question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Lemon Grilled Salmon
Ingredients:
2 tsp. snipped fresh dill or 1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. lemon-pepper seasoning
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 salmon fillet (1 1/2 lb.)
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
3 Tbsp. chicken broth
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. chopped green onions (can substitute regular)
1 small lemon, thinly sliced
2 onion slices, separated into rings
Directions:
In a small bowl, mix together dill, lemon-pepper, salt and garlic powder.
Sprinkle on salmon.
Place in a large resealable plastic bag or shallow glass container.
Combine brown sugar, broth, oil, soy sauce and green onions.
Pour over the salmon. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Turn once.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Broiled Salmon With Herbed Lemon Butter
Ingredients:
8 (4 to 6 oz.) salmon fillets
1/4 c. butter, melted
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. dill weed, rosemary or marjoram, crushed
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. coarsely grounded pepper
Directions:
Line broiler pan with foil and place salmon fillets on the well-greased rack.
Combine remaining ingredients; baste salmon with mixture.
Broil 4 inches from heat, allowing 10 minutes cooking time per inch of thickness measured at its thickest part or until salmon flakes easily when tested with a fork.
Do not turn salmon.
Baste several times during cooking.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Grilled Lemon Salmon
Ingredients:
2 tsp. fresh dill
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 lb. salmon filet
1/4 c. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. oil
1 cube chicken bouillon, mixed with 3 Tbsp. water
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. green onions
1 lemon, thinly sliced
2 slices onions, separated into rings
Directions:
Sprinkle dill, salt, pepper and garlic powder over salmon and place in shallow pan. Mix sugar, bouillon, oil, soy sauce and green onions. Pour over salmon. Cover and chill for 1 hour; turn once. Drain and discard marinade. Put on grill over medium heat; place lemon and onion on top. Cover and cook for 15 minutes or until fish is done.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Dip
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. smoked salmon
1/3 c. mayonnaise
1/3 c. sour cream
1 clove garlic
2 dashes white pepper
1 dash dry dill weed
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Puree salmon.
Add all other ingredients, mixing well.

question: How do I make a lemon herb baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Easy Herbed Grilled Salmon
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. salmon filet
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 lemon
2 Tbsp. white wine
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
1/2 tsp. onion powder
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. parsley flakes
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Preheat grill. Make a tray out of heavy-duty foil by folding a long piece in half and folding up all 4 sides with the dull side up. Spray the bottom of the foil tray with cooking spray. Place fish filet in the tray, skin side down. Smear a thin line of butter on filet. Squeeze lemon juice liberally over filet and then a splash of white wine. Sprinkle remaining seasonings lightly over filet and transfer the foil tray to the hot grill. Cover. Cook for 10 minutes per inch of thickness of filet. DO NOT overcook or it will be dry and unpalatable. Turning is not necessary. Salmon is done when it turns a light pink color throughout.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Homemade Hummus
Ingredients:
2 c. dried garbanzo beans
1 onion, chopped
3 Tbsp. Frontier brand Mexican seasoning mix (or cumin, turmeric, chilies, onion powder, paprika, oregano and cayenne pepper)
6 cloves garlic, crushed
juice of 1/2 lemon
3 Tbsp. mellow white miso
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
2/3 c. raw sesame tahini
Directions:
Soak beans in 6 cups water overnight, then rinse well.
Drain. Place beans in crock-pot (high) for 10 to 12 hours until quite soft.
Cook also with 3 cloves of the garlic, 5 cups of water, onion and Mexican seasoning mix.
When done, place beans in food processor (use a slotted spoon so most of broth is left in crock-pot).
Blend with lemon, remaining 3 cloves garlic, white miso, olive oil, cayenne and tahini.
Add more broth little by little as needed to make a smooth paste.
You can find miso and tahini at health food markets.
This makes great sandwiches with mayo, avocado, sprouts and grated carrots.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 can chick peas, drained (reserve liquid to add if needed)
2 Tbsp. Tahini sesame paste
drizzle of olive oil
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. coriander
1 clove garlic, crushed
salt
juice from 1/2 of lemon
Directions:
Place all ingredients in food processor.
Process until well blended.
Serve with pita chips, celery, and carrot sticks.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. (15 oz. can) cooked chickpeas, drained, reserve liquid
1/4 c. tahini (sesame paste)
1/4 c. lemon juice
3 large cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground coriander
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. paprika
water if needed
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 c. scallions
dash of cayenne
Directions:
In blender (in batches) or in food processor, process chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice until mixture reaches consistency of coarse paste; use as much of reserved pea liquid or water as needed.
Add garlic, coriander, cumin, paprika and cayenne and process again.
Transfer to a bowl and add scallions. Cover and chill one hour before serving the dip.
Add parsley as garnish.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
2/3 c. white sesame seed
3/4 oz. garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
19 oz. can garbanzo beans
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. sugar
water (as needed)
pinch of cayenne (as needed)
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley (as needed)
Directions:
Process sesame seed several minutes until consistency of coarse peanut butter.
Add garlic cloves, their oil and lemon juice. Blend, then add drained garbanzos.
Add salt, cumin and sugar, then process until smooth.
Add very little water for sandwich spread, a bit more for dip.
Add a dash of cayenne pepper, if you like heat. Before serving, add chopped parsley for color and flavor.

question: How do I make homemade hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1/4 c. sesame seed
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, drained (reserve liquid)
4 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 cloves garlic
salt and pepper
Directions:
In small frying pan, toast sesame seed over low heat, shaking pan often, until golden brown (about 3 minutes).
Transfer seed to blender or food processor and add garbanzos, 2 tablespoons olive oil, lemon juice, garlic and 6 tablespoons reserved liquid. Whirl, adding more liquid if necessary, until hummus is smooth, but still thick.
Season with salt and pepper.
Place in shallow bowl.
Drizzle with remaining 2 tablespoons oil.
Makes 2 cups.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Baked Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. small white mushroom caps
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped
3 Tbsp. butter
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 c. light cream or half and half
2 egg yolks, lightly beaten
2 Tbsp. bread crumbs
paprika
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Sprinkle mushrooms with lemon juice.
In medium skillet, saute mushrooms with onion in butter.
Sprinkle with flour, salt, pepper and cheese.
Cover; simmer for 3 minutes. Put mushrooms into baking dish.
Combine cream and egg yolks; pour over mushrooms.
Cover with bread crumbs and touch of paprika. Bake until golden, 10 to 20 minutes.
Yields 6 servings.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Business
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. fresh mushrooms
8 slices white bread
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
2 eggs
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can mushroom soup
1/4 c. grated yellow cheese
butter
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Clean and slice mushrooms.
Saute in butter until slightly cooked.
Butter 3 slices of bread.
Trim crusts and cut into 1-inch squares.
Put in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Creamed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. mushrooms
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. minced onion
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. celery salt
1 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Slice or half washed mushrooms lengthwise.
In butter, in large skillet over low heat, saute onion until tender; add mushrooms.
Saute over medium heat, covered, stirring occasionally 8 to 10 minutes.
Stir in flour, salt, pepper, lemon juice, celery salt, then milk.
Cook over low heat, stirring until thickened.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Baked Mushrooms
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 small onions, chopped
2 eggs
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
1 lb. fresh mushrooms, coarsely chopped
3/4 c. light cream
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. milk
Directions:
In a medium skillet, melt butter and saute onions until golden.
In a 1 1/2-quart casserole, beat eggs, then mix in crumbs, milk, cream, salt and pepper until crumbs absorb liquid. Blend in mushrooms and onions.
Bake at 350° for 60 to 70 minutes until golden and set.

question: What can I make with polenta and mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Patties
Ingredients:
2 c. mushrooms, cut up
1/2 c. flour
2 beaten eggs
1/2 tsp. baking powder
dash of salt and pepper
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
sweet basil to taste
Directions:
Mix ingredients into a batter.
Pour about 1/4 inch or more oil in a skillet.
When oil is hot, take a tablespoon of batter at a time, and place in hot oil.
Flip once and fry until golden brown.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Chicken In A Sack
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. catsup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
4 Tbsp. water
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 tsp. red pepper
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. chili powder
2 frying size chickens, cut up into pieces
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except chicken and heat.
Salt and flour chicken pieces.
Then dip in sauce that has been heated.
When saturated, place in a well-greased paper grocery bag.
Twist bag closed.
Place on broiler pan.
Cook 15 minutes at 450°, then lower to 250° for 1 hour or until tender.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Gentlemen Prefer Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. Chicken, cut up
Salt and Pepper to taste
1/4 c. Oil
1 can Lemonade Concentrate, thawed
3/4 c. crushed Pineapple, drained
3/4 c. chunk Pineapple, drained
2 Green Bell Pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. Brown Sugar
1/4 c. A-1 Steak Sauce
1/2 c. Slivered Almonds
Directions:
Brown chicken in skillet with oil, salt and pepper with a little butter.
When brown place in baking dish.
Put remaining ingredients over chicken in the order given.
Bake uncovered at 400 degrees for 45 minutes.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Deep South Ovenly Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 pkg. biscuit mix
1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. paprika (optional)
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/2 c. margarine or butter, melted
6 legs and thighs or 6 breasts, pat dry (with or without skin)
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients in paper bag.
Dip chicken into milk, then place into bag.
Shake to coat well.
Place in 13 x 9-inch shallow baking dish.
Pour magarine or butter over chicken.
Bake, uncovered, 1 hour at 350°.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken With Gravy
Ingredients:
6 thighs, skin removed
1 whole breast, cut into 4 pieces and skin removed
low-fat buttermilk
1 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. paprika
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
canola oil
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch
1 can evaporated milk
1/4 c. minced green pepper
1/4 c. minced onion
1/4 c. minced celery
1 1/2 c. chicken stock
Directions:
In a large bowl, cover chicken with buttermilk; marinate for about an hour.

question: I want a recipe for chicken made on the stove.
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless chicken breasts
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1 tsp. ginger
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper
2 onions, cut in wedges
2 carrots
1 bunch broccoli
Directions:
Cut and skin (if not already) chicken in thin strips.
Set aside.
In small bowl, blend sauce mixture.
Set aside.
Add oil to wok.
Preheat.
Slice green pepper, carrots and onions into thin strips.
Cut broccoli into small pieces.
Stir-fry carrots and broccoli for 2 minutes.
Add onions and green pepper.
Add chicken to wok, stir-fry for 4 minutes.
Add sauce mixture. Cover and simmer on low for 2 minutes . Serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: Easy No-Knead Bread(Very Good)
Ingredients:
2 c. unbleached or all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
2 pkg. active dry yeast
1 egg
1 c. water
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. milk
Directions:
(Generously use cooking spray at the bottom of your baking pan.)

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No Knead Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. boiling water
1 Tbsp. oleo
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
1 pkg. dry yeast or 1 yeast cake
1/4 c. lukewarm water
3 1/2 c. flour
3 Tbsp. nonfat dry milk
Directions:
Place first 3 ingredients in a large bowl and let cool to lukewarm.
Beat egg slightly and stir in.
Sprinkle yeast into 1/4 cup warm water and stir until dissolved.
Add to egg mixture.
Sift flour, measure and lightly stir in dry milk.
Add 1/3 of dry ingredients into yeast mixture at one at a time and beat after each addition until smooth.
Cover with moist cloth and let rise to almost double.
Punch down and place in greased 9 x 5 loaf bread pan.
Let rise slightly and bake in a 375° oven for about 45 minutes or until golden.
Take out of pan immediately to cool. Makes 1 loaf.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No-Knead Bread
Ingredients:
3 pkg. dry yeast
2 eggs
10 c. flour
4 tsp. salt
3 3/4 c. warm water
6 Tbsp. soft margarine
6 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Dissolve dry yeast in warm water; add remaining ingredients one by one.
Mix by hand until moist.
Seal in Tupperware fix-n-mix bowl until seal pops off.
Divide into 4 loaves.
Cover with towel and let rise 1/2 hour.
Bake at 350° for 1/2 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No Knead Bread
Ingredients:
2 pkg. dry yeast
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. sugar
2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. cooking oil
1 c. milk
1 c. water
1 egg
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients in large mixer bowl.
Set aside.
In saucepan, over low heat, combine oil, milk and water.
Heat until temperature reaches 120° to 130°.
Combine dry ingredients with the liquids, add egg.
Blend at low mixer speed until moistened.
Beat three minutes at medium speed.
By hand, stir in another 2 or 2 1/2 cups of flour to form a stiff batter.
(Batter will follow spoon.) Cover batter with damp cloth; let rise in warm place (80° to 85°) until light and doubled, about 50 minutes.
Stir down batter, spoon into greased two 8 x 4-inch loaf pans, batter does not rise a second time before baking.
Immediately place in oven.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes.
Cool on rack.
Brush with melted butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for a no-knead bread?
answer:
Title: No Knead White Bread
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dry yeast
1/4 c. lukewarm water
3 Tbsp. butter, cut into 3 pieces
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 c. boiling water
3 c. white flour (plus a little more at the end)
Directions:
Stir the yeast into the lukewarm water.
Set aside.
Put butter, sugar and salt in a medium bowl.
Add boiling water and stir.
When this is lukewarm, stir in the yeast mixture.
Now add the liquid mixture slowly to the flour by hand or mixer.
When everything is combined and mixture is smooth, cover and leave in warm place to rise until double in bulk, about 1 hour.
Stir the dough until it deflates.
Spoon into a regular size loaf pan that has been buttered.
The dough will be soft and spongy.
Pat the top of the log with a floured hand to smooth it out.
Let it rise again, lightly covered, just until edges of loaf reach top of pan, 30 minutes.
Bake at 375° for 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Spicy Spinach
Ingredients:
3 (10 oz.) boxes frozen, chopped spinach
1/2 c. spinach liquid, reserved from cooking spinach
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 onion, chopped
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. skim milk
1 (6 oz.) roll hot pepper cheese, cubed
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Cook spinach according to directions on package; drain well, reserving 1/2 cup spinach liquid.
Set aside.
In pan coated with nonstick cooking spray, melt margarine and saute onion until tender.
Add flour; stir.
Gradually add milk and spinach liquid to make sauce.
Cook until mixture thickens.
Add cheese and seasonings; cook until cheese is melted.
Add spinach to pan, combining well.
Yields 10 servings.
A favorite of spinach lovers.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. mayo
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 pkg. Good Seasons Italian dressing mix
Directions:
Blend well all ingredients.
Chill.
Hollow out pumpernickel roll.
Fill with dip.
Use bread for dipping.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 c. sour cream
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/4 c. minced onion
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dill weed
1 Tbsp. salad seasoning
Directions:
Defrost spinach and drain well.
Combine with all ingredients. Mix well and chill.
Serve with fresh vegetables or crackers.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chopped spinach
16 oz. sour cream
8 oz. cream cheese
Good Seasons Italian dressing
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Chill and serve.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen spinach, thawed, drained and chopped
1 c. mayonnaise
1 c. sour cream
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/2 c. green onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. dill seed
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Mix ingredients and refrigerate for several hours before serving. Serve with fresh raw vegetables (carrots, broccoli, celery, cauliflower, radishes, etc.) or chips and crackers.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ganoush(From "Wings Of Life" Cookbook)
Ingredients:
1 medium eggplant
4 or 5 cloves garlic, mashed
1 tsp. sea salt
1/2 c. tahini
juice of 1 lemon
1/2 c. finely minced fresh parsley
sprinkle cayenne pepper
Directions:
Prick the whole unpeeled eggplant in a few places with a fork, place it on a baking sheet and broil it about 4 inches from the heat in the oven.
Turn it to cook on all sides, until the eggplant is completely collapsed.
This takes about 20 minutes. When the eggplant is cool enough to handle, peel off the charred skin.
Beat the pulp with a fork until it is smooth or puree in blender.
In a separate bowl, mix garlic and salt.
Stir in the tahini.
With a wooden spoon, beat in the lemon juice.
Beat the tahini mixture into the eggplant a little at a time.
The mixture should whip up nicely and turn a lighter color.
Add the fresh parsley and cayenne pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Puree(Baba Ghanouge)
Ingredients:
2 large eggplants
1/2 c. tahini (sesame paste)
3 garlic cloves, crushed
3 lemons
salt to taste
olive oil
Directions:
Pierce eggplants at different points.
Broil for 30 minutes, turning occasionally (the surface should be burned and cracked). Remove skin, drain pulp.
Combine all ingredients in blender; puree until smooth.
Garnish with chopped parsley and olive oil. Eat with fresh pita bread.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ghanouj(Eggplant Puree)
Ingredients:
2 unpeeled eggplant (medium size)
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. Tahini
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of paprika
Directions:
Place eggplant in a baking pan and bake in oven at 375° for about 30 minutes.
Remove eggplant and let cool; split open and scoop out pulp; set aside.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Baba Ghamouj(Eggplant Dip)
Ingredients:
1 medium eggplant
3 Tbsp. tahini (sesame extract; can be purchased from health food stores)
juice of 2 lemons
2 cloves garlic, minced
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. red bell pepper, chopped fine
Directions:
Broil eggplant with skin on, turning it frequently.
Or, you may cook eggplant in microwave for 6 minutes.
(Ensure the use of fork to make small holes in eggplant before it is placed in microwave.)
When cool, remove skin and mash like a potato.
Mix other ingredients; add to eggplant and blend well. Garnish with parsley and olive oil.
Serve with pita bread.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a recipe for roasted eggplant dip (Baba Ganoush)?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Appetizer(Baba Ghannuj)
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1 clove garlic
2 Tbsp. water
1/4 c. sesame seed paste (tahini)
olive oil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. lemon juice
parsley (for decoration)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Wash and remove stem of eggplant. Pierce with a fork about 5 times.
Place in a baking dish.
Bake for 45 minutes or until tender.
Remove from oven and run under cold water.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Strong Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. anchovy paste
1 Tbsp. drained capers
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and whisk.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 part Balsamic Vinegar
2 parts Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1/2 tsp Dijon Mustard
3 pinches of Pepper
2 pinches of Kosher Salt
1 pinch of Sugar
Directions:
Whisk all ingredients until oil and vinegar become creamy. Spoon onto salad as needed.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Red Wine Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
1/2 c. olive oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
3/4 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Mix well and chill.

question: How do I make a light lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 c. oil
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. wine vinegar (raspberry wine vinegar, if possible)
3 tsp. light soy sauce
1 1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Heat the vinegar; add sugar and stir until dissolved.
Remove from heat. Add oil and soy sauce. Mix in salt and pepper. Cover and
refrigerate until ready to use. Put in blender or food processor to emulsify.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Roasted Rosemary Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 large baking potatoes
olive oil*
4 to 5 garlic cloves
salt
pepper
rosemary (dry or fresh)
Directions:
Peel and cut potatoes into eighths.
Rinse in cold water; drain and pat dry.
Put potatoes into a large casserole dish, making sure potatoes are not crowded.
Add the rest of the ingredients.
Toss and bake in a hot oven (400 to 450°) until potatoes are tender and thoroughly browned.
Taste for seasonings. Delicious served with beef, veal or chicken dishes.
Serves 4 to 6.
Be prepared to double next time!!!

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Rosemary Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 lb. small red potatoes
fresh rosemary sprigs
6 cloves garlic, thinly sliced
olive oil
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°F.
Lightly oil baking pan.
Cut a narrow wedge 2/3 through each potato.
Insert a rosemary sprig and a sliver or two of garlic in each wedge.
Drizzle a bit of olive oil in the opening, too.
Place potatoes in baking dish, making sure none of them touch.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Potatoes Rosemary
Ingredients:
1 med onion, thinly sliced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. grated lemon rind
1/4 cup bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 cups potatoes, peeled and diced
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1 cup shredded cheddar cheese (4 ozs.)
2 tsp. fresh or 1 tsp. dried Rosemary
Directions:
Saute onions and garlic until tender.
Stir in potatoes, seasoned salt, pepper and lemon rind.
Spoon half of mixture in lightly greased 1-1/2 qt.
baking dish.
Sprinkle half of the cheese.
Repeat with remaining potato mixture and cheese.
Stir together bread crumbs, butter and Rosemary.
Sprinkle over top. Bake covered at 400 degrees for 40 minutes.
Uncover and bake another 20 minutes or until potatoes are tender.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Potatoes With Rosemary
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. light olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 lb. new potatoes, scrubbed and cut in 1-inch pieces
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 1/4 tsp. fresh rosemary, crumbled
Directions:
Heat olive oil and minced garlic in 10-inch heavy skillet over low heat until garlic starts to sizzle, about 10 minutes. Add potatoes.
Sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper and tiny pinch rosemary; toss to coat.
Increase heat to medium and cook, covered, until potatoes are tender when pierced, about 15 minutes.
Uncover skillet.
Increase heat to high and cook, stirring frequently, until well browned, 3 to 4 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining rosemary and additional salt and pepper. Any leftovers make ideal additions to beef or turkey hash.

question: How do I make garlic mashed potatoes with rosemary?
answer:
Title: Rosemary Potatoes
Ingredients:
potatoes
1/3 c. olive oil
4 tsp. dried rosemary
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Leave peel on potatoes and slice round.
Layer potatoes in baking dish; sprinkle each ingredient over.
Repeat.
Use more salt, if desired.
Bake at 400° for 1 hour.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Salad
Ingredients:
4 pkg. Ramen noodles (chicken flavor)
1 onion, chopped
1 carrot, grated
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
black olives, sliced (optional)
other veggies (optional)
Directions:
Cook noodles.
Drain.
Run cold water until noodles are cool. Add seasoning packages and mix well.
Add onion, carrot, olives and other veggies.
Mix well.
Spoon noodle mixture into rectangular serving dish.
Spread mayonnaise on top; just enough to coat.
Refrigerate until ready to serve.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Salad
Ingredients:
2 pkg. Ramen noodles (chicken)
1 c. sunflower hearts, roasted
1 c. almonds (slivered)
4 c. cabbage, shredded
1/2 c. celery (fine)
3/4 c. carrots, sliced thin
1 small onion, diced
Directions:
Combine the ingredients.
Crush Ramen noodles (do not cook). Mix all.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Oriental
Ingredients:
5 pkg. Ramen noodles
2 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion
4 stalks celery
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms
1/4 stick butter
1/2 c. soy sauce
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Brown beef and drain.
Saute onions, celery, mushrooms and soy sauce in butter.
Add salt and pepper.
Bring noodles to a boil. Boil 3 to 4 minutes; drain.
Serve by making a noodle bed.
Place beef mixture on top.
Serve hot.
Fast meal.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Noodles
Ingredients:
1 bag Ramen noodles
Directions:
Cook a bag of Ramen noodles as directed on bag.
Put in 2 bowls and serve.

question: How can I make a quick ramen noodle dish?
answer:
Title: Ramen Noodle Stew
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) bag cole slaw
1 pkg. Ramen noodles (chicken flavored)
1/2 c. slivered almonds, toasted
1/2 c. olive oil
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. Accent
seasoning packet (from noodles)
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Mix first 3 ingredients together, then mix next 7 ingredients together and pour over slaw mixture.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. lean stewing beef
flour (for coating beef)
oil (for browning beef)
2 celery stalks, chopped
pinch of minced garlic
2 bay leaves, crushed
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
2 Tbsp. brandy (optional)
1 1/2 c. red wine
1 c. beef stock or bouillon
3/4 c. sliced mushrooms
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Coat meat with flour and brown in oil.
Add all the other ingredients, except celery and mushrooms.
Simmer on low for 2 hours.
Add celery and mushrooms during last 10 minutes of cooking.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
2 lb. lean beef chuck round, cut in 1 1/2-inch cubes
2 Tbsp. butter or fat
2 Tbsp. sherry (heated optional)
24 small white onions
12 large mushrooms, quartered
1 tsp. tomato paste
1 tsp. browning gravy (gravy starter)
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. beef consomme
1 c. red wine
salt and pepper to taste
bouquet garni (1 small bay leaf, 2 sprigs thyme, marjoram and 2 Tbsp. parsley)
Directions:
Brown meat fast in hot fat in heavy skillet.
Pour sherry over and transfer to medium casserole.
Salt lightly.
In remaining fat, saute onions and mushrooms lightly; stir in tomato paste, meat glaze and flour.
Add slowly, consomme and 1/4 cup wine.
Stir until boils.
Season to taste and pour over beef in casserole.
Add bouquet garni.
Cover and cook in slow oven (250°) about 3 hours until meat is tender and cuts with a fork.
Add remaining wine at intervals.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignonne
Ingredients:
1 c. quartered mushrooms
1/2 c. each: frozen pearl onions, sliced carrots and canned ready-to-serve beef broth
1/4 c. each: dry red table wine and canned crushed tomatoes
1 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 tsp. all-purpose flour
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 lb. boneless beef sirloin, cut into 1-inch cubes, broiled until medium done
1/4 tsp. rosemary leaves
1/8 tsp. each: salt and pepper
Directions:
In 1-quart casserole, combine all ingredients except beef, rosemary, salt and pepper.
Stir to dissolve tomato paste and flour.
Microwave on High for 5 minutes until vegetables are tender, stirring every 2 minutes.
Add remaining ingredients and stir.
Microwave on High 1 minute until heated through.
Serves 2. Contains 269 calories, 8 gm fat and 532 mg sodium.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 lb. lean stew beef, cut in 1-inch cubes
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. flour
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 c. red wine (boil 5 minutes before using)
1 can beef bouillon
2 tsp. tomato paste
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Brown beef and onion in oil. Sprinkle with flour and brown. Add remaining ingredients, except mushrooms. Cover and simmer slowly for 2 1/2 hours. Add mushrooms in last 15 minutes. Serve over plain or wild rice.

question: How do I make a rich beef bourguignon?
answer:
Title: Beef Bourguignon
Ingredients:
1 c. onion, sliced
1/4 c. butter
3 lb. round steak, cut in 1 1/2-inch cubes
3 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 lb. button mushrooms
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. marjoram
3 drops garlic juice
2 c. beef bouillon
1 c. red Burgundy wine
Directions:
Saut onions in butter in a heavy saucepan until tender.
Add meat and brown on all sides.
Add flour, salt, pepper, herbs and garlic juice.
Stir until smooth.
Add 1 1/2 cups bouillon and 1/2 cup wine.
Simmer 3 hours.
Add mushrooms.
Cook 1 hour more; add remaining bouillon and wine as needed.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked, diced chicken
1 pkg. Stove Top dressing
1/2 pkg. seasoning in Stove Top
2 c. chicken stock (no salt)
2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped bell pepper
dash of Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. pimento
mushrooms, sauteed in butter
2 Tbsp. grated onion
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 c. mayonnaise
3/4 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. chopedd nuts
2 c. crushed potato chips
Directions:
Moisten poultry dressing with chicken stock.
Combine with all but last three ingredients and put in 9 x 13-inch pan.
Top with grated cheese, chopped nuts and crushed potato chips.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until brown.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. chopped chutney
1 tsp. curry
2 tsp. grated lime peel
1/4 c. fresh lime juice
1/4 tsp. salt
4 c. diced chicken
2 c. pineapple chunks, drained
2 c. sliced celery
1/4 c. chives
1/2 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Mix
first
five ingredients.
Add rest and refrigerate overnight.	Serve over lettuce.
Also good made with shrimp.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. diced celery
3 c. cubed cooked chicken
1/2 c. small seedless grapes
1/2 c. toasted pecans, coarsely chopped
1/4 c. flaked coconut
1/4 c. whipping cream, whipped
3/4 c. salad dressing or mayonnaise
1/4 tsp. salt
few grains pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine the first 5 ingredients, tossing together lightly with a fork.
Gradually blend the salad dressing and seasonings into whipped cream.
Pour over salad ingredients in bowl; fork-toss to mix lightly but thoroughly.
Cover; chill thoroughly.
Serve on chilled, crisp greens, or use to fill center of a tomato.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Curried Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
6 c. breast of chicken, diced
1 1/2 c. celery, diced
1/2 c. red onion, chopped
1/2 c. fresh parsley, chopped
1/2 c. raisins
3/4 c. cashews
1 Tbsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. white pepper
1 3/4 c. mayonnaise
2 papayas, peeled and halved
3 heads romaine lettuce, chopped except for 8 leaves
Directions:
Mix chicken, celery, onion, parsley, raisins, cashews, curry powder, pepper and mayonnaise.
Arrange lettuce on 4 plates.
Place 1/2 papaya on each plate.
Fill with 2 scoops of salad.
Salad tastes best if made a day ahead.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with leftover rotisserie chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
2 lb. cooked chicken breast
1 c. onions, chopped fine
1 c. celery, chopped fine
mayonnaise
Directions:
Chop chicken up fine.
Mix well.
Add mayonnaise to your taste.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Green Salad
Ingredients:
6 medium-sized romaine lettuce leaves, torn
1/2 c. parsley, torn
3/4 c. purple (Chinese) cabbage, slivered
1/2 c. celery, sliced diagonally
2 or 3 red onions rings, sliced very thin
1/2 avocado, sliced lengthwise
olive oil to taste
lemon juice to taste
Directions:
Prepare greens in a salad bowl; add celery and toss.
Garnish with onion and avocado.
Add olive oil and lemon juice or other favorite dressing.
Serves two.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Very Green Dressing
Ingredients:
1 handful parsley
1 handful fresh spinach leaves
1/2 small zucchini, chunked
10 to 15 fresh basil leaves
2 cloves garlic
1 c. buttermilk
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. lemon juice
few pieces of avocado (optional)
Directions:
Whip all ingredients in a blender or food processor.
Keep refrigerated.
Makes about 1 1/4 cups.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Green Salad
Ingredients:
1 small head lettuce
1 layer grated carrots
1 layer chopped celery
1 layer green onions
1 can green peas, drained
Directions:
In clear glass bowl, layer lettuce, carrots, celery, onions and peas. Spread mayonnaise and sprinkle with 2 teaspoons sugar. Slice pimento olives over mayonnaise. Chill. Just before serving, fry 6 to 8 slices crisp bacon and crumble over top.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Green Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
1 can French-cut green beans, drained
1 can peas, drained
1 can whole grain corn, drained
1 c. celery, diced
1 c. green peppers, chopped
1 c. onions, chopped
1 small jar pimientos, drained and chopped
1 c. white sugar
1/2 c. oil
3/4 c. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. water
Directions:
In large bowl, mix together green beans, peas, corn, celery, green peppers, onions and pimientos.
In saucepan, mix together sugar, oil, vinegar, salt, black pepper and water.
Cook over heat until mixture boils.
Cool completely before pouring over vegetable mixture.
Refrigerate overnight before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a green smoothie?
answer:
Title: Green Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
1 can French-cut green beans, drained
1 can peas, drained
1 can whole grain corn, drained
1 c. celery, diced
1 c. green pepper, chopped
1 c. onions, chopped
1 small jar pimentos, drained
1 c. white sugar
1/2 c. oil
3/4 c. white vinegar
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. water
Directions:
In large bowl, mix together green beans, peas, corn, celery, green pepper, onions and pimentos.
In saucepan, mix together sugar, oil, vinegar, salt, black pepper and water; cook over heat until mixture boils.
Cool completely before pouring over vegetable mixture.
Refrigerate overnight before serving.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta And Tuna
Ingredients:
1 lb. spaghetti
2 Tbsp. oil
1 small green pepper, diced
5 medium mushrooms, diced
1 small onion, diced
2 fresh basil leaves, finely minced
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
1 clove garlic, finely minced
1 (6 1/2 oz.) can white tuna, packed in water
Directions:
Start preparing pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile heat oil over medium heat in pan and saute pepper, mushrooms, onion and basil until onion begins turning translucent. Add oregano and garlic; toss in pan for 1 minute.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
4 slices sweet onion (thin)
4 slices red onion (thin)
1/2 lb. tuna, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 small tomatoes, sliced
1/4 c. black olives, sliced
2 Tbsp. basil (fresh), minced
2 tsp. garlic, minced
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 lb. linguine
2 Tbsp. capers, drained
Italian parsley sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy medium skillet over medium-low heat.
Add onions and cook until translucent, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Add tuna, tomatoes, olives, basil, garlic, salt and pepper; cook until fish is opaque, stirring often, about 9 minutes.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
4 oz. spaghetti (2 c., cooked)
1 can tuna in water, drained and flaked
1/2 c. cooked peas
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. wheat germ
Directions:
In small saucepan over medium-high heat, heat oil.
Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes.
Add tomato sauce and oregano; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer, stirring occasionally about 15 minutes.

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta-Tuna Salad
Ingredients:
4 c. vegetable pasta (spiral)
2 cans white tuna (6 oz. each), drained
4 Tbsp. light mayonnaise
2 c. mixed vegetables
2 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. olive oil or butter
1 1/2 Tbsp. oregano
1/2 c. sliced black olives or green (optional)
Directions:
Put the pasta in boiling water for 13 to 15 minutes; drain and set aside.
Put the oil (or butter) in a pan with the mixed vegetables over low heat.
Cover and let it simmer for 15 minutes (after 3 minutes add 3 tablespoons water and cover again).
In a salad bowl, mix mayonnaise, salt and oregano with the tuna.
Add the cooked pasta and vegetables.
Sprinkle the sliced olives on top (if desired).

question: What can I do with canned tuna and pasta?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Supper
Ingredients:
1 (12 1/2 oz.) can tuna
1 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. sliced green onions
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. each: salt and pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
8 oz. spaghetti, cooked and drained
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Drain oil from tuna into a skillet; add butter and onions. Saute 1 minute.
Stir in flour and seasoning.
Add milk and then cook until slightly thickened.
Stir in tuna to heat and combine with spaghetti.
Serve with cheese, if desired.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 medium eggplant
2 c. tomato sauce
1 egg, beaten
1 c. breadcrumbs
1/4 c. oil
Mozzarella cheese
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Peel and slice eggplant.
Dip into egg and breadcrumbs.
Fry in oil until browned lightly.
Use a long, low baking pan and pour enough tomato sauce to cover the bottom.
Put one layer of fried eggplant slices and enough Mozzarella cheese to cover.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and cover with a layer of tomato sauce. Repeat process until all the ingredients are used, ending with cheese and sauce layer.
Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.
Serves four.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1 egg, beaten with milk
bread crumbs
garlic powder
cooking oil
2 c. tomato sauce
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 lb. Mozzarella cheese
salt (optional)
Directions:
Peel eggplant and slice.
Dip slices in egg and milk mixture, then into bread crumbs.
Cover bottom of frying pan with cooking oil and fry eggplant.
Sprinkle each slice with small amount of garlic powder while frying.
Add more oil as necessary.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 medium eggplant, halved and thinly sliced
3 eggs
1/4 c. water
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
2 c. dry bread crumbs
cooking oil
8 oz. grated Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 large can mushroom spaghetti sauce (I use Hunt's)
Directions:
In medium bowl, beat together eggs and water.
Coat eggplant slices in flour, then dip in egg mixture.
Coat with bread crumbs. Heat oil in large skillet and fry eggplant slices until lightly browned, turning once.
Drain on paper towels.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
2 eggs, beaten
1 to 2 c. bread crumbs (plain or seasoned)
3/4 c. olive or salad oil
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. oregano (optional)
1 1/2 c. tomato sauce
1 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Cut eggplant into slices (not too thick).
Dip each slice, first in egg, then into crumbs.

question: How do I make a classic eggplant parmesan?
answer:
Title: Eggplant Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 medium size eggplant
1 c. Parmesan cheese
Italian bread crumbs
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. oregano
1/2 c. oil
2 eggs, beaten
tomato sauce
grated Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Mix Parmesan cheese, bread crumbs, garlic, salt, pepper and oregano.
Slice
eggplant and dip in egg mixture, then in other mixture.
Fry until golden brown.
Place in baking dish and cover with sauce and Mozzarella cheese.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
6 lasagna noodles (4 oz.)
2 qt. water
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. (1/8-inch) bias-cut carrots (about 4 medium)
2 tsp. minced garlic
1 3/4 c. spaghetti sauce (one 15 oz. jar)
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
2 eggs
2 c. low-fat cottage cheese (about 16 oz.)
4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 (10 oz.) frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. quartered and sliced zucchini
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese (4 oz.)
Directions:
Cook lasagna noodles in boiling water about 12 minutes. Drain, rinse and cover with cold water.
Heat vegetable oil in saucepan.
Add onion, carrots and garlic.
Saute until carrots are tender, about 10 minutes.
Add spaghetti sauce, water and spices. Bring to a simmer.
Beat eggs and blend in cottage cheese, Parmesan cheese and vegetables.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onions
2 cloves garlic, minced
3 c. chopped canned tomatoes with juice
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, grated
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed to drain
1 c. cooked kidney beans
6 uncooked lasagna noodles, broken into thirds
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
In a quart-size glass measuring cup or bowl, place oil, onions and garlic.
Cook, uncovered, at Medium power (50%) for 1 minute. Add tomatoes, oregano and basil and cook, uncovered, at High power (100%) for 10 minutes.
Stir in Parmesan cheese, cottage cheese, spinach and beans.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped fresh mushrooms
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1 c. chopped green pepper
2 tsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
2 bay leaves
2 tsp. salt
salt and pepper
1 lb. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 (1 lb. 13 oz.) can tomato puree
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 c. freshly chopped tomatoes
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. Ricotta cheese
2 beaten eggs
1/2 lb. raw chopped spinach
dash of nutmeg
2 Tbsp. wheat germ
lasagna noodles
Directions:
In olive oil saute onion, garlic, green pepper, basil, oregano, bay leaves and salt.
When onions are soft, add tomato puree, tomato paste, chopped tomatoes and 1/4 teaspoon black pepper. Reduce heat and simmer for 45 minutes.
Add mushrooms, parsley, salt and pepper.
Mix Ricotta cheese, eggs, salt, pepper, spinach, nutmeg and wheat germ to make the filling.
You don't have to cook the noodles.
Spread a little of the sauce in a 13 x 9-inch pan. Place a layer of noodles next and then 1/2 of the filling.
Next add in a layer 1/2 of the rest of the sauce.
Layer the remaining ingredients in this order:
1/2 of the Mozzarella cheese, noodles, remaining filling, a little sauce, the rest of the Mozzarella cheese, another layer of noodles and the last bit of sauce. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 375° for 45 minutes.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna(Makes 8 Servings)
Ingredients:
8 oz. lasagna noodles, cooked tender
2 medium onions, chopped
4 cloves garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. tomato sauce, canned tomatoes or thinned paste
2 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. dried basil
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
2 tsp. salt
3/4 lb. sliced mushrooms, sauteed in olive oil
3/4 c. dry, small, red beans, cooked tender
3/4 lb. Mozzarella cheese (low-fat), thinly sliced
2 c. Ricotta cheese (low-fat)
1/2 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Rinse the cooked noodles in cold water.
Set them aside. Saute the onions and garlic in the olive oil until soft and transparent, but not browned.
Stir in the tomato, oregano, basil, parsley and salt.
Cook sauce about 1/2 hour, simmering it and stirring often until it has thickened.
Stir in the sauteed mushrooms and cooked beans.

question: I want a recipe for vegetarian lasagna.
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Lasagna
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lasagna noodles, cooked according to pkg. directions
1 medium onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. fresh parsley, minced
1 Tbsp. oregano
1 bay leaf
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 lb. fresh spinach
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 egg
3/4 c. Romano, grated
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 lb. Mozzarella, grated
Directions:
Cook noodles and drain.
In large skillet, saute onion, garlic and pepper in oil until golden, 5 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste, tomatoes, parsley, oregano, bay leaf and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Simmer, uncovered, for 20 minutes.
In medium size bowl, combine spinach, Ricotta, egg, 1/4 cup Romano, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper. Spoon 1/3 tomato sauce in bottom of 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Cover with layer of lasagna, half of the spinach and cheese filling, half of the Mozzarella and 1/4 cup Romano.
Repeat layers.
Top with remaining sauce and Romano.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef or turkey
1/3 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1 egg, well beaten
1 c. fresh bread crumbs
1/2 c. finely chopped onions
2 tsp. mustard
6 medium potatoes, cooked, drained and mashed
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. milk
1/4 c. butter
Directions:
Mash potatoes with salt, milk and butter.
Combine tomato juice, salt, peppers, egg, bread crumbs, onions and mustard.
Add ground beef or turkey and mix well.
Put mixture into a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Press in well.
Bake at 400° for 35 minutes.
Drain off grease.
Cover with mashed potatoes.
Bake additional 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 lb. hamburger meat
1 onion, finely chopped
1 large carrot, finely chopped
1 beef stock cube
1/2 tsp. mixed herbs
seasoning to taste
2 sticks celery, finely chopped
2 green onions (shallots), chopped
1 1/2 lb. potatoes, cooked and drained
1 oz. butter or margarine
1/4 c. milk
1 egg
Directions:
Heat oil in a large pan and saut meat, onions and carrot over a high heat until golden brown.
Add crumbled stock cube, mixed herbs, seasoning, celery and green onions (shallots).
Simmer for 5 minutes.
Spoon into greased ovenproof casserole.
Mash potatoes with butter and milk and spoon onto meat.
Brush with lightly beaten egg and bake at 400° for 30 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 Tbsp. minced onion
1 egg
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. bread crumbs or oatmeal
1 can English peas or peas and carrots, drained
1/2 to 3/4 c. grated cheese
1 c. water
1 1/2 c. instant mashed potato flakes
1 c. milk
1 egg
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Combine the first 6 ingredients and press into a 9-inch pie plate (bottom and sides).
Bake for 15 minutes in a 425° oven. Pour off fat.
Pour the peas or peas and carrots into shell. Sprinkle with the cheese.
Boil the water.
Add the potato flakes, milk, egg, butter, salt, onion and garlic salt.
Mix thoroughly. (May need to add more potatoes if too thin or more milk if too thick.)
Cover pie with potato mixture. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake again for 10 to 15 minutes until golden brown.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
5 c. mashed potatoes
3 Tbsp. butter
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. minced parsley
1/2 c. cream cheese, softened
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. chopped onions
2 tsp. basil
1 1/2 tsp. tarragon
2 c. chopped broccoli or sliced zucchini
1 c. chopped green pepper
1 c. cooked chickpeas
2 c. sliced mushrooms
2 c. corn
1 1/4 c. sour cream
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Combine mashed potatoes with 2 tablespoons butter, 1/2 teaspoon salt, pepper, parsley and cream cheese in a large bowl; set aside.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat; saute onions, basil, tarragon and broccoli or zucchini.
Add green pepper, 1/4 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste.
When vegetables are tender, but not overcooked, set aside.
Add chickpeas and mix well.
Pour into a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.
Heat 1 tablespoon butter in skillet.
Saute mushrooms.
Remove from heat.
Add corn and sour cream.
Layer on top of vegetables, then layer on mashed potatoes, then grated cheese.
Bake, covered, for 30 minutes at 350°, then uncover and bake for 10 to 15 minutes, until browned a bit on top.
Let sit 10 minutes before cutting.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a traditional shepherd’s pie?
answer:
Title: Shepherd'S Pie
Ingredients:
8 slices day-old bread
2 c. diced chicken
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2/3 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. mayo
1 1/2 c. milk
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 can cream of chicken soup, undiluted
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cut and cube 4 bread slices in greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Mix chicken, pepper, celery, mayo, onion, salt and pepper and spread over bread cubes.
Lay other bread cubes or slices on top.
Beat egg and milk together and pour over mixture.
Chill overnight in fridge.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Chicken Feed
Ingredients:
1 small onion, diced
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. dried thyme, divided
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
4 c. cubed, leftover, cooked chicken
4 c. leftover gravy
1 chicken bouillon cube, crushed
dash of pepper
3 c. mashed potatoes
Directions:
In a skillet, saute the onion, mushrooms, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon thyme in butter. Stir in the chicken, gravy, bouillon and pepper. Spoon into a greased 3-quart casserole.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Chicken Feed
Ingredients:
1 small onion, sliced
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. dried thyme, divided
1 Tbsp. margarine
4 c. cubed leftover chicken or turkey
4 c. leftover gravy
1 chicken bouillon cube, crushed
dash of pepper
3 c. mashed potatoes
Directions:
In skillet, saute onion, mushrooms, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon thyme in the margarine.
Stir in the chicken, gravy, bouillon and pepper; spoon into a greased casserole and remaining thyme.
Spoon over mixture.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes.
Yield:
6 to 8 servings.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Poultry Main Dishes
Ingredients:
3/4 c. Italian-seasoned fine dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
6 whole large chicken breasts, skinned, split lengthwise and boned
1/2 c. sliced green onion
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 c. milk
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
1 (4 oz.) pkg. boiled ham slices, diced
boneless chicken breast
8 oz. sour cream
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/3 soup can sherry
1 jar sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Place chicken breast in bottom of casserole dish.
Mix soup, sour cream and sherry.
Pour over chicken.
Spread mushrooms on top.
Cook, covered, in 325° oven for 45 minutes.
Uncover and cook for 15 minutes at 350°.
Serve with egg noodles.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Chicken For A Crowd
Ingredients:
4 c. diced, cooked chicken or turkey
1 c. chopped celery
2 Tbsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. mayonnaise
a little curry
water chestnuts, if desired
8 slices bread, cubed
3 eggs
1 pt. half and half cream
1 can cream of mushroom or cream of chicken soup
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Put 4 slices cubed bread on bottom of a greased 9 x 13-inch Pyrex dish.
Add chicken mixture.
Top with 4 slices of cubed bread.
Mix eggs and half and half cream.
Pour over casserole. Let stand, covered in refrigerator, overnight.
Next day, spread soup over mixture.
Top with grated Cheddar cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Serve immediately.
Serves 10.

question: Can you suggest a meal with chicken and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Yummy Chicken Dinner
Ingredients:
1 (2 or 3 lb.) chicken
6 potatoes
6 carrots
1 small onion
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 can condensed onion soup
1 c. giblet water or bouillon
Directions:
In roasting pan, heat oil and butter.
Add flour and stir until light brown.
Add cup of liquid slowly, stirring to make gravy.
Meanwhile, have potatoes, carrots and onion sliced rather thin.
Mix with salt, pepper, Italian seasoning and the condensed onion soup.
Put potato mixture in gravy and place cut up chicken on top.
Cook about 1 hour at 350°.
Yields about 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: A Meal In Minutes
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef
3/4 c. Minute rice
1/2 c. green pepper, diced
1 c. diced celery
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 onion, diced
1 c. tomato juice
1 small can mushrooms
Directions:
Brown meat and add remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook in electric skillet for 20 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Quick Dinner Fix
Ingredients:
1 can Veg-All, drained
1 can corn soup
1/2 can tomato soup or 1/2 can mushroom soup
1 lb. ground chuck, browned and drained
1/2 onion
2 c. shredded cheese of choice
1 can biscuits
Directions:
Brown ground beef and onion, then drain.
Mix Veg-All, corn soup, mushroom soup or tomato soup, beef and onion all together. Combine in round cake pan.
Cover with cheese, then cut biscuits into fourths and put on top.
Bake in a 300° oven for 30 to 45 minutes, or until golden brown.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Quick Supper Casserole
Ingredients:
5 pork chops or 5 chicken breasts
2 c. instant rice
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
1 pkg. frozen mixed vegetables or canned
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Spray a large baking dish with Pam.
Place pork chops or chicken in pan.
Cover with mushroom soup.
Cook at 325° for about 25 minutes.
Prepare instant rice.
Remove meat from oven and add rice and frozen vegetables (that have been cooked in water and drained).
Return to oven for about 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve with salad and bread.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Super Easy, Super Quick Supper
Ingredients:
1 box frozen chopped chicken or 1 lb. chicken, chopped and cooked
1 bag frozen broccoli
1 jar mushrooms
1 small onion, chopped
1 can bean sprouts
1 can water chestnuts, sliced
1 pkg. stir-fry seasoning
soy sauce to taste
3 c. cooked white rice
Directions:
Heat 1 tablespoon cooking oil (any variety) in large frying pan.
Add onion and cook until clear.
Add chicken and cook until thawed.
Add broccoli and mushrooms and cook about 5 minutes until heated through.
Add bean sprouts and water chestnuts.
Mix stir-fry seasoning according to package directions and pour over stir-fry.
Add soy sauce to taste.
Be careful not to cook too long, bean sprouts will become soggy.
Serve immediately over hot cooked rice.

question: I need a recipe for a quick dinner under 20 minutes.
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Supper
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
salt to taste
4 medium potatoes, sliced
4 medium onions, sliced
4 medium carrots, scraped and sliced
Directions:
Form meat into individual loaf size.
Place on a piece of aluminum foil.
Over meat, place potatoes, onions and carrots. Sprinkle salt over vegetables.
Wrap securely and bake 40 minutes at 350°.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
5 (1 oz. each) sq. semi-sweet chocolate
2 (1 oz. each) sq. unsweetened chocolate
3 Tbsp. strong coffee
6 eggs
3 egg yolks
1 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. light rum
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
1/4 c. water
2 c. heavy or whipping cream
Directions:
In small saucepan, combine chocolates and coffee.
Heat over low heat until chocolates are melted.
Cool.
In a large mixer bowl, beat eggs and yolks on high speed 10 minutes.
Add sugar and beat until shiny, 5 minutes.
Add melted chocolates, rum and vanilla.
Beat just until thoroughly blended.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 eggs, separated
3/4 c. confectioners sugar
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate bits
5 Tbsp. cold water
pinch of salt
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Beat egg yolks and sugar until thick and lemon-colored.
Melt the chocolate with the water in a baking dish in a 350° oven for a few minutes.
Do not stir until chocolate is creamy.
Add egg yolks and sugar while chocolate is still warm.
Beat egg whites with pinch of salt until stiff.
Fold chocolate mixture into egg whites until there are no streaks.
Whip cream and add vanilla. Fold into chocolate mixture.
Spoon into serving bowl or individual cups.
Chill for 4 hours.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips
4 tsp. water
4 tsp. sugar
6 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. almond extract
2 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 pt. heavy cream
Directions:
Put first 3 ingredients in top of double boiler or microwave for 1 minute.
Melt and stir.
Separate eggs and beat whites until stiff; set aside.
Beat yolks; add salt, almond extract and vanilla.
Stir again.
Whip heavy cream until stiff; set aside. Blend everything to egg yolks.
Add everything to egg whites.
Add chocolate, egg whites and heavy cream.
Fold carefully.
Pour into another serving bowl.
Refrigerate 6 hours.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
1 (12 oz.) bag semi-sweet chocolate morsels
3 Tbsp. sugar
6 Tbsp. cold water
6 egg yolks
6 egg whites
2 pt. heavy cream
2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Melt chocolate bits and water in double boiler.
Add sugar and mix well.
Remove from heat; add egg yolks and cool.
Beat egg whites to peaks.
Fold into chocolate mixture.
Beat 1 pint of cream with vanilla.
Fold into chocolate mixture and chill for 24 hours.
Whip the remaining 1 pint of cream for a garnish on top of mousse.

question: How do I make a simple chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
1 pkg. semi-sweet chocolate pieces
1 Tbsp. flour
3 eggs, separated
1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. vanilla or rum
1 Tbsp. grated orange rind
1 1/2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour and egg yolks; stir in milk; heav over low heat, stirring with whisk until mixture reaches consistency of mustard sauce.
Add butter, 1 tablespoon at a time, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat.
Add chocolate; stir until melted. Stir in vanilla or rum, and orange rind.
Cool slightly.
Add stiffly beaten egg whites and 1 cup of the cream, whipped stiff. Pour into sherbert dishes.
Chill about 5 hours, until firm.
Whip remaining cream as topping.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
1 large onion, chopped
1 large green bell pepper, chopped
3 jalapeno chiles to taste (fresh or canned)
1 large can stewed tomatoes
5 cloves minced garlic
1 medium bunch cilantro (Chinese parsley), chopped
2 Tbsp. basil
1 Tbsp. oregano
2 cans tomato paste
juice from 1 lime
1 Tbsp. vinegar
water (as needed combined with jalapeno juice, if any)
salt
pepper
Tabasco
Directions:
Chop all ingredients and mix in herbs in a large bowl.
Add water, stewed tomatoes, tomato paste, lime juice, vinegar and jalapeno juice (if any) until desired consistency is achieved. Taste and adjust seasonings (salt, pepper and Tabasco) to taste. Let sit 24 hours in plastic or glass container with lid.
Keep refrigerated.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
4 c. tomatoes
3 c. peppers (2 sweet and 1 hot)
1 c. onion
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. vinegar
3 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Mix all together.
Boil to desired thickness.
Put in jars. Seal.
Pressure or cold pack for 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
1/2 gal. ripe tomatoes
2 sweet peppers
3 jalapenos
5 medium onions
1 clove garlic
1 1/2 tsp. canning salt
4 tsp. vinegar
Directions:
Chop all ingredients and combine in a large pot.
Bring to a boil.
Simmer 1 hour, put into hot jars and seal.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
10 qt. chopped tomatoes
2 large onions, chopped
1 qt. + 1 pt. green peppers, chopped
1/2 c. salt
6 c. jalapeno peppers, chopped
2 bulbs garlic
2 tsp. coriander (optional)
1 1/2 tsp. basil leaf
1 tsp. oregano leaf
2 c. lemon juice
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Chop in blender.
Cook until thickened.
Put into hot jars with hot lids.

question: What’s a good recipe for homemade salsa?
answer:
Title: Homemade Salsa
Ingredients:
2 large cans whole tomatoes
1 bunch green onions
2 or more jalapenos
juice of 1 lemon
juice of 1 lime
handful of fresh cilantro
3 Tbsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. Accent
1 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 Tbsp. garlic powder
Directions:
In a food processor, process onions, jalapenos, lemon juice, lime juice and cilantro.
Add drained tomatoes and pulse.
Add seasonings; mix by hand.
A good gift idea.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Corn Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. black beans (drained)
16 oz. (1 can) corn (drained)
1 lime, juiced
5 Tbsp. vegetable or olive oil
1/4 c. red onion, minced
1/4 c. scallions, minced
1/8 c. parsley or cilantro, minced
1 1/2 tsp. cumin
salt (to taste)
pepper (to taste)
1/2 c. tomatoes, chopped
Directions:
Mix together all ingredients, except tomatoes.
Cover and chill.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Corn And Black Bean Salad
Ingredients:
1 can black pinto or kidney beans
1 (8 oz.) can corn
1 c. chopped green or red pepper
1 onion, chopped
1/4 c. cider vinegar
2 tsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
Drain and rinse beans.
Drain corn.
Mix together with pepper and onion in a refrigerator bowl.
Combine remaining ingredients with wire whisk; pour over veggies and stir to coat.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Corn Salad
Ingredients:
1 can (15 oz.) black beans, rinsed and drained
4 oz. Monterey Jack cheese, cut into 1/4 cubes
1 can (8 3/4 oz.) whole kernel corn, drained
1/4 c. sliced green onions with tops
3/4 c. thinly sliced celery
1 small sweet red pepper, diced
3/4 c. picante sauce
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1 clove garlic, minced
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in large bowl, mix well.
Cover and chill several hours or overnight.
Serves 8.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Black Bean And Corn Salsa
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. frozen whole corn
1 c. canned black beans, rinsed
1 sweet red pepper, chopped
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
1 clove garlic, pressed
2 Tbsp. lime juice
2 tsp. chopped fresh cilantro
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook corn and drain. Combine corn and remaining ingredients. Makes 4 cups.

question: What can I cook with black beans and corn?
answer:
Title: Spicy Black Bean And Corn Salad
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can black beans, rinsed and drained
4 oz. Monterey Jack cheese, cut into 1/4-inch dices
1 (8 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
3/4 c. sliced green onions with tops
3/4 c. thinly sliced celery
1 small red bell pepper, diced
3/4 c. mild picante sauce
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 clove garlic, minced
Directions:
Combine beans, cheese, corn, green onions, celery and red pepper in large bowl.
Combine picante sauce, oil, lemon juice, cumin and garlic; mix well.
Toss with bean mixture.
Chill.
May serve with additional picante sauce, if desired.
Makes 8 servings or about 5 cups of salad.
Preparation Time:
30 minutes.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon (fried then crumbled)
2 1/2 c. cauliflower
3/4 c. sour cream (low fat version works just as well)
1/2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 sm. yellow onion, finely chopped
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook the cauliflower until firm, yet tender. Coarsely mash cauliflower with potato masher.
Add the sour cream, onion, cheese, salt and pepper.
Mix well.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Medley
Ingredients:
1 large head cauliflower
1 (10 oz.) pkg. Brussels sprouts
1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen creamed onions
2 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 c. shredded Cheddar
1 (2 oz.) jar pimento
1/4 c. seasoned bread crumbs
Directions:
Wash cauliflower.
Break into flowerets.
Cook covered in small amount of boiling salted water, about 10 minutes.
Cook Brussels sprouts and onions according to directions.
Combine all vegetables in lightly greased 9 x 13 dish.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Salad
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower, cut into florets
1 1/2 c. diced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
3/4 c. sliced green onions with tops
1/2 c. sliced radishes
1 (8 oz.) carton plain yogurt
2 Tbsp. white or tarragon vinegar
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. caraway seed
1 tsp. celery seed
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, toss cauliflower, carrots, celery, green onions and radishes.
Combine all of the remaining ingredients; pour over vegetables and stir to coat.
Cover and chill for several hours.
Yields 12 servings.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Scalloped Cauliflower
Ingredients:
One 10 1/2 oz. can of condensed cream of celery soup
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 tsp. fresh ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. shredded cheddar cheese
3/4 c. soft bread crumbs
1/4 c. snipped parsley
1/4 c. chopped pimento
1 Tbsp. minced onion
16 to 20 oz. fresh cauliflower, cooked and drained
Directions:
Combine soup, milk, and eggs. Stir in half of cheese, bread crumbs, parsley, pimento, onion, salt and pepper.
Then add cauliflower.
Turn into 10 x 6 x 2 inch baking dish.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.
Top with remaining cheese and bake 5 minutes more.
Serves 6-8.

question: How do I make mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Relish Salad
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower, broken into rosettes
2 c. carrots, sliced
1 green pepper, sliced
2 small cans mushrooms, sliced
4 oz. black olives, sliced
4 oz. green olives, sliced
1 large jar chopped pimentos
2 stalks celery, sliced
3/4 c. wine vinegar
1/2 c. oil
1 tsp. oregano
salt and pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and bring to boil; simmer 3 minutes. Place in container and cover.
Cool and chill overnight.
Drain to serve.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
olive oil flavored vegetable spray
1 medium onion, cut into thin slices
1 1/2 c. julienne cut carrots
1 1/2 c. fresh sugar snap peas
1 c. chopped red pepper
1/2 c. canned low sodium chicken broth (undiluted)
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Heat at medium-high (375°) until hot.
Add onion.
Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add carrot.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add peas and sweet red pepper. Stir-fry 4 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: "Stir-Fry Vegetables"
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. bean sprouts
10 pea pods
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 medium carrots, sliced
2 celery sticks, sliced
1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 medium bell pepper, sliced in rings or strips
1/2 medium brown onion, sliced in rings or strips
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add all vegetables, except onion, mushrooms and bell pepper.
Cook until vegetables are almost to the desired tenderness, then add the onion, mushrooms and bell pepper, adding as much soy sauce as desired to taste.
Cook up to 1/2 hour or until done to taste. Serve with rice, chow mein noodles or both.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 c. bean sprouts
2 c. sliced celery
6 mushrooms, sliced
1/2 c. carrots, sliced thin
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. oil
1/4 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. green peppers, sliced in strips
1/2 tsp. m.s.g. (optional)
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Mix salt, cornstarch, chicken broth, soy sauce and m.s.g.
Set aside.
Heat 2 tablespoons oil in wok.
Add carrots and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add mushrooms and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add remaining vegetables and stir-fry for 1 minute.
Add liquid mixture and stir-fry for another minute.
Remove from heat.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
3 cloves garlic, peeled
1 Tbsp. rice vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. catsup
1 chicken bouillon cube, crumbled
1/4 tsp. Chinese 5 spice seasoning
1 1/2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 tomato, peeled and cut in wedges
4 small carrots, cut lengthwise
1 medium onion, cut in wedges
8 stalks asparagus, cut up
2 Tbsp. water
4 small yellow squash, cut lengthwise
1 c. sliced celery
Directions:
In blender, process garlic with vinegar until finely chopped. Add soy sauce, catsup, bouillon and spice.
Blend smooth.
Heat oil in wok or large skillet over high heat.
Stir-fry carrots 2 minutes.
Add onions and fry 1 minute.
Add asparagus, stir and add 1 tablespoon water.
Cover lightly and steam 5 minutes.
Add squash, celery and remaining water.
Cover and steam 5 minutes or until tender-crisp.
Stir in tomato and garlic sauce.
Cover and cook 1 minute.

question: I need a recipe for a vegetable stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 tsp. peanut oil
3 carrots, sliced diagonally
1 medium size green pepper, seeded and cut into 1/4-inch pieces
1 medium sweet pepper (red)
3 green onions, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 (15 oz.) can baby corn-on-the-cob, drained
1 (6 oz.) pkg. frozen sweet peas
1/4 c. low sodium soy sauce
1 tsp. chicken flavored bouillon granules
3/4 tsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
Directions:
Coat a wok with oil. Drizzle oil around top of wok, coating sides. Heat at medium heat (350°) until hot. add carrots and stir-fry 2 minutes. Add peppers; stir-fry 3 to 4 minutes or until crisp. Remove from heat. Add green onions, corn and peas. Combine soy sauce and remaining ingredients. Stir-fry cook 3 minutes or until thickened.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
1 1/2 c. Quick Quaker oats, uncooked
1 c. sifted all-purpose flour
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 eggs, beaten
1/3 c. vegetable oil or melted shortening
Directions:
Pour milk over oats; let stand.
Sift together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.
Stir eggs into oats-milk mixture.
Add sifted dry ingredients.
Stir in oil.
Bake on hot, lightly greased griddle or frypan until golden brown, turning only once.
(For variety, sprinkle on pancakes before turning:
chopped apples, finely chopped luncheon meat, cooked corn, cooked sausage, or chopped cooked ham.)
Serve pancakes hot with syrup.
Makes 10 to 12 pancakes.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. oats
2 c. buttermilk
2 eggs
1/4 c. butter, melted
1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. vanilla or cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
1/3 c. raisins (optional; we don't use)
Directions:
Mix oats and buttermilk in large bowl.
Let sit a while (a few minutes okay or overnight in refrigerator).
Beat in eggs and butter.
Add raisins, if used.
Add rest of ingredients.
Heat a lightly greased frying pan over moderate heat.
If batter is too thick, you can add up to 3 tablespoons more buttermilk.
Cook pancakes until a few bubbles appear.
Turn to brown other side. Makes about 18 pancakes.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1 c. oats
2 c. water
2 eggs, separated
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/4 c. honey
1/2 tsp. salt
1/3 c. raisins
Directions:
Cook oats in water with salt for 5 minutes.
Beat egg whites until stiff.
Mix oats, egg yolks, melted butter, honey and raisins.
Fold in egg whites.
Pour into well-greased 8-inch pan and cook at 400° for 15 minutes or until set in the middle and light brown.
Recipe may be doubled.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, melted
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs, beaten (optional)
3 c. quick oats
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
Directions:
Cream together the first 3 ingredients.
Add the rest to creamed mixture.
Bake in a 10 x 10-inch pan at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes, stirring occasionally (stirring is not a must).
Add raisins if desired.
Can be mixed the night before.

question: Give me a quick breakfast idea with oats.
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil*
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
3 c. old fashioned oats
Directions:
*Can use 1/2 cup applesauce and cut the oil to 1 tablespoon.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Delight
Ingredients:
1 c. light cream
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
3 chopped hard-boiled eggs
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
dash of cayenne pepper
1 1/4 c. canned salmon, flaked
4 slices buttered toast or patty shells
Directions:
Place top chafing pan in water jacket.
When heated, put in cream, eggs, butter, cayenne and parsley.
While it's steaming, add drained salmon.
Heat through well.
Do not let it boil. Serve on toast or patties.
A dash of sherry is optional.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Divine Salmon
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. salmon (one piece)
1/2 lemon
1/2 onion, sliced
salt and pepper
1/4 tsp. dried tarragon leaves
1/4 c. chopped parsley
1 clove garlic, minced or pressed
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 medium tomato, sliced
dill and lemon slices for garnish
Directions:
Pat dry salmon. Should be cleaned and opened for stuffing. Squeeze lemon into fish cavity.
Place on buttered piece of foil. Fill salmon with tomato and onion slices.
Season with salt, pepper, tarragon and parsley. Close foil around fish.
Bake at 425° for 25 to 30 minutes.
Melt butter in skillet.
Saute garlic and diced tomatoes. Remove salmon to serving dish.
Spoon any juice over the fish.
Serve with sauteed tomatoes. Garnish with lemon slices.
Preparation time:
10 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Supper
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
3 Tbsp. fat
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can cream of mushroom or celery soup
1 (7 oz.) can salmon, drained
1 c. cooked peas
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 can biscuits
Directions:
Heat oven to 450°.
Saute onion and green pepper in hot fat until onion is golden.
Blend in salt and flour.
Gradually stir in milk and soup.
Bring to a boil.
Boil 1 minute.
Add flaked salmon, peas and lemon juice.
Pour into baking dish, 11 1/2 x 7 1/2 x 1 1/2-inch.
Top with biscuits.
