Bake 10 to 12 minutes. Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted salmon?
answer:
Title: Braised Salmon With Roasted Almonds(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. whole roasted almonds
3 Tbsp. extra-virgin olive oil (plus more for drizzling)
1/4 c. minced onion
1/4 c. minced cilantro
2 large garlic cloves, minced
2 anchovy fillets, drained and mashed
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
salt and freshly ground pepper
4 (6 oz.) skinless salmon fillets
3/4 lb. linguine
Directions:
In a mini processor, finely grind the almonds. In a large skillet, heat 3 tablespoons of the olive oil. Stir in the almonds, the onion, cilantro, garlic, anchovies and cayenne and season with salt and pepper. Add the salmon to the skillet and spoon some of the almond mixture on top. Season the salmon with salt and pepper and drizzle with a little olive oil. Cover the salmon and cook over moderate heat for 5 minutes. Reduce the heat to moderately low and cook until the salmon is just opaque throughout, 8 to 10 minutes longer.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Macaroni And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. macaroni
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
3 c. milk
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 eggs, beaten
some breadcrumbs
Directions:
Cook macaroni.
Combine butter, cheese, salt and pepper with hot drained macaroni in bowl and mix well.
Pour into greased 1 1/2-quart casserole. Beat eggs and milk in small bowl until well mixed.
Pour over macaroni.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes or until macaroni is set and golden brown on top.
Sprinkle with breadcrumbs.
Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Macaroni And Cheese(Home Economics Class Of 1946)
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. macaroni
3 Tbsp. margarine
3 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
1/2 lb. grated cheese
1 c. dried bread crumbs
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook macaroni in boiling water until tender; drain and wash. Make white sauce of flour, margarine, milk and seasoning.
Add 2/3 of cheese to sauce; stir until melted.
Pour over macaroni in a greased baking dish.
Sprinkle remaining cheese and bread crumbs over top.
Bake for 30 minutes at 325°.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Macaroni And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 c. macaroni pieces
3 eggs
2 c. milk
1/4 c. evaporated milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
dash of Tabasco sauce
3 Tbsp. melted butter
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Boil macaroni in salted water 6 minutes. Drain and rinse well to remove starch.
Set aside.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Macaroni And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 pkg. macaroni, cooked until tender
1 lb. grated cheese
3 eggs
2 c. milk
salt
pepper
Directions:
Cook macaroni in salted water until completely tender.
Drain. Dot 2-quart casserole dish with oleo.
Add part of macaroni and then part of cheese in alternate layers.
Cover with cheese.
Beat eggs and add the milk, salt and pepper to taste.
Add this to macaroni and cheese dish.
Bake until thickens in 400° oven.

question: How do I make baked mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 pkg. elbow macaroni
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar, grated
1/3 bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook
macaroni	as
directed
and drain. Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Blend in flour. Stir in milk slowly and cook, stirring constantly,
until	mixture thickens. Add seasonings and
cheese, stirring
until
cheese
melts. Add macaroni and transfer to a buttered 1-quart casserole. Combine bread crumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle over macaroni. Bake in a 400° oven for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Spiced Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
4 chicken breast halves, skinned and cubed
1/4 c. butter, melted
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/4 tsp. rubbed thyme
1/4 tsp. Cajun seasoning
1/2 c. dry breadcrumbs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Put last 7 ingredients into a plastic bag and shake well. Place foil over a baking sheet.
Dip chicken pieces in butter and shake a few at a time in the bag.
Place on baking sheet and bake at 400° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
3 boneless chicken breasts
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. Accent
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. basil
1/2 c. margarine, melted
Directions:
Cut each fillet in 6 to 8 nuggets, about 1 1/2 inches square. Combine bread crumbs, cheese, Accent, salt and herbs.
Dip chicken nuggets in melted butter, then in crumb mixture.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. dried basil
3/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
2 1/2 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes
Directions:
In a shallow bowl, combine the first 6 ingredients. Place melted butter in another. Dip chicken in butter and roll in crumbs. Place on a greased baking sheet and bake uncovered at 400° for 15 to 20 minutes or until juices run clear. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
7 to 8 whole skinless, boneless chicken breasts
2 c. fine dry bread crumbs
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. dried thyme
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. dried sweet basil
1 c. melted butter
Directions:
Cut chicken into 1 1/2-inch pieces.
Combine bread crumbs, cheese, salt and herbs.
Mix well.
Dip chicken pieces in butter. Coat with bread crumb mixture.
Place on baking sheet in a single layer.
Bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes or until done.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken nuggets?
answer:
Title: Chicken Nuggets
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 tsp. sesame seed
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 c. water
1 lb. chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
cooking oil
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Roll chicken in batter.
Fry in hot cooking oil until golden brown.
Drain.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. beef cubes
1 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 qt. water or vegetable stock
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
2 peppercorns
1 tsp. allspice
2 Tbsp. paprika
2 tsp. Spike (Gayelord-Hauser) seasoning
1/2 c. barley
1 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. diced carrots
2 c. fresh or canned tomatoes
2 Tbsp. Tamari soy sauce
Directions:
Brown meat in oil. Add water or stock and bring to a boil. Skim off foam if present. Add parsley and spices; cover and simmer 30 minutes. Add barley and vegetables; cover and simmer an hour or until barley is done. Add Tamari sauce and garnish with chopped fresh parsley.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Beef Barley Soup
Ingredients:
3 meaty beef soup bones (beef shanks or short ribs)
2 1/2 qt. water
1 medium onion, chopped
5 tsp. beef bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 bay leaves
1 1/2 c. chopped carrots
1 1/2 c. chopped celery
2 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed
1/2 c. medium pearl barley
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/4 tsp. dill weed
Directions:
In a Dutch oven or soup kettle, place soup bones, water, onion, bouillon, vinegar, salt, pepper and bay leaves.
Slowly bring to boil; skim foam with slotted spoon.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 3 to 4 hours.
Discard bay leaves.
Set bones aside to cool; remove meat from bones and dice.
Skim fat from the broth surface. Add meat, carrots, celery, potatoes, barley, thyme and dill.
Cover and cook for 1 hour or until barley and vegetables are tender. Serves 9.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Old Fashion Beef Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/4 lb. ground meat
3 medium, chopped onions
3 medium, sliced potatoes
3 celery stalks, diced
3 medium carrots, diced
2 (16 oz.) cans whole tomatoes
16 oz. can whole corn
16 oz. can peas
16 oz. can French-cut string beans
2/3 c. pearl barley
6 c. water
3 Tbsp. beef bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. sweet basil
2 bay leaves
Directions:
Brown meat with onions.
In large pan, put in browned meat with onions, water, potatoes, celery, carrots, tomatoes, barley and spices.
Simmer 45 to 60 minutes.
Add corn, peas and string beans; simmer 10 more minutes.
Add all liquids from the cans of vegetables.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Barley  Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 qt. water
1/2 c. barley
6 beef bouillon cubes
2 c. sliced carrots
1 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. chopped celery
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 pkg. frozen lima beans
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
Directions:
Brown beef.
Add water, salt, pepper, barley and bouillon cubes.
Simmer for 30 minutes, covered.
Add carrots, celery, onion and tomato sauce.
Simmer for 30 minutes.
Add frozen lima beans and simmer for another 15 minutes.

question: How do I make a hearty beef and barley soup?
answer:
Title: Beef And Barley Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean beef for stew
5 c. water
1/3 c. barley
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 to 5 medium carrots, sliced
1 c. celery, sliced
2 Tbsp. fat
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. instant beef bouillon
1/2 tsp. marjoram
1 bay leaf
1/2 lb. fresh green beans or 1 can
Directions:
Brown meat in fat.
Pour off drippings.
Add water, onion, barley, bouillon, thyme, marjoram, pepper and bay leaf.
Cover tightly and cook slowly for 1 1/2 hours.
Stir in carrots, celery and green beans (if canned, add at the end and heat).
Cook, covered, for 45 minutes or until all are cooked through.
Serves 5 to 6.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium shrimp
1/2 c. olive oil
1/4 c. scallions, chopped
1 stick butter
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 cloves chopped garlic
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In frying pan, melt butter.
Stir in olive oil, lemon juice, scallions, garlic, salt and pepper.
Place shrimp in the frying pan.
Toss around until coated with mixture and slightly pink.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi(Quick And Easy)
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
1/4 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. parsley
3/4 tsp. basil
3/4 tsp. oregano
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 to 2 lb. large shrimp
Directions:
Shell and devein raw shrimp.
"Butterfly" the shrimp by making a cut and splitting the thickest part.
Wash the shrimp and place it in a shallow baking dish.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. medium size or larger raw shrimp, shelled and deveined
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. minced green onion
1 Tbsp. olive oil or salad oil
4 to 5 cloves garlic, minced or pressed
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. minced parsley (I use dried)
1/4 tsp. grated lemon peel (optional)
dash of liquid hot pepper
Directions:
Pat shrimp dry with paper towels; set aside.
Melt butter in a wide frying pan over medium heat.
Stir in green onion, oil, garlic, lemon juice and salt.
Cook until bubbly.
Add shrimp to pan and cook, stirring occasionally, until shrimp turn pink (4 to 5 minutes).
Stir in parsley, lemon peel and hot pepper sauce. Great!

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. cleaned shrimp
3/4 c. melted butter
2 to 3 cloves minced garlic
4 to 5 chopped shallots
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. or more fresh parsley (for garnish)
Directions:
Clean shrimp.
May leave tail on.
Melt butter/margarine in frying pan.
Saute garlic and shallots until clear.
Add everything except parsley and shrimp.
Bubble one minute.
Place shrimp on broiler pan.
Pour half sauce over shrimp.
Broil 5 inches from heat for 3 minutes.
Turn over and pour remaining sauce on shrimp and broil additional 3 minutes.
Turn out onto serving dish; garnish with parsley.
Serve with white rice. Instead of broiling may also just add shrimp to frying pan with sauce and cook until shrimp are done.

question: How do I make a classic shrimp scampi?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Scampi
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. raw shrimp, shelled
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. minced green onion
1 Tbsp. oil
4 to 5 cloves minced garlic
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. minced parsley
1/4 Tbsp. grated lemon peel
dash of hot sauce
Directions:
Pat shrimp dry.
Melt butter in skillet.
Add oil, lemon juice, garlic and salt.
Cook until bubbly.
Add shrimp and green onion.
Cook until shrimp turns pink, about 5 minutes.
Blend in parsley, lemon peel and dash of hot sauce.
Serve over rice or pasta.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lasagna noodles
1 lb. ground beef
1 jar spaghetti sauce
3/4 lb. Mozzarella cheese
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 egg, beaten
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Do not cook the lasagna noodles. Brown beef, drain fat and add sauce. Cut 6 slices Mozzarella for topping.
Shred remainder and mix with Ricotta, egg, parsley, salt and pepper.
Ladle 1/3 of meat sauce into bottom of baking dish.
Add a layer of 1/3 of the noodles (uncooked) and a layer of 1/3 of the cheeses mixture. Repeat
layers 2 more times and top with Mozzarella slices and Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 box lasagna noodles
chopped onions
salt
pepper
large can tomato sauce
2 eggs
1 lb. hamburger
Mozzarella cheese, shredded
Parmesan cheese, shredded
Directions:
Cook hamburger until no longer pink. Boil noodles according to package directions. In a mixing bowl, combine salt, pepper, onions and eggs.
In baking pan, layer noodles and hamburger filling. Spread cheeses over mixture. Continue layers until ingredients are gone.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 c. Ricotta cheese
1 c. cottage cheese
2 eggs
1 lb. grated Mozzarella cheese
Parmesan cheese
1/2 lb. hamburger
1/2 lb. sausage
1 can tomato sauce
2 Tbsp. sugar
pinch of oregano
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix Ricotta and cottage cheese with beaten egg.
Set aside. Brown hamburger and sausage.
Add tomato sauce, sugar, oregano, garlic salt and pepper.
Drain and cook lasagna noodles.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 (32 oz.) jars spaghetti sauce
2 c. Ricotta cheese
2 eggs
10 lasagna noodles
1 (16 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1 c. Parmesan cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Brown ground beef and drain.
Stir in spaghetti sauce. Simmer.
In separate bowl, mix Ricotta cheese and eggs.
In large baking dish, spoon meat mixture to cover bottom of dish. Alternate layer of noodles, egg mixture, Mozzarella cheese and meat sauce, forming 2 layers.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes. Top with Parmesan cheese.

question: How do I make a traditional beef lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
9 lasagna noodles
2 envelopes spaghetti sauce mix
2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground beef
2 beaten eggs
1 pt. Ricotta cheese
salt to taste
handful (about 1/4 c. total) Mozzarella cheese, Cheddar cheese and Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cook noodles.
Brown beef and add tomato sauce and spaghetti sauce mix.
Beat eggs and add Ricotta cheese.
Layer:
noodles, meat, Ricotta and top with Cheddar, Mozzarella and Parmesan cheese. (Makes 3 layers.)
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Let stand for 10 to 15 minutes.
Cut and serve.
May be frozen.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugar Pudding
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 3/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. margarine
2 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla or lemon flavoring
Directions:
Beat eggs.
Add sugar and blend.
Alternate adding flour and milk, blending after each addition.
Add flavoring and softened margarine.
Mix well.
Pour into 9 x 13-inch greased dish or pan. Bake at 400° until done.
Delicious cut in squares and served warm.
For variety, add your favorite topping or frosting.
My family always like sweetened canned blackberries that we all picked and I canned.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugar Gems
Ingredients:
1 c. confectioners sugar
1 c. granulated sugar
2 eggs
1 c. salad oil
1/2 lb. butter
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. vanilla
4 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Cream sugars, butter and oil until fluffy.
Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together and blend in well.
Drop cookies on sheet, dip glass in sugar and press on cookie.
(I prefer to roll cookies in sugar and press with glass.)
Bake at 350° until lightly brown (very light).
Makes about 40 very large cookies or 100 to 150 small cookies.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake*
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/2 c. applesauce
1 c. dates or raisins
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. nuts or cranberries
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Beat eggs and vanilla; add to dry mixture.
Add melted butter, applesauce, raisins and nuts.
Bake in tube pan in 350 °oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free One Layer Yellow Cake
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. self-rising flour
1/2 c. fructose sweetener
1/3 c. shortening
1 egg
3/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding
3 c. milk
3 bananas, sliced
1 regular size can crushed pineapple (in its own juice)
Cool Whip
nuts
1 box vanilla sugar-free pudding
Chocolate Sauce
sliced almonds
Directions:
Mix sugar-free pudding according to directions.
Let set. Spoon all of pudding between the 2 layers of cake.
Top with Chocolate Sauce and sliced almonds.

question: What’s a good recipe for a low-sugar dessert?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. water or 1 1/2 c. water and 1/2 c. orange juice
2 c. raisins
1 c. unsweetened applesauce
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. liquid sweetener
3/4 c. cooking oil
1 tsp. soda
2 c. flour
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Slow boil the raisins in water and juice until liquid is gone. Add applesauce, sweetener and oil; then add eggs.
Mix well. Blend in soda and flour.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Pour into a greased square cake pan and bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger Patties
Ingredients:
3 c. water
2/3 c. pearl barley
2/3 c. lentils
2/3 c. long grain brown rice
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 c. grated carrots
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/4 c. shelled sunflower seeds
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh basil
2 tsp. chopped fresh thyme
2 tsp. chopped fresh oregano
salt and pepper to taste
4 beaten eggs
7 Tbsp. flour
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
Dried herbs can be substituted, use smaller amounts.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked lentils
1 c. plain bread crumbs
3 egg whites
1 c. cooked spinach
1/2 c. chopped carrots, cooked
1/2 c. chopped green onions
1 c. shredded Cheddar
1 Tbsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. olive oil
salt to taste
8 wheat buns
Directions:
Combine lentils, bread crumbs, egg whites, spinach, carrots, onions, Cheddar cheese, salt and pepper in a bowl.
Shape into 6 equal patties.
Place on baking sheet.
Refrigerate for 2 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Student Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
1 can beans (your choice)
pasta sauce
1 green pepper
1 onion
bread crumbs or crackers
vegetable oil
lettuce
cheese (optional)
hamburger condiments (ketchup, mustard, pickles, etc.)
bread
Directions:
Drain juice from beans and crush in mixing bowl.
When beans are mashed into a paste, add sauce, diced green pepper and diced onion.
Add bread crumbs or crushed crackers until mixture can be formed into patties.
Heat 1/8 cup oil in pan; grill patties. Sandwich patty with desired toppings and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Veggie Burger
Ingredients:
1 medium red bell pepper
1 medium green bell pepper
1 onion
1/2 to 1 small garlic clove
1 large carrot
1/2 c. mushrooms
1 c. couscous (Moroccan pasta)
1 egg
Directions:
Ground bell pepper, onion, garlic, carrot and mushrooms.
(May chop fine in food processor for best results).
Cook 1 cup of couscous as directed on box of pasta.
Add to ground ingredients, then add 1 scrambled egg.
Mix well.
Roll out to patties.
Bake or fry as desired.
Serve on hamburger buns (cheese optional).
May use rice instead of couscous.

question: What’s a good recipe for a homemade veggie burger?
answer:
Title: Burger Mix Burgers
Ingredients:
1/2 c. dry chickpeas
1/4 c. dry soy beans
1/4 c. lentils
1/4 c. peanuts
1/4 c. sunflower seeds
1/4 c. sesame seed
1/4 c. oats
1/4 c. cornmeal
1/4 c. wheat germ
2 Tbsp. soy flour
2 Tbsp. dried parsley
1 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. salt
dash of your favorite spice
Directions:
Grind the beans, nuts, seeds and oats in the blender to consistency of coarse flour.
For best results, process only 1/2 cup at a time.
Combine mixture with remaining ingredients and mix well.
Store in a covered container at cool room temperature or refrigerate.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Baked Salmon Fillets
Ingredients:
6 oz. salmon fillets
1 Tbsp. plain dried breadcrumbs
1 Tbsp. dill, minced
1 tsp. mayonnaise
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
black pepper to taste
Directions:
Dot top of 6 ounce salmon with a mixture of bread crumbs, dill, mayonnaise, mustard and pepper. Arrange in baking pan coated with cooking spray. Bake in 450° oven about 15 minutes or until fish is opaque throughout.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Fillet
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. salmon per person
Directions:
Coat fish on both sides with olive oil.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Squeeze on 1/2 to 1 lemon.
Top with slices of garlic and lemon.
Bake, uncovered, 20 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Cakes
Ingredients:
2 lb. boned fillet of salmon
3 eggs
1/2 c. heavy cream
1 scallion
1 sprig of parsley
1 sprig of tarragon
1 soup spoon of capers
2 sun-dried tomatoes
salt and pepper
1 oz. olive oil
4 oz. balsamic vinaigrette
6 c. of fancy salad mix
Directions:
Chop coarse:
scallion, parsley, tarragon, capers and sun-dried tomatoes.
Put salmon fillets through meat grinder or food processor on slow speed, not too fine.
Blend eggs and heavy cream slowly into coarse salmon meat, one egg at a time, with a rubber spatula or wooden spoon.
Add chopped ingredients.
Mix well.
Add juice of lemon, salt and pepper to your own taste.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Cakes(Quick And Easy)
Ingredients:
1 can (12 oz.) pink salmon, skin removed
1/3 c. diced onion
1 egg, lightly beaten
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 1/2 c. vegetable oil
Directions:
Drain salmon, reserving 2 tablespoons juice.
In a bowl, combine juice with all ingredients except oil.
Mix well.
Evenly divide into 6 balls and form into patties.
In a large skillet, in hot oil, fry patties on each side until golden brown, Drain on paper towels.
Makes 4-6 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Cakes
Ingredients:
1 can salmon, drained
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. dried bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 egg, beaten
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine ingredients.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Form patties and coat with seafood breader.
Pan-fry.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Maui Mango Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter
1 1/4 c. sugar
3 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. coconut extract
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. walnuts, chopped
2 c. mango fruit, diced with pulp
2 to 3 large mangoes
Directions:
Cream the butter and sugar.
Add 2 eggs one at a time.
With third egg, add vanilla and coconut extract.
Add half of the flour, salt, soda and cinnamon.
Stir with spatula.
Add remaining flour, nuts and mangoes.
Mix well.
Pour into greased and floured pan.
Bake at 350° for 50 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: *Mango Chutney*
Ingredients:
6 lb. mangos (about 26 large mangos, or about 12 cups), chopped or put through grinder course
5 lb. brown sugar
3 pt. vinegar
2 c. water
1 c. ginger, finely chopped
1 c. onion, finely chopped
1 doz. small Hawaiian chili peppers, without seeds
6 doz. whole Hawaiian chili peppers
3 Tbsp. salt
3 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1 lb. seedless raisins, chopped
1 lb. seeded raisins, whole
Directions:
Combine vinegar, water, salt and sugar in a large pot and bring to a boil.
Add onions, raisins, garlic and ginger and bring to a boil again.
Add mangos and chili peppers and bring to a boil.
Cook for 20-30 minutes until mangos look clear or glassy. Gently stir mixture occasionally to avoid sticking to the bottom of the pot.
Remove from heat, place mixture in hot sterilized jars and seal immediately.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Chutney
Ingredients:
10 large green mangos
2 lb. sugar
1/4 lb. dates
1/4 lb. preserved ginger
1/4 lb. sultanas
6 chilies
1 oz. garlic
1 Tbsp. salt
3/4 bottle vinegar
Directions:
Peel and slice mangos.
Salt and cover with water overnight. Strain and wash.
Boil all ingredients (except sugar) until tender.
Add sugar and simmer another 2 hours.
Bottle and seal.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Ice Cream
Ingredients:
4 ripe mangoes, peeled and sliced
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. sugar
4 egg yolks, beaten
6 c. half and half
1/4 tsp. almond extract
Directions:
Start with a good portion of love, stir in a few smiles and one or two good belly laughs.
Add a pinch of each: understanding, cheerfulness, compassion, a prayer or two or three and honesty.

question: How do I make a mango salsa for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mango Fruit Parfait
Ingredients:
2 c. cubed mango
1/4 c. freshly squeezed orange juice
24 strawberries, hulled
1 c. peeled and sliced kiwi
12 red raspberries
Directions:
Put the mango and orange juice in a blender and puree until smooth.
Slice 20 of the strawberries, leaving 4 whole.
Line the bottom of 4 balloon wine glasses with the sliced strawberries. Pour a thin layer of the mango puree over each to cover.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
3/4 c. nonfat dry milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 c. oleo
3 c. sliced apples
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients. Cut in oleo until mixture is crumbly. Arrange apples in shallow, well-greased pan. Sprinkle apples with dry mixture and cover baking dish. Bake at 350° about 30 minutes or until apples are tender. Remove cover and bake a few minutes longer until crumbs are brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Crumbled Apples
Ingredients:
6 tart apples
1/4 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
4 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. hot water
Directions:
Quarter apples and place in buttered pan.
Mix flour, sugar, cinnamon, butter and water.
Pour over apples and bake at 350°. Can be served hot or cold or with milk.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
5 oz. all-purpose white flour
4 to 6 c. cooking apples (1 1/2 to 2 lb.), peeled, cored and thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. butter
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. lemon rind, grated
Directions:
Combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 ounce flour in mixing bowl. Squeeze lemon juice over apple slices.
Toss apples with sugar mixture.
Put
in
ovenproof
baking
dish.
Thoroughly
mix butter,
remaining
flour
and
cinnamon.
Add
lemon rind and remaining
1/2 cup of sugar.
Sprinkle mixture over apples and bake
in
oven
at 350° for 30 minutes or until golden.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
4 c. sliced apples
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. oatmeal
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. butter or margarine
Directions:
Mix first 3 ingredients and put in 8-inch square pan.
Blend and spread last four ingredients; pour over the apple mixture. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3 to 4 green apples, peeled and sliced to make 6 c.
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. white sugar
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix together 1 1/2 cups flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon and melted butter.
Press 1/2 of mixture in bottom of a 9 x 12-inch greased baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine sliced apples with 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon sugar.
Turn into crust. Sprinkle with remaining half of mixture.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream, if desired.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: No-Bake Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 box Jell-O cheesecake mix
1 small container Cool Whip
1 small container sour cream
1 can blueberry, cherry or strawberry pie filling
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 can Eagle Brand condensed milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Use a rectangular (8 x 13-inch) pan or glass dish for crust. Mix cheesecake according to directions.
Mix in softened cream cheese, Eagle Brand milk and lemon juice.
Fold in other ingredients until well blended.
Pour in crust; chill for at least an hour.
Top with your favorite pie filling.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: The Ultimate Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 egg yolk
1/4 c. butter, softened
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Grease inside of 9-inch spring-form pan. Remove side.
Make crust:
In medium bowl combine flour, sugar, lemon peel and vanilla.
Make well in center; with fork blend in yolk and butter.
Mix with fingertips until smooth.
On bottom of pan, form half of dough into ball.
Roll pastry to edge of pan. Bake 6 to 8 minutes, or until golden brown.
Meanwhile, roll rest of dough into 3 strips 2 1/4-inches wide and 9-inches long. Assemble spring-form pan.
Line inside of pan with pastry strips, overlapping ends.
Preheat oven to 450°.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Best-Ever Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted enriched flour
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 slightly beaten egg yolk
1/4 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar and lemon peel. Cut in butter until mixture is crumbly. Add egg yolk and vanilla; blend well. Pat 1/3 of dough on bottom of 9-inch spring-form pan (sides removed). Bake at 400° about 6 minutes or until golden; cool. Butter sides of pan; attach to bottom. Pat remaining dough evenly on sides to a height of 2-inches.

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: No-Bake Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 can evaporated milk
2 c. graham cracker crumbs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. melted margarine
1 small pkg. Jell-O (any flavor)
1 c. hot water
8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Take evaporated milk and put in bowl.
Then put in freezer until mushy.
Whip until thick.
Line 9 x 13-inch pan with graham cracker crumbs, vanilla, 1/2 cup sugar and melted margarine, mixed together.
(Save out 3/4 cup mixture for topping.)

question: I want to make a no-bake cheesecake. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Virtuous Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 (8 oz.) containers nonfat cream cheese
1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 c. nonfat sour cream
3 egg whites
1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs
1 pt. sliced strawberries
Directions:
Blend first four ingredients with electric mixer at medium speed.
Blend in sour cream and egg whites.
Spray 9-inch pie pan with nonfat cooking spray; sprinkle with crumbs.
Pour in cheese mixture and bake at 325° for 40 minutes.
Cool, then refrigerate for 3 hours.
Top with berries.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Herb Butter
Ingredients:
2/3 c. oleo
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. dry oregano
Directions:
Soften oleo and stir in remaining ingredients.
Use to make garlic bread; put on chicken.
Cook 1 cup spiral pasta according to package directions and drain well.
Put into serving bowl or dish.
Add 2 tablespoons or more to taste and toss well to coat pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Easy Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. basil
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 c. butter/margarine (room temperature)
8 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/3 c. Parmesan, grated
1/4 c. olive oil
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
2/3 c. boiling water
Directions:
Blend parsley and basil into butter.
Blend this with cream cheese.
Add Parmesan, olive oil, garlic and pepper.
When pasta is ready, drain.
Add 2/3 cup boiling water to cheese mixture. Stir and toss with pasta.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Butter(3 Pound Recipe)
Ingredients:
3 (1 lb.) containers whipped soft butter
1/2 tsp. onion salt
1 1/2 Tbsp. wet garlic
1/3 c. dry crushed basil
1/3 c. crushed oregano
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in mixing bowl.
Mix thoroughly until whipped smooth.
Put into container and refrigerate.
Use as needed.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Buttered Noodles
Ingredients:
9 c. wide egg noodles, uncooked
1/4 c. (1/2 stick) real butter
2 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
In saucepan over low heat, add remaining ingredients.
Heat until butter is melted; stir in hot pasta.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for garlic butter pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1 pod garlic
virgin olive oil (the most expensive oil yields a wonderful tasting butter)
Directions:
In a mortar and pestle, crush 2 or 3 cloves of peeled garlic. (The broad side of a knife hit against the clove makes it easier to peel.)
Add a few drops of oil.
Add 1 or 2 more cloves of garlic while continuing to crush the mixture in the mortar.
Your finished consistency should by silky.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Chicken Stew
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 medium onion, finely chopped
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. minced fresh ginger or 1 tsp. ground ginger
2 Tbsp. flour
2 medium tomatoes, diced
8 to 10 peppercorns or to taste
6 whole cloves
1 cinnamon stick
8 pieces chicken (about 2 1/2 lb.), skinned and fat removed
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
3/4 lb. baby carrots (fresh or frozen)
6 oz. green peas (fresh or frozen)
8 oz. red or white new potatoes, scrubbed and unpeeled
Directions:
In a deep skillet or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Saute onion, ginger and garlic until onion is soft, about 3 minutes.
Add flour and cook 1 minute, stirring quickly to prevent sticking.
Stir in tomatoes and allow to cook another 2 minutes.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Cabbage Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground round
1 head cabbage
3 fresh carrots
1 medium onion
1 (10 oz.) frozen broccoli
1 (10 oz.) frozen corn
1 (10 oz.) frozen green beans
1 (15 oz.) can crowder peas
1 (15 oz.) can diced tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
about 3 c. water
salt, pepper, garlic, oregano, basil and thyme to taste
Directions:
Saute ground round in 8-quart pot with onion; toss in shredded cabbage, cook until tender, adding water as needed.
Add spices and stir, to meat and cabbage.
Dice carrots, add to pot. Add 2 cups water, cover with lid; cook until tender.
Add green beans, broccoli and corn; cook until tender.
Add diced tomatoes and tomato sauce and 1 cup water and crowder peas.
Stir and cook for 1 to 2 hours on low-medium.
Add more water and spices as needed.
Serves about 12.
Serve with corn bread.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef for stew, cut into 3/4 inch cubes
1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 lb. bacon
1 (1 3/8 oz.) envelope onion soup mix
3 c. water
1 (1 lb.) can (2 c.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. barley
1 (29 oz.) can Veg-All homestyle-mixed vegetables (including juice)
Directions:
Coat beef with flour seasoned with salt and mustard.
Cut bacon 1 inch pieces; fry in Dutch oven.
Remove bacon pieces; add beef to bacon drippings.
Brown beef on all sides.
Add soup mix and Veg-All liquid plus water to give you 3 cups.
Cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Add tomato juice, sugar and barley.
Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.
Add bacon and Veg-All home-style vegetables.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef And Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt, divided
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces
2 Tbsp. oil
1 onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
4 parsnips (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 carrots (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
4 red skin potatoes (about 1 lb.), cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. red wine or beef stock
1 1/2 tsp. dried thyme
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Combine flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper in plastic bag.
Add beef and shake until coated.
In large pot or Dutch oven, heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add meat in batches and cook until browned, about 20 minutes.
Remove meat. Reduce heat to medium.
Add onion, garlic and remaining 1 teaspoon salt.
Cook until onion is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: How do I make a hearty vegetable stew?
answer:
Title: Hearty Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
4 lb. stew meat (1 1/2-inch cubes)
4 Tbsp. oil
3 small onions
3 c. water or beef broth
8 to 10 carrots (1-inch chunks)
12 oz. pkg. snow peas or 2 pkg. green beans
Directions:
Mix
well
flour,
salt
and
pepper,
then roll meat in mixture
and
brown
in
oil using large Dutch oven, then brown onions.
Add water and carrots; bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer
2 to 2 1/2 hours until meat is tender, then add peas or beans.
Cover
and
continue
to
cook until meat is completely done.
Can be stored in freezer.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Pad Thai(Stir-Fry Thai Noodles)
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. dried rice flour noodles (noodles can be found in Asian grocery store)
8 medium shrimp
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 large eggs
2 Tbsp. distilled vinegar
2 Tbsp. fish sauce
3 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. paprika
2 scallions, cut in 2-inch pieces
1 c. bean sprouts
1 garlic clove
1/2 c. roast unsalted peanuts, crushed
coriander sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Soak noodles in warm water for 30 minutes or until softened. Do not let noodles become mushy.
Drain and discard water.
Set noodles aside.
Heat oil over medium-high heat until hot.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 20 seconds.
Add shrimp and stir-fry for 2 to 3 minutes.
Set shrimp aside.
Add eggs, stirring constantly and breaking it into pieces.
Push eggs aside.
Add noodles, vinegar, fish sauce, sugar and paprika and toss gently over medium heat for about 1 to 2 minutes.
Add scallions, bean sprouts and shrimp.
Mix all together for about 2 minutes.
Place noodles on a large platter.
Sprinkle crushed peanuts over noodles and garnish with the coriander sprigs and bean sprouts.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Thai Fried Noodles
Ingredients:
1 pkg. rice noodles, cooked and drained
3 Tbsp. oil
3 cloves garlic, crushed
2 eggs
1 pkg. firm bean curd, diced
4 oz. shrimp, pork or chicken
1/2 Tbsp. pickled Chinese radish
3 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. fish sauce
4 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 Tbsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. chopped roasted peanuts
6 oz. bean sprouts
1/2 c. green onions, cut into 1-inch lengths
1/2 tsp. ground chili
1 fresh lime, sliced
Directions:
Heat oil in a wok and saute the garlic and pickled radish. Add eggs and stir.
Season with sugar, fish sauce, vinegar and paprika.
Add meat, bean curd and noodles.
Toss and cook for about 10 minutes.
Then add green onions, ground chili, bean sprouts and peanuts.
Remove from heat.
Garnish with additional peanuts if desired and lime on the side.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1 carrot, shredded
3 green onions, chopped
1 cup cooked shrimp
6 Tbsp. oil
2 eggs
3 cups cooked rice
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 cup cooked peas
Directions:
Heat 2 Tbsp. of oil in a skillet.
Fry eggs and reserve.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Thai Chicken
Ingredients:
1/3 c. finely chopped green onions
2 crushed garlic cloves
3 Tbsp. hoisin sauce
2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce
8 skinned chicken thighs
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Combine first 8 ingredients.
Mix well.
Arrange chicken in shallow baking dish, single layer.
Spread sauce on top. Marinate for 2 hours.

question: How do I make a quick and easy pad thai?
answer:
Title: Pad Thaismall Width Noodles
Ingredients:
1 bag (16 oz.) Pad Thai Noodles
1 Clove Garlic
4 Tbsp. Peanut Oil
1 Egg
16 to 24 Shrimp (1 1/4 lbs.)
2 Tbsp. White Vinegar
1 1/2 Tbsp. Fish Sauce
1 Tbsp. Sugar
1/4 c. Ground Peanuts
1 tsp. Pepper
1 tsp. Ground Dried Shrimp
1 Scallion
1 c. Fresh Cilantro
Directions:
Soak the noodles in cold water overnight or 15 minutes in hot water.
Shell and devein shrimp.
Chop scallion and cilantro. Grind or crush the peanuts.
Preheat the oil in the WOK on medium-high, then add garlic and shrimp then stir until the shrimp turns white, add the egg and stir till cooked, add the noodles and all of the seasonings, stir or toss well.
Turn heat off, add bean sprouts and scallions.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Beans For Strict Fast
Ingredients:
1 large can Great Northern beans
1 (15 oz.) can tomatoes
2 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. oil
salt to taste
Directions:
In a saucepan, heat through the beans and the can of tomatoes, add salt to taste.
In a skillet, heat the oil; add flour and brown, making a smooth paste.
Add slowly to bean mixture to thicken.
Cook through until heated.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Fried Tomatoes
Ingredients:
3 tomatoes, firm or unripened
2 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Dress up veggies by adding simple ingredients to canned or frozen English peas:
pearl onions, sliced mushrooms, sliced almonds or lemon pepper, singly or in combination.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Green Beans And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
3 cans cut-style green beans, drained
1 can stewed tomatoes
1 medium onion, minced
1/2 stick oleo
Directions:
Saute the onion until limp and mix in the rest of the ingredients.
Simmer 30 minutes and put into casserole.
Cover and reheat leftovers.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: "Quick, Hot, Green Beans"
Ingredients:
1 can green beans
10 oz. can Ro-Tel diced tomatoes and chile peppers
Directions:
Partially drain green beans. Add tomatoes and heat.

question: What can I make with canned tomatoes and beans?
answer:
Title: Greek-Style String Beans
Ingredients:
1 lb. green beans
2 Tbsp. oil
salt and pepper
1 onion, minced
1 (22 oz.) red pack whole tomatoes in puree
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine the green beans, oil, salt, pepper and onion in large skillet.
Cook 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes.
Add 2 tablespoons sugar.
Simmer until tender.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. salad oil
7 egg yolks
2 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. grated lemon rind
1 c. egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
3 Tbsp. butter
3 c. sifted powdered sugar
1/2 c. drained crushed pineapple
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and 1 teaspoon salt into bowl.
Make well in center.
Add oil, egg yolks, 3/4 cup cold water, vanilla and lemon rind.
Beat until smooth.
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar until stiff peaks form (do not underbeat).
Pour egg yolk mixture gradually over egg whites; fold gently until blended.
Do not overmix.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
7 eggs, separated
2 1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 c. Wesson oil
3 Tbsp. lemon rind and extract
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Separate eggs.
In egg whites, add 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar and beat well until very stiff.
In yolks, add flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, oil, extract, rind and water.
Beat well until creamy.
Fold into egg whites, do not beat.
Pour into 10 inch tube pan.
Do not grease.
Bake at 325° for 50 minutes and 375° for 10 minutes more.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. cake flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. Wesson oil
3/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon flavoring
7 eggs, separated
1 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, oil, water, lemon flavoring and egg yolks until smooth.
Beat egg whites with cream of tartar until very stiff and dry (about 5 minutes).
Fold into flour mixture and pour into ungreased tube pan.
Bake for 1 hour in preheated 300° oven.
Remove from oven and invert pan over a bottle to cool for at least 1 hour.
May be glazed.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chiffon
Ingredients:
1 box lemon chiffon
4 eggs
1/2 c. oil
3/4 c. water
1 box instant vanilla pudding
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. baking powder
Directions:
Mix well.
Fold into package #1.
Bake at 350° for 55 minutes.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy lemon chiffon cake?
answer:
Title: Chiffon Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. Wesson oil
7 unbeaten egg yolks
3/4 c. cold water
2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. lemon flavoring
1 c. egg whites
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
In first bowl, sift together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Form a well and add Wesson oil, egg yolks, cold water, vanilla and lemon flavoring. Beat with spoon until smooth.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Sweet Disposition Recipe
Ingredients:
3 grains of common sense
1 large heart
1 good liver
plenty of fresh air and sunlight
1 bushel of contentment
a good husband
Directions:
Do not bring to a boil, please!

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Hints
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 box salt
1/8 c. salad oil
water
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients.
Add water until smooth.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: For A Good Disposition
Ingredients:
3 grains of good common sense
1 large heart
1 good liver
plenty of fresh air and sunshine
1 bushel of contentment
1 good husband or wife
Directions:
Do not bring to boil!

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: White Liniment
Ingredients:
1 pt. vinegar
3 egg whites
1 pt. turpentine
Directions:
Put in a bottle and shake well.
Rub on aching joints.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon garlic pasta?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Hermits
Ingredients:
1/3 c. margarine, softened
2/3 c. firmly packed brown sugar
1 egg, beaten
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
1/4 tsp. vanilla extract
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. ground allspice
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 c. unsweetened apple juice
56 raisins
Directions:
Cream margarine and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Add beaten egg and flavorings; mix well.
Combine flour and next 5 ingredients, mixing well.
Add to creamed mixture alternately with apple juice (beginning and ending with flour) and mix well after each addition.
Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2-inches apart on cookie sheets sprayed with Pam or vegetable cooking spray.
Press a raisin in center of each cookie.
Bake at 325° for 15 to 20 minutes.
Cool slightly on cookie sheets before removing.
Makes 56 cookies.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
3/4 cube oleo
4 medium onions, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
9 garlic cloves, chopped
handful of celery leaves, chopped
10 dried chili peppers, crushed
1 1/2 tsp. cumin seed, crushed
4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cayenne
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
2/3 can tomato sauce
Directions:
Fry on medium-high heat the oil, all spices and celery leaves until absorbed by oil and not powder.
Add tomato sauce and cook until thick.
Skin and cup up chicken and put in large pot. Add sauce to chicken and simmer 20 to 25 minutes.
Add water to not quite halfway to the top of chicken.
Cover and simmer until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/4 c. chopped onions
1/3 c. flour
1 Tbsp. salt
4 c. cooked chicken
1 c. chicken stock
2 c. milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
3 Tbsp. curry powder
Directions:
Fry onions in butter.
Add flour, salt, curry powder and chicken stock.
Stir constantly until mixture is thick.
Add milk, lemon juice and chicken.
Heat well.
(May be made in advance and reheated.)
Serve over rice with chopped bacon or chutney, diced pineapple and coconut.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken breasts (4 to 7)
1/4 c. butter
2 medium onions, chopped
2 or 3 cloves garlic
3 Tbsp. curry powder
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
4 c. water
4 little green peppers (don't cut open)
1 inch stick cinnamon
8 cloves
6 cardamon seed
salt to taste
1/4 c. butter
3 1/2 c. rice
5 c. chicken broth
Directions:
Boil chicken with onion, celery and salt; debone.
Saute onions, garlic and green peppers in butter.
Stir constantly, then add tomato paste and water.
Add chicken; cook about 20 minutes. Keep chicken broth.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken pieces, skinned
2 cloves garlic, chopped
2-inch pieces ginger, chopped
2 tsp. cumin seed, ground
3 Tbsp. natural yogurt
4 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. turmeric
pinch of chili powder
1 tsp. pepper
2 onions, chopped
salt
Directions:
Place the garlic, ginger, turmeric, cumin, chili pepper, coriander and yogurt in a large bowl with salt to taste.
Mix well.
Add chicken and leave for 4 hours; turn occasionally. Heat the oil in the pan; add the onion and fry until golden. Add the chicken and marinade.
Bring to simmering point; cover and cook for about 30 minutes, until the chicken is tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, cubed
4 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. cayenne pepper
3 onions, sliced
3 garlic cloves, minced
2-inch piece fresh ginger
2 tsp. cumin
2 tsp. coriander
1 c. plain yogurt
1 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Shake flour, cayenne and chicken in a bag to coat.
Remove chicken and saute in margarine until lightly browned.
Remove chicken.
In same pan, add onions, garlic and grated ginger; fry until soft.
Add cumin and coriander; fry, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes.
Return chicken to pan; add cream and yogurt. Simmer for 30 minutes until sauce is brown and thick.
Serve over Rice Pilau.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. 1% cottage cheese
1/2 c. skim milk
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt (optional)
8 oz. corkscrew noodles, cooked and drained
1 large tomato, seeded and chopped
Directions:
In a blender or food processor, process cottage cheese, milk and garlic until smooth.
Add flour, lemon juice, basil, mustard, pepper and salt, if desired; process until well blended.
Pour into a saucepan.
Cook over medium heat until thickened.
Do not boil.
Serve over noodles; sprinkle with chopped tomatoes.
Yield: 4 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. chopped green onions
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skimmed milk
1/4 c. grated fresh Parmesan cheese
1/8 c. grated fresh Romano cheese
1/2 tsp. dried whole thyme
1/2 tsp. dried whole basil
1/4 tsp. dried dill weed
6 c. hot cooked medium seashell macaroni
Directions:
Melt margarine in saucepan over medium heat. Add onions and garlic; saute 2 minutes. Add flour and stir well.
Gradually add milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to medium-low and cook 3 minutes or until thickened, stirring constantly. Remove from heat.
Stir in cheeses and herbs. Serve over macaroni. Garnish with extra onions, if desired.
Contains 244 calories and 4.3 grams fat per serving.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Herbed Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. reduced calorie margarine
1/4 c. chopped green onions
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. flour
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skim milk
1/4 c. grated fresh Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. grated fresh Romano cheese
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. dill weed
6 c. cooked medium seashell macaroni (without salt or fat)
green onion strips
Directions:
Melt margarine in a saucepan over medium heat; add green onions and garlic.
Saute for 2 minutes.
Add flour and stir well. Gradually add milk and bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and cook until thickened, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat and stir in cheeses and herbs.
Serve over macaroni. Garnish with green onion strips.
Serves 6.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Pasta Alfredo
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. heavy cream
1 lb. noodles or fettuccini (cooked as directed on pkg.)
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese or more
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat butter and cream.
Do not boil.
Mound pasta in warm buttered bowl and pour on cream; sprinkle generously with cheese and toss thoroughly but lightly.
Season to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a creamy Alfredo pasta.
answer:
Title: Alfredo
Ingredients:
Pasta of Choice
3/4 c. Unsalted Butter
4 medium Cloves Garlic, pressed
1 3/4 c. Grated Parmesan Cheese
1 1/2 c. Evaporated Milk (unsweetened)
1 Tbsp. Fresh Ground Pepper
Directions:
Start the pasta first.
In 1/2 quart sauce pan, heat the butter, garlic and milk over a medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the butter melts and the milk is hot.
Do not boil.
Stir in the parmesan Cheese and pepper, continue heating until all is melted.
Pour sauce over the noodles, serve with additional parmesan and pepper as desired.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas("Easy")
Ingredients:
1 bag frozen chicken strips
seasoned meat tenderizer
salt and pepper
2 Tbsp. oil
lettuce
tomato
onion
sour cream
1 pkg. tortilla shells
Directions:
Salt, pepper and season strips.
Fry in skillet in 2 tablespoons oil until tender.
Warm tortilla shells as per package directions.
Place strips of chicken on shells; top with choice of lettuce, tomato, onion or sour cream.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, sliced
1 onion, sliced
1 green bell pepper
2 tsp. fajita seasoning
1 tsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. water
flour tortillas
toppings of your choice
Directions:
Put water, oil, lemon juice, salt, onion, pepper and fajita seasoning in frying pan.
Cook on medium high heat until onions and peppers are slightly tender.
Add chicken and cook until all pink coloring is gone.
Remove from heat and spoon fajitas into tortillas.
Add the toppings of your choice.
Enjoy!

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. boneless chicken, julienned
1 onion, sliced
1 green pepper, sliced
1 red pepper, sliced
tortilla shells
fajita spice sauce (available at UKrops)
salsa
sour cream
lime
Directions:
Grill chicken with fajita spice sauce.
Saute onions, green pepper and red pepper in oil until soft.
Do not burn.
Warm tortilla shells according to package directions.
Slice lime in quarters.
Serve warmed tortillas with chicken, onions, pepper and garnishes of salsa, sour cream and guacamole.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
flour tortillas (the soft kind)
white chicken meat, sauteed and cut in strips
red and green peppers, cut in strips and sauteed with onions
sour cream or nondairy product
Monterey Jack/Cheddar cheese, shredded
salsa or diced tomatoes
hot sauce
Directions:
Place sauteed chicken, peppers and onions in middle of tortilla.
Roll up; secure with toothpick.
Warm 30 seconds in microwave or a few minutes in 350° oven.
Serve with salsa, sour cream and shredded cheese on the side, as desired.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy chicken fajita?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
3 (12 oz.) boneless chicken breasts
1 medium zucchini squash
1 green pepper
1 medium onion, sliced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. fresh or dried cilantro
2 tsp. chili powder
6 (6-inch) flour tortillas
Directions:
Cut zucchini and pepper into strips.
Remove skin from chicken and cut into strips.
Heat the oil in a skillet and fry the chicken strips over medium heat until chicken turns white.
Add the remaining ingredients except tortillas and stir-fry until vegetables are crisp-tender, about 5 minutes.
Divide the mixture evenly into 6 servings.
Place a serving of chicken mixture in center of each tortilla.
Fold over in half to form the fajita. Serve with fresh salsa.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon (fried then crumbled)
2 1/2 c. cauliflower
3/4 c. sour cream (low fat version works just as well)
1/2 c. grated cheddar cheese
1 sm. yellow onion, finely chopped
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook the cauliflower until firm, yet tender. Coarsely mash cauliflower with potato masher.
Add the sour cream, onion, cheese, salt and pepper.
Mix well.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower
Ingredients:
cauliflower
2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. flour
1 c. grated cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Boil cauliflower in salted water until tender.
Drain.
Make white sauce with milk, flour, cheese and butter.
Pour over cauliflower.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creamy Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. mustard
1 c. shredded cheese
Directions:
Cook cut up cauliflower until done.
Mix mayonnaise and mustard.
Put cauliflower in casserole dish.
Cover top with mayonnaise mixture.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Cook in 350° oven until cheese melts.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Creamed Cauliflower Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 c. flour
2 c. milk
3/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Pepperidge Farm herb seasoned stuffing mix
1 c. water
1/2 c. butter or oleo, melted
Directions:
Break cauliflower into small pieces and cook until just tender.
Drain and place in a shallow 2-quart casserole.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic mashed cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium head cauliflower
1/4 c. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
5 Tbsp. butter
2 c. milk
1 c. herb seasoned stuffing mix
1/4 c. water
1 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cook cauliflower in salted water until done, about 10 minutes.
Combine flour, salt and pepper.
Set aside.
Melt 3 tablespoons butter in pan.
Add flour, salt and pepper.
Add milk and cook until thick.
Put cheese and cauliflower in a greased 2-quart casserole dish and spoon sauce over top.
Combine stuffing, 1/4 cup water and 2 tablespoons melted butter.
Mix well and put over cheese sauce.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Raspberry Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1 c. raspberry vinegar
1 c. olive oil
1 c. vegetable oil
1 c. maple syrup
1 Tbsp. Poupon mustard
1 Tbsp. chopped tarragon leaves
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and mix well in mixer or food processor.
Mix until mixture thickens and is blended well.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Raspberry Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
2/3 c. olive oil
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. chopped garlic
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. raspberry preserves
1 Tbsp. honey
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Stir vigorously or put into a jar and shake well.
Serve over mixed greens.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Creamy Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. white wine vinegar
salt and pepper
1 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a screwtop jar and shake.
Chill.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Creamy Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. half and half
1 egg, lightly beaten
1 clove garlic, minced
5 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. sugar
juice of 1 1/2 lemons
Directions:
Whisk together and refrigerate for 2 hours.

question: How do I make a tangy raspberry vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Raspberry-Orange Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. onion
5 cloves garlic
1/8 c. raspberry puree
1/2 c. orange juice
1 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. balsamic vinegar
1 1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Dice onion and garlic.
Pour in raspberry puree, orange juice, ginger, soy sauce and balsamic vinegar.
Whisk in olive oil slowly.
Let sit for 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
2/3 c. dried bread crumbs
2/3 c. whole wheat or all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. buttermilk
12 chicken wings
Directions:
In 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch roasting pan in 425° oven, melt butter.
Remove pan from oven.
On wax paper, mix next 5 ingredients.
Pour buttermilk into small bowl.
Dip one wing at a time in buttermilk, then in crumb mixture.
Place wings in melted butter in roasting pan, turning to coat evenly.
Bake 35 minutes or until chicken wings are tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
32 chicken wings
6 to 8 Tbsp. butter, melted
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt or lemon pepper
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Discard wing tip; cut remaining wing in two pieces.
Dip chicken wing in melted butter.
Combine bread crumbs, cheese, salt and garlic powder in a plastic bag.
Shake wings in crumb mixture. Place chicken on greased 15 x 10-inch baking sheet and bake in preheated oven at 400° for 30 minutes.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
16 chicken wings
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 c. canned stewed tomatoes
1/2 c. finely chopped celery
1/2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Wash chicken wings and pat dry.
In skillet, saute chicken wings in melted butter until lightly browned.
Arrange in oiled baking dish; add tomatoes and celery.
In a separate bowl, mix soy sauce, vinegar and salt.
Pour over the chicken.
Bake at 375°, uncovered, for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Baked Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings
1 c. soy sauce
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. butter
1 tsp. dry mustard
3/4 c. water
Directions:
Split chicken wings in 2 sections.
Arrange in shallow baking dish.
Combine remaining ingredients and heat until sugar and butter dissolve.
Cool and pour over wings.
Marinate for 2 hours, turning occasionally, without removing sauce.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes, turning over once and spooning sauce over chicken a couple of times.
Drain on paper towel and serve hot.

question: What’s a good recipe for oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Oriental Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
30 drummettes or wings
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. ketchup
1/4 c. vinegar
2/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. water
3 peeled garlic cloves
cornstarch
2 beaten eggs
oil (for frying)
Directions:
Roll washed drummettes or wings in cornstarch.
Dip in egg. Fry in oil until golden brown.
Layer wings or drummettes in 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan.
Combine all other ingredients together.
Pour over chicken.
Bake uncovered in 375° oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour or until dressing sticks to the chicken and chicken is glazed.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Tiramisu
Ingredients:
1 large pkg. ladyfingers
1 1/2 c. coffee (very strong)
2/3 c. dark rum
8 large egg yolks
3 (8 oz.) pkg. mascarpone cheese
2 c. heavy whipping cream
1/2 c. powdered sugar
dash of vanilla
cocoa powder (for dusting)
Directions:
Pour coffee in mixing bowl; add 1/3 cup rum. Set aside. In another bowl, beat eggs, then add mascarpone cheese, 1/4 cup of powdered sugar and rest of rum. Beat together until stiff. In another bowl, add 2 cups heavy cream, the rest of powdered sugar and dash of vanilla. Beat until stiff. Put together. Dip ladyfingers, one at a time, in coffee mix. Cover bottom of 9 x 13 dish. Layer cheese mix, then heavy cream. Mix and repeat. Dust with cocoa powder. Enjoy!

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Tiramisu
Ingredients:
1/2 c. heavy cream
6 eggs, separated
3/4 c. sugar
1 lb. Mascarpone cheese
1/2 c. brandy
24 Italian Amaretto biscuits or macaroons
1 1/2 c. strong Espresso coffee
5 oz. shaved semi-sweet chocolate
Directions:
Whip the cream until firm and place in refrigerator.
Beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
Gradually beat in sugar and continue beating until stiff.
Refrigerate.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Tiramisu
Ingredients:
1 c. cold water
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1 pkg. vanilla instant pudding
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 (8 oz.) tub whipped topping, thawed
1 c. hot water
1/3 c. Kahlua (coffee flavored liqueur)
1 Tbsp. instant Espresso or 2 Tbsp. instant coffee granules
24 ladyfingers (two 3 oz. pkg.)
3 Tbsp. unsweetened cocoa, divided
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large bowl. Stir well with whisk. Cover surface with plastic wrap. Chill 30 minutes or until firm. Remove plastic wrap and add cream cheese. Beat with mixer at medium speed until well blended. Gently fold in whipped topping. Combine hot water, Kahlua and Espresso. Split ladyfingers.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Tiramisu(Restaurant Style)
Ingredients:
5 egg yolks
1 1/4 c. sugar, divided
2 lb. Mascarpone
2 tsp. vanilla extract
10 egg whites (room temperature)
3/4 tsp. cream of tartar
1 1/2 c. prepared Espresso, cooled
1 1/2 Tbsp. Anisette
1 1/2 Tbsp. dark creme de cacao
1 1/2 Tbsp. Amaretto
1 1/2 Tbsp. brandy
1 (17 oz.) pkg. ladyfinger cookies (about 24)
2 Tbsp. unsweetened cocoa powder
Directions:
Prepare a 9-inch square baking pan by tearing a piece of aluminum foil about 36 inches long and folding it over to make a long piece 3 inches wide.
Place around the inside of the baking pan to make the pan 3 inches tall.
Or, use a 12 to 15-cup baking pan with a flat bottom and 3-inch sides.

question: What’s a recipe for an easy tiramisu?
answer:
Title: Tiramisu
Ingredients:
3 pkg. ladyfingers
4 egg yolks
1/4 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. Marsala
1/4 lb. Mascarpone cheese
1 c. whipping cream
6 Tbsp. powdered sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. espresso or strong coffee
1/2 c. rum
cocoa powder
Directions:
In top of double boiler, beat egg yolks and 1/4 cup sugar with mixer for 5 minutes.
Set over simmering water; add Marsala and continue beating for 6 minutes.
(Keep beater on high speed.) Remove, set aside and cool.
In separate bowls, beat Mascarpone cheese (which is available in delis with imported cheeses) until smooth and whipping cream until it has soft peaks.
Fold together Mascarpone, whipping cream, powdered sugar and vanilla.
Mix together coffee and rum.
Layer one package of ladyfingers in flat bottom casserole and brush with 1/3 of the coffee mixture.
Spread 1/3 of the Mascarpone mixture on ladyfingers and top with 1/3 Marsala mixture.
Repeat with remaining ladyfingers, making 3 layers.
Sift cocoa powder evenly on top.
Cover lightly and refrigerate 3 hours.
Serves 10 to 12.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1/4 c. orange juice
1 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken breasts
3/4 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 1/2 tsp. canola oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. minced fresh ginger or 1 1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1 1/2 c. snow peas
1 medium red bell pepper, cut in thin strips
3/4 c. sliced green onions
2 c. cooked white rice
Directions:
In a shallow glass bowl, combine the orange juice and cornstarch.
Stir in chicken.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours. Drain chicken.
In a small bowl, combine broth and soy sauce.
Set aside.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1/4 c. orange juice
1 1/2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into strips
3/4 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 1/2 tsp. vegetable oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1 1/2 c. snow peas or green beans
1 medium red bell pepper, cut into thin strips (about 1 c.)
3/4 c. sliced green onion
2 c. cooked white rice
Directions:
In a shallow glass bowl, combine orange juice and cornstarch; mix well. Stir in chicken. Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 2 hours. Drain chicken; discard juice mixture.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
Cooking Spray
1 tsp. Vegetable Oil
1 lb. skinned, boned Chicken Breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
1/2 medium Onion, chopped
1 medium-size sweet Red Pepper, chopped
1 medium-size sweet Yellow Pepper, chopped
1/2 c. Snow Pea Pods
1/2 c. chopped Broccoli
1/2 c. sliced Carrot
1 large clove Garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. Salt
1/4 - 1/2 tsp. Pepper
2 c. cooked Rice (cooked without salt or fat)
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with Cooking Spray; drizzle Oil around top of wok.
Heat at medium-high heat (375) until hot.
Add Chicken, and stir-fry 2 minutes or until lightly browned.
Remove from wok, and drain well on paper towels.
Add Onion and next 8 ingredients; stir-fry 4 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Return Chicken to wok; stir-fry 2 minutes.
Serve over rice.
Yield:
4 (2-1/4-cups) servings.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Basic Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
10 oz. boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut in strips
soy sauce to taste
garlic powder to taste
4 tsp. peanut oil
1/2 c. broccoli florets
1/2 c. cauliflower, chopped
1/2 c. onions, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. celery, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. green bell peppers, sliced into strips
4 tsp. cornstarch, dissolved in 1 c. water
Directions:
In a glass bowl, combine chicken, soy sauce and garlic powder. Stir well and set aside.
Heat 2 teaspoons oil in skillet or wok. Stir in all vegetables and stir-fry 3 to 5minutes until onions are translucent.
Remove to bowl.
Heat remaining 2 teaspoons oil; add chicken and stir-fry until chicken is cooked, about 5 minutes. Return vegetables to skillet.
Stir in cornstarch mixture and continue cooking until sauce thickens.

question: How do I make a simple chicken stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. soy sauce
2 tsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
10 oz. boneless chicken breasts
1/2 c. celery
1/2 c. green peppers
1/2 c. red peppers
1/2 c. onions
1 c. sliced mushrooms
3 oz. sliced water chestnuts
1 tsp. cornstarch
Directions:
In medium mixing bowl, combine 1/2 cup chicken broth, soy sauce, 1 teaspoon oil, garlic powder and ginger.
Mix well.
Add chicken and stir to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Salsa
Ingredients:
4 tomatoes, peeled and finely chopped
1/2 c. minced onion
1/2 c. minced celery
1/4 c. minced green pepper
1/4 c. olive oil
3 Tbsp. chopped mild green chilies
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. mustard seed
1/2 tsp. oregano
dash of pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Cover and chill several hours. Serve as a dip with tortilla chips, or as a mild sauce for other dishes.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Spicy Salsa
Ingredients:
6 small tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1/2 cup diced red onion
1/4 cup diced yellow onion
3 serrano peppers, minced
1/4 cup minced cilantro
1/2 cup minced fresh parsley
3 garlic cloves, minced
3 Tbsp red wine vinegar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and chill in refrigerator for several hours before serving.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Salsa (Hot Sauce)
Ingredients:
2 peeled tomatoes
1 onion
1 jalapeno pepper
2 Tbsp. salad oil
juice of 1/2 lemon
pinch of oregano
salt and pepper
Directions:
Chop tomatoes, onion and pepper.
Mix with salad oil, lemon and seasonings.
Store in refrigerator.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Hot Mexican Salsa
Ingredients:
3 large tomatoes, chopped
3 tsp. green onions
1 tsp. chopped green parsley
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. sugar
3 canned or fresh jalapeno peppers
Directions:
Use blender or food processor; add all ingredients.
Blend until chunky.
Cover and chill.

question: I need a recipe for spicy salsa.
answer:
Title: Salsa - Medium Hot
Ingredients:
8 medium tomatoes
1 to 2 green peppers
1 medium Spanish onion
8 to 10 scallions
2 tsp. cilantro
1 to 2 tsp. garlic powder
salt and pepper
10 slices jalapeno pepper
Directions:
Chop the first 4 ingredients finely. Add the remaining ingredients.
Heat 10 minutes and chill.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
stew meat
4 c. boiling water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 clove garlic
1 medium onion
1 or 2 bay leaves
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. paprika
dash of allspice or cloves
12 oz. Larry's Blend (ground chuck), handle with care
2 oz. American cheese
2 of Steve's onion buns (fresh, of coarse!)
mushrooms and bacon (optional but good)
16 oz. vodka
12 oz. ice
4 oz. Squirt (watch Squirt, very expensive)
Directions:
Make sure you have enough ice.
Next, chop mushrooms.
Fry bacon and chop into small bits.
Make second drink and call off work for tomorrow while you can still talk (great idea).
Take Larry's Blend and fold in mushrooms and bacon (easy).
Turn on VH-1.
Turn up volume.
Get buns and cheese ready.
Put burgers on grill.
Keep an eye on them and flip when juice comes through. Turn up VH-1 and hope no one is home next door.
Better make a pitt stop next!
Be sure to refresh you drink (if you can find the vodka).
When juice runs clear (burgers not vodka) they are done. Place on buns with cheese.
Eat, drink and pass out!!!
Then you start over tomorrow.
Next cookbook will contain recipe for "The Perfect Porterhouse."

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. stew beef
3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. onion powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. oil
2 c. water
1 medium onion, sliced
2 bay leaves
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. sweet basil
1 tsp. tarragon
1 tsp. onion powder
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
6 carrots, cut into bite size chunks
4 to 6 onions, quartered, or 12 small whole onions
6 to 8 potatoes, cut into chunks
2 ribs celery, sliced
1 can peas, drained
1 c. water
3 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Put flour, seasoned salt, onion powder and pepper in a bag. Toss meat in flour mixture.
In a large pot, brown meat in oil. Add water and all ingredients listed down to carrots.
Stir and simmer 10 minutes.
Add carrots, onions, potatoes and celery. Cover and simmer 45 minutes.
Mix last 4 ingredients and stir into stew.
Simmer 15 minutes.
Add peas and cook 5 minutes more.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes
1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. oil
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 onion, chopped
1 c. beef bouillon
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
6 carrots, peeled and sliced or quartered
1 c. sliced celery
4 potatoes, peeled and cut into eighths
12 small white onions
2 medium turnips, peeled and quartered (optional)
4 c. water
1 c. cooked okra (optional)
Directions:
Coat meat with flour; set excess flour aside.
In large skillet or slow-cooking pot with browning unit, heat oil.
Brown meat on all sides.
In slow-cooking pot, combine browned beef, bay leaf, Worcestershire sauce, chopped onion, bouillon, pepper, salt, sugar and vegetables.
Pour water over all.
Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours.
Turn control on high.
Thicken sauce with flour left over from coating (about 1/4 cup), dissolved in a small amount of water.
Add okra, if desired.
Cover and cook on high 10 to 15 minutes, or until slightly thickened.
Makes up to 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a classic beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. chuck or stew meat
2 c. hot water
1 medium onion, sliced
1 large bay leaf
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
dash of ground cloves (optional)
6 carrots, peeled and cut in 1/2-inch slices
4 potatoes, peeled and cut in eighths
4 stalks celery, quartered lengthwise
1 lb. small white onions
1/4 c. flour
1/3 c. cold water
Directions:
In a 3-quart casserole, combine meat, water, sliced onion, bay leaf, salt, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, pepper, garlic powder and cloves.
Cover.
Microwave at High 5 minutes.
Reduce power to Medium and microwave 40 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
Remove bay leaf. Add vegetables.
Cover.
Microwave 35 to 45 minutes, or until meat and vegetables are tender.
Blend flour into water; stir into stew.
