4 large eggs, separated
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 (12 oz.) pkg. Nilla wafers
4 or 6 large bananas
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. banana extract or vanilla extract
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Whisk together milks and egg yolks; stir into dry ingredients. Cook over medium heat, whisking constantly, until smooth and thickened. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Strong Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. anchovy paste
1 Tbsp. drained capers
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and whisk.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 part Balsamic Vinegar
2 parts Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1/2 tsp Dijon Mustard
3 pinches of Pepper
2 pinches of Kosher Salt
1 pinch of Sugar
Directions:
Whisk all ingredients until oil and vinegar become creamy. Spoon onto salad as needed.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette (Basic)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
scant 1/2 tsp. salt
5 twists of peppermill
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
scant tsp. fresh lemon juice
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put mustard in the bottom of a salad bowl.
Stir the first 5 ingredients, whisking constantly.
Add vegetable oil and olive oil in a very thin stream.
Makes 6 tablespoons of vinaigrette, enough for 10 to 12 cups of salad greens.
Use shortly after it is made. Add whatever you like, garlic, anchovies, shallots, sliced mushrooms, chopped capers, etc.
May be used on grilled fish or cold roast beef (add horseradish) or chicken.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a homemade vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Creamy Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. white wine vinegar
salt and pepper
1 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a screwtop jar and shake.
Chill.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Chili Beans
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. hamburger
2 1/2 c. diced onions
1 c. diced celery
1 c. diced green pepper
2 cans tomatoes, chopped up in blender
1 can tomato sauce
1 or 1 1/2 cans tomato paste
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. chili powder or more
red pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 can kidney beans (add last)
1 Tbsp. cocoa
1 1/2 Tbsp. parsley
1 tsp. oregano
2 bay leaves
3 cloves garlic
1 c. mushrooms
Directions:
Saute onions, celery and green pepper together, then add meat. Brown and drain. Add rest of ingredients.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Chili Beans
Ingredients:
1 lb. dry beans (pinto, kidney or October beans or a combination)
1 qt. stewed tomatoes
1 c. dry barley
1 large onion, diced
1 green pepper, diced
4 stalks celery, diced
6 oz. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. paprika
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. raw honey
3 bay leaves
Directions:
Cook beans and barley according to package directions in large pot with onion, pepper and celery.
Add stewed tomatoes, tomato paste and remaining ingredients.
Add beans and simmer 45 minutes. Serve hot or cold.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Chili
Ingredients:
2 lb. very lean ground meat
1 onion, finely chopped
3 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1/2 to 3/4 bell pepper, chopped
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. red pepper
2 to 3 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (10 oz.) can Ro-Tel tomatoes
4 Tbsp. flour, dissolved in 2 c. water
2 (15 oz.) cans Ranch Style chili beans
Directions:
In Dutch oven, brown ground meat.
Add chopped onion, garlic and green pepper; cook with meat until tender.
Add seasonings, tomato sauce and Ro-Tel tomatoes.
Cook mixture over medium heat about 15 minutes; stir as needed.
Add flour and water mixture. Stir often to prevent sticking or burning.
Cook 15 or 20 minutes. Add a little water, if needed.
Add beans; mix and heat thoroughly.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Chili
Ingredients:
1 (No. 2) can chili beans
1 chopped green pepper
1 lb. stew meat, diced in 1/2-inch squares
1 (No. 2 1/2) can tomatoes
1/8 tsp. paprika
2 whole cloves
1 to 2 tsp. chili powder
1 or 2 oz. cumin seed (this is important)
1 large onion
1 lb. ground beef
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 bay leaf
3 garlic buds, minced
Directions:
Brown onion, garlic, green pepper, ground beef and stew meat in hog fat or bacon drippings.
Add chili powder, salt, paprika, cayenne pepper, cloves, bay leaf, cumin seed and tomatoes.
Simmer for 2 hours, adding water if necessary.
Add beans; heat through. Serves 6 to 8.

question: I want a recipe for a spicy chili with beans.
answer:
Title: Vegetable Chili
Ingredients:
1 1/2 chopped onions
1 1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 (16 oz.) cans tomatoes, undrained and chopped
2 Tbsp. chili powder
2 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. ground red pepper
2 (16 oz.) cans pinto beans, undrained and divided
Directions:
Saute the first 4 ingredients in oil in a large Dutch oven until tender. Add tomatoes and next 3 ingredients.
Empty 1 can of beans into container of electric blender.
Blend beans until smooth. Add to tomato mixture with remaining can of beans.
Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, 30 minutes or to desired consistency.
Yields about 2 quarts.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
36 fresh mushrooms
Directions:
Remove stems, brush caps with melted butter and place hollow-side up in pan.
Salt and pepper to taste.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
16 large mushrooms
1/2 c. butter
3 Tbsp. chopped shallots
1 1/4 c. seasoned breadcrumbs
1/2 chopped fresh parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Wash mushrooms thoroughly and pat dry.
Remove stems.
Chop stems fine.
Melt 1/4 cup of the butter in a skillet.
Saute mushroom caps briefly on both sides until they begin to turn beige.
Remove caps from pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
20 large mushrooms
2 Tbsp. butter, salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1/2 onion, finely chopped
2 egg yolks
3 Tbsp. bread crumbs
1/4 c. sour cream
Directions:
Saute chopped onion in butter.
Add egg yolks, salt, pepper, bread crumbs, sour cream and the mushroom stems, finely chopped. Stuff each mushroom head, forming a rounded top.
Sprinkle with 3 more tablespoons bread crumbs.
Place mushrooms in a shallow, buttered baking dish.
Sprinkle with the melted butter.
Bake in a hot oven at 450° for 10 minutes or until golden brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium size mushrooms, wiped with a damp cloth
1 c. mushroom stems
3 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 c. butter, softened
1 c. nuts, finely chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 to 1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Arrange mushrooms in a shallow baking dish, hollow side up. Combine all remaining ingredients except cream; heap into mushroom umbrellas. Pour cream over mushrooms; bake at 350° for 20 minutes. Baste once or twice with sauce in baking dish. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for stuffed mushrooms?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
12 large or 24 medium mushrooms
2 Tbsp. minced green onion (include tops)
5 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. Jack cheese, shredded
1 c. flaked crab
1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
1 egg, lightly beaten
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Clean mushrooms.
Remove stems and some of meat.
Chop and saute stems with onions in 2 tablespoons butter.
Stir in all else, except cheese and rest of butter and wine.
Melt butter and coat mushrooms with it.
Fill each mushroom with stuffing and pile cheese on top.
Pour wine into baking pan and bake mushrooms at 400° for 15 minutes.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
4 medium russet potatoes, cut into large wedges
1 tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
2 cloves garlic, minced, optional
Reduced-sodium ketchup, optional
Directions:
Place potatoes in a large bowl, add cold water to cover. Let stand for 25 minutes. Preheat oven to 425°. Spray a nonstick baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray. Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
4 medium Russet potatoes (cut into large wedges)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
garlic salt
ketchup
Directions:
Place potatoes in large bowl; add cold water to cover and let stand for 15 minutes. Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Spray a nonstick baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray. Set aside. Drain potatoes in a colander. Spread on a double layer of paper towels. Cover with a second layer of paper towels. Press down on the towels to dry potatoes. Transfer potatoes to a clean large bowl. Sprinkle with oil, pepper and salt; toss gently to combine. Arrange seasoned potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, using a spatula turn potatoes; sprinkle with garlic salt. Bake until golden, about 20 minutes, turning baking sheet after 10 minutes for even browning. Serve immediately with ketchup on the side.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, cut in large wedges
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 tsp. fresh ground black pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
2 cloves minced garlic
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Place potatoes in a large bowl.
Add cold water to cover.
Let stand 15 minutes.
Spray a nonstick baking sheet with vegetable cooking spray.
Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges
Ingredients:
4 Medium Russet Potatoes, cut into large wedges
1 Tbsp Vegetable Oil
1/4 tsp Freshly ground Black Pepper
1/8 tsp Salt
2 Cloves Garlic, minced (Optional)
Directions:
1. Place Potatoes in a large bowl, add cold water to cover, let stand for 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy potato wedges?
answer:
Title: Crispy Potato Wedges(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Paprika
1 tsp. Dried Parsley Flakes
1/4 tsp. Onion Salt
1/8 tsp. Pepper
2 Medium Potatoes Cut into Wedges
Refrigerated Butter Spray
Directions:
In a reusable plastic bag.
Combine the first 4 ingredients. Spritz the potato wedges with butter flavored spray.
Place in the bag a few at a time, and shake to coat.
Arrange in a single layer on an ungreased baking sheet.
Bake at 450 for 25-30 minutes or until tender.
Makes 2 Servings - 1 Point Each.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Cajun Shrimp
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, divided
1/4 c. finely chopped green onions
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. white pepper
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/8 tsp. oregano
1 3/4 lb. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
6 Tbsp. fish stock
3 Tbsp. finely chopped fresh parsley
cooked rice or pasta
Directions:
In large skillet, melt 1/2 cup butter.
Add onions, salt, garlic, peppers, basil, thyme and oregano; stir well.
Add shrimp; saute until pink, about 1 minute, shaking the pan.
Add mushrooms, stock and remaining butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Cajun Shrimp Creole
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
3 stalks celery, chopped
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 large onion, diced
1 large bell pepper, diced
1 (14 oz.) can stewed tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. salt
1 lb. medium shrimp, shelled and deveined
cooked rice
Directions:
In large, deep	fry
pan
over medium heat, melt butter and oil.
Add
celery, garlic, onion and bell pepper.
Saute 4 minutes, until
vegetables	begin to soften.
Add stewed tomatoes and tomato	sauce.	Mix well.
Add basil, pepper, cayenne pepper and salt.
Mix
well.
Over medium-high heat, simmer 10 minutes. Add shrimp.
Simmer
5
to	8 minutes, stirring frequently, until shrimp
are pink and cooked thoroughly.
Serve over white or brown rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Cajun Shrimp Creole
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 c. onion, chopped medium
1/2 c. bell pepper, chopped medium
2 Tbsp. garlic, minced
1/2 c. parsley flakes, double if fresh
1 tsp. cayenne pepper, adjust to taste
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. shrimp, cleaned and deveined
1/4 c. tomato paste
1 c. tomato sauce
1 c. water
Directions:
In a 10 inch skillet, heat oil.
Add flour, stir on medium heat until flour begins to brown.
Add onion, bell pepper, garlic, parsley, cayenne, black pepper and salt.
Simmer on medium heat until onion is limp and clear.
Add shrimp, cook until all shrimp are pink.
Add tomato paste, tomato sauce and water.
Simmer 20 minutes on low heat.
Serve over rice.
Serves 3 to 4.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Shrimp And Fish Creole
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. shrimp, peeled
1 lb. fish fillets, cut in small pieces
1 1/2 c. chopped onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 Tbsp. unsalted margarine
4 ripe tomatoes, peeled and coarsely chopped
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. water
1 c. uncooked rice
Directions:
Saute onions, green pepper and garlic in margarine until tender. Add tomatoes, parsley, paprika, sugar, cayenne and bay leaf. Cover and simmer 30 minutes. Add fish to sauce, then add shrimp. Cook about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally until shrimp turns pink and fish flakes easily with fork. Blend together cornstarch and water. Add to creole and cook, stirring until slightly thickened.

question: What’s a good recipe for shrimp tacos?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Creole
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. oil
6 Tbsp. flour
2 c. chopped onions
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. chopped bell pepper
1 c. chopped green onions
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. tomato sauce
2 bay leaves
1 tsp. black pepper
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. basil
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. water
3 lb. peeled shrimp
Directions:
Heat oil in a large, heavy pot.
Stir in flour and make a medium brown roux.
Add onions, celery, bell pepper and green onions; saute until limp.
Add garlic, tomato sauce, tomatoes, bay leaves, black pepper, thyme, basil, salt and cayenne.
Cook for 15 minutes.
Add Worcestershire sauce; simmer for about 20 minutes. This dish improves upon resting several hours.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. ground pork
3/4 lb. ground beef
2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3/4 lb. rice, washed well
1 large onion, minced
3 Tbsp. shortening
1 large head of cabbage
1 small can of sauerkraut
1 No. 2 can tomato juice
Directions:
Core cabbage and place in enough boiling salted water to cover. With a fork in one hand and a knife in the other, keep cutting off the leaves as they become wilted. Drain. Trim thick center vein of each cabbage leaf. Brown the onion in shortening. Add to meat, seasonings and rice; mix well. Place a tablespoon of filling on each cabbage leaf and roll, tucking in edges. Place in pot and cover 2/3 full with water; arrange sauerkraut on top; add tomato juice. Cover and cook slowly for about 1 1/2 hours or until rice is tender. Serves 6 to 8 people. You can substitute green pepper for the cabbage or use both. For green peppers, cut off tops, scoup out center and fill peppers about 2/3 full with filling. Cook as directed for cabbage.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Oriental Pork And Cabbage
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean pork tenderloin
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sesame oil
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
3 tsp. vegetable oil
2 c. coarsely shredded cabbage (about 8 oz.)
1 medium bell pepper, cut into 1/4-inch strips
1 c. (1-inch) green onion pieces with tops
1 Tbsp. toasted sesame seed
Directions:
Trim fat from pork tenderloin; cut pork with grain into 2-inch strips.
Cut strips across grain into 1/4-inch slices.
(For ease in cutting, partially freeze pork, about 1 1/2 hours.)
Toss pork with soy sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, sugar, salt, pepper and garlic in glass or plastic bowl or heavy plastic bag.
Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Red Cabbage
Ingredients:
1 large head red cabbage, sliced
1 c. onions, chopped
3 c. unpeeled Granny Smith apples, chopped
2 c. 100% Concord grape juice
1 c. lean salt pork, chopped (leave rind in large pieces)
1/2 c. brown sugar
2/3 c. red wine vinegar
2 bay leaves
12 juniper berries (whole)
12 allspice (whole)
12 cloves (whole)
1 c. water
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Directions:
Lightly brown salt pork to remove fat.
Remove pork from pan and lightly brown onion in fat.
Combine pork, onion, cabbage and apple.
Combine juice, water and vinegar and pour directly over cabbage.
Vinegar will eliminate color bleeding from cabbage.
Add remaining ingredients and salt and pepper to taste.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer three to four hours or until tender and flavors are blended.
Add more water or grape juice as needed. Do not drain.
Remove pork rind.
This is better made a day ahead.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Cabbage
Ingredients:
1/2 c. uncooked rice
1 lb. ground beef
1 lb. ground pork
1 medium chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 eggs, beaten
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. cooked roast pork (butt end)
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large head cabbage
16 oz. sauerkraut, drained
1 qt. whole tomatoes
caraway seed
Directions:
Cook the rice in lightly salted water according to package directions.
Cool slightly.
Mix with the next 8 ingredients for filling.

question: What can I cook with ground pork and cabbage?
answer:
Title: Pork With Cabbage
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. pork, thin sliced
3 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sesame oil
1/2 cabbage, shredded
pinch of salt
4 Tbsp. peanut oil
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Marinate sliced pork with soy sauce and sesame oil.
Add 2 tablespoons peanut oil to a preheated wok.
Stir-fry pork until meat changes color.
Pull pork up the sides of the wok.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Baked Eggs
Ingredients:
6 eggs
1 c. cream
6 oz. cream cheese
4 c. cubed day old firm white or French bread
2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
10 eggs, lightly beaten
4 c. (1 qt.) milk
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. onion powder
dash of freshly ground pepper
8 to 10 slices cooked bacon, crumbled
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. chopped, peeled tomatoes
sausage (optional)
ham (optional)
green/red pepper (optional)
Directions:
Generously butter a 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Arrange bread cubes in dish and sprinkle with cheese.
Beat together next 5 ingredients with pepper to taste and pour evenly over cheese and bread. Sprinkle with bacon, mushrooms and tomato. Cover and chill overnight.
Preheat oven to 325°.
Bake casserole, uncovered, until set, about 1 hour
(tent with foil if top begins to overbrown).
Makes 12 servings.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Buns
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
3/4 c. sugar, divided
1 Tbsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 eggs, lightly beaten
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 c. milk
1 c. raisins
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, stir together the flour, 1/2 cup of sugar and baking powder.
Cut in butter.
Combine eggs, vanilla and milk.
Add to dry ingredients and stir just until moistened.
Add raisins.
Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheet.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Fruit And Nut Morning Buns
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. hot roll mix
1 c. oats (uncooked)
3/4 c. flour
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
3/4 c. dried fruit
1/2 c. finely chopped pecans
1 (3 oz.) pkg. fat free cream cheese
2 Tbsp. margarine (soft)
2 Tbsp. grated orange peel
1 egg (room temperature)
1 c. very warm water
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
Directions:
In large bowl combine hot roll mix, yeast packet, oats, flour, sugar, fruit and nuts.
Mix well.
Add cream cheese, margarine, orange peel and egg.
Mix.
Add water.
Mix until dough pulls away from sides of bowl.
Turn dough out on floured surface.
Knead 5 minutes.
Shape dough in ball.
Cover.
Let rest 5 minutes.
Cut in half.
Cut each half into 6 pieces.
Shape each piece in ball. Place on cookie sheet.
Brush tops with melted margarine. Sprinkle with oats. Cover loosely.
Let rise 20 to 30 minutes. Heat oven to 375°.
Bake uncovered 26 to 28 minutes.
Remove to wire rack.
Cool.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Homemade Buns
Ingredients:
4 c. milk
1 c. Crisco
1 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
4 eggs
1 c. water
1 cake yeast
1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Heat milk, Crisco, sugar and salt.
Let cool to lukewarm. Beat eggs, water, yeast and flour.
Add to first mixture, using electric mixer until you can't beat anymore.
Then knead with hands.

question: What’s a good vegetarian burger recipe?
answer:
Title: Cheeseburger Buns
Ingredients:
2 pkgs. (1/4 oz. each) active dry yeast
1/2 c. warm water
3/4 c. warm milk
1/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. shortening
1 egg
1 tsp. salt
3 1/2 to 4 c. all purpose flour
1 1/2 pounds ground beef
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 can (8 oz.) tomato sauce
8 slices American cheese, quartered
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water.
Add milk, sugar, shortening, egg, salt, and 2 c. flour; beat until smooth. Stir in enough remaining flour to form a soft dough.
Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 4-6 minutes.
Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 30 minutes.
In a skillet, cook beef and onion until beef is no longer pink.
Set aside.
Stir tomato sauce and remove from head. Divide dough into 16 pieces on a lightly floured surface.
Roll out and stretch each piece.
Top each piece with cheese and 3 Tbsp. beef, bring dough over and seal.
Let rise and bake at 400 degrees for 20-30 minutes.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin-Coconut Bread
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. coconut cream instant pudding mix
1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 c. canned or cooked, mashed pumpkin
1/2 c. chopped pecans (optional)
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in a large mixing bowl; beat at medium speed of an electric mixer until blended.
Combine flour and next 7 ingredients in a medium bowl; add to sugar mixture alternately with pumpkin, beginning and ending with flour mixture. Mix after each addition.
Stir in pecans, if desired.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Coconut Muffins
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. sugar
3/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 (3 1/2 oz.) pkg. coconut cream instant pudding
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. canned pumpkin
1/2 c. chopped nuts (pecans or walnuts)
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients in large mixer bowl.
Beat at medium speed until well blended.
Combine flour and next ingredients in medium bowl.
Add to the sugar mixture alternately with pumpkin.
Mix after each addition.
Stir in nuts.
Pour into greased muffin pans.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 10 minutes.
Makes 15 to 18 muffins.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. Baker's Angel Flake coconut
1/4 c. butter or margarine
2 c. Cool Whip
1 pkg. instant vanilla pudding
2/3 c. milk
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cloves
1/4 tsp. allspice
1 c. pumpkin
Directions:
Lightly brown coconut in butter.
Stir often.
Save 2 tablespoons for garnish.
Press remaining coconut over the bottom and sides of greased 8-inch pie pan.
Cool.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Coconut Milk
Ingredients:
1 c. shredded unsweetened coconut
3 c. distilled water
1 tsp. honey (raw)
pinch of salt
Directions:
Blend until very smooth.
Strain well or use on cereal unstrained.

question: What can I make with pumpkin puree and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. pumpkin
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 c. cooking oil
1 c. chopped nuts
1 small box instant coconut pudding mix
Directions:
Sift dry ingredients together, except sugar.
Mix together pumpkin, sugar, eggs, oil and nuts.
Add a small box of instant coconut pudding and mix in dry ingredients.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Roasted Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh asparagus, trimmed
2 Tbsp. olive oil
pinch salt
shaved parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Arrange oven racks to middle and lower third of oven.
Heat oven to 400 degrees.
Divide asparagus and spread on two jelly-roll pans.
Toss each with 1 tablespoon oil and salt.
Roast 10 minutes. Switch pans between racks and roast 10 minutes more until stalks are tender.
Sprinkle top with cheese if desired and pepper.
Makes 4-6 servings.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Asparagus Parmesan
Ingredients:
1 lb. asparagus
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/3 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
pepper to taste
Directions:
In skillet over medium heat, boil 1-inch of water. Add asparagus and 1 teaspoon salt; cover skillet and cook 5 minutes or until asparagus are tender-crisp. Drain.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Roasted Asparagus
Ingredients:
1 lb. asparagus
2 to 3 cloves chopped garlic
3 to 4 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Break off tough ends of asparagus.
Peel lower white sections; place in baking dish.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Sprinkle on chopped garlic.
Bake at 450° for 8 to 10 minutes.
Makes 2 to 3 servings.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Herbed Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh asparagus, tough ends removed
4 Tbsp. unsalted butter, room temperature
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. chopped chives
1 Tbsp. chopped dill
1 Tbsp. chopped rosemary
1 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 lb. wedge Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Blanch asparagus in boiling water for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Remove to paper towels.
Pat dry.
In small bowl combine butter with herbs and spices.
Melt herb-butter over medium heat in large skillet.
Add asparagus.
Toss gently.
Place on serving platter. Top with shaved Parmesan cheese.

question: How do I make roasted asparagus with parmesan?
answer:
Title: Asparagus And Parmesan Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. green and/or white asparagus
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. fresh thyme or basil
1/4 tsp. Dijon style mustard
1 clove garlic, minced
salt and pepper
finely shredded Parmesan cheese
parsley
basil
slivered garlic (optional)
Directions:
Place asparagus in a steamer basket.
Place basket in a large skillet over boiling water.
Reduce heat, cover and steam for 5 to 7 minutes or until asparagus is crisp tender.
Remove from steamer and cool slightly.
Meanwhile, for dressing, in a screw top jar, combine olive oil, lemon juice, thyme, mustard, garlic, salt, and pepper to taste.
Cover and shake until combined.
Arrange asparagus on a platter.
Drizzle with dressing.
Sprinkle with cheese, parsley and if desired basil/garlic.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen Brussels sprouts
water
4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. sour cream
salt to taste
Louisiana hot sauce or ground cayenne pepper to taste
Directions:
If using fresh sprouts, rinse well and cut off any discolored leaves.
With a paring knife, cut a "plus"
sign in the stem end to insure even cooking.
Place the sprouts in a large saucepan and cover with water.
Bring to a boil and continue boiling for about 10 minutes or until the stem side is tender when pierced with a knife.
Drain and set the sprouts aside.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Creamed Sprouts
Ingredients:
2 pt. Brussels sprouts
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 c. milk
1 c. sour cream
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cook Brussels sprouts in small amount of salted water in covered pan; drain well.
In medium saucepan, cook onion in butter until tender; add flour, brown sugar, mustard and salt and stir in milk.
Cook until thickened.
Add sour cream and mix; add sprouts, stirring gently.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Fancy Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
1 c. water
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
2 pt. fresh Brussels sprouts, halved or 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen Brussels sprouts, thawed
1 (8 oz.) water chestnuts, drained and diced
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
In a saucepan over medium heat, bring water, parsley, sugar and salt to a boil. Add Brussels sprouts. Cover and simmer for 6 to 8 minutes or until tender; drain. Add water chestnuts and butter; heat through. Yield: 6 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Cream And Garlic
Ingredients:
3 pounds Brussels sprouts, trimmed and cross cut in base
1/4 cup unsalted butter
2 medium garlic cloves, minced
1 cup whipping cream
1 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Cook Brussels sprouts in large pot of boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain, rinse under cold water and drain again.
(Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated.)
Melt butter in heavy large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and cook until soft, stirring occasionally, about 5 minutes.
Do not brown.
Add Brussels sprouts, cream, salt and pepper and cook until cream thickens enough to coat Brussels sprouts, stirring occasionally, about 15 minutes.
Serve hot. Yield:
8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts Supreme
Ingredients:
1 pound fresh Brussels sprouts, trimmed
1 cup chopped celery
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 cup milk
1/2 cup shredded process American cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
pinch cayenne pepper, optional
Directions:
Place Brussels sprouts, celery, and a small amount of water in a saucepan; cover and cook for 8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in another saucepan, melt butter.
Stir flour until smooth.
Gradually add milk; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add cheese, salt, and cayenne if desired; stir until cheese is melted.
Drain sprouts and celery; top with cheese sauce.
Yield:
4-6 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Rice Surprise
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. rice, cooked
1 can Progresso black beans, drained
1 jar salsa or picante sauce
Directions:
May substitute bean of your choice.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Rice With Beans
Ingredients:
4 c. rice
1 can beans (pink)
1/2 can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. sorito or onions or peppers
5 c. water
3 Tbsp. oil (vegetable oil)
Directions:
Put the oil in the pot and then all the ingredients.
Then add the beans, water and last, the rice.
Wait until it dries.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. red beans
1 stick butter
1 onion, chopped
1/2 bell pepper
dash of black pepper
dash of red pepper
dash of salt
Directions:
Boil together all ingredients.
Add cooked rice and simmer.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 c. dried red beans
3 c. water
1 clove garlic, chopped
1 tsp. salt
1 rib celery, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
1 bay leaf
1 medium onion, chopped
2 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Cook beans in salted water or in water with bacon drippings, ham bone or salt pork.
Add onion, garlic, celery, pepper and bay leaf and continue cooking until done, about 3 hours.
Place dry rice on plate and top with beans which should be fairly soupy. Serves 4.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and beans?
answer:
Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 c. beans, washed and drained
3 c. water
lean white bacon or ham bone
1 garlic clove, chopped
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
1 tsp. "no salt"
2 c. Uncle Ben's rice
Directions:
Soak beans overnight. Cook rice and set aside. Drain off old water from beans and add fresh water. Add meat and cook until beans are tender. Add seasoning and serve over rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
16 medium carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 1/2 c. water
2 Tbsp. liquid Butter Buds
1 onion, diced
1 Tbsp. packed brown sugar
1 tsp. dry instant beef broth
1/2 tsp. lemon peel
1/2 tsp. Sweet 'N Low brown sugar substitute
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine all ingredients and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Simmer, covered, 20 to 25 minutes. With slotted spoon, remove carrots to a bowl.
Increase heat and bring to a rapid boil.
Reduce to glaze consistency.
Add carrots and coat evenly with glaze.
One 1 cup serving contains 95 calories and 0 gm fat.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
8 cooked carrots, halved lengthwise
Directions:
Cover carrots with water and boil until tender. Drain.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
2 bunches small carrots
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Peel carrots; cut in fourths lengthwise.
Place in heavy skillet and add remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook over low heat, turning often, until tender and glazed.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1/3 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. water
4 tsp. sugar
2 to 3 lb. mini carrots (3 to 4-inches long or cut into julienne strips)
1 tsp. Accent
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
Directions:
In medium skillet, melt butter; add water and sugar.
Add carrots, then cover and simmer until carrots are tender, adding water as necessary to prevent sticking.
Remove cover and bring to a boil.
Cook and stir until all liquid has evaporated and carrots are glazed, stirring gently.
Sprinkle with Accent, salt and pepper.

question: What’s a good recipe for glazed carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 lb. carrots
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Steam carrots until tender.
Drain in a pan; mix butter, sugar and nutmeg.
Stir in carrots and heat until glazed.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
2 large cloves garlic, coarsely chopped
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. fresh grated Parmesan
Directions:
Puree lemon juice and garlic in food processor.
With machine running, gradually add olive oil and blend until smooth.
Add Parmesan cheese, blend until thickened.
Season with salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Lemon Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/3 c. ReaLemon lemon juice from concentrate
1/4 c. sliced green onions
1 Tbsp. Dijon style mustard
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
In 1-pint jar with tight fitting lid or cruet, combine all ingredients; shake well.
Chill to blend flavors.
Use as a salad dressing or as a marinade for asparagus, broccoli, poultry or fish.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette (Basic)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
scant 1/2 tsp. salt
5 twists of peppermill
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
scant tsp. fresh lemon juice
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put mustard in the bottom of a salad bowl.
Stir the first 5 ingredients, whisking constantly.
Add vegetable oil and olive oil in a very thin stream.
Makes 6 tablespoons of vinaigrette, enough for 10 to 12 cups of salad greens.
Use shortly after it is made. Add whatever you like, garlic, anchovies, shallots, sliced mushrooms, chopped capers, etc.
May be used on grilled fish or cold roast beef (add horseradish) or chicken.

question: How do I make a simple lemon vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Strong Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. white wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. anchovy paste
1 Tbsp. drained capers
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and whisk.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Crisp Oven-Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 envelope onion soup mix
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. margarine, melted
1 tsp. thyme (optional)
1 tsp. marjoram (optional)
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. potatoes, cut into quarters
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
In shallow baking pan, thoroughly blend all ingredients, except potatoes.
Add potatoes to coat thoroughly. Bake, stirring potatoes occasionally, 60 minutes or until potatoes are tender and golden brown.
Garnish with chopped parsley, if desired.
Makes about 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Crisped Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. Russet potatoes
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. shallots, minced
1 Tbsp. diet soft margarine or Pam
1/4 c. chopped fresh basil (1/8 c. dried)
Directions:
Cut potatoes into eighths or sixteenths.
Brush margarine or spray with Pam evenly on potatoes to coat.
Sprinkle with garlic salt.
Roast potatoes in 450° oven until brown and crispy, approximately 20 to 30 minutes, turning once or twice.
Stir in basil and shallots.
Transfer to serving dish.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roast Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes
1/2 c. oil
1/4 c. margarine
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. rosemary, crushed
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Scrub potatoes; cut into cubes.
In plastic bag, add remaining ingredients; refrigerate overnight.
Bake at 400° for 1 hour. Turn every 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Crisp Onion Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 envelop Lipton mushroom soup
1/2 c. olive or vegetable oil
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 tsp. thyme leaves (optional)
1 tsp. marjoram leaves (optional)
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 lb. all-purpose potatoes, cut into quarters
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place in roasting pan.
Pour ingredients over potatoes.
Bake 60 minutes.
Garnish with parsley, if desired. Makes 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
potatoes, cut to bite size pieces
1/4 c. melted butter
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Pour mixture over potatoes and toss to coat.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until done.
Stir occasionally to absorb liquid.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1.5 lb. steamed rice
1/2 onion
0.3 lb. chicken
2 eggs
vegetable oil
soy sauce
salt
Directions:
Cut onion into small pieces which you like.
Cut chicken into small pieces which you like.
Stir 2 eggs in the bowl.
Heat pan (wok) up, then put 2 or 3 spoons of oil.
Cook eggs first and stir them into small pieces.
Put eggs into the bowl, then clean the pan.
Heat the pan up again, then put 3 spoons of oil.
Cook chicken, then onion and rice.
Add some soy sauce and salt.
Put some vegetable that you like.
Enjoy.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fried Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked rice
2 scallions, chopped (including green ends)
1 c. cooked chicken, diced or shredded
1/2 box frozen mixed vegetables, thawed or your choice of fresh vegetables
2 eggs
1 tsp. m.s.g. (optional)
pepper and salt to taste
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
soy sauce
Directions:
Beat eggs, m.s.g. and salt together.
Heat wok until hot; add oil and make thin pancakes out of mixture.
Pour egg by tablespoons to fry and make small pancakes.
Cut egg pancakes into thin strips. Heat wok hot and dry.
Add oil.
Sprinkle wok with salt.
Brown onion, then add rice.
Cook for 5 minutes.
Add rest of ingredients except eggs and soy sauce.
Fry and stir constantly until thoroughly mixed.
Add soy sauce and stir.
Mix in shredded eggs and serve while hot.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fried Rice
Ingredients:
2 egg whites
1 whole egg
2 Tbsp. sesame oil
3 green onions, chopped
1 1/3 c. cooked vegetables (peas, carrots, corn)
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 c. cooked white rice
Directions:
In a bowl, beat together the egg whites and whole egg; let sit.
Heat oil in large nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Add vegetables and saute for 20 to 30 seconds.
Add the eggs, saute for an additional 30 seconds. Add rice, chicken and soy sauce. Stir until well mixed.

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen vegetables (desired)
rice
soy sauce
seasonings (desired)
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Cook rice and set aside.
Add oil to skillet.
When hot (medium), add vegetables.
Stir constantly until cooked.
Add rice, soy sauce (desired amount of soy sauce) and seasonings. Enjoy!

question: How do I make homemade chicken fried rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked, diced chicken
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 c. uncooked long-grain rice
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1/3 c. salad oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. green pepper
1/4 c. celery
2 beaten eggs
1 c. shredded lettuce or red cabbage
Directions:
Cook chicken. Combine chicken and soy sauce. Sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon salt. Let sit for 15 minutes. Cook rice in hot oil. Reduce heat. Add chicken and broth. Simmer, covered, 20 to 25 minutes. Stir in onions, green peppers and celery. Cook, uncovered. Push rice to side. Add eggs and cook until almost set. Blend into rice. Stir in lettuce or red cabbage.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
6 c. peeled, sliced apples
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. plain flour
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
2 pie shells
2 Tbsp. butter
small amount of milk
cinnamon-sugar
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour, spices and dash of salt.
Mix with peeled, sliced apple.
Fill pie shell with apple mixture.
Dot with butter.
Cover pie with another pie shell and crimp edges together.
Cut slits in top.
Brush pie top with milk.
Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar.
Place pie on inverted iron skillet in a 400° oven and bake for 50 minutes.
(This will make a crisp bottom crust.)

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
6 c. tart apples, thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 c. milk or cream
1 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
Mix both the regular and brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, salt and nutmeg. Spread 1/3 of apples in unbaked deep-dish pie crust. Spread 1/3 of filling on top. Repeat. Pour 1/4 cup milk in center and dot with margarine. Top with an unbaked crust. Brush crust with 1 tablespoon milk. Bake at 375° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. lemon juice
5 c. thinly sliced apples
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour, spices, salt and lemon juice.
Add apples; toss to mix.
Roll out pastry dough for crust and top.
Cut vents in top piece.
Line pie pan with pastry and cut off overhang. Fill with half the apples and dot with butter.
Add remaining apples.
Moisten rim with water.
Adjust top crust.
Leave about 1/2-inch pastry beyond edge.
Fold in under lower pastry.
Seal rim by pressing together and flute it.
Brush with milk.
Bake at 400° for 50 to 60 minutes or until apples test done with fork.
For a single crust, use a 425° oven.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
4 cut up apples
1 c. water
2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
2 rounded Tbsp. Clear Jell
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook apples and water and stir in remaining ingredients.

question: How do I make a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: My Favorite Apple Pie
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. tart apples, peeled and sliced (8 c.)
1 1/2 c. light brown sugar
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 stick butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. apple pie spice
1 c. apple juice
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl.
Add apples, mix well. Line a 10 or 12-inch baking dish with pastry, add apple mixture. Pour apple juice around edge (not on apples).
Cover with top pastry, sealing edges.
Cut slits in top.
Brush with margarine, sprinkle with white sugar.
Bake at 425° for 40 minutes or until juice bubbles through slits.
This is a deep-dish pie.
Pan must be at least two inches deep.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
1 stick butter
1 medium onion
bouillon cubes (2/bowl)
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
salt and pepper to taste
Mozzarella cheese
French onion bread
water (as much as needed)
Directions:
You will need cup/bowl.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
2 or 3 onions, sliced
1 bay leaf
1 c. dry red wine
2 cans consomme
1 can water
Directions:
Saute onions in butter until tender.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer 20 minutes.
Put soup in bowls.
Add toasted garlic bread.
Top with Mozzarella cheese and add grated Parmesan or Romano cheese.
Brown in oven.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
5 medium yellow onions
5 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. oil
2 tsp. sugar
6 c. beef consomme
3 c. chicken broth
2 c. burgundy wine
1 c. white wine
3 c. water
2 Tbsp. beef base
few dashes brandy
garlic powder and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. dry parsley, Parmesan cheese, garlic and cheese croutons
Directions:
Saute onions in butter and oil in a large pot.
Cook over medium heat until onions are soft.
Sprinkle onions with sugar and toss together.
Add stocks and wine, water and beef base.
Stir well and bring to boil.
Add brandy, parsley flakes, garlic powder and pepper to taste.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium-sized onions, thinly sliced
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 c. beef or chicken stock
Directions:
Fry onions gently
in
fat
until lightly browned.
Add stock, and salt and pepper to taste.
Simmer about 15 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic French onion soup?
answer:
Title: French Onion Soup
Ingredients:
3 medium onions, thinly sliced
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. flour
2 c. consomme
4 c. water
1/2 c. boiled milk
1/4 lb. grated Swiss cheese
6 dried slices French bread
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
In heavy skillet, cook onions in heated butter until slightly browned.
Sprinkle with flour and cook over low flame until golden, never allowing them to become dark brown.
Add consomme and water. Bring to boil, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon, then simmer gently for 20 minutes.
Spoon into casserole or individual bowls. Place slices of bread on top.
Sprinkle generously with cheese. Add pepper.
Sprinkle with melted butter.
Brown quickly under broiler flame.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Asparagus Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. asparagus
1 to 3 cloves garlic, minced
2 to 4 Tbsp. olive oil
1 to 2 tsp. vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Break and discard bottom 1/8 of each stalk.
Break remaining part into halves. Wash by soaking and rinsing.
Boil or steam until tender.
Do not overcook.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Herbed Asparagus
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh asparagus, tough ends removed
4 Tbsp. unsalted butter, room temperature
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. chopped chives
1 Tbsp. chopped dill
1 Tbsp. chopped rosemary
1 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 lb. wedge Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Blanch asparagus in boiling water for 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Remove to paper towels.
Pat dry.
In small bowl combine butter with herbs and spices.
Melt herb-butter over medium heat in large skillet.
Add asparagus.
Toss gently.
Place on serving platter. Top with shaved Parmesan cheese.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Asparagus Spears With Garlic Mustard
Ingredients:
1 lb. (24) asparagus spears, trimmed
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. (1/2 lb.) sliced 1/4-inch fresh mushrooms
2 Tbsp. country-style Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. pepper
pinch of salt
1/2 tsp. minced fresh garlic
Directions:
In 10-inch skillet, place asparagus spears; add enough water to cover.
Bring to a full boil.
Cook over medium heat until asparagus is crisply tender (5 to 7 minutes).
Drain; return to skillet.
Add remaining ingredients, pushing asparagus to side just until butter is melted.
Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until heated through (5 to 7 minutes).
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Crunchy Asparagus With Onions
Ingredients:
fresh asparagus spears
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. coarse black pepper
4 Tbsp. oil
3 medium sweet onions, sliced
1/8 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Slice asparagus diagonally.
Place oil in wok and heat.
Add asparagus, onions and other seasonings.
Cover and shake until crispy, about 6 or 8 minutes.

question: What can I cook with asparagus and garlic?
answer:
Title: Marinated Asparagus
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. chopped dill
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
12 medium mushrooms, sliced
2 cucumbers
3 tomatoes
1 lb. asparagus
Directions:
Briefly steam and cool the asparagus.
Mix together olive oil, garlic, dill, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Cut stems from the mushrooms and slice.
Peel, seed and slice the cucumbers.
Peel and quarter the tomatoes.
Place all the vegetables in the bowl. Cover and refrigerate for 24 hours.
Drain the oil and arrange on chilled platter.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients:
5 1/2 c. chicken stock or canned low-sodium broth
6 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion, minced
1 1/2 c. Uncle Ben's rice (not Minute rice)
1/2 c. minced Italian parsley
2 oz. Asiago or Parmesan cheese, finely grated
salt and freshly ground pepper
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, bring the stock to a simmer over moderate heat.
Reduce the heat to very low and cover until ready to use.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Fresh Vegetable Risotto
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 medium onion, chopped (1/2 c.)
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. long grain rice
3 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. bite-size asparagus or broccoli pieces
1 medium tomato, seeded and diced
1/4 c. shredded carrots
1 c. shredded Muenster cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan
3 Tbsp. fresh basil
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook mushrooms, onion and garlic in hot oil until onion is tender, but not brown.
Stir in rice.
Cook and stir for 5 minutes.
In another saucepan, bring broth to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer.
Slowly add 1 cup of broth to rice mixture, stirring constantly.
Continue to cook and stir until liquid is absorbed.
Add 1 cup more broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly until broth is absorbed.
It should take 15 minutes.
Stir in tomato, carrot and remaining half cup broth. Cook until rice is slightly creamy and just tender, stirring constantly.
Stir in cheeses and basil.
If desired, garnish with tomato slices.
Serve immediately.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
40 mushrooms (medium size), washed, caps whole, stems removed
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. rosemary
freshly ground pepper
2 c. chicken bouillon
1/2 c. wild rice
1 shallot
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. chopped almonds
fresh lemon
Directions:
Bring bouillon to a boil.
Add washed wild rice; cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Saute mushroom caps in butter.
Mix rice, almonds, herbs and spices and fill mushroom caps.
Drizzle with fresh lemon juice.
Bake on cookie sheet at 300° for 15 minutes.
May easily be prepared a day prior to re-heating.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom risotto?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Mushroom Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 lb. boneless chicken breast, cut in 1 1/2-inch pieces
1 c. rice
1 medium carrot, chopped (1/3 c.)
1 small onion, chopped (1/4 c.)
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. frozen peas
Directions:
In large skillet, brown chicken pieces in butter; remove chicken.
In same skillet, brown rice, onion and carrot until rice is brown, stirring constantly.
Stir in broth, soup and pepper; bring to boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add peas and chicken; cover and simmer 5 more minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. olive oil
thyme to taste (optional)
rosemary to taste (optional)
soy sauce or Tabasco to taste
onions
potatoes
use your favorite veggies: turnips, broccoli, cauliflower, garlic, peppers, zucchini, summer squash, mushrooms)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
Melt oil and butter in roasting pan large enough so that vegetables rest on bottom of pan.
Adjust oil and butter to amount of vegetables.
Using tongs, turn cut sides of longest cooking vegetables down to seal in juices (potatoes, onions, turnips).
Roast 15 minutes.
Toss once or twice.
Add medium cooking vegetables (broccoli, summer squash) and pour soy sauce (or other favorite sauce) to coat.
Roast 15 minutes.
Add mushrooms and any seasonings.
Toss lightly.
Roast 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve with cornbread.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
10 c. mixed vegetables, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces (try onions, carrots, potatoes, eggplant, mushrooms and zucchini)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. melted butter
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried or fresh rosemary
1 1/2 tsp. dried or 1 Tbsp. fresh marjoram
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Arrange the vegetables in a large oiled baking dish and toss in the oil, butter, garlic and herbs. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes.
Uncover and turn the vegetables with a large spoon.
Add salt and pepper and roast at 425° for approximately 30 minutes or until the carrots and potatoes are thoroughly cooked and the edges of the vegetables have browned.
Serves 5.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Vegetable Pasta
Ingredients:
2 lbs. leeks, quartered
1/4 c. olive oil
1/4 c. defatted chicken broth
2 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. coarse salt
black pepper to taste
6 plum tomatoes, quartered
2 yellow squash, sliced
1/2 c. pitted black olives
1/3 c. chopped flat-leaf parsley
1 lb. Fettucini, cooked al dente
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees.
Place leeks in a shallow roasting pan and drizzle with olive oil and chicken broth. Sprinkle with thyme, salt and pepper.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roast With Carrots, Potatoes, Onions And Cabbage
Ingredients:
1 large center cut beef
1 large bag carrots (already cut)
1 bag potatoes (small)
1 large head cabbage
3 medium onions
3 cans Campbell's French onion soup
1 bottle Lea & Perrins steak sauce
butter
garlic salt*
garlic powder*
meat seasoning*
pepper*
Directions:
*Season to your taste.

question: What can I make with leftover roasted vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Mixed Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 large red skin potatoes, wedged (about 2 lb.)
3 large carrots, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
3 large parsnips, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
2 lb. onions, cut into wedges (large)
1 Tbsp. dried rosemary leaves
2 tsp. garlic powder
3 Tbsp. Fleischmann's margarine, melted
Directions:
In a large bowl, toss potatoes, carrots, parsnips and onions with rosemary and garlic.
Drizzle with margarine.
Arrange in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake at 450° for 40 to 45 minutes or until fork-tender, stirring constantly.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
2 large cucumbers
2 Tbsp. salad oil
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1 c. diced tomatoes
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 chopped green onions
Directions:
Peel cucumbers, wash and slice very thin.
In a small container with lid combine salad oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Shake well.
Add tomatoes, sugar and onions.
Pour dressing over vegetables.
Toss well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
1/3 c. non-fat plain yogurt or reduced-fat sour cream
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh or 2 tsp. dried dill
1 clove garlic, crushed
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
2 small cucumbers, sliced 1/4-inch thick
dill sprig for garnish
Directions:
In large bowl, whisk together yogurt, dill, garlic, lemon juice and salt.
Add sliced cucumbers.
Toss gently to coat well. Cover and chill at least 30 minutes until ready to serve.
Toss gently just before serving.
Garnish with dill sprig.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vinegar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. celery seed
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. Accent
1 chopped onion
2 tsp. parsley or 1 Tbsp. flakes
3 c. cucumbers
Directions:
Mix all. Refrigerate; enjoy!!

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
6 to 8 cucumbers, sliced thinly (peel and leave little strips of green on for color)
2 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar
1 c. vinegar
1/3 c. oil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 small jar pimentos
1 tsp. dried dill weed
Directions:
Mix salt into cucumbers.
Let stand in fridge for 2 hours. Meanwhile, mix together in saucepan sugar, 1/4 teaspoon salt, vinegar, oil and garlic powder.
Bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute. Let cool.
Drain cucumbers thoroughly.
Mix pimentos and dill weed into cucumbers.
Pour liquid over cucumbers and mix well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a light cucumber salad?
answer:
Title: Creamy Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
4 cucumbers, peeled and sliced
1 onion, sliced
1 1/2 c. Miracle Whip
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
Salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Coffee
Ingredients:
2 1/2 Tbsp. coffee (for each c. water), brewed as usual
milk
whipped cream
Directions:
Mix the coffee in equal portions to milk and serve hot.
If weaker Cafe Au Lait is desired, mix 1 part coffee to 3 parts milk. Top with whipped cream.
Serve with sugar.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Spiced Coffee
Ingredients:
4 c. water
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
4 (3-inch) cinnamon sticks
peel of 2 oranges
1/2 tsp. whole allspice
2 Tbsp. instant coffee
Directions:
In saucepan, combine all ingredients except coffee.
Heat to boiling.
Strain.
Pour liquid over coffee in heatproof container. Stir coffee until dissolved.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Spiced Coffee
Ingredients:
1/4 c. freeze-dried instant coffee
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. instant milk powder
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ground allspice
whipped cream
cinnamon sticks
Directions:
Mix first 7 ingredients in blender for 15 seconds.
Stir. Then blend for 15 seconds more.
Store the mixture in a tightly covered container.

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Cafe Au Lait(France)
Ingredients:
6 heaping Tbsp. coffee
10 c. milk
10 c. water
Directions:
Make coffee.
Heat milk to scalding.
Pour hot coffee and milk into serving cups at the same time (use equal amounts of each).

question: What’s a good recipe for a pumpkin spice latte?
answer:
Title: Cafe Au Lait Mix
Ingredients:
1 (11 oz.) jar coffee creamer
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. instant coffee
dash of salt
Directions:
Combine 4 tablespoons of mix with 2/3 cup of hot water.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
1 lb. lean ground beef
1 sweet red pepper, chopped
4 (10-inch) flour tortillas
2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1 onion, cut in strips
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. salsa
1 small zucchini, thinly sliced
2/3 c. low-fat sour cream
Directions:
In nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat; cook onion, garlic, chili powder, salt and pepper, stirring often, for 5 minutes or until onion is softened.
Add beef and salsa; cook, breaking up beef with back of spoon, for about 3 minutes or until beef is no longer pink.
Add peppers and zucchini; cook, stirring for 3 minutes or until tender-crisp and liquid has evaporated.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic, minced
1 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1 1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 lb. beef, sliced in strips
1 red pepper
1 green pepper
1 large onion
8 flour tortillas
Directions:
Combine garlic, seasoned salt, cumin, chili powder, crushed red pepper, vegetable oil, lemon juice and cornstarch.
Add beef and marinate for 2 hours.
Chop onion and peppers.
Stir-fry beef until thoroughly cooked; remove from pan.
Stir-fry peppers and onions.
Re-add beef to heat up.
Place tortilla on plate; cover with damp paper towel.
Microwave for 30 to 45 seconds.
Serve with sour cream and salsa.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean top round steak
1 Tbsp. salad oil
2 cloves garlic, minced or pressed
1 large onion
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1 large red bell pepper, seeded and cut into thin strips
2 tsp. ground cumin
3 Tbsp. lime juice
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 lb. Roma tomatoes, diced
Directions:
Cut beef into strips and set aside.
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over high heat; add meat and stir-fry until browned. Transfer meat to a bowl.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Beef Fajitas
Ingredients:
about 1 lb. beef flank steak
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 large cloves, minced
1 green onion
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. dried thyme leaves
1/2 tsp. salt
1 large onion
1 bell pepper
8 (8-inch) flour tortillas
Directions:
Cut steak into paper thin slices. Combine next 9 ingredients and marinate at least 4 hours.

question: What’s a good recipe for beef fajitas?
answer:
Title: Fajitas
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. boneless sirloin steak (about 1 1/2-inches thick)
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
12 (10-inch) flour tortillas
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 onions, sliced
2 green peppers, sliced
picante sauce
Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Trim excess fat from beef steak.
Prick beef with fork in several places.
Mix 1/4 cup oil, the vinegar, sugar, oregano, chili powder, garlic powder, salt and pepper in ungreased square baking dish (8 x 8 x 2-inches).
Place beef in dish, turning once, to coat both sides.
Cover and refrigerate at least 8 hours, turning meat occasionally.
Broil beef with top about 3 inches from heat about 8 minutes or until brown.
Turn.
Brush beef with marinade.
Broil until done.
Saute onions and peppers in oil. Cut beef diagonally into very thin slices.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Sauce For Broccoli
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. margarine
5 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. m.s.g.
3 dashes hot pepper sauce
3 1/2 c. milk
2 chicken bouillon cubes
5 egg yolks, beaten
1 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese
1 can sliced mushrooms
slivered almonds
paprika
1/4 c. minced onion
Directions:
Saute onion in margarine until tender.
Blend in flour and seasonings.
Add milk and bouillon cubes.
Stir over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens and comes to a boil. Add a little of the heated sauce to eggs.
Stir this into rest of sauce.
Add cheese; stir until melted.
Add mushrooms; pour over broccoli in a casserole.
Sprinkle with almonds and paprika.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes, until brown.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-N-Cheese
Ingredients:
3/4 c. onion
3/4 c. celery
2 c. cooked Minute rice
1 c. water
2 cans cream of mushroom soup
4 boxes cooked broccoli spears
1 (16 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz, room temperature
1 stick margarine
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
cooked, cut up chicken (optional)
bacon bits (optional)
Directions:
Separately, cook rice and broccoli as directed on boxes.
Chop onion and celery.
Drain water from broccoli, yielding 1 cup.
In large pot (broccoli should be cooked in), add all ingredients. Use the 1 cup water that was yielded from the cooked broccoli. Mix well.
Bake for 1 hour, uncovered, at 350°.
Top with Cheddar cheese and bacon bits.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Elegant
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water
6 Tbsp. butter, divided
1 (6 oz.) pkg. cornbread stuffing mix with seasoning
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli spears, thawed
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. chicken bouillon granules
3/4 c. milk
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/4 tsp. salt
4 green onions, sliced
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
paprika
Directions:
Combine water, 4 tablespoons butter and seasoning packet from stuffing; bring to a boil.
Remove from heat.
Stir in stuffing crumbs; let stand 5 minutes.
Spoon stuffing around inside edge of lightly buttered 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish, leaving well in center.
Place broccoli in well; set aside.
Melt remaining 2 tablespoons butter in a heavy saucepan over low heat; add flour, stirring until smooth.
Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Stir in bouillon.
Gradually add milk; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened and bubbly.
Add cream cheese and salt, stirring until smooth.
Stir in onion.
Spoon mixture over center of broccoli.
Sprinkle with Cheddar cheese and paprika. Cover with foil.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes; remove foil and bake 10 minutes longer.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Elegant
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1 (6 oz.) pkg. corn bread stuffing mix
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, thawed
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. chicken bouillon granules
3/4 c. milk
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/4 tsp. salt
4 green onions, sliced
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
paprika
Directions:
Combine water, 1/4 cup butter and 1 package seasoning mix. Bring to a boil.
Remove from heat; stir in stuffing crumbs.
Let stand 5 minutes.
Spoon stuffing around inside edge of lightly buttered 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish, leaving a well in the center. Place broccoli in the well.
Set aside.
Melt 2 tablespoons butter in a heavy pan over low heat.
Add flour; stir until smooth.
Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Stir in bouillon.
Gradually add milk.
Cook until thickened.
Add cream cheese.
Stir until smooth. Spoon mixture over center of broccoli.
Sprinkle with cheese and paprika.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes covered with foil.
Remove foil.
Bake an additional 10 minutes.
Yields 8 servings.

question: What can I cook with broccoli and cheese?
answer:
Title: Broccoli With Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
2 pkg. broccoli
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 c. milk
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. shredded cheese
1/4 c. chopped nuts
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook broccoli until just tender.
Drain and place in greased casserole dish.
Make a sauce with the butter, flour, salt, milk, pepper and cheese.
Sprinkle nuts over broccoli, then pour sauce over all.
Sprinkle top with bread crumbs.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes or until bubbling hot and browned on top.
Yields 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/4 c. chopped onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. each: dried basil leaves, oregano leaves and ground cumin
2 c. diced zucchini
1 c. diced carrots
2 lb. tomatoes, cut in eighths or 2 cans (undrained)
1 can chickpeas, drained
1 can kidney beans (undrained)
Directions:
In a 5-quart saucepot, heat oil over medium heat.
Add next 6 ingredients.
Cook, stirring 5 minutes, or until onion is tender. Add zucchini and carrots.
Cook, stirring for 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 to 35 minutes.
Makes 6 servings.
Freezes well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili(Diet)
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
3 cloves garlic
1 c. water
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. cumin
2 c. diced zucchini
2 (16 oz.) cans tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can red kidney beans
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans
1 c. diced green pepper
1/4 c. nonfat sour cream
Directions:
Spray pot with cooking spray.
Place over medium heat until hot.
Add onion and garlic; saute 5 minutes.
Add water and next 7 ingredients.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, 30 minutes.
Serve with some sour cream on top.
Serves 5 to 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/4 c. chopped onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 c. diced zucchini
1 c. diced carrots
2 lb. ripe tomatoes, cut into eighths
1 (16 oz.) can chickpeas, drained
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans, drained
Directions:
In a large saucepot, heat vegetables and oil over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, chili powder, basil, oregano and cumin.
Cook, stirring until onion is tender.
Add zucchini and carrots, cook stirring 1 or 2 minutes.
Stir in tomatoes, chickpeas and kidney beans.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes to 35 minutes.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Meatless Chili For 4
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. carrots, chopped
1 c. green pepper, chopped
1/2 c. sesame seed
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder or to taste
fresh ground pepper to taste
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. thyme
2 c. tomatoes, chopped
4 c. kidney beans (cooked or canned)
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 can water
Directions:
In large, heavy skillet saute the first 5 ingredients in olive oil.
Cook until vegetables are almost tender.
Add sesame seed and saute lightly.
Add all remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook over medium-low heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Sometimes I cook this in my crock-pot.
After sauteing the vegetables and sesame seed I just transfer to the crock-pot, add everything else and cook at low for 3 to 4 hours.
Make sure you rinse the kidney beans before adding to the vegetables.
I also add extra beans to stretch, if needed.

question: What’s a good recipe for a meatless chili?
answer:
Title: Chili
Ingredients:
3 lb. lean beef
1 qt. water
3 tsp. salt
5 cloves garlic, chopped
1 tsp. marjoram
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/4 c. liquid shortening
8 chili pods or 6 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. red pepper
3 Tbsp. paprika
6 Tbsp. corn meal
3 Tbsp. flour and 1 c. water (for thickening)
Directions:
Heat oil in large pot.
Add meat; cook until almost brown. Add water.
Cook, covered, over low heat for 1 1/2 to 2 hours. Add remaining ingredients, except thickening; simmer for 30 minutes.
Mix thickening ingredients; add to chili mixture.
Cook 5 minutes while stirring.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. shortening
1 Tbsp. salt
4 eggs, beaten
3 1/2 Tbsp. yeast, dissolved in 1 3/4 c. warm water
butter, softened
cinnamon sugar
1/3 c. sugar
1 3/4 c. boiling water
9 c. flour
Directions:
Combine shortening, sugar, salt and boiling water.
Beat eggs and add to first mixture.
Dissolve yeast in warm water and add. Add flour and mix well.
Place in refrigerator to chill.
Remove dough from refrigerator and roll to 1/4-inch thickness.
Spread with butter and then with cinnamon sugar.
Roll into a long roll; cut into rolls 1-inch thick.
Put in buttered pan and mash down lightly.
Put back in refrigerator until needed.
Turn oven and set temperature to 400°.
Put rolls into cold oven and bake until done.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1 pkg. dry yeast
1/4 c. sugar
3 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 c. oil
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. melted butter
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Scald milk.
Cool to lukewarm in bowl.
Add yeast, sugar and 1 1/2 cups flour; mix well.
Let stand until bubbly.
Stir in salt, eggs, oil and remaining 1 1/2 cups flour to form soft dough. Knead on floured surface until smooth and elastic.
Place in greased bowl, turning to coat surface.
Let rise, covered, in warm place until doubled in bulk.
Roll 1/4-inch thick on floured surface.
Spread with 3 tablespoons softened butter.
Sprinkle with mixture of cinnamon and 1/2 cup brown sugar.
Roll as for jelly roll.
Slice 1 1/2 inches thick; place in greased baking dish.
Combine 1 tablespoon butter, 1/4 cup brown sugar and water in bowl.
Drizzle over rolls.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes or until golden brown.
Yield:
12 servings.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls "Ready In The Morning"
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 c. margarine
1 c. sugar
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 eggs, well beaten
8 to 10 c. flour
Directions:
At 4 p.m., boil first 4 ingredients together.
Set in sink in water to cool.
In a big bowl, dissolve the yeast in water.
Stir in cooled mixture, 2 beaten eggs and enough flour to handle easily.
Put in a greased bowl and let rise.
At 9 to 10 p.m., punch down.
Roll out in rectangle; spread with melted butter and sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon (3 tablespoons cinnamon, 1 cup sugar and 1 cup brown sugar).
Roll up and cut.
Makes about 40 if cut about 1-inch.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
2 pkg. dry yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 c. warm water
1 c. shortening
1/2 c. sugar
2 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. warm water
6 c. flour
butter
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Dissolve the yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar in 1 cup warm water. Add the shortening, sugar, salt, beaten eggs and 1 cup warm water. Add 3 cups of flour at first; beat with wire whisk, then add remaining flour, 1 cup at a time, stirring in with wooden spoon. Cover bowl; let rise 1 hour.
Flour board and roll out 1/2 of dough to 1/4-inch thickness.
Spread with butter, 1 teaspoon cinnamon and 1/2 cup brown sugar.
You can add more sugar so it makes its own glaze.
Roll up and cut into 1-inch slices to place in greased pan.
Let rise 2 hours.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
2 c. scalded milk
1/2 c. shortening
1 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar
1 c. mashed potatoes
2 beaten eggs
1/4 c. lukewarm water
2 yeast cakes
7 c. flour
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Add scalded milk while hot to shortening, then add salt, sugar, potatoes and beaten eggs.
Mix together in electric mixer or by hand.
Add yeast cakes to water and dissolve and add to first mixture.
Add 3 cups of flour, sifted and beat.
Gradually add rest of flour.
If electric mixer wil not take all flour, add by hand, beating well.
Do not knead.
Add 1 cup raisins and 1 cup chopped nuts.
Mix in and place dough in large container in the bottom of refrigerator.
Let rise 2 to 4 hours.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Cauliflower Salad
Ingredients:
1 medium bunch fresh broccoli (flowerets)
1 medium head cauliflower (flowerets), sliced
1/2 c. purple onion, chopped
8 slices bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled
Directions:
Mix together in a bowl.
Add dressing.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower-Broccoli Salad
Ingredients:
1 bunch broccoli
1 head cauliflower
2 bunches green onions
2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. sour cream
3 tsp. garlic powder
salt and pepper
1 c. frozen peas
Directions:
Chop broccoli and cauliflower; add chopped onions.
Mix mayonnaise, sour cream, garlic powder and salt and pepper.
Mix with vegetables and add peas.
Serve cold.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower And Broccoli Salad
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
1 bunch fresh broccoli
red or green onion
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled
Directions:
