Cut vegetables in small pieces. Mix rest of ingredients together.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower-Broccoli Salad
Ingredients:
1 small head cauliflower, chopped into small pieces
1 or 2 bunches broccoli, chopped (use juste the "beads", not the stalk)
1 small onion, chopped fine
1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, rinsed and sliced thin
1 c. cherry tomatoes, quartered
1 c. mayonnaise
1 c. Green Goddess dressing
1/2 c. Hormel real bacon bits or pieces
2 Tbsp. apple cider vinegar
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Place all vegetables in a large bowl.
Combine rest of ingredients and stir until well blended.
Pour over vegetables, toss and refrigerate until ready to serve.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Cauliflower Salad
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower, chopped
1 bunch broccoli, chopped
1 lb. crisp bacon bits
2 bell peppers, chopped
1 onion, chopped
3 tomatoes, chopped
Ranch dressing
Directions:
Pour Ranch dressing over chopped vegetables and bacon bits; mix well.
Chill before you serve.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Different Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or margarine, softened
3/4 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/4 c. flour
1 c. whole wheat flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips
1/2 c. salted sunflower kernels
1/4 c. sesame seed
Directions:
Cream butter.
Add sugar, beating until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla.
Beat well.
Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt.
Add to creamed mixture.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Dr. Cookie'S Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. margarine
2/3 c. packed brown sugar
2/3 c. granulated sugar
2 large eggs
1/4 c. nonfat milk
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 1/4 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
3/4 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
Directions:
Coat 2 baking sheets with nonstick cooking spray.
Beat margarine and sugars with a mixer until smooth.
Add eggs; beat again.
Add milk and vanilla; beat again until smooth.
Add flour, baking soda and salt; beat until well mixed.
Add chocolate chips and stir.
Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls, 2 inches apart. Flatten with back of a spoon.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes, until light brown.
Cool on wire rack.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. (1 stick) oleo
1 c. shortening
1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. firmly packed brown sugar
1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. white sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3/4 tsp. water
3 eggs (one at a time)
3 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips
Directions:
Beat first 6 ingredients until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time. Beat well.
Combine dry ingredients and blend into butter mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop from teaspoon on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 375° for 10 minutes, or until golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or margarine
1 c. light brown sugar
2 eggs (1 at a time)
1 c. granulated sugar
1 tsp. vanilla extract
2 c. flour (plain)
2-1/2 c. oatmeal
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. baking powder
4 oz. grated milk chocolate
1/2 c. chopped pecans
12 oz. chocolate chips (milk chocolate or semisweet)
Directions:
Cream butter and sugars until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla; mix well.
Add flour, oatmeal, salt, baking soda and baking powder slowly to mixture.
May need to use a heavy mixer or a wooden spoon.
Add grated milk chocolate, pecans and chocolate chips.
Roll into small balls and place onto cookie sheet.
Bake 375 degrees for 6 minutes.
DO NOT OVER COOK OR THEY WILL BE HARD. BAKE ONLY 6 MINUTES AND THEY WILL BE VERY MOIST AND CHEWY.
THEY WILL NOT LOOK DONE WHEN YOU TAKE THEM OUT.
Makes 55 to 150 cookies, depending on size.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate chip cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies At Their Best
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or margarine, softened
1/2 c. solid vegetable shortening
1 1/3 c. granulated sugar
1 c. firmly packed brown sugar
4 eggs
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 tsp. lemon juice
3 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground cinnamon (optional)
1/2 c. rolled oats
2 large (12 oz. each) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate chips
2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl of an electric mixer, beat butter, shortening, granulated sugar and brown sugar on high speed until very light and fluffy (about 5 minutes).
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Beat in vanilla and lemon juice.
In another bowl, stir together flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and oats.
Gradually add to butter mixture, blending thoroughly.
Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts.
Use a scant 1/4 cup of dough for each cookie.
Drop dough onto lightly greased baking sheets, spacing cookies about 3 inches apart.
For soft cookies, bake in 325° oven for 17 to 19 minutes or until light golden brown.
For crisp cookies, bake in 350° oven for 16 to 18 minutes or until golden brown.
Transfer to racks and let cool.
Store airtight. Makes about 3 dozen.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal-Peanut Butter Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. shortening or margarine
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 c. sugar
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
1/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. applesauce
1 c. raisins
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. cloves or nutmeg
1/2 c. nuts (if desired)
2 c. flour
Directions:
Cream butter and sugar; add eggs, milk and vanilla.
Add applesauce; add sifted ingredients, oats and raisins.
Bake 15 minutes at 350°.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Oaties
Ingredients:
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter
1/2 c. creamy or chunky peanut butter
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 c. granulated sugar
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/4 c. quick or old-fashioned uncooked rolled oats
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. chocolate chips
1 c. coconut or nuts (optional)
Directions:
Cream together butter, peanut butter and sugars.
Blend in egg and vanilla.
In another bowl, combine oats, flour and soda. Blend into creamed mixture thoroughly.
Stir in chocolate chips, nuts or coconut.
Shape into 1-inch balls.
Place on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 11 minutes or just until edges are golden brown.
Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet, then remove to cooling rack.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal-Peanut Butter Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. shortening
1 c. peanut butter
3 eggs
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. quick oats
1 c. chocolate morsels or raisins
Directions:
Cream sugars and shortening; add eggs and peanut butter.
Beat well.
Gradually add flour, salt and soda.
Add vanilla.
Stir in quick oats and chocolate morsels or raisins.
Drop by heaping teaspoons onto cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. softened margarine
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
1/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 1/2 c. quick cooking oats
1 c. raisins
Directions:
Cream together the oleo, peanut butter and sugars until smooth and creamy. Add eggs, milk and vanilla.
Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt and cinnamon. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend in oats and raisins.
Drop batter about 2-inches apart onto greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes until browned.

question: What can I make with peanut butter and oats?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Peanut Butter Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
3 eggs
1/2 c. peanut butter
3 1/2 c. regular oats (uncooked)
1 c. all-purpose flour
3/4 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 c. raisins
1/2 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Cream butter; gradually add sugar, beating well.
Add eggs and peanut butter and beat well.
Combine oats, flour, soda, salt and cinnamon; add to creamed mixture, beating well.
Stir in raisins and pecans.
Drop dough by teaspoonfuls onto lightly greased cookie sheets.
Bake at 350° for 10 to 11 minutes.
Cool slightly on cookie sheets; remove to wire racks.
Yield: 9 dozen.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Fresh Fruit Crumble
Ingredients:
6 c. fresh pears, pared, cored and sliced
1/3 c. Mrs. Butterworth's syrup
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 c. uncooked oatmeal
1/2 c. margarine or 1/2 c. plain yogurt
1 tsp. lemon peel
3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine pear slices, syrup, lemon juice and peel and cinnamon.
Mix well.
Put in 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Stir together flour, oatmeal and nutmeg.
With a pastry cutter, cut in margarine until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Sprinkle over pears.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes or until pears are tender.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Fruit Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1 c. quick rolled oats
1 1/2 sticks melted margarine
1 can pie filling
1/2 tsp. soda
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except fruit.
Spread half of mixture in bottom of 8 x 8-inch pan.
Cover with fruit and top with remaining mixture.
Bake at 350°
for 40 minutes.
Can be served with ice cream or whipped cream.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Twenty-Four Hour Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. halved green grapes
2 c. halved dark grapes
2 c. diced pineapple
2 c. orange sections
1 1/2 c. maraschino cherries, cut in half
2 sliced bananas
2 c. miniature marshmallows
1 1/2 c. broken pecans
2 eggs, slightly beaten
4 Tbsp. sugar
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cook in a double boiler.
When cool, add 1 cup whipping cream, whipped until soft peaks form.
Add to cooled custard.
Gently fold into fruit mixture.
Cover and chill 24 hours or overnight.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Crumble
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. plain flour
1/3 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. soft margarine
1 c. chopped pecans
2 egg whites
10 oz. strawberries (I use more)
1 c. sugar
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 (10 oz.) Cool Whip
Directions:
Beat egg whites stiff, adding sugar and lemon juice.
Add this to whipped topping.
Add strawberries last.

question: How do I make a quick fruit crumble?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Cranberry-Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
4 c. unpeeled, chopped cooking apples
2 c. cranberries
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
3 single serving envelopes instant oatmeal with spice
3/4 c. chopped pecans
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1/2 c. margarine, melted
Directions:
In a 12 x 7 1/2 x 2-inch baking dish, combine apples and cranberries.
Mix sugar and 2 tablespoons flour; toss with fruit. In a bowl, combine oatmeal, pecans, 1/2 cup flour and sugar.
Stir in margarine.
Spoon over fruit.
Bake at 350° in oven for 45 minutes.
Garnish with cranberries and pecans.
Serve at breakfast topped with cream or over vanilla ice cream.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
3 c. sliced onions
2 c. diced green peppers
2/3 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
3 qt. tomatoes, minced
1 tsp. rosemary
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. basil
2 tsp. salt (optional)
Directions:
Note:
These ingredients may be minced in blender.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 garlic cloves (or instant)
2 c. finely chopped onions (or instant)
3 1/2 c. Italian plum tomatoes (1 lb. 12 oz. can)
2 c. tomato puree (one 15 oz. can)
1 1/2 c. tomato paste (one 12 oz. can)
1/2 c. water or meat stock or wine
1 tsp. each: dried basil and oregano
1/2 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. salt
freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the garlic and onions.
Cook, stirring until the onions are light brown.
Add the tomatoes, tomato puree, tomato paste, water and seasonings. Simmer for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Leftover sauce may be frozen.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 to 3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 white onion, chopped
1 medium bell pepper, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1 lb. mushrooms, chopped
1 medium zucchini, diced
2 to 3 tomatoes, chopped
2 tsp. basil
1 handful fresh basil leaves, chopped
1 (13 oz.) can tomatoes
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. honey
3 tsp. black pepper
4 to 5 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. fresh minced parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil in Dutch oven.
Add onion, bell pepper, celery, mushrooms, zucchini, fresh tomatoes, herbs and salt.
Saute over medium heat until onion is soft; add can of tomatoes, tomato paste, honey and black pepper.
Bring to a boil, then simmer partially covered for about 30 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 10 minutes. Add parsley last.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 c. coarsely chopped onions
1/2 c. sliced carrot
2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
4 c. Italian tomatoes (plum Roma)
salt and pepper to taste
4 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. dried oregano
1 Tbsp. fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
Directions:
Tips:
Use more carrots (makes sweeter) or garlic or oregano if you like more herbs; whatever you desire, it's always good.

question: How do I make a simple homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 cans diced tomatoes (no salt added)
1 can tomato sauce (no salt added)
1 c. sliced mushrooms
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 large onion, chopped
3/4 tsp. oregano
3/4 tsp. basil
pepper to taste
Directions:
Spray nonstick skillet with Pam.
Combine all ingredients listed in the skillet.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve over linguini, angel hair pasta or any cooked pasta.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mushroom Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3/4 c. chopped onion
2 cloves crushed garlic
1 1/3 c. (12 oz.) tomato paste
2 1/2 c. water
2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 1/4 tsp. dried oregano
1 1/4 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt or to taste
1/8 tsp. ground black pepper
Directions:
In 2-quart saucepan, heat oil; saute onion and garlic until tender.
Stir in tomato paste, water, mushrooms, oregano, basil, sugar, salt and pepper.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat; simmer gently, uncovered, for 30 minutes or longer, stirring occasionally.
Serve over hot pasta.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium can mushrooms
4 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. rich milk
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter.
Add flour slowly and brown slightly.
Add milk and cook until it thickens.
Pour over steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms
2/3 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
In a small saucepan, cook onion in butter until tender, but not browned.
Stir in flour.
Drain mushrooms.
Stir in mushrooms, milk, salt and pepper.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir 1 to 2 minutes more.
Stir in sour cream; heat through.
Serve with poultry, beef, pork or burgers.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom sauce for pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 Egg Beater, beaten
1 (8 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (1 c.)
Directions:
Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.
Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in a small saucepan.
Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beater.
Toss with fettuccine until well coated.
Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
20 large shrimp, cleaned and shelled
1 tsp. fresh rosemary, chopped
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
1 tsp. fresh basil, chopped
2 Tbsp. fresh parsley
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/3 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Melt butter in a skillet.
Add olive oil.
Saute onion and garlic in same skillet.
Add rosemary, basil, black pepper and shrimp.
Cook until shrimp loses transparency (do not overcook). Add salt to taste.
Add wine and cook until oil and wine become slightly thickened.
Sprinkle parsley over.
Serve with fresh Parmesan cheese and lemon wedge to garnish.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 bay leaves
1/2 tsp. crushed oregano
salt and pepper
lemon juice
1 lb. medium to large shrimp in shell
Directions:
Melt butter
in skillet with lid.
Add remaining ingredients, including shrimp in shells.
Toss well.
Set aside for 30 minutes. Stir occasionally.
Place over medium heat.
Stir and cover. Cook
for
5
minutes.
Shrimp
should
turn pink. Serve immediately over rice.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
3 cloves fresh garlic, crushed
8 oz. whole mushrooms, stems removed
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
12 oz. fresh shrimp, shelled and deveined
1 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with just enough water to dissolve
Directions:
Melt butter in large skillet.
Add crushed garlic and whole mushrooms.
Gently mix in lemon juice and shrimp.
(Add more butter, if needed, at this time.)
Saute 1 minute on each side, or until pink.
Add wine; increase heat and bring to a boil.
Remove from heat and add cornstarch mixture.
Return to flame until sauce is thickened.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Skillet
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. hot water
1 c. cooked shrimp
1 c. French-style green beans
1/2 c. celery
dash of pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 1/3 c. Minute rice
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Add rice to butter, onion, celery in skillet and saute until rice is golden brown.
Add remaining ingredients.
Bring to a boil and then simmer uncovered 5 minutes.

question: How do I make garlic shrimp in a skillet?
answer:
Title: Simply Elegant Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. unsalted butter
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large, chopped onion
2 cloves minced garlic
3 lb. peeled and cleaned shrimp
3/4 c. chicken or seafood broth
3/4 c. Italian salad dressing
1/2 tsp. basil, oregano and salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 c. chopped, fresh parsley
2 to 3 c. cooked rice or fettucine
Directions:
Heat butter and oil in a large skillet.
Add onion and garlic; saute until transparent.
Stir in broth, salad dressing, herbs, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil; add shrimp and cook until pink. Stir in fresh parsley.
Serve with rice or fettucine.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 garlic cloves (or instant)
2 c. finely chopped onions (or instant)
3 1/2 c. Italian plum tomatoes (1 lb. 12 oz. can)
2 c. tomato puree (one 15 oz. can)
1 1/2 c. tomato paste (one 12 oz. can)
1/2 c. water or meat stock or wine
1 tsp. each: dried basil and oregano
1/2 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. salt
freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Heat the oil in a large saucepan and add the garlic and onions.
Cook, stirring until the onions are light brown.
Add the tomatoes, tomato puree, tomato paste, water and seasonings. Simmer for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Leftover sauce may be frozen.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 to 3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 white onion, chopped
1 medium bell pepper, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1 lb. mushrooms, chopped
1 medium zucchini, diced
2 to 3 tomatoes, chopped
2 tsp. basil
1 handful fresh basil leaves, chopped
1 (13 oz.) can tomatoes
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. salt
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. honey
3 tsp. black pepper
4 to 5 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. fresh minced parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil in Dutch oven.
Add onion, bell pepper, celery, mushrooms, zucchini, fresh tomatoes, herbs and salt.
Saute over medium heat until onion is soft; add can of tomatoes, tomato paste, honey and black pepper.
Bring to a boil, then simmer partially covered for about 30 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 10 minutes. Add parsley last.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Basic Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, chopped fine
4 Tbsp. dried parsley
1 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes, chopped (reserve liquid)
Directions:
Heat oil in heavy skillet.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until tender.
Add tomatoes and liquid, spices and sugar.
Cover and simmer over medium heat 20 minutes to blend flavors.
Cool and divide into 3 half-pint freezer containers.
Freeze and use to make Mediterranean Stuffed Potatoes, Southwest Turkey Pie or marinara makes an excellent base for spaghetti sauce.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: A Wonderful Marinating Sauce
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. water
1 Tbsp. sugar (white or brown)
2 1/2 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. cider vinegar
2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 small onion, minced really fine
1 tsp. powdered mustard
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 clove garlic, minced really fine
1/2 tsp. red pepper (I use less)
2 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
Simmer all this for several minutes.
Then store in refrigerator.
Meat marinated in this doesn't burn easily as it does hot have tomato sauce in it.
Very good for any kind of meat. I soak my meat about 1 hour before cooking.

question: How can I make a homemade marinara sauce?
answer:
Title: Marinara Sauce
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, peeled and sliced
3 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 can (28 oz.) whole tomatoes
1 bay leaf
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In large saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and saute for 2 to 3 minutes.
Add parsley and onion.
Slowly add tomatoes.
Stir to break up tomatoes.
Add bay leaf, salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Cover and simmer on low about 15 minutes.
Serve over pasta dishes or with rice.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pork Chops
Ingredients:
4 lean pork chops (about 1-inch thick)
1 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
2/3 c. dry sherry
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
1 clove garlic, minced
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except pork chops.
Mix well.
Place chops in shallow dish.
Pour marinade over chops.
Cover and refrigerate overnight, turning meat occasionally.
Remove pork chops from marinade and place on rack of broiling pan.
Broil 10 to 12 minutes on each side or until done, turning and basting once with marinade.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops With Herbs
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
2 onions, sliced
1 can cream of celery soup
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried oregano
snipped parsley
Directions:
Brown chops in heavy skillet.
In same skillet, saute onions until golden.
Combine soup, milk, thyme, poultry seasoning, oregano, water and salt.
Remove chops and onions to baking dish. Cover with remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 1/2 hours in covered pan at 350°.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Herbed Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
2/3 c. dry sherry
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
4 (1-inch thick) center cut pork chops
Directions:
Combine the first 3 ingredients; set aside.
Arrange pork chops on an 8-inch square dish.
Pour marinade over pork chops; cover and refrigerate 8 hours, turning meat occasionally.
Drain meat, discarding marinade.
Place chops on a lightly greased rack in broiler pan.
Broil 6 inches from heat with oven door partially open for 12 minutes.
Turn chops and broil 10 more minutes or until done.
Yields 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops With Herb Dumplings
Ingredients:
pork chops
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can mushrooms (undrained)
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. sage leaves
1 medium onion, sliced
1 1/2 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
3/4 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. sage leaves
1/2 tsp. celery seed
3 Tbsp. shortening
3/4 c. milk
1 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Cook pork chops until brown on both sides.
Mix soup, mushrooms, water and sage.
Layer onion on chops.
Pour soup mixture over top.
Heat until boiling; reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 1 hour.

question: What’s a recipe for grilled pork chops with herbs?
answer:
Title: Grilling Herb Mix
Ingredients:
1 part each: ground dried rosemary, basil and oregano
1/2 part each: ground dried sage, peppermint and thyme
1/2 part black pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well.
Pour into a jar; seal tightly. Store in a cool, dry place.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Corn-On-The-Cob
Ingredients:
4 ears cooked corn
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Place vinegar and sugar in pan of cold water (enough to cover corn).
Bring to boil.
Add sweet corn.
Simmer until heated through.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Fried Corn-On-The-Cob
Ingredients:
8 to 10 ears corn
Directions:
Ears of corn have been cleaned and silked.
Break ears into two pieces.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Creamed Corn
Ingredients:
6 medium ears fresh corn
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. water
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. water
2 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Remove husks and silks from corn.
Rinse corn and pat dry.
Cut corn from cobs (about 3 cups); to cut corn from cob:
with very sharp knife, first cut, just barely take the top of the kernels, second cut, take about half-way of kernels and third cut, use blade of knife and scrape down to cob.
This gets the milk out of corn. Place butter in 2-quart casserole; microwave at High for 55 seconds, until butter melts.
Add corn, 1/4 cup water and sugar, stirring well.
Cover with heavy-duty plastic wrap.
Cook on High 8 to 9 minutes or until corn is tender, stirring after 4 minutes. Shake 1/2 cup water, salt, pepper and flour in pan until flour is blended smooth.
Stir into corn, mixing well.
Cook on High 3 minutes or until mixture slightly thickens.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Corn To Can
Ingredients:
9 heaping c. corn
1 c. water
2/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut raw corn off of cob and measure.
Add water, sugar and salt.
Stir well.
Cook for 5 minutes.
Cool.
Put into freezer containers and freeze.

question: What’s a good recipe for corn on the cob?
answer:
Title: Fantastic Corn On The Cob
Ingredients:
6 ears frozen or fresh sweet corn
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1/2 tsp. oregano
salt to taste
pepper to taste
1/4 c. butter
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Boil corn for 15 minutes.
Remove from water and place in rectangular dish.
Sprinkle with spices and add butter.
Sprinkle corn with Parmesan cheese.
Cover dish with foil and place in warm oven until ready to serve.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
12 oz. shrimp, peeled and deveined *
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Thaw shrimp, if frozen.
In a large skillet, heat margarine over medium high heat.
Add shrimp and garlic.
Cook, stirring frequently for 1 to 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
Stir in parsley and sherry.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 bay leaves
1/2 tsp. crushed oregano
salt and pepper
lemon juice
1 lb. medium to large shrimp in shell
Directions:
Melt butter
in skillet with lid.
Add remaining ingredients, including shrimp in shells.
Toss well.
Set aside for 30 minutes. Stir occasionally.
Place over medium heat.
Stir and cover. Cook
for
5
minutes.
Shrimp
should
turn pink. Serve immediately over rice.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
3 cloves fresh garlic, crushed
8 oz. whole mushrooms, stems removed
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
12 oz. fresh shrimp, shelled and deveined
1 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with just enough water to dissolve
Directions:
Melt butter in large skillet.
Add crushed garlic and whole mushrooms.
Gently mix in lemon juice and shrimp.
(Add more butter, if needed, at this time.)
Saute 1 minute on each side, or until pink.
Add wine; increase heat and bring to a boil.
Remove from heat and add cornstarch mixture.
Return to flame until sauce is thickened.
Serve over rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
1/4 c. creamy peanut butter
2 Tbsp. hot water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. pasta
Directions:
In medium bowl with wire whisk or fork, beat peanut butter with water until smooth.
Stir in vinegar and next 4 ingredients until blended.
Add cooked and drained pasta; toss gently to coat well. Serve immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
8 oz. thin spaghetti
4 Tbsp. toasted sesame oil
6 green onions, finely chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. dried hot pepper flakes
1 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 c. finely chopped salted dry peanuts
1/3 c. chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Drain.
Rinse in cold water and toss with 2 tablespoons sesame oil.
Set aside.
Place remaining sesame oil in large heated frying pan.
Add green onions, garlic and pepper flakes.
Stir over medium heat until onions have softened, 2 minutes.
Add spaghetti, vinegar, sugar and soy sauce.
Heat mixture, tossing to combine for 3 or 4 minutes.
Stir in peanuts and cilantro.
Add salt to taste. Transfer to serving bowl.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut-Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. linguine or thin spaghetti
3 garlic cloves
1 1/2 tsp. minced peeled ginger root
7 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
6 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/4 c. rice wine vinegar
1/4 c. honey
1 tsp. dark sesame oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 c. broccoli florets, blanched until tender-crisp
1 c. sliced Napa cabbage
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions until al dente; rinse in cold water and drain well.
In food processor or blender, combine garlic, ginger, soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, honey, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce; process until blended.
Add water to reach desired consistency (1/2 to 3/4 cup), processing until smooth.
To serve, toss cooked linguine with vegetables and sauce. Yield:
6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Noodles In White Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 pkg. egg noodles
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. parsley
Directions:
Cook noodles per package directions.
Drain and set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Noodles And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
2 c. noodles
1 can stewed tomatoes
Directions:
Boil noodles until done.
Drain water and add tomatoes.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 large potatoes
milk
butter
salt (optional)
pepper (optional)
Directions:
Peel and cut potatoes into small, bite size pieces.
Place in pot; cover with water.
Boil at medium temperature until potatoes are tender.
Drain water.
Add 2 or 3 tablespoons of butter and a little milk.
Also add salt to taste and a dash of pepper.
With mixer, mix until creamy.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes For 50
Ingredients:
15 lb. potatoes
1 1/2 qt. scalded milk
1/4 c. salt
1 c. melted butter
pepper to taste
Directions:
Pare potatoes.
Wash and boil until tender.
Mash until smooth, using electric mixer.
Add the other ingredients.
Beat until light and fluffy.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Kathleen'S Favorite Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. red potatoes
canned milk
mayonnaise
salt to taste
pepper to taste
1/2 stick butter
Directions:
Peel and cube potatoes.
Boil in lightly salted water just until tender.
Do not overcook.
Turn off stove.
Drain potatoes and immediately return them to the hot pot.
Set on hot stove eye that is turned off.
Pour in amount of canned milk needed for beating.
Do not disturb potatoes.
Add 1 large spoonful of mayonnaise and the butter to the undisturbed potatoes.
Let set until milk becomes lukewarm (this is important).
When milk is warm, mash potatoes slightly; add salt and pepper to taste.
Beat with an electric mixer until smooth.

question: How do I make fluffy mashed potatoes without cream?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 large, hot, boiled potatoes
1/2 c. heated milk
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. salt
pepper
Directions:
Warm bowl and flat beater with hot water and dry.
Place potatoes in bowl and break apart with fork.
Attach bowl and flat beater.
Gradually turn to speed 4 and beat 1 minute, until smooth.
Add milk, butter, salt and pepper on speed 4.
Beat until milk is absorbed.
Increase to speed 6 until fluffy, about 1 minute.
Exchange flat beater to wire whip on speed 10 for 2 to 3 minutes.
Yields 3 cups of potatoes.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread(2 Loaves)
Ingredients:
2/3 c. margarine
2 2/3 c. sugar
4 eggs
1 3/4 to 2 c. mashed bananas
2/3 c. nuts
2/3 c. raisins
3 1/3 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Cream together first 3 ingredients.
Set aside.
Sift together flour, salt, soda, baking powder, cinnamon, cloves, ginger and nutmeg.
Add to creamed mixture and add remaining ingredients. Mix well; pour batter into greased and floured loaf pans.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour to 70 minutes.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. shortening
2 eggs, well beaten
3 bananas, mashed
8 Tbsp. cold water
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
2 c. flour
3/4 c. nuts
Directions:
Following is both basic dough and feeding.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
2/3 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
4 mashed bananas (medium)
1/3 c. margarine or butter
2 Tbsp. milk
2 eggs
1/2 c. nuts
1/2 c. raisins
1/4 tsp. vanilla
peel of 1 orange, grated
1/2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine 1 cup of the flour, the sugar, baking powder, soda and salt.
Add mashed bananas, butter or margarine and milk.
Beat until blended, then on high for 2 minutes.
Add eggs, remaining flour, vanilla, orange peel and lemon juice and blend.
Stir in raisins and nuts.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. wheat germ
3 medium ripe bananas, mashed (1 c.)
1/4 c. buttermilk
1/4 c. oil
4 egg whites
1/2 c. nuts
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Sift together the flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt; mix in wheat germ.
Add remaining ingredients; beat until well blended.
Place in an oiled 8 x 4-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for about 1 hour, or until done.
Yields 1 loaf, 16 slices.
Each slice contains 130 calories.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for banana bread?
answer:
Title: Banana Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. (4 to 6) mashed bananas
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Cream together butter and sugar (well).
Blend in bananas, eggs and vanilla.
Sift together flour, soda and salt.
Add alternately with buttermilk, blending just until well combined. Fold in nuts, if desired.
Pour into 2 greased loaf pans and bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Dessert
Ingredients:
1 large can pumpkin
1 large can evaporated milk
3 eggs
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. cloves
2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Beat all ingredients together and pour into oiled 9 X 13 pan.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Drops
Ingredients:
2 1/2 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. granulated sugar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1 egg
3/4 c. cooked sieved pumpkin or 5 oz. canned
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
3/4 c. whole wheat flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
In mixing bowl, cream shortening with sugars.
Beat in eggs, pumpkin and vanilla.
Sift the flour, baking soda and spices into a bowl; pour any bran remaining in sifter.
Add the flour mixture to the pumpkin batter and stir in raisins.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto lightly greased baking sheets.
Bake in 375° oven 12 to 15 minutes. Cool and serve.
Each of the 36 cookies has 1 gram of fat and 37 calories.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. pumpkin
1 1/4 tsp. cinnamon*
1/4 tsp. nutmeg*
1/2 tsp. ginger*
1/4 tsp. ground cloves*
3 eggs, beaten
1 c. sugar
1 (6 oz.) can evaporated milk
Directions:
*May use 2 1/4 teaspoons pumpkin pie spice instead of these spices.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin And Spice Roll
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 c. sugar
2/3 c. canned pumpkin
1 tsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. sifted flour
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. finely chopped nuts
1/2 c. powdered sugar
Directions:
For Cake:
In a large bowl, beat eggs for 5 minutes at high speed.
Gradually add sugar, mixing well.
Stir in pumpkin and lemon juice.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, cinnamon, baking soda, ginger, nutmeg and salt.
Fold into the pumpkin mixture.

question: How do I make an easy pumpkin pie?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
2/3 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. molasses
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 to 1 tsp. ground cloves
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In
mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add the pumpkin, orange juice, molasses and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients. Add to the creamed mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into two greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3 loaf pans. Bake at 350° for 65 to 75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pans onto wire racks.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Quick And Easy Chicken Wraps
Ingredients:
1 c. nonfat plain yogurt
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 c. roughly chopped cilantro
3 c. diced cooked chicken breast
4 large whole wheat tortillas
4 large pre-washed lettuce slices (large enough to cover tortilla surface)
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In medium mixing bowl, combine yogurt, garlic and herb. Stir until blended. Salt and pepper to taste. Add chicken breast and stir until well coated. Place lettuce slices and 1/4 of chicken mixture on a whole wheat tortilla and wrap up. Serves 4.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Asian Chicken Wrap
Ingredients:
6 (8-inch) flour tortillas
1 large carrot, peeled and sliced into strips
1 medium yellow squash, sliced into strips
6 scallions, thinly sliced
2 whole roasted red peppers, thinly sliced
8 oz. cooked shredded chicken
3 Tbsp. orange marmalade
1 Tbsp. low-sodium soy sauce
1 tsp. ground ginger
1 1/2 tsp. olive oil
Directions:
Place flour tortillas on work surface.
Divide and layer sliced carrot, squash, scallions, red peppers and chicken in the center of each tortilla.
Roll up tortilla, enclosing filling. Slice in half.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Wrap-Ups
Ingredients:
chicken breast (boneless and skinned; 1 per person)
bacon (two slices per chicken breast)
salt
pepper
soy sauce
lemon juice
parsley
Directions:
Wrap each chicken breast with 2 pieces bacon.
Crisscross slices of bacon and secure with toothpick.
Place in rectangular baking pan.
Season with salt and pepper, lots of soy sauce and lemon juice.
Sprinkle chopped parsley over top.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Roll
Ingredients:
12 oz. cooked chicken breast (4) chopped very fine
1/2 c. chopped candied ginger, crushed
1/2 c. ground almonds
2 fresh shallots, minced
2 tsp. curry powder
salt and pepper
2 tsp. lemon juice
4 Tbsp. softened butter
1-8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Combine ginger, almonds, shallots, curry powder, salt and pepper, lemon juice, softened butter, cream cheese, and chicken. Toast in heavy skillet over medium heat 3/4 c. sesame seed, 1 tbsp. sugar.
Cool.
Shape chicken mix into 4 rolls.
Cut wax paper, spread 2 tbsp. seed on paper and roll the rolls in it.
Bring to room temperature to serve with sesame crackers.

question: I need a recipe for a healthy chicken wrap.
answer:
Title: Chicken Wrap
Ingredients:
8 to 12 boneless chicken breasts
8 to 12 slices bacon
1 can dried beef
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 large container sour cream
Directions:
Wash chicken thoroughly.
Rinse dried beef under running water.
Wrap dried beef around one piece of chicken.
Secure in place with a slice of bacon.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onions with tops
3 garlic cloves, minced
1 loaf French bread (20-inch), halved lengthwise
1/3 c. minced, fresh parsley (optional)
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic; spread on bread halves.
If desired, spread with parsley.
Wrap each half in foil. Refrigerate 1 to 2 hours or freeze.
Unwrap and place on baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes (20 to 25 minutes if frozen) or until puffed but not brown.
Cut into slices.
Serves 12 to 15.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf crusty French or Italian bread
1 stick butter
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. basil
4 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese, shredded (Sargento)
Directions:
Slice bread diagonally but leave bottom crust unsliced. Soften butter.
Add garlic, herbs and cheese to butter and mix well.
Gently pull slices of bread open and spread with butter. Take care not to break bottom crust.
Spread any leftover butter on top of loaf.
Carefully place buttered
loaf on foil and wrap ends, leaving top of loaf exposed.
Bake at 350°
until crusty. Great with spaghetti!

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. thinly sliced green onion, with tops
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 loaf French bread (about 20 inches), halved lengthwise
fresh parsley (optional)
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise, cheese, onions and garlic.
Spread on bread halves.
If desired, sprinkle with parsley and paprika.
Wrap each half in foil.
Refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours, or freeze.
Unwrap and place on a baking sheet.
Bake at 400° for 8 to 10 minutes (20 to 25 minutes, if frozen).
Cut into slices.
Yield: 12 to 15 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 medium loaf French bread (unsliced)
1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 cloves garlic, halved
1 tsp. dried parsley
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Cut slices down the length of bread at 1-inch intervals, without cutting all the way through. Rub slices and top of loaf with cut sides of garlic halves. Then mince garlic. Combine butter, garlic, parsley and Parmesan cheese in small bowl. Spread mixture between bread slices and on top of the loaf. Wrap bread in foil, leaving top partially uncovered. Bake until heated through, about 15 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy garlic bread?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
French bread (long loaf, unsliced)
Parmesan cheese
butter or margarine
garlic powder
oregano
Directions:
Slice loaf lengthwise.
Spread butter evenly over each half. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese, garlic and oregano to taste.
Broil until bread is golden brown and topping is melted.
Slice into small sections.
Serve immediately.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 sweet potatoes
1 small flat can pineapple slices
1/2 stick butter
1 c. sugar (may use less)
1/2 c. orange juice
1/2 c. apricot nectar
1/2 c. pineapple juice (from can)
spices: cinnamon, allspice, nutmeg (optional)
Directions:
Cook yams until tender.
Do not overcook.
Melt butter in a skillet.
Add sugar and juices.
Cook until syrup is formed.
Dip sweet potatoes (quartered) in syrup, then place in a Pyrex baking dish.
Dip pineapple slices in syrup and place on top of potatoes. Sprinkle with spices, if desired.
Pour rest of syrup over dish. Bake until good and hot.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 c. creamed sweet potatoes
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 stick oleo, melted
1/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
salt
small can coconut
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Spread in buttered casserole dish.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 large can (2 1/2 c.) sweet potatoes, mashed
3/4 c. sugar
1/2 stick oleo, melted
1 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. cinnamon (optional)
1/2 tsp. nutmeg (optional)
Directions:
Mix well with a mixer and put into a greased casserole.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Creamed Sweet Potatoes With Marshmallows
Ingredients:
6 large yellow sweet potatoes
1/4 lb. butter
1 1/4 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. orange flavoring
1 c. whole milk
3 eggs, well beaten
heavy dash of ground ginger
dash of black pepper
pinch of salt
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. raisins
2 tsp. orange flavoring
1 c. whole milk
3 eggs, well beaten
heavy dash of ground ginger
dash of black pepper
pinch of salt
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. raisins
Directions:
Place in a casserole dish and cook until it sets.
Cover with marshmallows and brown lightly.
Add crystallized red cherries between marshmallows.

question: What can I make with sweet potatoes and lentils?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes
1/2 stick margarine
1/2 c. coconut
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 can crushed pineapple
Directions:
Boil potatoes until tender.
Peel and mash.
Add other ingredients and place in baking dish.
Top with marshmallows. Brown at 350°.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Sesame Tofu
Ingredients:
1 lb. firm tofu
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/3 c. sliced green onion
1 Tbsp. sesame seed, toasted
1 tsp. sesame seed oil
1/4 c. almonds, grind
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/4-inch thick or 3/4-inch cubes.
Mix soy sauce, onion, sesame seed, oil and almonds into small bowl.
In a dish, put sliced tofu and mixed sauce on the top of tofu; make layer. Cook in microwave about 4 to 5 minutes.
If you want to bring it to boil, use stainless pot or pan.
Cook about 3 minutes on medium-high temperature.
Serve with rice.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Herb Tofu
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. tofu
4 Tbsp. plain yogurt
3 scallions, cut into 2-inch pieces
1 c. parsley leaves, chopped
1 pt. cherry tomatoes, cut in half and chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 zucchini, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
Directions:
In blender or food processor, place tofu and yogurt.
Add chopped vegetables and salt and pepper to taste.
Place on serving platter with bagels, crackers or pita bread.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Spicy Fried Tofu
Ingredients:
2 lb. tofu
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. each: turmeric, sweet basil, powdered thyme and ground cumin
1/2 to 3/4 tsp. curry
2 cloves garlic, pressed, or 1 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese or nutritional yeast
Directions:
First, press tofu by cutting to 1/2-inch slices and firmly patting out excess water with an absorbent towel.
Cut into small cubes.
Spray Pam on nonstick skillet or wok.
Add tofu; saute on high heat for 5 minutes, turning with spatula.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add turmeric; stir until tofu is yellow all over.
Add the other seasonings, stirring well between each addition. Increase heat.
Add soy sauce, stirring constantly.
Finally, add nutritional yeast or Parmesan cheese; mix well, sauteing until golden brown or until cheese melts.
Good hot or cold.
Serves 4 to 8.

question: What can I make with tofu and peanut sauce?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Tofu And Vegies
Ingredients:
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. water
1/3 can (2/3 c.) pineapple chunks with juice
1/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/2 Tbsp. malt or molasses or 1 tsp. honey
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. ginger
touch of pepper
2 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 large carrot, sliced thinly or chopped small
3/4 lb. tofu, cut into chunks
1 green pepper, chopped
Directions:
Dissolve cornstarch in 2 tablespoons of water; add 1/4 cup pineapple juice, 1/4 cup water, vinegar, honey, soy sauce, ginger, and pepper; set aside.
Heat oil in a wok or large skillet on high heat.
Add onion and stir until strong smell starts to go away. Add carrot and stir a little more.
Add tofu and stir until lightly browned.
Add green pepper and salt.
Stir a minute more, then reduce heat to medium and cook, uncovered.
Colorful, rich and juicy with a Chinese flavor.
A meal in itself with rice or chow mein noodles.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Savory Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. cut-up frying chicken
1 c. all purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. ground sage
1/2 tsp. onion powder
1/2 tsp. crushed thyme
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Rinse chicken and pat dry.
In large bag, combine flour and seasonings.
In shallow bowl, beat eggs and water.
Place chicken a few pieces at a time in bag and shake to coat.
Dip in eggs and shake in bag again.
Fry chicken until done.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Super-Crisp Country Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. Milk
1 Egg
1 c. Flour
2 tsp. Garlic Salt
2 tsp. MSG - monosodium glutamate
1 tsp. Paprika
1 tsp. Black Pepper
1/4 tsp. Poultry Seasoning
1 frying Chicken, cut up (2-1/2 to 3 pounds)
Oil or Shortening for frying
Directions:
Blend Milk and Egg.
Combine Flour and seasonings until well mixed and put into a sealable container.
Place some of the flour mixture on a plate.
Roll the Chicken pieces into the four mixture until evenly coated.
Then roll into egg mixture.
Roll a second time into the flour mixture.
Deep fry in a cooker at 365 for 15 to 18 minutes.
Drain on a paper towel.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
3 whole frying chickens, cut into eighths
2 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground pepper
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 c. milk
2 eggs
2 c. plain bread crumbs
vegetable oil for pan-frying
2 lemons, cut into wedges
Directions:
Rinse the chicken and pat dry.
Place the flour, salt, pepper, cinnamon, nutmeg and garlic powder in a shallow baking dish; stir to distribute all the ingredients evenly.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crispy Oven-Fried Chicken(Makes 4 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic, peeled
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese (about 1 oz.)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. crumbled sage or thyme
1/4 c. milk
2 1/2 c. chicken parts
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Line a baking sheet with foil.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken?
answer:
Title: Crispy Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. cut up frying chicken
seasoned flour
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. garlic salt
1 1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and set aside.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: S O S
Ingredients:
5 lb. ground beef
2 large onions, chopped
1 gal. tomatoes
lots of garlic powder
1/4 c. Texas Pete
2 large bell peppers, diced
1 pkg. celery, diced
1 gal. tomato sauce
1/2 c. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Brown ground beef slowly, breaking up in small pieces. Drain off grease and add all ingredients. Simmer. Season to your taste.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 medium onions, peeled and quartered
2 medium cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 c. hot water
2 Tbsp. minced fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
8 medium new potatoes with skin
2 medium green peppers, cut in eighths
1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes, drained and broken up
Directions:
In Dutch oven, brown beef, breaking up pieces with spoon.
Add onions, garlic, water, basil, salt, pepper and potatoes.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until potatoes are almost tender.
Add peppers and tomatoes.
Simmer 10 minutes or until all is tender.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Vegetable Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef, browned and drained
2 medium onions, peeled and quartered
2 to 3 cloves garlic
1/2 c. water
2 Tbsp. fresh basil or 1 tsp. dried
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
8 medium new potatoes with skin
1 medium green pepper, sliced (optional)
4 carrots, sliced in 1-inch chunks
2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
Directions:
In Dutch oven, brown beef, breaking up pieces with fork or spoon.
Add onions, garlic, water, basil, salt, pepper, potatoes and carrots.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until potatoes and carrots are almost tender.
Add peppers and tomato sauce.
(I sometimes add chunks of zucchini at this time.)
Finish cooking until all vegetables are tender.
Serve with crusty bread or rolls.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef or turkey
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 can tomato soup
3/4 c. water
3 potatoes, sliced
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook meat and onion.
Drain.
Layer 1/2 of the potatoes in a 9 x 13-inch dish, then layer 1/2 of the meat mixture, followed by 1/2 cup of cheese.
Top with remaining potatoes, then rest of meat mixture.

question: What can I make with ground beef and onions?
answer:
Title: Scalloped Ground Beef And Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 large onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
4 large unpeeled potatoes, sliced
1 beef bouillon cube
1 c. boiling water
2 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef with onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper in skillet for 5 to 10 minutes, stirring frequently; drain. Arrange 1/3 of the potato slices in 2-quart baking dish.
Layer ground beef mixture and remaining potato slices 1/2 at a time in dish.
Dissolve bouillon cube in boiling water.
Pour over layers. Dot with margarine.
Bake at 425° for 30 minutes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 15 minutes longer.
Yield:
6 servings.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentil And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
2 large carrots
6 large tomatoes
1 c. split lentils
1 small onion
1 bay leaf
2 cloves
1/2 tsp. sea salt
1/4 c. margarine
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Grate carrots and chop tomatoes; set aside.
Wash lentils, removing any small stones.
In large saucepan, combine with 2 cups of water.
Wrap bay leaf around onion and push cloves through leaf into onion.
Add to pan with carrots and tomatoes.
Bring to a boil, stirring.
Lower heat and cover; simmer about 20 minutes. Remove onion; add salt, margarine and parsley.
Stir well.
Spoon into large ovenproof dish.
Dot top with margarine and bake in 375° oven for about 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked lentils
1/4 c. chopped cooked carrots
1/4 c. green onions
1 Tbsp. butter
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 c. tomato juice
2 c. lentil juice (the water that lentils are cooked in)
1/2 c. parsley, finely chopped
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together; heat to boiling.
Add one tablespoon butter; salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Rice
Ingredients:
1 c. uncooked lentils
4 c. water
1 large onion, chopped
1/4 c. olive or vegetable oil
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. cumin (optional)
1/8 tsp. garlic powder (optional)
salt to taste
1/2 c. uncooked rice
Directions:
Rinse lentils and place in a pan with water.
Boil for 20 minutes on medium fire.
Saute chopped (or julienned) onion in oil until light brown.
Add onion and residue, seasonings and rice to the lentils.
Cover and cook for 20 minutes.
Stir occasionally. Serve on a platter; this thickens as it cools.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Creole Style Lentils
Ingredients:
1/2 c. chopped carrots
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 large onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
few drops hot pepper sauce
1 c. lentils, cooked and drained
hot cooked rice (optional)
Directions:
Cook carrots, celery and onion in hot margarine in medium size saucepan until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, sugar, pepper, pepper sauce and lentils.
Cover; simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.
Makes about 5 1/2 cups.

question: What can I make with lentils and carrots?
answer:
Title: Lentil Skillet Supper
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. oil
1/2 c. thinly sliced carrot
1/2 c. dry lentils, rinsed
1/2 c. sliced green onions
2 1/4 c. chicken broth
1/2 c. regular brown rice
4 oz. (1 c.) shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add carrot, lentil and onion; cook, stirring constantly, for 3 to 4 minutes. Add broth and rice; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover and simmer for 30 to 40 minutes, until liquid is absorbed.
Fluff with fork.
Remove from heat and sprinkle with cheese.
Cover; let stand 1 to 2 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Makes four 1-cup servings.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
4 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 c. shortening
1 tsp. vanilla extract
2 c. sugar
2 egg yolks
1 c. evaporated milk (Carnation)
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 egg whites
Directions:
Sift first 3 ingredients; set aside.
Cream shortening and extract together.
Add sugar; beat until fluffy.
Add egg yolks, beating thoroughly.
Mixing until well blended after each addition, alternately add dry ingredients in fourths and a mixture of evaporated milk and lemon juice in thirds to the creamed mixture. Beat egg whites until stiff peaks are formed; fold into batter. Drop by tablespoon 3-inches apart onto a greased cookie sheet. Sprinkle with a mixture of sugar and cinnamon.
Bake at 375° for about 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned.
Remove cookies to cooling rack.
Makes around 5 dozen.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: "Sugar Cookies"
Ingredients:
1 c. granulated sugar
1 c. confectioners sugar
1 c. butter or margarine
1 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs
2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cream of tartar
5 1/4 c. plain flour
Directions:
Cream sugars and butter or margarine.
Add eggs; stir in oil and vanilla.
Combine dry ingredients.
Add to mixture.
Blend well.
Refrigerate overnight.
Form into small balls; place on greased cookie sheet.
Use small glass dipped in white sugar to press balls flat.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. softened butter or margarine
1 egg
1 tsp. grated lemon
1 tsp. vanilla extract
2 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
Directions:
Cream the sugar, salt and the butter.
Add to the creamed mixture the egg, grated lemon and vanilla extract.
Sift together the flour and the baking powder; add to mixture.
Roll out on a floured surface and cut into shapes.
Dab with clear Karo and sprinkle on some colored sugar crystals.
Bake at 350° on a lightly greased cookie sheets for 9 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. vegetable shortening
1/2 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. milk
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift dry ingredients.
Cream together butter, shortening and sugar.
Beat until light and fluffy.
Beat in vanilla and egg.
Add flour mixture; beat until smooth.
Blend in milk.
Drop by teaspoon onto lightly greased baking sheet.
Flatten with glass dipped in sugar.
Bake in a 400° oven for 12 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic sugar cookies?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. sifted all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
3/4 c. butter, at room temperature (1 1/2 sticks, no substitute)
1 1/4 c. sugar
3/4 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
1/4 tsp. almond extract
2 large eggs
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
Beat butter until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in sugar until well mixed.
Add extract and eggs and mix thoroughly.
Stir in flour mixture.
Mix well. This will make a soft, sticky dough.
Place in a tight container or roll in foil and season overnight in the refrigerator.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 medium onion
1 medium green pepper
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 tsp. garlic
2 cans (8 oz.) tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 can kidney beans, drained (save juice)
Directions:
Heat oil and add onion, pepper, beef and garlic.
Add tomato sauce, cumin, cayenne pepper, chili powder, oregano and salt. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
(If mixture is too thick, add water.)
Stir in the beans and cover and simmer for 5 minutes, until the beans are heated.
Add half of the juice from the beans while cooking.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 c. chopped onion
3/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 (1 lb.) can (2 c.) tomatoes, broken up
1 (1 lb.) can (2 c.) dark red kidney beans, drained (I prefer 1 lb. bag pinto beans), precook
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 to 2 tsp. chili powder
1 bay leaf
1 clove garlic or equivalent
1 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Brown meat, onion and green pepper.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove bay leaf. Serves 4.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 (16 oz.) cans Mexican-style chili beans
1 large onion, chopped
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 green pepper, chopped
1 lb. ground round
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can seasoned tomato sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 bay leaves
dash of paprika
dash of cayenne pepper
2 dashes Tabasco sauce
Directions:
Brown onion, green pepper, garlic and meat.
Add beans, tomatoes, tomato sauce, chili powder, salt, bay leaves, paprika, cayenne pepper and Tabasco sauce.
Cover and simmer for 1 1/2 hours.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
2 lb. extra-lean ground beef
1 large onion, chopped
2 garlic cloves, minced or pressed
1 qt. skinned fresh tomatoes or home-canned tomatoes or 2 (16 oz.) cans tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
4 c. beef broth
2 to 3 Tbsp. chili powder
1 Tbsp. ground cumin
salt to taste
1/2 tsp. dried leaf oregano
dash of hot pepper sauce
2 c. pinto beans, cooked* or 2 (16 oz.) cans pinto or red kidney beans, drained
Directions:
In a heavy Dutch oven, slowly brown beef with onion and garlic until meat is cooked through.
Add tomatoes with juice, tomato sauce, beef broth, chili powder, cumin, salt, oregano and hot pepper sauce.
Simmer beef mixture, covered, 1 1/2 to 2 hours. Add cooked or canned beans and simmer 30 minutes longer.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make a spicy chili con carne?
answer:
Title: Chili Con Carne
Ingredients:
1 c. onions, chopped
2 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. ground beef
2 (28 oz.) cans whole tomatoes
2 (19 oz.) cans red kidney beans
1/4 c. chili powder
1 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. beer
1 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Saute onions in oil until tender.
Add ground beef and brown. Add seasonings, tomatoes and kidney beans.
Stir.
Add beer and stir.
Simmer slowly, covered, for 1 to 1 1/2 hours or until thick.
Remove lid and simmer, uncovered, if necessary.
Serve with rice, grated cheese and sour cream.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple 'N Oat Bread
Ingredients:
3 c. chopped, pared raw apples
1/2 c. water
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1 tsp. each: baking powder, cinnamon, soda and salt
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 c. rolled oats (regular)
1/2 c. seedless raisins
1/2 c. chopped nuts
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 c. melted shortening or cooking oil
Directions:
Combine apples, water and 1/2 cup brown sugar.
Cook until apples are almost tender, about 5 minutes.
Cool while preparing remaining ingredients.
Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and spices.
Stir in remaining brown sugar, oats, raisins and nuts.
Add apple mixture, eggs and shortening or oil to dry ingredients; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Oatmeal Breakfast
Ingredients:
2/3 c. uncooked oats (regular or quick)
1 medium apple, cored and finely chopped
2 Tbsp. chopped walnuts
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
dash of cinnamon
Directions:
Cook oats according to package. Stir in apples, nuts, brown sugar and cinnamon. Let stand, covered, for 3 minutes.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Oat Crisp
Ingredients:
4 c. chopped tart apples
1/2 c. flour
1 c. oats
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. butter
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Work the last 6 items with a pastry blender or finger tips. Spread apples in bottom of a baking dish, sprinkle with topping. Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple And Oat Breakfast Mix
Ingredients:
2 c. quick cooking oatmeal
1 1/2 c. chopped, dried apples
2/3 c. chopped pecans
1/4 c. brown sugar, packed
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
To dry apples:
Select any tart, firm-textured apple (Granny Smith, Jonathan or McIntosh).
Wash, peel, core and cut into 1/4 to 1/2-inch slices or rings.
Pretreat by dipping in ascorbic acid mixture.
Dry at 130° to 135° until pliable, preferably in a food dehydrator.
I use the oven; it works well.
I place fruit on a cookie sheet.

question: What can I make with apples and oats?
answer:
Title: Apple Oatmeal Crisp
Ingredients:
4 c. peeled and thinly sliced tart (Granny Smith) cooking apple
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
3 Tbsp. granulated sugar
1/3 c. flour
1 c. rolled oats
1/2 c. firmly packed dark brown sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon or to taste
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. unsalted butter, melted and cooled
Directions:
In a well buttered 9 inch square baking pan, combine apples, lemon juice, and the granulated sugar.
In a bowl combine the flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon, and the salt, add the butter and combine the mixture well.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Bread Deluxe
Ingredients:
2 heaping Tbsp. yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. salt
5 c. warm water
1 c. powdered milk
1 c. warm water
4 eggs, beaten
2/3 c. oil
15 c. flour
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Combine yeast, 1 cup of warm water and sugar; let stand 10 minutes.
Add to beaten eggs, salt, oil, 1 cup sugar and 5 cups of warm water.
Add yeast mixture, then gradually add 15 cups of flour to which you have added 1 cup of powdered milk. Mix until smooth.
Let rise.
Knead down.
Put into loaf pans; let rise until doubled in bulk.
Bake at 350° for about 45 minutes.
Makes 6 loaves.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Yeast Bread - No Knead
Ingredients:
1/4 c. water
1 pkg. yeast
1/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. shortening
1 c. milk, scalded
1 tsp. salt
1 egg
3 1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water.
Combine milk, shortening, sugar and salt.
Add 1 1/4 cups flour and beat well.
Add yeast and egg and beat.
Add remaining flour.
Place in greased bowl and let rise 1 1/2 to 2 hours (doubled).
Shape dough and let rise 30 to 40 minutes.
Bake 20 minutes at 375°.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
8 c. warm water
3 pkg. yeast
1 c. powdered milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
3 Tbsp. salt
5 lb. flour (plus some)
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in water and powdered milk. Add all other ingredients. Mix well. Knead for at least 10 minutes. Put back in greased bowl and let rise until double, punch down and let rise again.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Homemade Bread
Ingredients:
2 c. warm water
1 pkg. dry yeast
1/3 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 c. shortening
6 c. flour, sifted
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water; add sugar, salt, shortening and stir until sugar and salt are dissolved.
Stir in flour and mix until all is well blended.
Turn out on a floured surface and knead well, about 5 minutes.
Place in a greased pan, covered with a cloth, for 1 hour over a pan of warm (not hot) water and let rise until double in bulk.
Knead down again; place over warm water again for about 30 minutes.
Mold into desired shape.
Let rise for about 45 minutes.
Bake at 350° for about 30 minutes or until done. Yields about 24 large or 36 small rolls or 2 loaves.

question: How do I make homemade bread without yeast?
answer:
Title: Easy Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. warm water
1 pkg. dry yeast
2 Tbsp. oil (canola for no cholesterol)
2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar (1 or none optional)
3 c. flour
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in a bowl.
Add oil, salt and sugar.
Mix and add 2 cups flour.
Stir well.
Add 3rd cup of flour.
Leave in bowl, cover and let rise until doubled.
Pour out on floured board.
Knead about 10 strokes.
Put in greased pans; let rise again.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
3 pounds fresh green beans (stem ends removed)
1/2 teaspoon butter flavored buds or butter flavored cooking spray
1/8 teaspoon garlic powder
1 1/2 teaspoons crushed dried thyme
2 tablespoons slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
Bring green bean to a boil in a large covered pot.
Reduce heat and simmer until crisp and tender, 3 to 4 minutes.
Drain. Toss with butter flavored buds, garlic powder and thyme.
Garnish with toasted almonds.
Serve hot.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans Almondine
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. green beans, trimmed
2 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. sliced natural almonds
1 pt. cherry tomatoes, washed and dried
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
In large skillet over high heat, bring 1-inch water to a boil.
Add washed green beans and cook 5 minutes; drain.
Remove beans and wipe out skillet.
In the same skillet over medium-high heat, melt the butter.
Add sliced almonds; cook 2 minutes or until browned, stirring frequently.
Meanwhile, halve the cherry tomatoes.
Add to skillet and cook 3 to 5 minutes, gently pressing with a wooden spoon to release the juices.
Season tomato mixture with salt and pepper.
Cook 5 minutes more or until softened.
Add cooked green beans to the skillet.
Gently toss all ingredients together; cook 1 to 2 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 8 servings.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans Almondine
Ingredients:
1/3 c. slivered or shaved almonds
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 1/2 lb. fresh green beans, halved
1/3 c. water
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine almonds and butter in a 2-cup glass measure. Microwave, uncovered, at power level High for 4 to 6 minutes, or until almonds are lightly toasted.
Set aside.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans With Almonds
Ingredients:
3 (14.5 oz.) cans green beans, drained and rinsed
2 cubes beef bouillon
2 c. water
1/2 c. corn oil
1/4 c. chopped onions (optional)
salt and pepper to taste
3/4 c. sliced or slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
In a large pan, combine beans, bouillon cubes, water, oil and onions.
Bring to a boil on the stove and cook on low heat for 1 hour.
Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Add almonds during last 15 minutes of cooking or use almonds as a garnish when served.
Yield:
8 to 12 servings.

question: What can I make with green beans and almonds?
answer:
Title: Green Beans Almondine
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. fresh green beans
1/2 c. hot water
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. slivered almonds
3 Tbsp. margarine/butter
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Wash beans and break off ends.
Break beans into 1 to 1 1/2-inch pieces.
Place beans in 2-quart casserole.
Stir water and salt until it is dissolved.
Mix with beans.
Microwave on High until beans are tender-crisp, 9 to 13 minutes.
Drain.
Mix in almonds, margarine, nutmeg and pepper until butter is melted. Microwave on High until heated through.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. olive oil
thyme to taste (optional)
rosemary to taste (optional)
soy sauce or Tabasco to taste
onions
potatoes
use your favorite veggies: turnips, broccoli, cauliflower, garlic, peppers, zucchini, summer squash, mushrooms)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
Melt oil and butter in roasting pan large enough so that vegetables rest on bottom of pan.
Adjust oil and butter to amount of vegetables.
Using tongs, turn cut sides of longest cooking vegetables down to seal in juices (potatoes, onions, turnips).
Roast 15 minutes.
Toss once or twice.
Add medium cooking vegetables (broccoli, summer squash) and pour soy sauce (or other favorite sauce) to coat.
Roast 15 minutes.
Add mushrooms and any seasonings.
Toss lightly.
Roast 5 to 10 minutes.
Serve with cornbread.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Mixed Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 large red skin potatoes, wedged (about 2 lb.)
3 large carrots, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
3 large parsnips, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces (about 2 c.)
2 lb. onions, cut into wedges (large)
1 Tbsp. dried rosemary leaves
2 tsp. garlic powder
3 Tbsp. Fleischmann's margarine, melted
Directions:
In a large bowl, toss potatoes, carrots, parsnips and onions with rosemary and garlic.
Drizzle with margarine.
