Arrange in a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan. Bake at 450° for 40 to 45 minutes or until fork-tender, stirring constantly.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
10 c. mixed vegetables, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces (try onions, carrots, potatoes, eggplant, mushrooms and zucchini)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. melted butter
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried or fresh rosemary
1 1/2 tsp. dried or 1 Tbsp. fresh marjoram
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Arrange the vegetables in a large oiled baking dish and toss in the oil, butter, garlic and herbs. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes.
Uncover and turn the vegetables with a large spoon.
Add salt and pepper and roast at 425° for approximately 30 minutes or until the carrots and potatoes are thoroughly cooked and the edges of the vegetables have browned.
Serves 5.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roasted Winter Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 tsp. tarragon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 head broccoli (about 3/4 lb.)
1/2 head cauliflower
2 small red onions
Directions:
Place butter and spices into shallow roasting pan in oven just to melt butter. Cut broccoli and cauliflower into florets.
Cut onions into wedges. Toss onions in butter, mix and roast, uncovered, 5 minutes. Stir in remaining veggies. Continue roasting until tender.
Bake at 425° for about 25 minutes.
Other combinations of vegetables are quite yummy.

question: I need a recipe for roasted vegetables.
answer:
Title: Roast With Carrots, Potatoes, Onions And Cabbage
Ingredients:
1 large center cut beef
1 large bag carrots (already cut)
1 bag potatoes (small)
1 large head cabbage
3 medium onions
3 cans Campbell's French onion soup
1 bottle Lea & Perrins steak sauce
butter
garlic salt*
garlic powder*
meat seasoning*
pepper*
Directions:
*Season to your taste.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
6 oz. (1 c.) semi-sweet chocolate
1/4 c. whipping cream
1 tsp. instant coffee, dissolved in 1 Tbsp. warm water or 2 Tbsp. of any liqueur (Kahlua, Grand Marnier, etc.)
2 Tbsp. butter
1 to 2 Tbsp. cocoa powder or other toppings to roll truffles in
Directions:
Combine all, but topping ingredients, into a small saucepan and slowly melt, stirring constantly.
Pour into a bowl and chill until firm.
Using a melon baller, shape into balls and roll into topping mixture.
Place on plate and keep in refrigerator.
Set at room temperature approximately 30 minutes before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
16 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
16 Tbsp. unsalted butter, softened
6 egg yolks
5 Tbsp. dark rum
3/4 c. confectioners sugar
3/4 c. Dutch cocoa
Directions:
In double boiler, melt chocolate over simmering water.
Beat in softened butter, egg yolks, rum and vanilla with wire whisk. Remove from heat and refrigerate until firm enough to handle (1 hour), keeping tightly covered.
Combine cocoa and confectioners sugar.
Shape chocolate mixture into 1-inch balls and roll in cream and sugar.
Store in airtight container and refrigerate.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Truffles
Ingredients:
6 oz. semi-sweet baking chocolate
10 Tbsp. butter, softened
2 egg yolks, beaten
1 1/2 c. sifted confectioners sugar
2 tsp. vanilla extract
cocoa
Directions:
Melt chocolate in saucepan over very low heat, stirring constantly.
Cool.
Cream butter with egg yolks in bowl.
Add confectioners sugar gradually, blending well.
Stir in chocolate and vanilla.
Chill until firm enough to handle.
Shape into 30 to 35 balls.
Roll in cocoa.
Store in airtight container

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Truffles
Ingredients:
8 oz. bittersweet chocolate
4 oz. unsalted butter, cut into small cubes
2 egg yolks
2 Tbsp. dark rum, cognac or orange liqueur
unsweetened cocoa
Directions:
Melt chocolate in a bowl over hot water.
Remove bowl from hot water and whisk in butter.
Next, whisk in egg yolks.
Add rum, cognac or liqueur.
Place bowl over cold water and beat vigorously until chocolate is thick and smooth.
Chill until workable.
Form into balls with 2 teaspoons; roll in unsweetened cocoa.
Place on a chilled plate until firm.
Roll in cocoa again and keep chilled in a covered container until served.

question: What’s a good recipe for chocolate truffles?
answer:
Title: Truffles(From A 1930 Chocolate Lovers Hershey Cookbook)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, softened
1/4 c. heavy cream (canned milk is good)
3 c. to 1 box 4x powdered sugar
1/2 c. Hershey's cocoa
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla or rum flavoring (if you like)
Directions:
Cream butter.
Combine 2 cups of the sugar and cocoa.
Stir into butter.
Add flavoring to milk and beat into the creamed mixture.
Add enough sugar to make a manageable dough.
If dough is too soft, may be placed in refrigerator to chill.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
4 avocados, peeled and chopped
2 green onions, chopped
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. dried cilantro or 1 fresh sprig
1 medium tomato, chopped
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine avocados, onions, lemon juice, salt, red pepper flakes, garlic powder and cilantro.
Using a fork or potato masher, mix and mash coarsely.
Add most of the tomatoes; stir well. Pour into serving bowl; garnish with remaining tomatoes and sprigs of cilantro.
Serve with tortilla chips.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 c. mashed avocados
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. pacantia sauce
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Mix together and serve.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 large avocado
2 1/2 tsp. minced onion
2 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. chili powder
5 oz. cream cheese
1/3 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
pinch of seasoned salt
1 c. diced tomatoes
1/4 c. diced onions
1/4 c. diced olives
6 oz. grated Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Peel avocado and remove pit.
Blend all but last four ingredients in blender or food processor until smooth.
Spread on plate and chill.
Just before serving, top with diced tomatoes, diced onions, diced olives and grated Mozzarella cheese.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 to 2 avocados (2 small or 1 large)
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 small onion
1 medium tomato
1 to 2 Tbsp. sour cream or plain yogurt (optional)
Directions:
Peel, seed and mash avocados.
Add lemon juice and sour cream. Mince onion.
Add to avocado.
Peel tomato.
Remove seeds and juice.
Chop tomato and add to avocado.

question: What’s a quick recipe for guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 medium avocado, peeled
1 small tomato, quartered
2 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. red pepper
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/3 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Position knife blade in food processor bowl.
Add all ingredients except onion.
Process 1 minute or until lumpy.
Stir in onions.
Yields 2 cups.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. (heaping) plain flour
3 Tbsp. cocoa
2 c. sugar
4 eggs, separated
pinch of salt
butter
Directions:
Sift flour, sugar and salt.
Add enough evaporated milk to make paste.
Beat in egg yolks, one at a time.
Add rest of milk and finish filling pan with sweet milk.
Cook in a double boiler until it begins to thicken.
Add butter and vanilla.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. boiling water
4 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 c. sugar
1 egg
2 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. cocoa
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Put sugar and water in 2-quart pan.
Cream shortening and sugar.
Beat in egg.
Sift dry ingredients together.
Add alternately with milk.
Add vanilla.
Pour pudding batter into hot syrup, being careful not to mix with syrup.
Cook, tightly covered, for 1 hour on medium heat.
Do not take cover of kettle off while cooking pudding, or pudding will not cook right.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Favorite Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. shortening
3/4 c. sugar
1 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 c. nuts
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. brown sugar
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 3/4 c. hot water
Directions:
Cream shortening and sugar.
Sift dry ingredients together (flour, baking powder, salt and 2 tablespoons cocoa) and add alternately with milk.
Add vanilla and nuts.
Spread batter in an ungreased pan (9 x 9-inches).
Mix brown sugar, 4 tablespoons cocoa and hot water.
Pour over mixture and bake at 350° about 30 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. cocoa
2 eggs, separated
1 Tbsp. and 1 tsp. vanilla
4 Tbsp. flour
3 c. milk
6 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 stick margarine
Directions:
Mix sugar, flour and cocoa. Beat with egg yolks and milk. Cover over medium heat, stirring until thick. Stir in margarine and 1 tablespoon vanilla. Pour into pie plate or casserole dish. Set aside. Beat egg whites and add sugar and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Pour on top of pudding. Brown at 350°.

question: I need a recipe for chocolate pudding from scratch.
answer:
Title: Baked Chocolate Pudding
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
4 1/2 tsp. cocoa
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. pecans, chopped or walnuts (optional)
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 c. water
Directions:
Sift together 3 times the flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and cocoa.
In a separate bowl, combine the melted butter, vanilla and milk.
Blend the liquid mixture with the dry mixture and add the nuts.
Pour into a square greased baking dish.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
1 fryer
salt
flour
1 small onion
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. celery and parsley flakes (or any seasoning desired)
Directions:
Before you go to church Sunday morning, cut up and remove the skin from fryer; salt and flour lightly.
Arrange in single layer in slow cooker.
Slice onion; spread over chicken.
Sprinkle over this the seasoning, thyme and celery
and parsley flakes.
Place lid on cooker; turn on.
Come home from church and eat!

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Fast Paced Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1 c. sour cream
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. salsa (mild, medium or hot)
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. celery salt
Directions:
Place chicken in a glass 9-inch baking dish.
Mix remaining ingredients and pour over chicken.
Refrigerate 8 to 24 hours. Preheat oven to 350° and bake 1 hour.
Good served with rice and a steamed squash medley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) pkg. Stove Top dressing
1 1/4 c. water
1/4 c. white wine
12 carrots, cut into 2-inch pieces
4 to 5 lb. roasting chicken
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare dressing as directed.
Set aside to cool.
Stir in wine.
Blanch carrots 5 minutes in boiling water.
Drain and put in crock-pot.
Stuff chicken with dressing and place in pot over carrots.
Cover pot and set on low for 6 to 8 hours.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken In A Pot
Ingredients:
1 (5 lb.) or 2 (3 lb.) roasting chickens
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. white wine
1/2 c. chicken broth
2 tsp. salt
12 small new potatoes, unpeeled
18 baby carrots
18 small white onions
12 medium mushrooms, halved
1/4 tsp. rosemary
1/2 c. chopped celery leaves
6 stalks celery, sliced
Directions:
Truss chicken.
Melt butter in large skillet and brown chicken slowly (about 30 minutes).
Transfer chicken to a large pot.
Pour wine, broth and salt into skillet and bring to a boil.
Stir to get all brown bits.
Pour this over chicken.
Cover and cook over medium heat for 45 minutes.
Remove chicken.
Add vegetables in layers:
first potatoes, second carrots, third celery, then onions and mushrooms.
Sprinkle with rosemary and celery leaves.
Place chicken on top of vegetables, cover and cook for 45 minutes more. Cut up the chicken and arrange with vegetables on platter.
Fill gravy boat with remaining juices.

question: How do I make slow-cooker pulled chicken?
answer:
Title: Easy Chicken And Rice Slow Cooker
Ingredients:
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 c. celery, sliced
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 pounds chicken thighs skinned and fat removed
1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup or cream of chicken
3/4 c. chicken broth
1 1/2 c. instant rice
Directions:
In a slow cooker combine mushrooms, celery, onion dill weed and pepper.
Top with chicken.
Pour soup and broth over chicken. Cover, cook on High 2 1/2 to 3 hours or Low 5 to 6 hours.
If using low turn slow cooker to high heat setting.
Stir uncooked rice into mushroom mixture.
Cover and cook for 10 minutes more.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 1/2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. lukewarm water
2 c. warm water
3/4 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. instant potatoes
1 c. warm water
Directions:
Mix well and let set out of refrigerator all day, 8 to 12 hours, until very bubbly.
Feed 2 or 3 times before making bread to avoid depleting your Starter.
Take out one cup to make bread and return the rest to the refrigerator.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Initial Starter For Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water (105~ to 108~)
1 pkg. yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 c. warm water
2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
Directions:
Mix first three ingredients well.
Mix last two ingredients well.
Then mix all together.
Store in refrigerator and feed every 3 to 5 days.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dry yeast
3 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 c. water
1 c. milk or water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. shortening
1/2 c. sugar
1 c. sourdough starter
6 or 7 c. flour
Directions:
Mix first 3 ingredients.
Let set 10 minutes.
Combine all ingredients and knead on floured board for 10 minutes.
Place in large bowl.
Grease top of dough and cover.
Place in warm place and let rise to double its size.
Punch down and let rise again. Turn out on floured board and divide in 3 parts.
Place in greased loaf pans and let rise double in size.
Bake in preheated oven at 375° for first 15 minutes.
Reduce heat to 325° and bake about 30 minutes longer.
Turn out on rack to cool.
Brush tops with butter.
Let completely cool before wrapping.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread
Ingredients:
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 c. starter
6 c. bread flour
Directions:
Stir all ingredients, except flour.
When mixed, add flour, a little at a time, to other ingredients, mixing well.
Put dough in large greased bowl; turn dough to grease the top.
Cover with foil.
Let rise at room temperature overnight, or for at least 8 hours.
Punch down dough.
Turn out onto floured board and knead. Divide into 3 parts; shape into loaves.
Put in 3 greased loaf pans; brush tops with oil.
Cover with paper towel or plastic wrap.
Let rise an additional 4 to 5 hours.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.
Brush with butter; cool and wrap.

question: How do I make homemade sourdough bread?
answer:
Title: Sourdough Bread Starter
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dry yeast
1/2 c. warm water
2 c. lukewarm water
1 c. bread flour
2 c. instant potatoes
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. sugar
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup warm water. Add remaining ingredients. Store at room temperature in a 1-gallon covered container in a warm, draft free place for 3 to 4 days, stirring 2 or 3 times a day. Cover during night; uncover during day. Then store in refrigerator for 3 to 5 days.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings
1 c. Louisiana hot sauce
2/3 c. butter
1/2 c. Burgundy wine
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
Directions:
Disjoint wings and wash.
Deep fry in oil; drain.
While wings are frying, mix all remaining ingredients and warm until butter is melted.
After draining wings, toss them in the sauce until coated. Serve with carrot and celery strips and Blue cheese dip.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
24 chicken wings, about 4 lb.
salt and pepper to taste
vegetable oil for deep frying
4 Tbsp. butter
2 to 5 Tbsp. Louisiana hot pepper sauce
1 Tbsp. white vinegar
Directions:
Cut off and discard the small
tips
of each wing.
Cut the main wing bone and second
wing bone at the joint.	Sprinkle the wings with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in deep-fryer or deep saucepan to about 350°.
Add
some of the wings.
(Do not overcrowd.) Deep fry, turning,
until
golden brown and crisp, about 10 minutes.
Drain well
on
paper
towel.
Repeat
with remaining
wings.	Melt
butter
in
a
small
saucepan.
Add desired
amount of hot sauce
and
vinegar.
Put
hot
chicken wings onto warm serving platter.
Put mixture over all.
Serve immediately with desired dressing
and celery sticks.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.
Use Blue Cheese Dressing, see index.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. chicken wings (tips removed)
1 c. vegetable oil
3 Tbsp. melted butter
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/3 c. Blue cheese, crumbled
1/4 c. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 tsp. each celery and garlic powder
Directions:
Cut each wing into 2 pieces. In a large deep skillet, heat oil over moderate heat (365°). Fry wings for 5 minutes.
Transfer to paper towel. In pie plate, combine butter, vinegar and cayenne pepper. Add wings; toss to coat.
Arrange on warm platter. In small bowl, blend remaining ingredients and serve with wings. Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 tsp. lemon juice
3 Tbsp. hot pepper sauce
1 1/2 tsp. brown sugar
1/4 tsp. minced garlic
3 c. vegetable oil
3 lb. chicken wings, cut apart at joints
Directions:
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Stir in brown sugar, lemon juice, garlic and hot sauce.
Remove from heat.
In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Fry wings, turning occasionally for 10 minutes or until brown and very well done. Remove and drain on paper towels.
Keep hot, or bake wings in a single layer at 450° for 25 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for spicy buffalo wings?
answer:
Title: Buffalo Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
24 chicken wings (about)
4 lb. salt (optional)
4 c. peanut, vegetable or corn oil
4 Tbsp. butter
2 to 5 Tbsp. Frank's Louisiana red hot sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
2 1/2 c. Blue cheese dressing
celery sticks
Directions:
Cut off and discard small tips of wings.
Cut remaining wing bones apart.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste.
Heat oil in large frying pan.
Add half wings; cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden brown and crisp.
Remove; drain well.
Repeat with remaining wings.
Melt butter in saucepan; add hot sauce and vinegar.
Put chicken wings on a warm serving platter.
Cover with butter mixture.
Serve with Blue cheese dressing and celery sticks.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless sirloin steak
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. oyster sauce
cooking spray (vegetable)
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, quartered
3 stalks celery, sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 lb. fresh snow peas
1/2 bunch broccoli flowerets
1 can sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Trim fat
from
steak.
Cut
across
grain into strips. Combine water,
cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar and oyster sauce. Set aside.
Coat wok or skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high for 2
minutes.
Add
steak
and
stir-fry about 3 minutes.
Remove meat.
Place onion, celery, mushrooms, pepper and water chestnuts to
pan drippings in wok.
Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes. Add meat,
broccoli
and snow peas.
Cover and reduce heat to medium.
Simmer
2
to
3
minutes.
Stir in soy sauce mixture.
Cook
on
medium,
stirring constantly until bubbly. Serve over hot rice.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 to 2 Tbsp. sesame oil
1 tsp. five-spice powder
2 lb. sirloin, cut into thin slices
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. beef broth
1 tsp. red pepper flakes
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 tsp. fresh ginger, grated
2 cloves garlic, grated
1 onion, chopped
2 c. bean sprouts
1 c. snow peas
Directions:
Combine sesame oil and five-spice powder in a skillet and heat to medium-high heat; add beef and brown. Remove from pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef top round steak
1 1/2 c. broccoli (1-inch size)
3 medium carrots
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion
1 c. frozen peas
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
4 to 6 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Slice beef very thin in bite size strips.
Add cooking oil to preheated hot wok (high heat).
Stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onion in hot oil for 2 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Remove from wok.
Add more oil, if necessary, before stir-frying the beef strips (fry only 1/2 of the portion of beef strips at a time) in hot oil (high heat) for 2 to 3 minutes.
Return all meat to wok. Add peas, water chestnuts and bamboo shoots.

question: What’s a recipe for a quick and easy beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 c. beef, sliced thin (I cut up a sirloin steak)
1 1/2 c. green pepper
2 onions
1 c. broccoli
1 tomato
1/2 c. mushrooms
1/2 c. snow peas
Directions:
May substitute or add other vegetables (carrots, celery or zucchini, etc.).

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Tomato-Basil Bruschetta
Ingredients:
1/4 c. extra virgin olive oil
2 large garlic cloves, minced
1 lb. ripe tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1/3 c. sweet white or red onion, chopped
1/3 c. coarsely chopped fresh basil, plus leaves for garnish
8 slices crusty Italian bread, cut 1/2-inch thick
2 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
In small bowl, combine olive oil and garlic; let stand 15 minutes.
In medium bowl, combine tomatoes, onion, basil, vinegar, salt, pepper and 2 tablespoons garlic oil.
Stir gently to mix. Let stand 15 to 30 minutes, allowing flavors to blend.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Fresh Tomato Bruschetta
Ingredients:
4 large tomatoes
1 c. mozzarella cheese, finely diced
1/3 c. fresh basil, chopped
3 medium cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 loaf crusty Italian bread
3 cloves garlic
Directions:
Cut tomatoes in half horizontally and squeeze out seeds.
Cut tomato into very small dice.
Place in a colander and drain 30 minutes. Transfer tomatoes into a bowl and add next 7 ingredients.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Bruschetta
Ingredients:
3 cloves garlic
2 tsp. lemon juice (fresh is best)
salt and pepper
olive oil
fresh basil
1 or 2 tomatoes, diced
fresh loaf bread
good olive oil
Directions:
Mash the garlic cloves in a bowl big enough to hold tomatoes. (I use the garlic press, then mash them.)
Squeeze or pour lemon juice.
Sprinkle liberally with salt and mix well.
Add about 2 tablespoons olive oil and a dash of Italian dressing if you like. Add tomatoes and toss.
Add more oil or dressing if the tomatoes aren't thinly coated.
Add basil, about 15 leaves.
Chill.
Toast the bread and serve with extra virgin olive oil and the tomato mix. If you want to toast the tomatoes already spread on the bread, DO NOT add basil until you remove it from the oven.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Bruschetta
Ingredients:
1 loaf Italian or French bread
olive oil
chopped garlic
tomatoes, sliced or diced
herbs
garlic
Directions:
Slice bread and spread with olive oil and chopped garlic. Bake until crisp then sprinkle with herbs, tomatoes and more garlic.

question: What can I make with tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella?
answer:
Title: Bruschetta
Ingredients:
1 French baguette roll
6 Roma (plum) tomatoes, chopped
1/2 c. sun-dried tomatoes, packed in oil
3 cloves minced garlic
4 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
2 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1/4 c. fresh basil, stems removed
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
2 c. shredded mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Preheat the oven on broiler setting.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the roma tomatoes, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, vinegar, basil, salt and pepper. Allow the mixture to sit for 10 minutes.
Cut the baguette into 3/4 inch slices.
On a baking sheet, arrange the baguette slices in a single layer. Broil for 1 to 2 minutes, until slightly brown. Divide the tomato mixture evenly over the baguette slices. Top the slices with mozzarella cheese.
Broil for 5 minutes, or until the cheese is melted.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Ganache
Ingredients:
2 c. heavy cream
4 Tbsp. unsalted butter
4 Tbsp. granulated sugar
6 oz. unsweetened chocolate
4 oz. white chocolate
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
Directions:
Heat cream, butter and sugar in a 2 1/2-quart saucepan over medium heat.
Stir to dissolve sugar.
Bring to a boil.
Place the semi-sweet, unsweetened and white chocolate in a steel bowl.
Pour the boiling cream mixture over chocolates.
Let stand 5 minutes. Stir until smooth.
Can put in 1 to 2 teaspoons vanilla, pecans or orange rind (optional).
Refrigerate.
Cut into bite-size pieces.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Ganache
Ingredients:
1 c. heavy cream
10 oz. semi-sweet or bittersweet chocolate, chopped (2 c.)
Directions:
Gently warm the cream in a small saucepan over medium heat until small bubbles begin to appear at the edges.
Remove from heat.
Stir in chocolate until mixture is smooth and the chocolate has melted completely.
Do not stir so vigorously that bubbles form.
If there are any visible lumps, strain the mixture through a fine mesh sieve.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Sour Cream Ganache Frosting
Ingredients:
4 (3 oz.) bars bittersweet chocolate (Lindt-Excellence recommended)
1 2/3 c. sour cream, at room temperature
Directions:
In a double boiler set over hot water or in a microwave on High power, stirring every 10 seconds, melt the chocolate.
Remove from the heat and add the sour cream.
Stir with a rubber spatula until uniform in color.
If the pan feels warm, transfer to a bowl.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Heritage Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or margarine, soften
1 3/4 c. sugar
3 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla extract
2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. cocoa
1 tsp. baking powder
3/4 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1/3 c. butter or margarine
1/3 c. cocoa
2 2/3 c. confectioners sugar
1/3 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Melt butter and cocoa on low until smooth and thickened.
Pour into small bowl and cool.
Add vanilla.
Add sugar and milk alternately until desired consistency.

question: How do I make a chocolate ganache?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1/2 c. shortening
2 c. sugar
3 eggs
3 heaping Tbsp. cocoa
2 c. buttermilk
3 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 level tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cream shortening and sugar.
Add eggs; beat well.
Sift flour, cocoa (or spices), soda, baking powder and salt together.
Add flour alternating with buttermilk.
Bake at 325° until done, 30 to 40 minutes.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Hot Dish
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 lb. boneless pork, cut into 1-inch cubes
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped red and green pepper
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 (10 oz.) pkg. noodles, cooked and drained
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 (16 1/2 oz.) can creamed corn
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. saltine crumbs
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Cook pork, celery, pepper and onion in oil until meat is browned and vegetables are tender.
In large bowl, combine pork mixture, noodles, soups, corn, milk, salt and pepper; mix well. Put in ungreased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
Combine crumbs and butter; sprinkle on top.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes until heated through.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
3 lb. pork, cubed
2 c. onions, chopped
3 green bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
6 oz. can tomato paste
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in slow cooker; cover and cook on high 8 hours. Shred meat with fork. Mix into sauce and heat through. Serve on hamburger/sandwich buns with grated cheese and cole slaw on top.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Potted Pork
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground lean pork
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1 onion, grated
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 c. milk
Directions:
In a heavy saucepan, combine all ingredients and simmer, covered over low heat for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Pour into an earthenware crock or rustic serving dish. Chill.
Makes a delicious spread on melba toast for appetizer or on a slice of crusty bread for lunch.

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oyster sauce
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 tsp. cooking wine
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. red pepper flakes
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 lb. pork tenderloin, cut in thin strips
1/2 c. chicken stock
4 tsp. minced garlic
1 c. thinly sliced onions
3/4 c. thinly sliced red bell peppers
3/4 c. thinly sliced celery
6 oz. sliced mushrooms
4 oz. bean sprouts
1 (5 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and thinly sliced
1/2 tsp. Chinese hot chili paste (optional)
cooked rice
4 (12 oz.) cans cherry cola (flat)
2 c. cherry jam or preserves
2/3 c. Dijon mustard with horseradish
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. malt vinegar or apple cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. hot pepper sauce
7 1/4 to 7 1/2 lb. well-trimmed pork spareribs
Directions:
Boil cherry cola in heavy large saucepan over medium-high heat until reduced to 1 1/2 cups, about 45 minutes.
Stir in next 5 ingredients.
Reduce heat to medium and simmer until mixture is reduced to 2 1/2 cups, stirring occasionally, about 35 minutes. Transfer glaze to large bowl.
(Can be made 1 week ahead.
Cover; chill.
Bring to room temperature before using.)

question: How do I make slow-cooked pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Hot Pork Dish
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 lb. boneless pork, cut into bite size pieces
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. chopped sweet red/green pepper
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 (10 oz.) pkg. medium egg noodles, cooked and drained
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup (undiluted)
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup (undiluted)
1 (16 1/2 oz.) can cream-style corn
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. saltine crumbs
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
In a skillet, heat oil; cook pork, celery, red/green pepper and onion until the meat is browned and vegetables are tender.
In a large bowl, combine pork mixture, noodles, soups, corn, milk, salt and pepper.
Mix well.
Turn into an ungreased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish.
Combine crumbs and butter; sprinkle on top. Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through. Yields 8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. self-rising meal
2 1/2 c. buttermilk
1/2 c. salad oil
3 eggs, beaten
1 large onion, grated
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. cream-style corn
1/2 c. chopped jalapeno chili peppers
1 1/2 c. yellow cheese, grated
1/4 lb. bacon or more, fried and crumbled
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 c. pimentos, chopped
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together well. Bake at 400° for about 35 minutes or until done.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. cornbread mix
2 1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. salad oil
3 eggs, beaten
1 large chopped onion
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. cream-style corn
1/2 c. finely chopped jalapeno peppers
1 1/2 c. sharp Cheddar cheese
1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 garlic clove (optional)
Directions:
Put cornbread mix in a large bowl; add milk and stir.
Add other ingredients in order given.
Bake in 3 greased 8 x 8 x 2-inch pans at 400° for about 35 minutes until done.
This freezes well.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs
1 c. buttermilk
1 c. mild cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. cream style corn
1/3 c. Wesson oil
3 whole jalapeno peppers, cut up
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients. Add buttermilk. Add 1 egg at a time. Stir in corn. Fold in jalapeno peppers, and cheese. Heat oil in baking dish until very hot. Pour hot oil into batter and stir. Then pour batter into baking dish. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. cornbread mix
2 Tbsp. sugar
3 eggs, beaten
2 c. milk
1/2 c. vegetable oil
6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 1/2 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 large onion, diced
8 1/4 oz. can cream-style corn
4 oz. jar pimiento, drained and diced
2 Tbsp. jalapeno peppers, minced
Directions:
Combine cornbread mix and sugar in a large bowl.
Add eggs, milk and oil.
Mix well.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Pour batter into a greased baking pan.
Bake at 400° for 40 to 50 minutes or until done.
This makes enough for a 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan.

question: How do I make a spicy jalapeño cornbread?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Cornbread
Ingredients:
3 c. cornbread mix
2 Tbsp. sugar
3 eggs, beaten
2 c. milk
1/2 c. vegetable oil
6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 large onion, diced
1 (8 3/4 oz.) can cream-style corn
1 (4 oz.) jar diced pimento, drained
2 Tbsp. minced jalapeno peppers
Directions:
Combine cornbread mix and sugar in a large bowl.
Add eggs, milk and oil, mixing well.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Pour batter into a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.
Bake at 400° for 40 to 45 minutes or until done.
Yield:
12 servings.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Ground Beef Bake
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. minced green pepper
2 cans golden mushroom soup
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 medium onion
Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown ground beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly.
Drain. Add green pepper, soup, salt and pepper.
Set aside.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Ground Beef And Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef or turkey
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 can tomato soup
3/4 c. water
3 potatoes, sliced
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook meat and onion.
Drain.
Layer 1/2 of the potatoes in a 9 x 13-inch dish, then layer 1/2 of the meat mixture, followed by 1/2 cup of cheese.
Top with remaining potatoes, then rest of meat mixture.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Beef And Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 can tomato soup
1 small onion, chopped
2 c. cooked green beans or other vegetables
5 servings instant potatoes
Directions:
Brown ground beef and onion in skillet.
Drain off grease. Add tomato soup and ground beef; mix together.
Put in 2-quart casserole dish.
Put green beans on top of beef.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Beef And Potato Load
Ingredients:
4 c. thinly sliced peeled raw potatoes
1 Tbsp. cut-up onion
salt and pepper
1 tsp. parsley flakes (can omit)
1 lb. ground lean beef
3/4 c. Pet evaporated milk
1/2 c. fine soda cracker crumbs or uncooked rolled oats
1/4 c. catsup or chili sauce
1/4 c. cut-up onion
Directions:
Arrange evenly in greased, 2-quart baking dish, potatoes and 1 tablespoon cut-up onion, sprinkled with 1 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper and parsley flakes.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Scalloped Ground Beef And Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 large onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
4 large unpeeled potatoes, sliced
1 beef bouillon cube
1 c. boiling water
2 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef with onion, garlic powder, salt and pepper in skillet for 5 to 10 minutes, stirring frequently; drain. Arrange 1/3 of the potato slices in 2-quart baking dish.
Layer ground beef mixture and remaining potato slices 1/2 at a time in dish.
Dissolve bouillon cube in boiling water.
Pour over layers. Dot with margarine.
Bake at 425° for 30 minutes.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake for 15 minutes longer.
Yield:
6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Creamed Chicken
Ingredients:
2 to 3 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1 1/2 qt. water
2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. m.s.g.
1/2 c. Wondra flour
3/4 tsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. chicken broth
1 tsp. poultry seasoning
3 c. chicken broth
1/4 c. margarine
Directions:
Cook chicken in water and 2 teaspoon salt and m.s.g.; simmer for about 1 1/2 hours.
Cool, then cut chicken into large bite size pieces.
Combine flour, onion powder, garlic powder, celery salt, pepper and 1/2 teaspoon salt with 1/2 cup chicken broth and poultry seasoning.
Mix until smooth.
Heat 3 cups chicken broth to boiling; add flour mixture.
Stir and cook over medium heat until smooth and thickened; add chicken and blend well.
Place in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Dot with margarine and cover with a biscuit crust. Make slits in crust and bake at 375° until browned (approximately 20 minutes).

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Dam Good Baked Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. paprika
1 tsp. celery salt
1 tsp. garlic salt or powder
1 tsp. chili powder
1 tsp. basil
1 Tbsp. onion salt
1 tsp. sage
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. marjoram
1 tsp. allspice
3/4 c. flour
1 1/2 Tbsp. brown sugar
melted butter
Directions:
Combine seasonings.
This is enough to coat 4 chickens.
Shake all those ingredients in a bag.
Wet the chicken; drain it and toss it in the bag.
Arrange the coated chicken on an oven pan; brush with melted butter.
Bake 1 hour at 350° without turning!!

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dressing
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
1 Tbsp. ground sage
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 can condensed cream of chicken soup (plus 1 can water)
1 (10-inch) corn bread cake
3 slices white bread, crumbled
salt to taste
Directions:
Cook chicken (skin and remove fat) in salted water with bay leaf until tender.
Remove from broth, throw away bay leaf. Remove bones and cut or tear meat into pieces; set aside.
In very large bowl or pan, crumble cornbread and white bread; add seasoning, chicken broth and soup.
Mix thoroughly.
If too dry, add the can of water.
Mix in chicken.
Generously grease 3-quart baking dish or roaster pan.
Put dressing in pan.
Dot with butter or margarine.
Bake at 450° until golden brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Unfried Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 c. Italian bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. Old Bay seasoning
dash of cayenne pepper
1/2 tsp. dried basil
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Put 1 cup yogurt into bowl.
Put chicken into bowl of ice water.
Boil chicken in yogurt, then put in bag and shake to coat.
Put chicken onto prepared baking sheet. Spray chicken lightly with Pam spray.
Bake 1 hour, turning pieces.

question: What’s a good recipe for enchiladas with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Oh So Good
Ingredients:
1 lb. skinless chicken breasts
1/4 c. liquid Butter Buds
1 (8 oz.) can golden cream of mushroom soup
1 beef bouillon cube
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. poppy seed
1 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots
1/2 c. celery, sliced
1/2 c. onion, sliced
1 (3 oz.) can sliced mushrooms
1 small green pepper strips
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Cut chicken in 1 1/2-inch pieces.
Brown chicken in skillet sprayed with cooking spray.
Stir in Butter Buds, soup, water, bouillon cube, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, curry and poppy seed.
Mix well.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Poppers
Ingredients:
1 dozen jalapeno peppers
1- 8 oz. pkg. cream cheese
1-1/2 c. self-rising flour
1-1/2 c. canola oil
water
Directions:
Wash peppers and slice in half lengthwise removing all seeds, being careful not to rub your eyes and wash your hands thoroughly when done.
Stuff each pepper half thoroughly with cream cheese. In med saucepan heat oil on med-high heat until oil is hot.
In a med size bowl mix all of flour with enough water to make batter consistency thick enough to cling to peppers.
Place poppers 6 at a time in hot oil.
Let cook until crisp turning over to cook both sides.
(New oil will not allow batter to brown as well.)
Remove cooked peppers from oil and drain on paper towels.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Poppers
Ingredients:
fresh jalapeno peppers
Monterey Jack cheese, shredded
1/2 c. milk
1 egg
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
oil
Directions:
Slice open one side of pepper.
Clean out seeds, depending on taste.
Fill with cheese.
Mix milk, egg, flour and salt.
Beat into batter.
Heat oil.
Dip into batter.
Deep fry.
Drain on paper towel.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Doris' Jalapeno Pepper Poppers
Ingredients:
10 medium fresh jalapeno peppers
4 oz. cream cheese, softened
10 bacon strips, halved
Directions:
Cut peppers in half; remove seeds. Stuff with 2 tablespoons of cream cheese. Wrap with slice of bacon and secure with toothpick. Place on broiler rack that has been coated with nonstick spray. Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes or until bacon is crisp.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Jalapeno Appetizer
Ingredients:
1 small can jalapeno peppers, chopped and rinsed
1 1/2 lb. grated medium sharp Cheddar cheese
1 1/2 lb. Monterey Jack cheese
5 well-beaten eggs
Directions:
Put grated cheese in buttered 9 x 13-inch pan.
Pour peppers on top.
Pour beaten eggs over entire pan.
Bake at 300° for 45 minutes.
Serve warm or cold.

question: How do I make cheesy jalapeño poppers?
answer:
Title: Jalapeno Popcorn
Ingredients:
peppers
oil or butter
Directions:
Chop and slice peppers. Place in oil or butter in bottom of popcorn popper. Place kernels in. Pop corn.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, coarsely chopped
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
2 medium firm red tomatoes (3/4 lb.)
2 medium zucchini (3/4 lb.)
1/4 tsp. basil (fresh if available)
1/4 tsp. oregano (fresh if available)
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. Italian bread crumbs
1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1/4 tsp. paprika (optional)
cooked pasta or rice
Directions:
In heavy skillet (with metal handle) heat oil.
Add onion and saute until golden.
Add garlic and cook until slightly brown. Stir in tomatoes.
Cook, stirring occasionally, for 2 minutes.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
1/2 c. grated parmesan cheese
6 medium zucchini, sliced
2/3 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 large clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. each of salt, pepper, oregano and rosemary
4 c. peeled tomatoes
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Heat oil in a skillet and add zucchini, onion, parsley and the spices.
Saute mixture over medium heat, stirring often until zucchini is done but still crisp and tender.
Toss in chopped tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes.
Turn mixture into a serving dish and sprinkle with the parmesan cheese.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
4 c. thinly sliced zucchini squash
1 large onion, thinly sliced
1 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Put first 6 ingredients into skillet.
Cover and cook 1 minute. Uncover and cook, turning with spatula, until barely tender (about 5 minutes).
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Toss.
Put in serving bowl.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
6 medium zucchini
1 onion, sliced thin
1 c. sliced celery
3 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute zucchini, celery and onion in skillet until onion is clear.
Season and simmer 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle cheese on, stir and serve.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I make with zucchini and parmesan?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Parmesan
Ingredients:
4 to 5 small zucchini squash, sliced thin
2 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
flour
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Mix small amount of flour, salt and pepper.
Roll zucchini slices in flour mixture.
Brown lightly on one side.
Turn and brown the other side.
Sprinkle with cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained (or you can use 1 can spinach, drained)
1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing or Miracle Whip Light
1 c. sour cream
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/4 c. green onion slices
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
Directions:
Combine ingredients; mix well. Chill and serve with assorted vegetable dippers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
8 oz. sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. dill weed
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1/4 c. chopped green onions
3 c. frozen cut leaf spinach, thawed and drained
8 oz. can water chestnuts, drained and finely chopped
3 Tbsp. chopped red pepper
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Mix well.
Stir in onions, spinach, water chestnuts and red pepper.
Cover and refrigerate until flavor blends.
Serve with vegetables or assorted crackers.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Creamy Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 C. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 C. sour cream
1/2 C. cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 tsp. lemon juice
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Chill for two hours. Return to room temperature before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 pt. sour cream
1 c. mayonnaise
1 pkg. vegetable soup mix
1 pkg. frozen spinach, thawed, drained and chopped
1 can water chestnuts, chopped
green onions (if desired)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate.
Very good dip!

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy spinach dip?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
1 pkg. frozen spinach, thawed and drained
1 (16 oz.) container sour cream
2 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. chopped green onion
1 tsp. dill weed
1 tsp. Salad Supreme
Directions:
Put all ingredients in blender.
Blend until smooth.
Chill 2 to 3 hours.
Serve with crackers.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3 to 4 green apples, peeled and sliced to make 6 c.
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. white sugar
3/4 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix together 1 1/2 cups flour, oats, brown sugar, cinnamon and melted butter.
Press 1/2 of mixture in bottom of a 9 x 12-inch greased baking dish.
In a large bowl, combine sliced apples with 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon sugar.
Turn into crust. Sprinkle with remaining half of mixture.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour. Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream, if desired.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
4 c. sliced apples
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. oatmeal
1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. butter or margarine
Directions:
Mix first 3 ingredients and put in 8-inch square pan.
Blend and spread last four ingredients; pour over the apple mixture. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Butter Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine (soft)
1 c. firmly packed brown sugar
1 egg
3/4 c. buttermilk
2 tsp. soda
2 c. plain flour
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. cloves
1 tsp. allspice
1 c. apple butter
1/2 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Cream butter and sugar and add egg; beat well.
Combine milk and soda.
Combine flour and spices.
Add to cream mixture, alternating with buttermilk mixture, beginning and ending with flour.
Stir in apple butter and nuts.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted flour
1 c. sugar
1/3 c. peanut butter
1/4 c. margarine
10 cooking apples
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. grated orange rind
4 Tbsp. orange juice
4 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Measure flour and 1 cup of sugar into mixing bowl.
Cut in margarine and peanut butter until crumbs resemble coarse meal. Pare and slice apples.
Arrange in 2-quart casserole or shallow baking dish.
Sprinkle with the remaining sugar, orange rind, orange juice and water.
Cover with crumb mixture.
Bake at 350° until apples are tender, about 45 minutes.
Serve warm, topped with ice cream.
Makes 10 servings.

question: How do I make a simple apple crumble?
answer:
Title: Apple Crumble
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 c. sifted flour
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/3 c. chopped peanuts
6 medium apples
Directions:
Sift flour with sugar, salt and nutmeg.
Cut in peanut butter and butter until mixture is crumbly; add peanuts.
Peel apples; slice thin and place in well-greased baking dish (10 x 7 x 2-inch).
Sprinkle peanut butter mixture evenly over top of apples.
Bake 40 minutes at 350°, then increase temperature to 425° and bake 10 minutes longer or until browned.
Serve warm with ice cream.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: 6-Cup Salad("Quik-N-Ez")
Ingredients:
1 c. pineapple tidbits
1 c. mandarin oranges
1 c. shredded coconut
1 c. fruit cocktail
1 c. mini marshmallows
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Mix well.
Chill as long as possible or overnight.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Inez'S Quik-N-Easy Salad
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
1 bunch broccoli
1 green pepper
1 red onion
2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. vinegar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 bottle Ranch Dressing
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and let set over night.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Three Greens Salad
Ingredients:
3 1/2 c. uncooked pasta
4 c. trimmed arugula
2 c. thinly sliced radicchio
2 medium heads Belgian endive, quartered
1 (19 oz.) can chickpeas
6 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1/4 c. low-salt chicken broth
2 Tbsp. virgin olive oil
1/4 c. finely chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
2 oz. shaved Parmigiano Reggiano cheese
Directions:
Combine first 5 ingredients in a large bowl; toss well. Combine vinegar, broth and oil; stir well with a whisk. Pour over pasta mixture; toss gently to coat. Sprinkle with parsley and cheese. Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. fresh spinach leaves (about 10 c.)
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 medium tomato, cut into wedges
1/3 c. seasoned croutons
1/4 c. chopped red onion
4 slices bacon, crisp cooked and crumbled
1/2 c. Wish-Bone Classic Dijon vinaigrette dressing
1 hard-cooked egg, sliced
Directions:
In large salad bowl, combine spinach, mushrooms, tomato, croutons, red onion and bacon.
Add dressing and toss gently. Garnish with egg.
Makes about 6 side dish servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a quinoa salad?
answer:
Title: Confetti Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. (8 oz. each) macaroni (shell or twirls), uncooked
1/4 c. Italian dressing or 3/4 c. mayonnaise salad dressing
1/2 c. carrots, thinly sliced
1 c. fresh, raw cauliflower, chopped
1/4 c. celery, finely chopped
1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped
1/4 c. radishes, thinly sliced
1 c. cherry tomatoes, halved
parsley (optional)
salt to taste
pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook macaroni according to package directions; drain well. Cool; rinse with cold water to cool quickly.
Combine Italian dressing, mayonnaise, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Blend well. Add cooled macaroni, cauliflower, celery, green pepper, radishes, carrots, tomatoes and parsley to the mayonnaise mixture.
Toss lightly until pasta and vegetables are evenly coated.
Chill for 8 to 10 hours to enjoy.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Chili Seasoning Mix
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. instant minced onion
1 1/2 tsp. chili powder
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. crushed dried red pepper
1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a small bowl until evenly distributed.
Spoon mixture onto a 6-inch square of aluminum foil to make airtight.
Label.
Store in a cool, dry place.
Use within 6 months.
Makes 1 package (about 1/4 cup) of chili seasoning mix.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Spicy Mix
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. chili powder
2 tsp. ground coriander
2 tsp. cumin
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Combine all and store in airtight container.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Chili Mix
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. minced onion
1 1/2 tsp. chili powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. red pepper
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
Add mix to one pound of hamburger while browning.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Chili
Ingredients:
2 onions, chopped and sauteed
2 lb. ground round, browned
1 tsp. salt
1 large can tomatoes (add to meat)
1/2 oz. chili powder
1 Tbsp. cumin powder
Directions:
Cook 1 hour.
Add 2 cans of kidney beans; mash 1 of them. Cook another hour.
Real good.

question: What’s a good recipe for a taco seasoning mix?
answer:
Title: Mexican Spice Mix
Ingredients:
5 tsp. cumin
5 tsp. chili powder
2 1/2 tsp. black pepper
2 1/2 tsp. salt
5 Tbsp. minced dried onions
5 Tbsp. minced dried garlic
Directions:
Combine spices; store in covered shaker bottle.
Use 3 tablespoons of mixture for every cup of dry beans or soup.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
1 1/2 c. chopped peanuts
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1 beaten egg
2 tsp. vanilla, divided
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
2 eggs
1/3 c. sugar
2 c. creamy peanut butter
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, half the chopped peanuts and margarine until crumbly.
Stir in the beaten eggs and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Mix well.
Press into bottom of 15 x 10-inch jelly roll pan and bake at 350° for 15 minutes.
Beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in condensed milk, 2 remaining eggs, sugar and peanut butter. Add remaining teaspoon of vanilla and mix until smooth.
Pour over prepared crust and sprinkle the remaining peanuts on top.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes until set.
Cool and cut into bars.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheesecake
Ingredients:
25 Oreo cookies
1/4 c. margarine
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1/2 c. peanut butter
4 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sugar
1 pt. whipping cream, whipped with 2 Tbsp. sugar
Hershey's chocolate syrup
Cool Whip
Directions:
Crush cookies and blend with margarine.
Press firmly on bottom of a 9-inch spring-form pan. Chill.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Cheese Cake
Ingredients:
1 Jell-O instant cheesecake mix
1 c. peanut butter
Directions:
Follow directions for instant cheesecake, adding the peanut butter to filling mix. Chill and cut into small squares. Very rich, but heavenly taste.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: The Best Cheesecake
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
1 1/4 c. flour
1/4 c. sugar
3 egg yolks
grated peel of 2 small lemons
5 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
5 eggs
1/4 c. milk
1 3/4 c. sugar
3 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
In small bowl with mixer at low speed, beat butter or margarine, flour, 1/4 cup sugar, 1 egg yolk and 1/2 of grated peel until well mixed; shape into ball; wrap; chill 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for a peanut butter cheesecake?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Candycakes
Ingredients:
4 large eggs (room temperature)
2 c. sugar
1 c. milk
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
2 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
pinch of salt
1 c. creamy peanut butter
1 (8 oz.) milk chocolate Hershey bar, melted
Directions:
Beat eggs with electric mixer until thick and lemon colored. Gradually add sugar, milk and vanilla.
Stir together the flour, baking powder and salt.
Blend these ingredients into egg mixture. Pour batter into a jelly roll pan (10 x 15-inch) sprayed with Pam or Baker's Joy.
Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes, or until cake tester comes out clean.
While cake is still hot, spread peanut butter evenly over top of cake.
Let cool thoroughly, then spread melted Hershey bar over peanut butter.
Refrigerate until firm.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Creme Bisque
Ingredients:
1 can bisque of tomato
1/3 c. sour cream
1 c. water
Directions:
In saucepan, blend soup and sour cream.
Gradually stir in water.
Heat and stir.
Makes 2 to 3 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion
1 clove garlic, minced
5 large ripe red tomatoes
1 Tbsp. fresh basil, chopped
1/4 tsp. mustard powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper, ground
1/4 c. tomato paste
1/4 c. flour
2 c. chicken broth
4 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 c. light cream
Directions:
In a deep saucepan, melt butter.
Saute onion and garlic until golden.
Slice tomatoes and add with dry mustard, salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, 8 to 10 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste.
(If tomatoes are not full flavored, you may wish to add more paste.) Add flour and chicken broth, then bring to a boil, stirring constantly.
Puree in a blender, then strain to remove seeds and skins.
Add 1 to 2 cups light cream.
Reheat to serve, but do not boil.
Add sherry to taste.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
2 lb. ripe tomatoes or 2 (15 oz.) cans tomatoes, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. butter
1 bay leaf
1 heaping tsp. brown sugar
2 tsp. basil, finely chopped
2 whole cloves
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 pt. light cream
1 c. milk
6 large croutons, buttered
2 Tbsp. chives, chopped
Directions:
Peel and seed tomatoes.
Saute onion in butter and add the chopped tomatoes, bay leaf, sugar, cloves, salt, pepper and basil. Simmer, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes are thoroughly cooked, about 25 minutes.
Remove bay leaf and cloves and transfer soup to blender or food processor to puree.
Add cream and milk and heat.
Serve topped with toasted buttered croutons.
Sprinkle with chives.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
1 can tomato soup
1 can tomatoes
1 can milk
Directions:
Mix, heat and eat.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato bisque?
answer:
Title: Tomato Bisque
Ingredients:
1 - 14 ounce can tomato sauce
1 - 14 ounce can stewed tomatoes
1 small onion chopped
1/3 cup cooked, crumbled bacon
1 tablespoon sugar
3 bay leaves
1 tablespoon granulated garlic
2 chicken bouillon cubes
1 cup V - 8 juice
salt and black pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, onion, bacon crumbles, sugar, bay leaves, garlic, chicken bouillon, V - 8 juice, salt and pepper in a large sauce pan. Mix well.
Simmer 1 hour.
Serve hot with homemade croutons.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. light brown sugar
1 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 inch piece grated ginger (or 2 tsp. powdered ginger)
1/3 tsp. sesame oil
1 to 2 Tbsp. cornstarch (depending on desired thickness)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, heat and serve.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. salad oil
1 Tbsp. ground ginger
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
2 cloves garlic, minced
Directions:
Mix together.
Let stand for 2 hours at room temperature before using.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/3 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. sugar
1 clove garlic, minced or mashed
2 tsp. fresh ginger, minced (or 1/2 tsp. ground ginger)
1/4 c. dry white wine (optional)
2 c. regular-strength beef broth (or 2 1/4 c., if wine is omitted)
Directions:
In a pan, blend together the cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar, garlic and fresh or ground ginger. Stir in wine, if used, and the beef broth. Cook, stirring until thickened. Makes about 2 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sherry
1 Tbsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. Accent
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 or 2 cloves garlic, sliced
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.

question: How do I make a simple teriyaki sauce?
answer:
Title: Teriyaki Sauce
Ingredients:
2/3 c. soy sauce
5 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/8 c. water
1 al garlic powder
1/2 tsp. ginger
1 clove garlic, chopped
Directions:
Double for 1 chicken.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free One Layer Yellow Cake
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. self-rising flour
1/2 c. fructose sweetener
1/3 c. shortening
1 egg
3/4 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 boxes sugar-free instant vanilla pudding
3 c. milk
3 bananas, sliced
1 regular size can crushed pineapple (in its own juice)
Cool Whip
nuts
1 box vanilla sugar-free pudding
Chocolate Sauce
sliced almonds
Directions:
Mix sugar-free pudding according to directions.
Let set. Spoon all of pudding between the 2 layers of cake.
Top with Chocolate Sauce and sliced almonds.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar-Free Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. raisins
2 beaten eggs
1 c. unsweetened applesauce
3 Tbsp. liquid sweetener
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. chopped nuts
2 c. flour
3 c. water
3/4 c. oil
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Combine and cook raisins and water until water is absorbed. Cool; combine eggs, applesauce, oil, vanilla and sweetener.
Sift flour, soda, salt and spices.
Add to egg mixture.
Add raisins and nuts.
Pour into greased and floured Bundt or tube pan.
Bake at 350° for one hour.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: No Sugar Cookies(For Diabetics)
Ingredients:
3/4 c. oleo
1 egg, well beaten
1/2 c. raisins
3/4 c. oatmeal, toasted
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. nuts
3 tsp. Sucaryl
1 1/2 c. flour, sifted
2 bananas, mashed
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Pour 1/2 cup boiling water over raisins.
Let stand. Thoroughly cream butter, Sucaryl and beaten egg.
Sift dry ingredients and add to butter mixture; add raisins, vanilla, toasted oatmeal and nuts.
Drop by teaspoonful on baking sheet. Cook 15 minutes at 400°.
Makes 4 dozen.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar Free Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. water
2 1/4 c. raisins (seedless)
1 1/3 c. unsweetened applesauce
3 eggs
1 Tbsp. Sweet 'N Low or Equal
3/4 c. oil
2 1/2 c. self-rising flour
3/4 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
1 Tbsp. vanilla flavoring
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Place water and raisins in saucepan and cook until water has evaporated.
Cool 10 minutes.
Add applesauce, eggs, Sweet 'N Low and oil.
Blend well and add flour, soda, cinnamon and vanilla.
Pour into greased and floured tube pan.
Bake 35 to 40 minutes.

question: Can you suggest a sugar-free dessert recipe?
answer:
Title: Sugar Pudding
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 3/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. margarine
2 c. flour
1 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla or lemon flavoring
Directions:
Beat eggs.
Add sugar and blend.
Alternate adding flour and milk, blending after each addition.
Add flavoring and softened margarine.
Mix well.
Pour into 9 x 13-inch greased dish or pan. Bake at 400° until done.
Delicious cut in squares and served warm.
For variety, add your favorite topping or frosting.
My family always like sweetened canned blackberries that we all picked and I canned.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal-Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. regular oats, uncooked
1 c. margarine, softened
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 (12 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate morsels
1 c. firmly packed brown sugar
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. chopped pecans
3 (1.5 oz.) milk chocolate bars, grated
Directions:
Place oats in container of electric blender or food processor; process until finely ground; set aside.
Beat butter in a large bowl at medium speed of an electric mixer; gradually add sugars, beating well.
Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well.
Combine ground oats, flour, soda, baking powder and salt; gradually add to creamed mixture, mixing well.
Stir in chocolate morsels, grated chocolate and pecans.
Drop dough by level tablespoonfuls onto greased cookie sheets.
Bake at 375° for 8 to 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool slightly.
Remove to wire rack and cool completely.
Yields 7 dozen.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. white sugar
1 c. butter (or 1/2 butter, 1/2 oleo)
2 eggs
1 c. flour
2 c. oatmeal
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. chocolate chips
1 c. peanut butter
Directions:
Beat eggs in large bowl.
Add brown sugar, white sugar and vanilla.
Add butter (melted).
Mix well.
Add peanut butter and mix well.
Sift together flour, salt and soda, then add this mixture to preceding mixture.
Add (slowly) oatmeal, mixing well. Add chocolate chips; mix well.
Form balls in hands, about walnut size.
Place on cookie sheet so can spread.
Bake about 10 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip-Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 c. margarine
1 1/2 c. brown sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. oatmeal (rolled oats)
1 c. chocolate chips
Directions:
In large mixing bowl, soften margarine.
Cream together margarine and sugar.
Add eggs and vanilla; stir well.
Blend flour, soda and salt; add to sugar mixture.
Stir well.
Add oatmeal and chips.
Drop by spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 350°.
Makes 2 to 2 1/2 dozen.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Oat-Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. granulated sugar
1/3 c. brown sugar
1 stick oleo
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. oatmeal (quick or regular)
1 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips or 1 c. raisins
Directions:
Cream sugars with softened butter (oleo).
Add egg and vanilla.
Beat.
Mix in dry ingredients.
Stir in chocolate chips or raisins.
Drop by spoonful on ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake in a 350° oven until lightly browned, about 10 minutes.

question: How do I make chocolate chip oatmeal cookies?
answer:
Title: Yummy Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. butter
3/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
3/4 c. granulated sugar
2 large eggs
1 1/2 tsp. pure vanilla extract
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
2 c. quick cooking oats (not instant)
1 bag pure semi-sweet jumbo chocolate chips
1 c. chopped pecans or walnuts (optional)
Directions:
Cream together the butter and sugars.
Add eggs and vanilla; blend thoroughly.
In a separate bowl, sift together the flour, baking soda and salt.
Add to creamed mixture; blend thoroughly. Add oats, chocolate chips and nuts; mix well.
Drop by tablespoon onto buttered baking sheet(s).
Bake in preheated 375° oven for 8 to 10 minutes, or until evenly browned.
Let cool on wire rack. Makes about 36 fantastic chocolate chip cookies.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. dark rum
1/4 c. milk
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground allspice
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. shredded coconut
16 medium-sized shrimp, peeled and deveined
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
In medium-sized bowl, mix eggs, 1 cup flour, rum, milk, baking powder and spices.
Place remaining flour in small bowl.
Spread coconut on small plate.
Dredge shrimp in flour, then dunk it in the batter, then dredge it in coconut.
Place coated shrimp on waxed paper.
Carefully drop shrimp in hot oil and fry 3 to 5 minutes.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Coconut Milk
Ingredients:
1 c. shredded unsweetened coconut
3 c. distilled water
1 tsp. honey (raw)
pinch of salt
Directions:
Blend until very smooth.
Strain well or use on cereal unstrained.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. large raw shrimp
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. white pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. ice water
oil for deep frying
2 c. short, shredded coconut
1/2 c. orange marmalade
1/4 c. Grey Poupon country mustard
1/4 c. honey
3 to 4 drops Tabasco
Directions:
Peel, devein and wash shrimp.
Dry well on paper towels.
Set aside.
In a bowl, mix all dry ingredients for batter.
Add 2 tablespoons oil and ice water.
Stir to blend.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Shrimp Curry With Coconut Milk
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 large onion, finely chopped
1 cardamom pod, crushed
1-inch piece cinnamon stick
4 cloves
salt to taste
4 whole black peppercorns
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped ginger
1 1/2 tsp. finely chopped garlic
4 c. large peeled shrimp
2 c. coconut milk*
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan.
Add onion and brown.
Add all the spices and saute for 2 minutes.
Add shrimp and saute 1/2 minute. Add coconut milk (strained) and 1/4 cup shredded coconut that is leftover after straining.
Cover and cook on medium heat until the gravy thickens.
Serve over plain rice or polao.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and coconut milk?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp, shelled and deveined
oil
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 egg
2 Tbsp. cream of coconut or whipping cream
3/4 c. flaked coconut
1/3 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Slit shrimp along curved side, cutting almost through.
Place on paper towel. Heat 2-inches of oil in a saucepan to 350°. Combine flour, salt and dry mustard in small bowl.
Beat egg and cream of coconut in small bowl.
In third bowl, combine coconut and bread crumbs.
Dip shrimp in flour mixture, then egg mixture, then coconut mixture.
Refrigerate until ready to cook.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
canola oil
1 lb. lean ground raw turkey
1 c. chopped celery
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz.) can V-8 juice
1 (16 oz.) can red kidney beans, drained
1 bay leaf
2 Tbsp. dried minced onion
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. instant beef bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
1/2 to 1 c. beer (optional)
Directions:
Spray cold pan with canola oil.
Cook turkey and celery.
Use a meat fork to break turkey into pieces.
Cook until no longer pink.
Stir in remaining ingredients, tomatoes, juice, sauce, beans, spices and beef, if desired.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer at least 30 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Discard bay leaf.
Serves 4.
Can be doubled easily.
(Serving has 4 grams of fat and 380 calories.)

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey-Vegetable Chili
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive oil
15 oz. ground turkey
1 1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped bell pepper
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
2 c. coarsely chopped tomatoes with juice
1/4 c. raisins
2 Tbsp. no-salt-added tomato paste
2 Tbsp. drained, canned, diced mild green chilies
1/4 tsp. salt
4 oz. rinsed, drained, canned kidney beans
1 c. frozen corn kernels
Directions:
Warm 2 teaspoons oil until hot, but not smoking.
Add the turkey and brown.
Put turkey aside and drain.
Add remaining 2 teaspoons oil to pan and saute onions and bell pepper until golden (3 to 5 minutes).
Stir in chili powder, garlic and cumin.
Cook, stirring, for 1/2 to 1 minute.
Add the next 5 ingredients.
Add turkey and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the kidney beans and corn.
Cook about 5 minutes until last ingredients are heated through.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey And White Bean Chili
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground turkey
1 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. chili powder
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
3 cloves garlic, chopped
4 oz. can chopped green chilies, drained
1 c. chopped red bell pepper
15 oz. can Great Northern beans, drained
3/4 c. fat-free sour cream
3/4 c. salsa
1/2 c. fat-free shredded Cheddar
Directions:
Cook turkey, onion and 3/4 cup of the broth in a 3-quart pan over medium heat for 5 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Stir in remaining broth, cumin, oregano, chili powder, red pepper, garlic and green chilies.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes. Stir in bell pepper and beans.
Cook uncovered over low heat, 20 to 30 minutes.
Serve chili topped with sour cream, salsa and cheese.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground turkey
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
3/4 c. kidney beans, cooked
3 medium tomatoes, peeled and chopped
1 (16 oz.) can no-salt tomato paste
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 clove minced garlic
1 c. water
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
Directions:
In a large, heavy pot, brown turkey; pour off any excess fat. Add onions, green pepper and garlic; cook 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add beans, water, tomatoes, tomato paste, chili powder, oregano, cumin and red pepper.
Cover; simmer for 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally.
Serve with cornbread.

question: What can I make with bell peppers and ground turkey?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. ground white turkey meat
2 c. chopped onion
1 green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
2 Tbsp. crushed red pepper flakes
3 Tbsp. chili powder
2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
2 (16 oz.) cans tomatoes, chopped (undrained)
1 (8 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (12 oz.) can corn
2 tsp. salt
2 (16 oz.) cans red kidney beans (undrained)
Directions:
Brown turkey with onion, green pepper, chili powder and garlic.
Drain off any grease.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini, sliced paper thin
1 c. flour
2 eggs, beaten
salt, pepper and oregano to taste
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. grated cheese
1 c. oil
Directions:
Put together zucchini, flour, eggs, salt, pepper, oregano, garlic, water and cheese.
Mix well.
Heat the oil.
When hot, drop batter by tablespoons into the oil and fry until golden brown. Drain on paper towels!

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
2 c. Zucchini Squash, grated
1 small Onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. Sugar
1 Tbsp. Salt
6 Tbsp. Flour
2 Eggs
2 Tbsp. Margarine, melted
Directions:
Combine all ingredients with a spoon and drop by spoonsful on a hot griddle with melted margarine.
Cook until brown on one side, turn.
Serve immediately while they are hot.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. shredded zucchini
1/4 c. flour
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
2 tsp. salad dressing
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. oregano
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all ingredients into a batter and fry in hot cooking oil until golden brown.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
1 lb. zucchini, grated
1 small onion, chopped fine
1/2 c. grated carrot
1 1/2 c. Bisquick
1 egg
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. parsley
Directions:
Combine in one bowl.
Drop by teaspoonful into hot vegetable oil and fry like pancakes until golden brown.

question: How do I make zucchini fritters?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Fritters
Ingredients:
3 large eggs
1/4 c. all-purpose flour, unsifted
2 Tbsp. grated onion
1 medium green zucchini, shredded
1 medium yellow squash, shredded
