1 large carrot, pared and shredded
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. oil
Directions:
In large bowl, beat eggs, flour, onions, salt and pepper.
Stir in vegetables.
In large skillet, heat 1/4 cup oil.
Drop batter by tablespoons into hot oil.
Cook about 1 minute on each side or until golden brown.
Drain on paper towel.
Serve hot with Red Pepper Mayonnaise.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Greek Moussaka With Eggplant
Ingredients:
1 lb. finely chopped onion
1 lb. chopped beef
1 1/2 lb. sliced eggplant
1 lb. fresh tomatoes, peeled and sliced
1 lb. sliced potatoes
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper
butter and vegetable oil, mixed
Directions:
Saute the onion until soft. Add meat and tomatoes; cook 5 minutes. Season to taste and remove from heat. Add eggs, cheese and parsley. Saute the potatoes and eggplant in oil and butter until soft.
In a buttered, flat casserole, put a layer of eggplant, a layer of potatoes and a layer of meat and tomato mixture.
Repeat layers. Cover with bechamel (white sauce).
Place in preheated 325° oven and bake 20 minutes.
Serves 10.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Moussaka(A Greek Specialty)
Ingredients:
2 large eggplants, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch slices
1/4 c. cooking oil
2 lb. ground lamb or ground beef
1 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
3/4 c. dry red wine
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1/4 tsp. dried oregano, crushed
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 beaten egg
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
2 c. milk
3 beaten eggs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
ground cinnamon
Directions:
Brush both sides of eggplant slices with the oil; sprinkle with salt.
In large skillet, brown eggplant slices about 1 1/2 minutes on each side.
Drain and set aside.
In same skillet, cook lamb or beef, onion and garlic until meat is brown and onion is tender; drain off excess fat.
Stir in tomato sauce, wine, parsley, oregano, the 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon and 1 teaspoon salt.
Simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes.
Gradually stir mixture into the 1 beaten egg.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Easy Moussaka
Ingredients:
3 medium size eggplants
1 c. butter or margarine
3 large onions
2 lb. ground lamb (true Moussaka) or beef
3 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. dry red wine
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
salt to taste
freshly ground pepper to taste
6 Tbsp. flour
1 qt. milk
4 eggs, beaten until frothy
nutmeg to taste
2 c. Ricotta cheese
1 c. packaged fine bread crumbs
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplants; slice 1/2-inch thick.
Brown slices quickly in large, heavy skillet in 4 tablespoons butter (more as needed). Set aside.
Heat 4 tablespoons butter in same skillet.
Cook onions until lightly browned.
Add ground meat; cook for 10 minutes.
Combine tomato paste with wine, parsley, cinnamon, salt and pepper; stir into meat.
Simmer, stirring frequently, until all liquid has been absorbed.
Remove from heat.

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Moussaka #2
Ingredients:
3 eggplant
3 eggs, separated
1/2 c. olive oil
salt and pepper
1/2 tsp. thyme
2 onions, chopped fine
2 small cans tomato paste
1 1/2 lb. ground meat
1 stick butter
1 c. milk
3 Tbsp. dried parsley
1 lb. coarsely grated Swiss cheese
grated Parmesan cheese
Progresso bread crumbs
Directions:
Slice the eggplant, rind and all, 1/4 inch thick.
Salt thoroughly each slice and set aside in large bowl for 20 minutes (this is to remove the poison).

question: How do I make a traditional Greek moussaka?
answer:
Title: Greek Moussaka
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, chopped
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. ground beef
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1/2 c. water
1/2 c. red wine
1/4 c. chopped parsley
salt and pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. soft bread crumbs
2 large eggplants
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. flour
2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onions in 2 tablespoons oil; add meat and brown.	Pour off fat.
Spoon in tomato paste.
Add water, wine, parsley, salt, pepper and paprika. Cook, covered, for 10 minutes.	Stir in 1/4 cup bread crumbs and mix well.
Slice eggplant, unpeeled, lengthwise and thinly; fry in heated oil until tender and golden. Add oil as required.
Line bottom and sides of 2 quart casserole dish; spread with layers of meat.
Alternate eggplant and meat. Finish with eggplant on top.
Melt 1/2 cup butter and stir in flour.
Slowly add milk, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened.	Season with salt and pepper.
Cool; add eggs and mix well.
Carefully pour into dish to cover the top and to penetrate lower layers. Sprinkle with cheese and remaining 1/4 cup crumbs. Dot with 1 tablespoon butter.
Bake in moderate oven at 350° for 1/2 hour. Cool slightly. Serve 6.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
4 medium squash
2/3 c. brown sugar
2/3 c. white sugar
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
4 tsp. lemon juice
5 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cut potatoes for frying (about 6 good ones).
Coat with 1 heaping
tablespoonful of flour.
Fry in deep oil.
Salt to taste.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked butternut squash
1/2 stick margarine
1 c. sugar
2 beaten eggs
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
raisins, nuts, coconut
Directions:
Mix all together and pour into greased baking dish.
Melt 1/2 stick margarine and drizzle over casserole.
Add topping.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 c. melted margarine
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/3 c. water (from cooking squash)
1 c. cooked squash
1/2 c. raisins or mixed fruit
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
Beat shortening, eggs, water and squash. Combine with dry ingredients until dry mix is moist. Pour into greased and floured pan.
Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 eggs
2 c. plain flour
2 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
8 oz. crushed pineapple (undrained)
2 c. grated butternut squash
1 c. walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. Beat eggs. Add to spice mixture. Mix dry ingredients together. Slowly add to spice mixture. Beat 5 minutes. Add pineapple, squash and nuts. Fold in. Pour in large, greased tube pan. Bake at 300° for 55 minutes. Cool. Frost with Buttercream Frosting or your favorite frosting.

question: How do I make roasted butternut squash?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
2 lb. butternut squash
3/4 c. sugar
1 stick margarine
1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. flour
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. vanilla
nutmeg
Directions:
Peel squash; remove seeds.
Place squash in pot and cover with water.
Cook, covered with lid, until tender.
Drain and mash. Add other ingredients.
Stir well; pour into baking dish.
Bake at 350° until firm.
Serves approximately 8.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. nonfat cottage cheese
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. butter flavored granules
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/2 tsp. chicken flavored bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
dash of ground red pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in container of an electric blender. Process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides.
Pour into a small saucepan. Cook sauce over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Yields 2 3/4 cups.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Sauce Alfredo(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter, softened
1 c. heavy cream (whipping)
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
2 egg yolks
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
In a heavy saucepan, heat the butter and cream almost to a simmer.
Do not let it bubble.
Remove from heat and pour over cooked and drained pasta of your choice.
Toss with cheese, egg yolks, salt and pepper and nutmeg.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Light And Easy Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. nonfat cottage cheese
3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. butter flavored granules
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/2 tsp. chicken flavored bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. red pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in container of an electric blender; process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides.
Pour into a small saucepan.
Cook sauce over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Yields 2 1/2 cups.
Contains 86 calories, 0.8 g fat and 0.5 g saturated fat per 3 1/2-ounce serving.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter
1 pt. heavy cream
1 pt. milk
1 c. Romano or Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. minced garlic
1 1/2 tsp. basil
1 tsp. chicken base
3/4 tsp. white pepper
cornstarch (to thicken)
Directions:
Melt butter.
Bring cream and milk to a boil in a large pan. Mix rest of ingredients except cornstarch together and add to boiling mixture.
Mix with whisk.
Burns easy.
Thicken with cornstarch.
Serve over hot fettucine.

question: How do I make a creamy Alfredo sauce without cream?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2/3 c. sour cream
1/4 lb. butter
1 egg yolk
Directions:
Beat egg yolk lightly; add yolk to sour cream.
Melt butter on top of stove in a saucepan.
Add sour cream mixture to melted butter.
Add Parmesan cheese and heat thoroughly.
Do not burn. Pour mixture over cooked pasta.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. flour
1/2 c. dark rum
1/4 c. milk
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. ground cloves
1/4 tsp. ground allspice
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. shredded coconut
16 medium-sized shrimp, peeled and deveined
vegetable oil for frying
Directions:
In medium-sized bowl, mix eggs, 1 cup flour, rum, milk, baking powder and spices.
Place remaining flour in small bowl.
Spread coconut on small plate.
Dredge shrimp in flour, then dunk it in the batter, then dredge it in coconut.
Place coated shrimp on waxed paper.
Carefully drop shrimp in hot oil and fry 3 to 5 minutes.
Drain on paper towels and serve hot.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. large raw shrimp
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. white pepper
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. ice water
oil for deep frying
2 c. short, shredded coconut
1/2 c. orange marmalade
1/4 c. Grey Poupon country mustard
1/4 c. honey
3 to 4 drops Tabasco
Directions:
Peel, devein and wash shrimp.
Dry well on paper towels.
Set aside.
In a bowl, mix all dry ingredients for batter.
Add 2 tablespoons oil and ice water.
Stir to blend.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp, shelled and deveined
oil
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 egg
2 Tbsp. cream of coconut or whipping cream
3/4 c. flaked coconut
1/3 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Slit shrimp along curved side, cutting almost through.
Place on paper towel. Heat 2-inches of oil in a saucepan to 350°. Combine flour, salt and dry mustard in small bowl.
Beat egg and cream of coconut in small bowl.
In third bowl, combine coconut and bread crumbs.
Dip shrimp in flour mixture, then egg mixture, then coconut mixture.
Refrigerate until ready to cook.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. large shrimp
vegetable oil
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 egg
2 Tbsp. cream of coconut (from a 15 1/2 oz. can) or 2 Tbsp. light cream
3/4 c. flaked coconut or shredded fresh coconut
1/3 c. packaged bread crumbs
Chinese Mustard Sauce
Directions:
Shell and devein shrimp, leaving tails on.
Slit shrimp with sharp knife along curved side, cutting almost through.
Place on paper toweling.
Pour oil into a medium-size saucepan to a depth of 2-inches.
Heat to 350° on deep fat frying thermometer.
While oil is heating, combine flour, salt and dry mustard in one small bowl. Beat egg and cream of coconut in second small bowl.
In third bowl, combine coconut and bread crumbs.

question: What’s a recipe for a crispy coconut shrimp?
answer:
Title: Tropical Coconut Fried Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. raw, peeled, deveined, large shrimp (fresh or frozen)
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. milk
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 to 3 c. shredded coconut
oil for frying
Sweet 'N Sour Sauce
Directions:
Thaw shrimp if frozen.
Measure 1 1/2 cups flour; set aside. In a 1-quart mixing bowl, combine the remaining 1 1/2 cups flour, milk, baking powder, curry powder and salt.
Place reserved flour and coconut in 2 separate shallow pans.
Dredge shrimp in flour, dip in bowl, then roll in coconut.
Fry in hot oil at 350° until coconut is golden brown.
Drain on paper towel before transfering to warming tray.
Serve hot with Sweet and Sour sauce.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.
Tail section may be left on for easier handling.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Shrimp And Avocado Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. wine vinegar
1/3 c. water
1/2 c. lemon juice
1 c. salad oil
1/4 c. chopped parsley
2 cloves garlic, crushed in a garlic press or minced
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. thyme, crushed
1 tsp. oregano, crushed
2 lb. large shrimp, cooked, peeled and deveined
3 small onions, sliced
1/3 c. chopped green pepper
2 ripe avocados, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Note:
To prepare, 20 minutes (allow time for chilling).

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Avocados And Shrimp
Ingredients:
2 lb. shrimp, cooked, shelled and deveined
1 c. salad oil
1 medium red onion, thinly sliced
3/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/2 c. celery, minced
1/4 c. capers, undrained
5 bay leaves
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. celery seed
1 tsp. pepper
3 drops of hot pepper sauce
lime juice
lettuce leaves
Directions:
Toss the
shrimp
with all ingredients, except the last three listed.
Chill
shrimp mixture for 24 hours.
Remove bay leaves and
strain
shrimp
mixture.
Sprinkle
diced avocados with lime juice.
Add avocados to the strained shrimp mixture. Serve on lettuce lined plates.
Serves 8.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Shrimp-Avocado Salad
Ingredients:
1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime Jell-O
1 c. hot water
1/2 c. cold water
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/8 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. diced shrimp (7 oz. can)
1/3 c. celery
1 tsp. chopped onion
1 c. diced avocado
Directions:
Dissolve gelatin in hot water.
Add cold water, vinegar, mayonnaise, salt and pepper.
Blend with rotary beater.
Pour into refrigerator tray.
Quick chill in freezing unit until firm, about 1-inch from edge, but soft in the center, about 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Avocado Crab Or Shrimp Salad
Ingredients:
1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime or lemon jello
1 1/2 c. hot water
3 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 ripe avocado
1 small pkg. cream cheese, softened
3/4 c. chopped celery
1/4 c. green pepper, chopped
1/4 c. pimento
1 tsp. onion juice
1/2 c. mayonnaise
2 hard-boiled eggs
1 can crab or shrimp
Directions:
Mix jello with hot water, vinegar and salt.
Set aside.
When starting to set, beat until foamy.
Mash avocado and mix with softened cream cheese.
Mix celery, green pepper, pimento, onion juice, mayonnaise and eggs; add to foamy jello.
Add avocado mix to jello.
Add crab or shrimp.
Pour into Pyrex dish and refrigerate.

question: What can I cook with shrimp and avocado?
answer:
Title: Baked Avocado
Ingredients:
2 avocados, sliced in half from top to bottom
2 cloves garlic, finely diced
1 tsp. salt
pinch of hot red pepper
pinch of black pepper
pinch of allspice
1 c. cooked shrimp, finely chopped
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. yogurt (plain)
Directions:
Empty all the inside of the avocado halves and put these creamy insides in a bowl.
Combine all the other ingredients and mix well. Preheat the oven to 350°.
Fill the avocado shells with mixture.
Bake avocado for 15 minutes.
May be served hot or cold.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: 6-Cup Salad("Quik-N-Ez")
Ingredients:
1 c. pineapple tidbits
1 c. mandarin oranges
1 c. shredded coconut
1 c. fruit cocktail
1 c. mini marshmallows
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
Mix well.
Chill as long as possible or overnight.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Easy Vegetable Quiche
Ingredients:
2 Pet Ritz deep dish pie shells
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skim milk
1 can condensed cream of mushroom or broccoli soup
5 beaten eggs
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt, herb blend or Mrs. Dash, McCormick parsley blend
1 box chopped broccoli (cooked without water)
1 box cauliflower (cooked without water)
2 large carrots, finely chopped (in food processor)
4 oz. shredded taco cheese (I add 2 tsp. Parmesan, too)
4 oz. chopped pimentos
Directions:
Bake shells at 400° for 6 minutes.
Add milk, soup and eggs; mix well.
Add rest of ingredients and distribute evenly over 2 shells.
Bake 50 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Onion Quiche
Ingredients:
1 (9-inch) pie crust (deep dish frozen is good)
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese (divided in half)
2 1/2 c. fresh broccoli
1 to 1 1/2 c. sherdded Colby cheese (Swiss or Cheddar may also be used)
1/4 to 1/2 c. chopped onion (according to taste)
3/4 to 1 c. half and half
2 to 4 Tbsp. chicken broth or bouillon
1/2 c. sour cream or sour slim if watching weight
1/2 tsp. salt or to taste
4 to 5 eggs
dash of baking powder
dash of pepper or Tabasco (if desired)
Directions:
Prick pie crust and bake 5 minutes at 450°.
Sprinkle with 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese.
alternate layers of broccoli pieces and grated cheese-onion mixture.
Beat eggs and all other remaining ingredients together and pour over broccoli-cheese mixture.
Sprinkle with rest of Parmesan.
Bake at 450° for 10 minutes; reduce heat to 325° and bake 20 minutes more or until set.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Quiche
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. fresh broccoli
1 or 2 tsp. chopped onion
1 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 c. milk
1/2 c. Bisquick mix
3 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Grease a 9-inch pie plate.
Thaw and drain the broccoli and place in the bottom of pie plate. Sprinkle with onion and cheese. Place milk, Bisquick mix, eggs, salt and pepper in a blender. Cover and whirl for 15 seconds or else beat with hand mixer.
Pour into pie plate. Bake in preheated oven at 375° for 20 or 25 minutes.
Let stand 5 minutes before cutting.

question: What’s a recipe for a healthy quinoa bowl?
answer:
Title: Quiche
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. light cream or milk
1 c. shredded Cheddar
1/2 c. diced, cooked ham, turkey or chicken
1/2 c. broccoli or spinach
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 small onion, chopped (optional)
1 (9-inch) prebaked pie crust
ground nutmeg (optional)
Directions:
In large bowl, beat eggs until foamy.
Gradually add soup and cream, mixing well.
Add cheese, meat and vegetables (onion optional) and stir until well mixed.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Curried Chickpeas And Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. soaked chickpeas or canned chickpeas
1 onion, sliced
2 carrots, diced
1 small zucchini, diced
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. coriander (dry ground)
1 tsp. cumin (dry ground)
1 tsp. ground turmeric
2 tsp. salt to taste
1/3 c. fresh coriander leaves
1/2 small chili pepper (optional)
1/3 c. plain yogurt (low-fat)
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to cover until tender, 1/2 to 1 hour.
Saute onion in olive oil.
Add to chickpeas.
Add carrots and zucchini.
Cook on low heat until vegetables are tender.
Add a little water if necessary to keep moist.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander, 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon turmeric.
Add salt, depending on your taste.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Add fresh coriander leaves, chopped fine, and 1/2 small chili if you like it hot and spicy.
Just before serving, stir in yogurt.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Herb Roast Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless skinless chicken breasts
1 tsp. dried rosemary
1 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
1/4 c. chicken stock
1/2 c. low-fat sour cream
1 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
juice of 3 limes
cayenne pepper
Directions:
Mix together the rosemary, sage, thyme, cumin and salt in a bowl. Sprinkle over the chicken breasts and rub in, coating both sides. Broil or grill chicken until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Salad
Ingredients:
2 (19 oz.) cans chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. black olives, chopped or sliced
1/3 c. chopped red onion
1/3 c. chopped parsley
1/4 c. vinegar
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine the first 5 ingredients in a bowl.
In a small jar, shake together the vinegar, salt and pepper. Add the olive oil and shake again.
Pour dressing over chickpea mixture and toss.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
3 eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. milk
Directions:
Mix in order.
Dip slices of bread or biscuit slices into mix. Fry in oil, turning to brown both sides.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
2 slightly beaten eggs
1/2 c. milk
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine eggs, milk and salt.
Dip bread in milk and egg mixture.
Fry in small amount of hot oil.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 Cup milk
1/4 tsp. salt
6 slices thick bread
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract or almond extract
Directions:
For traditional sunny-side up eggs, melt 1 or 2 Tbsp. of butter in a 8- inch non-stick omelet pan or skillet over medium heat. Break open eggs into pan and immediately reduce heat to low.
Cook slowly until the whites are completely set and the yolks begin to thicken, but are not hard.
For ever easy flip over for 15 seconds. Serve immediately.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
3 eggs
3 Tbsp. milk
6 slices bread
Directions:
Beat eggs and milk with fork until well blended. Dip bread slices in egg mixture. Turn and coat evenly. Place in hot skillet. Reduce heat to medium; cook until lightly brown on both sides.

question: How do I make French toast?
answer:
Title: French Toast
Ingredients:
bread
eggs
milk
syrup
Directions:
Take a couple of eggs and crack them.
Then scramble them up with some milk.
Put bread in eggs until covered.
Put on griddle until cooked.
Cut up and pour on syrup, then eat.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. curry powder
2 c. water
2 chicken broth cubes
1 c. uncooked rice
1 c. coconut milk
1/3 c. golden raisins
sliced onions, fried
Directions:
Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Stir in curry powder. Add water and broth cubes and bring to a boil. Add rice, coconut milk and raisins. Stir to blend.
Return to boil and then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Put into a serving dish and garnish with fried onions.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Curry Dip
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. tarragon vinegar
1 tsp. grated onion
1 tsp. horseradish
Directions:
Combine, chill and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/4 c. chopped onions
1/3 c. flour
1 Tbsp. salt
4 c. cooked chicken
1 c. chicken stock
2 c. milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
3 Tbsp. curry powder
Directions:
Fry onions in butter.
Add flour, salt, curry powder and chicken stock.
Stir constantly until mixture is thick.
Add milk, lemon juice and chicken.
Heat well.
(May be made in advance and reheated.)
Serve over rice with chopped bacon or chutney, diced pineapple and coconut.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Curry Dip
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. minced onion
1 tsp. horseradish
1 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Mix well all ingredients.
Great with raw vegetables.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. diced apple, peeled
6 Tbsp. oleo
8 oz. sliced mushrooms
2 c. water chestnuts, sliced
4 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1 tsp. salt
3/4 c. chicken broth
1 c. evaporated milk
Directions:
Saute onion, apple, oleo, mushrooms and water chestnuts until tender.
Add
the remaining ingredients in order (flour, curry powder, sugar, ginger, salt, chicken broth and evaporated milk). Cook
about
15 minutes on medium heat until thickened.
Add 3 cups diced, cooked chicken.
Let set for 24 hours in refrigerator. Heat and serve over hot rice.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
8 c. (2 qt.) tomatoes
1 c. celery
1 large pepper
1 c. onion
1/4 c. parsley
2 sticks butter
4 Tbsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. red food coloring
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Cook tomatoes; strain to remove skin and seeds.
Put celery, pepper, onion and parsley through food processor or blender.
Add to prepared juice.
Cook until boiling, then simmer for 30 minutes or thicken.
Add butter and remaining ingredients.
Continue simmering.
You may want to thicken with a little cornstarch or flour in a paste.
Add to sauce.
Ladle into jars or containers if freezing.
Process 10 minutes at 5 pounds pressure.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
2 gal. tomatoes
6 c. green peppers, diced
2 c. hot peppers, diced
6 c. onions, diced
4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 oz. oregano
5 (12 oz.) cans tomato paste
1 c. cooking oil
1/2 c. salt
1/2 c. sugar, more or less to taste
Directions:
Cook tomatoes, peppers and onions until tender.
Cool and run through blender.
Add remaining ingredients.
Bring to a boil and cook 1 hour.
Put in jars and seal.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
3 (No. 10) cans crushed tomatoes
2 qt. water
1 1/2 c. salad oil
4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. garlic powder
4 Tbsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. basil
Directions:
Put everything in a large pot and beat with wire whisk.
Makes 3 gallons.

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Basic Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
3 c. canned Italian-style plum tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. ground pepper
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 bay leaf
1 c. chopped onions
Directions:
Saute onions in olive oil over medium heat until transparent. Add remaining ingredients (except oregano) and stir.
Simmer, uncovered, for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add oregano and continue cooking for 15 minutes.
Remove bay leaf.
Spread evenly over pizza dough.
(Remember to prick the dough first before applying sauce.)

question: I need a recipe for homemade pizza sauce.
answer:
Title: Pizza Sauce
Ingredients:
19 c. tomatoes
1 green pepper
9 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. chopped onions
1 tsp. minced garlic
3 Tbsp. oregano
3 Tbsp. basil
1 bay leaf
6 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. salt
2 Tbsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chili powder
Directions:
Put tomatoes and green pepper through the blender.
Cook onion in pan with olive oil until tender & add garlic.
In large pot mix in all other ingredients.
Add in 2 (12 oz.) cans tomato paste.
Add in the garlic/olive oil mixture.
Bring to a boil. Turn down & simmer for 30 minutes.	Put into jars, seal & water bath for 40 minutes.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Oven Roasted Garlic Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 lb. red potatoes (3 to 4)
6 large garlic cloves, unpeeled and flattened
2 Tbsp. olive oil (any oil will do)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary or 1 tsp. dried rosemary, crumbled
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Cut potatoes in half lengthwise and then into 3 wedges per half.
Combine all ingredients in bowl; mix well.
Bake in shallow baking pan for 30 to 35 minutes or until potatoes are light brown and tender, turning occasionally.
Serve potatoes hot.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes(Preparation: 10 Minutes. Baking: 25 Minutes.  Servings: 4.)
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large cloves garlic, peeled and chopped
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 lb. small potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place garlic, butter and water in small saucepan; simmer until water evaporates and garlic is tender. Strain butter; mash soft garlic through very fine strainer.
Toss potatoes in garlic butter; place in single layer in large baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes, turning potatoes occasionally, until they are tender and browned.
Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Potatoes With Garlic
Ingredients:
2 lb. small red potatoes, quartered
2 large cloves garlic, sliced thin
1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In a large baking pan, toss potatoes with garlic, oil, salt and pepper.
Roast in a preheated 500° oven, stirring once for 30 minutes.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. small red potatoes
1/4 c. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. kosher salt
1 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°. Cut the potatoes in half or quarters and place in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, pepper and garlic; toss until the potatoes are well coated. Transfer the potatoes to a sheet pan and spread out into one layer. Roast in the oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour or until browned and crisp. Flip twice during cooking with a spatula in order to ensure even browning. Remove from the oven; toss with the parsley. Season to taste and serve hot.

question: How do I make roasted garlic potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 medium raw potatoes, cut in 4 pieces
1/4 c. oil
2 Tbsp. parsley, minced
salt and pepper to taste
2 cloves garlic minced or 1 Tbsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Mix all ingredients together and place in roasting
pan.
Bake
1	hour, stirring occasionally. Slices of bacon may
be
added
on top halfway through baking. Serves 6 people.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
About 2 c. fresh blueberries
1 3/4 c. sugar, divided
3 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. milk
1 c. sifted flour
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
4 pints blueberries
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/3 c. water
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
After cooked and melted, fill a pie crust with blueberry filling.
Sprinkle 1/2 cup of crushed pecans over top of filling. Cut a second pie crust into lattice pieces and place over the top of the pie.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 c. whole wheat pastry flour
1 1/2 t. baking powder
1 pint blueberries
1/3 c. fructose/sucanat
1/4 c. honey
1 t. lemon rind
3/4 c. water
1/4 c. butter
1/3 c. honey
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. skim milk
2 t. vanilla
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
Sift flour and baking powder.
In medium pan bring to a boil blueberries, fructose, 1/4 cup honey, lemon and water.
Cream butter and 1/3 cup honey.
Add egg, milk and vanilla.
Gradually add dry ingredients.
Pour hot blueberries in 1 1/2 quart baking dish.
Spoon flour mixture over the top. Bake 25 minutes.
Serve warm with ice cream.
Serves 12.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
3 c. blueberries, drained
vegetable spray
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 egg, beaten
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
Directions:
Place blueberries in bottom of a 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish, coated with cooking spray.
Sprinkle with lemon juice.
Combine egg, flour and sugar.
Stir until mixture resembles coarse meal. Sprinkle over blueberries.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
3 c. fresh blueberries
2 Tbsp. white sugar
1/3 c. orange juice
2/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 tsp. baking powder
pinch of salt
1/2 c. butter, softened
1/2 c. white sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In 8-inch square baking dish, mix blueberries, 3 Tbsp. sugar and orange juice. Set aside. In small bowl, thoroughly mix flour, baking powder and salt. Set aside. In a medium bowl, cream butter and 1/2 cup sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in egg and vanilla extract. Gradually add flour mixture, stirring just until ingredients are combined. Drop batter by rounded tablespoons over blueberry mixture. Try to cover as much of filling as possible. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, until top is golden brown and filling is bubbly.

question: What’s a good recipe for a blueberry cobbler?
answer:
Title: Blueberry Cobbler
Ingredients:
4 c. blueberries
1 stick butter, melted
2 1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. sugar
2 1/2 tsp. baking powder
3/4 c. milk
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Place berries in bottom
of 9 x 13-inch buttered pan.
Mix dry ingredients in bowl; add melted butter, milk and beaten eggs. Spoon batter over berries.
Mix an additional 1/3 c. sugar and 1 1/2 teaspoons cornstarch.
Sprinkle over batter.
Now, pour 1 1/2 cups boiling water over all.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Chickpea And Tomato Stew
Ingredients:
6 medium-sized tomatoes
1/2 c. olive oil
2 medium-sized onions, peeled and chopped
4 cloves garlic, peeled and minced
2 c. boiled, drained chickpeas or drained canned chickpeas
1/2 c. very finely chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. salt or to taste
Directions:
Drop the tomatoes into boiling water for 15 seconds.
Remove with a slotted spoon and peel.
Mince the tomatoes.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Fried Tomatoes
Ingredients:
3 tomatoes, firm or unripened
2 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Dress up veggies by adding simple ingredients to canned or frozen English peas:
pearl onions, sliced mushrooms, sliced almonds or lemon pepper, singly or in combination.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Curried Chickpeas And Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. soaked chickpeas or canned chickpeas
1 onion, sliced
2 carrots, diced
1 small zucchini, diced
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. coriander (dry ground)
1 tsp. cumin (dry ground)
1 tsp. ground turmeric
2 tsp. salt to taste
1/3 c. fresh coriander leaves
1/2 small chili pepper (optional)
1/3 c. plain yogurt (low-fat)
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to cover until tender, 1/2 to 1 hour.
Saute onion in olive oil.
Add to chickpeas.
Add carrots and zucchini.
Cook on low heat until vegetables are tender.
Add a little water if necessary to keep moist.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander, 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon turmeric.
Add salt, depending on your taste.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Add fresh coriander leaves, chopped fine, and 1/2 small chili if you like it hot and spicy.
Just before serving, stir in yogurt.

question: What can I make with canned chickpeas and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamed Canned Tomatoes
Ingredients:
2 c. canned tomatoes
2 Tbsp. minced onion
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. brown sugar
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. milk or cream
Directions:
Simmer tomatoes, minced onion, salt, paprika, brown sugar and celery gently for about 10 minutes.
Combine flour and milk or cream until smooth and bring to a boil.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Pasta
Ingredients:
1 box fettucini florentine
1 red bell pepper
broccoli
carrots
fresh garlic
fresh lemon
lite olive oil
Parmesan cheese
fresh Italian parsley
Directions:
Cut pepper into strips; slice carrots diagonally and cut broccoli into bite size pieces.
Stir-fry in olive oil (1 tablespoon) until just tender.
(Cook each vegetable separately). Mix vegetables and cooked pasta together.
Add 1 clove crushed garlic, 2 tablespoons olive oil and squeeze a lemon wedge into mixture; stir and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and chopped fresh parsley.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Pasta And Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 c. part skim milk Ricotta
1/2 c. grated Mozzarella
1/2 c. grated Romano cheese
3 egg whites (optional)
1/2 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
salt and pepper
2 c. broccoli florets
1 c. minced onions
3 medium carrots, sliced
2 celery stalks, sliced
1/2 lb. spaghetti
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. diced fresh tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Combine cheeses, egg whites, thyme, oregano, garlic powder, salt and pepper in medium bowl.
Set aside.
Steam broccoli, onions, carrots and celery until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes.
Add pasta and oil to large pot of boiling water and cook until pasta is just tender, but still firm to bite, about 5 minutes.
Drain.
Return to pot.
Add steamed vegetables and toss. Add cheese mixture and toss.
Transfer to serving bowl.
Spoon tomatoes in center of pasta.
Garnish edges with parsley.
Yield: 4 servings.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Pasta Bake
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 lb. lean ground beef or turkey
3 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed
3/4 c. red marinara or spaghetti sauce
3/4 c. brown gravy
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 c. half and half
1/4 c. Parmesan or Romano cheese
1 tsp. dried whole oregano
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary
3/4 lb. small short pasta tubes
Directions:
Cook pasta.
Heat large frypan and add oil, beef or turkey and garlic.
Saute until meat is tender; drain excess fat.
Add all remaining ingredients, except cheese, for topping and the pasta. Simmer until pasta is cooked.
Drain pasta and mix with sauce. Pour into 3-quart baking dish and bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes at 350° or until all is bubbly hot.
Enjoy!!!

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Quick-Baked Pasta Family Style
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 lb. lean ground beef
3 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed
3/4 c. red marinara or spaghetti sauce
3/4 c. brown gravy
1/2 c. half and half
1/4 c. Parmesan or Romano cheese, freshly grated
1 tsp. dried whole oregano
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Bring 4 quarts of water to a boil.
Heat a large frying pan and add the oil, beef and garlic.
Saute until the meat is tender and then drain excess fat.
Add all remaining ingredients except the cheese for topping and the pasta.
Simmer.
Add 3/4 pound pasta (small pasta tubes) to the boiling water.
Cook until barely tender.
Drain the pasta and mix with the sauce.
Pour all into a 3-quart glass baking dish and top with the remaining cheese.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 25 minutes or until all is bubbly hot. Great for freezer, refrigerator or microwave.
Serves 6.

question: Can you suggest a vegan pasta dish?
answer:
Title: Pasta Vegetable Medley
Ingredients:
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 c. mushrooms, sliced
1 medium red or green pepper, cut into strips
2 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 lb. Velveeta Mexican pasteurized process cheese spread with jalapeno pepper, cubed
1 Tbsp. milk
1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) tri-color corkscrew noodles, cooked and drained
Directions:
In a large skillet, stir-fry vegetables in margarine until crisp-tender.
Reduce heat to low.
Add cheese spread and milk; stir until cheese is melted.
Add noodles; toss lightly to coat noodles and mix vegetables.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Macaroni And Cheese
Ingredients:
3 c. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
8 oz. each of mild and sharp Cheddar and Monterey Jack cheese
1 stick butter or margarine
1/2 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
3 to 4 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat;
add salt and pepper.
Blend in flour and remove from heat.
Add milk and then return to a medium heat,
stirring constantly, until mixture thickens and bubbles. Add
cubed cheese (cube 3/4 of the cheese) and stir. Cheese
does not
have
to
melt.
Remove
from
heat.
Layer macaroni
and cheese
sauce;
if sauce is too thick, then add more
milk, in Dutch oven or roasting pan.
Take the remaining cheese
and
slice thinly.
Place
on top of the macaroni and cheese sauce.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Old Fashion Macaroni And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. elbow macaroni
2 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar (10 oz. pkg.)
1 1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, lightly beaten
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1/8 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Cook macaroni according to directions on package; drain well. Layer 1/3 of macaroni in greased 2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle 1/3 of cheese.
Repeat procedure and top with remaining macaroni (reserve remaining cheese).

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Macaroni And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 pkg. macaroni
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. American cheese, diced or grated
1/3 c. bread crumbs
Directions:
Cook macaroni as directed; drain. Melt butter in heavy saucepan; blend in flour. Stir in milk slowly and cook, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens. Add seasonings and cheese, stirring until cheese melts. Place macaroni in 1-quart casserole. Pour cheese mixture over macaroni. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top. Bake in 400° oven 20 minutes.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Macaroni And Cheese
Ingredients:
4 c. macaroni, cooked
2 Tbsp. butter, cut up
1 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 eggs, beaten
3 c. milk
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Combine macaroni, butter, 1 cup cheese and seasonings; place in a greased 2-quart baking dish. Combine eggs and milk; pour over macaroni. Do not stir. Sprinkle remaining cheese over top. Bake 40 to 50 minutes. Let set about 5 minutes before serving. Serves 6.

question: What’s an easy recipe for mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Baked Mac And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 pkg. elbow macaroni
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1 3/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar, grated
1/3 bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook
macaroni	as
directed
and drain. Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Blend in flour. Stir in milk slowly and cook, stirring constantly,
until	mixture thickens. Add seasonings and
cheese, stirring
until
cheese
melts. Add macaroni and transfer to a buttered 1-quart casserole. Combine bread crumbs and melted butter. Sprinkle over macaroni. Bake in a 400° oven for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Garlic Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 or 5 garlic cloves, sliced
1/4 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
4 or 5 tomatoes, skinned and chopped
1/2 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat oil and brown garlic until light brown.
Add onion and bell
pepper;
cook
a
little and add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Simmer
for
5
minutes.
Add
water;
bring to boil. Reduce heat;
simmer
for 20 minutes.
Cook thin spaghetti or angel
hair pasta; drain.
Pour sauce over pasta; blend well. Sprinkle with grated Italian cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Easy Garlic Pasta
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. basil
1 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 c. butter/margarine (room temperature)
8 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/3 c. Parmesan, grated
1/4 c. olive oil
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
2/3 c. boiling water
Directions:
Blend parsley and basil into butter.
Blend this with cream cheese.
Add Parmesan, olive oil, garlic and pepper.
When pasta is ready, drain.
Add 2/3 cup boiling water to cheese mixture. Stir and toss with pasta.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, sliced
1 to 2 stalks celery, chopped
1 green pepper, sliced
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
3 large green olives, chopped
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste, with 2 c. water*
2 Tbsp. parsley, snipped
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 bay leaf
1 tsp. dried oregano
Directions:
*Or, 1 (12 ounce) tomato sauce and 1 cup water or tomato paste and whole tomatoes and little water.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Garlic Sauce
Ingredients:
3 cloves garlic, mashed
1/4 c. oil
juice of 1 lemon
2 mashed potatoes
Directions:
Blend ingredients.
Use a pasta sauce or basting sauce.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic pasta sauce?
answer:
Title: Italian Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients:
4 cloves garlic, crushed
2 large onions, diced (2 c.)
4 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 peck (13 lb.) tomatoes, cut up
4 cans (6 oz.) tomato paste
3/4 c. chopped parsley
3 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. leaf basil
1 Tbsp. oregano
2 bay leaves
1 or 2 cans mushrooms
1 to 2 c. dry red wine (optional)
Directions:
Saute garlic and onion in oil in large kettle until tender. Discard garlic; add tomatoes, tomato paste, parsley, salt, pepper, oregano, basil and bay leaves.
Bring to boiling, stirring.
Reduce heat and simmer, covered, stirring occasionally for 2 hours.
Add mushrooms and wine and cook, uncovered, 30 minutes longer (optional).
Cool and freeze.
I use Ziploc bags.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf (1 lb) Italian bread
1/2 c. (1 stick) unsalted butter, softened
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained
2 Tbsp. jarred pesto
1 clove garlic
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 c. shredded Provolone cheese
Directions:
Heat grill.
With serrated knife, slice bread lengthwise in half, horizontally.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
4 large mushrooms, sliced
2 medium green onions, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. freshly ground pepper
4 oz. cold Brie, cut into 1/8-inch thick slices
8 slices firm textured white bread, crusts removed
4 sprigs fresh tarragon
Directions:
In a heavy medium skillet, melt the butter over high heat. When the butter begins to brown, add the mushrooms and toss to coat.
Saute, stirring occasionally, until the mushrooms have browned around the edges, 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the green onions and cook for 1 minute longer. Transfer the mushrooms to a plate and season with salt and pepper.
Divide the cheese among 4 slices of bread.
Top each with the mushrooms, leaving about 1/4-inch from the edge of the bread. Add a tarragon sprig and cover with the remaining 4 slices of bread.
Preheat a cast-iron ridged griddle or skillet for 10 minutes over moderate heat. Grill the sandwiches for 4 minutes per side or until the bread is lightly browned and the cheese has melted.
Serve halved as a first course or quartered as an hors d'oeuvre.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese
Ingredients:
4 slices bread
2 slices Kraft cheese
squeeze butter
Directions:
You will need a sandwich machine.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Loaf
Ingredients:
1 3 oz. pkg cream cheese softened
2 tbsp. butter or margarine, softened
1 cup (4 oz.) shredded mozzarella cheese
1/4 cup chopped green onion with tops
1/2 tsp garlic salt
1 loaf (1 pound) french bread sliced
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and butter.
Add cheese, onions, garlic salt; mix well.
Spread on both sides of each slice of bread.
Wrap loaf in a large piece of heavy duty foil.
Seal tightly.
Grill, covered over medium coals for 8 - 10 minutes turning once.
Unwrap foil; grill 5 minutes longer.
Yield 10 -12 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a grilled cheese sandwich?
answer:
Title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Ingredients:
2 pieces bread
butter, softened
2 to 3 slices your favorite sandwich cheese
Directions:
Prepare a medium size skillet with Pam cooking spray or butter. Heat skillet.
Lightly butter one side of each piece of bread.
Lay butter side down; place cheese on top, then place other slice of bread with butter facing up.
Cook on both sides until lightly browned.
Cut into strips or use your favorite cookie cutter for little fingers.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini
3 medium potatoes (red)
2 tsp. oil
1 small onion, chopped
1 large ripe tomato, diced
1 c. chicken broth
1 tsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. rosemary
1/4 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Cut unpeeled potatoes and zucchini into 1/2-inch pieces.
Heat oil in skillet.
Add potatoes.
Stir-fry 1 to 2 minutes.
Pour in chicken broth.
Cover and cook over low heat 5 minutes.
Add onion, zucchini, tomato and seasonings.
Stir.
Cover and cook until vegetables are tender.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Stewed Zucchini
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, chopped
4 medium potatoes, pared and diced (small)
3 Tbsp. margarine
1 large zucchini, pared and diced large
water
1 c. lima beans or 1 c. lima butter beans
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Saute onions and potatoes in 2 tablespoons margarine until onions are soft.
Add zucchini and water to cover.
Simmer, covered, until vegetables are tender.
Add lima beans with liquid and 1/4 cup of margarine.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Scalloped Zucchini And Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 sliced new potatoes
2 Tbsp. oil
2 medium onions
garlic
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. thyme
1/3 c. buttermilk
1 1/2 c. large zucchini slices
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Spread sliced potatoes over bottom of lightly greased 9 x 13-inch loaf pan.
Saute onions in oil with garlic until softened. Mix together basil, oregano and thyme.
Add 1/2 of mixture to onions.
Distribute onions evenly over potatoes; dribble with buttermilk.
Arrange one layer of zucchini slices to cover potato-onion mixture.
Sprinkle with remaining herbs; salt and pepper lightly.
Spread Cheddar cheese evenly over zucchini, then sprinkle on Parmesan cheese.
Cover with foil; bake in a 375° oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until potatoes are tender.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini Appetizers
Ingredients:
3 c. thinly sliced, unpeeled zucchini
1 c. baking mix
1/2 c. onion, finely chopped
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 clove garlic, chopped
4 eggs, slightly beaten
Directions:
Make your selection carefully.
Do not choose too young or green but mature and ripe, coming from good stock.
Do not keep in a stew or hot water or pickle.
This tends to make them sour, hard or bitter.

question: What can I cook with potatoes and zucchini?
answer:
Title: Zucchini-Potato Pancakes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. milk
1 egg
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
2 c. shredded potatoes (half a 20 oz. refrigerated pkg.)
8 oz. zucchini, shredded
1 small onion, finely chopped
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Whisk together milk and egg in medium size bowl.
Add the flour, baking powder, salt, pepper and garlic.
Whisk until smooth. Stir in the potatoes, zucchini, onion and cheese.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Using 1/4 cup for each pancake, cook until browned on underside, about 3 minutes.
Turn pancake over.
Reduce heat to medium-low; cook 5 minutes until cooked through.
Keep warm on plate.
Repeat. Makes 4 servings or 12 pancakes.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops With Dressing
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. margarine
4 1/2 c. bread cubes
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. celery salt
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. chopped celery
3 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
cooking oil
1 can cream of mushroom soup
Directions:
Season pork chops with salt and pepper.
Brown in 1 tablespoon hot oil in a skillet.
Remove from skillet and place in baking dish.
Saute onion and celery in margarine in a small skillet. Combine with bread cubes, poultry seasoning, celery salt and 1/4 cup water; mix lightly.
Shape dressing into mounds on top of chops.
Coat potatoes with oil; place around chops.
Combine soup and 1/2 cup water; pour over chops and potatoes.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour, or until meat is tender.
Serves 6.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. ground mustard
1 1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1/8 tsp. dried oregano
1/8 tsp. dried basil
1/8 tsp. salt
pinch of pepper
4 pork loin chops, 3/4-inch thick
1 to 2 Tbsp. oil
1 c. ketchup
1 c. water
1/4 c. brown sugar
Directions:
Combine first 10 ingredients; dredge pork chops.
In a skillet, brown chops in oil on both sides.
Place in greased 9 x 13-inch pan.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 bone-in pork loin chops (1/2-inch thick)
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed cream of celery soup (undiluted)
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. sour cream
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
1 (2.8 oz.) can French fried onions, divided
1 (24 oz.) pkg. frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
Directions:
In a skillet, brown pork chops in oil on each side. In a large bowl, combine the soup, milk, sour cream, pepper, 1/2 cup cheese and 1/2 cup onions; fold in potatoes. Spread into a greased 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Arrange chops on top; sprinkle with seasoned salt. Cover and bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes or until pork is tender. Uncover; sprinkle with remaining cheese and onions. Bake 5 to 10 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. Yield: 6 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Elegant Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 to 8 pork chops
1/4 c. shortening
1 medium onion, cut in rings
1 green pepper, cut in rings
1 (13 oz.) can chunk pineapple, drained
1/4 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. pineapple juice
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 c. catsup
1/4 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Brown chops in shortening; remove.
In the drippings, brown lightly the onion, green pepper and pineapple chunks.
Remove; return chops to the skillet and cover with onion, green pepper and pineapple.
Mix the sauce (brown sugar, pineapple juice, vinegar, catsup and oregano) and pour over all.
Cover; simmer for 1 1/2 hours.

question: What can I make with leftover pork chops?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops And Dressing
Ingredients:
4 loin pork chops (1/2 inch thick)
Kitchen Bouquet
3 c. herb seasoned croutons
1/4 c. diced onion
1/4 c. melted margarine
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 c. water
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/3 c. milk
Directions:
Brush both sides of chops with Kitchen Bouquet; set aside. Combine croutons, onion, butter and egg mixed with 1/4 cup water. Spread in bottom of 8 x 12-inch glass baking dish.
Place chops on dressing.
Cover with foil.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Yields 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Dumb Bunny Carrots (Marinated)
Ingredients:
1 can tomato soup
1/2 c. vegetable oil
3/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. mustard
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
5 c. cooked, sliced carrots
1 large green pepper, diced
1 large onion, diced
Directions:
Mix soup, oil, vinegar, mustard, salt, pepper, sugar and Worcestershire sauce in pan and bring to a boil.
Pour over carrots, green pepper and onion.
Mix and refrigerate at least 24 hours before serving.
Great for holidays.
Can be made in advance and last a long time in fridge.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
8 cooked carrots, halved lengthwise
Directions:
Cover carrots with water and boil until tender. Drain.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Herbed Carrot Potato Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1 c. sour cream
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. snipped chives
1 tsp. Worcestershire
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 medium carrots (2 c.), thinly bias sliced
8 medium potatoes, cooked, peeled and sliced (7 c.)
1 c. thinly bias sliced celery
1/2 c. pitted ripe olives, sliced
leaf lettuce (optional)
Directions:
Combine mayonnaise or salad dressing, sour cream, lemon juice, chives, Worcestershire, salt, dill weed, mustard and pepper until well combined.
In a medium pan, heat small amount of water to boiling; add carrots and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes.
Drain. Rinse with cold water; drain again.
In a large bowl, gently toss together the sliced potatoes, sliced carrots, celery and olives. Add sour cream mixture.
Gently toss to coat well.
Cover and chill several hours.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: What can I cook with carrots and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Marinated Carrots(A Great Cookout Dish And Easy To Make!)
Ingredients:
2 lb. sliced cooked carrots
1 can tomato soup
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. cooking oil
1/2 c. cider vinegar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 chopped onion
1 chopped green pepper
3 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
1 (9 oz.) can artichoke hearts
1/2 lb. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
4 Tbsp. margarine
6 Tbsp. milk
1/3 c. grated cheese
ground pepper
Directions:
Layer drained artichoke hearts in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.
Layer drained spinach next.
Blend cream cheese, mayonnaise and margarine until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in milk. Spread over top of spinach.
Sprinkle with pepper and grated cheese.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: "Stir-Fry Vegetables"
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. bean sprouts
10 pea pods
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
2 c. broccoli flowerets
2 medium carrots, sliced
2 celery sticks, sliced
1 (8 oz.) pkg. mushrooms, sliced
1/2 medium bell pepper, sliced in rings or strips
1/2 medium brown onion, sliced in rings or strips
Directions:
In large skillet, heat oil over medium heat.
Add all vegetables, except onion, mushrooms and bell pepper.
Cook until vegetables are almost to the desired tenderness, then add the onion, mushrooms and bell pepper, adding as much soy sauce as desired to taste.
Cook up to 1/2 hour or until done to taste. Serve with rice, chow mein noodles or both.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
olive oil flavored vegetable spray
1 medium onion, cut into thin slices
1 1/2 c. julienne cut carrots
1 1/2 c. fresh sugar snap peas
1 c. chopped red pepper
1/2 c. canned low sodium chicken broth (undiluted)
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
2 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
Directions:
Coat a wok or large nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Heat at medium-high (375°) until hot.
Add onion.
Stir-fry 3 minutes. Add carrot.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add peas and sweet red pepper. Stir-fry 4 to 5 minutes or until crisp-tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stir Fry
Ingredients:
1 pkg. stir fry seasoning mix
2 tomatoes
1 green pepper
1 onion
1 can mushrooms
1 1/2 c. cauliflower
1 1/2 c. broccoli cut up
1 cucumber
Directions:
Heat 2 Tbsp. oil cut up vegetables.
Mix seasoning mix with 1/4 c. water till smooth.
Add all to oil and cook at medium high. Stir constantly till tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped cabbage
1 c. chopped carrots
1 c. chopped onions
1/2 c. chopped sweet pepper (maybe 1 hot pepper)
1/2 c. chopped zucchini
1 c. chopped cauliflower
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Heat oil about 1 minute.
Add vegetables with wooden spoon. Stir constantly until food is only wilted, but still crunchy.
The secret of good stir-fry is not to overcook.

question: What’s a good recipe for a healthy vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 small onion, chopped
4 c. mixed, chopped vegetables (carrots, celery, broccoli, cauliflower, green peppers)
2 c. cooked chicken, beef or shrimp, chopped or cubed
Directions:
Heat oil in wok or skillet; add onion.
Saute until limp.
Add vegetables; cook until limp or to desired doneness.
Add meat. Stir until heated (3 to 4 minutes).
Remove from heat.
Let stand 4 or 5 minutes to heat and blend flavors.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1/2 c. diced onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. egg substitute
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. 1% low-fat cottage cheese
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach, thawed and drained
vegetable oil pastry
1 1/2 oz. part skim Mozzarella cheese slices
Directions:
Coat a large, nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Place over medium-high heat until hot.
Add mushrooms, onion and garlic; saute until tender.
Combine egg substitute and next 4 ingredients.
Stir in spinach.
Add mushroom mix, stirring well. Spoon in prebaked pastry shell.
Bake in a 350° oven for 35 minutes.
Arrange cheese slices on top.
Bake 5 minutes until cheese melts.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen or chopped spinach
1 (3 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese
1 c. shredded cheese
5 eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tomato, thinly sliced
1/4 c. grated cheese
1 (9-inch) pastry shell (uncooked)
Directions:
Cook spinach according to directions on package (drain well). Combine next 6 ingredients and beat lightly with a fork.
Stir in spinach.
Pour into pastry shell.
Arrange tomato slices on top. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 450° for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
3 eggs, well beaten
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
2 c. low-fat cottage cheese (small curd)
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
3 Tbsp. shredded Swiss cheese
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. instant minced onion
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/8 tsp. salt
vegetable cooking spray
Directions:
Combine first 10 ingredients; mix well.
Pour into a 9-inch pie plate coated with cooking spray.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes or until set.
Yields 6 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. unsalted butter
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground white pepper
pinch of nutmeg
4 eggs
1 c. half and half
1 c. heavy cream
1/2 c. grated Swiss cheese or Monterey Jack cheese
2 (9-inch) pie shells
crisp-fried bacon
sauteed mushrooms
chopped tomatoes
Directions:
Melt butter in a large skillet.
Saute onions over medium heat until soft, about 5 minutes.
Add spinach and continue to cook, stirring often, until no liquid is left.
Add salt, pepper and nutmeg.
Stir well and allow to cool.
Preheat oven to 375°.
Beat eggs and cream together; gradually add to spinach mixture.
Stir until smooth.
Add cheese and combine.
Pour mixture into pie shells.
Place shells on cookie sheet and bake 30 to 35 minutes or until a knife inserted into pie comes out clean.
Serve hot or room temperature.

question: How do I make a cheesy spinach quiche?
answer:
Title: Spinach Quiche
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 (8 oz.) pkg. refrigerated crescent rolls
1 1/4 c. shredded Swiss cheese
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
5 eggs
3/4 c. milk
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
8 slices bacon, fried crisp, drained and crumbled
fresh chopped parsley
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cook spinach according to package directions.
Drain well; squeeze out excess moisture.
Chop into smaller pieces; set aside. Unroll dough.
Press into greased 10-inch glass pie plate, covering bottom and sides.
Sprinkle cheese and onion over crust. Beat eggs.
Add milk, seasonings and reserved spinach.
Pour into crust.
Sprinkle with bacon, parsley and Parmesan cheese.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes or until knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
Let stand 5 minutes before serving.
Yield:
6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marinated Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1/4 c. lemon juice
5 cloves garlic, crushed
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 c. vegetable oil
Directions:
Mash garlic cloves.
Add salt to make a paste.
Add lemon juice and oil.
Add chicken and marinate for 1 hour or more. Grill chicken over low heat until done.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
6 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
1/2 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. oil
1/4 c. soy sauce
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
1/2 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. pepper
1 c. very strong lemonade
Directions:
Place chicken in bowl.
Mix all other ingredients and marinate chicken for at least 6 hours.
Barbecue marinated chicken until done.
Heat sauce in microwave until hot.
Place chicken back in sauce and serve.
Excellent.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. canola and corn oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. rosemary or tarragon, crushed
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
Directions:
In a cup, mix first five ingredients.
Pour over chicken. Cover and let stand at room temperature no longer than 30 minutes, turning once.
Broil 10 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, turning once.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. canola oil
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. rosemary or tarragon, crushed
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
Directions:
In cup, mix the first 5 ingredients.
Pour over chicken. Cover and let stand at room temperature no longer than 30 minutes, turning once.
Broil 10 minutes or until thoroughly cooked, turning once.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marinated 12 Chicken Boneless Breasts
Ingredients:
2 c. sour cream
1/4 c. lemon juice
4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. celery seed
2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. Ritz crackers
1 1/2 c. saltine crackers
1 c. melted butter
Directions:
Mix together sour cream, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, celery seed, paprika, garlic powder, salt and pepper.
Dip chicken into mixture.
Marinate overnight.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom And Cheese Omelette
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 lb. mushrooms, cleaned, trimmed and sliced thin
1 clove garlic, minced or put through a press
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 Tbsp. dry white wine
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
4 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. milk
1/2 c. grated Gruyere or Parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley (for garnish)
Directions:
Heat half the butter in a frying pan and add mushrooms and garlic.
Cook over moderate heat 5 minutes or until mushrooms begin to soften.
Add thyme, rosemary and white wine and continue to saute another 5 minutes or until liquid evaporates.
Season to taste with salt and freshly ground pepper.
Remove from heat and set aside.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Omelet
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced mushrooms (about 1/4 lb.)
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1 medium garlic clove, minced
6 tsp. butter or margarine
6 or 12 eggs
1 c. water
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed tomato soup
1 large bay leaf
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Combine mushrooms, onion, green pepper and garlic in 2 teaspoons margarine in small saucepan and cook until tender.
In another saucepan, blend water, soup, bay leaf, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper to taste and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove bay leaf.
Keep sauce hot.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Cheese Omelet
Ingredients:
5 pieces bread, buttered on both sides
1/2 lb. Swiss cheese
4 eggs, well beaten
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
dash of pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese
2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1 can mushrooms
Directions:
Place bread in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Grate the cheeses; mix together and sprinkle on bread.
Mix together the eggs, milk, dry mustard, salt and pepper.
Beat well.
Pour over cheese.
Sprinkle mushrooms over top.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Remove from refrigerator 1 hour before baking.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Baked Omelet
Ingredients:
2 c. seasoned croutons
1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1 1/2 lb. sausage
6 eggs
2 c. milk
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. minced onion
1 can cream of mushroom soup
Directions:
Spread croutons in bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan. Sprinkle cheese over croutons.
Brown the sausage.
Drain and put over cheese and croutons.
Combine the soup, milk, eggs, dry mustard and onion.
Beat together.
Pour over croutons, cheese and sausage.
Bake 1 hour at 325°.

question: How do I make a mushroom and cheese omelette?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Business
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. fresh mushrooms
8 slices white bread
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
2 eggs
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can mushroom soup
1/4 c. grated yellow cheese
butter
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Clean and slice mushrooms.
Saute in butter until slightly cooked.
Butter 3 slices of bread.
Trim crusts and cut into 1-inch squares.
Put in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Very Good Noodles
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. oil
1 c. flour
1 egg
Directions:
Mix oil, eggs and flour.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Roll thin, cut in strips.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Noodles
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
2 eggs
Directions:
Mix together and roll thin.
Let dry a little and cut.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Tofu Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, crumbled
1 green onion, chopped
1 small carrot, shredded
2 Tbsp. sunflower seeds
1/2 c. broccoli, chopped fine
3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 tsp. tamari or soy sauce
pita bread (Chapatis or your favorite whole grain bread)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients in a bowl and enjoy!

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Marinated Tofu Salad
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. tofu, parboiled, drained and dried
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. Chinese sesame oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. shoyu or tamari
2 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar
1 head Chinese cabbage or equivalent, shredded
1 small carrot, shredded
2 to 3 scallions, chopped
handful watercress
gomahsio
Directions:
In a shallow pan combine oils, lemon juice, shoyu and vinegar.
Combine with a wire whisk.
Cut tofu in half horizontally, then diagonally to form thin triangles about 1/4-inch thick.
Place into the bowl with the marinade and chill for at least an hour.
Arrange the cabbage on center of the plates.
Top with tofu.
Arrange the watercress around the edges. Place some shredded carrots in the center, with the scallions. Pour the marinade over all with a sprinkle of gomahsio.

question: What can I cook with tofu and noodles?
answer:
Title: Noodles
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 egg yolk, beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
water (enough to mix)
Directions:
Roll very, very thin and let dry. Cut in strips and add to favorite broth.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. golden Caesar dressing (Kraft)
2 c. cherry tomatoes, halved
1 c. cucumber slices, halved
1 c. mushroom slices
1/4 lb. pepperoni slices
3/4 c. sour cream
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. green onion slices
2 c. pasta noodles, cooked, drained and chilled
Directions:
Pour dressing over tomatoes, cucumbers, mushrooms and meat. Cover, marinate in refrigerator several hours or overnight; drain. Combine sour cream, cheese and onions; toss with the noodles.
Top noodles with vegetable mixture.
Sprinkle with additional cheese, if desired.
Garnish with tiny choppings of the green onion stems.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Overnight Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. tiny shell macaroni
2 c. shredded lettuce
2 boiled eggs, sliced
1 c. ham
1 tsp. prepared mustard
dash of pepper sauce
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1/2 c. shredded Swiss cheese
1/2 c. salad dressing (Miracle Whip)
1/4 c. sour cream
1 Tbsp. chopped green onion
paprika
Directions:
Cook macaroni; drain, rinse and cool.
Shred lettuce in 2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Top with macaroni.
Add ham, peas and cheese.
Combine salad dressing, sour cream, onion, mustard and pepper sauce.
Spread over casserole and seal edges.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Sprinkle top with paprika.
Toss before serving.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. corkscrew macaroni
2 small carrots, sliced
2 green onions, chopped
1 (2 oz.) jar pimientos, drained
1 c. kidney beans
3/4 c. sliced celery
1/4 c. cooked English peas
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 c. Italian dressing
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1/8 tsp. dried marjoram
1/8 tsp. pepper
lettuce leaves
2 tomatoes
2 boiled eggs
Directions:
Cook macaroni according to directions; drain.
Combine next 11 ingredients; toss well.
Chill at least 1 hour.
Spoon into lettuce lined dish.
Arrange tomato slices and egg wedges around edges.
Garnish with parsley.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Casserole
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 onion, diced
1 green pepper, diced
2 cans drained mushrooms
