1 (8 oz.) block Mozzarella cheese, shredded
1 (8 oz.) mild Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 lb. medium size pasta shells
2 heaping tsp. butter
1 can spaghetti sauce
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Boil pasta and butter according to package directions. Fry hamburger with onion and green pepper. Drain and add mushrooms and add the spaghetti sauce. Drain and rinse cooked pasta. In a 9 x 9 dish, put a layer of pasta, a layer of meat sauce and a layer of cheeses. Sprinkle a layer of Parmesan cheese. Repeat layers once more.

question: What can I do with leftover pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 box rotini pasta
2 Tbsp. spicy mustard
1/2 lb. Feta cheese, cubed
1/2 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 c. vegetable oil
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 bunch fresh broccoli
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 c. vinegar
Directions:
Cook and drain pasta according to package directions.
Slice broccoli into bite size pieces. Steam until tender and drain. When the pasta and broccoli have cooled, mix them together with the cheese.
Combine the remaining ingredients and pour over the pasta mixture.
Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Grilled Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
6 large lamb chops
1 Tbsp. olive oil
3 to 4 cloves of garlic, peeled and cut thin
1 Tbsp. rosemary
Directions:
Brush lamb chop with olive oil, then roll in garlic and rosemary.
Put on grill until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
3 loin lamb chops
2 tablespoons butter
salt and pepper
1/2 cup water
1 can (8 ounces) tomato sauce
1/4 cup ketchup
1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1/4 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
Directions:
Melt butter in a heavy skillet; brown lamb chops. Place chops in a baking dish; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Pour 1/2 cup water into the skillet and stir to loosen browned bits. Add remaining ingredients to skillet then pour over the lamb chops. Cover and bake at 350 for 1 hour. Serves 3.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Charcoal Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
8 thick lamb chops
1/2 c. white wine
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. garlic, minced
1 tsp. rosemary
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Season chops with salt and pepper.
Then marinate in a mixture of the other ingredients for 4 hours or overnight.
Grill the drained chops for 6 to 8 minutes on each side for a medium rare (pink center).

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Lamb Chops
Ingredients:
4 loin lamb chops, 1-inch thick
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. honey
3 Tbsp. prepared mustard
Directions:
Trim fat from chops.
Season with salt and pepper.
Broil 5 minutes on 1 side; turn and broil 4 minutes.
Mix together mustard and honey; spread over chops and broil 2 minutes longer.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for grilled lamb chops?
answer:
Title: Lamb Chops With Rosemary
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary
6 lamb chops or steaks
2 Tbsp. olive oil
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 Tbsp. fresh sage, crushed
2 cloves garlic
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 large egg or whites from 2 large eggs
1 can (15 oz.) salmon, drained and flaked
1 c. fresh bread crumbs
1/4 c. minced onion
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Heat oven to
400°.
Spray
cookie sheet with vegetable cooking spray.
Beat egg
with
fork
in
a medium sized bowl. Add remaining ingredients
and	mix until well blended.
Shape in eight 1/2-inch patties.
Place on prepared cookie sheet and bake 10 to 12
minutes,	turning
once,	until golden brown on both sides.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
4 c. chicken, cooked and cut-up
2 pkg. frozen broccoli
2 c. milk
2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 can French fried onions
Directions:
Grease 2-quart casserole dish. Cook broccoli as directed. Cut into bite-size pieces and arrange in casserole.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken And Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli
2 c. (or more) cooked chicken
2 cans Cheddar cheese soup
1 c. milk
2 c. Bisquick or Jiffy mix or cornbread mix
2/3 c. milk
Directions:
Cook broccoli until tender.
Arrange spears in large 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Place chicken on top.
Combine soup and milk and pour over chicken and broccoli.
Mix Bisquick or Jiffy mix and milk.
Spread this mixture over the chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chopped frozen broccoli
1 c. Minute rice
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 c. milk
1 (8 oz.) jar Cheez Whiz
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (6 oz. can) water chestnuts, drained and sliced
Directions:
Cook broccoli by package directions; drain and set aside. Combine rice, soup, milk, cheese, salt and pepper.
Heat until cheese is melted and ingredients are well blended, then add onion, celery, water chestnuts and broccoli.
Stir thoroughly.
Place in a lightly greased 10 x 6 x 2-inch baking dish and heat in a 350° oven for about 30 minutes.
Fifteen minutes before removing from oven, cover top with finely crushed cracker crumbs.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, shredded and divided
1 1/2 c. cooked chicken
1 1/2 c. pasta, cooked and drained
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped red or green pepper
1/4 c. milk
3/4 c. seasoned croutons (optional)
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Mix all ingredients except 1/2 cup cheese and croutons.
Spoon into a 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with reserved cheese and croutons.
Bake 30 minutes until thoroughly heated.
You may also heat in microwave oven on High for 8 to 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy chicken and broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Chicken Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
1 1/2 c. chopped, cooked chicken
1 1/2 c. bow tie pasta, cooked and drained
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. chopped red or green pepper
1/4 c. milk
1/2 tsp. each: crushed, dried oregano leaves and garlic salt
3/4 c. seasoned croutons (optional)
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Mix all ingredients, except 1/2 cup of the cheese and croutons.
Spoon into 1 1/2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with reserved 1/2 cup cheese and croutons.
Bake for 30 minutes or until thoroughly heated.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 Tbsp. margarine
2 c. chopped, cooked chicken, diced
1 (4 oz.) can green chili peppers, rinsed and chopped
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. ground coriander (optional)
3/4 tsp. salt
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. sour cream
1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey jack cheese (6 oz.)
12 (6-inch) tortillas
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and green pepper in 2 tablespoons of margarine until tender.
Combine onion in a bowl with chicken and green chili peppers.
Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 c. chopped cooked chicken
4 oz. can green chili peppers, rinsed, seeded and chopped
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. ground coriander
3/4 tsp. salt
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. dairy sour cream
1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese (6 oz.)
12 (6 inch) tortillas (corn)
Directions:
In large saucepan cook onion and green pepper in 2 tablespoons butter until tender.
Combine onion mixture in bowl with chicken and peppers; set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onions
1/2 c. chopped bell peppers
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 c. chopped cooked chicken
1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chilies
3 Tbsp. margarine or butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. ground coriander (cilantro)
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. salsa (optional)
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 c. sour cream
1 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese
12 corn tortillas or chips
Directions:
Cook onions and pepper in skillet until tender. Combine in bowl with chicken and chilies. Set aside. In the same skillet, melt 3 tablespoons butter. Blend in flour, coriander and salt. Stir in chicken broth all at once; cook and stir until thick. Remove from heat; stir in sour cream and 1/2 cup cheese. Cut up tortillas (or use chips) and mix together. Pour into 13 x 9 x 2 baking dish; sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake, uncovered, in 350° oven about 25 minutes. Serves 6. Can freeze. Can do ahead.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchiladas Casserole Style
Ingredients:
1 can Valley Fresh white chicken in water
1 small (1/2 c.) purple onion
1 small can diced green chiles
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1 soup size can water or milk
8 oz. sour cream
12 to 15 corn tortillas
2 c. grated cheese (Longhorn, Colby or Monterey Jack)
Directions:
Place first 7 ingredients in saucepan; heat to boil.
Reduce heat.
Add sour cream (do not boil after adding).
Place a couple of spoonfuls in the bottom of 4-cup crock-pot.
Layer tortillas, soup mixture and cheese.
Cook on low for the afternoon.
Let stand 10 minutes if there is too much liquid or cook a bit longer. Dinner is ready when lessons are finished.
Serve with tossed green salad.

question: What’s a good recipe for a chicken enchilada casserole?
answer:
Title: Chicken Enchilada Casserole
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil or polyunsaturated vegetable oil
1 (4 oz.) can chopped green chiles
2 c. onion, chopped
1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes, undrained and chopped
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
2 c. (8 oz.) part skim milk Mozzarella cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
1/2 tsp. ground oregano
3 c. cooked skinless chicken, chopped
2 c. low-fat plain yogurt
24 corn tortillas, torn into 1-inch strips
fresh coriander (cilantro) or parsley for garnish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Heat oil in a nonstick skillet and saute the green chiles and onion over low heat for 2 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, garlic powder and oregano.
Add salt if desired. Simmer uncovered about 30 minutes or until thick.
Combine chicken and yogurt.
Place in shallow 3-quart baking dish.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cream Of Anything Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. flour
2 (14 1/2 oz.) cans evaporated milk
cheese (optional)
1 to 2 c. chopped meat or vegetables
2 to 3 c. broth
Directions:
Make a roux of butter and flour; add milk and make a thick white sauce.
If cheese is used, add here and whisk to melt.
Mix in leftover cooked vegetables or meat; stir until smooth.
Add broth to desired consistency.
Season to taste.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cream Of Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
1/4 c. cooked rice
1 qt. boiling water
2 tsp. salt
2 c. chopped vegetables (onion, tomatoes, turnips, carrots and greens)
2 c. evaporated milk
Directions:
Boil rice in water until almost tender.
Add salt and vegetables. Continue boiling until vegetables are tender.
Add milk and cook until heated.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
8 Tbsp. butter
6 Tbsp. flour
1 qt. rich milk
2 c. grated cheese
2 c. chicken stock, seasoned to taste
1/2 c. celery
1/2 c. green pepper
1/2 c. onion
1/2 c. grated carrots
several drops hot pepper sauce
salt to taste
Directions:
Melt 6 tablespoons butter.
Add flour, blending well.
Pour milk in gradually, blending well.
Bring to a boil.
Add cheese and remove from heat, but keep warm.
Melt remaining butter in another pan.
Add celery, green pepper, onion and carrots, all of which have been finely chopped or grated.
Cook until transparent, then pass these through a sieve.
Add chicken stock and mix well. Combine two mixtures and season with hot pepper sauce and salt. Do not boil.

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Soup!
Ingredients:
olive oil, butter or margarine
milk and cheese(s)
vegetable: tomatoes
meat: optional
herbs: seasonings, tomatoes, etc. as needed
Directions:
Note:
Use whatever in whatever amounts in order to delight your palate!

question: I need a recipe for a dairy-free soup.
answer:
Title: Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. finely chopped onion
2 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. flour
1 Tbsp. diced parsley
4 c. chicken stock
1 1/3 lb. Velveeta cheese
1 tsp. salt and pepper
1/8 tsp. baking soda
dash of cayenne
1 tsp. paprika
2 heaping Tbsp. cornstarch
4 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter and saute vegetables.
Stir in flour and cornstarch.
Add stock and milk, gradually blending into a smooth sauce.
Add soda and cheese and stir until thickened.
Add salt, pepper and parsley.
Do not boil.
Garnish with paprika.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
2 c. sausage or bacon, cooked and drained
1/4 lb. sharp cheese, diced
1/2 lb. Velveeta, diced
1 stick butter
1 qt. milk
1 tsp. dry mustard
12 slices bread (crust removed)
1 tsp. dry onion
1/2 tsp. salt
6 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer bread, meat, cheese and onion.
Melt butter and pour over all.
Beat eggs, seasonings and milk.
Pour over.
Chill in refrigerator overnight and bake 1 hour at 350°. Let stand 15 minutes before serving.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
4 c. cubed bread (French is best)
2 c. shredded cheese
2 c. egg substitute
2 eggs, beaten
1 qt. milk
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
black pepper to taste
1/2 lb. bacon or sausage
4 to 5 green onions, thinly sliced
1 c. sliced mushrooms
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
Directions:
Grease a 9 x 13-inch pan and arrange bread cubes along bottom. Sprinkle with shredded cheese.
Mix egg substitute, eggs, milk, mustard, Worcestershire and pepper.
Pour evenly over bread. Sprinkle with bacon or sausage chunks, onions, mushrooms and tomato.
Cover and chill for 12 to 24 hours.
Heat oven to 325° and bake for 1 hour or until set.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
6 green onions, chopped
1 green or red pepper, chopped
1 pt. mushrooms, sliced
16 slices bread, cut into cubes
1 (8 oz.) pkg. grated Swiss cheese
1 (8 oz. pkg. grated Cheddar cheese
1 doz. eggs
2 c. milk
2 tsp. prepared mustard
3 Tbsp. margarine, melted
Directions:
Combine vegetables, bread and cheeses in greased 8 x 10 x 2-inch pan.
Combine eggs, milk and mustard; pour over vegetable mixture.
Cover and refrigerate 6 hours or overnight.
Bake at 325° for 60 to 65 minutes.
Before done, drizzle melted margarine over casserole and bake until done.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Serve.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
10 to 12 slices bread, decrusted and cubed
1 lb. sausage, bacon or ham, crumbled
12 oz. mild Cheddar, grated
6 eggs
2 1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 stick margarine, melted
2 c. crushed cornflakes
Directions:
Pam a 9 x 12-inch pan.
Place bread on bottom in a single layer.
Sprinkle meat, then cheese over bread.
Mix eggs, milk and seasonings.
Pour over casserole.
Blend cornflakes and margarine and spread over top of casserole.
Let stand in fridge overnight. Bake at 325° for 1 hour.

question: I need a recipe for a hearty breakfast casserole.
answer:
Title: Breakfast Casserole
Ingredients:
6 eggs
2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dried mustard
6 slices white bread (no crusts)
1 lb. bacon, sausage or ham
1 tsp. minced onion
4 oz. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown meat.
Drain.
Beat eggs; add salt, mustard, milk and onion.
Break bread into chunks and add to mixture with cheese. Add meat.
Place in casserole.
Refrigerate overnight.
When ready to use, take out and let stand until room temperature.
Add topping, if desired.
Bake casserole in a pan of water at 350° for 45 minutes.
Serves 6.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Rice
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh sausage, sliced
1 1/2 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Fry sausage in a pan until done.
Add sausage to rice and stir mixture on low heat for about five minutes.
Serve hot!

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Rice Supreme
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean sausage
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
1 (3 oz.) can mushrooms
1/2 c. almonds, toasted
1 can water chestnuts
1 1/2 pkg. chicken noodle soup (dehydrated)
2 1/2 c. water
3 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Cook rice according to package directions.
Reserve.
Slice and fry sausage in skillet.
Coarsely crumble sausage.
Remove sausage from drippings.
In drippings, add onion and celery and saute.
Add mushrooms, almonds, water chestnuts, soup, water, cooked rice and sausage.
Mix and bake covered 45 minutes at 1 hour at 350°.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Sausage Rice
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, finely chopped
1 to 2 ribs celery, finely chopped
1 green pepper, finely chopped
1 (12 oz.) pkg. sausage roll
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 to 2 cloves minced garlic
1/4 tsp. each: basil and thyme
cayenne or Tabasco sauce to taste
1 c. rice
2 1/2 c. chicken stock
Directions:
In a large skillet, melt butter.
Saute onion, celery and green pepper until soft.
Add sausage until browned and crumbly. Add mushrooms, garlic and spices.
Cook about 3 to 5 minutes. Stir in rice.
Add stock.
Boil.
Reduce heat to simmer and cook until liquid is absorbed, 20 to 25 minutes.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Southern Style Rice
Ingredients:
1 c. long grain rice
3/4 c. water
1 lb. hot sausage links
1 large red pepper, diced
1 large green pepper, diced
1 medium tomato, chopped
salt
Directions:
Prepare rice as label directs.
In a 10-inch skillet over medium heat, heat sausage links and water to a boil. Cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Remove cover; continue cooking.
Turn sausage links frequently until water evaporates.
Remove sausage links to paper towel and drain.
Dice sausage links.
In drippings remaining in skillet over medium heat, cook red and green peppers until tender.
Stir occasionally. Stir in rice, sausage links, chopped tomato and salt to taste.
Heat through.

question: What can I cook with sausage and rice?
answer:
Title: Dirty Rice
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) pkg. rice Florentine
2 Tbsp. butter
2 1/3 c. water
8 oz. sausage
Directions:
Combine contents of both packets from rice Florentine package, butter and water in saucepan; mix well.
Bring to a boil.
Simmer, tightly covered, for 20 minutes.
Remove from heat.
Let stand, covered, for 5 minutes.
Shape sausage into thin patties.
Fry in skillet until brown and crisp; drain on paper towels.
Crumble sausage into cooked rice mixture; mix well.
Yield:
8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
1/2 c. flour
2 large eggs
1 c. milk
1 Tbsp. melted butter
pinch of salt
Directions:
Mix flour and salt in large bowl.
Make a well in center and add eggs, melted butter and half of milk.
With a whisk or wooden spoon, gradually stir the flour into the liquid mixture.
While stirring, gradually add more liquid until consistency is that of cream.
When all liquid is added, beat or whisk to remove all lumps.
Pour 1/4 cup of crepe batter into preheated pan.
Cook both sides on low heat until lightly browned.
Makes 6 to 8 crepes. Fill with fruit, ice cream, or scrambled eggs.
Fold and enjoy.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepe
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
2 eggs, well beaten
1 c. evaporated milk
1 c. water
1 Tbsp. melted shortening
Directions:
Mix together flour, baking powder and salt.
Combine eggs, milk and water.
Beat until smooth.
(I like to make batter the night before.)
In cast-iron skillet, add shortening (Crisco). When very hot, add 3 to 4 tablespoons of batter and fry until golden brown.
Serve with your favorite topping.
Brown sugar and sour cream is mine.
Roll like a jelly roll.
Enjoy.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: Crepes(French)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 c. milk
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt together in a bowl. Stir in remaining ingredients.
Beat mixture until smooth.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 c. flour
1 c. milk
3 tsp. oil
pinch of salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Mix all together with a wire whip.
Fry as you would a pancake.
Drain on paper towel.
Cool.
Use whipped cream and top with fresh strawberries or blueberries.
Arrange the whipped cream on half of the crepe.
Then top with fresh fruit.
Then flip the crepe on top of fruit.

question: What’s a recipe for classic French crepes?
answer:
Title: French Crepes
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
3/4 c. milk
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. butter, melted
1 can fruit filling (fresh fruit of your choice)
whipped cream
powdered sugar
Directions:
Beat ingredients together.
Pour batter into warmed skillet, just enough to thinly cover bottom of pan.
Cook over medium heat until golden.
Fill with fruit, roll up lengthwise and top with whipped cream and powdered sugar.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh fettucini
1 lb. medium shrimp
1 Tbsp. parsley
1 tsp. sweet basil
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3 cloves garlic, crushed
1 stick butter
1 green pepper
1 sweet red pepper
Directions:
Peel and devein shrimp.
Slice peppers.
Set aside dry ingredients.
In a large frying pan, melt butter.
Add garlic and peppers.
Cook on medium heat until soft.
Put water on for pasta and, once boiling, add pasta to water.
Place shrimp in frying pan; stir-fry with peppers until shrimp turn pink.
Add dry ingredients; mix.
Serve shrimp mixture over fettucini.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp And Vegetables
Ingredients:
olive or salad oil
1 lb. large shrimp, shelled and deveined
2 green onions, thinly sliced
1 1/2 tsp. grated fresh ginger root
1 garlic clove, minced
salt
2 medium-size carrots, thinly sliced
1 medium yellow pepper, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
2 c. small broccoli florets
3/4 (16 oz.) pkg. bow tie or rotella pasta
1/2 c. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
Directions:
About 40 minutes before serving:
In nonstick 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat, in 1 tablespoon hot olive or salad oil, cook shrimp, green onions, grated ginger, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon salt, stirring constantly until shrimp are opaque throughout, about 3 minutes.
With slotted spoon, remove shrimp mixture to bowl.
In dripping remaining in skillet and 1 teaspoon additional hot olive or salad oil, cook carrots, yellow pepper and 1/4 teaspoon salt, stirring frequently, until vegetables are golden and tender-crisp.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Shrimp And Wine
Ingredients:
12 oz. fresh or frozen shelled shrimp
1 c. onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 c. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1 tsp. dried basil
1 clove garlic, crushed (if desired)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped (1 c.)
10 oz. dry pasta, cooked (6 c.)
1/4 c. butter, melted
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. snipped fresh parsley
Directions:
Thaw shrimp if frozen.
In saucepan cook onion in 2 tablespoons butter and olive oil until tender, but not brown. Stir in wine, bouillon granules, basil, garlic (if used), salt and pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and boil gently, uncovered, for 12 to 15 minutes or until liquid is reduced by 2/3.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Herbed Shrimp And Pasta
Ingredients:
1 lb. unpeeled, medium-size fresh shrimp
4 oz. angel hair pasta (uncooked)
1/2 c. butter
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 c. half and half
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 tsp. chopped fresh dill weed or 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Peel and devein shrimp; set aside. Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside; keep warm. Melt butter in a heavy skillet over medium-high heat; add shrimp and garlic. Cook 3 to 5 minutes, stirring constantly; remove shrimp and set aside, reserving garlic and butter in skillet. Add half and half to skillet; bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low and simmer about 15 minutes or until thickened, stirring occasionally. Add shrimp, parsley and seasonings; stir until blended. Serve over angel hair pasta with steamed or sauteed red, green and yellow pepper strips.

question: How do I make a creamy garlic shrimp pasta?
answer:
Title: Shrimp-Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
1 lb. shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
2 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/4 c. oregano
1 c. prepared pasta sauce
11/4 c. white wine
Directions:
Saute garlic and oregano in oil.
Add shrimp and saute till done.
Add sauce and wine; serve over your favorite pasta.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
8 large potatoes
1/2 c. salad oil
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt (optional)
1/2 tsp. herb and pepper (optional)
Directions:
Peel potatoes and cut into 1/-8 inch wedges lengthwise.
Set aside.
Mix together oil and the rest of the ingredients.
Add the potatoes and coat well.
Place in a single layer on a cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° about 45 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt (if desired)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°. Peel potatoes and cut into slices 4-inches long and about 1/4-inch wide. Place in a bowl of iced water to crisp. Just before cooking, turn onto paper towel and pat dry. Turn pieces into a shallow baking pan. Sprinkle with vegetable oil. Shake pan to spread oil evenly over potatoes and spread into one layer. Bake 30 to 40 minutes, turning frequently, until golden brown. Turn potatoes onto paper towel. Sprinkle with paprika and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Fat-Free Oven Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
4 potatoes
1/2 c. liquid Butter Buds
lite salt to taste
Pam spray
Directions:
Cut potatoes into strips.
Arrange on Teflon baking sheet after dipping each strip into liquid Butter Buds or brushing Butter Buds on potatoes.
Optional seasoning to use is garlic, onion or chili powder instead of salt.
Sprinkle to taste.
Bake at 425° for 15 to 20 minutes or until golden brown.
Turn; bake 15 to 20 minutes more.
Yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked French Fries(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
2 large potatoes
1 egg white
1 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. red pepper
Directions:
Cut the potatoes into fries.
In a large bowl, beat the egg whites with a fork until foamy.
Stir in the chili powder and pepper.
Add the potatoes and coat them well.
Spray cookie sheet with Pam and spread in a row.
Bake at 450° for 30 to 35 minutes, until crisp and brown.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked French fries?
answer:
Title: No Fry French Fries
Ingredients:
6 large potatoes
1/4 c. oil
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (optional)
1/2 tsp. garlic powder (optional)
1 tsp. paprika (optional)
1/2 tsp. pepper (optional)
Directions:
Scrub potatoes well and cut into strips.
Combine oil, salt and pepper (may add optional ingredients) into a plastic bag.
Add potatoes and shake to coat.
Spread strips on 2 cookie sheets in a single layer.
Bake at 400° for 20 to 30 minutes until golden brown and tender.
Stir once.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, cooked
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. lemon
1 1/2 c. milk
1 stick margarine
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
3 eggs, separated
Directions:
Mash potatoes and margarine together.
Add sugar, salt, spices and flavorings.
Separate eggs.
Blend yolks with milk (add more milk if desired); add to potato mixture (will be a very thin consistency).
Pour into unbaked pie shell; cook at 400° until lightly browned (approximately 45 minutes).

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
3 large sweet potatoes
1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. evaporated milk
2 eggs, separated
2/3 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. vanilla
3 Tbsp. brandy
1 (9-inch) unbaked pie shell
Directions:
Boil sweet potatoes until tender.
Peel and mash.
Melt butter in milk and add to sweet potatoes.
Mix well.
Beat egg whites until stiff.
Set aside.
Add yolks and remaining ingredients to potatoes.
Gently fold in egg whites.
Pour into pie shell and bake at 350° for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
1 uncooked pie shell (bottom crust only)
2 c. mashed, cooked sweet potatoes
1/2 c. margarine, softened
2 egg yolks
1 1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. milk
2 egg whites, beaten stiff with 1/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Mix
first
6 ingredients, starting with sweet potatoes in mixing
bowl.
Add	milk.
Fold
in
beaten
sweetened egg whites. Pour
into
pie
shell.
Bake at 400° for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 350° and continue to bake until center is firm, approximately 40	minutes.
Nutmeg and sugar may be sprinkled on top of pie before baking, if desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
2 c. mashed sweet potatoes
1 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/2 tsp. allspice
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 eggs, beaten
2/3 c. canned milk
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/2 c. flour, mixed with water to make a paste
Directions:
Beat potatoes.
Mix in all the spices, vanilla, eggs, milk and butter.
Mix well, then add flour mixture.
Pour into pie shells. Bake at 400° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a sweet potato pie?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Pie
Ingredients:
4 c. mashed, cooked sweet potatoes
2 c. firmly packed brown sugar
1 stick margarine, softened
4 eggs, separated
1 tsp. ground ginger
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 can evaporated milk
1 can sweetened condensed milk
2 c. coconut
2 tsp. lemon flavoring
1/4 c. white sugar
4 uncooked pie shells
Directions:
Beat egg yolks. Add sweet potatoes, brown sugar, margarine, spices, salt and sweetened condensed milk in a large mixing bowl; beat until fluffy.
Add evaporated milk and lemon flavoring; beat just until blended. Stir in coconut. Beat egg whites with electric mixer until foamy; gradually add white sugar, one tablespoon at a time, beating until stiff peaks form.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: No Egg Chocolates Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. margarine, softened
1 c. light brown sugar, packed
2 tsp. vanilla
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Cream margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add vanilla and mix well.
Add sifted dry ingredients.
Blend thoroughly.
Add chips and nuts.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. (1 stick) oleo
1 c. shortening
1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. firmly packed brown sugar
1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. white sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3/4 tsp. water
3 eggs (one at a time)
3 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 (12 oz.) pkg. chocolate chips
Directions:
Beat first 6 ingredients until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time. Beat well.
Combine dry ingredients and blend into butter mixture.
Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop from teaspoon on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 375° for 10 minutes, or until golden brown.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
3 eggs
1 lb. dark brown sugar
1 1/2 c. granulated sugar
2 Tbsp. vanilla
1 lb. butter or margarine, softened
6 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 Tbsp. water
4 c. chocolate chips or 2 (12 oz.) pkg.
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a large mixing bowl beat eggs for 4 minutes on high speed; add the sugar, vanilla and butter and mix well.
Sift together the flour, salt and baking soda.
Add the flour mixture to the batter slowly and mix well.
Add the water and mix again.
Stir in the chocolate chips.
Measure 1/4 cup batter onto an ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 13 to 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Be careful not to overbake.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. softened butter or shortening
2 medium eggs or 3 small eggs
1 c. granulated sugar
1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
2 c. unsifted self-rising flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped nuts (optional)
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips
Directions:
Beat butter, eggs, sugars and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add dry ingredients; blend well.
Stir in chips and nuts.
Drop from teaspoon onto ungreased baking sheet 2 inches apart.
Bake in a moderate oven (375°) for 7 to 9 minutes.
Makes about 7 dozen.

question: How do I make chocolate chip cookies without eggs?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. soft butter or margarine
3/4 c. brown sugar
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
2 1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
2 c. chocolate chips (or you can substitute raisins, nuts or M&M's)
Directions:
Cream the butter, sugars and vanilla together.
Beat eggs and mix with the creamed mixture.
Add flour, baking soda and salt. Stir in chocolate chips.
Drop by spoonfuls onto a greased baking sheet and bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Covered Strawberries
Ingredients:
1 pt. fresh strawberries
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine, softened
3 Tbsp. light corn syrup
Dash salt
2 c. sifted powdered sugar
2 (12 oz.) packages milk chocolate morsels
Directions:
Wash strawberries; remove stems if desired.
Drain well; dry on paper towels.
Combine butter, corn syrup and salt, blending well; stir in powdered sugar.
Knead sugar mixture until smooth; chill 30 minutes.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Covered Strawberries
Ingredients:
fresh strawberries (with stems)
1 stick margarine
1 c. chocolate morsels
Directions:
Combine chocolate morsels and margarine on low heat. Stir until melted. Dip strawberries, one at a time, into the chocolate. Place on wax paper.
Let cool and refrigerate.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Covered Strawberries
Ingredients:
strawberries
chocolate bark
Directions:
Dip fresh strawberries in chocolate bark.
Really pretty for showers and taste oh, so good.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Dipped Strawberries
Ingredients:
6 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
3 1/2 c. whole strawberries
Directions:
Melt chocolate slowly over hot water.
Dip washed and dried whole strawberries in chocolate.
Place on waxed paper and refrigerate to harden.

question: What's a good dessert I can make with chocolate and strawberries?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Dipped Strawberries
Ingredients:
3 baskets strawberries, washed and dried
4 oz. each: semi-sweet and unsweetened chocolate
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1/4 c. light corn syrup
Directions:
Melt chocolates, butter and syrup together on top of stove or on High in microwave.
Dip strawberries into chocolate and place on wax paper to cool.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: What Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. boiling water
1 stick butter
1 tsp. soda
3/4 c. sugar
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. quick cooking oats
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Pour boiling water over oats and butter which has been broken into chunks.
Stir until butter melts; set aside.
Sift flour, soda, cinnamon and salt.
Add to oat mixture; mix well.
Add sugars, then eggs; mix thoroughly.
Bake in a 2-quart dish 12 minutes in microwave.
Turn dish often.
Frost with topping.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Sugarless Cake*
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 1/2 c. applesauce
1 c. dates or raisins
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 1/2 c. whole wheat flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. nuts or cranberries
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Beat eggs and vanilla; add to dry mixture.
Add melted butter, applesauce, raisins and nuts.
Bake in tube pan in 350 °oven for 45 minutes to 1 hour.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Texas Sheet Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
2 c. flour
Directions:
Combine in large bowl.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: Diet Cake
Ingredients:
1/2 c nuts chopped
1 1/2 c dates chopped
1 c raisins
2 Tbsp butter
3/4 tsp soda
1 tsp vanilla
1 1/2 c whole wheat flour
1/4 c wheat germ
Directions:
Place all in bowl except flour and wheat germ.
Pour 1 c boiling water over all and stir well.
Add the flour and wheat germ and mix well.
Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes or until done.

question: How do I make a gluten-free cake?
answer:
Title: English Farmhouse Cake
Ingredients:
1 to 2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 lb. whole wheat flour (2 c.)
1/2 lb. all-purpose flour (2 c.)
6 oz. fat (lard, Crisco or margarine)
8 oz. coarse sugar (1 1/4 c. brown sugar)
1 lb. mixed fruit (raisins, currants and golden raisins)
1 Tbsp. mixed spice
2 eggs
milk to mix (approximately 1/2 c.)
a pinch of salt (optional)
Directions:
Heat oven to 250° to 300°.
Rub fat into flour with fingertips until it looks like breadcrumbs.
Add all dry ingredients; mix. Slightly beat eggs.
Add eggs to dry ingredients with enough milk to mix a stiff, but sticky dough.
Bake in one pan for 1 1/2 hours, or until cooked.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Indian Chickpeas
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1/2 tsp. cumin seed
2 onions, diced
6 cloves garlic, crushed
1-inch piece ginger root, grated
1/2 tsp. turmeric powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
3/4 tsp. coriander
1/2 tsp. salt
2 medium tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped
1 tsp. garam masala
4 c. cooked chickpeas
juice of 1 lemon
4 small potatoes, boiled, peeled and chopped
Directions:
Heat oil.
Add cumin and onions.
Cook 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger.
Cook 5 minutes on low heat.
Add turmeric, coriander, cayenne and salt.
Stir; add chopped tomatoes and garam masala. Cook on low heat 10 minutes.
Add chickpeas and lemon juice.
Cook 5 minutes; add potatoes.
Serve over white steamed basmati rice, garnished with chopped green jalapeno peppers.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Curried Chickpeas And Vegetables
Ingredients:
2 c. soaked chickpeas or canned chickpeas
1 onion, sliced
2 carrots, diced
1 small zucchini, diced
2 tsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. coriander (dry ground)
1 tsp. cumin (dry ground)
1 tsp. ground turmeric
2 tsp. salt to taste
1/3 c. fresh coriander leaves
1/2 small chili pepper (optional)
1/3 c. plain yogurt (low-fat)
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in enough water to cover until tender, 1/2 to 1 hour.
Saute onion in olive oil.
Add to chickpeas.
Add carrots and zucchini.
Cook on low heat until vegetables are tender.
Add a little water if necessary to keep moist.
Add 1 1/2 teaspoons coriander, 1 teaspoon cumin and 1 teaspoon turmeric.
Add salt, depending on your taste.
Cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Add fresh coriander leaves, chopped fine, and 1/2 small chili if you like it hot and spicy.
Just before serving, stir in yogurt.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Herb Roast Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless skinless chicken breasts
1 tsp. dried rosemary
1 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
1/4 c. chicken stock
1/2 c. low-fat sour cream
1 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
juice of 3 limes
cayenne pepper
Directions:
Mix together the rosemary, sage, thyme, cumin and salt in a bowl. Sprinkle over the chicken breasts and rub in, coating both sides. Broil or grill chicken until done.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpeas Indian Style
Ingredients:
2 cans chickpeas
2 peeled medium onions, cut in quarters
1 1/4 inch long piece fresh ginger, peeled
1 green chili or 2 dried small red chilies
3 or 4 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. nigella seed (black onion seed)
1 tsp. mustard seed
1 tsp. powdered coriander
1/2 tsp. powdered red pepper (if desired)
small can tomatoes, broken up
salt to taste
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Open cans of chickpeas and drain, reserving liquid.
In blender or food processor place onions, ginger, chilies and garlic.
Blend this all together into a puree.
In heavy saucepan, heat 2 to 3 tablespoons oil briefly.
Add cumin, nigella and mustard seed.
The seed should pop and crackle.
(Do not let burn.)
Pour in blender contents.
Fry, stirring, until color turns golden.
Add coriander, tomatoes, salt, lemon juice and red pepper (if desired).
Mix well and gently mix drained chickpeas into the spice-onion mixture. Then add liquid from cans.
Cover and let simmer about 40 minutes. Tastes better the next day.
A good dish for vegetarians, too.

question: How can I make crispy roasted chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Chickpea Spread
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked garbanzos
4 Tbsp. lemon
1/2 c. tahini
1/3 c. water
1 tsp. garlic
Directions:
Blend.
Use as spread, dip or dressing.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
3 lb. ground chuck
1 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 egg
a little milk
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
salt and pepper
2 cans crushed tomatoes
3 cans tomato sauce
3 cans tomato paste
2 cloves garlic
dash of sugar
2 (8 oz.) Mozzarella cheese
2 (8 oz.) Ricotta cheese
1 egg
Directions:
Mix first 9 ingredients and make into meatballs.
Brown in oven until done.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti pasta
2 lb. ground beef
2 Tbsp. instant minced onion
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
1 1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
3 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
2 3/4 c. water
1 (8 oz.) carton cottage cheese
1 small can sliced black olives
1 can mushrooms, drained
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Prepare
pasta	as
directed
on
package;
cook only 7 minutes.
Drain.	Meanwhile,
brown
beef
and
drain.
Add seasonings, tomato sauce, tomato paste and water.
Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Mix pasta, meat sauce,
cottage cheese, black olives and mushrooms in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Top with Mozzarella cheese.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese
over
Mozzarella cheese.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: A-Z Quick Bread
Ingredients:
1 tsp. baking soda
3 c. flour
1-3 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
3 eggs, beaten
2 c. sugar
1-3 tsp. vanilla
1 c. oil
2 c. (A-Z ingredients)
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Stir together flour, baking soda, cinnamon, baking powder, salt and set aside.
Beat eggs, with sugar, vanilla, and oil.
Add the A-Z ingredients.
Stir in all but 1/2 c. flour.
Add the 1/2 c. flour to nuts, stir to coat.
Stir into mixture and blend. Pour in 2 9 x 5 loaf pans and bake at 325° for 50-60 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted in the center comes out clean. Baking times can vary so watch carefully.
Can use apples, chopped apricots, mashed banana, finely grated carrots or finely grated zucchini.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 c. tomato paste
2/3 c. water
1 tsp. basil
1/8 tsp. pepper
6 oz. part skim milk Mozzarella, shredded
2 tsp. olive oil
1 (8 oz.) can no salt tomato sauce
1 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. part skim milk Ricotta
8 oz. ziti, cooked and drained
Directions:
Saute the onion in the oil in a medium size saucepan until tender.
Add the tomato paste, tomato sauce, water, oregano, basil, salt and pepper. Simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Preheat the oven to 375°. Coat the inside of a 1 1/2-quart casserole with nonstick cooking spray. Combine the Ricotta and half of the Mozzarella in a large bowl. Add the cooked ziti and half of the tomato sauce.
Stir gently to mix. Turn into the prepared casserole.
Add the remaining tomato sauce. Sprinkle with the remaining Mozzarella cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until the cheese is melted and browned.

question: I have only ingredients x, y, and z, what can I make?
answer:
Title: Gazpacho
Ingredients:
3 c. tomato juice
2 c. peeled, chopped tomato
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can tomato soup, undiluted
1 1/4 c. water
3/4 c. peeled, chopped cucumber
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. commercial Italian salad dressing
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. hot sauce
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
dash of white wine
Worcestershire sauce
cucumber slices
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except cucumber slices.
Stir well. Cover and chill at least 8 hours. Ladle into large, stemmed glasses. Garnish with cucumber slices.
Yields 9 cups.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Plain Risotto
Ingredients:
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon butter
1 medium onion (chopped)
1 cup Arborio rice
1/2 cup white wine or dry vermouth
4 cups chicken or vegetable broth
1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil and butter in a saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion and saut until soft.
Add rice and saut until rice is coated.
Add white wine or vermouth and stir until all the liquid is absorbed.
Add hot broth 1/2 cup at a time, until it is all absorbed in the rice and rice is tender.
Add hot water if more liquid is needed.
Stir in parmesan cheese and fresh parsley, and serve warm.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, diced
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 3/4 c. broth (chicken or beef)
1/2 c. sherry
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in 1/4 cup butter in large skillet until golden brown.
Add rice and stir until rice turns yellow.
Add broth and sherry.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat.
Cover and let simmer 15 to 20 minutes, until liquid is absorbed.
Add remaining 1/4 cup butter and stir in cheese.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Fuss Free Risotto
Ingredients:
2 1/4 c. water
1 c. long grain rice
3 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. half and half cream
3/4 c. grated Parmesan
1/2 to 1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In saucepan, bring to boil water and salt.
Stir in rice. Reduce heat; cover and simmer 15 minutes.
Stir in butter, cream and Parmesan.
Serve.

question: How do I make a basic risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto A La Milanese
Ingredients:
2 c. Arborio rice
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion
1 oz. milk cream
8 oz. dry white wine
4 Tbsp. grated cheese
pinch of saffron
2 qt. clear broth
Directions:
Prepare clear broth and set aside.
Saute onion in butter and oil until golden.
Add rice and stir until rice has absorbed liquid. Pour wine in and stir 2 minutes.
Begin adding broth; stir occasionally until rice is almost cooked.
Add saffron.
Premix cheese and cream and add to risotto.
Turn off heat.
Sprinkle remaining cheese and serve hot.
Makes 4 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Spiced Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. canola oil
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
2 lb. sweet potatoes, peeled and cut lengthwise into 3/4-inch thick wedges
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine oil with salt, cinnamon and cayenne. Stir in sweet potatoes until each piece is well coated. Arrange sweet potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes. Turn potatoes; bake until lightly browned, about 10 minutes. Remove from oven; place on serving platter.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
1 lb. sweet potatoes
1 egg white
2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. onion powder
Directions:
Peel and cut potatoes into 1/4 inch by 1/2 inch strips. In a bowl, combine egg white and seasonings; beat well. Add potatoes; toss to coat. Place in a single layer on two baking sheets coated with nonstick cooking spray. Bake, uncovered, at 450° for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. Yield: 8 servings. One 1/2 c. serving equals 40 calories, 20 mg sodium, 0 cholesterol, 9 gm carbohydrate, 1 gm protein, trace fat. Diabetic Exchange: 1/2 starch.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Oven Fries
Ingredients:
2 medium sweet potatoes (12 oz. total), peeled
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive or canola oil
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450 degrees.
Coat baking sheet with vegetable oil spray.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Oven Fries
Ingredients:
4 medium sweet potatoes
cooking oil spray
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut the sweet potatoes into wedges lengthwise. Spray them lightly with the cooking oil spray. Add the salt and pepper. Bake them at 450° until crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, about 25 minutes. Turn them halfway through the cooking time.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for baked sweet potato fries?
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Sweet Potato Fries
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil, divided
4 large sweet potatoes or baking potatoes, scrubbed
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Line cookie sheet with foil.
Brush with 1 teaspoon of oil.
Cut potatoes lengthwise into 1/2-inch thick wedges.
Transfer to a large bowl.
Add remaining teaspoon of oil, salt and pepper.
Toss.
Spread potatoes in single layer on prepared cookie sheet.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes, until golden and crisp.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese(Casserole)
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower (about 1 1/2 lb.)
1 small red pepper, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c .milk
3 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Jack cheese or white Brick cheese
2 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into flowerets.
Drop into boiling water with salt.
Cook five minutes or until tender-crisp.
Drain. Arrange in a shallow, 2-quart well-buttered baking dish.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower (about 1 1/2 lb.)
1 small red pepper, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced or mashed
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Jack cheese or white Brick cheese
2 Tbsp. fine dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. melted butter or margarine
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into flowerets.
Drop into boiling salted water.
Cook 5 minutes or until tender-crisp.
Drain.
Arrange in a shallow 2-quart well buttered baking dish.
Heat 1 tablespoon butter in frying pan.
Add red and green pepper and garlic.
Saute for 1 1/2 minutes.
Sprinkle over cauliflower.
Mix cornstarch into milk.
Add 2 tablespoons butter to frying pan.
Stir in milk and cornstarch mixture; cook, stirring until thickened.
Add salt, pepper and cheese.
Stir until cheese is blended.
Pour over vegetables.
Mix bread crumbs and butter.
Sprinkle on top of casserole.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes or cover and refrigerate. Bake for 35 minutes, if chilled.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Salad
Ingredients:
large head cauliflower, broken up
1 green pepper
1 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled or substitute Bac*Os
1/2 c. Miracle Whip
1/4 c. sugar
2 c. grated Colby cheese
1/2 c. onion
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine cauliflower, cheese, green pepper, onion and bacon. Mix Miracle Whip, sour cream and sugar.
Pour over ingredients and toss lightly.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Cheese Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. sugar
1 head cauliflower, cut into small pieces
1 green pepper, sliced thin
1 lb. cooked bacon, crumbled
1 c. shredded natural Colby cheese
Directions:
Mix mayonnaise and cheese; set aside.
Mix other ingredients. Add mayonnaise and cheese mixture.
Chill before serving.

question: What can I make with cauliflower and cheese?
answer:
Title: Company Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 large head cauliflower
1/4 c. diced green pepper
2 Tbsp. diced pimento
2 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1 tsp. salt
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 (14 oz.) can evaporated milk
1/4 lb. American cheese
paprika
Directions:
Separate cauliflower into medium pieces; cook, covered in boiling water, until tender (10 to 15 minutes).
Drain.
Saute green pepper and pimento in margarine; blend in flour.
Gradually stir in milk and cook, stirring constantly, until thick; add salt, mushroom soup and cheese.
Continue stirring until smooth.
Add cauliflower and mix gently until cauliflower is coated.
Pour into 1 1/2 to 2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with paprika.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Yield:
6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
6 cloves garlic, peeled and left whole
salt in water
Directions:
Boil potatoes and garlic in salt water until tender.
Drain well.
Add 1/2 stick light butter.
Using hand blender mash all above ingredients until smooth.
Slowly add skim milk and 2 Tablespoons lite mayo, until creamy consistency.
Sprinkle parsley before serving.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Herbed Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. potatoes
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, slivered
3/4 c. milk
2 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In large pot, boil potatoes.
Drain.
In same pot, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until golden, stirring frequently.
Remove pot from heat and add potatoes, remaining 2 tablespoons butter, milk, basil, salt and pepper. Using an electric beater or potato masher, beat mixture until smooth.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 baking potatoes, peeled and quartered (about 4 lb.)
1 3/4 tsp. salt, divided
1/2 c. butter, softened
3/4 c. half-and-half
3 large garlic cloves, minced
1/2 tsp. ground white pepper
1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil in a Dutch oven or stockpot; cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes or until tender; drain.
Beat potatoes, remaining 3/4 teaspoon salt, butter, half-and-half, garlic cloves, and pepper at medium speed with an electric mixer until smooth.
Stir in fresh parsley. Serve immediately.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
1 1/4 - 1 1/2 c low fat milk, warmed
1/2 tsp salt
dash pepper
Pam Garlic Flavor Seasoning spray
paprika, parsley, watercress, or chives for garnish
Directions:
Place potatoes and water to cover in large saucepan; heat to boiling. reduce heat; cover and simmer 20-25 min. until tender. Drain potatoes; return to saucepan. Mash potatoes until no lumps remain, gradually adding milk in small amounts. Add salt and pepper. Spray Pam into mixture for 15 seconds; mix until blended. Spoon into serving bowl and garnish with paprika, snipped parsley, watercress, or chives, if desired. Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make creamy garlic mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 medium-sized potatoes, peeled
2 large cloves garlic, peeled
2 c. boiling water
salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
3 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. heated cream
Directions:
Add potatoes and garlic to boiling water.
Cover and boil slowly about 30 minutes or until tender.
Drain, reserving cooking liquid.
Put hot potatoes and garlic through food ricer.
Add salt, pepper, butter and cream.
Stir to blend ingredients.
Add reserved potato cooking water to desired consistency.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Tacos(Quick Low Calorie Meal, Feeds 1 To 22)
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 can chicken or beef stock
1 pkg. taco seasoning or chili powder, black pepper and garlic salt
grated cheese
picante sauce
taco shells
onions
lettuce
cumin
tomato
Directions:
Cook ground beef in iron skillet on medium heat.
Add 1 can of beef or chicken stock.
Season with spices or package of taco seasoning.
When stock is reduced, serve meat with slotted spoon. Chop veggies and put each in it's own serving bowl.
Put grated cheese in bowl.
Heat shells on cookie sheet in 300° oven for 15 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
2 tsp. minced onions
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
3/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Cook ground beef in skillet until browned. Drain excess fat. Add rest of ingredients.
Simmer, uncovered, about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Makes 12 tacos.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Soft Beef Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 small onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 green pepper, chopped
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
1 c. water
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. dried whole oregano
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
8 (7-inch) flour tortillas
2 c. shredded lettuce
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
1 (8 oz.) carton commercial guacamole
commercial taco or picante sauce
Directions:
Cook first 5 ingredients in a large skillet until meat is browned, stirring to crumble. Drain well. Stir in water, cumin, chili powder, oregano, salt and pepper. Cover and simmer over low heat 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Uncover and cook 8 to 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, finely chopped
1 1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. rosemary
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. taco sauce
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Brown meat until crumbly; add other ingredients.
Blend well and heat through.

question: What’s a good recipe for tacos with ground beef?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 pkg. chili mix
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
1 smal can evaporated milk
1 lb. Velveeta cheese
1 can Ranch Style beans
Directions:
Brown ground beef and drain.
Add remaining ingredients and serve over tortilla chips.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Macaroni And Cheese
Ingredients:
4 c. cooked macaroni (2 c. uncooked)
2 c. (8 oz.) low fat sharp cheddar cheese
1 c. 1% low fat cottage cheese
3/4 c. no fat sour cream
1/2 c. skim milk
2 T. grated fresh onion
1 1/2 t. low fat stick margarine, melted
1/2 t. salt
1/4 t. pepper
1 egg, lightly beaten
cooking spray
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1 T. melted lowfat stick margarine
1/4 t. paprika
Directions:
Combine first 10 ingredients:
stir well and spoon into a 2 qt. casserole coated with cooking spray.
Combine bread crumbs and next 2 ingredients:
stir well.
Sprinkle over casserole.
Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 30 min.
Uncover:
bake 5 min. or until set.
Yield:
6 servings (1 cup each).

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Three Cheese Macaroni
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. small elbow macaroni (about 6 c.)
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese, grated (about 2 c.)
1/2 lb. Fontina cheese, grated (about 2 c.)
8 Tbsp. (1 stick) butter
4 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 large egg
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. bread crumbs (1 slice bread, toasted and crumbled)
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. extra virgin olive oil
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Cook pasta as directed; strain and place in a buttered 3-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle Cheddar and Fontina cheeses on top, reserving 1/2 cup of each of the cheeses. Stir lightly with a fork.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Macaroni And Cheese With Vegetables
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. macaroni
salt (for boiling macaroni)
3 Tbsp. margarine, divided
1 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. vegetable stock or water
3/4 c. milk
1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped
1 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 c. broccoli florets
1 small red bell pepper, chopped
1 c. sliced mushrooms
2 green onions, sliced
Directions:
Cook macaroni according to directions for about 10 minutes. Melt 2 tablespoons margarine in a medium saucepan.
Remove the pan from the heat; stir in the flour until well blended.
Stir in the vegetable stock or water and milk; place the pan back over medium heat.
Stir the mixture until it comes to a boil and thickens. Reduce heat to low.
Stir in cheeses, parsley, basil and spices. Continue stirring until cheese is melted.
Remove from heat; set aside.
In a skillet over medium heat, melt remaining margarine. Stir in broccoli, pepper, mushrooms and green onion.
Keep stirring until vegetables are soft.
When pasta is done, drain well.
Toss with the vegetables and the cheese sauce.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Old Fashion Macaroni And Cheese
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. elbow macaroni
2 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar (10 oz. pkg.)
1 1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, lightly beaten
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1/8 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Cook macaroni according to directions on package; drain well. Layer 1/3 of macaroni in greased 2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle 1/3 of cheese.
Repeat procedure and top with remaining macaroni (reserve remaining cheese).

question: What’s a recipe for homemade mac and cheese?
answer:
Title: Macaroni And Cheese(Serves 4 To 6)
Ingredients:
1 c. dry macaroni
2 c. water
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. butter, melted
1 egg, beaten
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dry mustard
3 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese
1 c. milk
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a quart pan, combine water and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Cover and bring to a boil.
Add macaroni slowly, so that water continues to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 8 to 9 minutes.
Drain macaroni in colander.
Place macaroni in a 1-quart casserole dish.
Stir in butter, egg, salt, dry mustard and 2 1/2 cups of the grated cheese.
Stir until evenly mixed.
Pour milk over macaroni mixture.
Top casserole with remaining 1/2 cup cheese.
Cover with foil.
Cook for 20 minutes.
Uncover casserole and cook another 10 to 12 minutes.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Chowder
Ingredients:
2 large leeks (white parts only)
1 lb. potatoes (about 3 medium), peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 c. chicken broth (homemade or canned)
freshly ground pepper to taste
salt (if desired, omit if using canned broth)
1 c. skim milk
2 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley or 2 tsp. dried flakes
1/2 c. grated Cheddar (2 oz.)
Directions:
Separate and wash the leeks.
Slice them into 1/2-inch pieces. In a nonstick large saucepan, saute the potatoes and leeks in the butter or margarine for several minutes, stirring the vegetables to prevent browning.
Add the broth, pepper and salt.
Bring the chowder to a boil; reduce heat, cover and simmer chowder for 20 to 30 minutes or until tender.
Add the milk gradually; heat the chowder gently, but do not boil.
Stir in the parsley.
Serve chowder with a generous sprinkle of grated cheese.
If desired, puree in blender before adding milk.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
bottoms of 3 large leeks
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 small clove garlic
salt and pepper to taste
1 pt. or more chicken broth
Directions:
Cook vegetables in enough water to keep from sticking until tender.
Add Accent while cooking.
Serve hot with saltine or other crackers.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
bottoms of 3 large leeks
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1 pt. or more chicken broth
1 small clove garlic
salt and pepper to taste
Accent
Directions:
Cook vegetables in enough water to keep from sticking until tender.
Add chicken broth and seasonings.
Add Accent while cooking.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
bottom of 3 large leeks
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. onion, chopped
small clove garlic
salt and pepper to taste
1 pt. or more chicken broth
Directions:
Cook vegetables in enough water to keep from sticking, until tender.
Serve hot with crackers.

question: What can I cook with leeks and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 c. diced onions
2 c. diced potatoes
2 c. chopped leeks
1 tsp. salt
3 c. water or chicken broth
1 can evaporated milk
Directions:
In a large pot saute onions in oil
until clear.
Add water, salt, potatoes and leeks.
Cover and simmer for 25 minutes or until potatoes are soft.
Puree in blender and return to pot.
Add milk. Heat for 5 minutes until hot.
Serve with croutons and fresh ground black pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: "Shortbread"(Cookies)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. butter, at room temperature
1 c. confectioners sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
2 2/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Beat butter, powdered sugar and vanilla until fluffy. Gradually add flour until well blended.
Divide dough in 1/2. Shape each into ball.
Flatten to 1-inch rounds between 2 pieces of plastic wrap.
Refrigerate until firm.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Jeweled Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. (2 sticks) margarine or butter, softened
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. almond extract or 1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. Quaker oats (quick or old fashioned, uncooked)
1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. fruit preserves
1/4 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Beat margarine, sugar and almond extract until fluffy.
Stir in combined oats and flour.
Divide dough into four equal pieces.
Place two portions on opposite corners of a large ungreased cookie sheet.
Press each into circle about 1/8-inch thick.
Press edges of dough with tines of fork.
Repeat with other two pieces.
Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until light golden brown.
Remove from oven; spread 2 tablespoons preserves on center of each circle.
Sprinkle 1 tablespoon almonds over preserves.
Cool 10 minutes on cookie sheet.
With large knife, cut each circle into 8 wedges.
Remove to wire rack; cool completely.
Store loosely covered.
Yields 32 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. butter
1 c. powdered sugar
3 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 c. granulated sugar
Directions:
Cream softened butter and confectioners sugar together until light. Sift flour and salt together and add to butter/sugar mixture. Add vanilla and blend thoroughly. Gather dough in a bowl; wrap in wax paper and chill 4 to 6 hours. Roll out chilled dough to 5/8-inch thickness. Cut out cookies (hearts or shamrocks are nice). Sprinkle tops with granulated white or colored sugar. Place cutout cookies on ungreased cookie sheet and refrigerate for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Whipped Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
1 c. softened butter or margarine
1/2 c. powdered sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1 c. plus 2 Tbsp. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter (1 cube) softened (or shortening)
6 Tbsp. sugar
6 Tbsp. brown sugar, packed
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. water
1 egg
1 (6 oz.) bag Nestle Toll House semi-sweet chocolate morsels (1 cup)
1/2 c. coarsely chopped walnuts (2 oz.)
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking soda and salt in bowl and set aside.
In a separate bowl, combine butter, granulated and brown sugars, vanilla and water.
Beat until creamy.
Beat in egg.
Add flour mixture and mix well.
Stir in chocolate morsels and walnuts. Drop by well-rounded half teaspoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375° for 10 to 12 minutes.
Makes 50 cookies.

question: What’s a recipe for classic shortbread cookies?
answer:
Title: Shortbread Cookies
Ingredients:
2/3 c. margarine
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
1 egg
4 tsp. milk
2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
Directions:
Thoroughly cream the shortening, sugar and vanilla.
Add egg; beat until light and fluffy.
Stir in milk.
Add dry ingredients; blend into creamed mixture.
Divide dough in half; chill for 1 hour.
On lightly floured surface, roll dough to 1/8 to 1/4-inch thickness.
Cut into desired shapes with cutters.
Bake on greased cookie sheet at 375° for about 6 to 8 minutes.
Cool slightly; remove from cookie sheet.
Makes approximately 2 dozen.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey-Mustard Chicken
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. crushed rosemary
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. water
2 Tbsp. oil
4 tsp. honey
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
2 lb. chicken
Directions:
Marinate chicken for about 1 hour.
Bake or broil until chicken is cooked.
Drizzle with remainder of marinade while cooking.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Mustard Marinade
Ingredients:
1 envelope honey mustard salad dressing mix
1/3 c. oil
1/3 c. orange juice
Directions:
Mix ingredients in bowl until well blended.
Reserve 1/4 cup for basting.
Pour marinade over meat, poultry, hamburger or seafood.
Cover and refrigerate.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Mustard Marinade (For Grilling)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. honey
1/4 c. Dijon mustard
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 cloves crushed garlic
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Brush on chicken while grilling. (Best to marinate chicken or pork for about 8 hours before grilling.)

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Tenders With Honey Mustard Sauce
Ingredients:
1 pkg. boneless skinless chicken breasts
2 eggs
1 can beer
3 Tbsp. hot sauce
1 c. flour
1/2 c. seasoned bread crumbs
1 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Tony Chachere's creole seasoning
2 Tbsp. paprika
Directions:
Honey-Mustard Sauce:
Combine honey and Dijon mustard to taste, approximately 2/3 mustard to 1/3 honey.

question: How do I make a honey mustard chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Honey Barbecue Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken
salt
pepper
1/3 c. dry white wine
2 pinches of ground ginger
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/2 c. ketchup
1 Tbsp. mustard
1/3 c. honey
Directions:
Salt and pepper chicken on one side.
Mix rest of ingredients and add chicken.
Place in refrigerator overnight.
Barbecue on low until chicken is cooked.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Rice
Ingredients:
rice
water
Directions:
Put rice and water together and cook it.
Eat with butter on it.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Tasty Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. rice
4 c. water
2 tsp. salt (optional)
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Stir lightly all ingredients; bring to a rolling boil and reduce heat to simmer. Cover with a tight fitting lid and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 5 minutes. Remove cover; fluff with fork.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Rice Cooking Directions
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 c. rice
1 tsp. salt (if desired)
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
For 3 to 12 cups cooked rice or seven 1/2 cup servings.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: White Rices(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
3 c. rice
1 Tbsp. oil
salt to taste
3 c. water
Directions:
Put water in pan.
Bring to a boil.
Add oil and salt and cook until done.
Serve with chicken or beef.

question: I have leftover rice. What can I do with it?
answer:
Title: Rice
Ingredients:
1 c. rice
1 can consomme
1 can onion mix or soup
1 can mushrooms
1 stick butter
Directions:
Mix together and bake, covered, at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. catsup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 bay leaf
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all of the ingredients in a small saucepan.
Bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Discard bay leaf.
Use as a basting sauce when grilling chicken, pork or beef.
Yields 1 1/2 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/2 to 1 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 bay leaf
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all of the ingredients in a small saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 30 minutes.
Discard bay leaf.
Use as a basting sauce for chicken, pork or beef.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. prepared barbecue sauce
1/2 c. chili sauce
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. honey
1/4 c. brown sugar
1 clove garlic, sliced thin
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in small saucepan.
Heat to thicken and blend flavors.
Baste turkey with sauce during the last half hour of roasting.
Make 2 2/3 cups.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/2 c. vinegar
1/4 c. oil
4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
Directions:
In a small saucepan, beat 1 egg; add remaining ingredients. Cook over medium-high, stirring constantly, until mixture begins to thicken.
Remove from heat.
Coat chicken wings, parts, breasts, etc. on the grill.

question: How do I make a tangy barbecue sauce?
answer:
Title: Tangy Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 small (18 oz.) jar barbecue sauce
1 small (12 oz.) jar chili sauce
1 small (14 oz.) jar catsup
2 c. sherry
1 c. crushed pineapple
1 lb. dark brown sugar
2 c. soy sauce
1 small (15 oz.) jar Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. liquid smoke
1 Tbsp. Lawry's seasoned salt
Directions:
Mix in 4-quart saucepan.
Bring to simmer for about 10 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Oven Fried Drumsticks
Ingredients:
12 chicken legs
3/4 c. flour
3/4 c. corn flake crumbs
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Wipe chicken legs with damp paper towel. In clean bag, combine flour, corn flake crumbs, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and garlic.
Dip chicken in egg a couple at a time, then shake in bag to coat with flour mixture.
Arrange in greased pan.
Pour melted margarine over chicken.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes at 400°.
Remove foil, increase heat to 450° and bake 25 to 30 minutes until golden brown.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Delicious Drumsticks
Ingredients:
1/2 c. Gold Medal all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. pepper
6 chicken drumsticks (1 1/2 lb.)
1/4 c. margarine or butter, melted and cooled
Directions:
Heat the oven to 425°.
Mix flour, salt, paprika and pepper in a bowl.
Dip chicken drumsticks into margarine; roll in flour mixture to coat.
Arrange in an ungreased square pan, 8 x 8 x 2-inches.
Bake, uncovered, until done, about 50 minutes.
Makes 6 drumsticks.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked Drumsticks
Ingredients:
6 chicken drumsticks
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. butter or margarine
Directions:
Heat oven to 425°.
Mix flour, salt, pepper and paprika in a bowl.
Dip drumstick into butter.
Roll in flour mixture to coat. Arrange in ungreased square pan, 8 x 8 x 2-inches.
Bake, uncovered, about 50 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Glazed Chicken Drumsticks
Ingredients:
12 chicken drumsticks (about 2 lb.)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. chili sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Place chicken drumsticks in ungreased shallow glass dish. Mix remaining ingredients.
