Pour over chicken.
Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour.
Heat oven to 375°.
Line broiler pan with aluminum foil.
Place chicken on rack in broiler pan. Brush chicken with remaining sauce.
Bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until done.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for baked chicken drumsticks?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wing Drumsticks
Ingredients:
12 chicken wings
1/3 c. sesame seed
2/3 c. fine dry breadcrumbs
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 c. half and half
Directions:
Remove and discard wing tips.
Separate remaining wing sections.
Cut skin at small end of each wing section.
Pull out one of the bones from section, having 2 bones; set aside.
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a small skillet, toast sesame seed over low heat until golden, stirring occasionally.
In a small shallow bowl, combine toasted seed, breadcrumbs, paprika, salt and seasoned salt.
Dip wing sections into half and half, then into breadcrumb mixture.
Arrange in a 13 x 9-inch baking pan.
Pour melted butter over chicken.
Bake 45 to 55 minutes in preheated oven until tender.
Makes 24 appetizer servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, torn
1 cucumber (bite size pieces)
3 large tomatoes (bite size pieces)
1 c. red cabbage, shredded
1 medium onion, sliced thin and separated into rings
1 small pkg. radishes, sliced
1 small flat of anchovies, drained and cut up
16 green and black olives, pitted (whole)
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
Directions:
Wash and prepare all the vegetables.
Combine in a large bowl and add the anchovies, olives and cheese.
Toss well with your favorite Italian dressing or:

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1 large head lettuce, shredded
potato salad (recipe given)
2 or 3 tomatoes, cut into wedges
1 cucumber, cut lengthwise into fingers
1 to 2 avocados, sliced
6 slices Feta (Greek cheese)
1 green pepper, cut into rings
1/4 c. olive oil and 1/4 c. salad oil, blended
6 to 8 slices canned beets, cooked
shrimp, peeled and cooked
6 to 8 anchovy fillets
black olives (Greek-style preferred)
6 to 8 whole green onions
1/2 c. white vinegar
oregano
Directions:
Mound the potato salad on a large platter. Cover the potato salad with the shredded lettuce, then arrange the remaining vegetables in an attractive pattern on the lettuce. Place the anchovies and shrimp on top of the salad. The entire salad is then sprinkled with the vinegar, then the blended oil. Sprinkle liberally with oregano over all and serve at once. Toasted French or Greek bread is served with the salad. Each person serves himself from the beautiful salad platter. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1 medium cucumber
2 c. fresh spinach
2 c. Boston lettuce
1/4 c. crumbled Feta cheese
2 Tbsp. sliced green onions
10 pitted ripe olives, sliced
1 medium tomato, in wedges
Directions:
Score cucumber by running tines of fork lengthwise down sides; slice.
Toss cucumber with remaining ingredients.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/4 c. wine vinegar
bay leaf
1 clove garlic
1 tsp. oregano
1/4 c. parsley, chopped
1 bunch romaine (bite size pieces)
1/2 head lettuce (bite size pieces)
2 red onions, sliced thin
2 tomatoes, quartered
1 cucumber, sliced
1/2 green pepper, cut into strips
8 to 10 black olives
1/4 lb. Feta cheese, crumbled
4 hard-cooked eggs
Directions:
In a jar, combine oil, vinegar, bay leaf, garlic and oregano. Shake well and chill several hours.
In a large bowl, combine remaining ingredients.
Before serving, remove bay leaf and garlic from dressing.
Shake well and pour over salad.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a Greek salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients:
6 c. torn lettuce
1 1/2 c. halved cherry tomatoes
1 c. (1/4-inch thick) slices red onion, separated into rings
1 c. cucumber, halved lengthwise and cut into 1/4-inch slices
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley or 1 tsp. dried parsley
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
2 tsp. Dijon mustard
3/4 tsp. dried oregano
1 tsp. extra virgin olive oil
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 c. (2 oz.) crumbled Feta cheese
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/4 c. kalamata olives, pitted and halved
1/2 c. pepperoni slices, cut into quarters
8 pepperoncini peppers
Directions:
Place lettuce, tomatoes, onion and cucumber in large serving bowl; toss to combine. Combine parsley and next 7 ingredients, stirring with a whisk. Add dressing, cheese, olives and peppers to lettuce mixture. Toss gently to coat. Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
3/4 cube oleo
4 medium onions, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
9 garlic cloves, chopped
handful of celery leaves, chopped
10 dried chili peppers, crushed
1 1/2 tsp. cumin seed, crushed
4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cayenne
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
2/3 can tomato sauce
Directions:
Fry on medium-high heat the oil, all spices and celery leaves until absorbed by oil and not powder.
Add tomato sauce and cook until thick.
Skin and cup up chicken and put in large pot. Add sauce to chicken and simmer 20 to 25 minutes.
Add water to not quite halfway to the top of chicken.
Cover and simmer until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
1/4 c. chopped onions
1/3 c. flour
1 Tbsp. salt
4 c. cooked chicken
1 c. chicken stock
2 c. milk
1 tsp. lemon juice
3 Tbsp. curry powder
Directions:
Fry onions in butter.
Add flour, salt, curry powder and chicken stock.
Stir constantly until mixture is thick.
Add milk, lemon juice and chicken.
Heat well.
(May be made in advance and reheated.)
Serve over rice with chopped bacon or chutney, diced pineapple and coconut.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken breasts (4 to 7)
1/4 c. butter
2 medium onions, chopped
2 or 3 cloves garlic
3 Tbsp. curry powder
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
4 c. water
4 little green peppers (don't cut open)
1 inch stick cinnamon
8 cloves
6 cardamon seed
salt to taste
1/4 c. butter
3 1/2 c. rice
5 c. chicken broth
Directions:
Boil chicken with onion, celery and salt; debone.
Saute onions, garlic and green peppers in butter.
Stir constantly, then add tomato paste and water.
Add chicken; cook about 20 minutes. Keep chicken broth.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken pieces, skinned
2 cloves garlic, chopped
2-inch pieces ginger, chopped
2 tsp. cumin seed, ground
3 Tbsp. natural yogurt
4 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. turmeric
pinch of chili powder
1 tsp. pepper
2 onions, chopped
salt
Directions:
Place the garlic, ginger, turmeric, cumin, chili pepper, coriander and yogurt in a large bowl with salt to taste.
Mix well.
Add chicken and leave for 4 hours; turn occasionally. Heat the oil in the pan; add the onion and fry until golden. Add the chicken and marinade.
Bring to simmering point; cover and cook for about 30 minutes, until the chicken is tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy chicken curry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, cubed
4 Tbsp. margarine
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. cayenne pepper
3 onions, sliced
3 garlic cloves, minced
2-inch piece fresh ginger
2 tsp. cumin
2 tsp. coriander
1 c. plain yogurt
1 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Shake flour, cayenne and chicken in a bag to coat.
Remove chicken and saute in margarine until lightly browned.
Remove chicken.
In same pan, add onions, garlic and grated ginger; fry until soft.
Add cumin and coriander; fry, stirring constantly, for 2 minutes.
Return chicken to pan; add cream and yogurt. Simmer for 30 minutes until sauce is brown and thick.
Serve over Rice Pilau.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Take Alongs
Ingredients:
2/3 c. butter or margarine
2/3 c. sugar
1 egg
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. oats (quick or old-fashioned)
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. wheat germ or finely chopped nuts
6 crispy cooked bacon slices, crumbled
Directions:
Beat together until well blended the butter, sugar, egg and vanilla.
Add the combined flour, soda and salt; mix well.
Stir in oats, cheese, wheat germ and bacon.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased cookie sheet.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 14 minutes or until edges are golden brown.
Cool 1 minute on cookie sheet; remove to wire cooling rack.
Store in loosely covered container. Yield:
about 3 dozen cookies.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Do Ahead Breakfast
Ingredients:
1 lb. breakfast sausage (or hot and spicy sausage)
12 slices bread
9 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. milk (approximately)
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 (16 oz.) container sour cream
1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese
mushrooms, bell peppers, onions (optional)
1 loaf French bread
6 eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. sugar, divided
1 tsp. vanilla
1/8 tsp. salt
cinnamon
powdered sugar
3 c. (1 lb.) strawberries, stemmed and sliced
1/2 tsp. lemon zest
1 tsp. lemon juice
12 slices cinnamon bread
1 pt. (16 oz.) half and half or light cream
4 large eggs
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
2 Tbsp. brown sugar, firmly packed
2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 tsp. grated orange peel (optional)
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
powdered sugar (used for garnish only)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Lightly grease a 13 x 9 baking pan. Arrange bread slices in two layers.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Breakfast For One
Ingredients:
1 slice bread, tear into bite-size pieces
1 egg, beaten well
cinnamon to taste
2 tsp. sugar or 1 to 2 pkg. Sweet 'N Low
1/2 Granny Smith apple (tart), diced and unpeeled
small dab of diet margarine
Directions:
Fry apples with margarine in nonstick skillet until softened. Crumble bread into beaten egg.
Mix until bread is soaked like French toast.
Pour into skillet with apples.
Add cinnamon and sugar (or Sweet 'N Low).
Continue to fry until bread is toasty and apples are turning brown and are done.

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Drink
Ingredients:
3/4 c. orange juice
1 small carrot, sliced
1/2 banana
1 egg
1/3 c. dry milk powder
1 tsp. honey
Directions:
Blend all ingredients in a blender and drink!

question: What’s a low-carb recipe for breakfast?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Breakfast Eggs
Ingredients:
1 doz. eggs
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. butter
1 (8 oz.) container sour cream
12 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a medium bowl, beat eggs.
Stir in milk, salt and pepper; set aside.
In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter; pour in egg mixture.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until eggs are set but still moist.
Remove from heat to cool.
Stir in sour cream. Spread evenly into buttered 2-quart shallow baking dish (12 x 7-inch).
Top with bacon and cheese.
Cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.
Preheat oven to 300°.
Uncover eggs; bake 15 to 20 minutes or until hot and cheese has melted.
Refrigerate leftovers.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Kid'S Favorite Chicken
Ingredients:
8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
1 roll Ritz crackers, very finely crushed
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
black pepper to taste
1 stick margarine, melted
Directions:
Mix cracker crumbs, cheese, salt, garlic and pepper; set aside.
Cut chicken into small pieces (about 1 1/2 inches).
Dip chicken in margarine, then into crumb mixture.
Place on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until done.
Serve with Pineapple Dipping Sauce.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken For A Crowd
Ingredients:
4 c. diced, cooked chicken or turkey
1 c. chopped celery
2 Tbsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. mayonnaise
a little curry
water chestnuts, if desired
8 slices bread, cubed
3 eggs
1 pt. half and half cream
1 can cream of mushroom or cream of chicken soup
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Put 4 slices cubed bread on bottom of a greased 9 x 13-inch Pyrex dish.
Add chicken mixture.
Top with 4 slices of cubed bread.
Mix eggs and half and half cream.
Pour over casserole. Let stand, covered in refrigerator, overnight.
Next day, spread soup over mixture.
Top with grated Cheddar cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Serve immediately.
Serves 10.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Oh So Good
Ingredients:
1 lb. skinless chicken breasts
1/4 c. liquid Butter Buds
1 (8 oz.) can golden cream of mushroom soup
1 beef bouillon cube
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. poppy seed
1 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots
1/2 c. celery, sliced
1/2 c. onion, sliced
1 (3 oz.) can sliced mushrooms
1 small green pepper strips
1/4 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Cut chicken in 1 1/2-inch pieces.
Brown chicken in skillet sprayed with cooking spray.
Stir in Butter Buds, soup, water, bouillon cube, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce, curry and poppy seed.
Mix well.
Cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Poultry Main Dishes
Ingredients:
3/4 c. Italian-seasoned fine dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
6 whole large chicken breasts, skinned, split lengthwise and boned
1/2 c. sliced green onion
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 c. milk
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
1 (4 oz.) pkg. boiled ham slices, diced
boneless chicken breast
8 oz. sour cream
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/3 soup can sherry
1 jar sliced mushrooms
Directions:
Place chicken breast in bottom of casserole dish.
Mix soup, sour cream and sherry.
Pour over chicken.
Spread mushrooms on top.
Cook, covered, in 325° oven for 45 minutes.
Uncover and cook for 15 minutes at 350°.
Serve with egg noodles.

question: What’s a kid-friendly dinner recipe with chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Feed
Ingredients:
1 small onion, sliced
2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. dried thyme, divided
1 Tbsp. margarine
4 c. cubed leftover chicken or turkey
4 c. leftover gravy
1 chicken bouillon cube, crushed
dash of pepper
3 c. mashed potatoes
Directions:
In skillet, saute onion, mushrooms, garlic and 1/4 teaspoon thyme in the margarine.
Stir in the chicken, gravy, bouillon and pepper; spoon into a greased casserole and remaining thyme.
Spoon over mixture.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes.
Yield:
6 to 8 servings.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. smoked sausage
1/2 c. margarine
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 c. green pepper strips
1/3 c. chopped onions
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
2 1/4 c. milk
2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. pepper
3 c. ziti
Directions:
In a large pan, brown sausage.
Slice into coin size pieces. Remove from pan and drain.
Melt margarine and cook mushrooms, green pepper and onions until tender (but do not brown).
Blend flour into vegetable mixture.
Gradually stir in milk.
Cook, stirring constantly, over medium heat until it begins to boil. Blend in cheese until melted.
Cook ziti; drain.
Stir hot ziti, cheese, vegetables and sausage together.
Pour into 2-quart buttered dish.
Bake at 350°, covered, for 30 minutes.
Makes about 6 servings.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. Italian sausage, cut into slices
1/3 c. chopped onions
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
2 c. eggplant, pared and cut into strips
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
3 c. uncooked ziti
3 1/2 c. spaghetti sauce
1 c. Mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown sausage, onions, garlic, mushrooms and eggplant.
Saute until vegetables are tender; drain off fat.
Add salt and pepper. Set aside.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti With Sausage
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti
1 1/2 lb. sweet Italian sausage links
1 medium size onion, chopped
1 large green pepper, chopped
1 (30 oz.) jar chunky garden-style spaghetti sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded part-skim Mozzarella cheese (2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) container part-skim Ricotta cheese
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
About 1 1/4 hours before serving:
In saucepot, prepare ziti as label directs, but do not use salt in water.
Drain ziti and return to pan.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Ziti With Sausage And Cream Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. ziti
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 lb. Italian sweet sausage, casing removed
1 c. heavy whipping cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat butter and oil in large frying pan.
Add onion and saute for 2 minutes.
Add sausage and cook, crumbling with fork, for 10 minutes, or until lightly browned.
Reduce heat to low and add cream, salt and pepper.
Continue to cook, stirring constantly, until sauce thickens; do not boil.

question: How can I make baked ziti with sausage?
answer:
Title: Baked Ziti
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. ziti macaroni
1 (16 oz.) pkg. sweet Italian sausage links
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (30 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. (2 c.) shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 (15 oz.) Ricotta cheese (2 c.)
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cook ziti according to package directions and drain.
Remove casings from sausage links. Brown sausage in a large skillet, stirring occasionally. Saute onion in sausage drippings. Drain off excess fat.
Combine ziti, sausage/onion mixture, spaghetti sauce, 1 cup Mozzarella cheese and Ricotta cheese. Spoon mixture into 3 1/2-quart casserole. Top with Parmesan and remaining Mozzarella cheese. Cover and bake 30 to 40 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Veggie Mix
Ingredients:
1 bunch broccoli
1 head cauliflower
1 onion
Directions:
Cut into bite size pieces.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Combo
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli
2 c. frozen sliced carrots
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 (16 oz.) can creamed corn
1/2 tsp. salt
1 (3 oz.) can French fried onion rings
Directions:
Place broccoli and carrots in 1 1/2-quart glass casserole dish.
Cover with glass lid.
Microwave for 10 minutes on High. Drain.
Stir in corn, cheese and seasonings.
Sprinkle with onion rings.
Microwave for 5 to 6 minutes or until heated through.
Let stand for 2 minutes before serving.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Carrot-Broccoli Medley
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 1/2 c. 1/4-inch sliced carrots
1 1/2 c. chopped frozen or fresh broccoli
snipped parsley
Directions:
Place
margarine, salt, nutmeg, carrots and broccoli in 1-quart casserole.	Cover tightly and microwave on High (100%) for 4	minutes;
stir.
Cover	and microwave until vegetables are crisp-tender, 2 to 4 minutes longer.
Let stand 5 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Carrot Surprise
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli
1 (10 oz.) can cream of mushroom or cream of chicken soup
1 1/2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. grated carrots
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
3/4 c. bread cubes
salt and pepper (to taste)
Directions:
Cook broccoli; drain well.
While broccoli is cooking, blend soup and flour; stir in sour cream.
Mix with broccoli and carrots.
Put in greased 1-quart casserole.
Melt butter; stir in bread cubes and poultry seasoning; spoon around edge of casserole. Bake at 350° until hot and bubbly, about 30 minutes.

question: How do I make a crispy vegetable tempura?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Carrot Supreme
Ingredients:
6 carrots
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. dried whole thyme
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 bay leaf
1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen cut broccoli, cooked and drained
1/4 c. whipping cream
1/4 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Scrape carrots and cut into thin slices.
Saute carrots and onion in butter in a large skillet 4 minutes.
Stir in wine and next 4 ingredients.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes or until carrots are tender.
Discard bay leaf.
Stir in broccoli, whipping cream and pecans.
Cook until thoroughly heated.
Yield: 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Chocolate Candy
Ingredients:
6 (1 oz.) sq. semi-sweet chocolate
1/2 c. butter
1 1/4 c. powdered sugar
3 egg yolks
1 tsp. vanilla
1 to 2 Tbsp. chopped nuts or almonds (optional)
Directions:
Melt chocolate in the top of a double boiler over hot water. Combine butter and powdered sugar in mixing bowl.
Beat well until smooth and creamy.
Beat yolks, one at a time, stirring constantly.
Stir in chocolate, vanilla and nuts (if used).
Chill until mixture is fairly thick, but not yet set.
Drop mixture into small paper cups or spread on baking sheet lined with waxed paper. Refrigerate until set.
Cut chocolate on baking sheet into bite-size pieces.
Makes about 30 pieces.
Preparation time: 25 minutes.
Chilling time: 1 hour.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Black And Whites
Ingredients:
2 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. unsweetened cocoa powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. dark brown sugar, firmly packed
1 c. (5 1/4 oz.) white chocolate bar, coarsely chopped
3/4 c. white sugar
1 c. salted butter, softened
3 large eggs
2 tsp. pure vanilla extract
1 c. coarsely chopped semi-sweet chocolate
Directions:
Preheat oven to 300°.
In medium bowl, combine flour, cocoa, soda and salt.
Mix well with a wire whisk.
Set aside.
Blend sugars in a large bowl using an electric mixer set at medium speed. Add butter and mix to form a grainy paste, scraping down the sides of the bowl.
Add eggs and vanilla and beat at medium speed until smooth.
Add the flour mixture and chocolates and blend at low speed until just combined.
Do not overmix.
Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets, 2 inches apart.
Bake 18 to 22 minutes.
Transfer cookies immediately to a cool, flat surface.
Yield:
3 dozen.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Dessert
Ingredients:
5 beaten egg yolks
2/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1 c. butter
1 c. confectioners sugar
2 1/2 (1 oz.) sq. semi-sweet chocolate, melted
5 egg whites
1 c. vanilla wafers, crushed very fine
Directions:
Mix milk, sugar and egg yolks.
Cook over low heat over water, stirring constantly until thickened; cool.
Cream together butter, confectioners sugar and cooled chocolate.
Blend with first mixture.
Beat egg whites until stiff.
Fold chocolate mixture into egg whites.
Blend well.
Sprinkle half of crumbs into an 8 x 8-inch pan.
Pour mixture on top of crumbs.
Cover with remaining crumbs.
Chill overnight.
May be served with Cool Whip.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Delights
Ingredients:
1 lb. sweet milk chocolate
2 (1 oz.) sq. unsweetened chocolate
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. chopped dates
1/4 tsp. salt
5 c. corn flakes
Directions:
Melt both chocolates over hot water.
Combine remaining ingredients.
Add to chocolate; mix well.
Drop from teaspoon onto waxed paper.
Chill until firm.
Makes 6 1/2 dozen.

question: What’s a recipe for a chocolate soufflé?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chews
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or oleo
1/2 c. dark corn syrup
6 Tbsp. baking cocoa
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
3 1/4 c. confectioners sugar, divided
3/4 c. nonfat dry milk powder
Directions:
In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat.
Stir in corn syrup and cocoa and bring to a boil.
Remove from heat and add vanilla, 2 cups sugar and the powdered milk.
(Mixture will be stiff.)
Turn out onto a surface lightly dusted with confectioners sugar.
Knead in remaining sugar.
Knead 3 to 4 minutes until stiff.
Divide into 4 pieces and roll each into an 18-inch rope. Cut into 3/4-inch pieces.
Wrap and store in refrigerator.
Makes 8 dozen.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken In Sauce
Ingredients:
16 chicken thighs
3/4 c. oil
1 c. flour
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
2 c. apple or white grape juice
1/4 c. catsup
1/2 tsp. marjoram
1/2 tsp. sage
3 minced garlic cloves
1/2 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
5 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. basil
Directions:
Mix flour, pepper and salt.
Coat the chicken thighs in this mixture.
Brown in oil in a 14-inch Dutch oven.
Set over 20 coals.
Drain
grease off.	Mix the rest of the ingredients in a separate
pan and boil for 2 minutes.
Pour over browned thighs in Dutch oven.
Cook 1 hour with 20 coals on the bottom only.	Turn every 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Thighs Supreme
Ingredients:
6 chicken thighs, skinned
3 medium-sized onions, cut or whole
1 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1 tsp. chopped garlic
1 tsp. celery salt
2 c. water
1 bay leaf
1 small peeled potato
pepper to taste
Directions:
Put chicken in large pot.
Add onions, vinegar, garlic, celery salt, pepper, water and bay leaf.
Cover and cook 1 hour over medium heat.
Check during cooking and add additional water, if needed.
Halfway through cooking, add potato.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken Thighs And Rice
Ingredients:
2 slices bacon
1 to 1 1/2 lb. chicken thighs (boneless)
1/2 c. long grain rice
1 small onion, cut into thin wedges
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes, drained and cut up
1/2 c. quartered fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
3 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet cook bacon until crisp.
Drain, reserving drippings.
Crumble bacon and set aside.
Brown chicken in reserve drippings, about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper.
Remove chicken from skillet.
Cook rice, onion wedges and garlic in skillet drippings until rice is golden brown.
Stir frequently.
Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, wine, bouillon granules, salt, basil and 1 cup water.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: "Unfried" Chicken
Ingredients:
3 1/2 c. ice water
4 lb. skinned chicken
1 c. nonfat plain yogurt
1 c. Italian bread crumbs
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. Old Bay seasoning
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. Creole seasoning
1/8 tsp. pepper
dash of cayenne pepper
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Place ice water in large bowl and soak chicken parts while preparing the breading.
Spray baking sheet with Pam.

question: What can I make with chicken thighs and rice?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
4 to 6 chicken thighs
1 c. rice
2 tsp. poultry seasoning
2 tsp. onion powder
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. pepper
1 small can peas (optional)
Directions:
Put chicken thighs in large saucepan; cover with water.
Add all seasonings.
Bring to boil; continue boiling until meat begins to fall off bone.
Remove thighs from water; take meat off bone and discard skin and bone.
Continue boiling water until about 2 cups remain in saucepan.
Add rice and boned chicken.
Cover; simmer for about 20 minutes, until all water is absorbed.
Drain and add peas.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
3 large chicken breasts, split, skinned and boned
1 egg, beaten
1/4 c. milk
1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 clove garlic, mashed
1 c. Marsala cooking wine
1 can chicken broth
1 lemon
Directions:
Flatten chicken pieces between sheets of wax paper with rolling pin or mallet.
Pieces should be 1/4-inch thick.
Combine egg and milk in dish.
Combine flour, salt and pepper on wax paper.
Dip chicken into egg mixture, then into flour mixture to coat all sides.
Refrigerate 2 hours.
Heat oil and butter in large skillet. Brown chicken on both sides.
Remove to platter.
Saute onion, mushrooms and garlic until tender.
Remove to platter.
Add wine and chicken broth to pan; boil 10 minutes to reduce liquid.
Return chicken and vegetables to pan; heat thoroughly.
Arrange on platter.
Garnish with lemon slices.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
4 whole chicken breasts (8 pieces), boned and skinned
3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. oregano
6 Tbsp. margarine
1 1/4 c. Marsala or dry sherry, divided
juice of 1/2 lemon
Directions:
Pound breasts slightly and dredge in flour mixed with seasonings.
Melt margarine in skillet; brown chicken on both sides.
Add 1 cup wine, cover and simmer 1/2 hour or until tender.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
4 boneless breasts
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
1 small bottle olive oil
2 eggs
1 c. milk
1 pkg. fettucine noodles
juice of 1 lemon
1/2 c. favorite wine
4 Tbsp. flour
2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. water
salt to taste
Directions:
Dip chicken in egg, milk and bread crumbs.
Brown lightly in olive oil.
Remove chicken and set aside. Make gravy with flour and butter.
When bubbly, add wine and water.
May need to add more water to get to right consistency.
Squeeze in lemon juice. Add chicken to gravy. Slice lemons on top.
Add salt and garlic. Cover and simmer 20 to 30 minutes.
Serve over pasta.
Soooo Good!

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
8 chicken breast halves
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, washed and sliced
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. dry Marsala
1 c. chicken stock (fresh or canned)
1/4 c. lemon juice
flour
1 tsp. oregano
salt
white pepper
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Flatten chicken breasts (place between 2 pieces of plastic wrap and use rolling pin to flatten to uniform thickness).
Dredge breasts in flour with oregano, pepper and salt; shake off excess. Lightly brown in olive oil and butter.
Drain on paper towels. Set aside.
Saute mushrooms in remaining oil; remove from skillet. Pour over breasts.
Add lemon juice, chicken stock and Marsala to skillet and simmer.
Add about 2 tablespoons cornstarch mixed into 1/4 cup water and add to the skillet mixture.
Stir constantly until becomes thick and smooth.
Add 2 tablespoons butter and stir in.
Pour sauce over chicken and mushrooms.
Keep warm until you serve and garnish with lemon slices.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic chicken marsala?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marsala
Ingredients:
2 whole chicken breasts, skinned, boned and halved lengthwise
1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
3/4 c. beef broth
1/4 c. Marsala or other dry red wine
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place each breast half between two pieces of heavy-duty plastic wrap or waxed paper and set on a sturdy surface.
With flat side of meat mallet, pound to 1/4-inch thickness.
Remove plastic or waxed paper; dredge each piece slightly in flour.
In skillet, melt butter and oil.
Saute mushrooms over medium heat until tender.
With slotted spoon, remove from skillet.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Baked Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. catfish fillets
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (1/4 lb.) butter
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
In a 12 x 8 x 2-inch dish, arrange fillets with thickest, meaty areas to outside edge of dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In 1-quart casserole dish, place butter. Microwave on High for 1 to 2 minutes until melted. Blend in parsley and lemon juice; pour over fish. Sprinkle paprika over fillets. Preheat oven to 350°. Place casserole dish in oven. Cook 45 to 60 minutes or until fillets are fluffy. Serves 2 to 3 people.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. celery seed
1 lb. fish fillet
Directions:
Place butter in baking dish.
Microwave on High to melt butter (45 seconds).
Blend in seasonings.
Coat fish fillets in mixture. Place around in dish.
Cover with wax paper and microwave on High until fish flakes (with fork).
Approximate time is 5 to 6 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter or margarine
2 1/4 c. sugar
3 lemons
Directions:
Allspice:
pot roasts, squash, fish, eggs, sweet potatoes.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Broiled Fish
Ingredients:
3/4 c. fresh lemon juice
3/4 c. unsalted (sweet) butter, melted
1 tsp. sage
3 lb. fresh fish (fillet of sole, flounder, haddock, halibut, salmon, trout, whiting)
Directions:
Combine lemon juice, butter and sage.
Pour over fish. Marinate in refrigerator at least 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for lemon butter fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Sauce For Fish
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter. Blend in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually stir in milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and smooth. Add lemon juice and parsley. Serve over fish.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
8 c. chopped Red Delicious apples
2 c. celery
1 c. English walnuts
1/2 c. mayonnaise (light, if desired)
1/2 c. sour cream (light, if desired)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 medium apples, diced
2 stalks celery, chopped
1/2 c. chopped nuts (walnuts)
1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
Directions:
Mix ingredients together until well coated.
Chill and serve.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
3 c. chopped apples
2 c. marshmallows (miniature)
1 c. celery slices
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
salad dressing
Directions:
Combine apples, marshmallows, thin celery slices and walnuts. Add enough salad dressing to moisten.
Miracle Whip is best.
Toss lightly.
Chill.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. diced apples
1 c. cut celery
1/2 c. broken walnuts
3/4 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. lemon juice
dash of salt
Directions:
Combine apples, celery and walnuts.
Blend together mayonnaise, sugar, lemon juice and salt.
Fold into apple mixture. Chill.

question: How do I make a classic Waldorf salad?
answer:
Title: Waldorf Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. diced unpared red apples
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 c. celery, diced
1/2 c. walnuts, chopped
Directions:
Combine apples, celery and mayonnaise in bowl and chill.
Just before serving, fold in nuts.
Serves 4.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon, Fresh-Grilled Or Baked
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen salmon
2/3 c. onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/3 c. chopped fresh tomatoes
1/4 c. chopped green peppers
1/4 c. parsley
3 Tbsp. chopped pimentos
1/2 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dill weed
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place salmon, skin side down, in baking dish which has been sprayed or greased and lined with aluminum foil.
Mix the vegetables, mushrooms, pimentos and parsley; put over fish.
Mix rest of ingredients and pour over fish.
Wrap foil over fish and seal tight.
Bake or grill 25 to 30 minutes at 350° or until flakes.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Horseradish Pate(A Great Way To Use Leftover Cooked Salmon)
Ingredients:
1 c. cooked salmon, flaked
1/3 c. shallots, minced
1 Tbsp. horseradish
2 Tbsp. diet mayonnaise (enough to hold it together)
freshly ground pepper
1 tsp. lemon juice
2 to 3 cucumbers, thinly sliced
Directions:
In a bowl, combine salmon, shallots, dill, horseradish, mayonnaise and pepper.
Let ripen at least 4 hours in the refrigerator.
(Keep only 1 to 2 days in the refrigerator.) Spread on thinly sliced cucumber rounds.
Can also be used as a dip for raw vegetables.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Spread
Ingredients:
2 cans (15 oz.) salmon, drained, boned and flaked
1 Tbsp. minced onion
1 Tbsp. prepared horseradish
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
2 1/2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. sour cream
fresh dill or parsley (optional)
toasted bread rounds or crackers
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine first 8 ingredients; mix well. Spread on a serving platter and shape into a loaf or ball.
Top with sour cream.
Garnish with dill or parsley if desired.
Serve with bread rounds or crackers.
Yields 8 to 10 appetizer servings.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Medley
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked salmon or canned, flaked
2 boiled potatoes, diced
2 Tbsp. green, yellow and/or red sweet peppers, chopped
1/4 c. onion, chopped
pinch of cayenne pepper
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. parsley, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. heavy cream
Directions:
In a bowl, combine all ingredients, except olive oil and cream.
In a skillet, heat olive oil.
Add salmon mixture and flatten with back of a spatula.
When the mixture begins to develop a crust on the bottom, flip over with spatula.
Add cream and turn up heat to thicken sauce and brown other side quickly. Garnish with avocado slices and add salsa to taste.
Makes 2 servings.

question: What can I do with leftover salmon?
answer:
Title: Salmon Dip
Ingredients:
1 can (1 lb.) salmon
juice of 1 lemon
2 tsp. chopped chives
1 tsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. crumbled dried rosemary
1/8 tsp. coarse black pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Drain salmon; remove and discard bones and skin.
Mash salmon; add remaining ingredients, except sour cream.
Mix well; fold in sour cream.
Chill for at least one hour.
Makes 2 cups. Serve with chips or crackers.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: What Shall We Do With The Leftover Turkey
Ingredients:
6 slices white bread
2 c. cubed turkey
1 c. cubed ham
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
1 can sliced water chestnuts
1/4 c. sliced pimentos
1 c. mayo
3/4 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 slightly beaten eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1/2 c. sharp cheese, shredded
Directions:
Butter 2 slices of bread.
Cut into small cubes and set aside. Cut remaining bread in cubes.
Place half of unbuttered cubes in bottom of an 8
x
8 x 2-inch baking dish. Combine turkey, ham, vegetables, seasonings and mayonnaise. Spoon over bread.
Place remaining unbuttered cubes over mixture. Combine eggs and milk; pour over all.
Chill for 1 hour or overnight. Spoon soup over top and sprinkle with the buttered cubes. Bake at 325° for 1 hour or until set. Sprinkle shredded cheese over top during the last few minutes of baking.
Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
Makes 6 healthy servings.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Left-Over Turkey
Ingredients:
1 qt. turkey, diced or what you have left over
1 c. broth or 1 c. boiling water and 1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 small can Ro-Tel, diced
1/4 lb. grated cheese
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 (7 oz.) pkg. Tostitos, broken
Directions:
Mix everything but the chips.
Stir well.
Butter casserole dish.
Pour some of the mixture in the bottom of the pan.
Layer with chips.
Repeat meat, chips; meat, chips.
You can shred the cheese or grate it over each layer or just put it over the top. Bake uncovered at 350° for 30 minutes or until bubbly and cheese melts.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: "Goodbye" Turkey
Ingredients:
5 Tbsp. sifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. onion salt
1/4 c. butter, melted
2 1/2 c. milk or light cream
1 1/3 c. Minute rice
1 1/2 c. turkey or chicken broth
1/2 c. grated American cheese
1 1/2 c. cooked asparagus or sweet peas
2 c. turkey
2 Tbsp. toasted slivered almonds
Directions:
Sift flour, half of salt and onion salt into butter.
Stir in milk.
Cook over hot water, stirring occasionally until thickened. Pour Minute rice into 2-quart shallow baking dish.
Combine broth, remaining salt and pour over rice.
Sprinkle half of cheese over rice.
Top with asparagus or peas, then turkey.
Pour on sauce.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese.
Bake at 375° about 20 minutes.
Top with almonds.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Soup From Leftover Turkey
Ingredients:
all bones leftover from the poultry
any leftover stuffing or dressing
2 qt. cold water
1 carrot, pared and sliced
1 onion, sliced
1 stalk celery, sliced
2 sprigs parsley
1 bay leaf
3 whole black peppers
2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 qt. tomatoes
1 pt. carrots, sliced
1 qt. corn (whole kernel)
1 can peas
instant rice
egg noodles or mixed vegetables (if you prefer)
Directions:
Simmer, covered, 10 to 15 minutes.

question: What can I do with leftover turkey from Thanksgiving?
answer:
Title: Turkey And Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked turkey
1 c. seedless grapes, halved
1 c. water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1/4 c. slivered almonds, diced
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
9 leaves leaf lettuce
1 c. celery slices
1 c. pineapple chunks, drained
1 c. fruit cocktail, drained
3/4 c. light mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
Cut turkey into julienned strips (4 1/2 x 1/2-inch).
Cut celery diagonally into slices (1/4-inch).
Combine with fruits and almonds and mix thoroughly.
Fold into turkey.
Combine salad dressing, lemon juice, soy sauce, Worcestershire sauce and curry powder and mix thoroughly.
Gently stir into turkey mixture. Cover and refrigerate.
Serve each portion on chilled lettuce leaf.
Garnish with strawberry or other brightly colored fruit.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Feta Cheese Pie
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach
1 lb. Feta cheese or cottage cheese
8 eggs
1/2 lb. melted butter
1 lb. pastry sheets
Directions:
Pass spinach through cheesecloth and remove all water.
In a large bowl, crumble Feta cheese and add beaten eggs.
Add spinach; mix very well.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Grease 9 x 13-inch pan and place 10 pieces of filo into pan, brushing each piece with butter.
Spread spinach mixture evenly across filo and place 10 more pieces of filo over mixture.
Paint top with butter and egg wash and place in a 350° oven for about 3/4 hour, or until golden brown.
Cut in squares and serve hot or cold.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. washed spinach
3 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
4 slices crisp bacon, crumbled
Directions:
Toss and serve with dressing.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Fettucine
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. fresh spinach
1 clove minced garlic
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 stick butter
1 box fettucine
1/2 c. heavy cream
1 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Clean spinach, removing stems.
Cook garlic, onion and 1/2 stick butter until golden.
Add spinach.
Cover until wilted. Cook fettucine.
Drain.
Mix with 1/2 stick butter, cream and cheese.
Add spinach mixture.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh spinach
hard-boiled eggs
mushrooms
bacon, cooked and crumbled
Directions:
Combine ingredients.
Pour dressing just prior to serving.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and eggs?
answer:
Title: Country Spinach
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) box frozen spinach
salt to taste
1 pat butter
1 egg
1 c. water
Directions:
Put spinach in saucepan.
Add water; cook until tender. Drain; add butter.
Stir and add egg.
Stir.
Put back on stove with lid over very low heat until all the egg is done.
You will need to stir the mixture.
Drain off all the liquid.
Salt to taste.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dressing
Ingredients:
1/3 c. oil
1/2 c. sugar
1/3 c. ketchup
1/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 tsp. salt
1 medium onion
8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
3 hard-boiled eggs
spinach
Directions:
Mix in blender the oil, sugar, ketchup, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, salt and onion.
Store 24 hours.
Pour over remaining ingredients.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Couscous Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. water
1 c. couscous
about 3 Tbsp. olive oil
about 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3 scallions (including green parts), finely chopped
1/2 c. tightly packed Italian parsley, finely chopped
2 medium ripe tomatoes, peeled, seeded and finely chopped
3 Tbsp. finely chopped mint
kosher salt
black pepper
Directions:
Bring the water to a boil in a small saucepan.
Pour in the couscous.
Cover the pan and remove from the heat.
Let stand for 5 minutes.
Uncover the pan and stir the couscous right away with a fork.
(If the grains do not separate, fluff them gently with your fingers.)
Transfer the couscous to a bowl and stir in the remaining ingredients.
Season the salad to taste with more lemon juice, salt and pepper.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 bag spinach
4 hard-boiled eggs
Bermuda onion
mushrooms
crumbled cooked bacon
Directions:
To serve:
Pour dressing over spinach, sliced hard-boiled eggs, sliced Bermuda onion and fresh mushrooms.
Garnish with crumbled bacon.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Salad And Dressing
Ingredients:
1/3 c. catsup
1/2 c. vinegar
3/4 c. oil
3/4 c. sugar
2 tsp. grated onion
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce (optional)
1 pkg. spinach
2 eggs, hard-boiled and sliced
cooked bacon, broken in pieces
red onion, sliced thin
Directions:
Add to spinach the bacon, eggs and onion.

question: What can I make with couscous and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
2 tsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. seasoned pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 (10 oz.) pkg. fresh spinach, torn into bite size pieces
5 bacon strips, cooked and crumbled
2 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
Directions:
Combine first 10 ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake until well mixed; set aside.
Place spinach in a large bowl. Just before serving, pour dressing over spinach and toss gently. Garnish with crumbled bacon and egg slices.
Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
3 fresh mangoes, peeled and chopped
16 oz. can unsweetened pears, chopped
20 oz. can chunk pineapple
16 oz. can unsweetened peaches
1 c. seedless golden raisins
1 c. coarsely chopped nuts, walnuts or pecans
1/2 pt. heavy cream
4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
Directions:
Drain all fruits well and add to mangoes.
Beat cream to pudding consistency, fold in mayo.
Put all ingredients together, cover, refrigerate until ready to serve. Serve with mint leaves for garnish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: 5 Cup Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. miniature marshmallows
1 c. shredded coconut
1 c. sour cream
1 c. mandarin oranges, drained
1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
Directions:
Blend all ingredients; chill and serve.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Twenty-Four Hour Salad
Ingredients:
1 egg
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. sugar
pinch of salt
1/2 c. heavy cream, whipped
12 large or 48 small marshmallows, quartered
1 c. pineapple tidbits, drained
1 c. sliced orange sections
1 c. seedless grapes
1 c. sliced bananas
10 maraschino cherries, quartered
1/2 c. toasted almond slivers
crisp salad greens
Directions:
In a double boiler, beat egg with a fork; stir in lemon juice, sugar and salt.
Cook over boiling water, stirring constantly, until mixture thickens.
Remove from heat and allow to cool completely.
Fold in whipped cream, marshmallows and fruits. Refrigerate for 24 hours.
To serve, fold in almonds and arrange on crisp greens.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 large apple, diced (larger pieces with peeling on)
1 banana, sliced
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 can mandarin orange segments, drained
1 can fruit cocktail, drained
1 can pineapple chunks, drained
2 c. miniature marshmallows
2 eggs, beaten
4 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 c. juice (reserved from fruits)
2 c. frozen whipped topping, thawed
Directions:
In large bowl, combine apple and banana with lemon juice.
Add canned fruits and marshmallows.
In saucepan, combine eggs, sugar, cornstarch and fruit juice.
Cook over medium heat until thick, stirring constantly.
Remove from heat and cool.
Toss lightly with fruit.
Fold in whipped topping.
Cover and chill at least 3 hours.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a mango salad?
answer:
Title: 5 Cup Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. coconut
1 c. mandarin oranges
1 c. sour cream
1 c. pineapple bits
1 c. chopped pecans
1 c. miniature marshmallows
Directions:
Drain fruit; mix all ingredients.
Can be made the night before.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Potato Chips
Ingredients:
4 medium potatoes, thinly sliced
1 inch deep vegetable oil
salt
Directions:
Slice potatoes as thinly as possible.
Soak in cold water for 1 hour; drain and pat dry.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Seasoned Potatoes
Ingredients:
potatoes
Canola oil
seasoned salt
Directions:
Use amounts depending on servings needed.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Almost Potato Chips
Ingredients:
baking potatoes
butter
salt and pepper
Directions:
Wash unpeeled potatoes.
Slice no more than 1/8 inch thick or they won't crisp up.
Dip slices in melted butter and arrange on nonstick or lightly greased jelly roll pan (not baking sheets as butter will run off and go into bottom of oven).
Sprinkle with salt and pepper (if you like).
Bake at 375° for 35 minutes or until golden brown.
Serve hot.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Matchsticks
Ingredients:
1 lb. potatoes
cooking oil
salt or garlic salt
Directions:
Wash and peel potatoes.
Cut potatoes into the thinnest possible slivers and soak in ice water for 30 minutes.
Drain and dry, then immerse in boiling oil for 1 or 2 minutes.
Remove and place on paper towel to dry.
Then put back into the boiling oil the second time for a minute.
Remove and drain.
Sprinkle with salt or garlic salt.

question: I need a recipe for homemade potato chips.
answer:
Title: Fresh Fried Potato Chips
Ingredients:
7 or 8 medium potatoes, scraped and sliced thin
1 c. Pet milk
1/2 c. flour
deep fat (for frying)
pepper and salt to taste
Directions:
Put potatoes in a large bowl and add salt and pepper.
Moisten well with Pet milk.
Sift about 1/2 cup flour over potatoes and coat potatoes well.
Fry in deep fat until brown.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 tsp. water
2 scallions
1 Tbsp. water
6 c. stock
1/2 tsp. sugar
3/4 to 1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sherry
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
Beat eggs and stir in water.
Mince scallions.
Blend cornstarch and remaining cold water to a paste.
Bring stock to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium and stir in sugar, salt, sherry and soy sauce.
Add cornstarch paste and cook, stirring, until soup thickens and is smooth.
Reduce heat to low.
Pour eggs in slowly, stirring constantly, until they separate into shreds, then turn off the heat.
Garnish with minced scallions.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. chicken broth
3 small scallions or green onion, chopped up
3 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Bring chicken broth to boil; remove from heat.
Slowly pour beaten eggs into soup, stirring constantly.
The egg forms lacy strands as it cooks.
Stir in scallions or onions.
Serve immediately.
Yields 1 quart.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup(For When You Feel Under The Weather.)
Ingredients:
3 c. chicken stock
1 Tbsp. beef bouillon
1 Tbsp. chicken bouillon
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
3 Tbsp. cold water
2 eggs, slightly beaten
2 scallions, chopped
Directions:
Bring chicken stock and bouillon to a boil.
Add cornstarch with cold water.
Thicken until clear.
Add scallions and stir. Add eggs, stirring gently with fork.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
3 c. soup stock (chicken or pork)
2 tsp. cornstarch, dissolved in 1/2 c. water
1 tsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. sesame oil
1 egg, beaten
1 Tbsp. green onion or fresh spinach, chopped
Directions:
Bring soup stock to a boil.
Stir in cornstarch mixture and continue stirring until slightly thickened.
As you stir thickened stock, slowly pour in egg mixture.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, then add green onion or spinach.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a simple egg drop soup?
answer:
Title: Egg Drop Soup
Ingredients:
3 c. chicken broth
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. cold water
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 egg, slightly beaten
1 scallion and top, finely chopped
Directions:
Bring chicken broth to a boil in soup pot.
Add salt; stir in mixture of cold water and cornstarch.
Stir a small amount of hot broth into egg.
Stir egg into hot broth.
Cook until clear and slightly thickened, stirring constantly.
Garnish with scallion.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Rice And Black Bean Salad
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cooked and cooled long grain brown rice
2 1/2 c. Niblets corn
1 c. (Conchetta) black beans, rinsed and drained
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
2 Tbsp. salsa
1 Tbsp. sour cream
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Before serving, use this topping:

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Bean Salad
Ingredients:
1 can black beans, rinsed and drained
juice of 2 limes
1 Tbsp. oil
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh cilantro
1 tsp. pepper
salt to taste
as much as desired: diced red and green peppers, corn kernels, diced tomatoes and grated carrots
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and let sit a few hours.
Serve chilled.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Bean Dip
Ingredients:
1 small red onion, peeled and quartered
1 c. loosely packed cilantro leaves
2 cans (15 oz. each) black beans, rinsed and drained
4 tsp. vegetable oil
1 tsp. coarse (kosher) salt
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/8 tsp. ground hot red pepper
1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. orange juice
Directions:
Combine onion and cilantro in food processor. Whirl until finely chopped.
Add beans, oil, salt, chili powder and ground hot red pepper.
Process using on/off pulses until evenly chopped (do not puree).
Scrape into bowl.
Stir in orange juice. Serve immediately or refrigerate, covered, for up to 6 hours.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
1 pkg. black beans
1 medium onion
1 medium green pepper
1 small bay leaf
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. vinegar
dash of olive oil
1/2 c. bacon grease
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Wash
beans
and
soak overnight.
Chop onion and green pepper in small pieces and saute in bacon grease.
Bring beans to boil and add all other ingredients; let simmer for several hours.
When just about done, add salt and pepper.
When done mash through several
times
with
potato
masher
to thicken juice.
If too thick,
add
a little hot water.
Cook about 2 cups of rice
for listed amount.
Chop white onion to put over top.

question: What can I cook with quinoa and black beans?
answer:
Title: Black Bean Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. black beans (canned), rinsed and drained
1 small can niblets canned corn (fat regular can), drained
1 tsp. Italian herbs
1 tsp. salt
1 c. fresh tomatoes, chopped
1 c. diced avocado
1/3 c. thinly sliced green onions
1/3 c. finely chopped cilantro or parsley
1/4 c. olive oil
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 garlic clove, minced
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. cumin
Directions:
Mix dressing of oil, vinegar and spices.
Add black bean mixture (first 8 ingredients).
Correct for more herbs or cumin if needed. Chill.
Really delicious; you might want more vinegar too.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken breast strips
2 Tbsp. oil
4 c. vegetables (broccoli, green peppers, water chestnuts, onions)
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 tsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. garlic powder
3/4 tsp. ginger
1 1/2 c. Minute rice
Directions:
Stir-fry chicken in hot oil in a large skillet until brown. Add vegetables.
Fry until crispy and tender.
Mix broth, soy sauce, cornstarch, sugar, garlic powder and ginger.
Add to chicken and vegetables.
Bring to boil.
Cook for 2 minutes. Prepare rice as directed on package.
Serve chicken and vegetables over rice.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/4 lb. skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 c. broccoli florets
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
4 scallions, cut into 1-inch pieces
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 Tbsp. dry sherry
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. Oriental sesame oil
Directions:
In a large frying pan or wok, heat oil over medium high heat. Add the chicken cubes and stir-fry 3 minutes, until chicken becomes opaque.
Remove with slotted spoon and set aside.
Add broccoli, fry for 1 to 2 minutes.
Add mushrooms, scallions, soy sauce, ginger and sesame oil.
Stir-fry 2 minutes.
Add cornstarch, dissolved in water, and chicken.
Cook until heated through and sauce has thickened.
Serve over rice or angel hair pasta.
Serves 4.
Preparation time 20 minutes.
Cooking time 20 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Broccoli Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
15 oz. cubed chicken breast
1 c. fresh broccoli florets
1 c. fresh sliced mushrooms
3 oz. sliced water chestnuts
1 small onion, diced
1 c. chicken broth
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 or 2 Tbsp. cornstarch, blended with small amount of water
Directions:
Heat oil in wok or deep skillet; add chicken cubes and stir-fry until half cooked.
Add broccoli, mushrooms, water chestnuts and onion.
Stir-fry.
Add chicken broth, soy sauce and blended cornstarch, cooking until thickened.
Serve over white rice.
Serves 3 or 4.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken breast strips
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
4 c. vegetables (fresh or frozen): broccoli, green peppers, water chestnuts, carrots
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 tsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Stir-fry chicken in oil until chicken is thoroughly cooked. Add all ingredients.
Stir and bring to a boil for 1 minute. Serve over rice.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for chicken and broccoli stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Chicken And Broccoli
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken breast strips
2 Tbsp. oil
4 c. vegetables (broccoli florets, pepper strips, sliced water chestnuts)
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
2 tsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. garlic powder
3/4 tsp. ground ginger
1 1/2 c. Original Minute rice
Directions:
Stir-fry chicken in hot oil in large skillet until browned. Add broccoli, pepper and chestnuts; stir-fry until crisp-tender. Mix broth, soy sauce, cornstarch, sugar, garlic powder and ginger. Add to skillet.
Bring to boil; boil 1 minute.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Company Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
4 bacon strips, diced
1 doz. Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh chives
1 carrot, thinly sliced
10 stuffed green olives, sliced
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/3 c. chicken broth or dry white wine
1 tsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. pepper
pinch of salt
Directions:
In a skillet, fry bacon just until cooked.
Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons drippings.
Add remaining ingredients; cook and stir over medium-high heat for 10 to 15 minutes or until Brussels sprouts are crisp-tender.
Yields 4 servings.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: The Best Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
6 slices bacon, cut across into 1/4-inch pieces
1/2 c. pine nuts
2-1/2 lb. (8 cups) Brussels sprouts, halved, cored and each half cut into quarters
2 tsp. minced garlic
1 cup carrots, peeled and cut into very small dice
2 tsp. salt
Freshly ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. chopped Italian parsley
Directions:
Place the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat and cook until the fat is rendered.
Add the pine nuts and cook until the bacon is crisp and the nuts are golden, about 1 minute.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen Brussels sprouts
water
4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. sour cream
salt to taste
Louisiana hot sauce or ground cayenne pepper to taste
Directions:
If using fresh sprouts, rinse well and cut off any discolored leaves.
With a paring knife, cut a "plus"
sign in the stem end to insure even cooking.
Place the sprouts in a large saucepan and cover with water.
Bring to a boil and continue boiling for about 10 minutes or until the stem side is tender when pierced with a knife.
Drain and set the sprouts aside.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts With Bacon
Ingredients:
3 slices bacon, coarsely chopped
1/4 c. chopped pecans
2 (10 oz. each) boxes frozen Brussels sprouts, thawed and halved or 2 c. fresh, halved
1/4 c. apple juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cook bacon over medium heat for 5 minutes, stirring frequently until crisp.
Stir in pecans and cook 1 minute, until roasted. Drain all but 1 tablespoon fat from skillet; remove bacon and pecans to a paper towel.
Add Brussels sprouts and stir to coat with remaining bacon fat.
Stir in apple juice, cover and bring to a boil over high heat.
Reduce heat to low and simmer 8 to 10 minutes (for frozen) or 10 to 12 minutes (for fresh).
Before serving, add bacon, pecans, salt and pepper.

question: How do I make roasted Brussels sprouts with bacon?
answer:
Title: Easy And Good Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
8 bacon slices diced
1 med. onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
1 container brussels sprouts
salt and pepper
Directions:
Par boil brussels sprouts until medium hard about 7-10 minutes. Fry bacon, onion and garlic until brown.
Add brussels sprouts to pan and mix.
Add salt and pepper to taste and saute 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
4 egg whites
1 1/2 sticks softened butter
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1 c. milk
3 c. finely sifted flour
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 qt. strawberries
3 c. whipping cream (or more; use mountains of whipped cream!)
1/4 c. sugar
Directions:
Stiffly whip the cream.
Rinse and cap the strawberries; blot dry on paper towels.
Slice strawberries and sprinkle with sugar. (If strawberries are sweet, no sugar is required.)
Divide the strawberries and put between cake layers.
(Do not put strawberries on top or they may bleed into cream.)
Spread whipped cream over the cake.
Cut and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake(Lo-Cal)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine
1/3 c. sugar
1 large egg, separated
1 3/4 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. skim milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 egg white
2 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Beat two egg whites until stiff.
Add 2 tablespoons of sugar and set aside.
Beat margarine, sugar, egg yolk and salt.
Add vanilla to milk.
Add baking powder to flour.
Add liquid and dry alternately as you mix.
Fold in beaten egg whites.
Put in a greased and floured 9-inch pan.
Bake 30 minutes at 350° until done and golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Individual Strawberry Shortcakes
Ingredients:
3 c. sifted flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. butter or shortening
3/4 c. milk
2 qt. strawberries, crushed and sweetened
Directions:
Sift flour once.
Measure.
Add baking powder and salt and sift again.
Cut in shortening.
Add milk all at once and stir carefully until all flour is dampened.
Then stir vigorously until mixture forms a soft dough and follows spoon around bowl.
Drop 3/4 cup dough onto ungreased baking sheet*.
Brush with milk (or cream). Bake in hot oven (450°) for 15 to 20 minutes.
Serves 8.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/3 c. shortening
1 egg
5/8 c. milk
butter or margarine
4 c. strawberries
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, sugar and salt.
Cut in fat until it is like corn meal.
Combine the beaten eggs and milk.
Add to the flour mixture to make a very soft dough.
Turn on floured board and toss lightly.
Pat or roll to 1/2-inch thickness.
Cut with cookie cutter for individual servings or cut in two sections and bake in sheets.
Spread one serving or sheet with butter and top with the other one.
Bake 12 to 15 minutes at 450°.
When done, separate the two sections and serve sweetened strawberries between the layers and over the top.
Serve with cream, plain or whipped.

question: What’s a recipe for a strawberry shortcake?
answer:
Title: Strawberry Shortcake
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. margarine
1 egg, beaten
2/3 c. light cream
1 c. whip cream
3 or 4 c. strawberries, halved and sweetened
melted butter
Directions:
In mixing bowl, stir together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.
Cut in butter to resemble coarse crumbs.
Combine the egg and light cream.
Add all at once to flour mixture, stirring with fork just to moisten.
Spread dough in greased 8 x 1 1/2-inch round baking pans or 8 x 8 x 2-inch baking pan, building up edges slightly.
Bake in 450° oven for 15 to 18 minutes or until done. Remove from pan and cool.
Using a sharp knife, gently split shortcake into 2 layers.
Spread bottom layer with soft butter. Whip cream to soft peaks.
Spoon half of strawberries and whipped cream over bottom layer.
Top with second layer.
Spoon remaining strawberries and whipped cream over top.
Serve while still warm.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Dry Rub
Ingredients:
1/4 c paprika
2 Tbsp granulated garlic
2 Tbsp Granulated onion
2 tsp peppercorns
1 tsp dry mustard
1 tsp chili powder
2 Tbsp cumin seed, toasted
3 Tbsp coriander seed, toasted
1/4 c kosher salt
1/4 c light brown sugar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a clean coffee grinder. Rub on chicken directly or coat in a plastic storage bag. Make sure chicken is dry before applying.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Goodie'S Bbq Rub
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp salt
2 Tbsp crushed red pepper
1/2 Tbsp dry rosemary
1 Tbsp chopped garlic
2 Tbsp cayenne pepper
1 Tbsp dry sage
2 Tbsp paprika
Directions:
Mix all together and use as a dry rub before cooking ribs or chicken.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Honey Barbecue Rub
Ingredients:
4 beef top sirloins (4 oz. each)
1/4 c. honey
4 cloves garlic, diced
2 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. chili powder
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Rub each steak with 1 tablespoon honey.
Combine rest of the ingredients and rub into steaks.
Let stand 20 to 30 minutes. Barbecue or broil to desired degree of doneness.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Grill Rub
Ingredients:
8 parts paprika
1 part thyme
1 part chili powder
1 part cayenne pepper
1 part cilantro
1 part cumin
2 parts salt
2 parts garlic powder
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together. Delicious rubbed on beef or pork and grilled.

question: How do I make a homemade barbecue rub?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Dry Rub Mix
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. light brown sugar
2 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. red cayenne pepper
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 bay leaf
Directions:
Process until the bay leaf is pulverized and mixture is thoroughly blended.
Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 3 months.
Makes about 1/2 cup.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Pate
Ingredients:
3 lb. fresh spinach
1 Tbsp. butter
1/2 onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. wine or cider vinegar
3 eggs
1/2 c. skim milk
1/8 tsp. nutmeg, grated
4 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. Gruyere cheese
3/4 c. whole wheat bread crumbs
sea salt to taste
pepper
Directions:
Wash and stem spinach.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Butter a loaf pan.
Puree spinach or chop fine.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
2 tsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. seasoned pepper
1 pkg. fresh spinach, torn into bite size pieces
5 bacon strips, cooked and crumbled
2 hard-cooked eggs, sliced
1 1/2 lb. fresh, whole green beans, cleaned and destrung
1/3 lb. good Swiss cheese, in thin strips
1/2 c. chopped ripe olives
1/2 c. each: thinly sliced green and red peppers
1/2 c. (or more) chopped, toasted almonds
Directions:
This salad is most delicious when made a day in advance and marinated overnight.
Actual preparation time: about 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef, browned and drained
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
1 can cream of celery soup
1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream
1 c. mushrooms, chopped
1 c. onions, chopped
2 to 3 c. Mozzarella cheese, grated
1 tsp. garlic salt
2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 or 2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Brown and drain ground beef.
Add onions; cook until onions are transparent.
Add mushrooms, seasonings and thawed spinach. Cook until spinach is warmed through.
Remove from heat.
Stir in soup and sour cream.
Place in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Top with cheese; bake at 400° until cheese is bubbling.
Serve over noodles or rice.
Add a salad and French bread.
Ummm!!!

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken-Spinach Picnic Salad
Ingredients:
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1/2 tsp. sugar
3 c. cooked, cubed chicken
2 c. broccoli florets
1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts
Parmesan cheese
3 tsp. vinegar
1 tsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. pepper
5 oz. fresh spinach, torn in bite size pieces
6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
Directions:
Mix soy sauce, vinegar, oil, onion, sugar and pepper and pour over chicken to marinate.
Refrigerate for at least several hours. Combine spinach, broccoli, chestnuts and bacon.
Just before serving, add chicken mixture.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I make with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
2 pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 can water chestnuts, chopped and drained
2 envelopes Herb-Ox instant chicken broth
Directions:
Drain spinach through colander until no water remains (press using food handler gloves).
Add remaining ingredients; mix well. Chill.
Serve with cut up vegetables, crackers, party size breads or bagel chips.
Kids love it!

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Egg Pastry
Ingredients:
3 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. shortening
1 egg
1 tsp. vinegar
1/2 c. ice water
Directions:
Sift flour and salt.
Cut in shortening until it looks like cornmeal.
Beat egg slightly.
Add vinegar and water.
Gradually add egg mix to dry ingredients.
Mix enough to hold dough together. Work on wax paper.
Keeps for a week in refrigerator.
Can be frozen indefinitely.
Makes 3 to 4 single shells.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Cake
Ingredients:
flour
water
eggs
Directions:
Put in a bowl.
Crack the eggs.
Stir for 30 minutes.
Put it in the oven and cook for a couple of hours.
Set it in a cool spot.
Gobble it up.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: One Egg Cake
Ingredients:
2/3 c. sugar
1/4 c. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
1 egg
1 1/2 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
Directions:
Cream shortening and sugar.
Add unbeaten egg and vanilla. Beat well.
Sift flour.
Sift with baking powder and salt.
Add alternately with milk to creamed shortening.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Eggless Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon and nutmeg
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. shortening
1 c. buttermilk
1 c. raisins
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift and measure flour.
Add soda, salt and spices.
Cream sugar and shortening.
Add salt in flour, 1/3 at a time. Alternate with milk.
Add raisins.
Add vanilla.
Beat well after each.
Pour into 13 x 9-inch or 9-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.

question: How do I make a flaky pie crust from scratch?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. boiling water
1 c. quick oats
1 c. flour
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. cloves
1/2 c. shortening
2 eggs
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. chopped dates
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Combine first 2 ingredients and set aside.
Sift together next 5 ingredients.
Cream shortening, eggs and brown sugar.
Add nuts and dates to creamed mixture.
Combine all ingredients and mix well by hand.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
12 oz. shrimp, peeled and deveined *
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Thaw shrimp, if frozen.
In a large skillet, heat margarine over medium high heat.
Add shrimp and garlic.
Cook, stirring frequently for 1 to 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
Stir in parsley and sherry.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
3 cloves fresh garlic, crushed
8 oz. whole mushrooms, stems removed
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
12 oz. fresh shrimp, shelled and deveined
1 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with just enough water to dissolve
Directions:
Melt butter in large skillet.
Add crushed garlic and whole mushrooms.
Gently mix in lemon juice and shrimp.
(Add more butter, if needed, at this time.)
Saute 1 minute on each side, or until pink.
Add wine; increase heat and bring to a boil.
Remove from heat and add cornstarch mixture.
Return to flame until sauce is thickened.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make baked garlic butter shrimp?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 bay leaves
1/2 tsp. crushed oregano
salt and pepper
lemon juice
1 lb. medium to large shrimp in shell
Directions:
Melt butter
in skillet with lid.
Add remaining ingredients, including shrimp in shells.
Toss well.
Set aside for 30 minutes. Stir occasionally.
Place over medium heat.
Stir and cover. Cook
for
5
minutes.
Shrimp
should
turn pink. Serve immediately over rice.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
1/4 c. flour
salt and pepper to taste
4 chicken cutlets, pounded until thin
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lemons, one thinly sliced and 1 juiced
3 Tbsp. large capers, drained
Directions:
On a plate, mix the flour, salt and pepper. Coat the chicken on both sides with flour mixture.
Shake off excess.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
1 lemon
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
4 chicken breasts (1 lb. total), pound to thin slices
2 tsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. reduced-sodium or regular chicken broth
1 Tbsp. capers, rinsed
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 tsp. butter
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
With a sharp knife, remove skin and white pith from lemon and discard.
Working over a bowl, cut lemon segments from their surrounding membranes.
Chop segments coarsely and reserve with the juice.

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, pounded 1/4 inch thick
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3/4 c. reduced-sodium chicken broth
3/4 tsp. dried rosemary leaves, crushed
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Dredge in flour

question: How do I make a quick chicken piccata?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken Piccata
Ingredients:
2 lb. skinless chicken breasts
4 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. flour
1 tsp salt
1/4 tsp black pepper
1 c. white dry wine or 1 c. Sprite
3 Tbsp lemon juice
1/2 lemon thinly sliced
3 Tbsp chopped parsley, optional
3 Tbsp capers, optional
Directions:
In a small bowl combine flour, salt and black pepper, dredge chicken in flour mixture, shake off excess of flour.
In a large frying pan heat butter and oil over medium heat.
Add chicken, cook about 3 minutes per side or until tender.
Remove from pan, keep in a warm place.
Add wine or Sprite to pan juices, cook 1 minute scraping up brown bits from the bottom of pan.
