Wrap bay leaf around onion and push cloves through leaf into onion.
Add to pan with carrots and tomatoes.
Bring to a boil, stirring.
Lower heat and cover; simmer about 20 minutes. Remove onion; add salt, margarine and parsley.
Stir well.
Spoon into large ovenproof dish.
Dot top with margarine and bake in 375° oven for about 30 minutes.

question: I have lentils and carrots. What can I make?
answer:
Title: Herbed Lentils And Rice
Ingredients:
2 2/3 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. dry lentils
3/4 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. brown rice
1/4 c. dry white wine
1/2 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 oz. Swiss cheese
Directions:
Combine broth and lentils, onion, uncooked rice, wine and seasonings.
Shred 1/2 ounce cheese and stir into ungreased 1 1/2-quart casserole dish and bake, covered, at 350° for 1 1/2 to 2 hours or until lentils and rice are done, stirring twice.
Cut remaining cheese into strips and uncover casserole.
Top with cheese strips.
Bake an additional 2 to 3 minutes more until cheese melts.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mandarin oranges
1 c. pineapple
1 c. coconut
1 c. red cherries
1 c. sour cream
1 c. Cool Whip
1 c. miniature marshmallows
Directions:
Drain all fruit and pour into a large bowl.
Add other ingredients and mix well. Cover and chill.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, torn
1 bell pepper, chopped
1 onion (red is best), chopped
1 c. celery, sliced
1 pkg. frozen garden peas
1 c. bacon bits
1 can water chestnuts
1 c. grated cheese
1 c. sour cream
1 c. sugar
1 c. salad dressing
Directions:
Layer first eight ingredients as listed in a large bowl. Combine last three items and pour over cheese.
Cover tightly and set in refrigerator overnight.
Stir first before serving.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
2 lettuces (red and iceberg)
1 cucumber, sliced
1 avocado, sliced
1 bunch green onions, sliced
2 cans mandarin oranges, drained
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. orange juice
1/2 c. salad oil
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Prepare first 5 ingredients in salad bowl.
Combine remaining ingredients and pour over the first combination.
Serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: Summer Salad
Ingredients:
1 head lettuce, chopped
1 head cauliflower, chopped
6 green onions, chopped
2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1 lb. bacon, cooked crisp and crumbled
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together and keep in refrigerator.
When ready to serve, combine 1/2 cup sugar and 1 cup Miracle Whip. Pour over salad and stir well.

question: What’s a recipe for a refreshing summer salad?
answer:
Title: California Summer Salad
Ingredients:
1 cucumber, sliced thin, skinned if desired
1 purple onion, sliced thin
2 Roma tomatoes, chunked
1/4 c. rice vinegar
salt, to taste
pepper, to taste
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Place all ingredients in an airtight glass jar that can be shaken before each serving.
Allow several hours or overnight for the flavors to blend.
This mixture does not have to be refrigerated.
It can be left out at room temperature, and more ingredients added as needed.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: 3 Bean Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
4 Tbsp. chili powder
1 small hot chili pepper, chopped fine
8 oz. baby carrots, chopped extra fine
2 c. rough chopped onions
1 c. rough chopped bell pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery
8 oz. tofu crumbles
salt and pepper to taste
1 (29 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 Tbsp. dark molasses or sorghum
2 (16 oz.) cans small pink beans
1 (16 oz.) can pinto beans
1 (16 oz.) can garbanzo beans
Directions:
Heat olive oil in cooking pot on medium high.
Add to hot oil the garlic, chili powder, chili pepper, carrots, onions, bell pepper, celery, tofu crumbles and salt to taste.
Cook until tender (approximately 10 minutes).
Add tomato and molasses.
Cook on low heat until all ingredients are blended together (approximately 5 minutes).
Drain all beans and add to mixture. Continue to cook on low heat until beans are heated through (10 to 15 minutes).

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Tofu Chili
Ingredients:
5 c. cooked pinto beans
2 lb. tofu, frozen, then thawed, broken into pieces
1/4 c. soy sauce
1 1/2 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/2 Tbsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 Tbsp. tomato paste
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. oil
1 green pepper, diced
2 large onions, diced
3 cloves garlic, minced
16 oz. can tomatoes
8 oz. can tomato sauce
3 Tbsp. chili powder
1/2 Tbsp. cumin
Directions:
Reserve the cooking water or liquid from cans of pintos.
Mix the soy sauce with next 6 ingredients (including the first of 2 tablespoons of oil); coat tofu pieces with this mixture.
Fry over medium heat until all liquid is absorbed and tofu is browned. Saute the green pepper, onions and garlic in the other 2 tablespoons oil.
Put beans, tofu mixture and sauteed vegetables in a cooking pot or crockpot.
Add the tomatoes, sauce and season. Simmer 30 minutes or longer.
If in crock-pot, simmer several hours.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Rice And Tofu Casserole
Ingredients:
1 c. long grain rice
3 c. boiling water
1/2 c. bulgur wheat
2 Tbsp. olive or canola oil
1 Tbsp. grated fresh ginger
3/4 lb. firm tofu
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
4 oz. chopped onion
4 oz. green pepper
4 oz. grated carrot
Directions:
Combine rice and boiling water in covered pan.
Add bulgur. Add 1 tablespoon oil.
Saute ginger and onion.
Add crumbled tofu. Cook several minutes.
Add green peppers, carrots and soy sauce. Cook until pepper and carrots are heated.
Check bulgur and rice. When tender, stir in vegetables.
Microwave, covered, several minutes, then serve.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Tofu Salad
Ingredients:
1 lb. tofu, drained
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/2 c. peppers, minced
1/2 c. celery, minced
1/4 c. onions, minced
1/2 tsp. honey
1/4 tsp. cumin
1 1/2 tsp. tamari (soy sauce)
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. turmeric
Directions:
Mash tofu well.
Add other ingredients.
Mix thoroughly. Serve on lettuce as a salad or in a sandwich.
Delicious.
Serves 5 to 6.

question: What can I make with tofu and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1/4 c. onion, chopped
2 c. diced potatoes
1 c. water
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
1 can cream-style corn
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter in saucepan.
Add onion.
Saute until onion is golden yellow.
Add potatoes, water, salt and pepper.
Cover and cook on low heat until potatoes are very soft.
Stir frequently. Add corn, milk and evaporated milk.
Heat, stirring frequently, until chowder bubbles.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. canola oil
1 small onion
2 Tbsp. flour
2 1/2 c. corn
2 c. milk
1 c. light cream or evaporated milk
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
3/4 tsp. thyme
Directions:
Heat oil.
Saute onion until soft.
Stir in flour.
Add corn. Gradually stir in milk.
Continue to stir until thick.
Add sugar, salt, white pepper, thyme and cream or evaporated milk.
Blend well.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
1 large onion
1 stick oleo
1 qt. milk
2 cans creamed corn
4 medium potatoes
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. marjoram
1 1/2 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1/2 c. heavy cream
Directions:
Thinly slice onion and saute in butter until cooked, not brown.
Add milk, corn, thyme, marjoram, salt and pepper.
Simmer 1 hour.
Peel potatoes and dice.
Cook until done but firm; drain and add to soup.
Last, add cream.
Stir and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 (15 oz.) cans creamed or whole corn
4 c. milk
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
6 strips bacon, diced
1 small onion, diced
4 medium potatoes, cooked and diced
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/2 c. sour cream
1 small jar salad peppers
Directions:
Bring milk to boil in large saucepan.
Lower heat.
Add cream cheese and corn, stirring often, over low heat until cream cheese has melted.
Reserve.
In a small skillet, cook bacon and onion until bacon is crisp; drain off excess grease.
Add bacon, onion and potatoes to milk mixture.

question: How do I make a creamy corn chowder?
answer:
Title: Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
2 c. peeled, cubed potatoes
2 c. water
1 c. diced celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 bay leaf
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/2 tsp. parsley flakes
2 c. creamed corn
2 c. whole kernel corn
2 to 3 c. rich soy or tofu milk
Directions:
Place all ingredients, except the last three, in a large kettle and simmer over low heat until potatoes are almost done.
Stir in corn and continue simmering for 10 minutes, stirring frequently. Add milk to desired consistency.
Turn heat off and let stand for 15 to 20 minutes.
Remove bay leaf before serving.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Homemade Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
8 large potatoes
milk
butter
salt (optional)
pepper (optional)
Directions:
Peel and cut potatoes into small, bite size pieces.
Place in pot; cover with water.
Boil at medium temperature until potatoes are tender.
Drain water.
Add 2 or 3 tablespoons of butter and a little milk.
Also add salt to taste and a dash of pepper.
With mixer, mix until creamy.
Yields 4 servings.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Southern Style Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
potatoes
1 stick butter
1 Tbsp. mayonnaise
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Peel and cut potatoes and boil until tender.
Drain well. Put in a bowl and add butter, mayonnaise, salt and pepper to taste. Mash with electric mixer for just about a minute and then add about a 1/4 cup milk. Continue to mash until desired smoothness.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Real Mashed Potatoes!(From Potatoes, Not A Mix!)
Ingredients:
20 potatoes (approximate)
1/2 stick butter
little milk
Directions:
Cut up potatoes and put in a big pot of salted water. Bring to a boil. Put cover on pot and let cook 25 minutes on medium heat. Drain; add butter and milk. Whip using a hand mixer.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Kathleen'S Favorite Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. red potatoes
canned milk
mayonnaise
salt to taste
pepper to taste
1/2 stick butter
Directions:
Peel and cube potatoes.
Boil in lightly salted water just until tender.
Do not overcook.
Turn off stove.
Drain potatoes and immediately return them to the hot pot.
Set on hot stove eye that is turned off.
Pour in amount of canned milk needed for beating.
Do not disturb potatoes.
Add 1 large spoonful of mayonnaise and the butter to the undisturbed potatoes.
Let set until milk becomes lukewarm (this is important).
When milk is warm, mash potatoes slightly; add salt and pepper to taste.
Beat with an electric mixer until smooth.

question: Give me a simple recipe for mashed potatoes.
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes For 50
Ingredients:
15 lb. potatoes
1 1/2 qt. scalded milk
1/4 c. salt
1 c. melted butter
pepper to taste
Directions:
Pare potatoes.
Wash and boil until tender.
Mash until smooth, using electric mixer.
Add the other ingredients.
Beat until light and fluffy.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Spinach
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
4 chicken breasts (8 halves)
1 c. mayonnaise
2 cans cream of chicken soup
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. curry powder
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Squeeze excess liquid out of spinach.
Spread in 9 x 13-inch dish.
Put chicken on top.
Mix mayo, soup, lemon juice and curry. Spread on top of chicken.
Sprinkle with cheese.
Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Dip
Ingredients:
2 pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1 can water chestnuts, chopped and drained
2 envelopes Herb-Ox instant chicken broth
Directions:
Drain spinach through colander until no water remains (press using food handler gloves).
Add remaining ingredients; mix well. Chill.
Serve with cut up vegetables, crackers, party size breads or bagel chips.
Kids love it!

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Fried Spinach Stuffed Chicken Breast
Ingredients:
1 (10-oz.) frozen chopped spinach, thawed, drained
1/4 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg (optional)
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
6 chicken breasts, skinless, boneless
1 egg
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Place breast between heavy plastic wrap and flatten to 1/4-inch thickness.
Place 1/2 teaspoon of spinach mixture on each flattened breast.
Fold in sides and ends and secure with toothpicks. Combine egg and milk, mix well.
Dredge chicken in flour mixture, then dip in egg mixture, and dredge in flour mixture.
Pour oil to 1 inch in skillet and fry chicken in hot oil about 15 minutes or until golden brown.
May also dip in egg wash and roll in cornflake crumbs (with seasonings) and bake.

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Spinach Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef, browned and drained
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
1 can cream of celery soup
1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream
1 c. mushrooms, chopped
1 c. onions, chopped
2 to 3 c. Mozzarella cheese, grated
1 tsp. garlic salt
2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. salt
1 or 2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Brown and drain ground beef.
Add onions; cook until onions are transparent.
Add mushrooms, seasonings and thawed spinach. Cook until spinach is warmed through.
Remove from heat.
Stir in soup and sour cream.
Place in a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Top with cheese; bake at 400° until cheese is bubbling.
Serve over noodles or rice.
Add a salad and French bread.
Ummm!!!

question: What can I cook with ground chicken and spinach?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Spinach Delight
Ingredients:
2 pkg. (boxes) frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
4 to 6 chicken breasts, halved, skinned and boned
3/4 c. mayonnaise
1 can cream of chicken soup
1 tsp. curry powder
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. grated extra-sharp Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. buttered fresh bread crumbs
Directions:
Spread spinach in greased 8 x 12-inch casserole.
Place chicken breasts on top in single layer.
Mix mayonnaise, chicken soup, curry and lemon juice and spread over chicken.
Sprinkle with cheese and bread crumbs.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 turkey breast (6 to 7 lb.)
2 stalks celery
1 large onion, cut
salt and pepper
Directions:
Thaw turkey breast in refrigerator.
Wash and dry well.
Rub outside well with salt and pepper.
Also sprinkle some on the inside.
Fill cavity with chunks of celery and onion.
Wrap breast good and tight with aluminum foil.
Put in crock-pot.
Add 1 cup of water.
Turn to high for about an hour.
Reduce to low and cook all night.
You will have lots of good broth and the turkey breast will be nice and juicy and tender.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 turkey breast
1/2 c. melted butter
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 tsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. minced onions
1 tsp. dried sage
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. marjoram
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except turkey, in a saucepan and bring to a boil.
Place turkey breast in a 13 x 9-inch oiled baking dish.
Pour 1/2 the mixture over the turkey; cover with foil and bake about an hour.
Pour the other 1/2 over the turkey and continue baking another hour.
Check for doneness.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Herb Butter Basted Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. green onions, minced
1 tsp. dried whole thyme
1 tsp. dried whole sage, crushed
1 tsp. dried whole marjoram
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 (5 to 5 1/2 lb.) turkey breast
Directions:
Combine all ingredients, except turkey in a saucepan.
Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and set aside.
Place turkey breast, skin side up, in a lightly oiled 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan.
Baste with butter mixture.
Cover pan with foil.
Insert meat thermometer through foil into thickest portion of breast, making sure it does not touch bone.
Make an opening in foil so thermometer does not touch the foil.
Bake at 325° for 2 hours or until thermometer registers 170°, basting often with butter mixture.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Perfect Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. flour
1 medium onion, sliced
2 stalks celery, sliced
4 to 8 lb. turkey breast, thawed
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
salt, pepper and paprika
Directions:
Preheat oven to 325°.
Shake flour in large size (14 x 20-inch) Reynolds oven cooking bag; place bag in 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.
Place onion and celery in bag.
Rinse, drain and pat turkey breast dry.
Brush with vegetable oil; sprinkle with salt, pepper and paprika.
Place turkey breast in bag.
Close bag with nylon tie; make 6 (1/2-inch) slits in top.
Insert meat thermometer through slit in bag into thickest part of turkey breast, but not touching bone.
Bake 1 3/4 to 2 3/4 hours or until meat thermometer registers 175°.
Let stand 15 minutes before serving.
Makes 5 to 10 servings.

question: What can I cook with turkey breast and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Roasted Turkey Breast
Ingredients:
1 large boneless turkey breast (approximately 2 lb.)
few drops olive oil
salt
freshly ground pepper
1/2 c. maple syrup
1/4 c. bourbon or ginger ale
3 c. fresh cranberries
1/4 c. white sugar
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. red wine or cranberry juice
1 c. light poultry stock (fat-free, sodium free)
2 Tbsp. fresh chives (if available)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place breast in lightly oiled nonstick or ovenproof dish.
Rub skin of turkey with few drops olive oil; season with salt and pepper.
Place in oven; cook until skin begins to brown, about 10 minutes.
Turn oven down to 325°.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Broiled Lamb
Ingredients:
1 c. olive oil
1/2 c. fresh lemon juice
1 large onion, thinly sliced
4 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. fresh Italian parsley, chopped
few sprigs of fresh oregano
salt
freshly ground pepper
1 leg of lamb (about 9 lb.), butterflied
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except for lamb.
Mix well and pour over lamb in glass dish.
Turn lamb to coat well.
Refrigerate overnight, turning occasionally.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Leg Of Lamb Mosaic
Ingredients:
1 (5 lb.) leg of lamb, boned and butterflied (with fell)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, minced or 1 tsp. dried, crumbled
2 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 lb. fresh spinach leaves, stemmed
4 medium carrots, cooked
4 whole pimientos, drained
1/2 medium onion, thinly sliced
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 medium celery stalks, chopped
2 medium carrots, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 c. dry vermouth
1 c. chicken stock
Directions:
Position rack in center of oven and preheat to 325°.
Pat meat dry.
Place on surface, fell side down with long edge toward you. Sprinkle with rosemary and garlic.
Cover with layer of spinach leaves.
Arrange 4 carrots in 2 rows across center of meat. Surround carrots with pimientos.
Scatter onion slices atop carrots.
Sprinkle with parsley, 2 teaspoons salt, 3/4 teaspoon pepper and cayenne.
Starting at short end, roll meat up tightly. Tie securely with kitchen twine at 2-inch intervals.
Place on rack in roasting pan.
Add celery, 2 chopped carrots and onion to pan.
Pour vermouth over meat.
Season with salt and pepper. Roast until thermometer inserted in thickest part of meat registers 130° (for medium rare), about 1 1/2 hours, adding up to 1/2 cup water to pan if necessary to keep vegetables from sticking.
Transfer meat to cutting board; let stand 15 minutes.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Ground Lamb Curry
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground lamb
2 Tbsp. flour
1 large onion, sliced thinly
1/2 to 2 tsp. curry powder (depends on taste)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. water or stock
1/2 c. raisins
juice and grated peel of 1 lemon
2 whole cloves
Directions:
Brown meat in large skillet; pour off all but 2 tablespoons of drippings. Push meat to one side. Add flour and brown slightly, stirring constantly. Add all remaining ingredients and mix in the meat. Cover and simmer about 15 minutes or until onions are tender. Remove cloves before serving. Serve over hot rice. Serves 4.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Leg Of Lamb
Ingredients:
1 (6 to 7 lb.) leg of lamb, boned and butterflied
2 cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 c. oil
1/4 c. red wine
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. Dijon mustard
2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. fresh ground pepper
1/2 tsp. basil
1 bay leaf, crushed
Directions:
Put lamb, fat side down, in shallow pan.
Combine all seasonings together and pour marinade over lamb.
Cover tightly; refrigerate overnight.
Turn meat at least once.
Take lamb out of refrigerator 1 hour before cooking it.
Make incisions to meat to lay flat.
Broil 4 inches from heat for 10 minutes.
Turn, baste and broil 10 minutes on other side.
Lower temperature to 425° for 15 minutes.
Test with a sharp knife.
Meat should be pink and juicy.
Carve into thin slices to serve.
This is great grilled outside.

question: What can I cook with ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Spicy Lamb
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless lamb shoulder or sirloin roast
1 Tbsp. margarine or butter
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped celery
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 c. tomato sauce
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. curry powder
1 1/2 tsp. fresh grated ginger
1/4 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 c. plain yogurt
2 tsp. all-purpose flour
fresh cilantro or parsley (optional)
Directions:
Cut lamb into 1-inch cubes.
In large saucepan, brown 1/2 of the meat in hot margarine/butter.
Remove meat.
Brown remaining meat with onion, celery and garlic until vegetables are tender. Drain fat.
Return all meat to pan and stir in tomato sauce, water, curry powder, ginger, cumin, 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Bring to boiling; reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for about 1 hour or until lamb is tender.
Combine yogurt and flour; add to meat.
Cook and stir until bubbly; cook about 1 minute more.
Serve sprinkled with cilantro or parsley over rice or with pita bread.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta
Ingredients:
sun-dried tomatoes
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. tomatoes, peeled, seeded and diced
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes
1 Tbsp. Italian parsley, chopped
salt and pepper
pasta (except spaghetti or linguine)
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat oil in skillet; add garlic and saute 1 minute.
Add tomatoes; heat to boiling.
Stir until thickens, about 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and sun-dried tomatoes and simmer about 5 minutes.
Add salt and pepper.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Tomato And Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
4 large ripe tomatoes, cut in wedges
1/2 c. Feta cheese, crumbled
1/2 c. basil leaves, cut in strips
3 cloves minced garlic
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
8 oz. pasta
Directions:
Cook pasta.
Add remaining ingredients and stir.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Fresh Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 tsp. olive oil
3 tomatoes, peeled and seeded
1/2 tsp. salt
12 oz. pasta, cooked
1/2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. leaf basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in olive oil in a large nonstick skillet until golden.
Add tomatoes and simmer until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add broth, basil and oregano, simmer to thicken sauce, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Serve over hot, cooked pasta. Sprinkle with cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Baked Spaghetti
Ingredients:
2 c. canned, diced tomatoes
2 c. tomato sauce
1/3 c. tomato paste
1 c. water
2 cloves chopped garlic
1/2 c. diced onions
1 1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 c. chopped parsley
2 small bay leaves
1 lb. ground beef
2 boneless raw chicken breasts, chopped
1 c. minced Italian sausage
4 c. cooked angel hair pasta (8 oz. raw)
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
4 oz. sliced Swiss cheese
2 c. shredded Cheddar Jack cheese
Directions:
Combine first 11 ingredients in a stockpot.
Bring to a boil, lower heat and simmer for 1 hour covered. Combine ground beef, chicken and sausage in a saucepan. Cook until done and add to tomato mixture.
Simmer for another 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Baked Tomato Pasta
Ingredients:
12 medium Roma tomatoes
3 to 6 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/2 c. olive oil
1 lb. dry spaghetti, cooked according to directions
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. fresh whole or 2 Tbsp. basil leaves
Directions:
Cut tomatoes in half lengthwise; set cut side up in a 9 x 13-inch baking pan.
Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper.
Mix garlic with 1/3 cup parsley and 2 tablespoons olive oil; pat mixture over cut side of tomatoes.
Drizzle 2 tablespoons of olive oil over tomatoes.
Bake at 425° for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Roasted Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower
2 red onions
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
2 Tbsp. garlic olive oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. parmesan cheese
Directions:
Make cauliflower into 1-1/2 inch florets.
Cut red onions into 8 wedges.
Heat oven to 475°.
In non-stick roasting pan, mix cauliflower, onions, oil, salt and 1/4 tsp. pepper.
Roast 15 minutes. Toss and roast 5 to 10 minutes until lightly charcoal and tender. Transfer to platter, top with 1/4 tsp. pepper, parsley and cheese.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Casserole
Ingredients:
1 med head of cauliflower
3 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. flour
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. milk
1/8 tsp. pepper
8 oz. herb seasoned stuffing mix
1 c. water
1/2 c. melted butter
Directions:
Break califlower into small pieces.
Cook until just tender, drain an place in a 2 Qt. casserole dish.
3 Tbsp.
butter in pan and stir in flour to make a paste.
Blend in milk and slowly bring to a boil and simmer until thickened.
Add salt and pepper and pour over cauliflower.
Mix together stuffing, water and melted butter and spoon over top of casserole.
Bake 350° for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Curried Cauliflower
Ingredients:
4 c. cauliflower
1 Tbsp. milk
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/4 c. lite mayonnaise
1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1 tsp. curry powder
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
1 c. cracker crumbs
Directions:
Cook cauliflower until tender-crisp and set aside in a large casserole dish. Combine milk, soup, mayonnaise, cheese and curry powder.
Pour over cauliflower.
Mix melted butter and cracker crumbs. Sprinkle over all. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes. Serves 6.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: Scalloped Cauliflower
Ingredients:
2 pkg. frozen cauliflower
2 tsp. salt
6 Tbsp. margarine
6 Tbsp. flour
1 c. milk
1 c. grated American cheese
6 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
Directions:
Cook cauliflower according to package directions, adding 1 teaspoon salt.
Drain cauliflower, reserving 1 cup liquid.
Melt margarine in saucepan over low heat; blend in flour.
Stir in milk and reserved liquid; cook until thickened stirring constantly. Season sauce with remaining salt.
Spread 2/3 cup sauce in casserole; add cauliflower.
Pour 2/3 cup sauce over cauliflower; sprinkle with 1/2 cup cheese.
Arrange eggs in casserole over cheese; cover with remaining sauce.
Sprinkle remaining cheese over top.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for roasted cauliflower?
answer:
Title: K'S Baked Cauliflower
Ingredients:
1 head fresh cauliflower, cut into small pieces or 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen
1 stick margarine
1 1/2 tsp. white flour
3/4 c. milk
8 oz. sharp cheese, grated
1/4 tsp. black pepper
salt to taste
1/4 c. sour cream
1 thinly sliced green bell pepper
2 eggs
1 tsp. Italian bread crumbs
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Boil cauliflower; drain and set aside. In a saucepan, melt margarine and gradually add flour and milk, stirring constantly.
Slowly add cheese, pepper, salt, sour cream, green pepper and cauliflower.
Mix well and cool.
Beat 2 eggs and add into cauliflower mixture.
Grease a 9 x 11-inch baking dish. Pour mixture into dish and sprinkle with bread crumbs.
Cover lightly with foil and bake 30 minutes.
Remove foil and bake 15 minutes more or until golden brown.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Bbq Sauce
Ingredients:
1 bottle jar of chutney
1 sm. bottle worcestershire sauce
1 sm. bottle A-1 sauce
1 sm. bottle chili sauce
1 sm. bottle ketchup
1 c. bourbon
Directions:
Put all in blender and puree. NOTE: I pour mixture back into empty bottles from sauces used as ingredients.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. Wesson oil
3/4 c. chopped onion
3/4 c. water
3/4 c. catsup
3 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. mustard
2 tsp. pepper
1/3 c. lemon juice
Directions:
In a 1-quart saucepan, combine Wesson oil and onions together and simmer until soft; add balance of recipe and bring to a boil.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Original Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. water
3/4 c. light corn syrup
1/2 c. tomato paste
2/3 c. vinegar
1/3 c. dark brown sugar
3 Tbsp. molasses
1 1/4 tsp. liquid smoke (hickory-flavored)
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. ground mustard
1/8 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
dash of cayenne pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a medium saucepan over high heat and whisk until smooth. Bring mixture to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 45 minutes or until thick. Cool, then store in a covered container in the refrigerator overnight. Makes 1 1/2 cups.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. vinegar (2 qt.)
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce (4 Tbsp.)
1 Tbsp. Tabasco sauce (4 Tbsp.)
2 Tbsp. paprika (8 Tbsp.)
2 Tbsp. black pepper (8 Tbsp.)
3 Tbsp. salt (12 Tbsp.)
1 bottle catsup (3 large bottles)
3/4 tsp. dry mustard (3 tsp.)
1/2 tsp. cayenne (2 tsp.)
1/2 c. water (2 c.)
1/4 c. lemon juice (1 c.)
Directions:
Simmer all ingredients for 45 minutes.
For a milder sauce, omit the cayenne pepper.

question: I want to make a BBQ sauce from scratch.
answer:
Title: Barbecue Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. salad oil
1/3 c. vinegar
1/2 c. pineapple juice
1/2 c. catsup
1/4 c. minced onion
1/4 c. Worcestershire
1 tsp. Tabasco
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chili powder
1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a saucepan; bring to a boil and simmer 10 minutes.
Wonderful for chicken, pork chops, ribs.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 orange
1 apple
2 bananas
1 pear
1 grapefruit
1 c. mandarin oranges
1/2 c. chopped pecans
1/2 c. coconut
1/2 c. white raisins
1/2 c. white seedless grapes
3 c. colored miniature marshmallows
1 small can pineapple chunks
1 c. purple seedless grapes
1/2 c. red cherries
1/2 c. green cherries
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. sour cream
2 tsp. soft cream cheese
10 oz. Cool Whip
Directions:
Mix everything well.
Put in a covered bowl overnight in refrigerator.
Mix with fruit before serving.
Chop all fruit and sprinkle with Fruit-Fresh.
Mix well in a large bowl.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1 egg
1 tsp. flour
2 oranges, cut up
3 apples, cut up
Directions:
Place fruit in bowl.
Mix ingredients and cook until thickens.
Pour over fruit.
Mix gently and refrigerate in covered dish overnight when possible.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
1 can fruit cocktail, drained
1 small jar cherries, chopped
1 apple, chopped (red and not peeled)
1 banana, chopped
1 c. pecans or walnuts
Directions:
Note:
Kiwi fruit and grapes are also good added

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fresh Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
2 oranges, peeled and sectioned
2 apples, cubed
2 bananas, sliced
2 peaches, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Combine fruit and set aside.

question: How do I make a simple fruit salad?
answer:
Title: Fruit Salad
Ingredients:
2 envelopes unflavored gelatin
1 c. cold water
1 1/4 c. hot water or fruit juice, heated, from canned fruit
2/3 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 jar maraschino cherries
2 small bananas
1 medium bunch seedless grapes
1 can tidbit pineapple
1 or 2 apples
1 c. walnuts
Directions:
Pour cold water in bowl and sprinkle gelatin on top.
Add sugar, salt and hot water.
Stir until all is dissolved.
Add lemon and mix thoroughly.
Put into fridge.
Allow to jell somewhat.
Cut fruit into small pieces.
Drain cherries and pineapple and cut.
Add fruit to jello when it is thickened somewhat.
Oil mold and rinse in cold water.
Pour mixture into mold and refrigerate.
To remove from mold, dip into hot water.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Couscous Pilaf
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. sliced zucchini
1 small onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. white wine or chicken broth
1 c. chicken broth
3/4 c. couscous
1 c. cherry tomatoes
1/4 c. pitted black olives, cut in half (Kalamata best)
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh flat leaf parsley
Directions:
Melt butter; add onion, zucchini, salt, pepper, garlic and basil.
Cook until zucchini is tender, 4 to 5 minutes.
Add wine; bring to boil.
Cook 1 minute.
Add broth; bring to boil.
Stir in couscous, olives and tomatoes.
Remove from heat; cover.
Let stand until liquid is absorbed (about 5 minutes).
Before serving, fluff with fork; sprinkle with parsley.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Couscous With Chickpeas And Feta Cheese
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) can chicken broth or vegetable broth
1 c. packaged couscous (1 box)
1 (15 1/2 oz.) can chickpeas, drained
1 c. sliced scallions (with tops)
4 oz. crumbled Feta
1 (2 1/4 oz.) can drained ripe olives
2/3 c. Italian vinaigrette dressing
Directions:
In medium saucepan, bring broth to boil.
Stir in couscous. Remove from heat; cover and let stand for 5 minutes.
Transfer couscous to large bowl and fluff with fork.
Let stand 5 minutes; fluff again. mix in chickpeas, scallions, cheese and olives.
Pour dressing over mixture and toss lightly with fork.
Serve on bed of lettuce.
Serves 6. Enjoy.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Spicy Vegetable Couscous
Ingredients:
1 c. each chopped zucchini and summer squash
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove chopped garlic
1 c. chickpeas
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley (fresh)
2 tsp. curry
1 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. red pepper flakes
1 lb. firm tofu (optional)*
3 c. cooked couscous
Directions:
Saute vegetables (and tofu, if desired) over medium heat until just tender.
Add chickpeas and spices, except for parsley.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Veggie-Topped Couscous
Ingredients:
1 large onion, cut into thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. olive oil or cooking oil
2 c. thinly sliced carrots
1/2 c. water
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (optional)
2 medium zucchini, quartered lengthwise and cut into 1/2-inch pieces (2 1/2 c.)
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can reduced sodium stewed tomatoes
2 Tbsp. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
2 c. reduced sodium chicken broth
1 c. couscous
1/4 c. chopped unsalted dry roasted peanuts
Directions:
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in hot oil over medium-low heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in carrots, 1/2 cup water, basil, cumin, salt and, if desired, red pepper.
Bring to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in zucchini, garbanzo beans and tomatoes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir together 2 tablespoons water and cornstarch.
Stir into tomato mixture.
Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir for 2 minutes more.

question: What can I make with chickpeas and couscous?
answer:
Title: Braised Vegetables With Couscous
Ingredients:
4 tsp. vegetable oil
2 c. sliced onions
1 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1 c. sliced zucchini
1 lb. rinsed, drained, canned chickpeas
1 sq. Knox vegetable bouillon
1/2 tsp. cumin
4 oz. uncooked couscous
Directions:
In nonstick Dutch oven, heat oil.
Add onions, carrots, celery and zucchini.
Cook over high heat, stirring frequently until onions are lightly browned.
Add 3 cups water, chickpeas, bouillon, cumin and dash of pepper.
Reduce heat to low.
Cover and simmer 10 minutes or until carrots are tender.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
5 lb. potatoes, pared
2 tsp. salt
2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese with chives, cubed
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. heavy cream
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
paprika (optional)
Directions:
Cook potatoes with 1 teaspoon salt in boiling water until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes until smooth; add cream cheese, 4 tablespoons butter, garlic salt, pepper and 1 teaspoon salt.
Mix until smooth.
Gradually add cream; mix well after each addition. Put in greased baking dish.
(Bake at once or cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.)
Dot top of potatoes with 2 tablespoons butter and sprinkle with paprika.
Bake in 325° oven 30 minutes. Increase heat to 375° and bake 30 minutes more.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 to 8 potatoes
1/2 stick butter
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
6 to 8 potatoes, grated
1 toe garlic, mashed
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. oleo or chicken fat *
1 onion, grated
1 tsp. salt
4 eggs
2 bacon strips, fried crisp and crumbled
6 medium potatoes
1/2 c. butter
1 c. hot milk
1/3 c. Cheddar cheese
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped chives
1 Tbsp. shortening
4 c. diced apples (1 large apple makes 1 c.)
2 eggs
1 c. chopped nuts
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 tsp. baking soda
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 tsp. salt
2 c. flour, sifted
Directions:
Peel, core and dice apples.
Place in a bowl and add eggs and mix.
Add remaining ingredients and mix well.
Pour into a greased and floured pan and bake 1 hour and 15 minutes or until done in a 325° oven.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Special Occasion Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 lb. potatoes (about 12 medium), peeled and cooked
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (room temperature)
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. sour cream
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 c. onions, finely chopped
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Mash hot peppers.
Add cream cheese and butter in pieces.
Beat until both melted.
Mix in sour cream.
To milk, add eggs and onions; whip lightly.
Add to potato mixture along with seasonings. Beat until light and fluffy.
Place in greased 9-inch round casserole dish.
Refrigerate several hours (can be chilled overnight if not needed immediately).
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 12.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Mashed Potatoes - Make-Ahead Type
Ingredients:
6 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/2 c. sour cream
3 oz. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 to 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Cook potatoes until tender.
Drain.
Mash potatoes and mix in sour cream, softened cream cheese, 1 tablespoon butter, onion salt and pepper.
Gradually beat in enough milk to make potatoes fluffy and light.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Cover with foil.
Chill up to 24 hours.
To serve, dot with remaining 1 tablespoon butter and bake, uncovered, at 350° for 45 minutes or until heated through.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy mashed potatoes?
answer:
Title: Party Mashed Potatoes
Ingredients:
12 medium potatoes, peeled and boiled
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese (can use fat-free or reduced-calorie)
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1/2 c. sour cream (can use fat-free)
1/2 c. milk
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1/4 c. minced onions
Directions:
Mash potatoes; add cream cheese and margarine or butter. Beat until melted.
Blend in sour cream. In separate bowl, combine eggs, milk, onions, salt and pepper.
Add to potato mixture.
Beat until light and fluffy.
Put into greased casserole or 9 x 13 pan. Refrigerate several hours or overnight.
Bake in 350° oven for 35 to 45 minutes. Serves 8 to 12.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. fish
1/2 c. salad oil
1/3 c. freshly squeezed lemon juice
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. capers and juice (optional)
2 Tbsp. catsup
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
4 bay leaves, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 cloves garlic, finely chopped
paprika
Directions:
Marinate fish for 30 minutes in mixed ingredients.
Cook on grill about 8 minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily with fork.
Baste fish while grilling and sprinkle with paprika.
Baste shrimp or scallops only, don't marinate.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
4 fish fillets
1/2 c. margarine
1/2 Tbsp. garlic salt
1/4 Tbsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Worcestershire
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
light vegetable oil cooking spray
1/4 c. cornmeal
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. lemon pepper
4 tsp. blackening seasoning
4 (4 oz.) catfish fillets
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 400°.
Spray the vegetable oil over the baking sheet 3 times to coat.
Put the cornmeal, thyme and basil on a large plate and mix well.
Sprinkle 1/8 teaspoon of the garlic powder, 1/8 teaspoon of the lemon pepper and 1 teaspoon of the blackening seasoning on each of the catfish fillets.
Coat the fillets thoroughly with the cornmeal mixture and transfer them to the prepared baking sheet.
Dust each fillet with 1/8 teaspoon of the paprika.
Coat the catfish lightly with the cooking spray. Place the baking sheet on the bottom shelf of the oven.
Bake for 20 minutes.
Reduce the heat to 350° and bake for about 5 minutes more, until the crust is golden and the fish flakes easily.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Spicy Grilled Catfish
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. lemon-pepper seasoning
2 Tbsp. blackened redfish seasoning
6 (6 oz.) catfish fillets
1/2 c. margarine, melted
1/4 c. lemon juice
Directions:
Combine first 2 ingredients; set aside.
Place fish in a single layer in a lightly-greased fish basket.
Combine butter and lemon juice; brush on each side of fish.
Grill fish 3 to 5 inches from hot coals 5 minutes on each side, basting with butter mixture when turned.
Sprinkle each side of fish with seasoning mixture. Baste and grill 3 additional minutes on each side or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish
Ingredients:
2 lb. red snapper
1 lemon (small)
1 small onion
1 small green pepper
salt to taste
garlic to taste
1/2 tsp. black lemon pepper
1/2 to 1 stick butter (unsalted)
Directions:
Season fish with salt, pepper and garlic.
Set aside for 15 minutes.
Cut up onion and green pepper.
Squeeze lemon juice over fish.
Put in covered dish.
Add onion, green pepper and s/c lemon over the entire dish.
Cook slow in oven for one hour.
Serve hot.

question: Give me a recipe for grilled fish with lemon.
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish
Ingredients:
fish of your choice
salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Put aluminum foil on grill.
Punch holes in foil.
Spray foil with Pam cooking spray.
Place fish, skin side down.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Squeeze lemon juice on fillet.
Cook on grill at medium temperature for 15 to 20 minutes or until flaky.
Top with Molly McButter flakes.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Eggs
Ingredients:
1 large ripe avocado
8 hard-cooked eggs, cut in half
1/2 c. softened cream cheese
pinch of salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Mash yolks of eggs with fork.
Add the cheese, 3/4 avocado, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Stuff the egg whites.
Slice remaining avocado thinly.
Put thin slice of avocado on top of eggs.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked shelled eggs, diced
4 strips bacon, fried, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 large avocados, halved and pitted
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. bottled mustard or to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine eggs, bacon and onion.
Cut and scoop avocado pulp and mash with a fork or large plate.
Stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice, prepared mustard and salt.
Add egg mixture; spoon into pretty glass cups.
Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard-boiled eggs, cut in half lengthwise
3 slices crisp bacon, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. paprika
dash of pepper
3 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 medium avocado, finely chopped
Directions:
Set aside egg white; sieve yolks.
Combine yolks with remaining ingredients except avocado.
Mix well.
Fold in avocado; refill egg whites with yolk mixture.
Sprinkle with additional paprika.
If desired, top each with a pimento strip or a parsley sprig.
Chill. Makes 12.

question: What’s a quick recipe for an avocado toast with eggs?
answer:
Title: Egg And Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado, diced in small pieces
2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped fine
2 anchovies, cut fine
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Mix well and refrigerate.
Serve on crackers or as dip.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
3/4 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. sour cream
1 Tbsp. white vinegar
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. mustard
salt and pepper to taste (white pepper)
3 c. cubed, boiled chicken
1 c. peas
1 c. celery, diced
2 tsp. grated onions
4 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
1 (4 oz.) can shoestring potato sticks (optional)
Directions:
Combine the first 6 ingredients.
Add chicken, peas, celery, onions and eggs.
Let stand in refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.
Mix in potato sticks just before serving.
Mound on lettuce.
Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. chopped chutney
1 tsp. curry
2 tsp. grated lime peel
1/4 c. fresh lime juice
1/4 tsp. salt
4 c. diced chicken
2 c. pineapple chunks, drained
2 c. sliced celery
1/4 c. chives
1/2 c. slivered almonds
Directions:
Mix
first
five ingredients.
Add rest and refrigerate overnight.	Serve over lettuce.
Also good made with shrimp.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
1 c. sour cream
1 bunch green onions
1 c. green seedless grapes
6 cloves
1 c. chopped fresh parsley
1 c. walnuts
6 medium potatoes
4 Tbsp. white wine
1 large onion
freshly ground pepper
salt to taste
2 broiling chickens, cut into quarters (remove back and backbones)
3 Tbsp. olive oil
40 cloves garlic, peeled * (if cloves are small, increase number)
2 medium or 1 large carrot, cut into matchsticks
2 ribs celery, cut into matchsticks
2 large onions, cut into matchsticks
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 c. dry white wine
1/2 c. cognac or more
salt and pepper
Directions:
Rub chicken in oil and brown in skillet.
While browning chicken, sweat the vegetables in Dutch oven casserole.
In casserole, make a bottom layer of carrot, celery, onion and garlics.
Over first layer, lay the chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper, then with parsley.
Make one more layer of the vegetables, ending with chicken.
Add cognac, warmed, and flambe carefully.
Season the top layer and add the wine.
Place a double layer of foil over the casserole and then add the lid.
Heat briefly on top of stove burner, then place in the preheated oven for 1 1/4 hours.
Serve chicken directly from the casserole.
A delicious sauce is self made, the garlics cook down to a soft and wonderful nutty flavor.
Serve with plenty of crusty French bread, wine, fresh fruits for dessert.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
2 c. cubed cooked chicken
1/2 c. celery, sliced
1/4 c. green onion, diced
1 hard-cooked egg, chopped
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients; blend well.
Chill thoroughly.
Serve on lettuce garnished with wedges of tomato, if desired.
Excellent for sandwich filling, too.

question: How do I make a simple chicken salad?
answer:
Title: Chicken Salad
Ingredients:
4 c. cubed cooked chicken
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. halved seedless grapes
1 pkg. slivered almonds, toasted
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. sour cream
Directions:
Combine first 6 items, then add mayonnaise and sour cream. Mix and chill several hours.
Serve on a plate of lettuce.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Meat Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. (8 oz.) tomato sauce
1 tsp. chili powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Brown beef in skillet, stirring until crumbly; drain excess fat.
Stir in remaining ingredients; simmer, covered, for 10 minutes.
Makes filling for 8 taco shells.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
8 oz. can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. cumin
Directions:
Brown the ground beef and onions. Drain. Add other ingredients and simmer over low heat until most of the liquid is absorbed. Easily increased for more than 1 pound.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Filling
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. water
1 pkg. taco seasoning mix or use Taco Seasoning Mix recipe
1 can pinto, red, or chili beans, drained
1 can whole kernel corn, drained
Directions:
Brown ground beef in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Drain excess grease.
Add water and taco seasoning mix and beans. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes, add corn stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Meat-Filled Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1 envelope taco seasoning mix
3/4 c. water
12 taco shells
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 c. Colby or Cheddar cheese, shredded
shredded lettuce
taco sauce
Directions:
Cook beef, onion and garlic until done.
Drain off fat.
Stir in taco seasoning mix and water.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, 15 to 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, arrange taco shells on a baking sheet lined with paper towels.
Warm in a 350° oven for 5 to 10 minutes.
Stuff each taco shell with meat, tomatoes, cheese, lettuce and top with taco sauce.

question: How do I make a traditional beef taco filling?
answer:
Title: Taco Beef Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. water
1 (16 oz.) can stewed tomatoes, cut up
1 (16 oz.) can kidney beans
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 envelope (2 Tbsp.) taco seasoning mix
1 small avocado, peeled, seeded and chopped
shredded Cheddar cheese
dairy sour cream
Directions:
In large saucepan, cook ground beef and onion until meat is browned; drain off excess fat.
Add water, undrained tomatoes, undrained kidney beans, tomato sauce and taco seasoning mix. Simmer, covered, for 15 minutes.
Add avocado.
Pass cheese, corn chips and sour cream to top each serving. Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops With Dressing
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. margarine
4 1/2 c. bread cubes
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. celery salt
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. chopped celery
3 medium potatoes, peeled and quartered
cooking oil
1 can cream of mushroom soup
Directions:
Season pork chops with salt and pepper.
Brown in 1 tablespoon hot oil in a skillet.
Remove from skillet and place in baking dish.
Saute onion and celery in margarine in a small skillet. Combine with bread cubes, poultry seasoning, celery salt and 1/4 cup water; mix lightly.
Shape dressing into mounds on top of chops.
Coat potatoes with oil; place around chops.
Combine soup and 1/2 cup water; pour over chops and potatoes.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour, or until meat is tender.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops And Dressing
Ingredients:
4 pork chops (boneless)
3 c. soft bread cubes
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/4 c. water
1/4 c. melted butter
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1/3 c. water
Directions:
Brown chops on both sides. Mix together bread cubes, poultry seasoning, onion, water and melted butter. Place chops in a baking dish and place a mound of stuffing on each chop. Blend cream of mushroom soup and water. Pour over chops and stuffing. Bake, uncovered, at 350° about 1 1/4 hours.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops & Potato Bake
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
vegetable oil
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. sour cream
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 pkg. (24 oz.) frozen hash brown potatoes
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1 can French fried onions
Directions:
Brown pork chops in lightly greased skillet.
Sprinkle with seasoned salt and set aside.
Combine soup, milk, sour cream, pepper and 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt.	Stir in potatoes, 1/2 c. cheese and 1/2 can onions.	Spoon mixture into 9 X 13 inch baking dish.
Arrange chops over potatoes.
Bake covered at 350° for 1 hour.
Top with remaining cheese and onions.
Bake uncovered 5 minutes longer.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops And Dressing
Ingredients:
4 large pork chops
2 c. cubed dry bread
1/8 tsp. sage
2 Tbsp. onion, chopped
1/2 tsp. celery salt
1/2 c. celery, chopped
2 Tbsp. water or more
1/4 c. oleo, melted
1 can mushroom soup plus 1/3 can water
Directions:
Brown chops in skillet; place into a 2-quart casserole.
In small bowl combine bread cubes, onion and seasoning.
Add water and melted oleo.
Top each pork chop with 1/4 cup or more of dressing.
Combine soup and water in skillet used to brown chops and heat.
Pour over the chops and dressing.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 1 hour.

question: How do I make crispy baked pork chops?
answer:
Title: Baked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 pork chops
2 Tbsp. flour
2 tsp. salt
pepper
1 can cream of mushroom soup
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. rosemary, crushed
1 can French fried onion rings
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Coat chops in mixture of flour, salt and pepper.
Brown chops in skillet.
Place chops in baking dish.
Combine soup, water, ginger and rosemary; pour over chops.
Sprinkle with half of the onion rings.
Cover.
Bake at 350° for 50 minutes.
Uncover; sprinkle with remaining onion rings and continue baking 10 minutes.
Remove meat to platter.
Blend sour cream into soup mixture; heat through.
Serve meat and gravy with fluffy rice.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Spinach
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils (1 c.)
1 lb. spinach, chopped
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. coriander
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. chili powder
lemon juice to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the lentils in 1 pint (2 cups) water until soft (about 25 minutes).
Fry sliced onion and chopped garlic; add spices.
Stir about 2 minutes.
Add cooked lentils and washed and coarsely chopped spinach.
Stir well.
Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add salt and lemon juice.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Bean Sprout Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 cup olive oil
1/4 cup sugar
1/4 cup cider vinegar
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
2 Tbsp. worcestershire sauce
1 pkg. fresh spinach, torn
1 cup bean sprouts
4 bacon strips, cooked & crumbled
4 green onion sliced
2 hard cooked eggs, sliced
2 Tbsp. sunflower kernels
Directions:
In a small sauce pan, whisk together the first 5 ingredients, cook and stir over low heat until mixture reaches 160 degrees. Remove from heat, cool.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
8 c. chicken stock or 48 oz. can stock
2 cloves chopped garlic
1 onion, chopped
3/4 c. chopped carrots
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. lentils
1 bunch spinach
3 Tbsp. lemon juice or vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Wash and pick over lentils.
Place in boiling water and cook 2 minutes.
Cover; let sit 1 hour and drain.
(This removes gas.)

question: What can I make with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
2 medium onions, sliced
1 clove garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. olive oil
3 c. water or chicken stock
8 oz. dried lentils
1 tsp. salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil over medium heat until onions are tender. Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice. Simmer about 5 more minutes. Serves 4.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Good Carrots
Ingredients:
12 carrots, peeled and sliced
1/4 c. butter
1 small onion, minced
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
2 c. milk
1/4 tsp. celery salt
3 c. buttered bread crumbs or Pepperidge Farm stuffing
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese slices
Directions:
Cook carrots.
Saute onion in butter.
Stir in flour, salt, dry mustard and milk.
Add pepper and celery salt.
In 2-quart casserole, arrange layers of carrots and cheese, ending with carrots.
Pour on sauce.
Top with crumbs.
Bake 20 minutes or until hot throughout.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Company Carrots
Ingredients:
12 carrots, cut into 3-inch long strips and cooked until tender (save water)
3/4 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. horseradish
1/4 c. reserved carrot water
salt and pepper (lightly)
1/2 c. cracker or bread crumbs (Ritz taste good)
1/2 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Combine carrots, mayonnaise, onion, carrot water and horseradish.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Top with crumbs and cheese.
Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
8 cooked carrots, halved lengthwise
Directions:
Cover carrots with water and boil until tender. Drain.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: Herbed Carrot Potato Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1 c. sour cream
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. snipped chives
1 tsp. Worcestershire
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. pepper
4 medium carrots (2 c.), thinly bias sliced
8 medium potatoes, cooked, peeled and sliced (7 c.)
1 c. thinly bias sliced celery
1/2 c. pitted ripe olives, sliced
leaf lettuce (optional)
Directions:
Combine mayonnaise or salad dressing, sour cream, lemon juice, chives, Worcestershire, salt, dill weed, mustard and pepper until well combined.
In a medium pan, heat small amount of water to boiling; add carrots and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes.
Drain. Rinse with cold water; drain again.
In a large bowl, gently toss together the sliced potatoes, sliced carrots, celery and olives. Add sour cream mixture.
Gently toss to coat well.
Cover and chill several hours.

question: What can I make with cabbage and carrots?
answer:
Title: German Style Carrots
Ingredients:
5 or 6 sliced carrots
2 Tbsp. oil
1 medium sliced onion
2 Tbsp. sugar
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. favorite herb
Directions:
Place oil in saucepan, then add sliced carrots and top with onion.
Sprinkle sugar, herbs, salt and pepper over top.
Put lid on pan and simmer for 20 minutes or until tender.
Do not add water.
If necessary, add a little oil.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sugar (granulated)
1 c. shortening (1/2 Crisco, 1/2 butter)
3 eggs
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. buttermilk
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Cream together well.
Dough should not be too stiff.
Drop by teaspoon.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. buttered Crisco
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1 tsp. vanilla
2 c. sifted flour
1/2 tsp. soda
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Mix
shortening and sugar;
beat well.	Add vanilla and lemon juice.
Add
egg
and beat until light. Add flour, soda and
salt; alternate	with buttermilk.
Drop by tablespoonful and sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.
Top with raisins.
Bake at 350° for 10 minutes or until lightly brown.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 1/2 c. sugar (white)
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
3 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1 c. dairy sour cream
cinnamon-sugar mixture
Directions:
Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Add vanilla.
Add flour, salt, soda and baking powder alternately with sour cream. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto lightly greased baking sheet, two-inches apart.
Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar mixture.
Bake until brown around the edges at 400° for approximately 10 minutes. Cool and store in airtight tin.

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookie
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter/margarine
1 1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
3 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. buttermilk
Directions:
In large bowl mix together butter, eggs, vanilla and buttermilk; set aside.
Mix together sugar, salt, flour, baking powder and baking soda.
Combine the dry ingredients slowly to the wet ingredients.
Mix well.
Drop onto ungreased cookie sheet. Sprinkle with granulated sugar (at Christmastime use red and green granulated sugar, be careful not to get sugar onto baking pan, sugar will burn).
Bake at 350° for 4 to 5 minutes or until done (top of cookie will spring back when touched).

question: What’s a good recipe for a soft sugar cookie?
answer:
Title: Soft Sugar Cookies
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. sugar
3/4 tsp. salt
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. hot water
4 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. butter, softened
4 egg yolks
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. sour cream
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Cream sugar, butter, salt, yolks and whole eggs.
Dissolve soda in hot water.
Add with sour cream to butter mixture.
Sift flour, baking powder, nutmeg and vanilla and add to egg mixture. Dough will be sticky.
Cover and chill several hours or overnight. Roll on well-floured surface.
Cut and bake on cookie sheet at 350° for 8 to 10 minutes or until cookies are set, but not browned.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers (any color)
1 tsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 medium squash, diced (yellow)
1 medium zucchini, diced
1/2 c. onion, diced
2 medium cloves garlic, minced
2 c. cooked brown rice
1/2 c. fat-free Cheddar cheese, grated
1 c. tomato juice (no salt added)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°. Cut peppers in half lengthwise. Remove stems, rubs and seeds. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat, swirling to cover bottom. Saut crookneck squash, zucchini, onion and garlic until zucchini is tender-crisp (about 4 minutes). Don't overcook. In a medium bowl, combine rice and cheese. Gently stir into skillet. Stuff pepper halves with vegetable mixture. Place in a 9-inch casserole dish. Carefully pour tomato sauce around peppers. Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes. Serves 8.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked rice
1/2 roll Prosage
1/2 c. sliced, cooked mushrooms
3 eggs
French fried onions (optional)
1/2 c. diced celery
1/2 c. diced onion
4 bell peppers
salt and McKay's chick style to taste
Directions:
Saute Prosage, celery and onion until transparent.
Mix in rice and eggs.
Remove seeds and stem from peppers and parboil them for 5 minutes.
Set peppers in a greased casserole and fill with rice mixture.
Don't crowd peppers as they will swell some in baking. If there is some rice mix left over, it can be placed in between peppers.
Top with French fried onion rings that come in a can.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
6 bell peppers
water (to cover)
1 stick butter
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped green onion tops
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces
1/4 c. grated Romano and Parmesan cheese
2 slices white bread, moistened and squeezed
3 eggs, slightly beaten
1/2 c. Progresso bread crumbs
1/2 lb. ground chuck
dash of oregano
dash of basil
dash of salt and pepper
Directions:
Cut off tops of bell peppers; remove insides and boil 5 minutes.
Drain.
Saute onions, shallots and minced garlic in butter.
Add meat and brown.
Shred moistened bread with fingers into skillet.
Add mushrooms and liquid, cheese, seasoning and bread crumbs.
Remove from heat and stir in eggs, working quickly. Return to heat for 5 minutes.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
4 large bell peppers
3 to 4 medium potatoes
2 tomatoes
2 medium onions
1 green chilli, chopped (optional)
1 tsp. cumin powder or curry powder
salt to taste
1 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. grated cheese
1 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Halve the bell peppers and remove seeds.
Dip in boiling water for a minute and keep aside.
Boil the potatoes; peel and mash coarsely with a fork.
Chop tomatoes and slice the onions.

question: How do I make baked stuffed bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
Ingredients:
6 large bell peppers
2 c. cooked rice
1 lb. ground meat
1 can tomatoes and green chilies
1/2 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 can cream of mushroom soup
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut tops off and center out of peppers.
Put peppers in boiling water; cook until tender.
Saute meat and pepper tops with salt.
Drain off excess oil.
Mix well the meat, rice, 1/2 of liquid from tomatoes and soups.
If you want it hotter, add rest of tomato juice.
Place peppers in pan and stuff with mixture. Bake at 350° for 20 minutes, or until bubbling hot.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sauce For Pasta
Ingredients:
1/4 c. creamy peanut butter
2 Tbsp. hot water
1 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. pasta
Directions:
In medium bowl with wire whisk or fork, beat peanut butter with water until smooth.
Stir in vinegar and next 4 ingredients until blended.
Add cooked and drained pasta; toss gently to coat well. Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut-Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. linguine or thin spaghetti
3 garlic cloves
1 1/2 tsp. minced peeled ginger root
7 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
6 Tbsp. peanut butter
1/4 c. rice wine vinegar
1/4 c. honey
1 tsp. dark sesame oil
1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
1 c. broccoli florets, blanched until tender-crisp
1 c. sliced Napa cabbage
1/2 c. carrots, diagonally sliced
1/2 c. bean sprouts
Directions:
Cook linguine according to package directions until al dente; rinse in cold water and drain well.
In food processor or blender, combine garlic, ginger, soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, honey, sesame oil and hot pepper sauce; process until blended.
Add water to reach desired consistency (1/2 to 3/4 cup), processing until smooth.
To serve, toss cooked linguine with vegetables and sauce. Yield:
6 servings.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Peanut Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
8 oz. thin spaghetti
4 Tbsp. toasted sesame oil
6 green onions, finely chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. dried hot pepper flakes
1 Tbsp. rice wine vinegar
1 tsp. granulated sugar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 c. finely chopped salted dry peanuts
1/3 c. chopped fresh cilantro
Directions:
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Drain.
Rinse in cold water and toss with 2 tablespoons sesame oil.
Set aside.
Place remaining sesame oil in large heated frying pan.
Add green onions, garlic and pepper flakes.
Stir over medium heat until onions have softened, 2 minutes.
Add spaghetti, vinegar, sugar and soy sauce.
Heat mixture, tossing to combine for 3 or 4 minutes.
Stir in peanuts and cilantro.
Add salt to taste. Transfer to serving bowl.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Cold Sesame Noodles
Ingredients:
4 oz. fine egg noodles
1 Tbsp. sesame oil
1/4 c. sesame paste (tahini) or peanut butter
3 Tbsp. brewed tea or water
2 Tbsp. hot oil (chili oil)
3 Tbsp. light soy sauce
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
2 tsp. sugar
salt to taste
1/4 c. oil
2 tsp. to 2 Tbsp. chopped garlic
leftover chicken, cut into small pieces
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Let sit a couple of hours.
Once all the ingredients are stocked, they last a long time and it's a great way to use leftover chicken or make a "special" dinner for surprise guests.

question: How do I make a simple peanut butter sauce for noodles?
answer:
Title: Buttered Noodles
Ingredients:
9 c. wide egg noodles, uncooked
1/4 c. (1/2 stick) real butter
2 tsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
In saucepan over low heat, add remaining ingredients.
Heat until butter is melted; stir in hot pasta.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Sausage Seasoning
Ingredients:
1 1/2 Tbsp. salt
1 Tbsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
1 tsp. allspice
1 Tbsp. lemon peel
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Makes enough to season 5 pounds ground meat.
Pork, chicken, turkey and beef all work well, alone or in combination.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Sausage
Ingredients:
1 fryer chicken, cut up
1 lb. Italian sausage (mild)
1 onion, diced
1 green pepper, diced
2 c. chicken broth
1 c. dry white wine
olive oil (light)
2 c. rice
1 Tbsp. tarragon
1 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. fresh garlic
seasoned pepper
Directions:
Brown chicken in olive oil until lightly browned on both sides.
Remove from skillet.
Add onion, green pepper and garlic and saute until tender.
Remove from skillet.
Add Italian sausage and brown, then add all 3 in a baking dish.
Pour over chicken broth and white wine.
Add spices and seasoned pepper.
Cover loosely and bake for 30 minutes at 375°.
Serve over rice.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Sausage Stuffing
Ingredients:
1 lb. bulk sausage
3 large onions
5 stalks celery (leaves and all)
1/3 bunch parsley
1/2 green pepper
28 unsalted crackers
1 loaf French bread
1/4 lb. margarine
2 eggs
1/2 c. pecans
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
Directions:
Put sausage in large pot and render out.
Chop onions and celery fine and add to sausage.
Mix over low flame.
Chop green pepper and parsley fine and add to mixture.
Stir in poultry seasoning.
Add some margarine.
Moisten French bread and squeeze out excess water; add to mixture.
Keep stirring to moisten. Crumble in crackers; stir and add the remainder of margarine. Stir to moisten.
Remove from fire and add eggs; mix well, then add pecans and stir well.
Stuffs a 12 to 16 pound turkey.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Sausage Dressing
Ingredients:
1 lb. sage sausage
2 1/2 c. (8 oz. bag) cornbread stuffing
2 1/2 c. (8 oz. bag) herb seasoned stuffing
2 (14 1/2 oz. size) cans chicken or turkey broth
1 large onion, chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
poultry seasoning
Directions:
Brown sausage and drain.
Cook onion and celery in butter or margarine until tender.
Mix stuffing, poultry seasoning, salt and black pepper.
Stir in broth, celery, onion, butter and sausage. Mix well.
Stuff 14 to 20 pound turkey lightly.
Do not overstuff.
Dressing may be baked separately in an uncovered dish for 30 to 35 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade chicken sausage?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
1 lb. Hillshire Farm Polska kielbasa
2 green peppers
2 yellow peppers
2 red peppers
1 onion
garlic powder to taste
Tony Chachere Creole seasoning
Directions:
Slice peppers and onions in half and then in even slices. Slice sausage diagonally in bite size slices.
Add all to large pot and add enough water to pot to steam everything.
Season to taste.
Cook until peppers are tender.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
2 lb. fresh or frozen Brussels sprouts
water
4 slices bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
1 c. chopped onion
1 c. sour cream
salt to taste
Louisiana hot sauce or ground cayenne pepper to taste
Directions:
If using fresh sprouts, rinse well and cut off any discolored leaves.
With a paring knife, cut a "plus"
sign in the stem end to insure even cooking.
Place the sprouts in a large saucepan and cover with water.
Bring to a boil and continue boiling for about 10 minutes or until the stem side is tender when pierced with a knife.
Drain and set the sprouts aside.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Fancy Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
1 c. water
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt (optional)
2 pt. fresh Brussels sprouts, halved or 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen Brussels sprouts, thawed
1 (8 oz.) water chestnuts, drained and diced
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
In a saucepan over medium heat, bring water, parsley, sugar and salt to a boil. Add Brussels sprouts. Cover and simmer for 6 to 8 minutes or until tender; drain. Add water chestnuts and butter; heat through. Yield: 6 servings.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Fancy Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
1 c. water
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt, optional
2 pints fresh Brussels sprouts, halved or 2 pkg. (10 oz. each) frozen Brussels sprouts, thawed
1 can (8 oz.) water chestnuts, drained and diced
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
In a saucepan over medium heat, bring water, parsley, sugar and salt to a boil. Add Brussels sprouts. Cover and simmer for 6-8 minutes or until tender; drain. Add water chestnuts and butter; heat through. This has 11 grams carbohydrate.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Creamed Sprouts
Ingredients:
2 pt. Brussels sprouts
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 c. milk
1 c. sour cream
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cook Brussels sprouts in small amount of salted water in covered pan; drain well.
In medium saucepan, cook onion in butter until tender; add flour, brown sugar, mustard and salt and stir in milk.
Cook until thickened.
Add sour cream and mix; add sprouts, stirring gently.

question: How do I make crispy roasted Brussels sprouts?
answer:
Title: Company Brussels Sprouts
Ingredients:
4 bacon strips, diced
1 doz. Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh chives
1 carrot, thinly sliced
10 stuffed green olives, sliced
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/3 c. chicken broth or dry white wine
1 tsp. olive oil
1/2 tsp. pepper
pinch of salt
Directions:
In a skillet, fry bacon just until cooked.
Drain, reserving 2 tablespoons drippings.
Add remaining ingredients; cook and stir over medium-high heat for 10 to 15 minutes or until Brussels sprouts are crisp-tender.
Yields 4 servings.
