question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. salad oil
1 medium onion, diced
1 medium green pepper, diced
1 small clove garlic, minced
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
4 medium zucchini (2 lb.), cut in 1 1/4-inch slices
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. basil
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese, grated
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet over medium heat in hot oil, cook onion, green pepper and garlic until tender, stirring occasionally.
Add tomatoes with liquid and next 5 ingredients.
Heat to boiling. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer until zucchini are tender-crisp, about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally to break up tomatoes.
When zucchini are done, sprinkle evenly with cheese. Cover and simmer for about 3 minutes.
Makes 8 servings.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
3 large zucchini or 6 small
1 (2 lb. 3 oz.) can tomatoes
2 onions, finely chopped
1 clove garlic, finely minced
olive oil
oregano flakes
Parmesan cheese, grated
Directions:
Wash zucchini and slice thinly.
Set aside.
Saute onions and garlic in olive oil; be careful not to burn.
Add zucchini and cover.
Stir occasionally to prevent zucchini from sticking; cook until soft.
Discard water that has collected in pot from zucchini.
Add tomatoes and oregano to taste.
Stir and simmer gently until done.
Serve with grated Parmesan cheese sprinkled on top.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini-Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 large onion, chopped (1 c.)
1 clove garlic, minced
1 lb. zucchini, trimmed and chopped
1/4 c. olive oil
2 large ripe tomatoes, peeled and chopped
2 tsp. leaf basil, crumbled
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
dash of sugar
Directions:
Saute onion, garlic and zucchini in oil in a medium saucepan until soft; stir in tomatoes, basil, salt, pepper and sugar.
Heat to bubbling; simmer 30 minutes or until sauce thickens slightly. Serve over fettucelle or spaghetti.
Yield:
3 cups.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini In Tomato Juice(From Weight Watchers)
Ingredients:
zucchini
12 oz. tomato juice
dash of oregano
dash of parsley flakes
dash of garlic powder
2 Tbsp. bell pepper
2 Tbsp. dehydrated onions
salt
1 chicken bouillon cube
Directions:
Cut zucchini in half lengthwise, then cut into cubes.
Put all ingredients in a saucepan and cook until the zucchini is tender.

question: What can I cook with zucchini and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Zucchini And Tomato Bake
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini, sliced
1/2 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 medium tomatoes, cut in wedges
1 medium onion, sliced
1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
3 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Place zucchini in 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with half of seasonings.
Layer tomatoes and onion over zucchini.
Sprinkle with remaining seasonings.
Top with cheese; dot with butter. Cover.
Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
2 to 3 ripe bananas, mashed
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Cream butter.
Gradually add sugar, medium speed.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Beat after each egg.
Stir in bananas, vanilla and cinnamon.
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients.
Gradually add to creamed mixture.
Beat until blended.
Stir in chips and walnuts. Spoon batter into loaf pan (greased).
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
Shield with foil after 1 hour.
Test with toothpick until comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes.
Remove from pan; cool completely.
Yields 1 loaf.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 c. flour, unsifted
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. mashed ripe bananas (about 3 small ones)
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 eggs
1 c. Hershey's mini semi-sweet chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Lightly grease the bottom only of a 9 1/4 x 5 1/4 x 2 3/4-inch loaf pan.
Set aside.
In large mixing bowl combine all ingredients except small chocolate chips and walnuts; blend well on medium speed.
Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts. Bake at 350° for 60 to 65 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool 10 minutes; remove from pan.
Cool completely.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 c. mashed ripe bananas
1/2 c. shortening
2 eggs
1 c. mini chocolate chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
1/2 tsp. orange peel (optional)
Directions:
Grease bottoms of 2 (8 x 4 x 2-inch) loaf pans.
Combine all ingredients, except chocolate chips and walnuts.
Blend well on medium speed.
Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts.
Pour into pans.
Bake in center of oven for 60 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. shortening or oil
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
3/4 c. mashed ripe bananas
1 1/4 c. sifted all-purpose flour
3/4 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 bag chocolate chips
Directions:
Cream shortening or oil and sugar until fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each.
Stir in banana.
Sift together dry ingredients; add to banana mixture and chocolate chips, mix well.
Pour into greased 9 x 9 x 2-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes.

question: How do I make chocolate chip banana bread?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Chip-Banana Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, softened
1 c. sugar
2 eggs
2 ripe bananas, mashed
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. semi-sweet chocolate mini chips
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Cream butter; gradually add sugar, beating well at medium speed of an electric mixer.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating after each addition.
Stir in bananas.
Combine flour and next 3 ingredients; gradually add to creamed mixture until blended.
Stir in many marvels and walnuts.
Spoon batter into a greased 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Cool in pan 10 minutes; remove from pan.
Cool completely.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Rosemary And Garlic Roasted Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 small to medium red skinned potatoes
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 large cloves fresh garlic, chopped
3 large sprigs fresh rosemary, leaves removed from stems, or 1 Tbsp. dried rosemary
Directions:
Scrub potatoes; cut in half or quarter.
Place in a covered microwave dish with 2 tablespoons water.
Cook on High for 2 minutes to slightly soften potatoes.
Drain.
Pour olive oil in a nonstick baking pan big enough to hold the potatoes in one layer. Rub the potatoes in the oil to coat on all sides.
Sprinkle with garlic and rosemary.
Salt and pepper to taste.
Bake, uncovered, in a 450° oven for 30 minutes, turning the potatoes twice so that all sides are browned.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. whole tiny new potatoes (20 to 24)
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
2 Tbsp. water
2 cloves garlic, minced, or 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place peeled potatoes in a greased 9 x 9 x 2-inch baking dish. Combine the margarine, water, garlic, salt and pepper.
Drizzle over potatoes.
Toss to coat.
Bake, covered, at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes, stirring once.
Uncover; bake 20 minutes more or until the potatoes are tender and slightly browned.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Roasted Potatoes With Garlic And Rosemary(Makes About 3 Cups)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 to 5 cloves garlic, smashed
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh rosemary
2 lb. Yukon gold and/or red skinned potatoes (unpeeled), cut into large chunks
coarse sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450° with rack in lower third.
Bring 6 quarts salted water to a boil in a large saucepan.
Heat oil, garlic and rosemary on a large baking sheet (with sides) on stove top over medium-low heat.
Do not allow garlic to brown.
To heat oil, place the pan directly on the stove top.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Potatoes(Preparation: 10 Minutes. Baking: 25 Minutes.  Servings: 4.)
Ingredients:
1 to 2 large cloves garlic, peeled and chopped
4 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 lb. small potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/8 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
Place garlic, butter and water in small saucepan; simmer until water evaporates and garlic is tender. Strain butter; mash soft garlic through very fine strainer.
Toss potatoes in garlic butter; place in single layer in large baking dish.
Bake for 25 minutes, turning potatoes occasionally, until they are tender and browned.
Remove potatoes from baking dish with slotted spoon.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted potatoes?
answer:
Title: Garlic Butter Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 large unpeeled potatoes
1 stick butter
pepper and salt to taste
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 milk
Directions:
Wash potatoes and cube into pieces about 1 inch.
Do not peel. Put into a covered casserole dish.
Drop in 1 stick butter. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic.
Pour in milk.
Cover. Bake at 350° for about 1 hour.
Do not lift lid.
The steam helps cook.
Take out of oven and let sit for 30 minutes.
Ready to serve.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken Legs Or Wings
Ingredients:
30 chicken wings, cut into 3 pieces (I use leg parts)
3/4 c. butter
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. soy sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
3/4 c. water
1 tsp. crushed hot red pepper
1/4 tsp. Chinese five-season powder
Directions:
Mix all ingredients, except chicken, in saucepan and cook until slightly thickened on top of stove.
Place chicken in roasting pan and baste with sauce.
Roast, uncovered, at 350° for 2 hours, basting and turning occasionally.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Pan-Roasted Chicken And Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1 1/2-inch chunks
1 lb. onion, cut into 12 wedges
4 garlic cloves, peeled
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
1/2 tsp. dried rosemary
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken thighs or breasts, cut each into quarters
1 (10 oz.) bag spinach, discard stems
rosemary sprigs for garnish
Directions:
Preheat oven to 475°.
In large roasting pan, (17 x 11 1/2-inch), combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt and pepper and rosemary; toss to coat.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 broiler-fryer chicken (about 3 lb.)
1 clove garlic, minced
4 sprigs fresh rosemary
4 small potatoes, quartered
3 medium carrots, halved and quartered
1 small onion, quartered
1 small fennel bulb, chopped
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Rinse chicken,
pat dry with paper towels.
Remove any excess fat from inside chicken.
Starting at the neck opening, use your fingers to loosen skin from the meat to create a pocket on each side of breast.
Leave skin attached to the breast bones.
Rub the garlic onto the meat underneath the skin.
Place the rosemary under the skin.
Place the chicken, breast side up, on a rack in a shallow roasting pan.
Loosely stuff with some of the potatoes, carrots, onions and fennel.
Place remaining vegetables in pan around chicken.
Skewer the neck skin to the back of chicken and tie legs to tail.
Insert meat thermometer in thickest part of thigh.
Pour water into bottom of pan.
Roast, uncovered, at 400° for 30 minutes.
Turn vegetables over and roast, uncovered, 30 minutes or until thermometer registers 180° to 185° and chicken is no longer pink.
Transfer vegetables to serving dish and keep warm.
Loosely cover the chicken with foil.
Let stand 10 minutes before carving.
Serve the chicken with vegetables.
Remove and discard skin before eating.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken(Serves Four)
Ingredients:
1 large roasting chicken (about 6 lb.)
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. sage leaves
3/4 tsp. thyme leaves
3/4 tsp. basil leaves
6 Tbsp. butter, softened
salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Wash chicken; pat dry.
Cream together 3 tablespoons butter, garlic, Parmesan, sage, thyme and basil.
This mixture goes under the skin, so turn chicken breast side up and make skin as loose as possible.
Spread herb mixture underneath the skin.
Smear butter on outside of skin.
Put chicken breast up in roasting pan and place in oven.
Melt remaining butter.
Cook chicken 15 minutes, basting once.
Reduce to 350°.
Roast 20 minutes per pound, basting with butter every 10 minutes.
Serve.

question: I need a recipe for roasted chicken thighs.
answer:
Title: Herb Roast Chicken
Ingredients:
4 boneless skinless chicken breasts
1 tsp. dried rosemary
1 tsp. ground sage
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/2 tsp. cumin
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
1/4 c. chicken stock
1/2 c. low-fat sour cream
1 Tbsp. jalapeno jelly
juice of 3 limes
cayenne pepper
Directions:
Mix together the rosemary, sage, thyme, cumin and salt in a bowl. Sprinkle over the chicken breasts and rub in, coating both sides. Broil or grill chicken until done.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Steak "A" Round
Ingredients:
1 large round steak, cubed
1/4 c. steak sauce
1/4 c. soy sauce
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. brown sugar
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. celery, diced
1 c. cabbage, shredded
1/2 c. onion, diced
1 medium tomato, cubed
1 can sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. beef bouillon
5 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Marinate steak in refrigerator with first 8 ingredients for up to 3 hours.
Drain. In large skillet melt 2 tablespoons butter, add cubed steak and fry until brown, stirring often.
Remove from pan.
In same pan, add 3 tablespoons butter, celery, cabbage and onion.
Stir and cook until crisp-tender.
Add tomatoes and mushrooms.
Heat through and then add beef and bouillon.
Simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve with rice or mashed potatoes.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Elegant Steak
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef, cut in strips
1 1/2 Tbsp. oil
2 large sliced onions
1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms
salt and pepper
1/4 tsp. ground ginger
4 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 c. sherry
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup
1 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Brown meat in 1 1/2 tablespoons oil.
Add onions and mushrooms. Cook briefly.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Stir in ginger, soy sauce, soup, sherry and garlic salt.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer until meat is tender.
Serve over rice.
Also good with pork.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Surprise
Ingredients:
1 pkg. chuck fillets
1 1/2 c. ketchup
1 1/2 c. water
1 small onion, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1/8 tsp. seasoned salt
1/8 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 tsp. A.1. steak sauce
4 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Brown steaks in oil on both sides.
Drain thoroughly and place in baking dish.
Mix together all of the other ingredients in a large bowl and pour over steaks.
Bake, uncovered, in oven at 350° for 1 hour.
Serve over hot, cooked rice.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Steak
Ingredients:
2 lb. round steak
1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 onion (optional)
3 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients.
Coat meat.
Brown meat on both sides.
Add liquid.
Simmer on low heat for 2 hours.

question: What can I do with leftover steak?
answer:
Title: Steak And Potato Supper
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. round steak, cut into serving pieces
1/3 c. flour
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3 medium potatoes, quartered
1 small onion, chopped
2 Tbs. parsley, chopped
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. water
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 c. cream of tomato soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
Directions:
Dredge steak with flour.
Heat oil in frying pan.
Brown steak on both sides in hot oil.
Add remaining.
Cover; simmer for 1 1/2 hours or until done.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. shortening
1 Tbsp. salt
4 eggs, beaten
3 1/2 Tbsp. yeast, dissolved in 1 3/4 c. warm water
butter, softened
cinnamon sugar
1/3 c. sugar
1 3/4 c. boiling water
9 c. flour
Directions:
Combine shortening, sugar, salt and boiling water.
Beat eggs and add to first mixture.
Dissolve yeast in warm water and add. Add flour and mix well.
Place in refrigerator to chill.
Remove dough from refrigerator and roll to 1/4-inch thickness.
Spread with butter and then with cinnamon sugar.
Roll into a long roll; cut into rolls 1-inch thick.
Put in buttered pan and mash down lightly.
Put back in refrigerator until needed.
Turn oven and set temperature to 400°.
Put rolls into cold oven and bake until done.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1/4 c. warm water
1/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. shortening
1 tsp. salt
1 c. hot milk
1 beaten egg
4 c. flour
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water.
Add 1/2 tablespoon sugar to hot milk.
Add sugar, salt and shortening; cool.
Add egg, yeast and flour.
Let rise until double in bulk.
Roll out 1/4-inch thick. Spread warm butter; sprinkle sugar and cinnamon.
Roll up and cut in 1-inch pieces.
Put in deep loaf pan and let rise.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 pkg. dry yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 c. warm water
2 large or 3 medium eggs
3/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. warm water
2 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. whipping cream
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
1/2 c. raisins
5 1/2 to 6 c. bread flour
1/2 c. butter
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Dissolve sugar and yeast in warm water.
Beat eggs in large mixing bowl.
(Have water, whipping cream and eggs at lukewarm temperature.)
To eggs, add 3/4 cup sugar, salt, water, whipping cream, vanilla, lemon extract, raisins and flour; beat by hand until well blended.
This should be a soft dough; too sticky to knead but stiff to stir.
Turn into greased bowl and cover.
Let rise in warm place until doubled (1 to 1 1/2 hours).
Stir down; let rise again.
Divide dough into fourths.
Combine 1 cup sugar and cinnamon; melt butter.
Roll dough on floured board (use enough flour to handle dough); brush with melted butter.
Sprinkle cinnamon-sugar mixture (1/4) over dough.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1 pkg. dry yeast
1/4 c. sugar
3 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 c. oil
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. melted butter
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Scald milk.
Cool to lukewarm in bowl.
Add yeast, sugar and 1 1/2 cups flour; mix well.
Let stand until bubbly.
Stir in salt, eggs, oil and remaining 1 1/2 cups flour to form soft dough. Knead on floured surface until smooth and elastic.
Place in greased bowl, turning to coat surface.
Let rise, covered, in warm place until doubled in bulk.
Roll 1/4-inch thick on floured surface.
Spread with 3 tablespoons softened butter.
Sprinkle with mixture of cinnamon and 1/2 cup brown sugar.
Roll as for jelly roll.
Slice 1 1/2 inches thick; place in greased baking dish.
Combine 1 tablespoon butter, 1/4 cup brown sugar and water in bowl.
Drizzle over rolls.
Bake at 350° for 35 minutes or until golden brown.
Yield:
12 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade cinnamon rolls?
answer:
Title: Cinnamon Rolls
Ingredients:
1/2 c. warm water
4 c. sifted flour
1 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar
1/4 c. butter
2 pkg. dry yeast
1/4 c. melted butter
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
3/4 c. brown sugar
5 Tbsp. raisins
1/2 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In a cup combine yeast with warm water.
In a pot, scald milk. Blend in sugar until sugar dissolves.
Remove from heat.
Let stand until warm.
Blend egg and yeast.
In a large bowl, combine yeast mixture with flour and cinnamon.
Blend butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lbs. Fish; firm and fresh, such as Swordfish,Shark, or Sea Bass, cut thick
1/3 c. Lime Juice
1/4 c. Tequila or White Wine
Directions:
Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Authentic Tacos
Ingredients:
3 1/2 lb. lean, boneless beef, pork or chicken
flour
water
1/2 bell pepper strips
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 small can tomato sauce
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. cumin
1 jalapeno pepper, chopped
Directions:
Roll meat in flour and place in stock pot filled with 1/4-inch water.
Brown meat and cook on low heat for about 30 minutes.
Then roll up and heat to high and add remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 hour longer until meat is shredding.
Serve in flour tortillas and garnish with lettuce and picante sauce.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Creamy Tacos
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
1/4 tsp. salt
2 cans refried beans
1 small can Pet milk
1 onion
chili powder to taste
2 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
4 c. cheese
Directions:
Fry beef, onion, salt and chili powder together.
Drain. Blend refried beans and Ro-Tel tomatoes.
Add to beef.
Then add Pet milk and cheese.
Cook until cheese is melted.
Serve over corn chips.
Then top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes, onions, sour cream and taco sauce.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 pkg. taco shells
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 to 2 Tbsp. chili powder
onions, tomatoes, lettuce and cheese
1 lb. ground meat (beef, turkey, vegieburger)
3/4 tsp. cumin
cayenne pepper (optional)
Directions:
Brown meat in pan.
Add spices and about 1/2 cup water. Simmer until water is gone.
In taco shell, layer meat, onions, tomato, cheese and lettuce.
Heat and eat.

question: What’s a good recipe for fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Meat-Less Tacos
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
chili powder to taste
cumin (just a pinch)
1/4 c. tomato sauce
3/4 c. water
1 can pinto beans, drained
1 c. quick cooking brown rice
taco shells or tortillas
low-fat grated Cheddar cheese
shredded lettuce
hot sauce
Directions:
Coat a large skillet with cooking spray and heat.
Saute the onion and garlic.
Add chili powder to taste, a pinch of cumin, tomato sauce and water. Bring to a boil, then add beans and rice. Cover and simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand another 5 minutes.
Spoon into taco shells or tortillas and top with cheese, hot sauce and lettuce.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Fried Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
4 or 5 boneless chicken breasts
3/4 c. flour
Adolph's tenderizer
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/3 tsp. red pepper
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Wash chicken.
Cut in strips across the grain.
Sprinkle with Adolph's tenderizer.
Let set a few minutes.
Add buttermilk.
Mix seasoning with flour.
Stir chicken in buttermilk.
Roll chicken in flour.
Fry in hot grease at medium heat until tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
4 boneless chicken breasts (split and skinned)
3 cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
cornstarch and water to thicken
3 stalks celery, diced
1 small can mushrooms
2 1/2 to 3 c. chicken stock (canned or homemade)
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut chicken into strips about 1 1/2 to 2-inches wide, coat them with the flour seasoned with salt and pepper.
Brown the chicken in a little oil on both sides, remove from pan.
Put chicken back in pan.
Let this cook about 35 minutes.
Mix enough cornstarch and water to thicken the broth that chicken was cooked in.
Take chicken out to thicken, after it is thickened as in gravy, put chicken back into pan to heat.
Serve over rice. Serves 4.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Tasty Chicken Tenders
Ingredients:
3 c. rice crispy cereal, slightly crushed
1 Tbsp. garlic salt
1 tsp. dill weed
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 lb. chicken tender or breasts (skinless and boneless)
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°. Mix cereal, salt and dill. Dip chicken in oil.
Roll in cereal mixture to coat thoroughly.
Place on foil-lined pan. Bake uncovered for 30 to 40 minutes or until chicken is fully cooked.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Chicken Pie
Ingredients:
1 fryer, boiled until tender
biscuit dough
Directions:
Boil fryer until tender.
Remove meat from bones.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked chicken tenders?
answer:
Title: Chicken Ala Kel
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 tsp. sweet basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. rubbed sage
1/2 tsp. white pepper
2 c. dry breadcrumbs
1 lb. chicken tenders
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
In a small bowl, beat eggs and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine all dry ingredients and mix well. Dip chicken tenders in eggs, then dredge in breadcrumb mixture, coating well.
Place chicken pieces on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Good Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken, cut up
1 1/2 c. flour
salt and pepper to taste
paprika to taste
1/2 c. margarine
1/2 c. Crisco
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Combine salt, pepper, paprika and flour.
Add chicken and coat 2 to 3 pieces at a time.
Heat margarine and Crisco in an electric skillet or cast-iron skillet
until a drop of water sizzles in it. Brown meaty chicken first, then add remaining pieces.
When lightly browned, reduce heat and add 2 tablespoons of water. Cover and cook 30 to 40 minutes.
Uncover the last 10 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Southern Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 whole fryer
2 tsp. spicy seasoned salt
1 1/2 tsp. hot sauce
1 1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 tsp. red pepper
2 c. Crisco oil
1 1/2 c. flour
Directions:
Cut fryer into parts; wash and drain.
Add seasoned salt, hot sauce, black pepper and red pepper.
Batter chicken in flour mixture.
Drop pieces into hot Crisco oil.
Cook until golden brown.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 fryer, cut up
salt and pepper to taste
1 Tbsp. paprika
1 egg, beaten
2 c. milk
2 c. flour
1 to 2 qt. cooking oil
Directions:
Season chicken with salt, pepper and paprika.
Combine egg and milk.
Dip chicken in egg mixture.
Drop into paper bag with flour.
Shake to coat.
Place in hot oil in heavy deep skillet. Cover.
Fry at 350° to 400° until brown.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Southern Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) chicken, cut up
2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 egg plus 2 Tbsp. milk or water, beaten
1 1/2 tsp. red pepper
1 1/2 tsp. paprika
1 1/2 c. flour
2 c. Crisco oil
Directions:
Wash chicken; drain on paper towel.
Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Dip in egg mixture.
Add spices to flour; coat chicken.
Fry slowly in hot oil until browned on both sides (about 35 minutes), turning as needed.

question: How do I make crispy fried chicken without buttermilk?
answer:
Title: Fried Chicken
Ingredients:
2 lbs. skinless chicken
Vegetable oil
1 egg
1 cup milk
1 cup wheat flour
1 tsp. each salt and pepper
1 tsp. each cayenne pepper and paprika
1 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet or deep fryer.
Add pepper, salt, cayenne, paprika and garlic powder to chicken.
Cover chicken with flour.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter, melted
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs, beaten (optional)
3 c. quick oats
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
Directions:
Cream together the first 3 ingredients.
Add the rest to creamed mixture.
Bake in a 10 x 10-inch pan at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes, stirring occasionally (stirring is not a must).
Add raisins if desired.
Can be mixed the night before.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Oatmeal Bake
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter or margarine
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. oatmeal
1 whole egg
2 egg whites (save yolks)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. boiling water
Directions:
Cream well butter, white sugar and brown sugar.
Pour 1 1/4 cups boiling water over 1 cup oatmeal.
Add 1 whole egg, 2 egg whites (save yolks) and 1 teaspoon vanilla.
Sift together 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 teaspoon soda, 1 teaspoon cinnamon and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
Combine creamed mixture and oatmeal; gradually add dry mixture.
Bake 30 minutes at 350°.
When taken from oven, cover with following topping.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil*
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
3 c. old fashioned oats
Directions:
*Can use 1/2 cup applesauce and cut the oil to 1 tablespoon.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
3 small eggs, beaten
1 1/4 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. plus 1/3 c. oil
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
5 c. oatmeal (quick cooking)
3 3/4 tsp. baking powder
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 1/2 c. plus 6 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
Beat eggs and add brown sugar and milk.
Add salt, vanilla, baking powder and cinnamon.
Stir altogether.
Stir in the oatmeal.
Put in a large lightly buttered baking pan.
Bake in a 350° oven for 1/2 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked oatmeal?
answer:
Title: Baked Oatmeal
Ingredients:
3 c. quick cooking oats
1 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. salt
1 c. milk
1/2 c. margarine, melted
2 eggs, beaten
additional milk
Directions:
In mixing bowl, combine first eight ingredients.
Spoon into a greased 9-inch square baking pan.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.
Serve warm with milk.
Makes about 9 servings.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 egg
3/4 c. salad oil
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Beat egg until very fluffy.
Add salad oil and keep beating until incorporated and thickened.
Then add rest of ingredients. Refrigerate.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Cooked Creamy Caesar-Style Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. cooking oil
2 egg yolks
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 clove garlic, crushed
2 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
Directions:
Combine oil and garlic in jar with tight-fitting lid. Refrigerate several hours or overnight.
Remove garlic.
Set aside.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 egg (yolk only)
1 good size squeeze anchovy paste
squeezed lemon
Directions:
Mix together in wooden bowl. Toss with lettuce (romaine), cut up. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. garlic
1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
4 eggs
2 oz. anchovy paste
4 oz. Dijon mustard
2 oz. lemon and pepper seasoning
5 oz. lemon juice
24 oz. olive oil
8 oz. salad oil
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Chill for 30 minutes and serve.

question: How do I make a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 cup salad oil
1 egg
1/2 cup Parmesan cheese
1/4 cup lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix in blender, pour over greens, toss.
Add anchovies and croutons.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Chicken
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. red wine
6 drumsticks
1 oz. ginger
1 bud garlic
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 to 3 c. water
2 potatoes, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Skin the chicken.
Remove the meat from the bones.
Cut meat into chunks (4 to 5 chunks from each leg).
Remove skin from each ginger.
Cut ginger into 4 to 5 slices.
Press 4 to 5 cloves of garlic flat.
Mix garlic, oil and ginger.
Deep fry for about 5 seconds on medium heat.
Add chicken and bones to vegetable mix. Continue frying on medium heat for 10 seconds.
Turn to high heat. Add wine.
Saute for 5 seconds.
Add water.
Heat until water boils.
Turn heat to low for 8 minutes.
Add salt, soy sauce and potatoes.
Cook for 20 minutes.
Remove bones.
Serve.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Company Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 pt. sour cream
10 oz. sharp cheese, shredded
2 lb. frozen hash browns, thawed
1/2 c. melted butter or margarine
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 can cream of chicken soup
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together well and put into a butter 4-quart dish.
In addition to the 1/2 cup of butter, melt another 1/4 cup with 1 cup of crushed corn flakes and sprinkle on top. Cover and bake at 375° for 1 1/2 hours.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken Breast - Sauteed With New Potatoes
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine
4 to 6 large chicken breasts
1 slice onion
1 minced clove garlic
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 c. hot water
1 (No. 303) can small potatoes, drained
1/4 c. red wine
snipped parsley
Directions:
Saute chicken in large skillet in hot butter until both sides are brown.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook about 5 minutes.
In a small bowl combine flour, salt and pepper and slowly stir in bouillon cube which has been dissolved in the hot water.
Pour over browned chicken.
Cook slowly covered for about 25 minutes or until chicken is tender.
Add potatoes and wine.
Heat potatoes thoroughly.
Garnish with parsley.
Yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
7 large white potatoes
water
2 tsp. salt
2 cans cream of chicken soup
2/3 c. milk
1 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese
1 medium onion, finely chopped or grated
paprika
Directions:
Peel and thinly slice potatoes.
Parboil for 5 minutes in salted water to cover.
Heat cream of chicken soup with milk.
Add cheese and onion.

question: What can I cook with chicken breast and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. fresh new potatoes
3 cloves garlic
1/2 Tbsp. rosemary, crumbled well
4 boneless chicken breasts
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 475°.
Spray a 10 x 15-inch pan well.
Place potatoes in single layer and cook for 15 minutes.
Mix rosemary and garlic in small bowl.
Put chicken breasts on top of potatoes and add rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper.
Bake chicken and potatoes until tender.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One-Pot Meal
Ingredients:
1 to 2 lb. stew beef (boneless and extra lean)
carrots, as many as you think you need
potatoes, as many as you think you need
1 large onion
1 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix together in crock-pot and cook on low while you are at work.
Add any vegetables desired, even a can of mixed vegetables (cabbage, celery, broccoli, mushrooms, etc.).
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: Beef And Potato Load
Ingredients:
4 c. thinly sliced peeled raw potatoes
1 Tbsp. cut-up onion
salt and pepper
1 tsp. parsley flakes (can omit)
1 lb. ground lean beef
3/4 c. Pet evaporated milk
1/2 c. fine soda cracker crumbs or uncooked rolled oats
1/4 c. catsup or chili sauce
1/4 c. cut-up onion
Directions:
Arrange evenly in greased, 2-quart baking dish, potatoes and 1 tablespoon cut-up onion, sprinkled with 1 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon pepper and parsley flakes.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: One-Pot Meal
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground meat
2 stalks celery, sliced thin
1 medium onion, sliced thin
1/2 head cabbage, sliced thin
3 medium potatoes, sliced thin
1/2 head cabbage, sliced thin
3 medium potatoes, sliced thin
1 can tomatoes and juice
1 can water (maybe more)
salt
pepper
Directions:
Brown meat in a skillet.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add layers of vegetables in order.
Top with cut up tomatoes.
Add juice and water.
When potatoes and cabbage are tender, it is ready to serve.
Serve with cornbread.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: Stew Beef
Ingredients:
1 pkg. stew beef
2 c. water
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 medium onion
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. pepper
dash of allspice or cloves
carrots
potatoes
Directions:
Brown meat; add all ingredients, except carrots and potatoes. Let simmer for 45 minutes.
Add carrots and potatoes; cook until done.

question: Suggest a recipe for a one-pot meal with beef.
answer:
Title: French Onion Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef stewing meat, cut in 1 1/2-inch cubes
2 medium onions, cut in quarters
3 stalks celery, cut in large pieces
4 carrots, quartered
2 c. tomato juice
1/3 c. quick cooking tapioca
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. basil
2 medium potatoes (in slices, 1/4-inch thick)
Directions:
Note:
The vegetables are cut in large pieces so they won't overcook while the beef cubes are stewing to tenderness.
Quick cooking tapioca, added at the beginning, disappears, yet thickens the liquid to a transparent gravy while the stew is cooking.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
4 cooked chicken breasts, cut in pieces
1 c. evaporated skimmed milk
1/4 c. liquid Butter Buds
1/4 c. flour
4 tsp. fat-free chicken broth
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese
3 cloves garlic
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Stir and cook slowly until thick.
Serve over fettuccine noodles or small spaghetti.
Add chicken to sauce after it has cooked.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts, boned
2 slices bacon
1 tsp. chopped garlic
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 pt. light cream
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/3 c. frozen peas
1 chopped scallion
fresh ground pepper to taste
1/4 c. white wine
Directions:
Cut bacon into small pieces and chicken into about 1-inch cubes.
Add garlic and oil into hot skillet; cook until chicken is done.
Remove from skillet.
Reheat pan and add wine so that it picks up flavors from skillet.
Slowly add cream, scallions, cayenne pepper, oregano and peas.
Mix cornstarch with about 4 ounces water.
Add a little at a time until you get a creamy sauce.
Add chicken and bacon mixture; heat.
Add black pepper to taste.
Serve over pasta.
Shrimp may be substituted for chicken.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Chicken Alfredo
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. lemon juice
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. oregano
4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
2 chicken broiler fryers, halved
1 c. flour
4 tsp. paprika
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Combine oil, lemon juice, Parmesan cheese, oregano, 2 teaspoons salt and 1 teaspoon pepper.
Beat well.
Pour over chicken halves. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or longer.
Combine remaining ingredients, except butter.
Remove chicken from marinade and roll in the flour mixture.
Saute chicken in butter until browned on both sides.
Place each chicken half, skin side up, in center of a double thick square of heavy-duty aluminum foil.
Bring up sides and ends and seal with tight folds.
Place packets on baking sheet and bake at 425° for 1 hour.
Makes 4 servings.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Alfredo Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. nonfat cottage cheese
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. butter flavored granules
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/2 tsp. chicken flavored bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
dash of ground red pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in container of an electric blender. Process until smooth, stopping once to scrape down sides.
Pour into a small saucepan. Cook sauce over low heat, stirring constantly, until thoroughly heated.
Yields 2 3/4 cups.

question: How do I make a classic chicken alfredo?
answer:
Title: Sauce Alfredo(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. (1 stick) butter, softened
1 c. heavy cream (whipping)
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
2 egg yolks
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
In a heavy saucepan, heat the butter and cream almost to a simmer.
Do not let it bubble.
Remove from heat and pour over cooked and drained pasta of your choice.
Toss with cheese, egg yolks, salt and pepper and nutmeg.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Tangy Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. paprika
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 c. boiling water
3/4 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/4 c. sliced green onions and tops
1 1/2 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley
lemon slices (for garnish)
Directions:
Combine flour, salt and paprika in paper or plastic bag. Brush chicken with lemon juice.
Place a few pieces at a time in bag.
Shake to coat.
Heat oil to 365° in electric skillet or large heavy skillet.
Add chicken.
Brown.
Combine water and bouillon granules.
Stir until dissolved.
Add brown sugar and remaining lemon juice.
Pour into skillet.
Cover.
Reduce heat to 250°; simmer 5 minutes.
Turn chicken.
Sprinkle with onion and lemon peel.
Recover.
Simmer 10 minutes.
Serve garnish with lemon slices and additional parsley.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/3 c. chicken broth
1/3 c. fresh lemon juice
1/2 tsp. soy sauce
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
2 tsp. lemon zest
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. white pepper
3/4 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts (about 2 large), cut the chicken in strips
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/3 c. cooking oil
1 1/2 tsp. cornstarch, dissolved in 1 Tbsp. water
1 tsp. toasted sesame seeds
Directions:
Toast sesame seeds by swirling in a nonstick skillet until they smell nutty.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
4 whole chicken breasts, halved, boned and skinned
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 c. flour
1/4 c. clarified butter
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
2 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. Madeira wine
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 large lemon, cut in 6 slices
3 Tbsp. capers
1 tsp. chopped pimento
1/4 c. fresh chives
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fettuccine, cooked according to package
Directions:
Pound chicken breasts to 1/4-inch thickness between 2 pieces of waxed paper.
Mix salt, pepper, paprika and flour in a plastic bag; add chicken, one piece at a time, and shake to coat.
Place butter and oil in a saute pan or large skillet; heat over medium heat until bubbly.
Add garlic and chicken; saute, turning, about 6 minutes or until chicken is brown and fork can be easily inserted.
Drain on paper towels and keep warm.
Drain all but 2 tablespoons of cooking fat from pan; add wine and deglaze pan, scraping up brown bits.
Add lemon juice and heat 1 minute; return chicken to pan; add lemon slices and heat 2 minutes.
Add capers and pimento.
Sprinkle chives over all.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon Herb Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 tsp. salt
3 lb. chicken parts
1/4 c. corn oil
2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/4 tsp. pepper (fresh ground)
Directions:
In a large, shallow baking dish, mix lemon juice, oil, herbs and spices.
Add chicken; turn to coat.
Cover and refrigerate, turning occasionally, for several hours or overnight.
Remove chicken from marinade.
Grill or broil 6 inches from heat, turning and brushing frequently with marinade, for 35 to 45 minutes, or until tender.

question: How do I make a tangy lemon chicken?
answer:
Title: Low-Fat Lemon Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. frozen unsweetened orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. dried parsley flakes
1 pkg. instant chicken flavor broth mix
1 lb. boned, skinned chicken parts, cut into large chunks
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. cornstarch
1 c. water
toasted sesame seed
bow tie noodles
Directions:
In a large skillet, combine lemon juice, mustard, garlic powder, pepper, orange juice, broth mix, parsley and vegetable oil.
Heat over medium heat until hot.
Add chicken.
Turning frequently, cook chicken until done (about 15 minutes).
Reduce heat to low; cover and cook 10 more minutes.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 tsp. shortening, vegetable spray or oil
3 Tbsp. oil
1 (at least) garlic clove
2 c. mushrooms, cleaned and sliced
2 c. green pepper, seeded, cored and sliced
12 to 16 oz. spinach, well washed, rinsed, drained and chopped (I've used chopped, frozen and it works)
2 eggs, beaten, or equivalent of Egg Beater type
1 lb. tofu, drained and crumbled
3/4 tsp. oregano
3/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. fresh parsley (at least), washed, dried, stems removed and rinsed
5 c. Marinara sauce or tomato sauce (canned or homemade)
12 oz. lasagna noodles, cooked
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese (light skim), shredded
3 oz. fresh Parmesan cheese, shredded or grated
Directions:
Spray 9 x 13-inch baking dish with shortening or vegetable spray/oil.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
3 lb. ground beef
1 Tbsp. salad oil
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 small diced onion
1/4 c. diced green pepper
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
5 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1 can water
1/2 c. ketchup
4 c. Mozzarella cheese
1 pkg. lasagna noodles
Directions:
Brown meat; add onions, green peppers and oil.
Add all the spices, seasonings, tomato sauce, ketchup and water.
Simmer until thick, about 1 hour.
Cook 1 package lasagna according to the package.
I add 1 tablespoon oil to water so noodles don't stick. Layer noodles, then sauce (about 1 1/2 cups per layer), then Mozzarella cheese in a 9 x 13-inch pan, 3 layers high.
Bake at 350° for 45 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. whole basil
1 tsp. oregano
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 lb. can tomatoes
1 (12 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
8 oz. egg noodles
3 c. creamed cottage cheese
1/2 c. Parmesan and Romano cheese
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
2 beaten eggs
1/2 Tbsp. + 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 Tbsp. pepper
1 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced thin
Directions:
Brown beef; spoon off fat.
Add next 7 ingredients.
Simmer approximately 30 minutes.
Cook noodles; rinse and combine remaining ingredients in bowl except Mozzarella cheese.
Layer noodles, cottage cheese, Mozzarella, then meat sauce.
Repeat. Bake at 375° for 30 minutes.
Let stand 10 minutes before cutting into squares.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. diced onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 medium green pepper, diced
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
3/4 lb. lean ground beef
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 (15 or 16 oz.) cans unsalted tomato sauce
1 (28 oz.) can unsalted tomatoes
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
1 Tbsp. dried basil leaves
1 Tbsp. dried oregano leaves
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
2 bay leaves
1 lb. lasagna noodles
8 oz. unsalted Mozzarella cheese, shredded
8 oz. unsalted low-fat cottage cheese
2 oz. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat oil in large saucepan.
Saute the onions, garlic and green pepper until softened.
Add the mushrooms and saute until tender. Add the ground beef and pepper.
Cook until meat loses its red color.
Drain well.
Add tomato sauce, tomato paste, basil, oregano, parsley and bay leaves.
Simmer 1 1/2 hours or until sauce has thickened.
While cooking, if sauce becomes too thick, add small amount of water as needed.

question: How do I make homemade lasagna?
answer:
Title: Lasagna
Ingredients:
2 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, diced
1 clove garlic, diced
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. marjoram
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 bay leaf
2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste
2 c. water
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 (16 oz.) container Ricotta cheese
2 eggs, beaten
Parmesan cheese
Romano cheese
Mozzarella cheese, grated
Directions:
Brown meat with onion and garlic; drain fat.
Add salt, oregano, marjoram, pepper, bay leaf, tomato paste, water and Worcestershire sauce.
Simmer at least 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
3 c. peeled, chopped apples
1 c. chopped nuts
raisins
3 c. flour (I use 1/2 whole wheat)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Blend oil, sugar and eggs well.
Stir in apples, nuts and raisins.
Add flour, vanilla, baking soda and cinnamon.
Bake about 1 hour in greased 13 x 9-inch pan.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sifted flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 c. butter
2 eggs
3/4 c. milk
5 apples
1/4 c. currants
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Work butter in mix.
Beat egg; add milk and stir dry ingredients.
Spread dough in a well-buttered biscuit pan.
Spread apples on dough, pressing sharp edges of fruit into mixture.
Sprinkle with currants, sugar and cinnamon which has been mixed.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
3 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
3 c. apples, cubed
3/4 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Mix oil, sugar and eggs.
Add salt, baking soda, cinnamon, flour and vanilla.
Add apples and walnuts.
Bake in ungreased 13 x 9-inch pan at 350° for 1 hour.
Do not cover tightly to store.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Fresh Apple Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. Wesson oil
2 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
1 c. pecans
4 c. diced apples
1 (6 oz.) pkg. butterscotch chips
Directions:
Grease and flour 13 x 9-inch pan.
Preheat oven at 350°.
Sift together dry ingredients.
Mix all ingredients except apples and chips.
Fold in apples; pour into pan.
Sprinkle chips on top. Bake 1 hour.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked apple chips?
answer:
Title: Apple Chip Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. salad oil
2 c. sugar
3 eggs
3 c. apples, diced
3 c. flour
1 tsp. cinnamon and baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
Mix salad oil, sugar and eggs together and beat.
Add remaining ingredients.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour in a greased and floured oblong cake pan.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Savory Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
40 mushrooms (medium size), washed, caps whole, stems removed
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. rosemary
freshly ground pepper
2 c. chicken bouillon
1/2 c. wild rice
1 shallot
2 cloves garlic
1/4 c. chopped almonds
fresh lemon
Directions:
Bring bouillon to a boil.
Add washed wild rice; cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Saute mushroom caps in butter.
Mix rice, almonds, herbs and spices and fill mushroom caps.
Drizzle with fresh lemon juice.
Bake on cookie sheet at 300° for 15 minutes.
May easily be prepared a day prior to re-heating.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium can mushrooms
4 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. rich milk
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter.
Add flour slowly and brown slightly.
Add milk and cook until it thickens.
Pour over steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Hot And Spicy Sauteed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 c. margarine or butter
1/2 c. chopped green and red bell peppers
1/4 c. sliced green onions
2 garlic cloves, minced
18 oz. presliced fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. sherry
1/2 tsp. cajun seasoning
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
In a
large
skillet melt 1/2 cup butter to saute mushrooms. Once
tender,
place to the side.
Use same skillet to melt second
1/2
cup
butter.
Add peppers, green onions and garlic. Cook
over	medium	heat until crisp-tender.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Simmer
2 to 3 minutes or until thoroughly
heated. Stir
once	halfway through cooking.
You can use canned mushrooms.

question: How do I make a savory mushroom sauce?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Wine Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
1/4 c. butter, melted
1 1/2 c. chicken broth, preferably stock
3 Tbsp. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. sliced green onion
1/4 tsp. salt
2 heaping tsp. cornstarch, dissolved in small amount of water
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter; set aside.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
12 chicken wings
1 egg
2 tsp. vegetable oil
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. 5 spice powder
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. Gold Medal all-purpose flour
1/4 c. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. baking soda
vegetable oil
1/2 c. Chinese hot mustard sauce
Directions:
Cut each chicken wing at joints to make 3 pieces.
Discard tips.
Mix egg, 2 teaspoons vegetable oil, the soy sauce, salt, sugar and 5 spice powder in medium glass or plastic bowl.
Stir in chicken.
Cover and refrigerate 1 hour.
Add water to chicken. Stir flour, cornstarch and baking soda into chicken.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken wings
1/2 c. butter, melted
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1 c. dry bread crumbs
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut chicken wings into pieces, discarding tips.
In a small bowl, combine melted butter and garlic powder.
In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings (32 to 36 pieces)
1/2 c. margarine
1 c. unsifted flour
1 tsp. onion salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Line large shallow baking pan to aluminum foil.
Cut wings at each joint.
Discard tips.
Melt margarine in lined pan.
Combine flour, onion, salt and pepper in bowl.
Add chicken pieces, a few at a time, and shake to coat. Place in pan.
Bake 25 minutes at 400°.
Turn wings over and bake an additional 20 to 25 minutes or until crisp.
Drain on paper towels.
Transfer to serving platter.
Serve to barbecue sauce, Blue cheese dressing, buttermilk Ranch dressing or hot sauce.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings Oriental
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken wings
2 Tbsp. fat
3 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. shoyu (soy sauce)
1/4 c. sherry
dash of Accent (m.s.g.)
1 small clove garlic, mashed
Directions:
Fry wings in fat.
Add remaining ingredients.
Cover and simmer 30 minutes.
Remove lid and increase heat until liquid is almost gone.

question: How do I make crispy air fryer chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
2 lb. chicken wings, cut into pieces
1 c. cider vinegar
1 c. soy sauce
1/2 c. pancake syrup
Directions:
Pour liquid ingredients over chicken wing sections.
Marinate overnight.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 stick butter
1/4 c. flour
salt and pepper to taste
1 c. chicken broth
2 1/2 c. milk
2 c. broccoli, cooked slightly
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender.
Stir in flour, salt and pepper.
Cook and stir until smooth.
Add broth and milk all at once.
Cook until thick.
Add broccoli; simmer and stir.
Remove from heat and stir in cheese until melted.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. broccoli, diced
3 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
5 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
1 c. whipping cream
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
Saute broccoli in butter over medium heat until tender. Sprinkle with flour and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes.
Gradually stir in stock and milk.
Heat just to simmering.
Stir in cream and cheese.
Allow cheese to melt in soup.
Season to taste and serve with croutons.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Broccoli And Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
1 qt. milk
1 large bunch broccoli, washed and chopped
1 onion, pureed
1 tsp. salt and pepper
Directions:
Cook altogether until broccoli is tender.
Add 1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese to soup and boil, stirring constantly. Thicken to desired consistency with water and flour.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Cheese Soup
Ingredients:
5 Tbsp. oleo, divided
1/4 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, peeled
2 lb. fresh broccoli
1 large rib celery
1 large carrot, peeled
4 green onions
2 1/2 c. chicken broth
1/4 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
dash of nutmeg
1 1/2 c. skim milk
4 oz. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
In heavy 4-quart kettle, melt 1 tablespoon oleo over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic.
Saute, stirring until onion is transparent and set aside.

question: What’s a recipe for creamy broccoli cheddar soup?
answer:
Title: Broccoli And Cheddar Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. chopped broccoli
2 c. chicken broth or 2 c. water plus 2 bouillon cubes
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. salt
2 c. light cream
1/4 c. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. margarine
3 Tbsp. cornstarch or flour
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In large saucepan, cook broccoli until soft; drain.
In small pan, saute onion in margarine.
Add cornstarch and slowly add broth and cream.
Stir and cook until thickens.
Add salt, nutmeg and broccoli.
Just before serving, stir in cheese.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese(Kids In The Kitchen)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped carrot
1/2 c. chopped celery
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes or tomato puree
1 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
1/2 lb. ground sirloin or ground beef
1 lb. spaghetti or ziti, cooked according to pkg. directions
Directions:
Heat oil in a large skillet. Add onion, carrots and celery. Saute over low-medium heat, stirring frequently, about 10 minutes. Stir in garlic. Saute 2 minutes more.
Add tomato sauce to skillet. Add basil and oregano. Stir.
Cook, covered, on medium-low heat for about 10 minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
1 slice root celery or 2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned whole tomatoes or 3 Tbsp. tomato puree
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. dried thyme
1/3 c. white wine or chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
In a skillet saute ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat loses its pinkness then transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion then dice celery and carrot.
Chop ham into small pieces and saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Transfer to pan with ground meat and combine all.
Add water, tomatoes or tomato puree, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme.
Cover and cook for about 20 minutes, then add the wine or chicken broth and cook for a few more minutes.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghettini Bolognese
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 carrot, sliced
1 clove garlic, crushed
1/2 c. each chopped onion, celery and green pepper
2 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 lb. Italian sausage, casing removed
2 (15 oz.) cans Hunt's tomato sauce
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. dry red wine (optional)
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian seasoning
Directions:
Saute mushrooms, carrot, garlic, onion, celery and green pepper in Wesson oil in Dutch oven.
Add sausage; cook until sausage loses redness.
Drain fat.
Add remaining ingredients. Simmer, uncovered, 40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve over hot, cooked spaghettini.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Bolog'Nase
Ingredients:
3/4 to 1 lb. Italian sausage
2 medium onions, chopped
1 carrot, thinly sliced
1 clove garlic, minced
1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 rib celery
1 green pepper
2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1/2 c. water or 1/4 c. red wine
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. Italian herb seasoning (increase to taste)
basil, oregano, garlic and red pepper
Directions:
Saut mushrooms, carrot, onions and green pepper in oil. Add sausage and cook until sausage is done. Drain well. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer 40 minutes (or longer).

question: I need a recipe for a classic spaghetti bolognese.
answer:
Title: Pasta Bolognese
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large onion
2 stalks celery
1 carrot
4 oz. smoked ham
1 c. water
3 to 4 canned tomatoes
2 cloves minced garlic
1 tsp. salt
dash of black pepper
1 tsp. thyme
1/3 c. chicken broth
10 to 12 oz. spaghetti or other pasta
Directions:
Brown ground beef in 1 tablespoon oil until meat is done. Transfer to a pan.
Peel and chop onion; dice celery and carrot. Chop ham into small pieces.
Saute in remaining oil with onion, celery and carrot.
Add to ground meat.
Add water, tomatoes, garlic, salt, pepper and thyme; cover and cook about 20 minutes. Add chicken broth; cook a few minutes more.
Cook pasta according to package directions; drain well.
Serve immediately with sauce.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Herbed Carrots
Ingredients:
1 bunch carrots
1 c. boiling water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried basil
1/4 tsp. marjoram (dried)
1/4 tsp. savory (dried)
3 Tbsp. butter or oleo
Directions:
Scrape carrots.
Cut into quarters (lengthwise), then halves (lengthwise).
Cook in hot water and salt, covered.
Cook 15 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
Add herbs and butter.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Company Carrots
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. carrots
boiling salted water
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/4 c. cooking liquid from carrots
1 Tbsp. minced onion or instant minced onion
2 Tbsp. Kraft horseradish sauce
1/4 c. fine cracker crumbs
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
salt and pepper
paprika
chopped parsley
Directions:
Cook the whole carrots in boiling, salted water until tender. Reserve 1/4 cup of the cooking liquid.
Drain carrots; cut lengthwise into narrow strips and arrange in shallow baking dish (8 or 9-inch square).
Combine reserved cooking liquid with mayonnaise, onion, horseradish sauce and salt and pepper.
If desired, at this point, the carrots and sauce may be refrigerated.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
8 cooked carrots, halved lengthwise
Directions:
Cover carrots with water and boil until tender. Drain.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Marinated Carrots
Ingredients:
2 lb. pkg. carrots
1 can tomato soup
1/3 c. Wesson oil
1/2 c. vinegar
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. mustard
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. Worcestershire
1 medium onion
1 bell pepper
Directions:
Slice and boil carrots until tender and drain.
Mix all ingredients together.
Chill in refrigerator overnight before serving.

question: What can I cook with chickpeas and carrots?
answer:
Title: Marinated Carrots(A Great Cookout Dish And Easy To Make!)
Ingredients:
2 lb. sliced cooked carrots
1 can tomato soup
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. cooking oil
1/2 c. cider vinegar
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 chopped onion
1 chopped green pepper
3 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach
1 (9 oz.) can artichoke hearts
1/2 lb. cream cheese
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
4 Tbsp. margarine
6 Tbsp. milk
1/3 c. grated cheese
ground pepper
Directions:
Layer drained artichoke hearts in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.
Layer drained spinach next.
Blend cream cheese, mayonnaise and margarine until light and fluffy.
Gradually beat in milk. Spread over top of spinach.
Sprinkle with pepper and grated cheese.
Bake at 375° for 40 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. rotini pasta
1/2 c. diced Provolone cheese
1 can pitted black olives
4 c. assorted vegetables
salt and pepper
1/2 c. Italian dressing
2 oz. Prosciutto, slivered
1/2 c. sliced red onion
1/2 c. frozen peas, thawed
2 Tbsp. fresh basil
1 avocado
Directions:
In a large bowl, gently toss pasta with dressing.
Add cheese, Prosciutto, black olives, onion, peas, broccoli, carrots, bell pepper, mushrooms, asparagus tips and sliced basil.
Toss gently. Season to taste.
Fan avocado slices on top.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and tomato.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. curly noodles
2 small avocados
1 (8 oz.) pkg. Mozzarella cheese
1/4 c. butter or margarine
garlic salt and pepper to taste
Parmesan cheese to taste
Directions:
Cook noodles according to package directions.
Drain in colander and return to pot.
Add butter, grated cheeses, seasonings and thinly sliced avocados.
Stir.
Serves 4 to 6. Very quick and easy to make and your family will think you're a gourmet cook!

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Avocado Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. mashed avocado
1/2 c. sour cream
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. grated onion
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. chili powder
3 slices bacon, crisp cooked
Directions:
Combine avocado, sour cream, lemon juice, onion, salt and chili powder. Chill. Stir in bacon, crumbled. Garnish with bacon curl.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Avocado Salad
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. sour cream
1/3 c. salad oil
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. Tabasco
1/2 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
In the blender, combine ingredients and blend until smooth. Taste for seasoning.

question: How do I make a creamy avocado pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado, peeled and pitted
1 (8 oz.) container plain yogurt
2 Tbsp. minced onion
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
carrot sticks
Directions:
Mash avocado in bowl.
Add yogurt, onion, salt and white pepper.
Stir until blended.
Serve with carrot sticks.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Tangy Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts, skin removed or chicken cutlets (use mallet to tenderize)
2 lemons
1 tsp. thyme, garlic powder and marjoram
2 or more Tbsp. soy sauce
4 Tbsp. honey (can add more if necessary)
Directions:
Mix ingredients; marinate chicken for one hour.
Put in broiler for 10 minutes or so.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Herb-Marinated Chicken(Makes 6 Servings)
Ingredients:
2 to 2 1/2 lb. meaty chicken pieces
2 Tbsp. oil
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 c. white wine
2 tsp. dried basil
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. onion salt
2 cloves garlic, minced
Directions:
Place cleaned chicken in a heavy plastic bag.
For marinade, in a bowl combine wine, oil, vinegar, basil, oregano, onion salt and garlic.
Pour over chicken in bag.
Close bag and coat chicken well.
Marinate for 5 to 24 hours in refrigerator, turning bag occasionally.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marinade(Great For Chicken And Spareribs)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, blenderized
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 c. water
Directions:
Heat all to boiling.
Marinate meat and brush every 15 minutes while cooking.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Marinade
Ingredients:
6 whole chicken breasts, split, skinned and boned
1/4 c. lemon juice
4 tsp. celery salt
1/4 tsp. garlic juice
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 c. sour cream
4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. paprika
1 (8 oz.) pkg. herb-seasoned stuffing mix, crushed
1/2 c. butter, melted
1/4 c. butter, melted
Directions:
In shallow bowl, mix lemon juice, celery salt, garlic juice, pepper, sour cream, Worcestershire sauce and paprika.
Place chicken in marinade.
Cover and place in refrigerator for 3 hours or overnight.

question: What’s a recipe for a tangy chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
1 tsp. basil
1/2 tsp. garlic powder with parsley
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine ingredients and pour over chicken in nonmetal dish. Cover and refrigerate overnight and turn occasionally.
Use marinade to baste chicken while cooking/grilling.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
12 hard boiled eggs
1 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 1/2 tsp. mustard
1 1/2 tsp. worcestershire sauce
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Half eggs lengthwise, mash yolks in a bowl.
Add remaining ingredients to yolks and blend well.
Fill egg halves with mixture and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
4 eggs, hard-cooked and shelled
6 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. sweet relish
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. mustard
pepper
Directions:
Cut eggs in half lengthwise.
Remove yolks and mash with a fork.
Then blend in mayonnaise, mustard, lemon juice, salt, Worcestershire sauce and pepper.
Use 1 tablespoon to each half.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard-boiled eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. salad dressing (mayo)
2 slices bacon, crisply fried and crumbled
1/2 c. finely shredded American cheese
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Cut eggs lengthwise in half.
Slip out yolks and mash with fork.
Mix in seasonings and salad dressing.
Fill whites with egg yolk mixture, heaping it up slightly.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard-cooked eggs
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. mustard or vinegar
3 Tbsp. salad dressing (enough to moisten)
Directions:
Cut egg in halves.
Slip out yolks.
Mash with fork.
Mix in remaining ingredients.
Refill white with yolk mixture.

question: What’s a recipe for classic deviled eggs?
answer:
Title: Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 eggs
salt to taste
pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. mayo
pinch of sugar
Directions:
Boil eggs.
Peel and remove yolks.
Mash; add salt, pepper, mayo and sugar.
Stir well.
Put back in egg whites.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 part Balsamic Vinegar
2 parts Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1/2 tsp Dijon Mustard
3 pinches of Pepper
2 pinches of Kosher Salt
1 pinch of Sugar
Directions:
Whisk all ingredients until oil and vinegar become creamy. Spoon onto salad as needed.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Greek Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1/3 c. olive oil
3 Tbsp. wine vinegar
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. fresh oregano
1 tsp. sugar
1 small clove garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine ingredients in a jar with a screw-top lid.
Shake well to mix.
Store in refrigerator, covered, for up to two weeks.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Creamy Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. white wine vinegar
salt and pepper
1 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a screwtop jar and shake.
Chill.

question: How do I make a basic vinaigrette for salad?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 c. oil
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. wine vinegar (raspberry wine vinegar, if possible)
3 tsp. light soy sauce
1 1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Heat the vinegar; add sugar and stir until dissolved.
Remove from heat. Add oil and soy sauce. Mix in salt and pepper. Cover and
refrigerate until ready to use. Put in blender or food processor to emulsify.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Feta Spinach And Fruit Salad With Honey-Lemon Dressing
Ingredients:
5 c. torn fresh spinach
1 c. cantaloupe chunks
1 c. halved strawberries
1/2 c. thin-sliced red onion rings
1 c. crumbled Feta natural cheese
1/4 c. pitted ripe olives
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. honey
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Place spinach, fruit, onion, cheese and olives in large bowl. Toss lightly.
Mix remaining ingredients; add and toss.
Makes 6 cups or 6 side-salad servings.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. fresh spinach
1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms (fresh)
1 or 1/2 lb. crumbled Feta (optional)
8 or 9 pieces bacon, fried and crumbled
1 1/2 c. croutons
1 medium red onion, sliced in rings
Italian dressing
Directions:
Wash spinach and mushrooms.
Remove spinach stems; slice mushrooms and onions.
Crumble Feta cheese and bacon.
Add all other ingredients except Feta cheese to the spinach.
Toss; then add Feta cheese; toss again.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
2 tsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. seasoned pepper
1 pkg. fresh spinach, torn into bite size pieces
5 bacon strips, cooked and crumbled
2 hard-cooked eggs, sliced
1 1/2 lb. fresh, whole green beans, cleaned and destrung
1/3 lb. good Swiss cheese, in thin strips
1/2 c. chopped ripe olives
1/2 c. each: thinly sliced green and red peppers
1/2 c. (or more) chopped, toasted almonds
Directions:
This salad is most delicious when made a day in advance and marinated overnight.
Actual preparation time: about 30 minutes.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Spinach 24 Hour Salad
Ingredients:
Fresh spinach, torn to bite-sized pieces
1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
6 hard cooked eggs, sliced
Lettuce, any kind, torn in bite-sized pieces
Purple onion, sliced, (optional)
1 pkg. frozen peas, don't thaw, put in strainer and rinse
1/2 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. Miracle Whip
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In glass bowl, layer spinach, bacon, eggs, lettuce, onion, and peas.
In separate bowl, mix together mayonnaise and Miracle Whip. Spread over peas.
Then sprinkle cheese on top.
Cover and refrigerate at least 24 hours before serving.

question: What can I make with spinach and feta?
answer:
Title: Company Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
4 to 5 bunches fresh spinach
4 hard-boiled eggs, cut in halves
1 cucumber, sliced (skin on or off, your choice)
2 ripe tomatoes, quartered
4 pitted ripe olives (per person being served)
4 pimento-stuffed Spanish olives (per person being served)
8 strips bacon, fried and broken into smaller pieces
alfalfa sprouts
1 small bag radishes, plain or sliced across the top to form rosettes
salad dressing (French, Italian, Vinaigrette, Blue cheese)
2 bunches fresh spinach
2 tomatoes, cut into wedges (Dwayne prefers home-grown tomatoes)
1 bunch green onions
4 strips bacon, fried and crumbled to pieces
1 green pepper, de-seeded and cut into strips
salt and pepper to taste
red wine vinegar (or dressing of your choice)
Directions:
Wash spinach well.
Cut out the stalks.
Tear the spinach into small pieces.
In a small bowl, combine the spinach, tomatoes, chopped onions, and green pepper strips.
Pour on dressing.
Serve.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Curry
Ingredients:
1 cauliflower, cut up
6 tomatoes, cut and peeled
6 to 8 potatoes, small and cut up
1/4 lb. shelled peas
1/4 lb. green beans, sliced
1 Tbsp. turmeric
1 1/2 Tbsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. butter
6 small onions
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. stock
Directions:
Place vegetables on a large plate.
Sprinkle with mixed spices and salt.
Melt butter in a heavy pan.
Saute the onions and garlic.
Add the spiced veggies and stock.
Cover and bring to a boil, simmer for about 20 minutes until all vegetables are tender. Serve with hot cooked rice.
Enjoy!

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Mixed Vegetable Curry
Ingredients:
2 c. broccoli (flowerets)
1 large potato (3/4-inch cubes)
2 carrots (1/3-inch slices)
1/2 c. sour cream
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin powder
1 Tbsp. coriander powder
pinch of garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. salt
oil for deep frying
Directions:
Steam broccoli until tender.
Deep fry potato on high heat until golden and tender.
Then deep fry carrots until tender. Drain and set aside vegetables.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Vegetables
Ingredients:
6 to 8 tiny new potatoes, quartered (1 to 1 1/2 lb.)
2 c. cauliflower flowerets
3/4 c. frozen peas
1 medium onion, chopped
1 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. water
1 tsp. curry powder
3/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. each: garlic and ginger powder
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook potatoes and onion in hot oil until the edges start to brown.
Add water, curry powder, salt, garlic, ginger and red pepper.
Bring to boiling; reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for about 10 to 15 minutes.
Add cauliflower; cook about 5 minutes more or until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally.
Add frozen peas; heat through, adding a little more water if necessary.
Makes 4 to 6 side dish servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Curried Vegetable Medley
