Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 c. cauliflowerets
1 c. green beans, cut into 1-inch pieces
1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms (4 oz.)
1/2 c. diagonally sliced carrots
2 Tbsp. sliced almonds, toasted
1 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. ground cumin
1 1/2 c. vegetable juice
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 medium minced garlic
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
Directions:
In 10-inch skillet, over medium heat in hot oil, cook cauliflowerets, beans, mushrooms and carrots with garlic, curry and cumin until vegetables are tender-crisp, stirring often.
In small bowl, stir together vegetable juice, cornstarch and pepper; gradually stir into skillet.
Cook until mixture boils and thickens, stirring constantly.
Sprinkle with almonds.
Makes 4 cups or 8 servings.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a vegetable curry?
answer:
Title: Curry Dip For Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. wine vinegar
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. curry powder
1 Tbsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. horseradish
Directions:
Mix all together.
Keeps well in refrigerator.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
2 doz. chicken wings
2 c. bread crumbs
3/4 c. powdered Romano cheese
1/4 c. dry parsley
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. Accent
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 c. margarine
Directions:
Mix together bread crumbs, cheese and spices.
Melt margarine. Dip wings in melted margarine and roll in bread crumb mixture. Place in greased shallow pan or cookie sheet.
Make sure sides of wings are not touching.
Bake 1 hour at 350°.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
5 lb. frozen chicken wings
2 c. cold water
2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. mustard
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. minced garlic
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Mix all ingredients, except wings, in a saucepan.
Bring to boil; turn heat down and simmer 6 to 7 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Divide wings into 2 (13 x 9-inch) pans.
Pour sauce over the wings and bake approximately 90 minutes or until sauce thickens.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
18 to 20 chicken wings, separated
1/3 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. honey
2 Tbsp. oil
2 Tbsp. catsup, chili sauce or chili powder
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Place wings in large baking pan.
Pour marinade over wings. Bake for 30 minutes at 400°.
Turn wings and baste with marinade. Reduce temperature to 350° and bake 30 minutes longer.
Baste 3 times in last 30 minutes of baking.
More flavorful if wings can marinate several hours or overnight prior to baking.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1/2 c. butter
1 tsp. dry mustard
1 clove garlic, minced
3/4 c. water
Directions:
Combine ingredients and heat until butter and sugar dissolve. Cool and pour over chicken wings (20 to 30).
Marinate 2 hours, turning. Put in baking pan.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.
Turn them over halfway.

question: How do I make crispy oven-baked chicken wings?
answer:
Title: Chicken Wings
Ingredients:
3 lb. chicken wings (15 to 16)
1/3 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. salad oil
2 Tbsp. chili sauce
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. fresh ginger
1 clove garlic
4 drops Tabasco
Directions:
Cut wings at joint.
Wash.
Pat dry on paper towel.
Combine remaining ingredients in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Arrange wings in single layer in marinade.
Cover.
Refrigerate several hours or overnight.
Bake, uncovered, in 375° oven until tender, 30 to 40 minutes.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Hard-Boiled Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
2 Tbsp. vinegar
water (to cover)
Directions:
Place eggs in saucepan just large enough to accommodate all. Cover with water right out of top.
Add the vinegar.
Bring to boil slowly over medium heat.
Boil 1 minute.
Remove from heat. Cover and let stand 10 minutes.
Cool with running water.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Egg Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. vinegar
1 egg, beaten
several hard-boiled eggs
Directions:
Add vinegar to beaten eggs.
Heat.
Stir until thick.
Pour over sliced hard-boiled eggs. A good sauce for greens.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Egg-Dying Kit
Ingredients:
1 c. water
1/4 c. white vinegar
food coloring
Directions:
Mix 1 cup water, 1/4 cup white vinegar and a few drops food coloring for a homemade version.
Make as many colors as you like.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: Vinegar Pie
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vinegar
1 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. butter
4 Tbsp. flour
1 c. water
2 egg yolks
Directions:
Mix flour with half of sugar.
Add boiling water and cook 15 minutes.
Add rest of sugar and beaten egg yolks; cook a few minutes longer.
Add butter, vinegar and 1 teaspoon lemon extract, if desired.

question: How do I make a perfect poached egg?
answer:
Title: How To Boil Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. white vinegar
Directions:
Put eggs in saucepan with fitted lid.
Cover with 1 inch cold water.
Add salt and white vinegar.
Bring to boil and cook, covered, one minute.
Turn off heat and let set in water for 15 minutes.
Eggs will be easy to peel and will have no green color.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Broccoli, Cauliflower And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 small head trimmed cauliflower, cut in florets
1 small bunch broccoli, trimmed and cut in florets
2 tsp. olive oil or vegetable oil
3 cloves garlic
2 1/2 thickly sliced mushrooms
2 1/2 c. whole noodles
1 c. low-fat small curd cottage cheese
1/2 c. low-fat milk
1/4 c. low-fat sour cream
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
salt and pepper
Directions:
In a large pot of boiling water, cook cauliflower and broccoli until tender-crisp, about 5 minutes.
With a slotted spoon, remove vegetables and save the liquid for cooking the pasta.
In a large skillet, heat oil.
Saute garlic for 2 minutes over medium heat. Add mushrooms for about 5 minutes.
Stir in broccoli and cauliflower.
Saute for 2 to 3 minutes longer; set aside. Meanwhile in reserved boiling vegetable liquid, cook pasta.
Add water if necessary tender but until firm, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain.
In a food processor combine cottage cheese, milk, sour cream and Parmesan.
Pour over broccoli mixture, add drained pasta and toss until mixed.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.
Make 8 servings.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium can mushrooms
4 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 c. rich milk
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter.
Add flour slowly and brown slightly.
Add milk and cook until it thickens.
Pour over steak or chicken.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1 tsp. grated onion
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. milk
Directions:
Melt butter over low heat in a heavy saucepan.
Stir with wooden spoon.
Saute onion and mushrooms in butter for 5 minutes. Blend in flour and seasonings.
Cook over low heat until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in milk.
Bring to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Cook until thickened. Serve over noodles, potatoes, etc.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettucini, uncooked (eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise or Miracle Whip
1 tsp. minced garlic (in jar)
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, rinsed and drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese (Alpine Lace or Weight Watchers)
Directions:
Prepare fettucini as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 Tbsp. minced onion
5 c. cooked, sliced Irish potatoes
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Blend soup and milk together.
Mix well and heat slowly in saucepan.
Blend in salt,
pepper
and
onion.
Then
in a greased, 1 quart casserole,
arrange
a
layer of sliced potatoes. Pour half of
the	mushroom
sauce
over
the potatoes. Then add another layer of
potatoes	and
more
of
the sauce. Sprinkle bread crumbs over the
top and bake in preheated oven at 350° for 30 minutes.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Bacon And Egg Pie
Ingredients:
2 eggs
salt and pepper to taste
pinch of nutmeg
3 oz. bacon, crumbled
1/2 c. Swiss cheese
1 c. half and half
Directions:
Beat eggs; add salt and pepper, nutmeg and milk.
Put bacon and cheese on bottom of pie shell.
Add egg mixture and bake for 45 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Bacon And Swiss Cheese Pie
Ingredients:
rich pastry
slightly beaten egg white
3 pieces cooked bacon, broken into small pieces
1 c. grated Swiss cheese
1 c. heavy cream or evaporated milk
2 beaten eggs and 1 egg yolk
sprinkle of salt and pepper
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
Directions:
Line a 9-inch pie pan with rich pastry.
Brush with slightly beaten egg white.
Bake in preheated hot oven at 450° until crust sets, but is not brown.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Bacon-Cheese Pie
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean bacon, crisply cooked and crumbled
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded cheese (sharp)
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 1/2 c. milk
3 eggs, beaten (add to milk)
1 c. biscuit mix (homemade; could use Bisquick)
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°.
Grease a 10-inch pie plate.
Sprinkle bacon, onion and cheese in pie plate.
In blender or processor, combine remaining ingredients and beat on high about one minute, until smooth.
Pour into pie plate.
Bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool 5 minutes. Cut into wedges.
Serve with salad.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Cream Cheese Pie Crust
Ingredients:
1 c. cream cheese
1 c. butter
1 tsp. salt
2 c. flour
Directions:
Cream together butter and cream cheese.
Add salt and flour. Mix with hands, refrigerate overnight.

question: How do I make a classic quiche Lorraine?
answer:
Title: Bacon-Cheese Pie
Ingredients:
1 (8 or 9-inch) unbaked pie shell
1/2 lb. sliced bacon
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
3 eggs
2/3 c. (6 oz. can) evaporated milk
1 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Fry bacon until crisp; drain.
Crumble into pie shell.
Arrange shredded cheese over bacon.
Beat eggs slightly with both milks and seasonings.
Pour over cheese.
Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until knife inserted 2 inches from edge comes out clean.
Do not overbake.
Cool 10 to 15 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola Bars
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. rolled oats
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. raw sunflower seeds
1/4 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. slivered almonds
4 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/4 c. dark brown sugar
1/2 c. honey
1 c. raisins
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Heat oven to 300°.
Spread oats, coconut, sunflower seeds, sesame seed, wheat germ and almonds on a 9 x 12-inch baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Granola Bars
Ingredients:
4 c. raw oats (Quaker)
1 c. chopped nuts (like almonds, walnuts or sunflower)
1 c. seedless raisins or 1/2 c. mini chocolate chips
1/4 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. dry milk powder
1 c. light corn syrup
2/3 c. salad oil
1 1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Lightly grease 15 1/2 x 10 1/2-inch jelly roll pan.
In large bowl, mix all ingredients thoroughly.
Spoon mixture into prepared pan.
With oiled fingers, press out firmly and evenly into pan. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden.
Cool at least 2 hours before cutting or they will fall apart.
Makes 32 bars at 195 calories each.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Chewy Granola Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2/3 c. peanut butter
1/2 c. light corn syrup
1/2 c. margarine or butter, melted
2 tsp. vanilla
3 c. quick cooking rolled oats
1/2 c. coconut
1/2 c. sunflower nuts
1/2 c. raisins
1/3 c. wheat germ
2 Tbsp. sesame seed
6 oz. pkg. (1 c.) semi-sweet chocolate or carob chips (if desired)
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Grease 13 x 9-inch pan.
In large bowl, combine brown sugar, peanut butter, corn syrup, margarine and vanilla; blend well.
Stir in remaining ingredients.
Press mixture evenly in prepared pan.
Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes or until light golden brown.
Cool completely.
Cut into bars.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Granola Bars
Ingredients:
2 cups oats
1 cup oat bran
3/4 cup brown sugar
3/4 cup raisins
3/4 cup chopped nuts
3/4 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
2 tsp. pure vanilla
1/2 cup canola or olive oil
2 cups honey
1 egg
4 mashed bananas
1 large can crushed pineapple
1 egg
3/4 cup canola oil
1/4 cup water
1 cup powdered milk
1 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 Tbsp. good vanilla
1 heaping Tbsp. stenia powder
3 cups oatmeal
2 cups oat bran
1 tsp. salt
3 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
Directions:
Blend 2nd bowl with 1st bowl and mix well.
Spoon into paper lined muffin tins and bake at 325 for about 45 minutes.
Makes 2 dozen.

question: How do I make homemade granola bars?
answer:
Title: Granola Bars
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. honey
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
4 1/2 c. granola type cereal
2/3 c. chopped nuts or coconut
Directions:
In a 3-quart pan, melt butter, then add brown sugar, honey, vanilla and salt; stir until well blended.
Stir in granola and desired nuts and coconut.
Turn into a well-greased 10 x 15-inch pan.
Press in firmly to form an even layer.
Bake, uncovered, in a 400° oven until browned and bubbly, about 10 to 15 minutes.
Cool slightly and cut into bars while still warm.
Yields 32 bars.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Leg Of Lamb Mosaic
Ingredients:
1 (5 lb.) leg of lamb, boned and butterflied (with fell)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, minced or 1 tsp. dried, crumbled
2 tsp. minced garlic
1/4 lb. fresh spinach leaves, stemmed
4 medium carrots, cooked
4 whole pimientos, drained
1/2 medium onion, thinly sliced
1/4 c. minced fresh parsley
2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper
1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
2 medium celery stalks, chopped
2 medium carrots, chopped
1 medium onion, chopped
1/4 c. dry vermouth
1 c. chicken stock
Directions:
Position rack in center of oven and preheat to 325°.
Pat meat dry.
Place on surface, fell side down with long edge toward you. Sprinkle with rosemary and garlic.
Cover with layer of spinach leaves.
Arrange 4 carrots in 2 rows across center of meat. Surround carrots with pimientos.
Scatter onion slices atop carrots.
Sprinkle with parsley, 2 teaspoons salt, 3/4 teaspoon pepper and cayenne.
Starting at short end, roll meat up tightly. Tie securely with kitchen twine at 2-inch intervals.
Place on rack in roasting pan.
Add celery, 2 chopped carrots and onion to pan.
Pour vermouth over meat.
Season with salt and pepper. Roast until thermometer inserted in thickest part of meat registers 130° (for medium rare), about 1 1/2 hours, adding up to 1/2 cup water to pan if necessary to keep vegetables from sticking.
Transfer meat to cutting board; let stand 15 minutes.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Spiceland Hen House Eggplant(In Honor Of Stallion, "Nat'S Luck")
Ingredients:
3 large eggplant
water (for cooking)
1/2 lb. bulk Italian mild sausage
3 green onions, chopped
1 c. red onions, chopped
1 c. celery, chopped
1 (6 1/4 oz.) pkg. cornbread stuffing mix
1/2 tsp. black pepper flakes
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated
Directions:
Peel and dice eggplant; cook in salted water until tender. Drain well and set aside.
(It is really best to steam, rather than to boil the eggplant.) Saute green onions, red onions and celery in a skillet with small amount of cooking oil until transparent; set aside.
Saute sausage, in skillet, until well done; remove to paper towels; set aside.
Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions; set aside.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Baked Eggplant
Ingredients:
1 eggplant
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/4 stick margarine
1 onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
2 c. Italian rice, cooked
1/3 c. seasoned bread crumbs
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. parsley
1/3 lb. grated Romano cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplant and cut into cubes.
Cook in boiling salt water. Drain well.
Mash eggplant down with a fork.
Brown ground beef in butter with spices, onion and green pepper.
Stir in eggplant and cooked rice.
Spoon into lightly greased Pyrex casserole. Sprinkle with bread crumbs and grated Romano cheese.
Cover and bake at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Eggplant From The Border
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
4 slices bacon, chopped
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 medium eggplant, peeled and cut into chunks
1 can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef.
Drain and set aside.

question: What can I make with eggplant and ground lamb?
answer:
Title: Wyatt'S Eggplant Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. eggplant
1/2 lb. bread crumbs
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/4 c. whole milk
1/2 stick margarine
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped pimento
2 eggs, beaten
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. sage
1/8 tsp. m.s.g.
1 1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Peel and cube eggplant; boil 30 minutes.
Saute vegetables in margarine until tender.
Add to crumb and milk mixture.
To drained eggplant, add remaining ingredients, except cheese.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Garden Rice
Ingredients:
1 bunch green onions, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
1 1/2 lb. zucchini and/or yellow squash, sliced
1 (12 oz.) Mexican corn
3/4 c. butter*
1 tsp. lemon pepper
1/2 tsp. cilantro (dry)
3/4 tsp. oregano (dry)
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. chopped parsley (dry)
1 1/2 c. raw rice (white)
Directions:
Saute green onions, green pepper and squash in 4 tablespoons butter until tender. Add corn, seasonings and parsley. Set aside. Cook rice. Place rice in large bowl. Pour 1/2-cup melted butter over cooked rice and toss lightly. Add seasoned vegetables, tossing again. Place in a buttered casserole dish (13 x 9 x 2). Cover. Heat in 350° oven for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Health Nut Brown Rice
Ingredients:
1/2 c. shredded carrot
1/2 c. shredded zucchini
3 Tbsp. sunflower seeds
3 Tbsp. sliced almonds
1 tsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. parsley, snipped
3 c. cooked brown rice, cooked in chicken broth
1/4 tsp. red pepper flakes
Directions:
Cook carrot, zucchini, sunflower seeds, almonds and pepper flakes in margarine in large skillet over medium-high heat until almonds are browned.
Add rice and parsley; stir until heated.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Brown Rice Plus
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked brown rice
1 c. chopped green onion
1/2 c. each broccoli and green beans or 1 c. of either
2 Tbsp. butter
2 tomatoes, chopped
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 to 3/4 c. minced parsley (optional)
1 medium garlic clove, minced
salt and pepper
Directions:
Saute onions, broccoli and green pepper in butter, about 3 minutes.
Mix in rice, tomatoes, cheese, parsley, garlic, salt and pepper to taste.
Cook 4 minutes longer, covered, until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Savory Brown Rice
Ingredients:
1 onion, chopped
1/4 c. water
1 c. long grain rice
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. basil
1/4 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. marjoram
1/4 tsp. thyme
Directions:
In a saucepan, combine onion and 1/4 cup water.
Cook on medium heat until onion is tender.
Add rice, 2 cups water and soy sauce. Stir well.
Bring to a boil.
Add remaining ingredients; stir well. Cover and simmer over low heat for about 15 minutes.
Let rest in covered pan for 5 minutes before serving.
Makes a good side dish to serve with vegetables.

question: What can I make with brown rice and vegetables?
answer:
Title: Brown Rice Salad
Ingredients:
4 to 8 c. cooked brown rice
1 large green and 1 large red pepper, diced
1 yellow pepper, diced (can be added for more color)
2 to 4 c. grated carrot
1/2 to 1 c. fresh parsley, chopped
1/2 to 1 c. currants or raisins
1/2 to 1 c. sunflower seeds
1/2 to 1 c. sliced almonds or any other kind of nut (optional)
1/2 c. Bonita crystallized ginger, chopped (found on the Chinese shelf at Publix with luck or Nutrition Depot) *
Directions:
*This is important; it makes all the difference to the taste. If you don't like ginger, it doesn't matter, but add gradually and taste.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Broccoli Beef
Ingredients:
2 small boxes frozen broccoli
2 lb. ground beef
2 c. (8 oz.) tomatoes
1 medium bell pepper
1/2 medium onion
1/2 c. catsup (ketchup)
1/2 c. French salad dressing
salt and pepper as desired
grated sharp or medium sharp Cheddar cheese or low-fat cheese of choice
Directions:
Grate Cheddar cheese.
Cut up and dice onion and bell pepper. In a large skillet, cook ground beef, onion, pepper and thawed broccoli together until beef is brown and broccoli is cooked, yet still crisp.
Drain off any excess fat.
Put back in skillet and add the remaining ingredients.
Bring to boil; afterwards lower heat to a good simmer.
Simmer for 10 full minutes (or until thickened somewhat).
Serve over cooked rice or pasta.
(You may substitute low-fat ground turkey for a low-fat family meal, if desired.)
Top with grated cheese on individual servings. Delicious!

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef-N-Broccoli
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless beef sirloin, 3/4 in. thick
2 c. broccoli flowerets
1 med. onion, cut in wedges
1 can beef gravy
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
4 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Slice beef into thin strips, spray skillet with vegetable cooking spray, heat over med. heat 1 minute.
Stir-fry broccoli and onion until crisp.
Remove from pan, set aside.
Stir fry beef until brown, add gravy, soy sauce and garlic.
Remove vegetables and heat through.
Serve over rice.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef And Broccoli Chowder
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 medium onion, chopped
6 c. water
1 pkg. Hamburger Helper mix for hamburger potatoes au gratin
2 medium carrots, sliced (1 c.)
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. frozen broccoli, chopped
Directions:
Cook and stir ground beef and onion in Dutch oven until beef is brown; drain. Stir in water, potatoes, sauce mix, carrots, mustard, salt and pepper. Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in broccoli; cover and cook 10 minutes longer. Makes 8 cups.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef-Broccoli-Potato Bake
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 (16 oz.) bag frozen broccoli
2 boxes scalloped potatoes
16 oz. sour cream
6 c. boiling water
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Brown ground beef.
Place potatoes in 2 1/2-quart pan.
Spread cooked ground beef over potatoes.
Spread frozen broccoli, broken apart, over beef.
Sprinkle powdered mixture from the potatoes over the broccoli.
Add butter to 1 cup of boiling water to melt.
Mix in sour cream and pour over casserole.
Pour remaining water over casserole.
Bake at 400° for 50 to 60 minutes.

question: What can I cook with ground beef and broccoli?
answer:
Title: Beef And Broccoli
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. beef tenderloin
1/2 c. beef stock
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. dry sherry
4 Tbsp. olive oil
1 lb. broccoli florets
pinch of red pepper flakes
salt
Directions:
Cut beef into strips 1-inch long, 1/4-inch thick and 1/2-inch wide; set aside.
In a small cup, stir together stock, cornstarch, soy sauce and sherry; set aside.
In a heavy skillet, heat 2 tablespoons oil until very hot.
Add broccoli, then toss and stir for 2 minutes.
Cover and cook for 2 minutes more over medium heat; remove to side dish.
Return skillet to high heat and add remaining 2 tablespoons oil and heat until smoking hot.
Add beef and cook 2 minutes.
Stir in stock mixture and add along with broccoli.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1 c. softened butter
1 t. each of minced dried marjoram, thyme, and rosemary leaves
1/4 t. each of garlic powder, dried basil and sage
Directions:
Beat all together at high speed in a small mixing bowl until fluffy.
Keep in tightly covered container in refrigerator.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. butter or margarine
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. minced parsley
1 Tbsp. dill
1 small garlic clove
2 tsp. minced chives
1 tsp. tarragon
Directions:
Mix in mixer or blender.
Great to saute veggies, or use on popcorn or French bread.
Use in place of salt.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. Heritage butter, room temperature
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
3 Tbsp. fresh herb parsley
3 Tbsp. taragon basil
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cream butter and lemon juice.
Beat in herbs, salt and pepper and chill.
Use on corn-on-the-cob or other vegetables.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Herb Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. butter
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 small clove garlic, crushed
2 Tbsp. minced dried chives
2 Tbsp. minced parsley
1 tsp. dried tarragon, crushed
1 tsp. dill weed
cayenne pepper
Directions:
Cream butter in small bowl of electric mixer.
Add rest of ingredients and blend well.
Refrigerate overnight before using.

question: How do I make a garlic herb butter for steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1 pod garlic
virgin olive oil (the most expensive oil yields a wonderful tasting butter)
Directions:
In a mortar and pestle, crush 2 or 3 cloves of peeled garlic. (The broad side of a knife hit against the clove makes it easier to peel.)
Add a few drops of oil.
Add 1 or 2 more cloves of garlic while continuing to crush the mixture in the mortar.
Your finished consistency should by silky.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 1/2 lb. fresh broccoli
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. onion, finely chopped
Directions:
Wash and trim broccoli; cut stalks into spears.
Cook broccoli, covered in a small amount of boiling unsalted water about 10 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Drain.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. fresh broccoli
2 slightly beaten eggs
3/4 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. fine dry bread crumbs
1 Tbsp. melted margarine
Directions:
Cut broccoli into spears.
Cook until crisp.
Drain. Meanwhile, combine beaten eggs, cottage cheese, Cheddar cheese, onion, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper in a bowl.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Broccoli-Cheddar Cheese Casserole
Ingredients:
6 slices white or wheat bread
1 medium to large bunch broccoli
3 eggs
1 small onion, chopped
1/2 c. milk
4 Tbsp. melted butter
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Butter an 8-inch square glass baking dish.
Cover bottom of dish generously with torn bite-size pieces of bread.
Cut broccoli into bite-size pieces and lay on top of bread pieces.
Mix together all remaining ingredients.
Pour over broccoli and bread. Cover dish with foil or glass cover and bake in a preheated 350° oven for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
2 (10 oz.) pkg. broccoli (can use fresh)
1 chopped onion
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
1 (3 oz.) cream cheese
1 c. milk
3/4 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Cook broccoli and onion together for 5 minutes.
In saucepan, melt butter or margarine and mix in flour, salt, pepper and milk. Cook and stir until bubbly.
Blend in cream cheese until smooth. Place broccoli and onion mix in 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
Pour cream cheese mixture on top of broccoli.
Sprinkle grated cheese on top.
Bake in preheated 350° oven for 30 to 35 minutes. (This is my favorite of all broccoli casseroles.)

question: How do I make a cheesy broccoli casserole?
answer:
Title: Cheesy Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained
1 c. sour cream
1 c. cottage cheese
1/2 c. Bisquick
1/4 c. margarine
2 eggs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Grease lightly a square baking dish, 8 x 8 x 2-inches.
Spread broccoli in dish. Beat sour cream, cottage cheese, Bisquick, margarine and eggs well with hand beater 1 minute.
Pour over broccoli.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
Let cool 5 minutes before serving.
Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Grilled Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
1/3 c. balsamic vinegar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 shallots, finely chopped
1 tsp. dried Italian seasoning
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. molasses
1/2 lb. carrots, scraped
1 sweet red pepper
1 sweet yellow pepper
2 zucchini
2 yellow squash
1 large onion
Directions:
Combine first 7 ingredients in a large bowl.
Set aside.
Cut remaining vegetables into large pieces and add to vinegar mixture, tossing to coat.
Let stand 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Drain, reserving vinegar mixture.
Arrange in a grill basket. Cook, covered with grill lid, over medium-hot coals (350° to 400°) for 15 to 20 minutes, turning occasionally.
Return vegetables to reserved vinegar mixture, tossing gently.
Cover and refrigerate overnight.
Makes 6 cups.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Salad(Marinated)
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
3/4 c. celery, chopped
3/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
1/2 c. oil
1/2 c. wine vinegar
1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 (12 oz.) can white corn, drained
1 (16 oz.) can French-cut beans, drained
1 (16 oz.) can green English peas, drained
Directions:
Mix the first 8 ingredients and heat to boil.
Combine all ingredients; chill 2 hours.
Will keep for up to 6 weeks.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onions
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. chopped green pepper
1 c. French green beans
1 c. peas
1 c. Shoe Peg corn
1 c. green limas
1 jar pimentos
3/4 c. vinegar
1/2 c. cooking oil
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Drain all canned vegetables.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. oil
3/4 c. wine vinegar
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
1 can peas
1 can corn
1 can green beans
1 jar pimento
1 c. celery
1/2 c. onion
1 c. green pepper
Directions:
Bring sugar, oil, wine vinegar, pepper and salt to a boil.
Let cool.
In colander, drain peas, corn, green beans and pimento.
Add celery, onion and green pepper.
You can add other vegetables, if you wish.
I added some carrots and cucumbers.

question: How do I make a classic grilled vegetable salad?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Salad
Ingredients:
3/4 c. apple cider vinegar
1/2 c. oil
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
4 Tbsp. water
1 c. LeSueur peas
1 c. Green Giant Shoe Peg corn
1 c. Del Monte French-cut green beans
1 c. celery
1 small jar pimentos
1/2 c. chopped bell peppers
3/4 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Place mixture of first 6 ingredients in refrigerator.
Drain the vegetables.
Marinate vegetables with first mixture and serve.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
2 pkg. sweet sausage
2 large green peppers, cut in strips
2 large onions, sliced
1 jar marinara sauce
1 can tomato paste
1 can water
1 envelope spatini
Directions:
Fry out sausage and pour off fat.
Drain. Cook onions and peppers in same pan.
Mix sauces and everything together.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
1 lb. Italian sausage links
6 green or red bell peppers, cut into strips
3 large onions, sliced
salt
1/4 c. dry red or white wine
Directions:
Prick sausage links several times with fork.
In skillet, brown sausage well.
Drain and reserve 3 tablespoons drippings.
Slice sausage.
Set aside.
In the drippings, cook the peppers and onions.
Cover for 5 minutes.
Uncover and cook until the vegetables are tender but not brown.
Season to taste with salt. Add the sausage and wine; heat through.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
1 lb. Italian sausage
2 Tbsp. water
2 large green peppers
1 medium onion
2 cloves minced garlic
1 (11 oz.) can Campbell's zesty tomato soup
1 can water
1 tsp. vinegar
rice
Directions:
In covered skillet over medium heat, cook sausage chunks in 2 tablespoons of water for 5 minutes.
Uncover and cook until sausage is brown on all sides.
Add green peppers, cut into strips, sliced onion, separated into rings and minced garlic to sausage in skillet; cook until peppers are tender, but crisp. Stir frequently.
Spoon off fat.
Stir in soup, 1 can of water and vinegar.
Reduce heat to low; cover and simmer 10 minutes.
Cook rice according to package directions.
Serve over rice.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Italian Sausage And Peppers
Ingredients:
4 green bell peppers
2 medium onions
2 Tbsp. olive oil
8 (5-inch) links Italian sausage
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1 c. dry red wine
2 tsp. dried oregano leaves
1/2 lb. egg noodles
3 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Remove cores, ribs and seeds from peppers.
Set aside.
Peel onions and slice into 1/8-inch slices.
Set aside.
Heat olive oil in large skillet.
Sear sausage for 5 minutes until well browned on all sides.
Remove from skillet and set aside.
Cook peppers and onions in sausage pan for 5 minutes over high heat.
Mix tomato paste with 1/4 cup of wine to dissolve.
Mix remaining wine and pour into skillet.
Bring to boil for 1 minuet.
Reduce heat to medium-low.
Sprinkle oregano over vegetables.
Place sausages in pan; cover and simmer for 40 minutes.
Cook noodles.
Serve over noodles.

question: What can I cook with sausage and bell peppers?
answer:
Title: Sausage
Ingredients:
15 lb. meat
4 Tbsp. salt
4 Tbsp. sage
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. cayenne pepper
1 Tbsp. black pepper
Directions:
Mix together and grind.
You can use less black pepper and more cayenne, if desired hotter.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Fish Fillets(Low Cholesterol)
Ingredients:
1 lb. fish fillets
2 egg whites, beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of ground pepper
1/4 c. cornmeal or 1/3 c. cornflake crumbs
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
lemon wedges (optional)
3 Tbsp. flour
1/4 c. lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 500°.
Soak fillets in equal parts lemon juice and water.
Combine egg whites and water in shallow dish.
Combine flour, salt and pepper in another shallow dish.
Dry fish. Sprinkle each side with flour mix.
Dip in egg whites and dredge in cornmeal.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Sauteed Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. fish fillets (cod, haddock, sole, flounder)
1/2 c. milk
1/2 c. wheat germ
2 shallots, chopped
1 1/2 Tbsp. cold pressed oil
2 1/2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. parsley, minced
1 lemon, cut into wedges
Directions:
Dip fish in
milk,
then in wheat germ.
Saute shallots in oil and butter in
a
skillet
for
2 minutes, then add the fish. Cook briefly, 3 minutes on one side and 2 on the other. Do	not cook
until
the
fish
is dry and comes apart.
When serving, toss
minced
parsley over.
Add lemon wedges on the side.	Serves 4.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Baked Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. lemon pepper
1/2 c. saltine or club style crackers
1/2 c. potato chips
1 lb. crappie fillets
Directions:
Melt the butter and pour into a shallow bowl.
Add the paprika and lemon pepper.
Crush the crackers and the potato chips.
Mix them together in a small bowl and pour the crumbs onto a plate or waxed paper.
Dip the fish fillets in the butter mixture and coat with the crumbs.
Place the fillets in a single layer in a shallow baking pan.
Bake at 350° for 8 minutes for small fillets and 10 minutes for large.
Turn the oven to broil and cook the fish for 5 to 7 minutes or until nicely browned.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Crispy Fish Fillets
Ingredients:
1/4 c. frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
1/4 c. margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. crushed onion flavored crackers
2 lb. fresh fish fillets
Directions:
Combine first four ingredients.
Mix well.
Add 1/4 cup of this mixture to crushed crackers.
Mix well.
Place fish in square baking pan.
Pour lemonade mixture over fish.
Sprinkle with cracker mixture.
Bake at 400° for 25 to 30 minutes, until fish flakes.

question: How do I make crispy fish fillets?
answer:
Title: Fish Fillets Elegant
Ingredients:
1/2 medium onion, sliced
1/2 green pepper, sliced
1 tsp. paprika
2 Tbsp. flour
3 Tbsp. French dressing
2 to 3 drops Tabasco sauce
3 tomatoes, peeled and quartered
1 lb. white fish fillets (sole, catfish, cod, etc.)
Directions:
Put all ingredients, except fish, in blender and blend 15 to 20 seconds.
Place fillets in baking dish and pour on sauce. Cover dish with foil and bake in a 350° oven for 15 minutes.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Scrambled Eggs
Ingredients:
2 eggs
1 Tbsp. butter
salt and pepper
Directions:
Crack eggs in a small bowl.
Mix with a fork.
Melt butter in a frying pan over low heat.
Pour in eggs.
Stir evenly until cooked.
Shake a little salt and pepper to taste.
Careful, not too much!

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Home-Style Scrambled Eggs
Ingredients:
4 eggs
1 Tbsp. instant minced onion or 3 Tbsp. minced onion
3/4 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. water
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1 c. diced tomatoes
1 c. diced cooked potatoes
1 c. diced zucchini or 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
Directions:
Beat eggs, onion, salt and water.
Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir vegetables in butter 2 minutes.
Pour egg mixture over vegetables. As mixture begins to set at bottom and sides, gently lift cooked portions with spatula so that thin, uncooked portion can flow to bottom.
Avoid constant stirring. Cook until eggs are thickened throughout but still moist, 3 to 5 minutes.
Makes 3 servings.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Breakfast Eggs
Ingredients:
1 doz. eggs
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. butter
1 (8 oz.) container sour cream
12 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
Directions:
In a medium bowl, beat eggs.
Stir in milk, salt and pepper; set aside.
In a large skillet over medium heat, melt butter; pour in egg mixture.
Cook, stirring occasionally, until eggs are set but still moist.
Remove from heat to cool.
Stir in sour cream. Spread evenly into buttered 2-quart shallow baking dish (12 x 7-inch).
Top with bacon and cheese.
Cover with foil and refrigerate overnight.
Preheat oven to 300°.
Uncover eggs; bake 15 to 20 minutes or until hot and cheese has melted.
Refrigerate leftovers.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Breakfast Eggs
Ingredients:
1 doz. eggs
1/2 c. milk
1 tbsp. butter
8 oz. sour cream
12 slices of bacon, cooked and crumbled
1 c. shredded sharp cheese, cheddar works best
Directions:
In bowl, beat eggs; stir in milk, salt and pepper.
Set aside. In large skillet over medium to low heat, melt butter, pour in egg mixture.
Cook, stirring occasionally until eggs are set but still moist.
Remove from heat to cool.
Stir in sour cream.

question: How do I make fluffy scrambled eggs?
answer:
Title: Make-Ahead Scrambled Eggs
Ingredients:
5 Tbsp. butter or margarine, divided
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
2 c. milk
2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
1 c. sliced, fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
12 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. salt
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped broccoli, cooked and drained
1 c. soft bread crumbs
Directions:
In a saucepan, melt 2 tablespoons butter. Add flour; cook and stir until the mixture begins to bubble. Gradually stir in milk; bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat. Stir in the cheese until melted; set aside. In a large skillet, saute mushrooms and onion in 2 tablespoons of butter until tender. Add eggs and salt; cook and stir until the eggs are completely set. Add the cheese sauce and broccoli; mix well. Pour into a greased 11 x 7 x 2-inch baking dish.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vinegar Candy
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. vinegar
2 c. sugar
Directions:
Melt butter.
Add sugar and vinegar.
Stir until sugar is dissolved.
Boil mixture until brittle stage.
Pull and cut into small pieces.
Butter plate and wrap later.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Old Fashioned Vinegar Candy
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. vinegar
Directions:
Melt butter in heavy pan; add sugar and vinegar.
Stir until sugar dissolves; wash down sides of pan with pastry brush dipped in cold water.
Boil mixture to brittle stage (256°); pull and cut into small pieces with scissors or knife.
Arrange on buttered plate to cool.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vinegar Rolls
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cider vinegar
1 1/4 c. sugar, divided
1 1/2 c. water
4 tsp. cinnamon, divided
2 c. sifted flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. vegetable shortening
3/4 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Combine vinegar, 1 cup sugar, water and 2 teaspoons cinnamon. Stir until well dissolved and cook over medium heat for 20 minutes.
Set aside.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Vinegar Rolls
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cider vinegar
1 1/2 c. water
1 1/4 c. sugar, divided
4 tsp. cinnamon, divided
2 c. sifted, enriched flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. shortening
3/4 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter/margarine, divided
Directions:
Combine vinegar, water, 1 cup of the sugar and 2 teaspoons of the cinnamon.
Stir over low heat until sugar dissolves.
Cook over medium heat for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a balsamic glaze for vegetables?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Dressing
Ingredients:
1 c. mayonnaise
1/2 c. sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in blender.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Versatile Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
2/3 c. vegetable oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. fresh ground pepper
1 clove garlic, pressed
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a jar.
Cover tightly and shake vigorously.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette (Basic)
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Dijon mustard
scant 1/2 tsp. salt
5 twists of peppermill
2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
scant tsp. fresh lemon juice
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Put mustard in the bottom of a salad bowl.
Stir the first 5 ingredients, whisking constantly.
Add vegetable oil and olive oil in a very thin stream.
Makes 6 tablespoons of vinaigrette, enough for 10 to 12 cups of salad greens.
Use shortly after it is made. Add whatever you like, garlic, anchovies, shallots, sliced mushrooms, chopped capers, etc.
May be used on grilled fish or cold roast beef (add horseradish) or chicken.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Creamy Vinaigrette Dressing
Ingredients:
1/2 c. white wine vinegar
salt and pepper
1 c. olive oil
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a screwtop jar and shake.
Chill.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette For Salad And Tomatoes
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. diced capers
1 tsp. diced tarragon leaves or 1/2 tsp. dry
1/2 medium onion, diced
1/2 medium red onion, diced
1 large dill pickle, diced
1 1/2 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. red wine vinegar
1 c. salad oil
2 dashes Tabasco
2 dashes Worcestershire
salt and fresh ground pepper to taste
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.
This recipe has been used at LeBistro for 20 years.
Spoon over any fresh salad mixture. Also excellent over tomatoes and asparagus with fresh red onion.

question: How do I make a simple vinaigrette?
answer:
Title: Vinaigrette
Ingredients:
1 part Balsamic Vinegar
2 parts Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1/2 tsp Dijon Mustard
3 pinches of Pepper
2 pinches of Kosher Salt
1 pinch of Sugar
Directions:
Whisk all ingredients until oil and vinegar become creamy. Spoon onto salad as needed.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless sirloin steak
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. oyster sauce
cooking spray (vegetable)
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, quartered
3 stalks celery, sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 lb. fresh snow peas
1/2 bunch broccoli flowerets
1 can sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Trim fat
from
steak.
Cut
across
grain into strips. Combine water,
cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar and oyster sauce. Set aside.
Coat wok or skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high for 2
minutes.
Add
steak
and
stir-fry about 3 minutes.
Remove meat.
Place onion, celery, mushrooms, pepper and water chestnuts to
pan drippings in wok.
Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes. Add meat,
broccoli
and snow peas.
Cover and reduce heat to medium.
Simmer
2
to
3
minutes.
Stir in soy sauce mixture.
Cook
on
medium,
stirring constantly until bubbly. Serve over hot rice.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Stir-Fried Beef
Ingredients:
1 lb. round steak, cut 1/4-inch thick
2/3 c. water
1/4 c. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. instant beef bouillon
garlic (1 clove), minced
dash of pepper
2 medium carrots, bias cut
1 small head cauliflower, broken into flowerets
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 c. mushrooms
1 (6 oz.) pkg. frozen pea pods
1/4 c. cold water
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 c. rice (optional)
Directions:
Partially freeze the round steak; thinly slice across the grain into bite-size strips.

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 c. beef, sliced thin (I cut up a sirloin steak)
1 1/2 c. green pepper
2 onions
1 c. broccoli
1 tomato
1/2 c. mushrooms
1/2 c. snow peas
Directions:
May substitute or add other vegetables (carrots, celery or zucchini, etc.).

question: I need a simple recipe for beef stir-fry.
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry American Style
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef chuck, round steak or chicken breast, cut into 1/8-inch slices
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. carrots, sliced diagonally
1 1/2 c. cauliflower, thinly sliced
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas
4 to 6 green onions
1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained (reserve liquid)
1/2 c. cold water
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
In small bowl, combine beef or chicken with soy sauce, sherry and ginger.
Let stand 15 to 30 minutes.
Preheat 1 tablespoon oil in wok, uncovered, at medium-high, about 2 minutes.
Add carrots; stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Add reserved mushroom liquid; cover and steam 4 minutes.
Remove carrots.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Stew
Ingredients:
1 c. dry lentils
1 medium onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
4 c. water
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can cut tomatoes
4 tsp. vegetable bouillon granules
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. salt and thyme
1/4 tsp. fennel seed and pepper
1 bay leaf
2 medium chopped carrots (1 c.)
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach
1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
Directions:
Rinse lentils; set aside.
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven cook onion and garlic until tender, not brown.
Stir in lentils, water, tomatoes, bouillon, Worcestershire sauce, salt, thyme, fennel seed, pepper and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add carrots and frozen spinach. Bring to a boil, breaking up spinach with a fork; reduce heat. Cover and simmer for about 10 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add vinegar; discard bay leaf.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentils And Spinach
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. lentils (1 c.)
1 lb. spinach, chopped
1 onion
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. coriander
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. cumin seed
1/2 tsp. chili powder
lemon juice to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Boil the lentils in 1 pint (2 cups) water until soft (about 25 minutes).
Fry sliced onion and chopped garlic; add spices.
Stir about 2 minutes.
Add cooked lentils and washed and coarsely chopped spinach.
Stir well.
Simmer 10 to 15 minutes.
Add salt and lemon juice.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil-Spinach Soup
Ingredients:
8 c. chicken stock or 48 oz. can stock
2 cloves chopped garlic
1 onion, chopped
3/4 c. chopped carrots
1 c. chopped celery
1 c. lentils
1 bunch spinach
3 Tbsp. lemon juice or vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Wash and pick over lentils.
Place in boiling water and cook 2 minutes.
Cover; let sit 1 hour and drain.
(This removes gas.)

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Salad
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. dried lentils
4 c. water
2 onions, sliced
8 whole cloves
2 bay leaves
2 whole garlic cloves
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. liquid red pepper sauce
3/4 c. oil
1/3 to 1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1/2 c. chopped parsley
2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onion
salad greens
tomato wedges
Directions:
In large saucepan, combine lentils, water, onions, cloves, bay leaves, garlic cloves, 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon red pepper sauce.
Bring to boil, reduce heat and simmer covered for 30 to 40 minutes, until lentils are tender.
Drain.
Add oil, vinegar, parsley, remaining 1 teaspoon salt and remaining 1/2 teaspoon red pepper sauce.
Mix well and cool.
Stir in celery and onion. Cover and chill several hours.
Turn into bowl lined with salad greens; garnish with tomato wedges.

question: What can I cook with lentils and spinach?
answer:
Title: Lentil Soup With Spinach
Ingredients:
1 c. sliced onions
2 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil
1/2 lb. dry lentils
1 lb. frozen, chopped spinach
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
3 c. water
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. grated lemon peel
2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook and stir onions and garlic in oil in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat until onions are tender.
Stir in water, lentils and salt.
Heat to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Cover and simmer 1 hour.
Stir in spinach, lemon peel and lemon juice.
Cover and simmer until spinach is tender, about 5 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 c. cooked or canned pumpkin
2/3 c. orange juice
2 Tbsp. molasses
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
3 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
3/4 to 1 tsp. ground cloves
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped nuts
Directions:
In
mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add the pumpkin, orange juice, molasses and vanilla. Combine dry ingredients. Add to the creamed mixture and mix until well blended. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into two greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3 loaf pans. Bake at 350° for 65 to 75 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes. Remove from pans onto wire racks.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Spiced Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
3/4 c. butter or margarine, softened
2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 Tbsp. molasses
2/3 c. orange juice
2 c. canned or cooked mashed pumpkin
3 1/3 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. ground cinnamon
1 tsp. ground cloves
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins
1 c. chopped pecans
Directions:
Beat butter at medium speed of mixer.
Gradually add sugar; beat well.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add molasses, orange juice and pumpkin.
Combine flour and next 5 ingredients.
Add to creamed mixture; mix until blended.
Stir in vanilla, raisins and nuts.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Bread
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
1 egg, beaten
1/2 c. melted margarine
1 c. pumpkin
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Mix by hand.
Sift dry ingredients together.
Make a well in center.
Add margarine and combine pumpkin, egg and water.
Mix until dry ingredients are moistened.
Pour into greased and floured 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 10 minutes or until done.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Bread
Ingredients:
1 c. oil
4 eggs
1/2 c. cold water
2 c. cooked pumpkin
4 c. white sugar
3 1/2 c. plain flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. soda
1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. cloves
1 c. chopped nuts
2 c. raisins (optional)
Directions:
Oil and flour 4 small loaf pans.
Cream together oil and sugar. Add eggs, one at a time; mix well. Sift dry ingredients and add alternately with water to creamed mixture. Blend in pumpkin, nuts and raisins. Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 15 minutes. You can freeze these; keeps very well.

question: What’s a good recipe for a spiced pumpkin bread?
answer:
Title: Pumpkin Spice Bread
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1 c. vegetable oil
4 eggs, lightly beaten
1 can (16 oz.) solid-packed pumpkin
3 1/2 c. all-purpose flour
2 t. baking soda
1 t. baking powder
1 t. salt
1 t. ground cinnamon
1 t. ground nutmeg
1/2 t. ground cloves
1/2 t. ground allspice
1/2 c. water
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine sugar, oil and eggs.
Add pumpkin and mix well.
Combine dry ingredients; add to the pumpkin mixture alternately with water.
Pour into
two greased 9-in. 5-in.x3-in. loaf pans.
Bake at 350° for 60-70 minutes or until bread tests done.
Cool in pans 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack; cool completely.
Yields 2 loaves.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1/4 c. chopped green onion
1/2 tsp. basil, crumbled
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 c. melted butter
2 tsp. chicken seasoned stock base
2 Tbsp. flour
3/4 c. Chablis or other white wine
1/2 c. half and half
2 whole chicken breasts, halved and boned
1 Tbsp. margarine (for frying)
Directions:
Mix toasted wheat germ, onion, basil and garlic powder into melted butter.
Combine stock base and flour; gradually add wine and half and half.
Stir until smooth.
Add 1 tablespoon of this sauce to wheat germ mixture and set remainder aside.
Place chicken breast on a board, cover with waxed paper and flatten with a mallet.
Place equal amount of wheat germ stuffing in center of each chicken breast.
Roll breasts around stuffing.
Fasten with picks.
Brown chicken and place in a baking dish.
Pour sauce over chicken.
Bake at 400° for 45 to 50 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
4 skinless chicken breasts
1/4 c. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. chopped bell pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
2/3 c. herb-seasoned stuffing mix
1/3 c. water
1/8 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 can cream of chicken soup
2 Tbsp. dry white wine
1 Tbsp. herb-stuffing mix
chopped parsley
Directions:
Flatten chicken breasts with a meat mallet.
Set aside.
Saute onion, green pepper and garlic in 2 tablespoons margarine.
Stir in 2/3 cup stuffing mix, water, salt and pepper.
Spread stuffing mixture evenly on each chicken breast.
Roll up chicken breast. Secure with wooden picks.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
6 skinless and boneless chicken breasts
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 chopped medium onion
1 chopped rib celery
1/4 c. chopped green pepper
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1 peeled carrot, chopped
3/4 c. seasoned bread crumbs
1/2 tsp. oregano
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
parsley, cayenne and paprika
Directions:
Pound breasts between two sheets of Saran Wrap to 1/8-inch thickness.
Saute onion, green pepper, carrot and garlic in butter until soft.
Add bread crumbs and 1/2 cup broth to mixture.
Salt and pepper to taste.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 oz. Mozzarella, diced
3 Tbsp. seasoned bread crumbs
1/4 tsp. salt
6 large boneless chicken breasts (approximately 2 lb.), pounded thin
2 eggs, lightly beaten
3 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. tomato sauce
Directions:
In a medium bowl, thoroughly combine cheese, eggs, crumbs, parsley, salt and pepper.
Place 1/4 cup of cheese mixture in center of each chicken breast.
Roll and secure with a toothpick.

question: How do I make stuffed chicken breasts?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Chicken Breasts
Ingredients:
10 to 12 skinless, deboned chicken breast halves, flattened
salt and pepper to taste (black and cayenne pepper)
parsley flakes
1 jar dried beef or 10 to 12 thin ham slices
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 can celery soup
1 small container sour cream
Directions:
Sprinkle flattened chicken breasts with salt, black and cayenne pepper and parsley flakes.
Place 1 slice of dried beef or ham on top of each breast, trimming to fit.
Roll breasts and place seam side down in buttered casserole dish.
Mix soups together and pour over chicken.
Bake in 350° oven for 45 minutes. Remove breasts to heated platter.
Stir sour cream into sauce. To serve, pour sauce over chicken and rice or pasta.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Cream Cheese - Tuna Bake
Ingredients:
1 c. macaroni
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 can mushroom soup
1 1/2 c. drained tuna
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 Tbsp. mustard
1/4 c. milk
1/2 c. cracker crumbs
Directions:
Cook macaroni and drain.
Soften cream cheese and blend with soup.
Stir in tuna, mustard, milk and macaroni.
Pour into a 1 1/2-quart dish and sprinkle crumbs on top.
Bake at 375° for 20 minutes or until bubbly.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Company Tuna Bake
Ingredients:
1 c. elbow macaroni
1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 small can white tuna, drained and flaked
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/4 c. milk
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
1 1/2 Tbsp. chopped pimento (optional)
2 Tbsp. melted margarine
Directions:
Cook macaroni; drain.
Blend cream cheese and cream of mushroom soup.
Stir in tuna, pimento, onion, mustard, milk and the macaroni.
Put mixture in 1 1/2-quart casserole.
Mix half dry bread crumbs and melted margarine; sprinkle over top.
Bake in moderate 350° oven for 20 to 25 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Pasta Bake
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 garlic clove, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
4 oz. spaghetti (2 c., cooked)
1 can tuna in water, drained and flaked
1/2 c. cooked peas
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 egg, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. wheat germ
Directions:
In small saucepan over medium-high heat, heat oil.
Add onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, about 3 minutes.
Add tomato sauce and oregano; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer, stirring occasionally about 15 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1 pkg. medium egg noodles
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 tomato, sliced
2 (6 1/2 oz.) cans tuna
1 can milk
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cook noodles.
Mix noodles with tuna, soup, milk and cheese. Pour into buttered dish.
Top with bread crumbs.
Bake until golden brown.
Preheat oven to 350°.

question: What’s a recipe for a creamy tuna pasta bake?
answer:
Title: Tuna Bake
Ingredients:
2 c. uncooked macaroni
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
2 cans mushroom soup
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 small jar pimentos
2 small cans tuna, drained
1 c. Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix
2 Tbsp. melted butter
Directions:
Cook and drain macaroni.
Combine next 5 ingredients.
Stir in tuna.
In another bowl, combine stuffing and butter.
In a casserole, alternate layers of macaroni and sauce.
Sprinkle topping over all.
Bake at 375° for 20 to 25 minutes.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
3 egg yolks
1 2/3 c. buttermilk
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. butter
3 egg whites, stiffly beaten
Directions:
Beat egg yolks with rotary beater. Add remaining ingredients except egg whites and beat until smooth. Gently fold in egg whites.
Pour onto hot griddle.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cooking oil or melted butter
2 c. flour
Directions:
Take turns holding the mixer until eggs are fluffy.
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until smooth, but do not overmix. Grease hot griddle with shortening.
Pour batter to make 4 inch pancakes.
Cook until puffed, turn and cook other side until golden brown.
We like to cut them into shapes and spread butter and jelly.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 egg yolks
2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. melted butter
2 egg whites, stiffly beaten
Directions:
Add egg whites last.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 whole egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. Wesson oil
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Sift together flour, baking powder, soda, salt and sugar in 1 bowl.
In another bowl, beat egg.
Add buttermilk, Wesson oil and vanilla.
Stir and add liquid ingredients to dry.
Stir, leaving entire ingredients slightly lumpy.
Bake on hot griddle (greased) until bubbles form.
Turn once and bake other side or place on waffle iron until lightly browned.

question: How do I make fluffy buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
4 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 egg, slightly beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1 3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all dry ingredients.
In separate bowl, add vanilla to eggs and beat slightly.
Add to dry ingredients.
Add milk and mix.
Add melted butter and stir until smooth.
Cook on hot griddle at 400°.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Curried Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. curry powder
2 c. water
2 chicken broth cubes
1 c. uncooked rice
1 c. coconut milk
1/3 c. golden raisins
sliced onions, fried
Directions:
Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Stir in curry powder. Add water and broth cubes and bring to a boil. Add rice, coconut milk and raisins. Stir to blend.
Return to boil and then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Put into a serving dish and garnish with fried onions.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Curried Egg Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. hot White Sauce
1/2 tsp. curry powder
1 1/2 tsp. parsley
1 hard-cooked egg, chopped
Directions:
Blend a little White Sauce with the curry powder.
Stir curry powder mixture, parsley and egg into remaining White Sauce.
Good on spinach, broccoli and asparagus.
Yield:
1 1/4 cups.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
1/2 c. oil
3/4 cube oleo
4 medium onions, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
9 garlic cloves, chopped
handful of celery leaves, chopped
10 dried chili peppers, crushed
1 1/2 tsp. cumin seed, crushed
4 tsp. curry powder
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. cayenne
1/4 tsp. thyme
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
2/3 can tomato sauce
Directions:
Fry on medium-high heat the oil, all spices and celery leaves until absorbed by oil and not powder.
Add tomato sauce and cook until thick.
Skin and cup up chicken and put in large pot. Add sauce to chicken and simmer 20 to 25 minutes.
Add water to not quite halfway to the top of chicken.
Cover and simmer until done.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Chicken Panang Curry
Ingredients:
1 (14 oz.) can Taste of Thai coconut milk
1 Tbsp. Taste of Thai Panang Curry Base
1 lb. boneless chicken, cut in strips
2 Tbsp. Taste of Thai seasoning sauce
2 tsp. lemon juice
1 medium tomato, diced
1 yellow bell pepper, diced
3 scallions, diced
2 c. mushrooms, sliced
2 tsp. Taste of Thai garlic chili pepper sauce (use this cautiously; you might prefer a little less)
Directions:
In a large saucepan, combine coconut milk and curry base and cook until blended over medium heat.
Add chicken, seasoning sauce and lemon juice and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients, except mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce.
Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce to taste.
Cover and simmer for 2 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut curry sauce?
answer:
Title: Sesame Curry Sauce(Use To Brush Over Chicken, Meat Or Fish When Grilling.)
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
2/3 c. oil
1/2 c. honey
1/2 c. vinegar
2 Tbsp. sesame seed
2 tsp. curry powder
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine in a screw-top jar.
Shake well.
Brush over grilled items.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Meat-Less Tacos
Ingredients:
1 small onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
chili powder to taste
cumin (just a pinch)
1/4 c. tomato sauce
3/4 c. water
1 can pinto beans, drained
1 c. quick cooking brown rice
taco shells or tortillas
low-fat grated Cheddar cheese
shredded lettuce
hot sauce
Directions:
Coat a large skillet with cooking spray and heat.
Saute the onion and garlic.
Add chili powder to taste, a pinch of cumin, tomato sauce and water. Bring to a boil, then add beans and rice. Cover and simmer 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand another 5 minutes.
Spoon into taco shells or tortillas and top with cheese, hot sauce and lettuce.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Breakfast Tacos
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 medium potato, cooked and diced
4 eggs, beaten
4 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
4 flour tortillas (8-inch)
3/4 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. Pace picante sauce or thick and chunky salsa
Directions:
In medium skillet over medium heat, heat butter. Add potato and cook until lightly browned. Add eggs and bacon and cook until eggs are set, but still moist. Warm tortillas according to package directions. Spoon about 1/2 cup potato mixture down center of each tortilla. Top with cheese and picante sauce. Roll up.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Authentic Tacos
Ingredients:
3 1/2 lb. lean, boneless beef, pork or chicken
flour
water
1/2 bell pepper strips
3/4 c. chopped onion
1 bay leaf
1 1/2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 small can tomato sauce
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. cumin
1 jalapeno pepper, chopped
Directions:
Roll meat in flour and place in stock pot filled with 1/4-inch water.
Brown meat and cook on low heat for about 30 minutes.
Then roll up and heat to high and add remaining ingredients.
Cook 1 hour longer until meat is shredding.
Serve in flour tortillas and garnish with lettuce and picante sauce.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Chicken Tacos
Ingredients:
2 tsp. vegetable oil
1/2 c. sliced onion
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 medium tomato, chopped
1/2 c. tomato sauce
dash of hot sauce
dash of oregano leaves
dash of salt
dash of pepper
4 oz. skinned, boned and cooked chicken, diced
2 taco shells
1 oz. Cheddar cheese, shredded
lettuce
Directions:
In a 9 or 10-inch skillet, heat oil.
Add onion and garlic and saute until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add tomato, tomato sauce and seasonings.
Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes.
Add chicken and cook until heated through. Divide chicken mixture into taco shells, then top with cheese and lettuce.

question: How do I make crispy fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Trimmed-Down Taco Bake
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. extra lean ground beef, crumbled
1/2 c. green pepper, washed, seeded, cored, ends removed and chopped
1/2 c. onion, peeled, ends removed and chopped
12 oz. canned pinto beans, rinsed and drained
6 oz. tomato sauce
1/2 c. salsa
2 tsp. chili powder
1/2 c. sour cream or low-fat substitute
1/3 c. reduced fat Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 c. unsalted tortilla chips, coarsely crushed
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
In a 10-inch deep dish style microwave-safe pie plate, combine ground beef, green pepper and onion.
Microwave on High for 4 to 5 minutes, or until meat is no longer pink, stirring once to break meat apart.
Remove from microwave and drain.
Add beans, tomato sauce, salsa and chili powder; mix well and set aside.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Frittata
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. margarine
1/2 c. chopped peeled potato
1/3 c. sliced zucchini
1/3 c. onion, sliced in rings
8 oz. frozen egg substitute, thawed
4 oz. (1/2 c.) cooked chicken or turkey, cubed
1/2 tsp. dried basil, crumbled
1/2 tsp. dried dill, crumbled
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
You will also need nonstick cooking spray.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Frittata
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. oil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 zucchini, sliced
2 carrots, sliced
1/2 onion, diced
3 red potatoes, chopped into small cubes
8 eggs
3 Tbsp. whipping cream or water
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet, saute over medium heat all ingredients but eggs and cream until tender (about 8 minutes). Remove from heat. Beat eggs and cream in a bowl.
Put skillet back on heat. Pour egg mixture over vegetables. Do not stir. Cook until eggs are softly set.
Cover the mixture until the top sets. Salt and pepper to taste.
Can add Parmesan cheese for added touch. Can also add imitation crab meat for special touch.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Western Style Frittata
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
4 oz. Canadian bacon, sliced and cut into strips
2 medium onions, sliced
1 bell pepper, chopped (optional)
7 eggs
1 1/2 c. grated Swiss cheese
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
season with pepper to taste
Directions:
In a 10-inch nonstick skillet, heat 2 tablespoons butter over low heat; add bacon and cook.
Add onions and green pepper, stirring frequently; cook about 5 minutes.
In medium bowl, beat eggs, cheese, pepper and bacon mixture until combined.
Melt 2 more tablespoons butter; add to egg mixture.
Cook on low heat until bottom is set.
Place in a preheated 300° oven.
Cook until desired consistency is reached, about 20 to 30 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Garden Frittata
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. broccoli
1 c. sliced carrots
4 eggs
4 Egg Beaters
1 c. nonfat cottage cheese
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 c. sliced mushrooms
6 thin slices tomato
1 Tbsp. Parmesan
Directions:
Steam broccoli and carrots for 10 minutes.
Beat together eggs, Egg Beaters, cottage cheese, salt and pepper.
Stir in carrots and broccoli and mushrooms.
Spray 10-inch round pan with Pam.
Pour in egg mixture.
Bake at 350° until eggs are cooked and knife inserted in center comes out almost clean.
Top with tomatoes; sprinkle with Parmesan.
Broil 1 to 2 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for a simple frittata?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Frittata
Ingredients:
4 1/2 tsp. olive oil
1/4 c. chopped onion
6 eggs
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
3/4 c. (3 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
dash of red pepper
dash of nutmeg
Directions:
Heat 3 teaspoons oil in skillet.
Add onion; cook until tender.
Remove onion and set aside.
Lightly beat eggs in bowl. Add onion, spinach, cheese and seasonings.
Heat 1 1/2 teaspoons oil in same skillet; add egg mixture.
Cook 5 minutes or until browned lightly.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Delight
Ingredients:
1 c. light cream
1 1/2 Tbsp. butter
3 chopped hard-boiled eggs
1 Tbsp. minced parsley
dash of cayenne pepper
1 1/4 c. canned salmon, flaked
4 slices buttered toast or patty shells
Directions:
Place top chafing pan in water jacket.
When heated, put in cream, eggs, butter, cayenne and parsley.
While it's steaming, add drained salmon.
Heat through well.
Do not let it boil. Serve on toast or patties.
A dash of sherry is optional.
Serves 4.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Spread
Ingredients:
1 envelope unflavored gelatin
1/2 c. boiling water
4 oz. cream cheese, cut up
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 (8 oz.) can salmon, drained and flaked
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
12 pimento-stuffed green olives, chopped
Directions:
Blend together gelatin and water.
Add cream cheese, mayo, vinegar and salmon.
Blend all together and add green pepper and olives.
Blend together and pour into a 3-cup mold.
Refrigerate until set.
Unmold and sprinkle with paprika.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Medley
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked salmon or canned, flaked
2 boiled potatoes, diced
2 Tbsp. green, yellow and/or red sweet peppers, chopped
1/4 c. onion, chopped
pinch of cayenne pepper
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. parsley, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. heavy cream
Directions:
In a bowl, combine all ingredients, except olive oil and cream.
In a skillet, heat olive oil.
Add salmon mixture and flatten with back of a spatula.
When the mixture begins to develop a crust on the bottom, flip over with spatula.
Add cream and turn up heat to thicken sauce and brown other side quickly. Garnish with avocado slices and add salsa to taste.
Makes 2 servings.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Warwick Molded Salmon
Ingredients:
1 c. milk
1 c. bread crumbs
1 lb. can salmon
3 eggs, beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 c. heavy cream or sour cream
1 1/2 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
1 cucumber
dash of cayenne pepper
Directions:
Combine milk and crumbs and cook until texture is smooth. Flake salmon; remove skin and bones.
Combine milk mixture, salmon, eggs, salt and lemon juice and pour into an oiled loaf pan (approximately 5 x 9-inch).
Place filled loaf pan in a larger pan of hot water and bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Unmold and serve with cucumber sauce.

question: What can I make with salmon and couscous?
answer:
Title: Salmon Spread
Ingredients:
2 cans (15 oz.) salmon, drained, boned and flaked
1 Tbsp. minced onion
1 Tbsp. prepared horseradish
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
2 1/2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. sour cream
fresh dill or parsley (optional)
toasted bread rounds or crackers
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine first 8 ingredients; mix well. Spread on a serving platter and shape into a loaf or ball.
Top with sour cream.
Garnish with dill or parsley if desired.
Serve with bread rounds or crackers.
Yields 8 to 10 appetizer servings.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Croutons
Ingredients:
4 slices firm bread *
1 1/2 oz. unsalted butter
1 tsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
*Stack slices and trim off crusts.
Cut bread into 1/2-inch cubes.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Homemade Croutons
Ingredients:
1 loaf day-old French, sourdough, wheat, or multi-grain bread
3/4 c. olive oil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 275°.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Croutons
Ingredients:
8 slices loaf bread
1/4 c. butter
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. parsley (if desired)
Directions:
Put bread on a cookie sheet and let "stale" in a warm oven, turning frequently, or you can leave bread out on countertop for about 5 hours and let "stale."
Melt butter.
Add garlic powder, salt and parsley.
Brush butter mixture on both sides of bread. Cut bread into cubes.
Bake at 325° until bread is toasty brown on bottom.
Turn bread over and brown on the other side.
Leftover croutons keep well in a Tupperware bowl.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Homemade Croutons
Ingredients:
1 loaf French bread, sliced 1/4-inch thick
butter
garlic powder
Directions:
Spread butter evenly on bread slices, taking to edges of bread. Sprinkle with garlic powder and cut into cubes. Bake at 350° until crispy. Store in airtight bags. Will keep for several days.

question: How do I make homemade croutons?
answer:
Title: Herbed Croutons
Ingredients:
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. oregano
2 Tbsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. basil
4 Tbsp. cooking oil
6 c. dry bread cubes (day old bread is best)
Directions:
Mix cheese, oregano, garlic powder, basil, salt and pepper; set aside.
Toss bread cubes in a large bowl with the oil; then add cheese-herb mixture.
Toss thoroughly.
Spread on an ungreased cookie sheet.
Bake at 225° for 45 minutes to an hour, turning occasionally, until light golden and crisp.
Cool.
Store in plastic bags with tie or in jars with tight lids.
Will keep about one month.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Boiled Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
water
salt (brings water to a boil quicker)
Directions:
Put eggs in single layer in saucepan.
Add enough tap water to cover eggs about 1 inch.
Quickly bring water to boiling.
Boil on medium to high heat 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove from heat.
