Let eggs stand covered in the hot water 10-15 minutes for large eggs. Run cold water over eggs until cooled.
To remove shell, gently tap all over.
Roll egg between the hands to loosen shell, then peel, starting at large end.
Hold egg under running cold water or dip in bowl of water to help ease off shell.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Hard-Boiled Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
2 Tbsp. vinegar
water (to cover)
Directions:
Place eggs in saucepan just large enough to accommodate all. Cover with water right out of top.
Add the vinegar.
Bring to boil slowly over medium heat.
Boil 1 minute.
Remove from heat. Cover and let stand 10 minutes.
Cool with running water.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Egg Song
Ingredients:
eggs
Directions:
For perfect soft-boiled eggs, sing "Onward Christian Soldiers" once; for medium boiled eggs, sing twice.
For hard-boiled, sing three times.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: How To Boil Eggs
Ingredients:
eggs
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. white vinegar
Directions:
Put eggs in saucepan with fitted lid.
Cover with 1 inch cold water.
Add salt and white vinegar.
Bring to boil and cook, covered, one minute.
Turn off heat and let set in water for 15 minutes.
Eggs will be easy to peel and will have no green color.

question: How do I make a perfect soft-boiled egg?
answer:
Title: Boiled Egg
Ingredients:
paper drinking cups
eggs
water
Directions:
Place
an
unbroken
egg in a paper drinking cup.
Fill the cup with
water and set it on a bed of coals.
Allow it to boil to your taste.
The cup won't burn.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. evaporated milk
3 Tbsp. melted butter
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 c. peeled, cooked and mashed sweet potatoes (don't use canned)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Pour into 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Top with topping.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 c. mashed sweet potatoes
1 c. sugar
1 c. brown sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
1/2 stick butter, melted
1/2 c. milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Combine and beat well.
Pour in casserole dish.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Fancy Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 c. sweet potatoes, baked ahead and mashed well
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1/3 c. butter
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. coconut
1 c. chopped nuts
1 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. melted butter
Directions:
Combine sweet potatoes, 1 cup sugar, milk, butter, eggs and vanilla.
Blend well by hand or mixer.
Pour into baking dish.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Dish
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked, mashed potatoes
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
4 Tbsp. soft margarine
1/2 c. milk or orange juice
1 tsp. vanilla
1/3 c. flour
1 c. brown sugar
4 Tbsp. margarine, softened
1 c. pecans or walnuts, chopped
bit of cinnamon
1 small can crushed pineapple (optional)
Directions:
Combine sweet potatoes (mashed) with first 5 ingredients. Place in buttered 2-quart casserole.
Mix remaining ingredients (except pineapple) for topping with fork until crumbled and sprinkle over potato mixture.
Bake in a 350° oven for 35 minutes or until brown.
Sprinkle with crushed pineapple.
Serves 8 to 10.

question: How can I make roasted sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 c. mashed sweet potatoes, cooked first
3 eggs
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 stick butter or oleo
pinch of salt
Directions:
Mix together and put in baking dish.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant In Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
4 c. fresh eggplant, peeled and cubed
2 medium white onions, chopped
1 small green pepper, chopped
3 garlic cloves, crushed
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 medium tomatoes, seeded and cubed
1 bay leaf
1 chicken bouillon cube
1 tsp. vinegar
1/2 tsp. oregano
3 Tbsp. tomato paste
Directions:
In a large skillet, saute the eggplant, onions, pepper, garlic and salt in the olive oil.
Add tomatoes, bay leaf, dissolved chicken bouillon cube, vinegar and oregano.
Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add tomato paste and mix well.
Cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Remove the lid, stir and discard bay leaf. Serve hot.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Tomato And Eggplant Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (1 1/2 lb.) eggplant
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
1 finely chopped onion
1/2 tsp. oregano leaves
1/2 c. crumbled saltines
6 medium tomatoes, sliced
1/2 c. grated cheese
Directions:
Boil eggplant in water and salt (sliced); drain and mash. Blend eggs, pepper, onion, oregano and saltines.
Slice tomatoes and spread over top, then sprinkle cheese.
Bake in a buttered casserole for 25 minutes at 375°.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Fried Green Tomatoes Or Eggplant
Ingredients:
1 eggplant or 6 green tomatoes
1 egg, beaten
flour
Directions:
Peel eggplant or cut off ends of green tomatoes; cut into thin slices.
Soak eggplant for 10 minutes in salted water.
Dip in egg; roll in flour.
Fry in hot oil in skillet until brown.
Drain on absorbent paper; serve.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant In Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
2 unpeeled eggplants
olive oil
1 onion, chopped
1/2 pepper, chopped (green)
3 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 can tomato sauce
2 diced tomatoes
3 diced and fried potatoes (optional)
Directions:
Slice eggplants.
Wash slices and sprinkle with salt.
Let sit aside.
Later, squeeze water out of eggplant and brown lightly in olive oil.
Set aside.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and tomatoes?
answer:
Title: Eggplant In Spicy Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant (about 1 1/2 lb.)
9 Tbsp. vegetable oil (approximately)
1 piece fresh ginger (1 1/2 x 1-inch), peeled and coarsely chopped
6 medium-size garlic cloves, peeled
1 tsp. whole fennel seed
1 tsp. whole cumin seed
3 medium-size tomatoes, chopped
1 Tbsp. ground coriander
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground turmeric
1/8 to 1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Preheat broiler.
Halve eggplant lengthwise and then cut crosswise into 1/2-inch slices.
Brush slices on both sides with about 3 tablespoons of the oil and arrange them in a single layer in large broiling tray.
Broil 3 inches from heat source, about 7 minutes; turn with spatula and broil another 7 minutes, or until eggplant is nicely browned.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Italian Style Kale
Ingredients:
1 (1 lb.) pkg. fresh kale
1 medium can tomatoes, crushed
6 medium potatoes or small new potatoes
1 onion, sliced
salt and pepper to taste
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
Boil kale; drain.
Place in pan with crushed tomatoes, olive oil, chopped onion, potatoes (halved), salt and pepper.
Cook until tender.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Kris Kringles
Ingredients:
1 c. light Karo syrup
1 c. sugar
1 c. peanut butter
6 c. Rice Krispies
1 c. chocolate chips
1 c. butterscotch chips
Directions:
Mix together Karo syrup and sugar in a large saucepan; bring to a boil.
Add peanut butter; stir until well blended.
In a large bowl, mix the peanut butter mixture with the Rice Krispies. Stir to coat.
Press into a 9 x 13-inch pan; cool.
Melt chocolate chips and butterscotch chips in a double boiler.
Frost the Rice Krispie mixture with the melted chips.
When cool, cut into squares.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Kale Greens
Ingredients:
3 qt. water
3 lb. kale
1/4 lb. seasoning meat (fat back, lean salt pork, ham or smoked turkey pieces)
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. crushed red pepper
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place the meat in the water with the red pepper.
Cook with lid on for about 1 1/2 hours or until meat is tender.
Wash kale several times.
Trim off the root and heavier part of the leaf. Remove meat and put the kale in; cook until tender.
Replace the meat on top and heat thoroughly.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Oven-Roasted Vegetables
Ingredients:
10 c. mixed vegetables, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces (try onions, carrots, potatoes, eggplant, mushrooms and zucchini)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. melted butter
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. dried or fresh rosemary
1 1/2 tsp. dried or 1 Tbsp. fresh marjoram
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 375°.
Arrange the vegetables in a large oiled baking dish and toss in the oil, butter, garlic and herbs. Cover tightly with aluminum foil and bake for 35 minutes.
Uncover and turn the vegetables with a large spoon.
Add salt and pepper and roast at 425° for approximately 30 minutes or until the carrots and potatoes are thoroughly cooked and the edges of the vegetables have browned.
Serves 5.

question: How do I make crispy roasted kale chips?
answer:
Title: Kale And Red Peppers
Ingredients:
1 tsp. canola or olive oil
1 red pepper, seeded and diced
1/2 hot chili pepper, seeded and diced
1 1/2 c. low sodium broth
1 1/2 lb. kale, mustard or turnip greens, cut steams, wash and drain
1 garlic clove, minced
Directions:
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven, combine oil, red peppers, garlic and chili pepper.
Saute over medium heat for 2 or 3 minutes, stirring until peppers are tender.
Stir in chicken broth and kale, mustard or turnip greens.
Bring to a boil, then toss greens in pan and cover with liquid.
Reduce heat to medium and cook 25 minutes or until greens are tender.
Serves 4. Contains 0 cholesterol and 2 grams fat.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 large butternut squash, halved
3 Tbsp butter
1/4 tsp cinnamon
1/4 tsp nutmeg
1/8 tsp cloves
1 Tbsp sugar
3 Tbsp olive oil
1 onion chopped
2 Idaho potatoes, peeled and chopped into large pieces
8 c chicken stock (or water + bouillon cubes)
1/4 c heavy cream (optional)
salt and white pepper to taste
Directions:
In a preheated, 400 degree oven, roast the butternut squash with the seasonings, butter and sugar, until soft and browned. Remove from oven and scoop squash from rind.
In a soup pot, heat olive oil and saute onions.
When translucent, add potatoes and squash flesh.
Cover with chicken stock and simmer until potatoes are soft.
Remove from heat and puree with stick blender or in an upright blender.
Return to soup pot and add heavy cream.
Season to taste.
Enjoy!

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
4 c. cubed, peeled butternut squash
2 c. water
2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 chopped fresh basil leaves or 1 tsp. dried
3 sprigs marjoram or 1 tsp. dried
2 Tbsp. cooking wine
2 bay leaves
2 bouillon cubes
1 tsp. dried coriander
1 tsp. powdered cardamom
Directions:
Cook the squash in water with herbs and bouillon cubes.
Saute onion and garlic.
Add to squash and puree in a processor.
Return to pan.
Add broth, soy sauce and cooking wine.
Cook for 5 minutes.
Remove bay leaves.
If the soup is too thin, thicken with 1 to 3 tablespoons cornstarch moistened in 1 to 3 tablespoons water.
Serves 4.
Serve warm or cold with a dollop of sour cream or yogurt.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1 butternut squash
1 small chopped onion
fresh parsley, chopped
1 can cream of chicken soup
1/2 pt. heavy cream
2 to 3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Saute onion.
Cut up squash; boil with 1 tablespoon sugar until soft.
Add onion to chicken soup.
Add chopped parsley and onions.
Drain and mash squash and add to soup mixture.
Put through blender briefly.
Add cream and melted butter.
Stir briefly.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. squash, peeled and seeded
1 Tbsp. margarine
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. curry
1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
3 (10 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth
1 c. water
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 Tbsp. creamy peanut butter
1/2 c. cream or evaporated milk
Directions:
Saute onion until wilted.
Add garlic.
Cut squash into 1-inch cubes.
Put into soup pot.
Add chicken broth, water and nutmeg; boil until squash is tender.
Remove from heat.
Add curry and pepper; stir.
Stir in Worcestershire sauce and peanut butter. Whirl mix in blender or food processor, adding cream or evaporated milk.
Reheat.
Makes 2 1/2 quarts.
Freezes well.

question: How do I make a simple butternut squash soup?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Soup
Ingredients:
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. margarine
1 Tbsp. minced fresh ginger
2 large carrots, peeled and sliced (about 1 c.)
2 medium butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cut into chunks (about 2 lb. each)
40 saltine crackers
1 c. chopped onions
3 c. apple juice
2 tsp. curry powder
Directions:
In large saucepan, over medium-high heat, cook carrots, onions and garlic in margarine until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add ginger, curry, cinnamon and nutmeg; cook for 1 minute.
Add squash and apple juice.
Heat to a boil.
Cover; reduce heat.
Simmer for 15 minutes or until squash is tender. In blender or food processor container, puree soup, in batches, until smooth.
Return to saucepan; heat through.
Serve hot or chilled with crackers. Makes 8 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooker Brisket
Ingredients:
1 trimmed beef brisket (6 or 8 lb.)
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
1 (8 oz.) can applesauce or equivalent
1/2 small can tomato paste
1/4 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. packed brown sugar
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Place brisket in crock-pot, cutting meat if necessary to fit into pot. In a bowl, stir together all other ingredients and pour over meat. Cover; cook on low heat setting about 10 hours or until meat is tender.
Remove meat, reserving juices; cover to keep warm.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Beef Brisket
Ingredients:
4 lb. beef brisket
1 c. catsup
1 c. water
1/2 onion, minced
2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
1 Tbsp. prepared horseradish
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Mix catsup, water, onion, vinegar, horseradish, mustard, salt and pepper.
Place brisket, fat side up, in shallow dish.
Cover and refrigerate several hours or overnight.
Roast in a preheated oven at 300° until tender (3 1/2 to 4 hours).
Slice against the grain and serve with sauce.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Brisket Of Beef With Hunters Sauce
Ingredients:
3 1/2 to 4 lb. brisket, trimmed
1 pkg. onion soup mix
1 1/4 c. water
1/2 lb. chopped mushrooms
3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. fresh minced green onion
1/2 c. dry white cooking wine
3 Tbsp. flour
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
pinch of dried tarragon
pinch of dried chervil
1 1/2 c. skimmed meat juice
2 beef bouillon cubes
Directions:
Place brisket in 2 layers of heavy-duty foil.
Sprinkle 1/2 package soup mix over meat.
Add 1/2 cup water.
Seal tightly. Bake 4 hours at 300°.
Refrigerate meat and juices separately.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Beef Brisket Pot Roast
Ingredients:
4 lb. boneless fresh brisket beef
1 large onion, coarsely chopped
salt and black pepper
all-purpose flour
water
vegetables of choice
Directions:
Heat large heavy pot.
Add meat.
Brown on all sides without oil.
Pour off any fat.
Sprinkle onion around meat.
Cover tightly.
Cook over low heat for 1 hour.
Remove from heat.
Keep covered and let meat cool to lukewarm.
When cool, slice across grain for serving.
Return meat to pot.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer 1 to 2 hours longer or until tender, turning slices once.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef brisket?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Beef Brisket
Ingredients:
1 (6 lb.) beef brisket
1 large onion, sliced 1/2 inch thick
1 bay leaf
16 whole cloves
garlic salt to taste
1 tsp. salt
2 c. ketchup
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. light brown sugar
2 tsp. dry mustard
Directions:
Place meat in large kettle.
Add onion, bay leaf, cloves, garlic salt and salt.
Cover with water.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for approximately 4 hours or until meat is tender. Drain liquid.
Cool.
Trim excess fat.
Chill in refrigerator, then slice in thin slices.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Lemon Glaze
Ingredients:
1 c. unsifted confectioners sugar
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
In small bowl, blend together until smooth.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Baked Onions With Balsamic Vinegar
Ingredients:
6 medium Vidalia or Texas sweet onions, peeled
1/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
2 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar (no substitute)
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Cut off roots and stem ends of onions.
Using a sharp knife one should make a deep "X" on top of each onion, cutting halfway down. Place each onion on a 6 x 6-inch piece of aluminum foil with "X" up.
Bring up corners of each square.
Top each with 1 teaspoon olive oil.
Twist foil together tightly to completely enclose onions.
Place twist up on a large baking sheet.
Bake 40 minutes at 350° until tender.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Glaze For Pork
Ingredients:
1/2 c. dark corn syrup
1 Tbsp. vinegar
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
You can add a little chickory if smoke flavor is desired.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Old-Fashioned Vinegar Rolls
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cider vinegar
1 1/2 c. water
1 1/4 c. sugar, divided
4 tsp. cinnamon, divided
2 c. sifted, enriched flour
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
1/3 c. shortening
3/4 c. milk
4 Tbsp. butter/margarine, divided
Directions:
Combine vinegar, water, 1 cup of the sugar and 2 teaspoons of the cinnamon.
Stir over low heat until sugar dissolves.
Cook over medium heat for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make a homemade balsamic glaze?
answer:
Title: Mustard-Balsamic Vinegar Sauce(For Beef, Chicken Or Pork)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/4 c. chicken broth
2 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
1 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
desired meat
Directions:
In a heavy skillet over medium-high heat, add olive oil and cook meat to desired doneness.
Remove meat and keep warm.
To skillet, add chicken broth, balsamic vinegar and mustard.
Over medium-high heat, heat mixture to boiling, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom of the pan until browned bits are dissolved and mixture reduces slightly.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey-Vegetable Chili
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. olive oil
15 oz. ground turkey
1 1/2 c. chopped onion
1 c. chopped bell pepper
2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 clove garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
2 c. coarsely chopped tomatoes with juice
1/4 c. raisins
2 Tbsp. no-salt-added tomato paste
2 Tbsp. drained, canned, diced mild green chilies
1/4 tsp. salt
4 oz. rinsed, drained, canned kidney beans
1 c. frozen corn kernels
Directions:
Warm 2 teaspoons oil until hot, but not smoking.
Add the turkey and brown.
Put turkey aside and drain.
Add remaining 2 teaspoons oil to pan and saute onions and bell pepper until golden (3 to 5 minutes).
Stir in chili powder, garlic and cumin.
Cook, stirring, for 1/2 to 1 minute.
Add the next 5 ingredients.
Add turkey and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the kidney beans and corn.
Cook about 5 minutes until last ingredients are heated through.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
canola oil
1 lb. lean ground raw turkey
1 c. chopped celery
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz.) can V-8 juice
1 (16 oz.) can red kidney beans, drained
1 bay leaf
2 Tbsp. dried minced onion
1 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. instant beef bouillon granules
1/2 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper (optional)
1/2 to 1 c. beer (optional)
Directions:
Spray cold pan with canola oil.
Cook turkey and celery.
Use a meat fork to break turkey into pieces.
Cook until no longer pink.
Stir in remaining ingredients, tomatoes, juice, sauce, beans, spices and beef, if desired.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer at least 30 minutes.
Stir occasionally.
Discard bay leaf.
Serves 4.
Can be doubled easily.
(Serving has 4 grams of fat and 380 calories.)

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground turkey
3 medium onions, chopped
1/2 tsp. instant minced garlic
2 (15 oz. each) cans tomatoes
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth
1 medium green pepper, seeded and chopped
1 medium red pepper, seeded and chopped
1 medium yellow pepper, seeded and chopped
2 (4 oz. each) cans diced green chilies, drained
2 tart apples, chopped
3 Tbsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. cocoa
1 1/2 tsp. curry powder
1 tsp. cinnamon
2 Tbsp. bottled hot pepper sauce
2 (15 oz. each) cans kidney beans, drained
1 c. slivered almonds
shredded cheese (optional)
Directions:
Cook turkey, onions and garlic in Dutch oven over medium flame; drain.
Add remaining ingredients except kidney beans, almonds and cheese.
Bring to a boil over high flame.
Reduce flame to simmer, cover and cook 1 hour.
Add kidney beans and almonds.
Simmer an additional 30 minutes.
Garnish with shredded cheese, if desired.
Makes 8 to 10 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. ground white turkey meat
2 c. chopped onion
1 green pepper, chopped
1 clove garlic, crushed
2 Tbsp. crushed red pepper flakes
3 Tbsp. chili powder
2 tsp. ground cumin
1/2 tsp. dried oregano
2 (16 oz.) cans tomatoes, chopped (undrained)
1 (8 oz.) can tomato paste
1 (12 oz.) can corn
2 tsp. salt
2 (16 oz.) cans red kidney beans (undrained)
Directions:
Brown turkey with onion, green pepper, chili powder and garlic.
Drain off any grease.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey chili?
answer:
Title: Turkey Chili
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 pkg. Chili-O mix
1/2 c. water
1 can chili beans with sauce (Joan of Arc brand)
1 (16 oz.) can whole peeled tomatoes, mashed
1 (8 oz.) can V-8 juice
salt and pepper to taste
chili powder to taste
1 medium onion, chopped and 1 medium green pepper, chopped (optional)
Directions:
In a nonstick pan over high heat, brown turkey meat.
Onion and green pepper may be added at this time, if desired. Add V-8 juice, Chili-O mix and water, stirring well. Reduce heat and add the tomatoes, chili powder, salt and pepper. Stir well and cook 10 minutes on low heat, covered. Add chili beans and cook another 10 minutes. Serve alone or over noodles.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: My Favorite Apple Pie
Ingredients:
2 1/2 lb. tart apples, peeled and sliced (8 c.)
1 1/2 c. light brown sugar
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 stick butter or margarine, melted
1/2 tsp. apple pie spice
1 c. apple juice
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients in a large bowl.
Add apples, mix well. Line a 10 or 12-inch baking dish with pastry, add apple mixture. Pour apple juice around edge (not on apples).
Cover with top pastry, sealing edges.
Cut slits in top.
Brush with margarine, sprinkle with white sugar.
Bake at 425° for 40 minutes or until juice bubbles through slits.
This is a deep-dish pie.
Pan must be at least two inches deep.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
3/4 c. sugar
1/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
6 c. tart apples, thinly sliced
3 Tbsp. margarine
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 c. milk or cream
1 Tbsp. milk
Directions:
Mix both the regular and brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, salt and nutmeg. Spread 1/3 of apples in unbaked deep-dish pie crust. Spread 1/3 of filling on top. Repeat. Pour 1/4 cup milk in center and dot with margarine. Top with an unbaked crust. Brush crust with 1 tablespoon milk. Bake at 375° for 1 hour.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
4 cut up apples
1 c. water
2 Tbsp. butter
1 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
2 rounded Tbsp. Clear Jell
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Cook apples and water and stir in remaining ingredients.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
6 c. peeled, sliced apples
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. plain flour
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
2 pie shells
2 Tbsp. butter
small amount of milk
cinnamon-sugar
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour, spices and dash of salt.
Mix with peeled, sliced apple.
Fill pie shell with apple mixture.
Dot with butter.
Cover pie with another pie shell and crimp edges together.
Cut slits in top.
Brush pie top with milk.
Sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar.
Place pie on inverted iron skillet in a 400° oven and bake for 50 minutes.
(This will make a crisp bottom crust.)

question: What’s a recipe for a classic apple pie?
answer:
Title: Apple Pie
Ingredients:
1 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. lemon juice
5 c. thinly sliced apples
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
Directions:
Combine sugar, flour, spices, salt and lemon juice.
Add apples; toss to mix.
Roll out pastry dough for crust and top.
Cut vents in top piece.
Line pie pan with pastry and cut off overhang. Fill with half the apples and dot with butter.
Add remaining apples.
Moisten rim with water.
Adjust top crust.
Leave about 1/2-inch pastry beyond edge.
Fold in under lower pastry.
Seal rim by pressing together and flute it.
Brush with milk.
Bake at 400° for 50 to 60 minutes or until apples test done with fork.
For a single crust, use a 425° oven.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 head iceberg lettuce
1/2 head romaine lettuce
1 head Boston or bibb lettuce
1 small bunch chicory
2 medium tomatoes, peeled and seeded
2 whole chicken breasts, cooked or baked
6 strips bacon, crisp
1 avocado
3 eggs, hard-boiled
2 Tbsp. chives, chopped
1/2 c. Bleu cheese, crumbled
1 c. French dressing
Directions:
Chop all greens; dice tomatoes, also finely dice chicken, avocado and eggs.
Add rest of ingredients and toss with the dressing.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Classic Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
2 skinless, boneless chicken breasts (4 to 5 oz. each)
olive oil
Emeril's Original Essence
1/2 lb. diced bacon
1/2 c. extra-virgin olive oil
3 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1/2 lb. Maytag Blue cheese
salt and freshly round black pepper
2 heads bibb lettuce, washed, cored, patted dry and thinly sliced
1 large, ripe avocado, peeled, pitted and diced
1 beefsteak tomato, peeled, seeded and chopped
2 large hard-boiled eggs, peeled and thinly sliced
Directions:
Preheat the grill. Drizzle the chicken breasts with olive oil, then season with the Essence. Grill the chicken until the juices run clear, about 4 minutes per side.
Remove from the grill; cool and dice. Cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until just crispy, 6 to 8 minutes. Remove from the skillet and drain on paper towels. Whisk the olive oil and lemon juice in a mixing bowl. Whisk in 1/4 pound of the Blue cheese, a handful at a time. Season with salt and pepper. Toss the lettuce in a large bowl with the dressing.
Season the avocado, tomatoes and eggs with salt and pepper.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: California Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
1/2 head Boston bibb lettuce
1/2 bunch watercress (optional)
1/2 head romaine
2 medium tomatoes, diced
2 half breasts cooked chicken, diced
6 strips crisply cooked bacon, crumbled
1 ripe avocado, diced
2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
1/3 c. Blue cheese, crumbled (optional)
oil and vinegar dressing
salt and pepper
Directions:
Shred lettuce, watercress and romaine fine; place in a large salad bowl.
Arrange diced tomatoes, chicken, crumbled bacon, diced avocado, diced eggs and crumbled Blue cheese in strips across salad greens.
Just before serving, toss with enough vinagrette dressing to moisten salad and salt and pepper.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: Cobb Salad
Ingredients:
2 chicken breast halves, cooked and cut up
6 c. finely shredded lettuce
1/4 c. crumbled Blue cheese
8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
4 green onions (with tops), sliced
3 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
2 medium tomatoes, chopped
1 avocado, peeled and sliced
Lemon Vinaigrette (recipe follows)
Directions:
Divide lettuce among 4 plates.
Arrange chicken and remaining ingredients, except Vinaigrette, in rows over lettuce.
Serve with Lemon Vinaigrette.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic cobb salad?
answer:
Title: `Over-Night' Layered Salad
Ingredients:
1 head iceberg lettuce (cut into bite sized pieces)
1/2 cup diced green onions
1 cup thinly sliced celery
1 small can sliced water chestnuts (finely chopped)
1 pkg. frozen peas
2 cups mayonnaise
2 tsp. sugar
1/2 cup Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. season salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 lb. sliced bacon (fried and crumbled)
3 hard boiled eggs (sliced)
2 medium tomatoes (sliced, to be arranged on top)
Directions:
Layer above ingredients, in order listed.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
2 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium yellow onion, peeled and cut into 1/8's
2 cloves garlic
2 stalks celery, cut into 2 inch pieces
2 carrots, peeled, cut into 2 inch pieces
1/2 c. flat leaf parsley leaves
1 large egg
1 c. ketchup
3 tsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. coarse salt
2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Place bread in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine crumbs form. Transfer to a medium bowl, and add ground beef.
Place onion, garlic, celery, carrots, and parsley in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine.
Add to meat mixture, using hands to mix well.
Add egg, 1/2 c. ketchup, 2 tsp. dry mustard, salt and pepper; use hands to combine thoroughly.
Place in an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2 inch loaf pan.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 beaten egg
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. celery salt
2 slices bread, cut into crumbs
2 lb. ground beef
1 c. oatmeal
catsup
Directions:
Mix ingredients in order listed.
Shape into loaf.
Top with catsup.
Bake at 375° for approximately 1 hour in foil-lined pan.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Super Tasty Basic Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. ketchup
1/3 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1/8 tsp. red pepper
2 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. soft breadcrumbs
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
2 tsp. brown sugar
Directions:
In large bowl, combine 1/2 cup ketchup, tomato juice, salt, peppers, eggs, breadcrumbs, onion and 2 teaspoons mustard.
Mix thoroughly.
Add ground beef.
Mix. Press beef into a 5 X 5 loaf pan.
Combine 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon mustard and brown sugar and spread over meatloaf.
Bake at 400° for 35 to 40 minutes or until done.
Garnish with fresh herbs, if desired.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Mexican Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil, plus 1 tsp.
1 c. onion, chopped
1 c. green bell pepper, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 pkg. beef broth seasoning
15 oz. ground round
4 oz. cheddar cheese, shredded
3/4 c. bread crumbs, plain
1/2 c. tomato sauce
1/4 c. yogurt or sour cream
2 Tbsp. parsley, fresh, chopped
2 tsp. worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. chili powder
Directions:
In skillet, brown onion, peppers, garlic and seasoning packet in oil.
Combine these ingredients with remaining ingredients in mixing bowl.
Shape mixture in a loaf and bake until browned, 45 minutes at 375 degrees.

question: What’s a recipe for classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Mystery Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 pound of alligator meat
1/2 cup of turtle eyes
1/2 cup of green slime
1 tablespoon of toxic waste
1 pinch of sand to spice
Directions:
Take 2 cups of flour mix with 1 gallon of sugar.
Put in the oven for 12 hours at 250°.
Shape it as a banana then let it cool for about 1 hour.
Sprinkle yellow sprinkles until no fudge is showing.
On top of the cake put 5 chocolate brownies.
In the center put a single strawberry then crack 2 raw eggs on top. Put in the refrigerator for 2 days, then serve.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 lb. Ricotta cheese
1 1/2 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded
1 egg
1 pkg. frozen spinach, thawed and drained
salt and pepper
3/4 tsp. oregano
1 jar Prego sauce (28 oz.)
1/2 pkg. lasagna noodles (8 oz.)
1 c. water
Directions:
Mix Ricotta, 1 cup Mozzarella, egg, spinach, salt, pepper and oregano.
In a greased pan, layer 1/2 cup sauce, 1/3 of noodles and 1/2 cheese mixture.
Repeat.
Top with remaining noodles, then remaining sauce.
Sprinkle with rest of Mozzarella.
Pour water around the edges.
Cover tightly with foil.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Let stand 10 minutes before serving.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 pt. low-fat Ricotta cheese
4 egg whites
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. basil
1 tsp. garlic powder
1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
5 c. spaghetti sauce
8 oz. uncooked lasagna noodles
3/4 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
1 c. water
Directions:
Mix Ricotta cheese, egg whites, spices, spinach and Parmesan cheese.
Coat bottom of 9 x 13-inch pan with thin layer of spaghetti sauce.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
1 (16 oz.) pkg. Ricotta or cottage cheese
1 1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 egg, slightly beaten
2 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
3/4 tsp. oregano
2 (27 oz.) jars spaghetti sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. uncooked lasagna noodles
1 c. water
Directions:
Do not need to precook the noodles.
Grease baking dish. Combine spinach, Ricotta, 1 cup of Mozzarella cheese, egg, salt, pepper and oregano; mix well.
Spread 1/2 cup spaghetti sauce in bottom of large lasagna pan.
Place 1/3 of noodles over sauce. Spread 1/2 of spinach cheese mix.
Repeat layers.
Top with remaining noodles, spaghetti sauce and 1/2 cup of Mozzarella cheese.
Pour 1 cup water into sauce jars, shake and pour around edges of dish.
Cover with aluminum foil.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Let stand 15 minutes before serving.
Freezes well.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Mushroom Lasagna(Serves 8)
Ingredients:
1 lb. lasagna noodles
4 tsp. olive oil
4 cloves garlic, minced
1 lb. mushrooms, sliced
salt to taste
freshly ground black pepper
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
4 bunches fresh spinach, washed and stemmed
2 c. low-fat Ricotta cheese
pinch of nutmeg
2 c. basic tomato sauce (homemade, jarred or canned)
1 c. shredded low-fat Mozzarella cheese
1/2 c. breadcrumbs
Directions:
Bring a large pot of well salted water to a boil and prepare a large bowl of ice water. Add the lasagna noodles to the boiling water and cook until they are just al dente. Drain and plunge the noodles into the ice water to cool them quickly. Drain again and lay the noodles out on paper towels.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a spinach and ricotta lasagna?
answer:
Title: Spinach Lasagna
Ingredients:
16 oz. bag frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 (16 oz.) box lasagna noodles, cooked firm
8 oz. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 1/2 bottles spaghetti sauce (use low fat variety)
12 oz. Ricotta cheese (part skim)
Directions:
Combine drained spinach with the Ricotta cheese. Layer ingredients in 9 x 12-inch pan in the following order: Spinach and Ricotta mixture, spaghetti sauce, noodles and Mozzarella cheese. Repeat until ingredients are used up, ending top 2 layers with sauce and Mozzarella cheese. Makes 12 servings. Each serving contains 261 calories and 6.9 g fat.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Pseudo-Southwestern Quinoa
Ingredients:
1 c. quinoa
1 t. ginger, minced
1 3/4 c. water 1/2 t. dulce or kelp powder
2 T. lemon juice
2 serrano peppers
1 t. oregano, dried
1 avocado, diced and drenched with lime juice
4 green onions chopped
2 ears fresh corn on the cob, cut off corn
1/2 diced green bell pepper
1/2 c. diced red sweet pepper
1/4 c. olive oil or flax seed oil
1 bunch cilantro chopped
Directions:
First of all quinoa (pronounced "keen-wa") is an alkalizing grain.
It is hardy and contains the highest amount if protein of any grain.
It cooks quickly and makes a delicious, crunchy dish. It is high in calcium, phosphorus, iron, B vitamins, and vitamin E and has an ideal balance of amino acids.
Wash quinoa thoroughly to remove the saponin, the rust-colored coating that protects this seed against insects, birds, and the sun.
While cooking, the germ on the outside of the grain unfolds like a partial spiral giving the finished cooked product a lovely appearance.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Avocado Corn Quiche
Ingredients:
3 ears fresh or frozen corn on the cob, scraped of kernels
3/4 c. grated Havarti cheese (or any white cheese)
4 green onions, tops only, chopped
1 1/2 ripe avocados, peeled and chopped
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/2 c. milk
3 eggs, lightly beaten
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of Tabasco
10-inch partially baked pie shell *
Directions:
*Using your favorite pie crust recipe fit the dough into a 10-inch false-bottom quiche pan.
Line with foil and fill with rice.
Bake 10 minutes in a preheated 400° oven.
Remove foil and rice and bake 5 minutes longer or until lightly colored.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Avocado Magnificent
Ingredients:
1 avocado, cubed
1 tomato, diced
1 lime
Garlic salt
Directions:
Place cubed avocado and diced tomato in a bowl.
Squeeze lime juice over mixture.
Lightly salt with 2 dashes of garlic salt. Blend well.
Serve with garlic pita chips.
Serves 2.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 avocado, mashed
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 Tbsp. freshly squeezed lemon
2 chiles, mashed
dash of Worcestershire
1/3 c. minced green onion
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Blend avocado with cheese until smooth.
Add other ingredients; blend well.
Cover; chill.

question: What can I make with avocado and quinoa?
answer:
Title: Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 fully riped avocado
1 Tbsp. minced onion
1/2 tsp. chili powder
1/8 tsp. Tabasco
1 Tbsp. mayonnaise
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Blend all ingredients until creamy.
Cover.
Changes color when exposed to air.
Refrigerate until ready to serve.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water
8 medium potatoes, peeled and cut up
2 1/4 c. milk
3/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. white pepper
1 small onion, chopped
Directions:
Heat water to boiling.
Add potatoes and onions.
Boil until potatoes are tender.
Drain off water.
Put 1/2 of vegetables into blender.
Add 1/4 to 1/2 cup of milk.
Blend until smooth.
Return all vegetables to cooking pot.
Stir in remaining ingredients using measurements listed first and then adding salt and pepper to your taste.
Heat, stirring occasionally, until hot.
Add more milk while heating for a thinner soup.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
4 large potatoes
1 tsp. salt
1 stick margarine
2/3 c. flour
1 chopped onion (optional)
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
3 c. sweet milk
bacon chips (optional)
1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. sour cream
Directions:
Peel and cube potatoes.
Stew with 1 teaspoon salt until tender.
In a double boiler, melt butter.
Add flour, salt and pepper.
Add onion and bacon chips, if desired.
Mix well.
Add milk.
Stir until thick, adding more milk until desired consistency (you may use water from potatoes).
Add potatoes and cheese.
Mix well.
Delicious served with corn bread.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
5 medium potatoes
2 tsp. salt
1 small onion, chopped
2 c. milk
1 stick butter
1/2 tsp. pepper
6 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Peel and dice potatoes. Boil until tender.
Melt butter in 5-quart pan over medium heat. Add onion, salt and pepper.
Cook until onion is tender.
Adjust heat as needed. Add flour and stir until smooth and bubbly. Remove from heat.
Gradually add milk, stirring constantly. Return to heat and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and add potatoes.
Simmer 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. celery salt (optional)
1/8 tsp. pepper
3 1/2 c. milk
1 1/3 c. uncooked instant mashed potatoes
Directions:
Heat all ingredients except potatoes to scalding.
Stir in potatoes; continue cooking until smooth, stirring constantly. Soup should be consistency of heavy cream.
Yield: 4 (1 cup) servings.

question: How do I make a creamy potato soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Potato Soup
Ingredients:
3 1/2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion or 1 Tbsp. instant minced onion
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. celery salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. Potato Buds mashed potatoes (dry)
Directions:
Heat milk, onion, butter, salt, celery salt and pepper to scalding in 3-quart saucepan.
Stir in potatoes.
Cook, stirring constantly, until smooth.
Sprinkle each serving with paprika and snipped parsley, if desired.
Makes 4 servings (about 1 cup each).

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. fettucini, uncooked (eggless variety)
1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
1/3 c. fat-free Kraft mayonnaise or Miracle Whip
1 tsp. minced garlic (in jar)
2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, rinsed and drained
1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese (Alpine Lace or Weight Watchers)
Directions:
Prepare fettucini as directed on package.
Drain and set aside.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Italian Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. oil
18 large mushrooms
1/4 c. onions, chopped
1 garlic clove, chopped
1/3 c. bread crumbs
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. oregano
Directions:
Remove and chop mushroom stems.
Saute stems, onions and garlic in skillet in 2 tablespoons oil.
Combine bread crumbs, cheese, parsley and oregano.
Add to skillet.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Business
Ingredients:
1 to 1 1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, coarsely sliced
3/4 c. onions, chopped
1 Tbsp. butter
bread
melted butter
3/4 c. chopped celery
3/4 c. chopped bell pepper
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 eggs
2 1/4 c. milk
2 cans undiluted cream of mushroom soup
grated Swiss cheese
Directions:
Saute mushrooms in butter for a few minutes.
Remove; drain. Saute onions, celery and bell pepper until tender.
Paint 4 to 5 slices of bread (remove crust) with melted butter.
Cut into 1-inch squares and line the bottom of a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Cover bread with mushrooms, peppers, onion and celery.
Add salt and pepper.
Add another layer of crumbs.
Beat eggs slightly.
Add to milk and pour over casserole.
Let stand overnight in refrigerator.
Before cooking, cover casserole with soup.
Add buttered bread crumbs and sprinkle with cheese.
Bake in 300° oven for 1 hour or until cheese is brown and bubbly.
Serves 10 to 12.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Business
Ingredients:
1/2 to 1 lb. fresh mushrooms
8 slices white bread
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
2 eggs
3/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
1 can mushroom soup
1/4 c. grated yellow cheese
butter
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Clean and slice mushrooms.
Saute in butter until slightly cooked.
Butter 3 slices of bread.
Trim crusts and cut into 1-inch squares.
Put in a 9 x 13-inch casserole dish.

question: What can I cook with mushrooms and pasta?
answer:
Title: Wild Mushroom Pasta(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium onion, finely chopped
3 cloves garlic, finely chopped
2 Tbsp. parsley, finely chopped
2 c. coarsely chopped tomato
4 c. assorted mushrooms
salt to taste
1 lb. penne
4 c. sliced, fresh mushrooms (shiitake, morel, oyster and/or best of all, portabella)
2 red or green peppers, cut into strips
1 medium onion, cut into thin wedges
1/4 c. margarine or butter
1/4 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
hot cooked pasta
shaved or grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In a large skillet, cook mushrooms, peppers and onion in hot margarine or butter until tender.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Toss with hot pasta.
Top with cheese.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef chuck, cubed
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 to 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. paprika
1 1/2 c. beef broth
1/2 garlic clove, minced
1 bay leaf
4 carrots, sliced
2 onions, chopped
1 rib celery
3 potatoes, diced
Directions:
Place meat in slow cooker. Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika. Stir into meat until coated. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover. Cook on low 10 to 12 hours or high 4 to 6 hours. Stir and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef cubes, cut into small pieces
4 small cans beef broth
2 envelopes Knorr classic brown gravy
as little or as much carrots as desired
as little or as much potatoes as desired
as little or as much celery as desired
2 medium onions, cut
flour
garlic salt to taste
Directions:
Put beef cubes in a bowl with flour, a little black pepper and garlic salt.
Coat beef cubes.
Brown beef cubes in hot oil on top of stove.
When brown, put beef cubes in slow cooker.
Mix in remaining ingredients; cook on medium-high for 7 hours or on high for 5 hours or until vegetables are tender.
Enjoy with hot French bread.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef-Vegetable Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 large can crushed tomatoes (undrained)
3 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca
2 Tbsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes
3 medium carrots, cut into 1-inch slices
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 1/2 lb. lean chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 tsp. canola oil
Directions:
In a bowl, combine tomatoes, tapioca, basil, sugar, salt and pepper; let this stand for 15 to 20 minutes. Put potatoes, carrots, onion and celery in large slow cooker.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: The New Beef Stew
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. lean beef stew meat
4 c. water
3 medium onions, halved
1 Tbsp. grated orange peel
1 Tbsp. instant beef bouillon granules
1 tsp. dried thyme, crushed
1/2 tsp. dried oregano, crushed
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 bay leaf
3 medium carrots, peeled
2 parsnips, peeled
1/2 medium turnip (about 1/2 lb.)
2 medium potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch chunks
1 c. frozen peas
1/4 c. fresh parsley or 1 Tbsp. dried flakes
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. cold water
Directions:
Trim all excess fat from beef and discard.
Cut beef into 1-inch chunks.
Spray a Dutch oven or large heavy saucepan with nonstick spray coating.
Heat pan over medium-high heat; add beef and cook, stirring until brown on all sides.
Remove from heat. Carefully add water to the pan and return to the heat.
Bring to boiling, scraping up any brown bits from bottom of the pan.
Add onions, orange peel, bouillon granules, thyme, oregano, pepper and bay leaf.
Cover, return to heat and simmer for 1 hour.

question: What’s a recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. chuck or stew meat
2 c. hot water
1 medium onion, sliced
1 large bay leaf
2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
dash of ground cloves (optional)
6 carrots, peeled and cut in 1/2-inch slices
4 potatoes, peeled and cut in eighths
4 stalks celery, quartered lengthwise
1 lb. small white onions
1/4 c. flour
1/3 c. cold water
Directions:
In a 3-quart casserole, combine meat, water, sliced onion, bay leaf, salt, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, pepper, garlic powder and cloves.
Cover.
Microwave at High 5 minutes.
Reduce power to Medium and microwave 40 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent sticking.
Remove bay leaf. Add vegetables.
Cover.
Microwave 35 to 45 minutes, or until meat and vegetables are tender.
Blend flour into water; stir into stew.
Microwave at High 3 to 4 minutes, or until bubbly, stirring once or twice.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Depending on size of vegetables, time will be longer if all ingredients are added at once.
Serves 6 to 8.
Can also be done on the stove or in slow pot.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Beef Dish
Ingredients:
1 c. potatoes
1 c. carrots
1 c. peas
1 medium onion, diced
1 c. rice, cooked
1 lb. ground beef
1 qt. tomatoes
salt and pepper
Directions:
Mix well all ingredients and bake in oven 1 hour or longer on moderate degrees (350°) or you may top with grated cheese if desired.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: What'S Cooking?(Beef Stew For One)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. cubed beef sirloin
1 c. carrots
1 c. potatoes
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 tsp. horseradish
Directions:
Brown beef in butter.
Add soup, vegetables and horseradish. Let simmer until vegetables are soft.
Add water for desired thickness.
For more servings, add more vegetables, horseradish and another can of soup.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
beef
1 medium onion
oil
1 1/2 Tbsp. flour
1 large or 2 small carrots
3 medium potatoes
Directions:
Heat corn oil in a large pan.
Cut meat in 1-inch cubes and chop onion.
Brown onion and meat in hot oil.
After all water has cooked out, brown flour in the hot oil.
Cut carrots and potatoes into small pieces.
Add with enough water to cover well.
Simmer until well done.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef cubes, cooked
2 c. water
2 c. tomato juice
6 medium potatoes, cubed
5 carrots, sliced
1 small can tomato paste
1 (1 lb.) can mixed vegetables
1 onion, chopped
seasoned salt to taste
pepper to taste
Directions:
Bring to a boil and cook on low heat for 2 hours.

question: What can I cook with beef, potatoes, and carrots?
answer:
Title: Beef And Potato Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. lean beef chunks
6 medium potatoes (chunks)
1 large onion, diced
2 large carrots, diced
1 large can Hunt's tomatoes
1 large can Hunt's special tomato sauce with tomato bits
1 c. beef broth
salt to taste
pepper to taste
pinch of garlic powder
Directions:
Cook beef cubes until they begin to stick and are tender.
Add all other ingredients.
Cook on medium heat for 1 hour.
Serve hot with cornbread.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. fresh basil
3 Tbsp. Parmesan
1/4 c. walnuts
3 cloves garlic
1/2 c. extra virgin olive oil
Directions:
Place basil, Parmesan and garlic in food processor until coarsely ground.
Gradually add olive oil until well blended.
Add walnuts; process until blended.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Basic Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. lightly packed fresh basil leaves
1/2 c. olive oil
1/3 c. pine nuts
1 large or 2 small garlic cloves
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Combine first 5 ingredients in a blender, or food processor, and process until smooth.
At this point, before adding cheese, mixture can be frozen in airtight container and kept for several months.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
4 c. fresh basil
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
4 tsp. garlic
1/2 c. pine nuts, toasted
2 c. light olive oil
1 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Place first 5 ingredients in food processor and chop well. Add oil slowly, then add Parmesan cheese.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
2 c. lightly packed fresh basil leaves
3 Tbsp. pine nuts (available in most grocery stores)
2 cloves garlic
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese (or Parmesan and romano)
1 c. olive oil
Directions:
Place basil, pine nuts, garlic and cheese in the work bowl of a food processor and process until a near-puree is obtained.
Pour oil slowly through the feed tube while the motor runs and scrap down the sides of the work bowl with a rubber spatula once or twice.
Run 20 to 30 seconds longer.
Remove and reserve.
Makes approximately 1/2 cup.
This may be frozen. Can be served over pasta and used with seafood and chicken dishes.

question: How do I make homemade pesto sauce?
answer:
Title: Pesto Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. well-packed basil leaves
1 large clove garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. pinenuts, chopped
1/2 c. good olive oil
1/4 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
twist of freshly ground black pepper
Directions:
Put basil, garlic and pinenuts in a food processor and process to chop leaves somewhat.
Add olive oil and continue to process, scraping down sides of bowl. Add Parmesan cheese, salt and pepper.
Store in refrigerator.
Makes 1 cup.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato-Chicken
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. red wine
6 drumsticks
1 oz. ginger
1 bud garlic
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 to 3 c. water
2 potatoes, peeled and sliced
Directions:
Skin the chicken.
Remove the meat from the bones.
Cut meat into chunks (4 to 5 chunks from each leg).
Remove skin from each ginger.
Cut ginger into 4 to 5 slices.
Press 4 to 5 cloves of garlic flat.
Mix garlic, oil and ginger.
Deep fry for about 5 seconds on medium heat.
Add chicken and bones to vegetable mix. Continue frying on medium heat for 10 seconds.
Turn to high heat. Add wine.
Saute for 5 seconds.
Add water.
Heat until water boils.
Turn heat to low for 8 minutes.
Add salt, soy sauce and potatoes.
Cook for 20 minutes.
Remove bones.
Serve.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Fragrant Baked Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
10 all-purpose potatoes, unpeeled and sliced 1/8-inch
2 Tbsp. minced fresh rosemary or 2 tsp. crumbled dried
6 cloves garlic, peeled
1/2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
1 1/2 c. chicken broth
Directions:
Layer 1/3 of potatoes in lightly greased 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Sprinkle with 1/3 rosemary, garlic and pepper.
Drizzle with 1 tablespoon oil.
Repeat layer twice more.
Gently pour chicken broth over all, taking care not to wash top layer of spices away.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken Thighs And Rice
Ingredients:
2 slices bacon
1 to 1 1/2 lb. chicken thighs (boneless)
1/2 c. long grain rice
1 small onion, cut into thin wedges
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (7 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes, drained and cut up
1/2 c. quartered fresh mushrooms
1/4 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules
1/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
3 Tbsp. parsley
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In a 10-inch skillet cook bacon until crisp.
Drain, reserving drippings.
Crumble bacon and set aside.
Brown chicken in reserve drippings, about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper.
Remove chicken from skillet.
Cook rice, onion wedges and garlic in skillet drippings until rice is golden brown.
Stir frequently.
Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, wine, bouillon granules, salt, basil and 1 cup water.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Chicken 'N Red Potatoes
Ingredients:
6 to 8 red potatoes, diced
2 to 3 lb. cut up fryer or 4 chicken breasts
3 Tbsp. rosemary
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. salt
1/2 stick margarine
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Spray Pam on a 9 x 13-inch pan.
Mix the seasonings together. Coat chicken pieces with seasonings.
Place potatoes on bottom of pan and cut chicken pieces on top.
Put dabs of margarine on top of the chicken.
Pour water into pan and bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes or until potatoes are soft.
Baste chicken with juices in pan periodically.
Yield:
4 servings.

question: What can I cook with chicken thighs and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Company Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 pt. sour cream
10 oz. sharp cheese, shredded
2 lb. frozen hash browns, thawed
1/2 c. melted butter or margarine
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 can cream of chicken soup
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together well and put into a butter 4-quart dish.
In addition to the 1/2 cup of butter, melt another 1/4 cup with 1 cup of crushed corn flakes and sprinkle on top. Cover and bake at 375° for 1 1/2 hours.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Basic Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. unbleached flour
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 Tbsp. salt
1/2 c. (plus 2 Tbsp.) lukewarm water
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water.
Let "proof" for 5 minutes.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
2 envelopes active dry yeast
2 c. lukewarm water (110~)
2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 tsp. salt
5 c. flour (bread flour or natural bleached)
1/2 to 1 c. flour (for additional needs)
Directions:
Sprinkle yeast in warm water; let stand until dissolved.
Add sugar, oils and 2 1/2 cups of the flour, beating well.
Gradually add the remaining 2 1/2 cups of flour to form a soft dough.
Turn out onto a floured board and knead until smooth and elastic, adding flour as needed.
May take 1/2 to 1 cup.
Turn dough into greased bowl.
Cover with plastic wrap.
Let rise in warm place until doubled (2 to 3 hours).
Punch down and let rise again. Punch down and divide into 3 balls.
Roll out dough, adding enough flour to make dough fit pizza pan.
Fold under outer edges. Pierce holes in dough with fork.
Do a "first bake" in a 400° to 450° oven for 5 to 7 minutes.
Ready for your favorite pizza recipe.
Makes three 13-inch pizzas.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Simple Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. lukewarm water
3 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. olive oil
Directions:
In a small bowl, dissolve the yeast and sugar in the lukewarm water.
Let rest until foamy, about 15 minutes.
Mix the flour and salt in a large bowl.
Add the olive oil to the yeast mixture. Make a well in the flour and add yeast mixture.
Stir to combine. Add extra flour if too sticky.
Knead on a floured board or countertop until smooth and elastic, adding flour as needed.
This should take about 5 minutes.
Pat the dough into a ball; put in large bowl and set in a warm place (near oven), covered with a clean towel.
Let rise for 1 hour or until doubled in bulk.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 1/2 tsp. active dry yeast
1 1/2 c. warm water (110~ to 115~)
3 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. olive oil
Directions:
In large bowl dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup warm water.
Allow yeast to proof 10 minutes or until it's foamy.
Add remaining 1 cup warm water, combining well with yeast.
Add 3 cups flour and salt.
Mix dough. Add remaining flour as needed to make a dough that holds together.
Place dough on floured surface and knead for 10 minutes or until dough is soft and not sticky.
Grease a large bowl with the olive oil.
Put dough in bowl and turn a few times to coat with oil.
Cover bowl tightly with plastic wrap and let rise for 2 hours in warm place.

question: How do I make a pizza dough from scratch?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1 c. warm water (105~ to 115~)
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 1/2 c. all-purpose * or whole wheat flour
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in warm water.
Stir in remaining ingredients; beat vigorously 20 strokes.
Let rest about 5 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Vegetable Soup
Ingredients:
2 c. sliced carrots
1 c. sliced celery
1 c. sliced onions
1 small turnip, peeled and diced (optional)
4 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (16 oz.) can whole tomatoes, cut up
1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place raw ingredients in a 5-quart kettle and cover with salt and peppered water.
Cook until tender.
Add tomatoes and corn (these make the soup) and heat through.
Serve with a sandwich for lunch or a first course at dinner.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Vegetable Soup(Stone Soup)
Ingredients:
3/4 c. onion, sliced
2 c. diced potatoes
1 1/2 c. celery, sliced
3 qt. boiling water
1 1/2 c. diced carrots
5 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 c. string beans and peas
4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
macaroni, broken in small pieces
rice (if desired)
1 can condensed tomato soup
Directions:
Wash and cut vegetables.
Heat butter in skillet.
Add onions and celery and simmer until soft.
Remove from heat; slowly add 3 quarts of boiling water.
Add seasonings and vegetables, macaroni and rice; boil until vegetables are tender (about 20 or 30 minutes).
Add tomato soup; heat.
Add more water, if needed.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Gwen'S Vegetarian Soup
Ingredients:
1/2 c. pinto beans (dry)
1/4 c. black-eyed peas
1/4 c. lentils
1/4 c. lima beans
1/2 c. navy beans
1/4 c. split peas (yellow or green)
1 c. chopped celery
2 medium onions, chopped
1 (16 oz.) can green beans (with juice)
2 large potatoes or turnips or both (optional)
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. rosemary
1/2 c. chopped fresh parsley or 3 Tbsp. dried parsley
3 large carrots, cut up
1 c. frozen corn
1 large can tomatoes (32 oz.) or combination of puree and tomato
1 tsp. salt or to taste
1 tsp. chili powder
1 1/2 tsp. dried basil
1/2 tsp. thyme
1/2 tsp. garlic powder or 2 fresh garlic cloves, minced
Directions:
Soak all dried beans except lentils and split peas overnight. Cook beans in about 4 cups water for about 1 hour.
(Not the lentils and split peas.)
If beans seem hard, cook awhile longer. Add lentils and split peas.
Simmer for 20 minutes. Add canned tomatoes, celery, carrots and onions and all spices and herbs. Simmer for 30 minutes. Add more water if too thick. Add potatoes and turnips (if adding). Simmer for 15 minutes. Add frozen corn and green beans. Simmer for about 10 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Vegetarian Potato-Cheese Soup(Serves 6)
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
4 c. chopped onions
1 clove garlic, minced
4 large potatoes (unpeeled), coarsely chopped
2 large carrots, chopped
6 c. vegetable stock or water
4 Tbsp. fresh dill
8 oz. cream cheese
3 c. milk
2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
In large soup pot, saute onions and garlic in butter until onions are translucent.
Add potatoes and carrots; saute for 5 to 10 minutes longer.
Add stock and dill.
Simmer until all vegetables are tender.
Puree the vegetables with the cream cheese and milk in blender or food processor.
Return the soup to soup pot.
Season with salt and pepper.
Stir in Cheddar cheese and reheat gently.

question: What’s a good recipe for a vegan soup?
answer:
Title: Hodgepodge Soup
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef, browned
3/4 c. onion
1 clove garlic
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 1/2 diced celery
3 cans minestrone soup
1 large can pork and beans
3 c. water
Directions:
Sprinkle with celery seed; simmer at least 1 hour.
Nice to use in crock-pot.
May also be frozen.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Fettucini And Spinach
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. fettucini noodles, cooked and drained
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach, thawed and drained
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 tsp. chicken flavor instant bouillon
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. basil leaves
1 c. cottage cheese
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. grated Parmesan and Romano cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
In large skillet, cook spinach and garlic in oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently.
Dissolve bouillon in water.
Add bouillon mixture, basil, cottage cheese and salt to spinach.
Stir over low heat until blended.
Toss spinach mixture, grated cheese and noodles.
Serve in heated dish, garnished with parsley. Refrigerate leftovers.
Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Spinach Pate
Ingredients:
3 lb. fresh spinach
1 Tbsp. butter
1/2 onion, minced
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. thyme
1 tsp. oregano
1 Tbsp. wine or cider vinegar
3 eggs
1/2 c. skim milk
1/8 tsp. nutmeg, grated
4 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1/2 c. Gruyere cheese
3/4 c. whole wheat bread crumbs
sea salt to taste
pepper
Directions:
Wash and stem spinach.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Butter a loaf pan.
Puree spinach or chop fine.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Spinach And Beans
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. olive oil
5 cloves garlic (whole), smashed
large bunch fresh spinach
1 (16 oz.) can cannellini beans
1 large tomato, cubed
1 (16 oz.) can garbanzo beans
1/4 tsp. oregano (leaf)
1/2 tsp. basil (leaf)
1 c. elbow macaroni
1/2 c. white wine
chopped fresh parsley
crusty bread
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
In 6 to 8 quart pot brown garlic in olive oil.
Steam spinach with cover on; add rest of ingredients.
Cook elbow macaroni and add to mixture.
Break to high simmer; add wine to boil off alcohol (1 to 2 minutes).
Serve in bowl; sprinkle with parsley and Parmesan cheese.
Enjoy with crusty bread.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Spinach Salad
Ingredients:
1 pkg. fresh spinach
1/2 lb. sliced mushrooms (fresh)
1 or 1/2 lb. crumbled Feta (optional)
8 or 9 pieces bacon, fried and crumbled
1 1/2 c. croutons
1 medium red onion, sliced in rings
Italian dressing
Directions:
Wash spinach and mushrooms.
Remove spinach stems; slice mushrooms and onions.
Crumble Feta cheese and bacon.
Add all other ingredients except Feta cheese to the spinach.
Toss; then add Feta cheese; toss again.

question: What can I make with spinach, feta, and chickpeas?
answer:
Title: Almond-Spinach Pilaf(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
2 tsp. olive oil
1 c. thawed frozen chopped spinach, squeezed dry
1/2 c. chopped scallions
1/4 c. chopped fresh dill
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
4 ___ uncooked rice
1 ___ whole almonds, coarsely chopped
1 1/4 c. low sodium beef broth
1 small navel orange, peeled and sectioned
Directions:
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, warm oil.
Add the spinach, scallions, dill, salt and pepper.
Cook, stirring frequently until vegetables are tender, about 2 minutes.
Add the rice and almonds; cook, stirring constantly until rice is well coated with oil, about 2 minutes.
Pour in broth and bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat to low and simmer until rice is tender, 20 minutes.
Gently stir in orange sections.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Tomato And Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
4 large ripe tomatoes, cut in wedges
1/2 c. Feta cheese, crumbled
1/2 c. basil leaves, cut in strips
3 cloves minced garlic
1/2 c. olive oil
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. ground black pepper
8 oz. pasta
Directions:
Cook pasta.
Add remaining ingredients and stir.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta
Ingredients:
sun-dried tomatoes
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 1/2 c. tomatoes, peeled, seeded and diced
1/2 c. heavy cream
1/4 c. sun-dried tomatoes
1 Tbsp. Italian parsley, chopped
salt and pepper
pasta (except spaghetti or linguine)
Directions:
Cook pasta according to package directions.
Heat oil in skillet; add garlic and saute 1 minute.
Add tomatoes; heat to boiling.
Stir until thickens, about 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and sun-dried tomatoes and simmer about 5 minutes.
Add salt and pepper.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Pasta With Fresh Tomato Sauce
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, chopped
2 tsp. olive oil
3 tomatoes, peeled and seeded
1/2 tsp. salt
12 oz. pasta, cooked
1/2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. leaf basil
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in olive oil in a large nonstick skillet until golden.
Add tomatoes and simmer until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Add broth, basil and oregano, simmer to thicken sauce, 5 to 7 minutes.
Stir in salt and pepper.
Serve over hot, cooked pasta. Sprinkle with cheese.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Baked Tomato Pasta
Ingredients:
12 medium Roma tomatoes
3 to 6 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1/2 c. olive oil
1 lb. dry spaghetti, cooked according to directions
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. fresh whole or 2 Tbsp. basil leaves
Directions:
Cut tomatoes in half lengthwise; set cut side up in a 9 x 13-inch baking pan.
Sprinkle lightly with salt and pepper.
Mix garlic with 1/3 cup parsley and 2 tablespoons olive oil; pat mixture over cut side of tomatoes.
Drizzle 2 tablespoons of olive oil over tomatoes.
Bake at 425° for 45 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a creamy tomato pasta?
answer:
Title: Baked Spaghetti
Ingredients:
2 c. canned, diced tomatoes
2 c. tomato sauce
1/3 c. tomato paste
1 c. water
2 cloves chopped garlic
1/2 c. diced onions
1 1/2 tsp. Italian seasoning
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/4 c. chopped parsley
2 small bay leaves
1 lb. ground beef
2 boneless raw chicken breasts, chopped
1 c. minced Italian sausage
4 c. cooked angel hair pasta (8 oz. raw)
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
4 oz. sliced Swiss cheese
2 c. shredded Cheddar Jack cheese
Directions:
Combine first 11 ingredients in a stockpot.
Bring to a boil, lower heat and simmer for 1 hour covered. Combine ground beef, chicken and sausage in a saucepan. Cook until done and add to tomato mixture.
Simmer for another 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1/2 c. margarine, at room temperature
1/2 c. butter, at room temperature
1 clove garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. basil
1 tsp. hickory salt
1 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 Tbsp. chopped olives or green onion tops
Directions:
Mix altogether and serve over cooked steak.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. minced green onion
1 c. dry wine
1/2 c. butter, softened
2 tsp. chopped parsley
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cook onion and wine in a small saucepan until the liquid is reduced to 1/4 cup.
Remove from heat and cool.
With beater, cream butter and parsley.
Gradually beat in the wine mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
Makes 3/4 cup butter.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Steak Butter Pattie
Ingredients:
1 stick margarine, softened
1/2 Tbsp. parsley
1/2 squeezed lemon
2 to 3 Tbsp. Worcestershire
Directions:
Mix ingredients together thoroughly.
Roll in wax paper. Freeze.
Use on steak when needed.
Can be cut to appropriate size before freezing if desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic Pepper Steak
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vegetable oil
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 lb. London broil
Directions:
Add all ingredients in medium container.
Marinate meat overnight in refrigerator, turning occasionally.
Drain.
Broil 5 minutes on each side.

question: What’s a good recipe for a garlic butter steak?
answer:
Title: Garlic-Herb Steak Marinade
Ingredients:
1/2 c. olive oil
1/2 c. dry red wine
1/4 c. red wine vinegar
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 Tbsp. garlic pepper
1 1/2 Tbsp. Italian seasoning
1 Tbsp. dry mustard
1 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a glass measure.
Pour in a sterilized decorative bottle or jar.
Cap and refrigerate.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
12 oz. shrimp, peeled and deveined *
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. margarine or butter
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
Directions:
Thaw shrimp, if frozen.
In a large skillet, heat margarine over medium high heat.
Add shrimp and garlic.
Cook, stirring frequently for 1 to 3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink.
Stir in parsley and sherry.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Shrimp In Garlic Butter
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 tsp. parsley flakes
1 pkg. (12 oz.) frozen, peeled, deveined, quick cooking shrimp
Directions:
Place butter in custard cup. Microwave at high 30-45 second, until melted. Stir in garlic powder and parsley flakes.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Butterflied Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter
2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled, deveined and butterflied
3 garlic cloves, smashed and chopped
1 1/2 green peppers, cut into thin strips
salt and pepper
1 large lemon, peeled and diced
1 Tbsp. parsley, chopped
1/4 tsp. paprika
Directions:
Heat butter in large frying pan.
Add shrimp and cook 2 minutes on each side over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and season well. Continue cooking for 1 minute.
Stir in green peppers and diced lemon.
Cook 1 more minute.
Add parsley, paprika, salt and pepper. Mix and serve.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter
3 cloves fresh garlic, crushed
8 oz. whole mushrooms, stems removed
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
12 oz. fresh shrimp, shelled and deveined
1 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. cornstarch, mixed with just enough water to dissolve
Directions:
Melt butter in large skillet.
Add crushed garlic and whole mushrooms.
Gently mix in lemon juice and shrimp.
(Add more butter, if needed, at this time.)
Saute 1 minute on each side, or until pink.
Add wine; increase heat and bring to a boil.
Remove from heat and add cornstarch mixture.
Return to flame until sauce is thickened.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make garlic butter roasted shrimp?
answer:
Title: Garlic Shrimp
Ingredients:
20 large shrimp, cleaned and shelled
1 tsp. fresh rosemary, chopped
1/2 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper
1 tsp. fresh basil, chopped
2 Tbsp. fresh parsley
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. olive oil
3 Tbsp. butter
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/3 c. dry white wine
Directions:
Melt butter in a skillet.
Add olive oil.
Saute onion and garlic in same skillet.
Add rosemary, basil, black pepper and shrimp.
Cook until shrimp loses transparency (do not overcook). Add salt to taste.
Add wine and cook until oil and wine become slightly thickened.
Sprinkle parsley over.
Serve with fresh Parmesan cheese and lemon wedge to garnish.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread(Low-Fat, High Taste Garlic Bread)
Ingredients:
1 loaf French or Italian bread
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 large garlic clove
Directions:
Pour or brush oil into bread under broiler until golden (goes quickly).
Rub toast with fresh garlic clove.
Serve immediately.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf Italian bread
1/2 c. soft butter or margarine
1 tsp. parsley flakes
1/4 tsp. crumbled oregano
1/4 tsp. dried dill weed
1 garlic clove, minced
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Cut bread diagonally into 1 inch slices; do not cut all the way through.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
3 Tbsp. mayonnaise or sour cream
1/2 c. grated Cheddar cheese
3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
Directions:
Spread on French bread that has been cut lengthwise.
Sprinkle with paprika and broil.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Loaf
Ingredients:
6 c. flour
2 pkg. RapidRise yeast
1/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
4 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/4 tsp. parsley
1 c. water
1/2 c. margarine
2 eggs
cornmeal
Directions:
In a large bowl, combine first 8 ingredients and mix well. Heat milk, water and margarine together until mixture is 120° to 130°.
Blend two mixtures together with eggs and beat with a wooden spoon about 3 to 5 minutes to make a stiff batter.

question: How do I make garlic bread from scratch?
answer:
Title: Garlic Bread
Ingredients:
1 loaf French bread (about 12-inches long; Italian or sourdough bread may be used)
1/4 c. olive oil
3 or 4 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. dried oregano laves
fresh ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Heat the oven to 375°. Halve the bread lengthwise. In a small bowl, stir the oil, oregano, garlic and pepper. Spread on bread. Wrap each half in foil, leaving the tops uncovered. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 25 minutes until golden and crusted. With a serrated knife, cut each half into 6 pieces. Serves 6.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Slow Cooked Pork Chops
Ingredients:
6 to 8 medium sliced pork chops
2 cans tomato soup
3 c. water
1 green pepper, sliced
1 onion, sliced
Directions:
Fry pork chops.
Put in slow cooker or drain oil and leave in skillet.
Add soup, water, green pepper and onion. Salt and pepper to taste.
Cover and cook until pork chops are tender.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
3 lb. pork, cubed
2 c. onions, chopped
3 green bell peppers, chopped
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/4 c. vinegar
6 oz. can tomato paste
1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder
1 tsp. dry mustard
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in slow cooker; cover and cook on high 8 hours. Shred meat with fork. Mix into sauce and heat through. Serve on hamburger/sandwich buns with grated cheese and cole slaw on top.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Chops Supper
Ingredients:
6 medium pork chops
1 c. barbecue sauce
1 large onion
1 small green pepper, sliced thinly
1 small can mushrooms
1 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Place water and barbecue sauce in slow cooker.
Add onion and pepper to sauce.
Place pork chops in sauce.
Add mushrooms, salt and pepper.
Cook on medium 2 to 3 hours or until tender.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Pig Stew
Ingredients:
pork chops
8 to 10 diced potatoes
chopped onion
1 can cheese soup (diluted)
Directions:
Place ingredients in slow cooker or crock-pot and cook until tender.
Add other seasonings to your taste.

question: What’s an easy slow cooker recipe with pork?
answer:
Title: Quick Lemon Pepper Pork Chops
Ingredients:
1/2 tsp. vegetable oil
4 boneless pork loin chops
lemon pepper
Directions:
