Heat 1/2 teaspoon vegetable oil in a nonstick skillet.
Brown 4 boneless pork loin chops.
Turn and sprinkle with lemon pepper or your favorite seasoning.
Brown other side and serve with potatoes and your favorite vegetable.
Takes 15 minutes cooking time.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef chuck, cubed
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 to 1/2 c. flour
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. paprika
1 1/2 c. beef broth
1/2 garlic clove, minced
1 bay leaf
4 carrots, sliced
2 onions, chopped
1 rib celery
3 potatoes, diced
Directions:
Place meat in slow cooker. Combine flour, salt, pepper and paprika. Stir into meat until coated. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover. Cook on low 10 to 12 hours or high 4 to 6 hours. Stir and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef cubes, cut into small pieces
4 small cans beef broth
2 envelopes Knorr classic brown gravy
as little or as much carrots as desired
as little or as much potatoes as desired
as little or as much celery as desired
2 medium onions, cut
flour
garlic salt to taste
Directions:
Put beef cubes in a bowl with flour, a little black pepper and garlic salt.
Coat beef cubes.
Brown beef cubes in hot oil on top of stove.
When brown, put beef cubes in slow cooker.
Mix in remaining ingredients; cook on medium-high for 7 hours or on high for 5 hours or until vegetables are tender.
Enjoy with hot French bread.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef-Vegetable Stew(Slow Cooker)
Ingredients:
1 large can crushed tomatoes (undrained)
3 Tbsp. quick cooking tapioca
2 Tbsp. dried basil
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1 1/2 lb. red potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes
3 medium carrots, cut into 1-inch slices
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery
1 1/2 lb. lean chuck roast, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 tsp. canola oil
Directions:
In a bowl, combine tomatoes, tapioca, basil, sugar, salt and pepper; let this stand for 15 to 20 minutes. Put potatoes, carrots, onion and celery in large slow cooker.

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Slow Baked Beef Stew
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. beef stew meat
1 medium onion, cut up
1 stalk celery
6 carrots
6 cut up potatoes
2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. tapioca (Minute tapioca)
1 c. tomato juice
1 c. water
Directions:
More celery, onions and potatoes may be used.
Put meat and vegetables in casserole.
Do not brown meat.
Blend 2 teaspoons salt, 1 tablespoon sugar and 3 tablespoons Minute tapioca. Sprinkle over meat and add 1 cup tomato juice.
Cover and bake for 4 hours at 250°.
Add 1 cup water.
Use more tapioca to thicken, if necessary.
Do not peek!

question: What’s a good recipe for slow-cooker beef stew?
answer:
Title: Beef Stew
Ingredients:
2 lb. cut up beef, browned
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 tsp. savory
1/4 tsp. cloves
1 tsp. margarine
1 clove garlic, minced
3 onions, chopped
1 can tomatoes
1 c. diced carrots
4 c. cubed potatoes
Directions:
Set potatoes and carrots aside.
Simmer all other ingredients for 1 1/2 hours; stir frequently.
The last half hour, add potatoes and carrots.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
2 eggs, beaten
2 c. buttermilk or sour milk
4 Tbsp. salad oil
Directions:
Sift dry ingredients
together.
Add
to eggs, milk and oil. Stir only until bubbly.
"Don't stir after."

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
2 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. cooking oil or melted butter
2 c. flour
Directions:
Take turns holding the mixer until eggs are fluffy.
Add the rest of the ingredients and mix until smooth, but do not overmix. Grease hot griddle with shortening.
Pour batter to make 4 inch pancakes.
Cook until puffed, turn and cook other side until golden brown.
We like to cut them into shapes and spread butter and jelly.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 Tbsp. baking powder
3/4 tsp. baking soda
3/4 tsp. salt
2 eggs
2 c. buttermilk
1/4 c. oil
2 Tbsp. (1 oz.) water
Directions:
To beaten eggs, add buttermilk and beat again.
Add oil and water.
Beat thoroughly.
Add each dry ingredient and gently mix after each addition.
Do not overbeat.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 c. buttermilk
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 egg
Directions:
In large bowl, combine buttermilk, egg and oil.
Add all dry ingredients that have been sifted together and blend well.

question: What’s a good recipe for buttermilk pancakes?
answer:
Title: Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. sugar
2 1/3 c. buttermilk
2 eggs, beaten
2 Tbsp. butter, melted
Directions:
Mix dry ingredients.
Add milk, butter to eggs and sugar in separate bowl.
Combine the 2 mixtures.
Mix only until blended. Batter will be lumpy.
Spoon in skillet and fry.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon-Garlic Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. olive oil
6 (6 oz.) chicken breast halves, skinned
lemon wedges (optional)
Directions:
Combine bread crumbs, garlic and salt in a large zip-top plastic bag, shaking well to combine.
Combine lemon juice and oil. Brush over both sides of chicken.
Place chicken, one piece at a time, in the bag, shaking to coat.
Remove chicken from bag and place in 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish coated with vegetable cooking spray.
Sprinkle remaining crumbs over chicken.
Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 45 minutes or until done.
Serve with lemon wedges, if desired.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) chicken
2 Tbsp. garlic powder with parsley
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoned salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Lemon-Garlic Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. fine dry breadcrumbs
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 c. fresh lemon juice
1 tsp. dried parsley
1 Tbsp. olive oil
6 (6 oz.) chicken breast halves, skinned
vegetable cooking spray
lemon wedges (optional)
Directions:
Combine breadcrumbs, garlic, parsley and salt in a large zip-top plastic bag, shaking well to combine.
Combine lemon juice and oil; brush over both sides of chicken.
Place chicken in zip-top bag, one piece at a time, shaking to coat.
Remove chicken from bag and place in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray.
Sprinkle remaining crumbs over the chicken.
Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 45 minutes or until done.
Serve with lemon wedges, if desired.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken With Lemon And Garlic
Ingredients:
1 roasting chicken (about 3 to 4 lb.)
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 tsp. olive oil
2 lemons
5 bulbs garlic, divided
1 bunch fresh thyme, washed, dried and divided
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450° to 500°.
Remove chicken parts from cavity of the bird.
Wash bird inside out.
Pat dry.
Rub skin with olive oil.
With an ice pick, poke about 2 dozen holes in each lemon. Break 1 head of garlic into cloves; peel and remove ends.
Stuff the cavity of the bird with the 2 lemons, the garlic cloves and half the thyme.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for lemon garlic roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
2 1/2 to 3 lb. broiler-fryer chicken
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoning salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.
Place chicken in ovenproof dish and bake.
Top with garlic cloves.
Bake in 375° oven for 1 hour or until done.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 eggs, beaten
1/3 c. sugar
1/2 c. evaporated milk
3 Tbsp. melted butter
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 c. peeled, cooked and mashed sweet potatoes (don't use canned)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Pour into 1 1/2-quart baking dish. Top with topping.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
3 c. mashed sweet potatoes, cooked first
3 eggs
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 stick butter or oleo
pinch of salt
Directions:
Mix together and put in baking dish.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked, mashed potatoes (sweet)
1 c. sugar
1 stick butter
2 eggs
vanilla
Directions:
Mix and place in casserole.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
3 c. mashed sweet potatoes
1 stick butter
1 c. evaporated milk
1 c. sugar
2 eggs, beaten
2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Beat all together and pour into greased 2-quart casserole.

question: How do I make creamy mashed sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
3 c. sweet potatoes, mashed
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs
1/2 c. butter
Directions:
Combine ingredients and beat 2 minutes on medium speed.
Pour in casserole dish.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: U. P. Skinny Dip
Ingredients:
2/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise
2/3 c. fat-free sour cream
3/4 Tbsp. dill weed
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 Tbsp. salt
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and chill.
Serve with raw vegetables.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Fat Free, Cholesterol Free Country Herb Dip
Ingredients:
1 tsp. Knox unflavored gelatine
1/4 c. cold skim milk
3/4 c. skim milk, heated to boiling
1 (8 oz.) container 1% milk fat cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. Dijon-style mustard or horseradish
1 tsp. dill
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In blender, sprinkle unflavored gelatine over cold milk.
Let stand 2 minutes.
Add hot milk and process at low speed until gelatine is completely dissolved, about 2 minutes.
Add remaining ingredients and process at high speed until blended.
Before serving, stir until smooth.
Serve with assorted crackers, bread sticks, cocktail breads or your favorite veggies.
Makes 2 cups of dip.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Quick Fruit Dip(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 1/3 c. plain low-fat yogurt
1/4 c. orange marmalade
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
6 c. assorted fresh fruits
Directions:
Combine first 3 ingredients.
Cover and chill.
Serve with assorted fresh fruits.
Yields 1 1/2 cups dip.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Garden Dip(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1/2 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 c. plain low-fat yogurt
1 tsp. finely grated carrot
2 tsp. finely grated onion
1 tsp. finely grated green pepper
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
Directions:
Mix all ingredients well.
Store in fridge.
May also be used as salad dressing.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for a low-fat dip?
answer:
Title: Diet Vegetable Dip
Ingredients:
2 c. cottage cheese (low-fat)
2 Tbsp. skim milk
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1/2 tsp. grated onions
2 tsp. lemon juice
garlic powder
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of sweetener
Directions:
Blend all in blender until smooth.
Makes 2 cups basic dip.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. dried chickpeas (garbanzo beans, about 12 oz.)
2 c. chopped fresh cilantro
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. allspice
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
5 garlic cloves, peeled
1 onion, quartered
1 leek, trimmed and cut into 3 pieces
6 Tbsp. olive oil, divided
Yogurt-Tahini Dip
8 (6-inch) pitas, cut in half
Directions:
Sort and wash chickpeas and place in large bowl. Cover with water to 2 inches above beans. Cover and let stand for 8 hours. Drain beans. Combine chickpeas, cilantro and next 8 ingredients in a food processor until mixture resembles coarse meal. Divide chickpea mixture into 16 equal portions, shaping each into 1/2 inch thick patties. Heat 2 Tbsp. oil in a large non-stick skillet. Add 5 patties and cook 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat procedure twice with remaining oil and patties. Spread 1 Tbsp. Yogurt-Tahini Dip in each pita half. Fill with 1 patty. Serves 8 (2 pita halves each).

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Soy Falafel
Ingredients:
1 cake firm tofu
1/3 c. finely chopped onions
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 c. bread crumbs
1/4 c. chopped fresh Italian parsley
1/2 Tbsp. dark sesame oil
1 Tbsp. tamari soy sauce
ground black pepper to taste
1 or more garlic cloves to taste, minced
1 tsp. ground cumin
1 tsp. turmeric
1 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Press and mash the tofu.
Mix with remaining ingredients in a medium bowl.
Form into 1-inch balls. Bake on oiled baking sheet for about 30 minutes, turning occasionally until golden and crusty on the outside.
These make a great sandwich served with sliced fresh tomato in pita pockets with a sauce made of plain yogurt and fresh dill.
(Not a children's favorite!)

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Falafel And Tehina
Ingredients:
8 oz. chickpeas (I use canned)
1/4 tsp. coriander
2 cloves garlic
1 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. ground red chili pepper
1 tsp. salt
3 Tbsp. cracked wheat flour
1 lightly beaten egg
oil for deep frying
Directions:
Drain can of chickpeas.
Mash.
Add next seven ingredients. Mix thoroughly.
Taking a spoonful of the mixture at a time, roll into balls about 1-inch in diameter.
Heat oil and deep-fry falafel until browned.
Drain.
Serve hot on a gyro bread or in a pita bread pocket with tehina on top Tehina recipe follows.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Felafel
Ingredients:
2 (15 oz.) cans chickpeas
4 medium cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. turmeric
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. finely minced onion or 6 scallions
1/2 c. minced parsley
1/4 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/3 c. flour
a few dashes cayenne
oil for frying
Directions:
Rinse chickpeas and drain.
Combine all ingredients besides flour in a food processor or bowl.
Mash to a uniform batter.
Add flour, stir thoroughly.

question: How do I make a crispy baked falafel?
answer:
Title: Fruit Crisp
Ingredients:
1 c. whole wheat flour
1 c. ground oats
3/4 c. almond meal
1/2 c. date sugar
1/4 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. coconut
1/2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. vanilla
1 c. oats
water to moisten
Directions:
Mix ingredients
and spread over sliced fruit.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Eggs
Ingredients:
1 large ripe avocado
8 hard-cooked eggs, cut in half
1/2 c. softened cream cheese
pinch of salt and pepper
lemon juice
Directions:
Mash yolks of eggs with fork.
Add the cheese, 3/4 avocado, lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Stuff the egg whites.
Slice remaining avocado thinly.
Put thin slice of avocado on top of eggs.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked shelled eggs, diced
4 strips bacon, fried, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. minced onion
2 large avocados, halved and pitted
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. bottled mustard or to taste
salt to taste
Directions:
Combine eggs, bacon and onion.
Cut and scoop avocado pulp and mash with a fork or large plate.
Stir in mayonnaise, lemon juice, prepared mustard and salt.
Add egg mixture; spoon into pretty glass cups.
Garnish with leaf of lettuce.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Egg Salad
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce (optional)
2 avocados, peeled and chopped
6 hard boiled eggs, chopped
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1/2 c. chopped red onions
1/4 cup fresh parsley or cilantro
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, salt and hot pepper sauce until well blended. Toss lightly with remaining ingredients until evenly coated with dressing. Cover - chill to blend flavors.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Avocado Deviled Eggs
Ingredients:
6 hard-boiled eggs, cut in half lengthwise
3 slices crisp bacon, drained and crumbled
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. paprika
dash of pepper
3 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
1 medium avocado, finely chopped
Directions:
Set aside egg white; sieve yolks.
Combine yolks with remaining ingredients except avocado.
Mix well.
Fold in avocado; refill egg whites with yolk mixture.
Sprinkle with additional paprika.
If desired, top each with a pimento strip or a parsley sprig.
Chill. Makes 12.

question: What can I make with avocado and eggs?
answer:
Title: Egg And Avocado Dip
Ingredients:
1 ripe avocado, diced in small pieces
2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped fine
2 anchovies, cut fine
1/2 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Mix well and refrigerate.
Serve on crackers or as dip.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Appetizers
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground chuck
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/8 tsp. onion salt
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. taco sauce
1 to 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Mix raw chuck with seasonings.
Spread on thin party rye bread.
Place in oven at 450° until brown.
Serve hot.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Appetizers
Ingredients:
marinated herring served on pumpernickel bread
herring in sour cream on rye bread
sardines on rye bread
marinated mushrooms with other marinated vegetables
Directions:
Appetizers have always been a great tradition in a Polish meal. As soon as a guest entered the home, food would be served.
The guest would present the host with a good bottle of vodka.
In order to insure that no one would get too "lively" the hosted quickly put together an appetizing meal.
"Feasting" was above all understood as passing time in community and sharing the pleasures of life.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Pizza Appetizers
Ingredients:
1 lb. hot sausage, cooked, drained and crumbled
1 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. sharp cheese, grated
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese (from wedge)
1 1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
3 cans flaky biscuits (Hungry Jack)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except biscuits.
Separate each biscuit into 3 pizza rounds.
Spread with mixture.
Put pizzas on a cookie sheet and freeze.
Remove from cookie sheet and store in plastic bags.
Bake frozen pizzas at 425° for 10 minutes.
Great for a cocktail party.
Serves 90.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Casserole
Ingredients:
8 oz. medium egg noodles
3 qt. water
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 c. chopped onion
1 green pepper, chopped
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. sour cream
1 1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/4 tsp. pepper
2 c. cubed, cooked chicken
2 c. cubed, cooked ham
1 c. ripe or pimento-stuffed olives, halved
4 oz. diced pimentos
1 can artichoke hearts, drained and halved
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Add egg noodles and salt to rapidly boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender; drain.
Saute onion in butter or margarine until tender, stir in green pepper and cook 1 minute longer.
In large bowl blend mushroom soup, sour cream, salt and pepper, chicken, ham, olives, pimentos and artichoke hearts.
Mix gently, spoon into buttered 3-quart casserole.
Sprinkle with buttered crumbs.
Bake at 325° for 1 hour, serve with grated Parmesan cheese.

question: What’s a good appetizer recipe for a party?
answer:
Title: Party Pizza Appetizers
Ingredients:
1 lb. hot sausage, cooked, drained and crumbled
1 c onion, chopped
1/2 c sharp cheese, grated
1/2 c grated parmesan cheese (from wedge)
1 1/2 tsp oregano
1 tsp garlic salt
1 (8 oz) can tomato sauce
1 (6 oz) can tomato paste
3 cans flaky biscuits
Directions:
Combine first 8 ingredients. Separate each biscuit into 3 pizza rounds. Spread with mixture. Put pizzas on cookie sheet and freeze. Remove from cookie sheet and store in
plastic bags. Bake frozen pizzas at 425° for 10 minutes.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
1 c. butter, at room temperature
3 Tbsp. water
salt to taste
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
3 egg yolks
white pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut butter into 1-inch pieces.
In a small heavy saucepan, combine lemon juice and 2 tablespoons water and reduce over high heat to about one tablespoon.
Remove from heat and add 1 tablespoon cold water.
Beat egg yolks lightly and whisk into lemon water.
Over low heat, whisk in the butter, one piece at a time, making sure that each piece of butter is melted before adding more.
Continue to whisk the sauce until it is thick.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Serving size 8.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
3 egg yolks
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 lb. butter
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
white pepper
Directions:
Beat egg yolks until smooth and creamy, adding the salt.
Melt butter in small saucepan with a pouring lip.
Drop by drop, add 1/2 the butter to the egg yolks and continue beating. Alternately add butter and lemon juice, still beating, until all is used.
Season with some white pepper.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 egg yolks
1 Tbsp. boiling water
Salt and pepper, to taste
Directions:
In double boiler over hot water, melt butter.
Mix in lemon juice and egg yolks.
Cook slowly, beating with whisk constantly. Add boiling water a drop at a time.
Remove from heat.
Keep warm to serve.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
2 egg yolks
1/4 tsp. salt
dash of cayenne pepper
1/2 c. butter, melted
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Beat egg yolks until thick and lemon colored.
Add salt and pepper.
Add 3 tablespoons of melted butter, a little at a time, beating constantly.
Slowly add the rest of the butter alternately with lemon juice.
If made the day before, chill until serving time.
Stir until softened over lukewarm (not hot) water.

question: How do I make a classic hollandaise sauce?
answer:
Title: Lemony Hollandaise Sauce
Ingredients:
1 whole lemon
2 well beaten egg yolks
1 stick butter
Directions:
Use a small, heavy pot.
Squeezing a whole lemon into it, add egg yolks.
Add butter.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly. When butter is melted, cook 1 to 2 minutes longer.
Remove and serve.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake(Small)
Ingredients:
3 eggs, separated
1 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. baking powder
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. warm water
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Put yolks in a bowl.
Add warm water and beat until very light, almost filling a large bowl.
Add gradually the cup of sugar and keep beating until very creamy.
Stir in the flour and beat the egg whites to a froth.
Fold them into the sponge cake mixture.
Then add the salt, vanilla and baking powder.
Pour into ungreased tube and bake 40 or 50 minutes.
Very slowly the first 15 minutes (250°) and then increase temperature to 350°.
Turn upside down on a clean towel and cover pan with the towel so the cooling will be gradual.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or lard
1 c. sugar
1/2 c. molasses
2 eggs
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
2 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. boiling water.
Directions:
Last add boiling water.
Mix and bake at 350°.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. sifted Pillsbury Sno Sheen cake flour
1 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. double-acting baking powder
3/4 c. egg whites (6 medium)
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cream of tartar
1/2 c. additional sugar
1/2 c. egg yolks (6 medium)
1/4 c. cold water
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. lemon or almond extract
Directions:
Sift together flour, 1 cup sugar and baking powder into small mixer bowl.
Measure egg whites, salt and cream of tartar into large mixing bowl.
Beat with electric mixer at high speed until very soft mounds begin to form.
Beat 1/2 cup additional sugar into egg whites, a tablespoon at a time.
Continue beating until very stiff, straight peaks form when beater is raised.
Do not underbeat.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
2 eggs, separated
1 c. sugar
1 c. self-rising flour
1/3 c. hot water
2 tsp. vanilla (optional)
Directions:
Beat egg yolk until a lemon color.
Beat egg whites.
Add egg yolk, sugar and flour.
Add hot water and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Add stiffly beaten egg whites last. Bake in a well-greased pan in 350° oven.

question: How do I make a light and fluffy vanilla sponge cake?
answer:
Title: Sponge Cake
Ingredients:
3/4 c. cold water
3 eggs, separated
1 1/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Beat egg whites stiff.
Set aside.
Put cold water in a large bowl.
Add egg yolks.
Beat until light.
Add sugar and beat 7 minutes (do not fail here; this is the secret of a light cake). Sift flour twice. Add baking powder and salt. Add dry ingredients to egg yolk mixture. Add egg whites. Fold carefully and add vanilla.
Pour into ungreased tube pan and bake 45 minutes in a 350° oven.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
2 c. self-rising flour
1 stick margarine
2 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. Wesson oil
1 c. water
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 beaten eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Combine in large bowl the sugar and flour.
Bring to a boil margarine, cocoa, oil and water.
Pour mixture over sugar and flour and stir.
Then add buttermilk, beaten eggs and vanilla and stir.
Pour into well greased and floured pan (9 x 12-inch) and bake at 300° for 35 minutes.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Six Layer Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 sticks butter
2 c. granulated sugar
7 eggs
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. vanilla extract
1 Tbsp. almond extract
1/3 c. evaporated milk
Directions:
Cream butter, adding sugar until creamy.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Fold in sifted dry ingredients, alternating with milk, beating until smooth.
Add vanilla and almond extract.
Bake in 9-inch pans at 325° for approximately 12 minutes.
Use approximately 6 heaping tablespoonfuls of batter to each pan; makes 6 thin layers.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Lover'S Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 (2 layer size) pkg. chocolate cake mix (not pudding in the mix variety)
1/2 c. unsweetened cocoa
3 eggs
1 1/3 c. water
1 c. mayonnaise
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Grease and flour two (9-inch) round cake pans.
Line bottom of pans with wax paper.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
2 c. plain flour, sifted
1 stick margarine
1 stick butter
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 c. water
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. soda
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Place sugar and flour in a bowl and mix well.
Bring margarine, butter, cocoa and water to a rapid boil.
Remove from heat and pour over sugar and flour.
Mix well.
Add vanilla, soda, buttermilk and eggs.
Beat well with an electric mixer.
Pour in a greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.

question: How do I make a vegan chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Best Ever Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. cocoa
2 c. boiling water
1 c. margarine, softened
2 1/2 c. sugar
4 eggs
2 3/4 c. all-purpose flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
Directions:
Combine cocoa and boiling water, stirring until smooth; set aside.
Cream butter; gradually add sugar, beating well with electric mixer at medium speed.
Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Combine flour, soda, baking powder and salt in medium bowl; add to creamed mixture alternately with cocoa mixture, beating with electric mixer at low speed, beginning and ending with flour mixture.
Stir in vanilla.
Do not overbeat. Pour batter into greased and floured pans (use three 9-inch round pans or one 9 x 13-inch pan).
Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes; test center of cake with toothpick.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes; remove from pans and cool completely on wire racks before frosting.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Fried Rice
Ingredients:
1/4 c. egg substitute
2 Tbsp. rice wine or dry white wine
2 Tbsp. low sodium soy sauce
1 Tbsp. water
1/8 tsp. pepper
nonstick cooking spray
1 c. loose-pack frozen green beans, thawed and well drained
1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1/2 c. bias-sliced celery (1 stalk)
1 small onion, halved and sliced (1/3 c.)
1/2 (8 oz.) can bamboo shoots, drained (1/2 c.)
2 c. chilled cooked rice (cooked without margarine or salt)
2 Tbsp. unsalted dry roasted peanuts, coarsely chopped (optional)
Directions:
In a small mixing bowl, stir together the egg substitute, rice wine or white wine, soy sauce, water and pepper.
Set aside.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice #1
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. salad oil or bacon fat
1/2 c. ham or leftover meat, diced
1/2 c. vegetables (carrots, green beans, bamboo shoots, etc.), diced
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. oyster sauce
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
4 c. cooked rice
1/4 c. green onion, chopped
3 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet.
Add meats and vegetables.
Fry until vegetables are cooked.
Add salt, soy sauce and oyster sauce; cook 1 minute.
Add eggs.
Stir in rice.
Cook until done.
Add green onion.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice With Vegetables
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 egg, beaten
1 medium green bell pepper, chopped
3 scallions, sliced
1 celery rib, sliced
2 garlic cloves, minced
1/2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed (1 c.)
1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/8 tsp. hot pepper sauce
2 c. cooked rice, cooled
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
Directions:
In a wok, heat 1 tablespoon oil over medium-high heat until hot.
Add egg and cook, stirring, until firm, about 2 minutes. Remove to a plate.
Cut into small pieces.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. oil
1/4 to 1/2 lb. any cooked or raw meat or poultry or 1 can shrimp, rinsed and drained
3 cloves garlic, minced
1 c. sliced green onions
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3 c. cooked rice, chilled
1 c. frozen peas and carrots, cooked
2 eggs, beaten
Directions:
Heat oil in large skillet or wok.
Add meat (cut in thin strips or small pieces), garlic, onion, salt, pepper, sugar and soy sauce.
Stir-fry until meat is tender and hot, about 1 to 2 minutes.
Add rice.
Stir-fry 5 minutes.
Add peas and carrots. Stir well into rice-meat mixture.
Push rice-meat mixture to sides of skillet or wok; add beaten eggs and cook briefly before stirring through rice-meat mixture.
Continue to stir until eggs are completely cooked.
Serve immediately.
Serves 4.

question: How can I make fried rice with vegetables?
answer:
Title: Fried Rice
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. vegetable oil
3 eggs, beaten
dash of salt
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/4 lb. mushrooms
3 c. cooked, cold rice
soy sauce to taste
Directions:
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in skillet.
Add eggs and salt.
Fry until firm.
Remove to plate.
Cut into strips and reserve.
Heat remaining 5 tablespoons of oil in skillet.
Add onion and mushrooms.
Saute just until tender and crisp.
Add rice.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until heated through.
Stir in soy sauce and eggs.
Taste.
Add more soy sauce, if desired.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Brandied Roast Pork
Ingredients:
1 tsp. soy sauce
2 c. teriyaki sauce
1 c. pineapple juice
1 c. brown sugar
1 c. white vinegar
3 tsp. garlic powder
1 c. brandy
3 lb. pork loin
pinch of salt and pepper
Directions:
Place all ingredients, except pork loin, in a saucepan and bring to a low boil, stirring until sugar is melted and ingredients are blended. Use caution since this boils over easily. Let cool. Reserve 1/3 cup of the marinade and refrigerate. Marinate pork for no less than 4 hours; overnight works best.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Good Pork Roast
Ingredients:
3 to 4 lb. pork roast
1 pt. vinegar
salt and pepper to taste
1/2 c. sugar
1 can tomato soup
Directions:
Cook slow until meat gets done and then take out of sauce. Let sauce continue to boil until it is as thick as you want it. Then pour over meat and serve.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Pork Roast And Gravy
Ingredients:
1 pork roast
1 can golden mushroom soup
1 can cream chicken soup
1/2 onion, sliced
1 clove garlic, diced
1/2 c. water
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt (more or less to taste)
black pepper
2 Tbsp. oil
flour
Directions:
Season pork roast with seasoned salt and black pepper. Heat oil in Dutch oven. Dredge the roast in flour and brown on all sides in oil. Heat soups and water together in saucepan. Add onion and garlic. Drain fat from pork. Pour soup mixture over pork roast in the Dutch oven. Cover. Place in a 325° to 350° oven. Bake until well done.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Pork Roast
Ingredients:
1/2 c. Dijon mustard
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. olive oil
4 garlic cloves, minced
1 tsp dried thyme
1 boneless pork loin roast
1 tsp salt
1/4 tsp pepper
1 1/2 c. white wine
Directions:
In a small bowl combine mustard, soy sauce, oil, garlic and thyme.
Rub over roast.
Refrigerate, turning occasionally.
Place roast on a rack in a shallow roasting pan.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Pour wine into the pan.
Bake uncovered at 325°F for about 2 1/2 hours, until meat thermometer reads 160°, basting with pan juices every 30 minutes.
Before slicing let stand for 10 minutes.
Serve over mashed potatoes with green lettuce.

question: What can I do with leftover pork roast?
answer:
Title: Pork Roast
Ingredients:
1 (4 to 5 lb.) pork roast
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon
3 D'Anjou or Bosc pears (1 lb.), peeled and halved
2 lb. sweet potatoes, peeled and quartered
1/4 c. margarine
1/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed
1/2 c. maple syrup
1/8 tsp. ground cloves
1/8 tsp. nutmeg
1 tsp. cornstarch
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Sprinkle roast with salt, pepper and cinnamon; rub into meat.
Place roast on rack in baking pan, fat side up.
Bake about 3 to 3 1/2 hours (allow 25 minutes per pound).
Place pears and sweet potatoes around meat; continue baking.
Spoon off fat.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Molten Chocolate Lava Cake(Petite Gateau)
Ingredients:
1/2 cup Butter, unsalted
4 ounce(s) Bittersweet chocolate
2 Egg(s)
2 Egg yolk(s)
1/4 cup Sugar
2 tablespoon(s) Flour, all-purpose
Directions:
Butter and flour 4 custard cups.
Preheat oven to 450F.
Melt butter and chocolate.
Do NOT let it boil.
Remove from heat and set aside.
Beat together the 2 eggs plus 2 yolks and the sugar, until it's light and thick.
Pour the now tepid chocolate mixture into the egg mixture, and beat to mix.
Quickly beat in the flour until just mixed in.
Pour into the custard cups.
(At this point you can refrigerate for up to 24 hours.
If you refrigerate, let return to room temp before you bake.)
Put custard cups on a baking sheet and bake at 450 degrees for 6-7 minutes.
The outside will be set up, but the top may still be slightly wiggly (technical French cooking term).
Invert on plate, let sit for 10 seconds or so, remove custard cup.
Sprinkle with powdered sugar, and surround with a fruit sauce of you're choice.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1/2 c. cocoa
1/2 tsp. soda
2 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. Crisco
1 c. boiling water
1/2 c. buttermilk
1/8 tsp. salt
2 eggs
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients (flour, sugar, cocoa, soda and salt).
Cut in shortening.
Add slightly beaten eggs, buttermilk and vanilla; beat for 2 minutes, then add the 1 cup boiling water. Don't beat.
Just mix well.
Pour into well-greased and floured pans and bake at 350° for about 30 to 35 minutes.
"Real moist cake".

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 sq. unsweetened chocolate
2 1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/4 c. (1 lb.) brown sugar
3 eggs
2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. buttermilk
1 c. boiling water
Directions:
Melt chocolate over hot water.
Sift flour, soda and salt on wax paper.
Cream margarine and butter.
Add sugar.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
Stir in vanilla and chocolate.
Add flour mixture a third at a time alternately with buttermilk.
Stir in hot water and pour into 3 (9-inch) greased cake pans.
Bake in 375° oven for 25 to 30 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
4 c. brown sugar
4 c. white sugar
12 c. flour
2 c. cocoa
4 tsp. baking powder
4 tsp. soda
4 tsp. salt (level)
8 Tbsp. shortening (heaping)
1/4 c. vinegar
1/4 c. vanilla (8 tsp.)
8 c. hot water (add coffee, 12 tsp. to make strong)
Directions:
Stir all dry ingredients.
Make wells.
Before mixing dry ingredients, shortening, vinegar and vanilla, pour hot coffee over and mix.
Add 5 eggs last.
Use 1/4 of recipe for 3 dozen cupcakes.

question: What’s a recipe for chocolate lava cake?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. butter
1 c. sugar
1 c. brown sugar
6 egg yolks
3 Tbsp. cold water
3 sq. Baker's unsweetened chocolate, melted
2 c. sifted cake flour
1 tsp. baking soda
pinch of salt
1 tsp. pure vanilla
1 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Cream butter and sugar thoroughly.
Add chocolate.
Add egg yolks, which have been beaten well with water.
Sift flour, soda and salt 3 times.
Add to first mixture alternately with buttermilk until all are used.
Beat until well mixed.
Add vanilla.
Bake in 2 large layer pans (1 1/2 x 9-inch) for about 35 minutes in a 350° oven.
Use a seven minute frosting between layers and a chocolate frosting on top and sides.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 egg
1 1/4 c. buttermilk or soured milk
1 1/4 c. flour
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 tsp. baking powder
1 c. mashed banana
2 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Beat egg.
Beat in remaining ingredients until smooth.
Serve with honey or currant jelly or dust with confectioners sugar.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. salt
1 egg
1 c. buttermilk
1 Tbsp. margarine, melted
1 very ripe banana, mashed
Directions:
Sift flour and combine with next 4 ingredients. Combine egg, buttermilk and margarine; add to dry mixture. Stir until smooth. Stir in banana. Use 1/4 cup batter for each pancake. Pour onto hot griddle coated with cooking spray. Turn only once when edges look done. Serve with maple syrup and strawberry preserves.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. flour (all-purpose)
4 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
4 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
2 eggs
1 1/2 c. milk
1/3 c. melted butter
1 1/2 c. mashed bananas
Directions:
Sift flour with baking powder, salt, sugar and cinnamon.
Beat eggs and beat in milk, butter, bananas and vanilla.
Add dry ingredients and stir until blended.
Bake each pancake on a hot, lightly oiled griddle, pouring out 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Flip once when brown.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Yummy Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
3 c. whole wheat flour
3 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 1/4 tsp. double acting baking powder
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
3 eggs
3 c. buttermilk
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 ripe banana, mashed
Directions:
Beat 3 eggs until light.
Add 3 cups buttermilk, 3 tablespoons butter and ripe banana.
Combine the dry ingredients with the liquid ingredients.
Cook on medium hot griddle.
Makes 24 medium pancakes.
Freeze extras for easy, healthy breakfast, lunch or snacks.

question: How do I make banana pancakes?
answer:
Title: Banana Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. white sugar
2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
1 egg, beaten
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
2 ripe bananas, mashed
Directions:
Combine dry ingredients. In a separate bowl, mix remaining ingredients. Stir flour mixture into banana mixture; batter will be slightly lumpy.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 beaten egg
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. onion salt
1 tsp. celery salt
2 slices bread, cut into crumbs
2 lb. ground beef
1 c. oatmeal
catsup
Directions:
Mix ingredients in order listed.
Shape into loaf.
Top with catsup.
Bake at 375° for approximately 1 hour in foil-lined pan.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Meatloaf
Ingredients:
4 slices white bread, torn into pieces
2 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 medium yellow onion, peeled and cut into 1/8's
2 cloves garlic
2 stalks celery, cut into 2 inch pieces
2 carrots, peeled, cut into 2 inch pieces
1/2 c. flat leaf parsley leaves
1 large egg
1 c. ketchup
3 tsp. dry mustard
1 Tbsp. coarse salt
2 tsp. freshly ground black pepper
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°.
Place bread in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine crumbs form. Transfer to a medium bowl, and add ground beef.
Place onion, garlic, celery, carrots, and parsley in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a steel blade; pulse until fine.
Add to meat mixture, using hands to mix well.
Add egg, 1/2 c. ketchup, 2 tsp. dry mustard, salt and pepper; use hands to combine thoroughly.
Place in an 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2 inch loaf pan.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Mystery Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 pound of alligator meat
1/2 cup of turtle eyes
1/2 cup of green slime
1 tablespoon of toxic waste
1 pinch of sand to spice
Directions:
Take 2 cups of flour mix with 1 gallon of sugar.
Put in the oven for 12 hours at 250°.
Shape it as a banana then let it cool for about 1 hour.
Sprinkle yellow sprinkles until no fudge is showing.
On top of the cake put 5 chocolate brownies.
In the center put a single strawberry then crack 2 raw eggs on top. Put in the refrigerator for 2 days, then serve.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Super Tasty Basic Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. ketchup
1/3 c. tomato juice
1/2 tsp. each salt and pepper
1/8 tsp. red pepper
2 eggs, beaten
3/4 c. soft breadcrumbs
1/4 c. chopped onion
2 tsp. prepared mustard
1/4 c. ketchup
1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
2 tsp. brown sugar
Directions:
In large bowl, combine 1/2 cup ketchup, tomato juice, salt, peppers, eggs, breadcrumbs, onion and 2 teaspoons mustard.
Mix thoroughly.
Add ground beef.
Mix. Press beef into a 5 X 5 loaf pan.
Combine 1/4 cup ketchup, 1/2 teaspoon mustard and brown sugar and spread over meatloaf.
Bake at 400° for 35 to 40 minutes or until done.
Garnish with fresh herbs, if desired.

question: How do I make a classic meatloaf?
answer:
Title: Easy Meatloaf
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. extra lean hamburger
1 pkg. meatloaf seasoning
1 egg
4 oz. applesauce
1/4 c. A-1 or Heinz 57 sauce
1/3 c. breadcrumbs
Directions:
Combine all ingredients thoroughly in large mixing bowl. Place in either a loaf pan or shape into loaf in large baking dish. Shape mixture so there is room on all sides. Bake 1 hour at 325°.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
3/4 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. lite or fat-free sour cream
1/2 c. vegetable oil
2 eggs
2 Tbsp. poppy seeds
2 Tbsp. milk
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 tsp. lemon extract
Directions:
In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt; set aside. Combine remaining ingredients; mix well. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups 2/3 full. Bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes or until muffins test done. Cool in pan for 10 minutes before removing to a wire rack.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy-Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. all-purpose flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
3/4 c. skim or 1% milk
1 (6 oz.) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
2 Tbsp. oil
2 egg whites
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder and poppy seed.
Add milk, lemonade, oil and egg whites.
Stir until moistened; do not overmix.
Coat a 12-muffin tin with nonstick cooking spray or line with muffin cups.
Fill each 2/3 full with muffin mixture.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 400° or until golden brown.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon-Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 c. milk
2 eggs
1 pkg. lemon instant pudding mix (4-serving size)
2 c. Bisquick (original mix)
1/4 c. poppy seed (I use 1/8 c. or 2 Tbsp.)
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. grated lemon rind
Directions:
Grease bottoms of or use paper baking
cups in regular muffin pan.
Mix oil, milk, eggs and pudding mix with fork until blended. Stir in the poppy seeds.
Divide evenly into 12 prepared muffin pan.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes in preheated oven at 375°.
Cool 10 minutes and drizzle with glaze.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Muffins
Ingredients:
1 c. margarine
1 3/4 c. sugar, divided
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
5 eggs, separated
3/4 c. lemon juice
2 2/3 c. flour, sifted
1 1/4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. baking soda
1 c. poppy seed
1 Tbsp. grated lemon peel
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Beat margarine, 1 1/2 cups sugar and cream cheese at medium speed with mixer until light and fluffy. Blend in egg yolks and lemon juice.
Add combined flour, baking powder and baking soda and mix well.
Beat in poppy seed and peel. Set aside.
Beat egg whites until foamy.
Gradually add reserved 1/4 cup sugar, beating until soft peaks form.
Fold egg whites into batter.
Pour into greased muffin pan.
Bake 55 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
Cool and remove from pan.

question: What’s a recipe for a lemon poppy seed muffin?
answer:
Title: Lemon Poppy Seed Muffins
Ingredients:
2 c. plain flour
1/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. baking powder
1 Tbsp. poppy seed
3/4 c. low-fat milk
1 (16 oz.) can frozen lemonade, thawed
2 Tbsp. oil
2 egg whites
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, salt, baking powder and poppy seed.
Add milk, lemonade, oil and egg whites.
Stir until moistened; don't overmix.
Spray pan with Pam and fill 2/3 full.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 400°.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1 tsp. margarine
1 tsp. vegetable oil
1/2 lb. chicken cutlets, cut into cubes
1/2 c. sliced green or red bell peppers
1/2 c. sliced onion
1/2 c. quartered mushrooms
1 small garlic clove, sliced
1/2 c. drained canned crushed pineapple (no sugar added)
1 1/2 tsp. ketchup
1 tsp. firmly packed light or dark brown sugar
1 tsp. cider vinegar
1/2 packet (about 1/2 tsp.) instant chicken broth and seasoning mix
1 large plum tomato, blanched, peeled, seeded and sliced
1/4 diagonally sliced scallions (green onions)
Directions:
In 9 or 10-inch skillet heat margarine and oil together until margarine is bubbly and mixture is hot; add chicken and saute, stirring frequently, until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
Add peppers, onion, mushrooms and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender-crisp, about 5 minutes. In blender container combine pineapple, ketchup, sugar, vinegar and broth mix and process until pureed, scraping down sides of container as necessary.
Pour pureed mixture over chicken and vegetables in skillet and stir to combine; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low; add tomato and scallions, stir to combine, and cook until flavors blend, about 5 minutes.
Makes 2 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1 c. (8 oz.) pineapple chunks
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 Tbsp. shortening or Pam
1 1/4 c. water
2 c. carrot sticks
3 bouillon cubes or instant broth packets
1/4 c. firmly packed brown sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/4 tsp. ginger
1/4 c. catsup and 1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. vinegar
2 c. diced cooked chicken and/or can stir-fry
1 c. green pepper strips (you can substitute green beans)
3/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 1/4 c. Minute rice
Directions:
Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
Add water to juice to make 2 1/4 cups.
Saute onion in shortening in large skillet until tender.
Add 1 1/4 cups water, carrots and bouillon.
Cover and simmer 5 minutes.
Combine sugar, cornstarch and ginger.
Add catsup, vinegar and soy sauce and stir into vegetable mixture. Cook until clear and thickened.
Add chicken, green peppers and pineapple.
Cover and simmer 5 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
2 pkg. boneless, washed chicken breasts, patted dry
1/2 c. flour
1/3 c. vegetable oil (canola)
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 (13 1/2 oz.) can pineapple chunks
1 c. white sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
3/4 c. vinegar
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 tsp. ginger
1 chicken bouillon cube
2 green peppers, cut into strips
Directions:
Coat chicken with flour.
Fry in a large skillet and brown all sides.
Remove and place in shallow baking pan and arrange pieces to fit.
Sprinkle with salt and pepper.
Reheat oven to 350°. Drain pineapple juice in measuring cup and add water to make 1 1/4 cups of liquid. In medium saucepan, combine sugar, cornstarch, pineapple juice, vinegar, soy sauce, ginger and bouillon cube. Bring to a boil, stirring until smooth.
Boil 2 minutes; pour over chicken.
Add pineapple chunks and green pepper strips.
Bake 30 to 40 minutes, uncovered, until tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet-Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
1/4 c. water
2 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. vinegar
1 c. pineapple juice
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
3/4 c. green pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. onion, cut up
1 can pineapple chunks, drained
1 chicken, cut up
vegetable oil
Directions:
Combine water and cornstarch; add salt, brown sugar, vinegar, pineapple juice and soy sauce.
Cook until thick.
Add green pepper, onion and pineapple.
Brown the chicken in oil.
Cover with sauce.
Bake at 325° until tender.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for sweet and sour chicken?
answer:
Title: Sweet And Sour Chicken
Ingredients:
2 chicken breasts, skinned, boned and split
1/2 tsp. salt
1 egg, beaten
3/4 c. Bisquick
1 c. oil
2/3 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 Tbsp. paprika
1 can pineapple chunks, drained
1/4 c. soy sauce
1/4 c. vinegar (cider)
1 c. green pepper strips
1/2 c. sliced onions
2 tomatoes, cubed
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with salt and coat with egg and Bisquick. Fry at 400° until brown and place on paper towels in oven at 250°. Combine sugar, cornstarch and paprika in skillet.
Drain pineapple and add water to juice to make 2 cups.
Add pineapple, soy sauce and vinegar to sugar mixture.
Cook until it boils and let boil 1 minute.
Add green pepper and onions and cook 5 minutes.
Add pineapple, tomatoes and chicken.
Serve over hot white rice.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
3 c. cooked butternut squash
1/2 stick margarine
1 c. sugar
2 beaten eggs
1/2 c. evaporated milk
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. vanilla
raisins, nuts, coconut
Directions:
Mix all together and pour into greased baking dish.
Melt 1/2 stick margarine and drizzle over casserole.
Add topping.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Bread
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. plus 2 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 tsp. ground cloves
1/2 c. melted margarine
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/3 c. water (from cooking squash)
1 c. cooked squash
1/2 c. raisins or mixed fruit
Directions:
Sift together dry ingredients.
Beat shortening, eggs, water and squash. Combine with dry ingredients until dry mix is moist. Pour into greased and floured pan.
Bake at 350° for 55 to 60 minutes.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Sauteed Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 1/2 lb. butternut squash, seeded and cut into 1-inch chunks (about 3 1/2 c.)
1 large clove garlic, minced
salt and pepper to taste
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh sage
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh Italian parsley
Directions:
In a heavy (preferably nonstick) skillet, heat oil until sizzling.
Add squash and garlic to coat well with oil.
Saute slowly over low heat, stirring frequently, for about 30 minutes until squash is golden and tender.
(Add a tablespoon or two of water to pan if squash begins to stick.)
Add salt and pepper to taste, then sprinkle sage and parsley over squash and mix to combine well.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash
Ingredients:
4 medium squash
2/3 c. brown sugar
2/3 c. white sugar
1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg
1/4 tsp. salt
4 tsp. lemon juice
5 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Cut potatoes for frying (about 6 good ones).
Coat with 1 heaping
tablespoonful of flour.
Fry in deep oil.
Salt to taste.

question: How do I make a creamy butternut squash risotto?
answer:
Title: Butternut Squash Cake
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. oil
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. cloves
1/2 tsp. allspice
1/2 tsp. nutmeg
3 eggs
2 c. plain flour
2 Tbsp. baking powder
1 tsp. soda
8 oz. crushed pineapple (undrained)
2 c. grated butternut squash
1 c. walnuts
Directions:
In large bowl, combine first 6 ingredients. Beat eggs. Add to spice mixture. Mix dry ingredients together. Slowly add to spice mixture. Beat 5 minutes. Add pineapple, squash and nuts. Fold in. Pour in large, greased tube pan. Bake at 300° for 55 minutes. Cool. Frost with Buttercream Frosting or your favorite frosting.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 Tbsp. sugar
4 tsp. baking powder
1 tsp. salt
2 egg yolks
2 c. milk
2 Tbsp. melted butter
2 egg whites, stiffly beaten
Directions:
Add egg whites last.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
4 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 egg, slightly beaten
1 tsp. vanilla
2 Tbsp. melted butter
1 3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all dry ingredients.
In separate bowl, add vanilla to eggs and beat slightly.
Add to dry ingredients.
Add milk and mix.
Add melted butter and stir until smooth.
Cook on hot griddle at 400°.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
4 tsp. baking powder
2 tsp. sugar
1 Tbsp. oil
1 egg
1 c. milk (approximately)
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients together, adding the milk last, while mixing to the desired texture.
Pour onto hot griddle.
Cook and enjoy!

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Pancakes
Ingredients:
1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. baking soda
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 egg, beaten
1 c. buttermilk
2 Tbsp. melted margarine
Directions:
Combine flour, sugar, soda, baking powder and salt.
Combine egg, buttermilk and butter; slowly stir into dry ingredients. Batter will be very thick.
For each pancake, spoon about 1/4 cup batter onto a hot, lightly greased griddle.
Turn pancakes when tops are covered with bubbles and edges are brown.

question: What’s a recipe for fluffy chocolate chip pancakes?
answer:
Title: Fluffy Buttermilk Pancakes
Ingredients:
3 egg yolks
1 2/3 c. buttermilk
1 tsp. soda
1 1/2 c. flour
1 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
3 Tbsp. butter
3 egg whites, stiffly beaten
Directions:
Beat egg yolks with rotary beater. Add remaining ingredients except egg whites and beat until smooth. Gently fold in egg whites.
Pour onto hot griddle.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 egg whites
1/8 tsp. salt
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1/2 tsp. almond extract
2 c. packed flaked coconut
15 red candied cherries, halved (optional)
Directions:
Grease a large cookie sheet well.
Dust with flour; shake off excess and set aside.
In a small bowl beat egg whites until foamy; add salt and beat until soft peaks form.
Gradually add sugar 1 tablespoon at a time and beat until very stiff.
Fold in extracts and coconut until well blended.
Place rounded teaspoonfuls 1 inch apart on a cookie sheet.
With fingers dipped in cold water, smooth mounds.
Top each with a cherry half.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
1 c. brown sugar, packed
1 c. granulated sugar
1 c. melted shortening (Crisco or butter)
2 eggs, beaten
1 c. coconut
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
1 c. sifted flour
4 c. rolled oats
1/2 c. nuts
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Sift salt, soda and flour; mix ingredients in order given. Drop by teaspoon on greased cookie sheet.
Press flat.
Bake at 350° for 12 to 15 minutes.
Makes about 4 dozen 2-inch cookies.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
3 c. moist shredded coconut (8 oz.)
1 tsp. vanilla or almond extract
1/8 tsp. salt
2/3 c. sweetened condensed milk
1 or 2 stiffly beaten egg whites
chocolate
confectioners sugar
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Have the coconut ready in a bowl.
Add the vanilla or almond extract and salt.
Combine these with the sweetened condensed milk.
Make a thick paste.
These are much improved by folding into the batter the stiffly beaten egg whites. Roll into balls, or drop by teaspoon onto a well-greased cookie sheet.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, until lightly browned around edges.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 large egg whites
1/8 tsp. salt
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
1 (7 oz.) bag flaked coconut
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
Directions:
Preheat oven to 300°.
Grease and flour large cookie sheet. In small bowl with mixer at high speed, beat egg whites and salt until soft peaks form.
Beating at high speed, sprinkle in sugar 2 tablespoons at a time, beating well after each addition, until sugar is completely dissolved.
Beat in vanilla (whites should stand in stiff glossy peaks).
With rubber spatula fold in coconut and flour.

question: How do I make coconut macaroons?
answer:
Title: Coconut Macaroons
Ingredients:
2 egg whites
1/8 tsp. salt
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
2 (3 1/2 oz.) cans (3 c.) flaked coconut
1/4 c. all-purpose flour
Directions:
Preheat oven to 300°.
Grease and flour cookie sheets.
In small bowl, beat egg whites and salt until soft peaks form. Beating at high speeds, sprinkle in sugar, 2 tablespoons at a time, beating well after each addition.
Beat in vanilla (whites should stand in stiff, glossy peaks).
With rubber spatula, fold in coconut and flour.
Drop by tablespoons about 1 inch apart onto cookie sheets.
Bake 20 minutes or until lightly brown.
Remove with metal spatula.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. cooked, chopped chicken
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of chicken soup, undiluted
2 Tbsp. chopped pimiento
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and thinly sliced
20 slices bread, crusts removed
4 eggs, slightly beaten
2 Tbsp. milk
1 (6 oz.) bag potato chips, crushed
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients, mixing well. Spread evenly on 10 slices of bread.
Top with the remaining 10 slices. Wrap individually in freezer wrap and freeze.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken
Ingredients:
10 chicken breast halves
10 chicken legs (drum and thigh)
3/4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt-free herb-blend seasoning
2 tsp. paprika
1 tsp. pepper
2 eggs or 4 egg whites or 1/2 c. non-cholesterol egg substitute
1/4 c. milk (low-fat, if desired)
1/4 c. Dijon-type mustard
1 1/2 tsp. chopped rosemary
4 c. Panko or 2 c. plain dried bread crumbs
1/4 c. chopped parsley
Directions:
Remove skin from chicken.
Wash each piece and drain well. Combine flour, herb-blend, paprika and pepper.
Place in paper or plastic bag and add 3 pieces of chicken at a time; shake to coat. Beat eggs, milk, mustard and rosemary together until smooth; set aside.
Combine bread crumbs and parsley.
Dip chicken in egg mixture, shake off excess, then dip in crumb mixture to coat evenly.
Place coated pieces on shallow, lightly greased baking pans.
Let stand 30 minutes before baking.
(Or cover and refrigerate until baking time.)
Bake 10 minutes at 425°.
Reduce heat to 375° and bake an additional 25 minutes or until browned and juices run clear when knife is inserted.
Serve chilled. Makes 10 generous servings.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Hot Chicken Sandwich Supreme
Ingredients:
1/2 stick butter or margarine
1/2 c. diced green pepper
1 c. sliced mushrooms
4 Tbsp. flour
1 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
2 Tbsp. diced pimiento
2 1/2 c. diced cooked chicken
salt and pepper
2 egg yolks
2 Tbsp. sherry
8 slices bread (crust trimmed off)
2 eggs (additional)
1/2 c. milk (additional)
3 c. coarsely crushed potato chips
3 Tbsp. blanched almonds
Directions:
Heat butter, add green pepper and mushrooms, cook on low heat 5 minutes.
Add flour and stir until blended.
Slowly add stock and milk.
Stir over low heat until thick and smooth.
Add pimiento and chicken.
Add salt and pepper if desired.
Heat thoroughly.
Into slightly beaten egg yolks stir a little of the hot sauce.
Slowly add the egg mixture to the remaining sauce, stirring constantly.
Add sherry.
Pour mixture into an 8-inch square pan.
Cool, then put in refrigerator several hours or overnight.
Cut chicken mixture into 4 squares.
Place each square on a slice of bread.
Cover with slice of bread.
Smooth sides with spatula.
Cut each sandwich in half.
Beat eggs with 1/4 cup milk.
Dip each sandwich half on all sides in egg mixture, then in potato chips.
Place on greased baking sheet.
Sprinkle almonds on top.
Bake 30 minutes at 350°.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Baked Chicken
Ingredients:
1/2 c. fine dry bread crumbs
1 tsp. brown sugar
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. chili powder
1/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/4 tsp. celery seed
1/8 tsp. cayenne
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) broiler-fryer, cut up
1/4 c. margarine
salt and pepper
Directions:
Combine bread crumbs, brown sugar, chili powder, garlic powder, dry mustard, celery seed and cayenne.
Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Brush each chicken piece with butter.
Roll in crumb mixture to coat.
Arrange chicken, skin side up, so that pieces do not touch, in a shallow baking pan.
Sprinkle with remaining crumb mixture.
Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 50 minutes or until tender. Do not turn.
Makes approximately 6 servings.

question: I want a recipe for a crispy chicken sandwich.
answer:
Title: Crispy Chicken
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. crisp rice cereal coarsely crushed
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. dried thyme
1/4 tsp. poultry seasoning
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
Directions:
In a shallow bowl, combine first 5 ingredients.
Place butter in another bowl.
Dip chicken in butter, then into cereal mixture. Place in a greased 11x7 baking pan.
Drizzle with remaining butter.
Bake uncovered at 400 degrees for 20-25 minutes or until juices run clear.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken-Rice Twosome
Ingredients:
1 chicken breast, halved
1/4 c. flour
1/2 tsp. onion powder
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. margarine
1 1/3 c. hot water
2 chicken bouillon cubes
2 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
1/2 c. uncooked long-grain rice
1 (2 1/2 oz.) jar sliced mushrooms, drained
2 small ribs celery, chopped
2 green onions, chopped
Directions:
Coat chicken with flour, onion powder, paprika and pepper.
In skillet, brown chicken in hot margarine.
In a small saucepan, heat water and bouillon cubes until dissolved.
Stir in sherry.
In bottom of a 1 1/2-quart casserole, combine water mixture, rice, mushrooms, celery and onion.
Place chicken on top.
Cover and bake at 375° for 50 to 60 minutes or until all liquid is absorbed and chicken is tender.
Makes 2 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Brown Rice(Low-Fat)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. oil
3/4 c. chopped green onions (including tops)
1 c. green pepper, diced
1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced
1 c. water chestnuts, sliced
3 c. cooked brown rice
3 c. cooked chicken, cut into bite-size pieces*
1/3 c. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
*Turkey or tuna may be substituted.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Creamy Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
1/2 c. uncooked wild rice
3 c. boiling water
1/2 c. uncooked long grain rice
1/2 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/4 c. flour
1 (6 oz.) can sliced mushrooms (undrained)
chicken broth
1 1/2 c. light cream
3 c. diced cooked chicken
1/4 c. chopped pimento (optional)
1/4 c. snipped parsley
1 tsp. salt and pepper to taste
1/4 c. slivered almonds, toasted
Directions:
Rinse wild rice in cold water. Add with 1/2 teaspoon salt to 2 cups boiling water.
Cook 20 minutes. Add long-grain rice, remaining 1 cup boiling water and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Cook 20 minutes.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Rice
Ingredients:
1 pkg. Spanish rice
1 whole chicken
1 onion, chopped
4 carrots, cut in cubes
3 stalks celery, cut in cubes
1/4 tsp. dry thyme
2 packets beef bouillon
1/4 lb. butter
Directions:
Boil chicken.
Remove from broth and let cool.
Boil rice, onion, carrots, celery, spices and butter in chicken broth (vegetables should be crisp).
Remove chicken from bones.
Add the chicken to the prepared rice.
Heat and serve.

question: What can I make with leftover rice and chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken Rice Delight
Ingredients:
2 c. cooked rice
2 c. cooked, sliced chicken (4 to 5 chicken breasts)
1 1/2 c. chopped celery
1/2 c. chopped onions
1 (3 oz.) pkg. sliced almonds
1 can cream of mushroom soup
1 c. mayonnaise
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. salt
1/2 c. fine bread crumbs
2 Tbsp. melted margarine
1 pkg. frozen broccoli, cooked
Directions:
In large bowl, mix soup, mayonnaise, lemon and salt until blended.
Add chicken, rice, celery and onions.
Grease a 2-quart casserole (larger for a double party size).
Place well-drained broccoli at bottom; add 1/2 of chicken; sprinkle with 1/2 the almonds; add the remaining chicken.
Sprinkle with bread crumbs and margarine around edge of the casserole and remainder of almonds in center.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 45 minutes or until bubbly.
If making ahead, add crumbs and almonds at time of baking.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 c. sweet potatoes, cooked
1/2 stick margarine
1 Tbsp. cinnamon-sugar
1/2 c. brown sugar
1 tsp. nutmeg
1/2 c. Karo syrup
Directions:
Put all the ingredients in a casserole dish with lid and bake at 400°, for about 30 minutes or until hot and bubbly.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
2 large sweet potatoes
1/3 c. white Karo syrup
1/2 stick margarine, melted
1/2 c. sugar
1/3 c. water
Directions:
Peel and cut potatoes in 2 1/2-inch lengths.
Add ingredients in order listed.
Cook, covered with foil, for 20 minutes. Uncover and cook about 1 hour.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Candied Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
1 c. dark corn Karo syrup
1/2 c. firmly packed dark brown sugar
2 Tbsp. margarine
12 medium sweet potatoes, cooked
Directions:
Bring first 3 ingredients to a boil.
Reduce heat; simmer 5 minutes.
Pour half into a large shallow baking dish.
Add potatoes.
Top with remaining syrup.
Bake at 350°, basting often, for 20 minutes.
Do not cover.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Shredded Sweet Potatoes
Ingredients:
4 medium sweet potatoes, shredded
2 c. sugar
1/4 c. syrup (light Karo)
2 sticks margarine, melted
4 eggs
2 c. milk
1 c. coconut *
3/4 c. raisins *
1 c. chopped dates *
chopped pecans *
1/8 tsp. cinnamon
1/8 tsp. allspice
Directions:
*May vary amounts as desired.

question: What can I cook with kale and sweet potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sweet Potato Casserole
Ingredients:
3 c. mashed, cooked, sweet potatoes
1/2 c. sugar
1/3 c. orange juice
1/4 c. butter
2 eggs
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. white Karo
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Combine ingredients in shallow baking dish.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 lb. lean ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 c. catsup
3/4 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. sugar
1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown beef, onion and garlic; drain.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer until well blended.
Serve warm with your favorite chips or crackers.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 clove minced garlic
1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
1/4 c. ketchup
3/4 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. sugar
1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Brown hamburger, onion and garlic.
Drain well.
Add remaining ingredients and heat thoroughly.
Serve hot.
Good with tortilla chips or crackers.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 small jar cooked, dried beef
8 oz. cream cheese
1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes with green chilies
3 to 4 green onions, chopped (with stems)
Directions:
Combine all ingredients and chill.
Serve with tortilla chips.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Vegetable Dip
Ingredients:
1/2 c. tomato soup or tomato sauce
1/2 c. cider vinegar
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. French mustard
1 egg yolk
Directions:
Place all ingredients in a double boiler and mix well.
Cook over boiling water until thick. When still somewhat runny, cool and put in container. Refrigerate.
It will thicken when cool. Serve as dip for vegetables.

question: How do I make a spicy buffalo chicken dip?
answer:
Title: Spicy Beef Dip
Ingredients:
1 pound ground beef
1 tablespoon onion chopped
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder
1 8-ounce can tomato sauce
1/4 cup ketchup
1 teaspoon oregano
1 teaspoon sugar
1 teaspoon salt
1 8-ounce package cream cheese
Directions:
Brown beef and drain.
Add all ingredients and simmer 15-20 minutes.
Then add cream cheese with the meat mixture to a crock pot.
Stir well on low heat.
Serve with corn or tortilla chips.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3/4 c. salad oil
3 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onions
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. coarse black pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a covered jar and shake thoroughly. Chill.
Shake again before using.
Makes 1 1/2 cups dressing. Pour over broken romaine lettuce leaves and add croutons and anchovies if you like.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3/4 c. salad oil (canola, olive or vegetable)
3 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
1/3 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped green onions
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. garlic salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
Directions:
Shake in a jar and serve immediately!

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. garlic
1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
4 eggs
2 oz. anchovy paste
4 oz. Dijon mustard
2 oz. lemon and pepper seasoning
5 oz. lemon juice
24 oz. olive oil
8 oz. salad oil
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together.
Chill for 30 minutes and serve.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 egg (yolk only)
1 good size squeeze anchovy paste
squeezed lemon
Directions:
Mix together in wooden bowl. Toss with lettuce (romaine), cut up. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

question: What’s a recipe for a classic Caesar salad dressing?
answer:
Title: Caesar Salad Dressing
Ingredients:
1 clove garlic
1/2 c. salad oil
1 c. croutons
dash of salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. ground pepper
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. Worcestershire
6 anchovy fillets (can use anchovy paste)
1 egg
1 head romaine lettuce
1/4 c. crumbled Blue cheese
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Crush garlic and combine with oil. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Add to this, salt, mustard, pepper, Worcestershire, lemon and anchovies.
Refrigerate. Boil egg.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwiches
Ingredients:
3 hard-boiled eggs
1/3 c. chopped celery
1 tsp. chopped onion
3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
1/4 tsp. salt
8 slices bread
Directions:
Peel eggs and chop.
Place in mixing bowl.
Add chopped celery and onion.
Add mayonnaise and salt.
Mix well.
Divide egg mixture between 4 slices of bread and spread with table knife. Top with remaining 4 slices of bread.
Makes 4 sandwiches. Refrigerate any leftovers.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwiches
Ingredients:
2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
1/4 c. finely chopped celery
1/2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 tsp. diced pimiento
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
2 to 3 Tbsp. reduced calorie mayonnaise
6 (1/4-inch thick) slices whole wheat bread
2 slices tomato
2 lettuce leaves
Directions:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Add mayonnaise and mix well. Spread 2 slices of bread with egg mixture.
Top each with another slice of bread.
Arrange tomato slices and lettuce on top of sandwich.
Top with remaining bread.
Cut each sandwich into quarters to serve, using wooden picks to hold layers together. Yield:
2 servings.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwiches
Ingredients:
7 boiled eggs
1/2 tsp. mustard
1/2 chopped onion
3 Tbsp. mayonnaise
pickles (optional)
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Chop eggs.
Mix all ingredients together.
Spread on sandwich bread.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwiches
Ingredients:
1 large rib celery, finely chopped
1 small onion, finely chopped
1/4 c. salad dressing
7 hard-boiled eggs
8 slices rye or white bread
Directions:
In a medium bowl, combine the celery, onion and salad dressing. Chop the eggs. Add to the bowl. Mix well. Spread the egg mixture evenly on 4 bread slices. Top with remaining slices. Cut each sandwich in half.

question: How do I make egg salad for sandwiches?
answer:
Title: Egg Salad Sandwiches
Ingredients:
4 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
1/4 c. shredded reduced-fat Colby Jack cheese (1 oz.)
2 Tbsp. sweet or dill pickle relish
2 Tbsp. finely chopped red sweet pepper
1/4 c. low-fat mayonnaise dressing
1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
10 slices whole wheat or white bread
5 small romaine leaves
halved cherry tomatoes and/or thin bite-size carrot strips
Directions:
In a medium bowl, stir together the eggs, cheese, relish, sweet pepper, mayonnaise, dressing and mustard. If desired, use large cookie cutters to cut bread slices into shapes. Line 5 bread slices with lettuce. Spread on the egg mixture. Top with the remaining bread slices. If desired, garnish sandwiches with cherry tomatoes and/or carrots, using wooden toothpicks to secure.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken, cut into thin strips
3 c. cut up fresh vegetables (broccoli, carrot, sweet red pepper, green pepper)
1/4 tsp. garlic powder or 2 cloves garlic, minced
1 can tomato soup
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
Directions:
In skillet, in 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry half of the chicken until browned.
Remove and repeat with remaining chicken. In remaining 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry vegetables with garlic powder until tender and crisp.
Add soup, soy and vinegar.
Heat to boiling.
Return chicken to skillet.
Heat through, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. oil
1 lb. boneless chicken
1 c. broccoli
1 c. carrots
1 c. red peppers
1/2 tsp. ginger
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 can tomato soup
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
cooked rice
Directions:
In skillet, cook 1 tablespoon oil and half the chicken until browned.
Remove.
Repeat with remaining chicken.
In remaining 1 tablespoon of oil, stir-fry vegetables with ginger and garlic powder until tender-crisp.
Add soup, soy sauce and vinegar.
Heat to a boil; return chicken to skillet.
Heat through, stirring occasionally.
Serve over rice.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry(Method:  Skillet)
Ingredients:
1 lb. chicken (boneless), sliced in thin strips
6 to 8 mushrooms, sliced thin
4 scallions, sliced
4 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 carrots, sliced thin
1/2 head broccoli, sliced thin
1 can water chestnuts, drained
4 cloves garlic, chopped
Directions:
Put 2 tablespoons oil in pan.
Heat; cook chicken about 2 minutes, stirring often.
Remove chicken.
Add remaining oil and carrots, onions, mushrooms, garlic and water chestnuts.
Stir-fry until carrots are tender (2 minutes).
Add chicken, soy sauce and broccoli; stir-fry until broccoli is tender, about 1 minute.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 bag frozen vegetables (broccoli, cauliflower, peas and carrots)
6 chicken breasts, skinned and boned
3 Tbsp. oil
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 small can sliced mushrooms
1 medium onion
2 green peppers
1 can sliced water chestnuts
