1 tsp. cornstarch
1 small head cabbage
3 c. rice
Directions:
Cut chicken in 1 1/2-inch strips.
Put oil in wok.
Add chicken and soy sauce; brown chicken and remove.
Add onion, peppers, cabbage and frozen vegetables to wok.
After these have cooked until crisp-tender, add chicken.
Drain water chestnuts and mushrooms (reserving liquids) and add to wok.
Mix cornstarch with reserved liquid and add to mixture; cook 2 or 3 minutes.
Cook rice according to directions on package and serve with this stir-fry.

question: How do I make a healthy chicken and vegetable stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into thin strips
1 (16 oz.) bag frozen vegetable combination, thawed
1/2 tsp. ground ginger
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 can tomato soup
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. vinegar
4 c. hot cooked rice
Directions:
In a skillet, over medium-high heat, in 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry half of the chicken until browned.
Remove.
Repeat with remaining chicken.
Over medium heat, in remaining 1 tablespoon hot oil, stir-fry vegetables with ginger and garlic powder until tender-crisp.
Add soup, soy sauce and vinegar.
Heat to boiling. Return chicken to skillet.
Heat through.
Serve over rice.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 pkg. flour tortillas (small-sized)
2 large, skinless, boneless chicken breasts
1 tsp. salt
1-1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1-1/2 tsp. onion powder
1-1/2 tsp. cajun seasoning
1 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil, divided
1 large onion, thickly sliced
1 each, green, yellow and red peppers, cut into strips
1 (12 oz.) pkg. shredded, Mexican style 4 cheese blend
Directions:
Washed and pat dry the chicken breasts.
Marinate with garlic powder, onion powder, cajun seasoning, and crushed red pepper flakes.
Add a bit of water and boil until chicken is tender. Let cool then cut into thin strips.
Set aside.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. chicken cutlets, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
2 to 3 Tbsp. taco seasoning
3 Tbsp. oil
soft taco shells
Monterey Jack cheese, shredded
Cheddar cheese, shredded
1 to 2 tomatoes, diced
1 can black olives, diced
shredded lettuce
hot chili peppers
salsa
sour cream
Directions:
Saute chicken in oil and seasoning 10 minutes or until done. Layer chicken on shell.
Cover with cheeses, tomato, olives, lettuce, hot peppers and salsa.
Cover with another taco shell. Sprinkle shell with more cheese.
Heat in microwave 1 minute.
Cut into wedges.
Serve on platter with salsa and sour cream to garnish.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 lb. skinless, boneless chicken breasts
1 Tbsp. oil
1 (1 oz.) pkg. dry fajita seasoning mix
10 (10-inch) flour tortillas
8 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese or Mexican 4-cheese
1 Tbsp. bacon bits
1 onion chopped (optional)
2 peppers, chopped (optional)
Directions:
Preheat the broiler. Cut the chicken into small cubes and prepare with the fajita seasoning mix. Broil 5 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink on the inside. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in a large sauce pan over medium heat. Mix in the seasoned chicken, onion & pepper. Slowly cook and stir for 10 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. Layer 1/2 of each tortilla with chicken mixture, cheese, and desired amount of bacon bits. Top with cheese. Fold the tortillas. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes, or until cheese has melted.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless chicken breasts, cubed
1 can Campbell's Cheddar cheese soup
1/2 jar (1 c.) salsa
10 (8-inch) flour tortillas
Uncle Ben's fiesta rice (1 box) or you can substitute Lipton's Spanish rice
1 bag tortilla chips
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°. Cook chicken in skillet until done (browned and juices evaporate), stirring often. Add soup and salsa and heat through. Spread about 1/3 cup mixture on half of each tortilla. Moisten edge of tortilla with water; fold and seal. Place on baking sheet. Bake for 5 minutes or until lightly browned and hot. Serve with fiesta rice and tortilla chips and salsa.

question: What’s a quick recipe for a chicken quesadilla?
answer:
Title: Chicken Quesadillas
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2-inch strips
1 pkg. taco or fajita seasoning
1/2 bunch cilantro, chopped
1 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
3 to 4 green onions, chopped
5 to 6 burrito tortillas
sour cream
guacamole
salsa
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet.
Add chicken.
Stir until golden brown. Add taco seasoning and 2 tablespoons or so of water.
Add cilantro and simmer for 4 minutes.
Cover and set aside.
Divide and place chicken onto a half side of each tortilla.
Add green onions, cheese and a small amount of salsa if desired.
Fold over tortilla. Carefully place one folded tortilla in clean, dry skillet over medium heat.
Cover and let cook 5 minutes.
Carefully turn onto other side and heat 3 to 5 minutes until golden and ingredients are melted inside.
Repeat with other quesadillas.

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Braised Short Ribs
Ingredients:
4 lb. short ribs (serving size pieces)
1 1/4 lb. small new potatoes (10 pieces)
1 c. coarsely chopped onion
1 bay leaf, crumbled
salt and pepper to taste
1 1/2 small onions or 2 large, cut up
1 lb. small carrots
1 clove garlic, crushed
1 can condensed beef broth (undiluted)
Directions:
Clean ribs with cloth or paper towels; trim excess fat. Slowly heat Dutch oven. Add ribs, fat side down, half at a time. Brown meat well on both sides (about 45 minutes).

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Braised Short Ribs With Vegetables
Ingredients:
4 lb. beef short ribs
1 1/2 lb. small onions (about 12)
1 1/4 lb. small new potatoes (about 10)
1 lb. small carrots (about 8)
1 c. coarsely chopped onion
1 clove garlic
4 whole black peppers
1 bay leaf
2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1/2 tsp. dried marjoram
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed beef broth
Directions:
Brown short ribs, coated with flour, in large skillet with oil.
Place vegetables in crock-pot; add short ribs.
Combine spices and beef broth.
Pour over meat.
Cover and cook on low low for 6 to 8 hours.
Remove short ribs and vegetables.
Turn control to high.
Dissolve 1/2 cup flour into small amount of water.
Stir into sauce and cook on high for 10 to 15 minutes, until thickened. Makes 4 to 6 servings.

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Braised Short Ribs
Ingredients:
4 lb. beef short ribs
1 c. chopped onion
1 crushed clove garlic
1 (10 1/2 oz.) can beef broth
2 Tbsp. steak sauce
1/2 tsp. marjoram
4 peppercorns
1 bay leaf
1 c. water
2 to 3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 c. water
Directions:
In a 12-inch Dutch oven, brown ribs (fat side down) for 30 minutes.
Discard
drippings.
Add	onions,
garlic,
beef broth, steak sauce, marjoram, peppercorns, bay leaf and 1 cup water. Bring to a boil and then simmer, covered, for 2 hours. Remove meat and skim fat from Dutch oven.
Mix flour with 1/2 cup water. Stir
into Dutch oven and boil for 3 minutes. Pour over ribs.

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Braised Short Ribs
Ingredients:
4 lb. beef short ribs
salt and pepper
flour
2 medium onions, sliced
1 1/2 c. beef broth, water or barbecue sauce
Directions:
Roll short ribs in seasoned flour (about 1 cup flour, 1 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper). Brown well in large skillet. Put sliced onions in crock-pot; add browned ribs and liquid. Cover and cook on low 8 to 10 hours or high 4 to 6 hours.

question: How do I make tender braised short ribs?
answer:
Title: Crock-Pot Braised Ribs With Vegetables
Ingredients:
3 to 3 1/2 lb. beef short ribs
1 c. canned tomatoes or tomato juice
2 tsp. salt
4 small onions
1/4 tsp. pepper
6 medium potatoes, quartered
6 to 8 carrots, cut into 2-inch lengths
Directions:
Preheat ribs in skillet.
Brown on both sides.
Put short ribs into pot.
Add tomatoes or juice, salt, pepper, potatoes, carrots and onions.
Cover; simmer at medium setting for 4 to 5 hours or low setting for 7 to 10 hours.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. cake flour
1 1/2 c. sugar (sifted confectioners)
1 1/2 c. egg whites (12)
1 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. sugar (white)
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. almond flavoring
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Have ready a tube pan.
Stir flour and first amount of sugar together to blend.
Measure egg whites, cream of tartar and salt into large mixing bowl.
Beat until foamy. Gradually add second amount of sugar, 2 tablespoons at a time. Continue beating until meringue holds stiff peaks.
Add flavoring. Sprinkle sugar-flour mixture over meringue.
Fold in gently until mixed.
Bake in ungreased tube pan for 30 to 35 minutes.
Invert on a funnel to cool.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Filled Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 large angel food cake
1 c. milk
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, well beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. gelatin
3 Tbsp. cold water
1 tsp. vanilla
3/4 tsp. almond extract
1 c. cream, whipped
Directions:
Place milk, sugar, eggs and salt in top of double boiler. Place over boiling water; stir constantly until custard lightly coats spoon.
Do not overcook.
Soften gelatin in cold water and pour custard over it.
Stir until dissolved.
Add flavorings. Chill until partially thickened.
Stir frequently.
Fold in whipped cream.
Split cake in 2 layers.
Spoon filling between layers, on sides and top of cake.
Sprinkle with almonds.
Chill. Serves 16.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. sugar
1 3/4 c. egg whites
2 tsp. cream of tartar
pinch of salt
1 1/3 c. cake flour (sifted 4 times)
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. almond extract
Directions:
Sift flour and 1 cup sugar 4 times.
Beat egg whites until frothy, then add cream of tartar and salt.
Beat until stiff. Fold in 1 cup sugar.
Fold in flour and sugar mixture.
Add extracts.
Bake in tube pan (fit bottom of angel food cake pan with brown paper), in 325° oven for 1 hour.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake(This Recipe Is Over 50 Years Old.)
Ingredients:
1 3/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. flour
1 2/3 c. egg whites
3 Tbsp. cold water or 2 Tbsp. lemon juice and 1 Tbsp. water
1 1/2 tsp. cream of tartar
Directions:
Add cream of tartar to egg whites before beating. Then beat until whites form peaks, but not too dry.
Gradually add sugar, then the flour.
Place the batter in an angel food cake pan.
Bake at 300° for 30 minutes.
Increase the temperature to 325° and bake for 15 additional minutes.

question: How do I make a fluffy angel food cake?
answer:
Title: Angel Food Cake
Ingredients:
1 c. (8 or 10) egg whites
1 1/4 c. fine granulated sugar
1 tsp. cream of tartar
1/2 tsp. almond extract
1 tsp. vanilla extract
1 c. cake flour, sifted
Directions:
Bake half of the recipe for Angel Food Cake in a shallow pan (10 x 15-inch), lined with wax paper, in a moderately slow oven (325°) for 20 minutes.
Turn onto a damp cloth or paper sprinkled with powdered sugar.
Remove bottom paper quickly; cut off thin strips from the sides and ends of cake.
Spread with jam, jelly or whipped cream.
Roll.
Wrap in cloth or wax paper until serving time.
Work quickly or cake will crack.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms
4 oz. garlic and herb semi-soft cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
3 c. water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
Remove mushroom stems, keeping caps. Chop enough stems to measure 1 cup; put in bowl.
Stir in cheese and parsley.
In saucepan, bring water to boil and lemon juice. Add caps; cook 1 minute.
Drain.
Spoon cheese mixture into caps. Arrange in shallow baking pan.
Bake 8 minutes.
Makes about 2 dozen.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
1 lb. medium mushrooms (about 24)
1/4 c. finely chopped green onions (with tops)
1 clove garlic, finely chopped
1/4 c. butter or margarine
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. snipped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dried basil leaves
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Select firm white mushrooms with caps that are closed or slightly open around the stem.
Cut ends from mushroom stems; remove from mushrooms and chop finely.
Cook and stir mushroom stems, green onions and garlic in butter over medium heat until tender, about 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in remaining ingredients.
Fill mushroom caps with stuffing mixture.
Place filled sides up in greased baking dish.
Bake in 350° oven for 15 minutes.
Serve hot.
Makes 24 appetizers.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
2 large pkg. fresh mushrooms, stems removed
2 pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 pkg. salad crunchies, chopped in blender
1/4 tsp. red pepper
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. mixture of grated (finely) Monterey Jack and Cheddar cheeses
Directions:
After removing mushroom stems, combine cream cheese, salad crunchies and spices.
Add 2 to 3 tablespoons finely grated cheeses.
Spoon cream cheese mixture into mushrooms in a mound. Sprinkle cheese over filled mushrooms.
Bake at 350° on ungreased baking pans (it needs to have sides, because mushrooms become juicier) until cheeses are melted (about 15 to 20 minutes).

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
fresh mushrooms
1/2 c. melted butter (or less)
garlic powder to taste
3/4 c. Monterey Jack cheese
chopped green onion or pkg. onion dip mix
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry red wine
1 (2 3/4 oz.) pkg. Fritos, finely chopped or seasoned bread crumbs
Directions:
Remove stems.
Wash, pat dry and brush caps with part of melted butter.
Combine rest of butter with garlic powder.	Add cheese and onions (or dip mix).
Mix well.	Add soy sauce, wine and crumbs.
Chopped stems can be added also.
Fill caps.
Top with cheese if desired.
Put on cookie sheet and broil 3 to 5 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed mushrooms with cheese?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
2 large baskets fresh whole mushrooms
1/2 stick butter
6 green onions, finely chopped
mushroom stems (from whole mushrooms), finely chopped
1 (4 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
1 pkg. Monterey Jack cheese
1 pkg. grated Cheddar cheese
10 slices bacon, fried crisp and broken in small pieces
4 oz. sour cream
Directions:
Remove stems from mushrooms; wash caps and drain.
Microwave caps until tender and drain all water.
Saute chopped onions and mushroom stems in butter until tender; drain and mix with melted cheeses.
Add sour cream and prepared bacon; salt and pepper to taste.
Stuff in caps and eat immediately.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Baked Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
1/2 lb. ground beef
1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 small can tomato paste
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 1/2 c. cottage cheese
1 large egg
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
2 Tbsp. chopped parsley
4 oz. jumbo macaroni shells
1 can mushrooms, sliced or whole
Directions:
Saute onion, beef and all other ingredients, except cottage cheese, egg, parsley, Parmesan cheese and mushrooms.
Simmer about 15 minutes.
Cook shells as directed; cool.
Fill shells with cheese mixture:
cottage cheese, egg, Parmesan cheese and parsley. Place sauce in 2-quart baking dish.
Add stuffed shells.
Bake for 30 minutes at 300°.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Vegetable Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
2 tsp. margarine
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. shredded carrots
1 pkg. chopped spinach, cooked
1/4 tsp. basil
8 jumbo shells, cooked and drained
1 jar spaghetti sauce
4 to 8 oz. Monterey Jack cheese
1 c. Ricotta cheese
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Spray 8-inch baking pan with nonstick cooking spray.
In large skillet, melt butter (margarine); add onion.
Cook over medium for 5 minutes.
Add carrots, spinach and basil.
Cook another 3 minutes.
Remove from heat and add 1 cup Ricotta cheese.
Stuff into shells.
Put in baking dish.
Cover with sauce and cheese.
Bake 15 minutes or until heated through.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
1 pkg. jumbo shells
1/4 c. butter
1 lb. pork
1/2 c. minced onion
1 qt. spaghetti sauce
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
1 Tbsp. salt
1 lb. hamburger
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 cloves minced garlic
Directions:
Preheat oven to 375°.
Cook shells until soft, place in cold water and set aside.
Melt butter.
Add pork and beef; cook until brown.
Drain.
Add onion and garlic.
Cover and simmer 10 to 15 minutes or until onion is tender.
Remove from heat; stir in Parmesan, salt and bread crumbs.
Pour 1/2 cup of spaghetti sauce in the bottom of casserole dish.
Stuff each shell and arrange on top of sauce.
Cover with remaining sauce and bake for 30 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Chicken Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
4 cups cooked and drained chicken
1/2 cup chopped onion
1 cup chopped celery
1 cup mayonnaise
8 oz. frozen peas (optional)
1 box Stove Top stuffing (prepared)
1 box jumbo shells (cook al dente)
2 cans of condensed chicken or mushroom soup
1 can water
1 cup sour cream
Directions:
Mix first 5 ingredients with stuffing. Stuff shells. Combine soups and water and sour cream. Spray dish with Pam (dish big enough to hold 25-30 shells). Put some soup in bottom of dish. Lay shells in single layer and top with remaining soup. Bake 30 minutes at 350°.

question: What’s a good recipe for baked stuffed shells?
answer:
Title: Classic Stuffed Shells
Ingredients:
3 c. Ragu Old Home Style
2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1 (12 oz.) pkg. jumbo shells, cooked and drained
2 lb. Ricotta cheese
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
3 eggs
1/8 tsp. black pepper
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Evenly spread 1 cup sauce in a 17 x 12-inch bake pan.
In a large bowl, combine cheeses, eggs, parsley and pepper.
Fill shells with cheese mixture and arrange in a single layer in baking pan.
Evenly top with remaining sauce. Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until bubbly.
Serves 8.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Marvelous Marinade
Ingredients:
3 cloves garlic, minced
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
1/3 c. catsup
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. crushed basil
2 to 3 lb. meat or chicken, cut in 1/4-inch chunks or pieces
veggies
Directions:
In a small pan, cook garlic in oil.
Remove from heat.
Add the rest of the ingredients, except the meat and vegetables.
Pour sauce over meat/chicken in covered container.
Marinate meat/chicken 6 hours or overnight.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
1/2 c. soy sauce
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. water
2 Tbsp. dried minced onion
2 Tbsp. sesame seeds
1 Tbsp. sugar
4 garlic cloves, minced
1 tsp. ginger
3/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together. Pour over chicken (approximately 4 to 6 pieces). Cover and refrigerate overnight or for 8 hours. Keep 1/2 cup of the sauce for marinating while cooking; toss the remaining sauce. Grill or bake until done.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Lemon Marinated Chicken
Ingredients:
4 chicken breasts (boneless, skinless)
1 Tbsp. fresh rosemary, chopped or 1 tsp. dried rosemary
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. white wine or water
1 Tbsp. oil
2 tsp. honey
1 tsp. soy sauce
1/2 tsp. Dijon mustard
1/2 tsp. lemon peel
Directions:
In a shallow dish, combine all ingredients except chicken; mix well.
Add chicken; turn to coat.
Cover and marinate in refrigerator 20 to 30 minutes, the longer, the better.
Oil broiler pan and place chicken on prepared pan; broil 4 to 6 inches from broiler.
Cook 8 to 10 minutes on one side, basting with marinade.
Turn and continue cooking and basting 8 to 10 minutes longer or until chicken is fork-tender and juices run clear.
Can also be charcoal grilled.
Use same method as for broiling. Serves 4.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Chicken Marinade
Ingredients:
1 c. soy sauce
1 1/4 c. cooking sherry
4 c. pineapple juice
1/2 c. red wine vinegar
3/4 ??? sugar
2 tsp. granulated garlic
Directions:
Place all wet ingredients into a plastic container.
Stir in all dry ingredients.
Soak chicken, skin side up, 12 to 24 hours. Char-broil.

question: How do I make a zesty lime chicken marinade?
answer:
Title: Sesame-Lime Marinade
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. finely shredded lime peel
1/3 c. lime juice
3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. sesame oil
1/4 tsp. salt
4 chicken breasts, washed and patted dry
2 Tbsp. honey
1 tsp. sesame seed
Directions:
In a large bowl or plastic bag combine lime peel, lime juice, vegetable oil, sesame oil and salt.
Add chicken to marinade. Cover and refrigerate 4 hours or longer if desired, turning occasionally.
Remove chicken from marinade.
Reserve 1/4 cup marinade.
In a small bowl, combine 1/4 cup marinade, honey and sesame seed.
Grill or broil chicken with marinade-honey mixture several times while cooking.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Garden Fresh Turkey Burgers
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 c. uncooked oatmeal
3/4 c. finely chopped onion
3/4 c. finely chopped green or red bell pepper
1/2 c. shredded zucchini
1/4 c. catsup
2 cloves crushed garlic
6 whole grain rolls, split and toasted
1/2 c. sour half and half
Directions:
Lightly grease rack of broiler pan.
Combine first 7 ingredients; mix well.
Shape into 6 burgers.
Place on rack of prepared pan or over medium hot coals on an outdoor grill 6 inches from heat.
Broil 7 to 9 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Serve on rolls with rounded tablespoonful of sour half and half per serving.
Garnish with lettuce and sliced tomato, if desired.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Turkey Burgers
Ingredients:
8 oz. ground turkey
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. margarine, softened
1 1/2 tsp. water
1 1/2 c. thinly sliced onions
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. ketchup
2 hamburger rolls, toasted
1 packet instant chicken broth and seasoning mix
Directions:
In bowl, combine turkey, margarine, water and broth mix.
Form into 2 patties.
Spray skillet with Pam and heat over medium-high heat.
Add patties and brown on both sides.
Reduce heat to low and add onions.
Cover pan and cook until patties are no longer pink inside, 5 to 8 minutes.
Serve each burger topped with 2 teaspoons ketchup and half the cooked onion slices on toasted rolls.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Savory Turkey Burgers
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground raw turkey
2/3 c. rolled oats
1/2 c. tomato juice
1 large egg or 1/4 c. Egg Beaters
1 Tbsp. onion flakes
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
2 tsp. chicken bouillon
1/4 tsp. garlic flakes
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine all ingredients.
Mix well and shape into 6 patties. Broil or barbecue 3-inches from heat source, 4 minutes on each side.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: The All-American (Turkey) Burger
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey breast
1/4 c. oat bran cereal
1 large minced garlic clove
1/4 c. finely chopped onion
1/8 c. finely chopped green pepper
1 tsp. salt or sodium alternative seasoning
Directions:
Mix all the ingredients and form into 4 patties; grill indoors or out on the barbecue.
Serve on the proverbial toasted bun or choose sourdough bread for less fat and cholesterol.
Pile high with lettuce, tomato slices and onion rings grilled on a no stick pan sprayed with Pam.
Serves 4.

question: What’s a good recipe for a turkey burger?
answer:
Title: Turkey Burgers(Low Calorie)
Ingredients:
1lb. Ground Skinless Turkey
1 Medium Onion Chopped
1 Large Egg Beaten
2 Tbsp. Chopped Parsley
1 Clove Garlic Minced
1/2 tsp. Tarragon
1/2 tsp. Salt
1/4 tsp. Pepper
Directions:
Preheat broiler.
Spray the broiler with non-stick spray. Lightly combine turkey, onion, egg and parsley and garlic tarragon plus salt and pepper in a bowl.
Form into 4 burgers.
Broil 4-inch from heat until brown, about 5 minutes on each side. 1 Burger = 4 Points.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
4 avocados, peeled and chopped
2 green onions, chopped
2 tsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. red pepper flakes
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. dried cilantro or 1 fresh sprig
1 medium tomato, chopped
Directions:
In a mixing bowl, combine avocados, onions, lemon juice, salt, red pepper flakes, garlic powder and cilantro.
Using a fork or potato masher, mix and mash coarsely.
Add most of the tomatoes; stir well. Pour into serving bowl; garnish with remaining tomatoes and sprigs of cilantro.
Serve with tortilla chips.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 medium avocado, peeled
1 small tomato, quartered
2 Tbsp. lime or lemon juice
2 Tbsp. mayonnaise or salad dressing
2 Tbsp. sour cream
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. red pepper
1/4 to 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/3 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Position knife blade in food processor bowl.
Add all ingredients except onion.
Process 1 minute or until lumpy.
Stir in onions.
Yields 2 cups.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Guacamole
Ingredients:
1 envelope gelatin
1/4 c. cold water
1/2 c. boiling water
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 1/2 c. mashed ripe avocado
1/3 c. mayonnaise
3/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. finely minced onion
1 small ripe tomato, seeded and diced (1/3 c.)
Directions:
Sprinkle gelatin over cold water and let stand 5 minutes.
Add 1/2 cup boiling water and stir until dissolved.
Whisk in lemon juice, mashed avocado, mayonnaise and salt.
Stir in minced onion and tomato.
Turn into 3 cup mold or bowl.	Make in a.m. and serve in p.m. and it will not darken.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
2 medium tomatoes
1 ripe medium avocado
1 c. low-fat cottage cheese
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 tsp. bottled minced garlic or dash of garlic powder
1/8 tsp. salt
few dashes of hot pepper sauce
Directions:
Cut stem ends off tomatoes and hollow out, leaving 1/4 to 1/2-inch thick shells.
Discard seeds.
Chop tomato pulp and tops. Set aside.
Halve, seed, peel and cut the avocado into chunks. Combine the chunks, cottage cheese, lemon juice, garlic, salt and pepper sauce in blender or food processor until mixture is smooth. Stir in chopped tomato.
Makes 16 (2 tablespoon) servings of dip.

question: How do I make homemade guacamole?
answer:
Title: Guacamole
Ingredients:
2 large avocados, seeded, peeled and cut up
1 small tomato, peeled and cut up
1/2 small onion, cut up
2 to 3 canned green chili peppers, rinsed and seeded*
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place all ingredients in blender.
Blend until well combined. Makes about 2 cups.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 graham cracker crust (recipe included)
3 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
1 c. sugar
3 eggs
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 (16 oz.) sour cream
3 tsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Press graham cracker crust mixture into a 10-inch spring-form pan; set aside.
Beat cream cheese at high speed of electric mixer until light and fluffy.
Gradually add 1 cup sugar, beating well. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Stir in 1/2 teaspoon vanilla.
Pour into prepared pan.
Bake at 375° for 35 minutes or until set.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
1 graham cracker crust mix
2 8 oz. cream cheese
2 cups powdered sugar
2 8 oz. cool whip
1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
1 can blueberry or strawberry pie filling
Directions:
Make graham cracker crust according to directions (double the recipe) and put crust on bottom of 9x13 cake pan. Mix cream cheese and powdered sugar together. Then mix in cool whip. Add crushed pineapple. pour this mixture over crust. Cool in refrigerator a few hours or overnight. Put pie filling on top before serving.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Classic Cheesecake
Ingredients:
2 c. graham cracker crumbs
1/4 c. confectioners sugar
6 to 8 Tbsp. melted butter
1 lb. cottage cheese
1 pt. sour cream
8 oz. pkg. softened cream cheese
3 large eggs, lightly beaten
1 c. sugar
1/4 c. flour
1 tsp. vanilla
1 can cherry pie filling (optional) or fresh sliced strawberries or blueberries to serve with cake
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 300°.
Butter a 12-inch spring-form pan. Mix the pulverized graham crackers, sugar and melted butter and pat this dough into the bottom of the spring-form pan. Bake for 15 minutes or until set; remove and cool before filling. Raise the temperature to 350°.
With an electric mixer, beat the cottage cheese, sour cream, cream cheese, eggs, sugar, flour and vanilla. Beat for 10 minutes; batter will be very thin.
Pour over crust and bake for 40 minutes. Turn off oven but leave cake in for an additional 30 minutes.
Do not open oven door. Remove cake from oven, then cool cake for 2 hours.
When cool, run a thin metal spatula around the edge of cake. Loosen and remove sides of spring-form pan.
Note that when cooling, cheesecake will develop a large crack across the top. Slide cake onto plate. If you wish, top with pie filling or serve a wedge of cake with fresh berries. Yield: 12 to 16 servings.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Cheesecake
Ingredients:
8 oz. cream cheese (room temperature)
2 eggs
1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 pt. (16 oz.) sour cream
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. cinnamon
5 Tbsp. sugar
graham cracker crust
Directions:
Mix the cream cheese, eggs, sugar and vanilla until smooth. Pour into a 9-inch graham cracker crust and bake at 350° for 20 minutes (until firm).
Mix sour cream, vanilla, cinnamon and sugar.
Pour over baked mixture and bake for 5 minutes.
If you want to top the cheesecake with fruit, omit the cinnamon.

question: How do I make a perfect cheesecake with a graham cracker crust?
answer:
Title: Large Cheesecake
Ingredients:
18 graham crackers
1/4 c. butter, melted
4 eggs
1 c. sugar
1 tsp. vanilla
3 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
Directions:
Crush graham crackers and mix well with melted butter.
Mix eggs, sugar, vanilla and cream cheese. Beat well.
Put crackers in spring-form pan and pour in cheese mixture.
Bake at 375° for 30 to 35 minutes. Remove from oven and cool 10 minutes.
Increase oven to 475°.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 lb. ground pork
1 c. Parmesan cheese
1 c. milk
1 egg
1 c. soft bread crumbs
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 clove minced garlic
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. oregano
1/4 c. butter
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except butter and mix well.
Shape meat into balls.
Melt butter in large frying pan.
Brown slowly in butter over low heat.
Place meatballs in hot cooked sauce. Cover and cook an additional 30 minutes.
Serve over spaghetti.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1/2 c. bread crumbs
1/2 c. milk
2 lb. ground beef
1/2 lb. ground pork
2 eggs
1 c. Quick oats
1/3 c. Parmesan or Romano cheese
1 tsp. minced garlic
2 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. dry basil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Combine milk and bread and let soak, then add all remaining ingredients.
Mix well.
Shape into 1 1/2-inch balls.
Place in baking pan.
Bake in a 400° oven for 30 minutes.
Drain, then add sauce and cook 10 minutes.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 pound ground beef
1 pound ground pork
1 large onion, diced fine
2 tsp salt
1/4 tsp pepper
1/4 tsp nutmeg
1/4 tsp allspice
1 1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 eggs, beaten
1 1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together in bowl and shape into balls. Brown in frying pan in butter and vegetable oil. You may put these in spaghetti sauce or pour over 1 can golden mushroom soup and 1/2 c. sour cream, which makes like a gravy, and serve this way.

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Make Ahead Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground chuck
3 Tbsp. minced dry onions
1/2 c. dry bread crumbs
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
1 egg
1/4 c. milk
Directions:
Heat oven to 400°.
Mix all ingredients and shape into 1-inch balls.
Place in pans and bake about 10 minutes or until done. Cool in pans for 5 minutes.
Pack in freezer containers after about 15 minutes and freeze.
Use as needed.
Makes about 3 dozen. I like to double the recipe using 1 pound of chuck and 1 pound of turkey.
Enjoy!

question: What’s a recipe for homemade meatballs?
answer:
Title: Unusual Meatballs
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
2 c. Special K cereal
1 onion
1 Tbsp. parsley flakes
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 egg
1 c. applesauce
1 can tomato soup
1 can cream of mushroom soup
Directions:
Mix all together except soups.
Make into 12 large balls or more small ones if preferred.
Place in 9 x 13-inch pan or any baking dish.
Mix soups together and pour over.
Cover with foil or glass top of baking dish.
Bake 1 hour at 350°.
This can be made the night before and put in the refrigerator.
Can be served with rice or potatoes.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Medley Salad
Ingredients:
6 c. cooked instant white rice, chilled
1 c. olives
12 1/2 oz. can white tuna, chilled
4 strips cooked bacon, crumbled
1/2 c. radishes
2 c. green and red bell peppers
1 c. sliced celery
1/2 c. green onions, chopped
1 c. frozen green peas
1 large bottle your favorite Italian salad dressing
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
crisp salad greens
tomatoes
Directions:
Mix all ingredients except salad greens.
Cover tightly and refrigerate several hours or overnight.
Serve over salad greens. I never use the radishes, bell peppers and tomatoes.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Salad
Ingredients:
1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite size pieces
1 pkg. Feta cheese, crumbled
1/2 c. seedless green grapes, halved
1/2 c. pine nuts, toasted
1/2 c. olive oil
1/4 c. white wine vinegar
1/4 tsp. fresh cracked pepper
dash of salt
Directions:
Toss first four ingredients together.
Combine vinegar and seasonings, then slowly whisk in olive oil and add dressing to salad mixture.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
2/3 c. olive oil
3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar
1/2 c. chopped fresh basil
2 Tbsp. green onion
2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
12 oz. rotelle pasta, cooked and drained
1 each: small red, green and yellow bell pepper, sliced crosswise
1 medium size tomato
1/4 c. pitted black olives
8 oz. Mozzarella, cubed
1/4 tsp. dried oregano
Directions:
Process oil, vinegar, 2 tablespoons basil, green onion, Parmesan, salt and pepper in blender or food processor until smooth.
Put pasta, bell pepper strips, tomato wedges, nuts and olives in large bowl.
Pour in dressing; toss to mix.
Roll cheese cubes in remaining 2 tablespoons basil to coat.
Add to salad; sprinkle with oregano.
Toss lightly.
Serve at room temperature. Makes 4 main dish servings.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Pasta Salad
Ingredients:
3 oz. pkg. dried fettuccine, broken
1 medium carrot, cut into julienne strips
1/2 (6 oz.) can pitted ripe olives, halved
2 Tbsp. vinegar
1 Tbsp. water
1 Tbsp. olive oil or cooking oil
1 clove garlic, minced
3/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
1/2 tsp. sugar
1/8 tsp. onion powder
Directions:
In a large saucepan or Dutch oven, bring 3 cups water to boiling.
Add pasta; return to boiling.
Reduce heat.
Boil, uncovered, for 6 minutes.
Add carrot strips; cook for 2 to 4 minutes more or until pasta is tender but slightly firm and carrot strips are crisp-tender.
Drain pasta and carrot strips; rinse with cold water.
Drain again.

question: I want to make a Mediterranean salad. Can you help?
answer:
Title: Mediterranean Salad With Balsamic Vinaigrette(Serves 8)
Ingredients:
3 (6 3/4 oz.) cans boneless and skinless pink salmon
2 lb. cucumbers
1 lb. tomatoes
8 oz. Feta cheese
1 1/4 c. olive oil
3/4 c. balsamic vinegar
1 1/2 Tbsp. minced garlic
4 Tbsp. rosemary (fresh preferable)
3 Tbsp. chopped shallots
Directions:
Drain salmon.
Wash, peel and slice cucumbers.
Wash, core and roughly chop tomatoes. Crumble cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Tropical Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
2 c. water
1 c. coconut milk
1 1/2 c. uncooked long grain white rice
1/2-inch piece fresh ginger
1/2 c. pineapple tidbits
1/2 c. shredded coconut, toasted
1 1/2 Tbsp. cilantro (fresh), minced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 c. red bell pepper, minced
1/2 c. red onion, minced
1/2 c. chopped toasted cashews
Directions:
Bring water and coconut milk to boil. Stir in rice and ginger. Cover. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes, until liquid is absorbed. Transfer to bowl. Remove ginger. Add pineapple, shredded coconut and cilantro to rice and stir to combine. Heat olive oil in saut pan. Add red bell pepper and onion and saut until softened. Add to rice. Last, add cashews to rice; stir well. Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
2 tsp oil
3/4 c shredded coconut
1/2 c finely chopped onion
2 c rice
4 c chicken broth
1 small mango, peeled and chopped
1/4 cup fresh chives, chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan. Add coconut and cook and stir until browned. Add onion and cook 1 minute. Stir in rice. Add broth and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat to low and simmer for 25 to 30 minutes until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. Remove from heat. Stir in mango. Sprinkle with chives.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Curried Coconut Rice
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. curry powder
2 c. water
2 chicken broth cubes
1 c. uncooked rice
1 c. coconut milk
1/3 c. golden raisins
sliced onions, fried
Directions:
Melt butter in 2-quart saucepan over medium heat. Stir in curry powder. Add water and broth cubes and bring to a boil. Add rice, coconut milk and raisins. Stir to blend.
Return to boil and then reduce heat.
Cover and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed.
Put into a serving dish and garnish with fried onions.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Rice And Coconut Pudding
Ingredients:
2 c. rice (cooked)
1 c. coconut
1 c. raisins
1 c. sugar
1/4 tsp. salt
4 eggs
2 1/2 c. milk
1 tsp. vanilla
1 tsp. grated orange peel
Directions:
Mix well together cooked rice, coconut, raisins, sugar and salt.
Pour into buttered baking dish.
Beat eggs lightly. Combine with milk and vanilla.
Pour over rice mixture and sprinkle with grated orange peel over top.
Set baking dish in pan of hot water.
Bake 45 minutes at 350°.

question: How do I make a creamy coconut rice?
answer:
Title: Rice-Coconut-Chocolate Squares
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. water
1/4 c. sugar
1 1/2 c. Minute rice
1/2 c. Angel Flake coconut
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips
1 c. Cool Whip nondairy whipped topping, thawed
Directions:
Mix sugar, salt and water in a saucepan.
Bring to full boil. Stir in rice.
Cover.
Remove from heat.
Let stand 5 minutes. Add coconut and chips to hot rice and stir until chips are melted. Cover and chill.
Fold whipped topping into rice mixture.
Pour into waxed paper lined square pan (8-inch or 9 x 5-inch loaf pan). Cover and chill until firm.
Remove paper and put on a serving plate.
Cut into squares or slice.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Easy Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
3 heaping c. flour
3 rounded Tbsp. cocoa
3 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
3/4 c. shortening
3 c. sugar
3/4 c. buttermilk or sour milk
1 1/2 c. boiling water
3 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Measure and sift the flour, cocoa, soda, baking powder and salt.
Beat shortening and sugar; cream well.
Add alternately with dry ingredients and mix well.
Add buttermilk or sour milk, boiling water and vanilla.
Dough will be thin.
Bake in hot oven at 375° to 400°.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Can Do Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. flour
1 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. soda
1/2 c. shortening
1 tsp. vanilla
2 eggs
2/3 c. cocoa
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Grease and flour 2 round pans or 1 oblong pan.
In large bowl, combine all ingredients.
Beat on low speed 30 minutes, scraping sides and bottom of bowl.
Beat 3 minutes on medium speed, scraping bowl frequently.
Pour into prepared pans.
Bake at 350° until done.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Easy, Easy Cake(Chocolate)
Ingredients:
1 stick oleo
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1/2 c. Crisco oil
1 c. water
2 c. plain flour
2 c. sugar
2 eggs, well beaten
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 c. buttermilk
Directions:
Put oleo, cocoa, oil
and water in a pan and bring to a boil. Sift plain	flour.	Add sugar into a large mixing bowl. Pour cocoa mixture
into
this.
Mix
eggs,
soda, vanilla and buttermilk in a separate bowl.
Add to first mixture.
Bake in a long pan in a 400° oven for 20 minutes.
After cake has been baking 15 minutes, start the icing.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Perfect Chocolate Cake(May Prepare Ahead.  Makes One 3-Layer Cake.)
Ingredients:
1 c. cocoa
2 c. boiling water
1 c. butter, softened
2 1/2 c. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract
2 3/4 c. flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
4 eggs
Directions:
Combine cocoa and boiling water, stirring until smooth; set aside to cool.
Combine butter, sugar, eggs and vanilla; beat until light and fluffy (about 5 minutes).
Combine dry ingredients; add to sugar mixture alternately with cocoa mixture, beginning and ending with flour mixture.
Do not overbeat!
Pour batter into 3 greased and floured 9-inch round cake pans.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until toothpick comes out of the center clean.
Cool in pans for 10 minutes; remove and cool completely.

question: How do I make a basic chocolate cake?
answer:
Title: Easy Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
2 c. sugar
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. lard
4 Tbsp. cocoa
1 c. water
1/2 c. buttermilk
2 eggs, beaten
1 tsp. soda
1 tsp. cinnamon
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Set aside first 2 ingredients in
bowl.
Bring
next
4 ingredients to a boil;
then pour
over
first
2 ingredients. Mix well, then add remaining ingredients.
Mix
well
and pour into 9 x 13-inch pan.
Bake at 350° for
1
hour
or
15 1/2 x 10 1/2 x 1-inch jelly roll pan and only bake 20 to 25 minutes. Ice while hot.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef top round steak
1 1/2 c. broccoli (1-inch size)
3 medium carrots
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion
1 c. frozen peas
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
4 to 6 c. cooked rice
Directions:
Slice beef very thin in bite size strips.
Add cooking oil to preheated hot wok (high heat).
Stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onion in hot oil for 2 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Remove from wok.
Add more oil, if necessary, before stir-frying the beef strips (fry only 1/2 of the portion of beef strips at a time) in hot oil (high heat) for 2 to 3 minutes.
Return all meat to wok. Add peas, water chestnuts and bamboo shoots.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. top round steak, thinly sliced across grain into bite sized strips
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut in 1-inch pieces
3 carrots, bias slices
1 medium onion, cut in thin wedges
2 cloves garlic, chopped
1/2 lb. mushrooms, thinly sliced
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
1 Tbsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. dry sherry
1 c. beef broth, water and bouillon
2 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Blanch in boiling water for 2 minutes the broccoli and carrots.
Drain.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef And Vegetable Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. beef round steak, sliced thin
1 1/2 c. broccoli, cut into pieces
3 medium carrots, sliced
1 tsp. cornstarch
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. sherry (optional)
2 Tbsp. cooking oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed
1/2 c. water chestnuts
1/2 c. bamboo shoots
Directions:
Cook broccoli and carrots about 2 minutes in boiling water; drain.
Mix cornstarch, salt, sugar, soy sauce and sherry; set aside.
Add oil to wok or pan over high heat and stir-fry broccoli, carrots and onions until crisp and tender.
Remove from wok.
Add beef and cook for 2 to 3 minutes.
Remove beef.

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
3 c. sliced bottom rump or sirloin
1 c. broccoli
1 c. cauliflower
1 c. carrots
1 c. chopped peppers
1 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. cashew nuts
1/2 c. mushrooms
1/2 c. teriyaki sauce
1/4 c. Worcestershire
1/4 c. soy sauce
Directions:
Brown meat well in round frying pan or wok.
When done add Worcestershire and soy sauces and all the vegetables.
Cook for about 10 to 15 minutes and add teriyaki sauce.
(You may add more teriyaki than recipe calls for.)
When done, serve over rice or pasta.
M-mmm good!

question: What’s a good recipe for a beef stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Beef Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. boneless sirloin steak
1/2 c. water
1 1/2 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. cornstarch
1/4 c. soy sauce
2 Tbsp. oyster sauce
cooking spray (vegetable)
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, quartered
3 stalks celery, sliced diagonally
1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 green pepper, cut in strips
1/2 lb. fresh snow peas
1/2 bunch broccoli flowerets
1 can sliced water chestnuts
Directions:
Trim fat
from
steak.
Cut
across
grain into strips. Combine water,
cornstarch, soy sauce, sugar and oyster sauce. Set aside.
Coat wok or skillet with cooking spray and heat on medium-high for 2
minutes.
Add
steak
and
stir-fry about 3 minutes.
Remove meat.
Place onion, celery, mushrooms, pepper and water chestnuts to
pan drippings in wok.
Stir-fry 2 to 3 minutes. Add meat,
broccoli
and snow peas.
Cover and reduce heat to medium.
Simmer
2
to
3
minutes.
Stir in soy sauce mixture.
Cook
on
medium,
stirring constantly until bubbly. Serve over hot rice.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Spicy Fried Tofu
Ingredients:
2 lb. tofu
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. each: turmeric, sweet basil, powdered thyme and ground cumin
1/2 to 3/4 tsp. curry
2 cloves garlic, pressed, or 1 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese or nutritional yeast
Directions:
First, press tofu by cutting to 1/2-inch slices and firmly patting out excess water with an absorbent towel.
Cut into small cubes.
Spray Pam on nonstick skillet or wok.
Add tofu; saute on high heat for 5 minutes, turning with spatula.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add turmeric; stir until tofu is yellow all over.
Add the other seasonings, stirring well between each addition. Increase heat.
Add soy sauce, stirring constantly.
Finally, add nutritional yeast or Parmesan cheese; mix well, sauteing until golden brown or until cheese melts.
Good hot or cold.
Serves 4 to 8.

question: What’s a good recipe for crispy tofu?
answer:
Title: Flavorful Tofu(Kids Will Eat)
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1 small onion
1 can pasta ready tomatoes - 3 cheese
1/4 c. dry red wine
dash of chili pepper to taste
dash of marjoram to taste
dash of oregano to taste
dash of black pepper to taste
1/4 c. wheat germ
8 oz. mushrooms, sliced
1 Tbsp. olive oil
2 c. brown rice, cooked
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1/2-inch thick slices and allow to dry on paper towels.
Start to cook brown rice.
In large saute pan saute onions in olive oil until translucent.
Add mushrooms, red wine and spices and continue to cook until mushrooms are soft.
Coat tofu with wheat germ by placing wheat germ in shallow dish and gently pressing tofu.
Add tofu to saute, moving vegies aside to place tofu directly on pan.
Pour can of tomatoes over all and gently mix vegies onto top and in with the tomatoes.
Allow to cook, covered, on medium heat for 7 minutes.
Serve with rice.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Sauce For Fish
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
2 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 1/2 c. milk
3 Tbsp. lemon juice
1 Tbsp. chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter. Blend in flour, salt and pepper. Gradually stir in milk. Cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and smooth. Add lemon juice and parsley. Serve over fish.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Butter Baked Fish
Ingredients:
1 lb. catfish fillets
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. (1/4 lb.) butter
1/2 c. chopped parsley
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. paprika
Directions:
In a 12 x 8 x 2-inch dish, arrange fillets with thickest, meaty areas to outside edge of dish. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. In 1-quart casserole dish, place butter. Microwave on High for 1 to 2 minutes until melted. Blend in parsley and lemon juice; pour over fish. Sprinkle paprika over fillets. Preheat oven to 350°. Place casserole dish in oven. Cook 45 to 60 minutes or until fillets are fluffy. Serves 2 to 3 people.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Lemon Fish
Ingredients:
1/2 c. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. celery seed
1 lb. fish fillet
Directions:
Place butter in baking dish.
Microwave on High to melt butter (45 seconds).
Blend in seasonings.
Coat fish fillets in mixture. Place around in dish.
Cover with wax paper and microwave on High until fish flakes (with fork).
Approximate time is 5 to 6 minutes.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Piquant Sauce For Fish(Serves 4)
Ingredients:
1/4 c. butter or oleo
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1 1/2 tsp. dried parsley flakes
1/8 tsp. garlic powder
1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Place butter in a 1-cup glass measure.
Microwave on Medium-high (roast) for about 1 1/2 minutes, or until melted.
Add mustard, parsley flakes, garlic powder and lemon juice.
Pour sauce over fish to serve.

question: How do I make a lemon butter sauce for fish?
answer:
Title: Baked Fish In Lemon Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. margarine, melted
2 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. paprika
2 to 3 lb. fresh fish or 1 1/2 lb. fish fillets
1 green pepper, sliced into rings
1 onion, sliced into rings
Directions:
In baking dish, put onion and green pepper on fish.
Pour sauce onto fish.
Cover.
Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Vegetables With Tofu
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. tofu, cut into 1/2-inch cubes (firm or extra firm is best)
3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 tsp. vinegar
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 cloves garlic, minced
1/2 tsp. grated ginger
3 Tbsp. peanut or salad oil
1 large carrot, chopped
2 c. chopped broccoli
1 c. sliced mushrooms
1/2 c. sliced green onions
3 Tbsp. cilantro (optional)
use any vegetables that are your favorites
crispy noodles
Directions:
Place tofu in shallow bowl.
Mix soy, vinegar, cumin, garlic and ginger; drizzle this over tofu and set aside.
Heat oil in wok or large pan over high heat.
Add carrot and stir-fry 1 minute. Add broccoli and cook 2 minutes, then add mushrooms and onions. Reduce heat to medium.
Add tofu mixture and cook, stirring gently until heated through but vegetables are still crisp.
Garnish with cilantro.
Spoon over hot rice and pass the soy sauce and add crispy noodles on top.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Crispy Tofu(Crisp Outside, Soft Inside)
Ingredients:
1 box "regular" tofu
1/4 c. chopped, roasted peanuts
2 medium cucumbers, cubed
2 to 3 Tbsp. vinegar
2 to 3 Tbsp. sugar
1 bunch cilantro, chopped
Directions:
Soak 4 blocks tofu in salted water overnight or 4 hours if cut in cubes.
Cut each block into 9 to 12 cubes, depending on size, and drain.
Dip-fry in hot oil (should be crispy outside and soft inside, not hard).
Dip or pour Peanut Dressing over Crispy Tofu when ready to eat.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Stir-Fry Tofu And Veggies
Ingredients:
1 lb. extra firm tofu
1/2 c. Sake or white wine
2 Tbsp. sesame oil or vegetable oil
4 Tbsp. soy sauce or to taste
2 cloves minced garlic
2 tsp. ginger juice (optional)
1 onion, thinly sliced
1 red pepper, diced
2 c. broccoli florets or Chinese cabbage
8 oz. snow peas
1/4 c. roasted cashews or almonds
Directions:
Cut tofu into 1-inch cubes.
In wok or skillet, bring soy sauce, garlic, ginger and wine to a boil.
Add tofu cubes, cover and simmer for 5 to 10 minutes.
Remove tofu and remaining broth from wok or skillet.
Heat oil in wok and stir-fry vegetables over medium heat for 3 to 5 minutes.
Add remaining broth, tofu and cashews or almonds.
Heat and serve.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Spicy Fried Tofu
Ingredients:
2 lb. tofu
1 tsp. dill weed
1/2 tsp. each: turmeric, sweet basil, powdered thyme and ground cumin
1/2 to 3/4 tsp. curry
2 cloves garlic, pressed, or 1 tsp. garlic powder
2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce
1/4 to 1/3 c. Parmesan cheese or nutritional yeast
Directions:
First, press tofu by cutting to 1/2-inch slices and firmly patting out excess water with an absorbent towel.
Cut into small cubes.
Spray Pam on nonstick skillet or wok.
Add tofu; saute on high heat for 5 minutes, turning with spatula.
Reduce heat to medium.
Add turmeric; stir until tofu is yellow all over.
Add the other seasonings, stirring well between each addition. Increase heat.
Add soy sauce, stirring constantly.
Finally, add nutritional yeast or Parmesan cheese; mix well, sauteing until golden brown or until cheese melts.
Good hot or cold.
Serves 4 to 8.

question: How do I make crispy tofu stir-fry?
answer:
Title: Tofu Fried Rice
Ingredients:
4 c. baked rice
2 Tbsp. water
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 c. diced onion (green)
1 c. diced celery
1 1/2 c. bean sprouts
1 c. diced red pepper
1/2 Tbsp. olive oil
1/2 recipe OVEN-FRIED TOFU, diced
Directions:
Saute garlic
and
green
onion
in water until tender. Stir in celery
and
cook 2 to 3 minutes.
Stir in sprouts and red pepper and
cook 1 to 2 minutes.
Stir in remaining ingredients and remove from heat.
Serve hot with soy sauce.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecue Pork
Ingredients:
2 lb. meat, cut in cubes and cooked
1/4 c. drippings
1 medium onion, chopped
1/2 c. chopped celery or celery seed
1/4 tsp. pepper
3/4 tsp. Accent
2 garlic, crushed, or granulated garlic
1/2 c. water
1/4 c. vinegar
1/3 c. Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. salt
3/4 tsp. chili powder
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
Directions:
Heat drippings in saucepan.
Add other ingredients and simmer 2 or 3 minutes.
Add pork and simmer 5 to 10 minutes, longer if time permits.
Serve on buns or use as main dish.
The longer it simmers, the better it is.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Eastern Style Barbecue Pork
Ingredients:
1 Boston butt (about 5 lb.)
1 pt. cider vinegar
2 tsp. salt
2 tsp. ground red pepper
1 Tbsp. red pepper flakes
2 Tbsp. firmly packed brown sugar
Directions:
Combine everything but the meat in a saucepan and heat until boiling.
In a baking pan, place the pork.
Add a little sauce on top and cover with foil.
Cook at 350° for 2 hours or as many hours as it takes your pork to be done.
Finely chop the pork and add a little more sauce.
This recipe is great with the Barbecue Slaw and Baked Beans.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Barbecued Pork
Ingredients:
1 (5 to 6 lb.) Boston butt
salt
1 tsp. chili sauce
1 tsp. celery seed
1 c. catsup
1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce
1/4 c. vinegar
1 tsp. brown sugar
1 c. water
Directions:
Cook pork in lightly salted water over low heat 2 to 2 1/2 hours.
Drain, reserving 1 cup broth.
Cut pork into thin slices and place in a large shallow baking pan.
Combine salt, reserved broth and remaining ingredients.
Mix well and pour over pork slices.
Bake at 325° for 30 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Barbecue
Ingredients:
2 lb. pork
2 large onions
1 (No. 2 1/2) can tomatoes
1/3 bottle Worcestershire sauce
1 tsp. sugar
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. black pepper
1/2 tsp. red pepper
1 Tbsp. mustard
1 small clove garlic
1/2 c. vinegar
1/2 c. water
Directions:
Have pork cut into small pieces.
Mix all ingredients and cook slowly for 7 to 8 hours or until meat falls into pieces.
Serve on 18 to 20 buns.

question: How do I make homemade BBQ pulled pork?
answer:
Title: Pork Barbecue
Ingredients:
4 to 6 lb. pork roast
1 (28 oz.) can crushed tomatoes
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 tsp. black pepper
2 tsp. crushed red pepper
2 tsp. liquid smoke
Directions:
Trim off fat and skin.
Mix all other ingredients in bottom of Dutch oven.
Add meat and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 6 hours.
Take meat out and allow to cool; shred.
Use sauce on beef or serve on rice.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
3 Tbsp. flour
2 c. milk
2 c. shredded sharp cheese
1 can tuna, drained
1/2 lb. shells, cooked and drained
1/8 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter or margarine; stir in flour.
Cook over low heat for 1 minute.
Gradually stir in milk; stir until thickened. Remove from heat; add cheese.
Stir until cheese melts; stir in tuna, shells and black pepper.
Heat until hot.
Serve and sprinkle with parsley.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium onion
1 medium green pepper
3 Tbsp. butter
6 Tbsp. flour
2 (7 oz.) cans tuna, drained
3 c. milk
1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
Directions:
Chop onion and green pepper coarsely.
Cook in butter until limp.
Stir in flour as smoothly as possible.
Add milk. Gradually season with salt and pepper.
Cook, stirring constantly, until mixture bubbles.
Stir in tuna.
Pour into a shallow baking dish.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1 (8 oz.) pkg. noodles, cooked and drained well
1 (8 oz.) pkg. frozen spinach or broccoli, cooked
1/3 c. onion, sauteed in 1/4 c. butter
2 eggs, boiled and chipped finely
1 can cream of celery soup
3/4 c. milk
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Add to butter and onions; stir in vegetable and chopped eggs. Add 1 can (12 1/2 ounces) well drained, chopped tuna.
Stir in noodles and pour into a 2-quart casserole.
Add dash of Parmesan on top.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. medium noodles (2 c.)
2 medium onions, minced
2 Tbsp. butter or oleo
1 (20 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 tsp. garlic salt
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. snipped parsley
1 (7 oz.) can chunk-style tuna
1/2 lb. cheese slices
Directions:
About 1 hour before dinner, cook the noodles according to the package directions, adding the minced onions. Drain.
Add the butter.
In a bowl, combine the tomatoes, garlic salt, salt, pepper and parsley.
In an 8-inch square baking dish, place half of the noodles, half of the tuna, half of the cheese and pour half of the tomato mixture over the layers.
Repeat the layers, ending with the tomato mixture.
Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 40 minutes. Serves 4.

question: How do I make a simple tuna casserole?
answer:
Title: Classic Tuna Casserole
Ingredients:
1 envelope chicken noodle soup mix
2 1/2 c. boiling water
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
dash of pepper
1 can tuna, drained
2 c. canned peas, drained
1/2 c. buttered bread crumbs
Directions:
Preheat oven to 450°.
In a small saucepan, combine soup mix and water.
Heat to boiling.
In a medium saucepan, over low heat, melt butter; blend in flour and pepper.
Gradually stir in hot soup and cook until thickened.
Add tuna and fold in peas.
Turn into a greased 1 1/2-quart dish.
Top with buttered bread crumbs. Bake 15 minutes until heated through.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 diced onion
1 1/4 c. Arborio rice
1/3 c. white wine
2 Tbsp. tomato paste
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
5 c. chicken broth (keep hot over low heat)
1/3 oz. diced mushrooms, soaked in 1/2 c. water for 15 minutes, then chopped
Directions:
Heat oil in a large saucepan over low heat.
Add onion and cook until tender.
Stir in rice and cook with oil.
Add wine and stir until evaporated.
Add dried mushrooms, the water they were soaked in and the tomato paste, mixed in 1/2 cup of chicken broth. Stir until liquid is absorbed.
Continue adding broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly.
Each addition should be absorbed before adding the next.
Cook, uncovered, until broth is all absorbed and rice is tender to the bite.
Do not overcook.
Remove from stove.
Add Parmesan cheese; stir and serve.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto With Vegetables
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 red pepper, diced
1 medium zucchini, diced
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 1/2 Risotto
4 1/2 c. chicken broth
1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, cooked
1 chicken breast, cooked and shredded
1/2 c. Romano cheese, grated
Directions:
Heat oil in skillet.
Saute pepper and zucchini until crisp or tender.
Set aside.
In large saucepan heat butter and saute onion and garlic over medium heat 5 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add Risotto and cook about 3 minutes.
Stir in 1/2 cup hot chicken broth.
Continue stirring until almost absorbed.
Add remaining hot broth 1/2 cup at a time, stirring until Risotto is al dente.
Stir in red pepper, zucchini, peas, chicken and cheese.
Rice may be substituted for Risotto.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Plain Risotto
Ingredients:
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon butter
1 medium onion (chopped)
1 cup Arborio rice
1/2 cup white wine or dry vermouth
4 cups chicken or vegetable broth
1/2 cup grated parmesan cheese
fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Heat olive oil and butter in a saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion and saut until soft.
Add rice and saut until rice is coated.
Add white wine or vermouth and stir until all the liquid is absorbed.
Add hot broth 1/2 cup at a time, until it is all absorbed in the rice and rice is tender.
Add hot water if more liquid is needed.
Stir in parmesan cheese and fresh parsley, and serve warm.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Fuss Free Risotto
Ingredients:
2 1/4 c. water
1 c. long grain rice
3 Tbsp. butter
1/2 c. half and half cream
3/4 c. grated Parmesan
1/2 to 1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In saucepan, bring to boil water and salt.
Stir in rice. Reduce heat; cover and simmer 15 minutes.
Stir in butter, cream and Parmesan.
Serve.

question: How do I make a creamy risotto?
answer:
Title: Risotto
Ingredients:
1 medium onion, diced
1/2 c. butter or margarine
1 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 3/4 c. broth (chicken or beef)
1/2 c. sherry
1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in 1/4 cup butter in large skillet until golden brown.
Add rice and stir until rice turns yellow.
Add broth and sherry.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat.
Cover and let simmer 15 to 20 minutes, until liquid is absorbed.
Add remaining 1/4 cup butter and stir in cheese.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Grilled Fish Tacos
Ingredients:
2 lbs. Fish; firm and fresh, such as Swordfish,Shark, or Sea Bass, cut thick
1/3 c. Lime Juice
1/4 c. Tequila or White Wine
Directions:
Broil on the barbeque, the grill or the oven, turning as often as necessary and basting as needed, until cooked but not overdone.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
beef roast
pork roast
salt
chili sauce
soft tortilla shells
lettuce
onion
tomatoes
Cheddar cheese
taco sauce (hot or mild)
Directions:
Boil beef roast and pork roast about 3 hours with salt to taste.
Shred meat into small pieces.
Pour chili sauce, as much as needed to mix meat together.
In separate bowls, cut up lettuce, tomatoes, onion and Cheddar cheese.
Heat soft shells in microwave oven; fill with previous ingredients and taco sauce.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Mexican Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
1 pkg. taco mix
3/4 c. water
8 taco shells
1 small head lettuce, shredded
1 large tomato, diced
1 can taco sauce
1 c. shredded Cheddar
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Brown beef; drain.
Add seasoning and water.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes.
Heat shells in oven 5 to 7 minutes.
Fill shells with meat, lettuce, tomatoes and cheese.
Top with taco sauce for added flavor.
Serves 4.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground meat
1 large onion
1/2 tsp. cumin seed or powder
garlic powder to taste
1 hot jalapeno pepper
4 to 5 chopped fresh tomatoes or Del Monte Mexican style canned tomatoes
1 box taco shells
chopped lettuce and tomatoes (for topping)
Directions:
Heat shells in oven (325°) until crisp.
Simmer all ingredients for 45 minutes, thickening with 1 tablespoon flour if needed.
Spoon filling into taco shells.
Top with chopped lettuce, tomatoes and shredded cheese.

question: How do I make grilled fish tacos?
answer:
Title: Tacos
Ingredients:
12 taco shells
1 lb. lean ground beef
1/2 c. chopped onion
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 (4 oz.) can diced chili peppers, drained
1 to 2 tsp. chili powder
several dashes bottled hot sauce (optional)
1 1/2 c. shredded lettuce
1 c. chopped tomatoes
1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese
3/4 c. chopped onion
Directions:
Heat taco shells according to package directions.
For filling, in a large skillet, cook meat, onion and garlic until meat is brown.
Drain fat.
Stir in chili peppers, chili powder and hot pepper sauce.
Heat through.
Fill taco shell with meat mixture.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, onion and cheese.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Herbed Chicken
Ingredients:
3/4 c. Miracle Whip
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 tsp. dried basil leaves, crushed
1 tsp. dried thyme leaves, crushed
6 boneless chicken breast halves
1/4 c. dry white wine
2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onions
Directions:
Mix dressing, wine, garlic, onions and seasonings.
Pour salad dressing mixture over chicken; cover.
Refrigerate for several hours.
Drain.
Place chicken on grill over medium hot coals or on rack of broiler pan.
Grill or broil for 8 to 10 minutes on each side or until tender.
Makes 6 servings.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Gentlemen Prefer Chicken
Ingredients:
3 lb. Chicken, cut up
Salt and Pepper to taste
1/4 c. Oil
1 can Lemonade Concentrate, thawed
3/4 c. crushed Pineapple, drained
3/4 c. chunk Pineapple, drained
2 Green Bell Pepper, cut in strips
1/4 c. Brown Sugar
1/4 c. A-1 Steak Sauce
1/2 c. Slivered Almonds
Directions:
Brown chicken in skillet with oil, salt and pepper with a little butter.
When brown place in baking dish.
Put remaining ingredients over chicken in the order given.
Bake uncovered at 400 degrees for 45 minutes.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Stuff Chicken
Ingredients:
1 large chicken
2 lb. ground pork
1 c. chopped ham
1/4 c. sweet relish
1 Tbsp. soy sauce
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 hot dogs, chopped
4 eggs, beaten
1/2 c. grated cheese
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. peas
1/2 c. ketchup
2 Tbsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. pimientos, chopped
1 onion, minced
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Prepare chicken for stuffing, removing all bones and meat, leaving skin, wings and legs intact.
Soak in lemon juice and soy sauce.
Chop meat of chicken.
Mix ground pork and chopped chicken, then add ham, sweet relish, hot dog, eggs, cheese, raisins, peas, ketchup, cornstarch, pimientos, onion, salt and pepper.
Mix them all together.
Stuff chicken with meat mixture.
Sew up opening and bake in moderate oven until brown.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dressing
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
1 bay leaf
1 Tbsp. dried onion flakes
1 Tbsp. poultry seasoning
1 Tbsp. ground sage
1/2 tsp. black pepper
1 can condensed cream of chicken soup (plus 1 can water)
1 (10-inch) corn bread cake
3 slices white bread, crumbled
salt to taste
Directions:
Cook chicken (skin and remove fat) in salted water with bay leaf until tender.
Remove from broth, throw away bay leaf. Remove bones and cut or tear meat into pieces; set aside.
In very large bowl or pan, crumble cornbread and white bread; add seasoning, chicken broth and soup.
Mix thoroughly.
If too dry, add the can of water.
Mix in chicken.
Generously grease 3-quart baking dish or roaster pan.
Put dressing in pan.
Dot with butter or margarine.
Bake at 450° until golden brown.

question: What can I do with leftover chicken?
answer:
Title: Herbed Chicken
Ingredients:
3/4 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
1/4 c. dry white wine
2 garlic cloves, minced
2 Tbsp. finely chopped green onions
2 tsp. dried basil leaves, crushed
1 tsp. dried thyme leaves, crushed
6 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
Directions:
Mix dressing, wine, garlic, onion and seasonings.
Pour mixture over chicken.
Cover.
Refrigerate several hours or overnight. Drain.
Place chicken on grill (medium) or rack of broiler pan. Grill or broil 8 to 10 minutes on each side.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas (Flour)
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1 1/2 Tbsp. salt
1/3 c. shortening
1/2 c. cold water
Directions:
Cut shortening in flour and salt.
Add water, enough to make a soft but not sticky dough.
Make into 18 balls.
Set aside about 30 minutes.
Roll out about 1/8-inch thick.
Bake on hot griddle. Serve warm with beans or chile con carne.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Flour Tortillas
Ingredients:
4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/2 c. shortening
1 c. lukewarm water
1 Tbsp. baking powder
Directions:
Place flour, salt and baking powder in mixing bowl.
Add shortening and mix well.
Add lukewarm water and blend well.
Turn out on lightly floured board and knead at least 50 strokes.
Divide into 12 equal sized pieces and form into balls.
Cover with a cloth and let stand 15 minutes.
Roll each ball into a round tortilla, about 8 inches in diameter.
Cook on moderately hot iron grill, ungreased, turning once.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas
Ingredients:
3 c. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 1/4 c. warm water
1 tsp. baking powder
3 Tbsp. shortening
Directions:
Mix flour, baking powder and salt.
Blend in shortening and water; knead.
Let sit covered for 15 minutes.
Roll into balls and roll out.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas
Ingredients:
5 c. flour (all-purpose)
1 tsp. salt
1 tsp. baking powder
1/4 c. shortening
3/4 c. warm water (only as warm as your hand can stand)
Directions:
Mix flour, salt, baking powder and shortening together.
Pour small amount of warm water into flour.
Knead flour together. Only add enough water to where the flour stays together and forms a ball.
Preheat wrought iron skillet or some form of baking utensil on top of the stove.
Make small, round balls; roll out with rolling pin into a circle.
Cook in wrought iron skillet at a medium to high flame.
Cook on both sides.
Flip tortillas with tongs or fork.
Serves 6 to 8 persons.

question: How do I make homemade tortillas?
answer:
Title: Tortillas
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 tsp. baking powder
4 Tbsp. shortening
1 c. hot water (approximately)
Directions:
Mix all ingredients together, adding water a couple of tablespoons at a time until dough is workable but not sticky.
Add a little more flour, if necessary.
Separate dough into 12 small balls.
Roll out into circles and cook in an iron skillet or griddle, turning to brown both sides evenly.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage Potato Dinner
Ingredients:
1 lb. Polish sausage
5 Idaho potatoes, peeled
2 cans cream of celery soup
1 c. water
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped green pepper (optional)
1/4 c. chopped pimientos (optional)
Directions:
Grease a 3-quart baking dish.
In a large saucepan, heat soup and water over low heat, stirring occasionally.
Prepare cheese, peppers and pimientos.
Slice sausage.
Add above to soup mixture. Continue to heat.
Slice potatoes and layer on bottom of dish. Pour soup mixture over potatoes and bake at 400° for 1 1/4 hours. Serves 6.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage-Vegetable Dinner
Ingredients:
3/4 lb. Polish sausage
4 medium baking potatoes
1 medium sized green pepper, cut into strips
4 medium carrots, cut into 3 x 1/2-inch strips
1 (16 oz.) can French-style green beans, drained
1 medium onion, quartered
1 medium head cabbage, cored and quartered
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. water
Directions:
Cut sausage diagonally into 1/2-inch slices.
Wash potatoes; cut into 1/3-inch crosswise sections.
Layer sausage, potatoes and next 5 ingredients in order given in a large Dutch oven, sprinkling each vegetable layer with salt and pepper.
Add water and bring to a boil.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 35 to 45 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Yields 4 to 6 servings.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage-Potato-Dinner
Ingredients:
1 lb. or less Hillshire smoked sausage, cut into bite size pieces
2 1/2 c. potatoes, pared and thinly sliced
1 can cream of celery soup
1 c. water
1/3 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/4 c. chopped pimentos (optional)
Directions:
Grease a 10-inch baking dish.
Line the bottom with potatoes. In separate saucepan, heat soup and water, stirring until smooth. Stir in cheese until melted.
Add Hillshire sausage pieces, green pepper and pimento (if desired).
Pour over potatoes.
Bake at 350° for 55 minutes or until potatoes are done.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Potato Saute And Sausage Or Turkey
Ingredients:
6 medium red potatoes
1 1/2 lb. green beans
3 medium onions
salad oil
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
2 lb. turkey-sausage links
3 medium tomatoes
Directions:
Cut each unpeeled potato into quarters and cut stem end from beans.
In 6-quart pan, heat potatoes covered in hot water to boiling over high heat.
Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 7 minutes.
Stir in green beans, adding more hot water if needed. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce heat to low and simmer 5 minutes.
Drain.
Thinly slice onions.
In 12-inch skillet over medium heat, put 1 1/2 tablespoons hot salad oil and cook sausage until lightly brown.
Add onions and continue cooking until onions are tender.
Stir in 1/2 cup water, turn heat to low; cover and cook until sausage is cooked through.
Remove sausage mixture to bowl.
In same skillet, in 1 1/2 tablespoons hot salad oil, cook potatoes and green beans with salt and pepper until potatoes are golden, stirring frequently. Cut tomatoes in wedges.
Return sausage mixture to skillet, then add tomatoes and heat through. Spoon on to warm platters.
Makes 8 main dish servings.

question: What can I make with leftover sausage and potatoes?
answer:
Title: Sausage And Potato Stew
Ingredients:
12 oz. hot or sweet Italian sausage, cut in 1/2-inch pieces
2 c. water
1 Tbsp. plus 1 tsp. all-purpose flour
1 large bell pepper, chopped
1/4 tsp. dried thyme leaves
2 large potatoes, peeled and cut in bite size chunks
1 large onion, cut in thin wedges
1/2 tsp. minced garlic
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Bring sausage and 1/4 cup of the water to a boil in a large saucepan.
Reduce heat, cover and simmer 5 minutes, stirring once or twice, until water evaporates.
Reduce heat to low.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Cheese, Tomato And Onion Pie
Ingredients:
pastry for pie crust
10 oz. cheese (1/2 Swiss, 1/2 Gruyere)
5 Tbsp. flour
2 large onions
4 Tbsp. butter
1 tsp. chopped basil
2 large, firm tomatoes, sliced
2 large eggs
3/4 c. cream
Directions:
Prepare pastry; line a 10-inch pie dish and chill.
Grate all the cheese; toss it with the flour.
Melt the butter in a large skillet.
Slice onions; saute them very gently in butter until they begin to turn golden, about 1/2 hour.
Spread about 1/3 of cheese over bottom of pie dish.
Spread the onions over it.
In butter that is left in pan, heat tomato slices with chopped basil for 1 to 2 minutes.
Arrange tomato slices over the onions.
Cover with remaining cheese.
Beat eggs with cream; pour mixture over the cheese.
