If you like nutmeg, sprinkle a little on the top. Bake in a preheated 350° oven for about 35 to 40 minutes, or until the top browns nicely.
Serve hot in wedges.
Serves 6.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Chicken Pie
Ingredients:
5 lb. cooked chicken (boneless), pulled in pieces
1 c. pimento, diced
1 (#10) can Veg-All mixed vegetables
1 c. chicken fat or margarine
1 c. flour
1 qt. milk
1 qt. chicken stock
2 tsp. sage
1 Tbsp. salt
2 tsp. pepper
2 tsp. marjoram
2 doz. drop biscuit dough
Directions:
Fold chicken, pimento and Veg-All together.
Mix fat and flour together.
Cook until smooth and golden.
Add milk and stock, whipping until smooth and thick.
Add seasoning and fold into chicken vegetable mixture.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Savory Upside-Down Pie
Ingredients:
7 1/2 oz. pkg. frozen puff pastry
1 1/2 lb. ground beef
1 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1 large onion, chopped
3 egg yolks
1 c. mushrooms
4 oz. bacon slices
1/2 c. crumbled Blue cheese
1 Tbsp. chopped sorrel and chervil
Directions:
Thaw pastry.
Mix ground beef, salt, pepper and onion; bind with egg yolks.
Wash and quarter mushrooms.
Cover the bottom of an 8-inch loose bottomed cake pan with the bacon.
Arrange the cheese, herbs and mushroom quarters on top.
Cover the meat mixture, pressing it down firmly and smoothly on the top.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: The Best Pot Pie
Ingredients:
1/3 c. margarine
1/3 c. all-purpose flour
1/3 c. chopped onion
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
pastry dough (top and bottom)
1 3/4 c. chicken broth
2/3 c. milk
2 c. cooked, cut up chicken or turkey
1 pkg. frozen peas and carrots or fresh carrots and celery
Directions:
Heat margarine over low heat until melted.
Blend in flour, onion, salt and pepper.
Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and bubbly.
Remove from heat.
Stir in broth and milk.
Heat to boiling, stirring constantly.
Boil and stir 1 minute.
Stir in chicken and vegetables; reserve.

question: What’s a good recipe for a savory pie?
answer:
Title: Fried Pies
Ingredients:
3 c. dried fruit
1 c. sugar
3 c. plain flour
1 1/2 c. Crisco
1 tsp. salt
Directions:
Add 2 cups water to 1 cup fruit.
Cook until tender, then cool. Add sugar to fruit; mix good.
Add 1 teaspoon cinnamon.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twist Sticks
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/8 tsp. cayenne
1/3 c. butter
1 c. grated cheese (Cheddar)
3 Tbsp. ice water
Directions:
Sift all dry ingredients and cut in cheese and butter.
Add ice water and roll to a thickness of 1/8-inch.
Cut in strips and twist.
Bake at 350° for about 15 minutes.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
1 c. sifted flour
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1/2 c. grated sharp Cheddar
1/3 c. cold water
Directions:
Sift flour, baking powder and salt into a medium sized bowl. Cut in butter with a pastry blender until crumbly.
Sprinkle water over.
Mix lightly with fork just until mixture holds together and leaves sides of bowl.
Roll out on lightly floured pastry cloth or board to a 12 x 10-inch rectangle.
Divide in half lengthwise, then cut each half crosswise into 1/2-inch wide strips.
Lift strips one at a time.
Twist a couple turns and place on ungreased baking sheet.
Bake at 425° for 10 minutes or until golden brown.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
1 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper
3/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese, divided
1/2 c. softened butter or margarine
3 egg yolks
2 tsp. water
1 egg white, slightly beaten
1 Tbsp. sesame seeds (optional)
Directions:
Combine flour, baking soda, mustard, salt and red pepper in large bowl. Reserve 1 tablespoon cheese; stir remaining cheese into flour mixture. Cut in butter with pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles fine crumbs. Add egg yolks and water, mixing until dough forms. Shape into a ball; flatten and wrap in plastic wrap. Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
1 c. all purpose flour
1/2 tsp. baking soda
1/2 tsp. dry mustard
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. ground red pepper (cayenne)
3/4 c. grated parmesan cheese, divided
1/2 c. butter or margarine
3 egg yolks
2 tsp. water
1 egg white, slightly beaten
1 Tbsp. sesame seeds, optional
Directions:
Combine flour, baking soda, mustard, salt and red pepper in large bowl. Reserve 1 Tbsp. cheese; stir remaining cheese into flour mixture. Cut in butter with pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles fine crumbs. Add egg yolks and water, mixing until dough forms. Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm. Preheat oven to 400°. Grease two cookie sheets. Roll out dough on lightly floured surface into 12 inch square (about 1/8 inch thick). Brush surface lightly with egg white and sprinkle with remaining 1 Tbsp. cheese and sesame seeds, if desired. Cut dough in half. Cut each half crosswise into 1/4 inch strips. Twist 2 strips together. Repeat with remaining strips. Place 1 inch apart on prepared cookie sheets. Bake 6 to 8 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from cookie sheets and cool completely on wire racks. Store in airtight container. Makes about 48 twists.

question: How do I make grilled cheese with a twist?
answer:
Title: Cheese Twists
Ingredients:
3/4 c. all-purpose flour
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
1/8 tsp. red pepper
1/4 c. cold butter or margarine
1 egg yolk
2 Tbsp. water
Directions:
In a bowl, mix flour, cheese and red pepper with a pastry blender or 2 knives.
Cut butter into flour mixture until it resembles fine crumbs.
Stir in mixture of egg yolk and water. Gather dough into a ball; dust with flour.
Wrap and refrigerate until firm.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
4 lb. chicken fryer
1 tsp. garlic salt
1/2 c. melted butter
1/2 c. dry white wine
1 tsp. crushed rosemary
1 tsp. sweet basil, crushed
1 tsp. chopped parsley
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 375°. Sprinkle chicken cavities with the garlic salt and crushed rosemary. Truss chicken and place in an open roasting pan. Combine butter, wine, rosemary, basil, parsley, salt and pepper in a small saucepan. Cook over low heat a few minutes until thoroughly blended.
Baste chicken with wine sauce. Roast 20 minutes per pound until tender. Baste frequently. The last 20 minutes, turn to brown underside.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Garlic Roasted Chicken
Ingredients:
1 (2 1/2 to 3 lb.) chicken
2 Tbsp. garlic powder with parsley
2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice
1 tsp. seasoned salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, garlic powder, seasoned salt and pepper.
Wrap chicken loosely in foil.
Refrigerate overnight.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Easy Garlic Chicken
Ingredients:
1 whole roasting chicken (about 3 lb.)
salt and pepper to taste
12 cloves garlic, peeled
1 medium onion, quartered
1/2 c. fresh parsley, snipped
1 tsp. dried thyme
1 bay leaf (optional)
2 Tbsp. tarragon vinegar
1/2 c. apple juice
Directions:
Wash chicken and pat dry.
Rub with salt and pepper.
Cut one clove of garlic in half and rub over chicken.
Place remaining garlic, onion quarters, parsley and thyme in chicken cavity. Place in roasting pan.
Place vinegar and apple juice in pan with chicken, using liquid for basting.
Roast at 425° for 20 minutes. Baste once with juices.
Reduce oven to 350° and roast at least 1 more hour, basting often.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Roast Chicken With Garlic
Ingredients:
1 (3 lb.) fryer
1/2 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. dried oregano
10 large unpeeled garlic cloves
1 1/2 Tbsp. each: olive oil, white cooking wine
freshly ground pepper
Directions:
Heat oven to 450°.
Rinse chicken.
Pat dry.
Place on prepared pan, breast side up.
Put 1 1/2 teaspoons in cavity, sprinkling evenly.
Split 8 cloves and put in cavity.
Peel and mince remaining garlic.
Mix with remaining salt and oregano, oil, cooking wine and pepper in a small dish.
Use your fingers to carefully separate skin from the entire breast area of the chicken without tearing it, making a pocket.
Spoon the garlic mixture into pocket; massage gently on surface to distribute it evenly over breast area.
Roast about 50 minutes.

question: How do I make a garlic herb roasted chicken?
answer:
Title: Herb Roasted Chicken(Serves Four)
Ingredients:
1 large roasting chicken (about 6 lb.)
3 Tbsp. butter, softened
1 clove garlic, minced
3 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese
1/2 tsp. sage leaves
3/4 tsp. thyme leaves
3/4 tsp. basil leaves
6 Tbsp. butter, softened
salt
Directions:
Preheat oven to 425°.
Wash chicken; pat dry.
Cream together 3 tablespoons butter, garlic, Parmesan, sage, thyme and basil.
This mixture goes under the skin, so turn chicken breast side up and make skin as loose as possible.
Spread herb mixture underneath the skin.
Smear butter on outside of skin.
Put chicken breast up in roasting pan and place in oven.
Melt remaining butter.
Cook chicken 15 minutes, basting once.
Reduce to 350°.
Roast 20 minutes per pound, basting with butter every 10 minutes.
Serve.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Soup(6 Cups)
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, chopped
1 small clove garlic, minced
1 lb. fresh mushrooms, cut in 1/4-inch dices
1/4 c. flour
3 c. chicken stock
1 c. milk
1/4 c. dry sherry
1 bay leaf
1/4 c. (2 oz.) cream cheese, cut in bits
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/4 tsp. Tabasco sauce
3/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
Melt butter in heavy saucepan.
Add onion and saute 3 to 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook 30 seconds.
Stir in mushrooms and saute until they release juices.
Sprinkle on flour and blend. Cook 1 minute.
Add stock, milk and sherry.
Bring to boil and stir constantly.
Add bay leaf and simmer 15 minutes.
Stir in cream cheese, lemon juice and Tabasco.
Stir until smooth and cream cheese is melted.
Season with salt.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
8 oz. mushrooms
1 pt. water or stock
3/4 pt. fresh milk
2 oz. butter or substitute
2 oz. flour
seasoning
Directions:
Chop mushrooms finely unless it is desired to strain the soup. Melt butter in saucepan; fry mushrooms for 5 minutes, stirring to prevent their discoloring.
Stir in the flour and cook for 3 minutes.
Remove the pan from the heat and gradually add water and milk.
Bring to the boil and cook until soup thickens.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
3 oz. dried mushrooms
1 qt. beef broth
2 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. sour cream
Directions:
Soak mushrooms for 3 to 4 hours and bring to a boil in a small amount of water.
Add the broth and simmer, covered, for half an hour.
Melt the butter; blend in the flour, salt and pepper.
Add the stock gradually while stirring.
Stir in sour cream just before serving.
Reheat, but don't let the soup boil.
Add more seasoning to taste.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Cream Of Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
2 c. chopped fresh mushrooms
2 Tbsp. chopped onion
1/4 c. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
3 c. milk
2 beef bouillon cubes, dissolved in 1 c. boiling water
1 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
Directions:
Saute mushrooms and onion in butter until tender (5 to 8 minutes).
Stir occasionally.
Blend in flour; add milk slowly and then beef stock, stirring to blend.
Add salt and pepper and cook, stirring constantly until soup is thickened.

question: How do I make a creamy mushroom soup?
answer:
Title: Creamy Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. butter
1 large onion
1 clove garlic, finely chop
1 lb. mushrooms
3 Tbsp. butter
3 Tbsp. flour
1 1/2 c. chicken stock
2 1/2 c. milk or more (as desired)
1 Tbsp. Worcestershire
1/4 tsp. Tabasco
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
2 Tbsp. fresh chopped parsley
Directions:
Melt butter in skillet.
Add onion and garlic.
Cook until onion is tender.
Add mushrooms.
Cook until liquid is evaporated. Melt butter in large saucepan.
Whisk in flour.
Cook, stirring constantly, 2 to 3 minutes without browning.
Whisk in milk.
Add seasoning.
Bring to boil.
Reduce heat and cook 5 to 8 minutes.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
10 to 12 small carrots
3 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
2 Tbsp. honey
Directions:
Cook carrots in small amount of boiling, salted water about 10 minutes or until tender.
Drain.
In a skillet, melt butter; add sugar and honey.
Simmer mixture for 2 minutes.
Add carrots and cook over low heat, turning until well glazed, about 5 minutes. Serves 6.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey-Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
2 lb. carrots, scraped and thinly sliced
1/2 c. water
3 Tbsp. honey
3 Tbsp. brown sugar
3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
2 Tbsp. spiced mustard (this is optional)
Directions:
Combine carrots and water in medium saucepan.
Bring to a boil;
cover,
reduce
heat
and
simmer
8 minutes or until crisp-tender.
Drain and return to pan.
Add honey and remaining ingredients;
cook	over low heat, stirring gently, until butter and sugar melts.
Yields 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
4 1/2 c. sliced carrots
1 Tbsp. butter
1 1/2 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. lemon juice
Directions:
Boil carrots in water until tender; drain.
Melt butter in large skillet over medium heat; add honey and lemon juice, stirring until smooth.
Add carrots, tossing gently.
Serve.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
4 large carrots
1/2 stick butter/margarine
brown sugar
lemon juice (optional)
Directions:
Clean and slice carrots longways.
Then cut in half to desired thickness.
Boil until tender.
Drain water; add butter until melted, then add brown sugar to sweetness desired.
Stir until carrots are glazed.

question: How do I make roasted carrots with honey glaze?
answer:
Title: Honey Glazed Carrots
Ingredients:
6 to 8 carrots
2 Tbsp. honey
1 Tbsp. butter
1 Tbsp. parsley
2 Tbsp. orange juice
salt to taste
Directions:
Scrape or peel carrots.
Cook in a small amount of water until tender, but not soft, about 15 minutes.
Remove from water.
Place in a greased baking pan.
Mix honey and orange juice, pour over carrots.
Bake 15 minutes in moderate oven at 350°.
Sprinkle with parsley.
Serves 6.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1 lb. rigatoni or pasta of your choice
1 small onion, chopped
4 cloves garlic, finely chopped
1 medium zucchini, peeled, halved lengthwise and sliced
1 c. broccoli cuts
1/2 c. lima beans
1/2 c. peas
2 carrots, cut in thin strips
3/4 c. crushed tomatoes
1/4 c. heavy cream
3 Tbsp. olive oil
salt and pepper
grated cheese
Directions:
Combine olive oil, onion and garlic in a large skillet.
Add all vegetables and season to taste with salt and pepper.
Cook on medium-high heat (stirring occasionally) until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Remove from heat.
Serve over cooked pasta. Sprinkle with grated cheese.
Makes approximately 6 servings.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera(Springtime Pasta)
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
1 medium diced onion
1 Tbsp. chopped garlic
3 to 4 c. sliced vegetables (zucchini, squash, red and green pepper, fresh mushrooms, cauliflower or broccoli)
1 (14 oz.) can diced tomatoes, drained (reserve juice)
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste
3/4 c. water
1/2 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
1 tsp. dried basil
linguine
olives
Directions:
Cook pasta.
Saute onion and garlic in medium skillet about 1 minute.
Add vegetables and saute 3 to 4 minutes.
Stir in reserved tomato juice, tomato paste and water.
Simmer 5 to 8 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Add tomatoes and basil, salt and pepper.
Simmer another couple of minutes.
Serve over pasta.
Garnish with olives.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
4 cloves garlic, chopped
2 Tbsp. plus 2 Tbsp. fat-free chicken broth
2 (15 oz. each) cans tomato sauce
4 Tbsp. honey
2 tsp. crushed dried oregano
2 tsp. crushed dried basil
pinch of white pepper (optional)
1 large red pepper, cut in 1-inch strips
1 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 1/2 c. yellow summer squash or zucchini, cut in thin sticks 1 1/2-inches long
1 1/2 c. carrots, cut in thin sticks 1 1/2-inches long
1 1/2 c. small broccoli florets
2 Tbsp. plus 1 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
3/4 c. peas
10 oz. whole grain pasta, cooked
1/4 c. chopped green onion
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
In a medium saucepan, cook onion and garlic in 2 tablespoons broth 5 to 7 minutes or until softened over medium-high heat. Add tomato sauce, honey, oregano, basil and white pepper.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 minutes.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
1 c. chopped onion
4 chopped garlic cloves
2 Tbsp. plus 2 Tbsp. fat-free chicken broth
2 (15 oz.) no salt tomato sauce
4 Tbsp. honey
2 tsp. crushed dried oregano
2 tsp. crushed dried basil
pinch of white pepper
1 large red pepper, cut in 1-inch strips
1 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms
1 1/2 c. yellow summer squash or zucchini, cut in thin sticks (1 1/2-inches long)
1 1/2 c. carrots, cut in very thin sticks (1 1/2-inches long)
1 1/2 c. small broccoli florets
2 Tbsp. plus 1 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar
3/4 c. peas
10 oz. whole grain cooked pasta
1/4 c. chopped green onions
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
In medium saucepan, cook onion and garlic in 2 tablespoons broth 5 to 7 minutes or until softened.
Add tomato sauce, honey, oregano, basil and white pepper.
Bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 minutes.
In a skillet or wok, combine red pepper, mushrooms, squash, carrots, broccoli and 2 tablespoons each balsamic vinegar and broth.
Stir-fry over high heat until crisp-tender, about 10 minutes.
Add peas and cook for 2 more minutes.
Set aside.
Add 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar to sauce and cook for 5 minutes.
Reserve 1 cup sauce to serve at table. Pour remaining sauce over cooked pasta and toss thoroughly.
Add stir-fried vegetables and toss again.
Sprinkle green onion and parsley over top.

question: Can you suggest a recipe for pasta primavera?
answer:
Title: Pasta Primavera
Ingredients:
5 oz. corkscrew macaroni or fettuccine
1/4 c. water
2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms
1 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen French-style green beans
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 (12 oz.) can evaporated skim milk
4 tsp. cornstarch
1/2 c. shredded Provolone or Mozzarella cheese (2 oz.)
1 medium tomato, cut into wedges
Directions:
Cook pasta according to directions, drain well.
Meanwhile, for sauce, in a medium saucepan, combine water, mushrooms, frozen beans, green pepper, garlic, 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
Bring to boiling, reduce heat.
Cover and simmer for 4 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Do not drain.
Stir together milk and cornstarch; stir into vegetable mixture.
Cook and stir over medium heat until thickened and bubbly.
Cook and stir for 1 minute more.
Stir in cheese until melted.
To serve, pour over pasta.
Garnish with tomato wedges.
Makes 4 servings.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Seafood Paella
Ingredients:
1 (6 oz.) can crab meat
1 can smoked oysters
1 Tbsp. corn oil
1/2 c. chopped green onion with tops
4 c. cooked yellow saffron rice
1 (14 1/2 oz.) can diced tomato
1/2 c. chopped onion
1 lb. fresh or frozen peeled shrimp
2 c. frozen green peas, defrosted
1/2 oz. jar chopped pimiento with juice
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3 large bay leaves
Directions:
Saute onions in oil.
Combine all ingredients in stove top pan.
Simmer for 20 to 25 minutes until seafood is cooked.
Remove bay leaves before serving.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
2 c. rice (yellow)
2 c. chicken chunks
1/2 c. sliced black olives
1 c. scallops
1 c. shrimp
2 to 3 muscles
6 clams
lobster tails (if desired)
other seafood of desire (optional)
Directions:
Steam or boil all seafood.
Cook rice.
Mix all ingredients together and bake 20 minutes.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
1/4 lb. raw shrimp
1/4 lb. raw little neck clams
1/4 lb. raw mussels
2 Tbsp. Spanish olive oil
3 chorizos or 1/2 lb. Italian sausage
3 Tbsp. Spanish olive oil
1 (1 1/2 or 2 lb.) chicken, cut up
1/2 c. flour or more if needed
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/4 c. Spanish olive oil
1 medium onion, chopped
1 clove garlic, chopped fine
1 green pepper, sliced
1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes, drained
3 c. uncooked long grain rice
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. ground saffron
6 c. boiling water
1 pkg. frozen peas, thawed
1/4 c. sliced pimiento
Directions:
Remove shells from shrimp, leaving tails.
Devein by making shallow incision down the back and running under cold water.
Set aside.
Scrub clams and mussels.
Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in a skillet.
Prick sausages with a fork to let out steam and cook in skillet until brown.
Pour off oil; add water to cover sausages.
Cover pan and simmer 5 minutes; set aside.
In a separate skillet, heat 3 tablespoons olive oil.
Mix 1/2 cup flour, 1 teaspoon salt and pepper.
Use to lightly coat chicken. Brown chicken until golden.
Set aside.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Paella
Ingredients:
1/2 c. dry white wine
3 Tbsp. saffron threads
light vegetable oil cooking spray
1 c. chopped onion (1 medium onion)
1 c. arborio rice
1 banana pepper, trimmed and cut into strips
1 red bell pepper, trimmed and cut into strips
1 yellow bell pepper, trimmed and cut into strips
3 c. hot chicken stock, fat skimmed off
6 oz. boneless, skinless chicken breast, cubed
1/2 c. squid rings
1/2 lb. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
12 mussels, scrubbed
12 littleneck clams, scrubbed
4 (3 oz.) freshwater lobster tails or 2 (6 oz.) lobster tails, cut in half
1/2 c. canned sliced artichoke hearts
1 c. frozen peas, thawed
1 c. chopped tomato (1 medium tomato)
Directions:
Preheat the oven to 350°.
Put the white wine and saffron threads in a small bowl and set aside.
Preheat a large, heavy paella pan or frying pan for about 1 minute over medium-high heat. Spray it 4 times with the vegetable oil.
Saute the onion for 2 to 3 minutes until limp.
Add the rice and saute for about 1 minute until golden.
Add the wine and saffron and stir until the liquid is completely absorbed.
Stir in the peppers.
Add the hot chicken stock 1/4 cup at a time, stirring until absorbed.
Keep the stock over low heat.
When only 1/2 cup of the chicken stock remains to be added, stir in the chicken.
With the last addition of stock, stir in the squid and shrimp.
Turn the burner off.
The rice should be tender.

question: What’s a good recipe for a seafood paella?
answer:
Title: Spanish Paella
Ingredients:
4 oz. butter
1 large sweet yellow onion, chopped
2 lb. boned chicken breasts, skinned, sauteed, cut into 1-inch strips and set aside in a bowl
2 c. long grain rice
1 to 2 Tbsp. saffron, crushed
4 c. chicken broth (1/3 less salt)
1 chorizo sausage, cooked well, drained of fat, mashed and set aside in a bowl
1 red bell pepper, chopped
18 small clams in shells, scrubbed
1 lobster tail, cleaned and cut into chunks
2 lb. fresh fish (halibut, scallops, sea bass), cooked, sauteed in butter and set aside in a bowl
Directions:
Preheat oven to 400°.
In a large paella pan or iron skillet, saute onion and red bell pepper in butter until softened.
Add rice to pan and cook 10 minutes.
Do not brown.
Add more butter, if necessary.
Stir in chicken broth and saffron and bring to a boil, stirring occasionally.
Reduce to a low simmer and cook, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until rice is tender.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
2 c. old-fashioned oats
1 c. raisins or dried cranberries
1 c. unsalted peanuts
1/2 c. unsalted sunflower seeds
2 1/2 c. Rice Krispies
2 Tbsp. sesame seeds
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. chunky peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
Directions:
Toast oats for 15 minutes at 250°. Add peanuts, raisins and sunflower seeds. Cool. Mix in Rice Krispies. Melt butter, peanut butter and marshmallows. Add dry mixture
and mix together. Press into buttered pan. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. To serve, cut into desired size or cut and wrap to store.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
1 c. butter or oleo
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
2 c. Rice Krispies
2 c. Minute oatmeal
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. peanuts
wheat germ
Directions:
Melt butter, peanut butter and marshmallows in a microwave until smooth. Add remaining ingredients, mixing thoroughly. Pour into a 9 x 13-inch pan lined with foil or sprayed with cooking spray. Flatten. When set, cut into squares.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
2 1/2 c. Rice Krispies cereal
1 c. quick oats
1/2 c. toasted sesame seed
1/4 c. butter (1/2 stick)
1/2 c. peanut butter
1 (10 oz.) pkg. marshmallows
1/2 c. peanuts, halved
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Grease 9 x 13-inch pan.
In large frying pan, combine cereal, oats and sesame seed.
Toast over medium heat for a few minutes until crisp, stirring constantly.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Banana Energy Bars
Ingredients:
3/4 c. soft margarine
1 c. packed brown sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. mashed ripe bananas
4 c. uncooked oats
1 c. raisins
1/2 c. chopped walnuts
Directions:
Cream margarine and sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in egg, salt and bananas.
Stir in remaining ingredients.

question: How do I make a healthy energy bar?
answer:
Title: Energy Bars
Ingredients:
3 c. miniature marshmallows
1/2 c. crunchy peanut butter
1/4 c. honey
3 Tbsp. margarine
4 Tbsp. cocoa
4 c. Rice Krispies
1 tsp. vanilla
Directions:
Melt together first 5 ingredients, stirring over low heat until marshmallows are melted. Add Rice Krispies and vanilla. Place in foil-lined pan and cool thoroughly. Cut into squares. Store in plastic container.
Makes 24 squares.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats(Yield:  6 Servings)
Ingredients:
1 1/2 lb. small zucchini
3/4 c. grated Cheddar cheese, divided
1 1/2 c. fresh bread crumbs
1/4 c. minced onion
2 Tbsp. parsley
1 1/4 tsp. salt
1/8 tsp. pepper
2 eggs, beaten
2 Tbsp. butter
Directions:
Boil zucchini until tender; cut in half lengthwise.
Scoop out zucchini and reserve shells.
Add 1/2 cup cheese and next 6 ingredients.
Stuff shells with mixture.
Dot with butter and 1/4 cup cheese.
Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
2 medium zucchini
1/2 c. brown rice (uncooked)
1 Tbsp. olive oil
1 small onion, chopped
2 cloves garlic, minced
1 red or green pepper, diced
1/2 c. mushrooms, chopped
1 tsp. Italian seasoning
dash of cayenne pepper
1/4 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. black pepper
1/4 c. fresh parsley, chopped
2 tomatoes, chopped
10 pimento-stuffed green olives, sliced
Directions:
Preheat oven to 350°.
Cook the rice in 1 1/2 cups of water until done; set aside.
Wash the zucchini thoroughly, trim ends and slice in half lengthwise.
Scoop out the pulp, leaving a 1/4-inch shell.
Chop the zucchini pulp and reserve for later use. Saute onion and garlic in oil until softened.
Add the chopped zucchini, red or green pepper, mushrooms, herbs, spices and salt and cook until the zucchini is softened.
Remove from heat; add the tomatoes and rice and mix well.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
2 large zucchini
boiling water
1/4 c. margarine or butter
2 garlic cloves, minced
1 c. onion, chopped
1/2 c. celery, chopped
1/2 c. carrots, grated
1/2 c. red bell pepper, chopped
4 c. dry bread, cubed
2 c. chicken broth
1 Tbsp. sweet basil, whole
1/2 tsp. whole marjoram
1 tsp. whole thyme
1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
salt to taste
white pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut end off zucchini and cut lengthwise in half to make 8 boats.
Hollow out inside of zucchini in a canoe fashion, leaving 1/4-inch flesh on boat.
Heat water to boiling; salt lightly. Blanch boats in water for 3 to 4 minutes until flesh is tender. Lift out gently; drain upside down on paper towels.
Melt margarine in medium pan.
Saute garlic, onion, celery, carrots and red bell pepper until tender.
Mix sauteed vegetables, bread cubes, chicken broth, marjoram, sweet basil, thyme, salt, pepper and 1/4 cup of the Parmesan cheese.
Preheat oven to 350°.
Place zucchini boats in lightly oiled shallow baking pan.
Fill boats with stuffing mix.
Sprinkle tops with remaining 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese.
Bake 10 to 15 minutes or until cheese is browned.
Makes 8 servings.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Italian Stuffed Zucchini Boats
Ingredients:
4 medium zucchini
1/4 lb. sausage
1/4 c. onion, chopped
1 egg, slightly beaten
dash garlic powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/4 tsp. thyme
1/4 tsp. Accent
6 Tbsp. parmesan cheese
1/2 - 3/4 c. crushed crackers
Directions:
Boil zucchinis 7 to 10 minutes, drain and let cool.
Cut each zucchini in half, lengthwise and scrape out pulp.
Set zucchini aside and mash pulp and pour off liquid.
Fry sausage and onion and drain well.
Combine sausage with pulp mixture.
Add egg and remaining ingredients and mix well.
Fill zucchini halves with mixture.
Sprinkle extra parmesan cheese on top of zucchini boats and bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.

question: How do I make stuffed zucchini boats?
answer:
Title: Stuffed Zucchini
Ingredients:
4 boats (2 zucchini cut in half longways)
1/2 c. raw rice
1 c. water
1 tsp. salt
3/4 c. grated cheese
1 egg, beaten
1/2 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. onion flakes
1 tsp. parsley
Directions:
Scoop out zucchini
pulp; cook with raw rice, water and salt for 15
minutes,
covered.
Take
off
heat.
Add
grated cheese, egg (beaten), oregano, onion flakes and parsley.
Pile into shells.
Bake
at 350° for 25 minutes.
Sprinkle top with a little grated cheese when taken out of oven.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
1 head cauliflower (cut into florets)
1 tsp. salt, divided
1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted
24 saltines, crushed
1 Tbsp. sugar
1/2 tsp. pepper
1/2 c. green pepper, diced
1 (14 1/2-oz.) can diced tomatoes
1 medium onion, chopped
1 1/2 c. (6-oz.) shredded sharp cheddar cheese
Directions:
Cook cauliflower in boiling water to cover with 1/2 teaspoon salt for 5 minutes, drain. In a large bowl, stir together 1/2 teaspoon salt, butter, crackers, sugar and pepper, mix well. Stir in cauliflower, bell pepper, tomatoes, onion and 1 1/4 cups cheese. Spoon into a lightly greased 2-quart baking dish. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Serve immediately.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Creole Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
4 Tbsp. butter
1 onion, chopped
1/2 green pepper, chopped
2 Tbsp. flour
2 c. mashed cooked tomatoes (canned tomatoes can be used)
salt and pepper to taste
3 c. cooked chopped cauliflower (frozen cauliflower can be used)
1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
Directions:
Melt butter in a saucepan; add onion and green pepper and brown lightly.
Blend in flour and add tomatoes and salt and pepper.
Heat to boiling point and cook 3 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add cauliflower and heat thoroughly.
Place mixture in a casserole and cover with shredded cheese.
Bake at 350° until cheese has melted and mixture is hot and bubbly.
Makes 6 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
1 large cauliflower
5 oz. butter
5 oz. flour
about 3/4 pt. water
7 eggs
1/4 to 1/2 pt. milk
salt
white pepper
grated nutmeg
2 tsp. corn flour
Directions:
Divide the cauliflower into sprigs.
Soak in salt water for a while and rinse well.
Boil up in slightly salted water.
Make a white sauce with the butter, flour and milk, adding enough cauliflower water to make a soft, smooth dough.
Allow to cool slightly and beat in the egg yolks one by one.
Finally, fold in the stiffly beaten egg whites to which the corn flour has been added.
Season to taste and line the bottom of a ovenproof dish with the gratin mixture.
Add the cauliflower and pour over the remainder of the gratin mixture.
Bake at 350° for about 1 hour testing with a knitting needle.
Serve with cold or melted butter.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter or margarine
1 to 2 garlic cloves, minced
4 oz. cooked ham, chopped
1 head cauliflower, broken into florets
2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour
1 1/2 c. whipping cream
1/4 tsp. salt
pepper to taste
pinch of cayenne pepper
1 1/2 c. (4 to 6 oz.) shredded Swiss cheese
2 to 3 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
Directions:
Melt butter in a large skillet. Saute garlic and ham for 2 minutes. Add cauliflower and cook just until crisp-tender. Combine flour and cream; stir into skillet and blend well. Add salt, pepper and cayenne pepper. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly; cook and stir 1 minute more. Pour into a 2-quart baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese.
Place under a preheated broiler until lightly browned, about 2 to 4 minutes. Sprinkle with parsley. Serve immediately. Yield: 6 to 8 servings.

question: How do I make a cheesy cauliflower gratin?
answer:
Title: Cauliflower Au Gratin
Ingredients:
2 medium heads cauliflower
2 c. sour cream
2 c. grated sharp processed American cheese
2 tsp. toasted sesame seed
salt and white pepper
Directions:
Wash cauliflower; break into flowerets.
Cook, covered, in a small amount of boiling water until tender, 10 to 15 minutes; drain well.
Place half the flowerets in a 2-quart casserole; season with salt and pepper.
Spread with 1 cup sour cream and 1 cup cheese; top with 1 teaspoon sesame seed and repeat layers. Bake in 350° oven until cheese melts and sour cream is heated through.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 c. water
1 medium size hen or 1 large frying chicken, disjointed
3 c. self-rising flour
desired amount salt and black pepper
Directions:
Place chicken, salt and black pepper in a large pot.
Boil over medium heat until tender.
Remove chicken from stock. Combine flour, shortening and water in a mixing pan.
Mix well to form soft dough.
Roll out paper thin.
Cut in small strips.
Drop in boiling broth.
Stir lightly.
Cook dumplings for 10 to 15 minutes or until tender.
Remove from heat and add chicken.
Serve hot.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken
3 Tbsp. shortening
1 1/2 c. flour
3/4 c. milk
Directions:
Boil chicken until cooked through.
Take chicken out of pan; set aside broth.
Debone chicken and place meat back into broth. Heat broth and chicken to boiling.
While broth is heating, cut shortening into flour until mixture resembles fine crumbs.
Stir in milk.
After broth starts boiling, drop dough by spoonfuls onto chicken.
Cook uncovered 10 minutes.
Cover and cook about 10 minutes longer.
Makes 8 to 10 dumplings.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken 'N Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 whole fryer
2 c. all-purpose flour
1 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. baking powder
2 Tbsp. shortening
2 eggs
sweet milk
Directions:
Boil fryer until tender. Remove from broth and set aside to cool. Mix dry ingredients.
Cut in shortening.
Add beaten eggs and enough milk to make a stiff dough. Roll out really thin on heavily floured board.
Cut into pieces (pizza cutter works great!).
Drop into rapidly boiling broth.
Cover and simmer on very low heat for 5 to 10 minutes. Remove skin and bones from chicken and pull into bite size pieces.
Add chicken to pot and season to taste with black pepper.
I pour about a cup of sweet milk in pot just as it's finished cooking.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dumplings
Ingredients:
2 c. flour
1 egg (2 may be used)
1 tsp. salt
water
Directions:
Combine first three ingredients.
Add enough water to make a slightly stiff, rollable dough.
Roll out as thin as possible.
Cut into strips.
Drop into a rich boiling chicken broth.
Simmer on low 45 minutes to an hour.
Chicken may be left in the broth.

question: How do I make slow-cooker chicken and dumplings?
answer:
Title: Chicken And Dumplings
Ingredients:
1 whole chicken, cut up
1 celery stick
1 carrot
1 small onion
2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1/2 tsp. baking powder
pepper
1/3 c. shortening
enough water or milk to make a manageable dough to roll thin
1/2 c. milk
Directions:
Stew chicken together with a celery stick, a carrot and a small onion.
Take the meat from the bones and set aside.
Reserve chicken broth.
To make dumplings, cut shortening into dry ingredients and add liquid a little at a time.
Roll on floured board and cut into strips, cutting dumplings to approximately 1 x 2-inch pieces.
Drop into boiling chicken stock.
Turn heat down and cook at moderate temperature for approximately 15 minutes. Add 1/2 cup milk; turn off burner and cover.
Let set for several minutes before serving.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Ice Cream(No Cooking)
Ingredients:
6 eggs
2 1/2 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
4 cans evaporated milk
Directions:
Combine all ingredients in a bowl and beat with a mixer until well
blended.
Stir
in
any flavoring that you want to choose, such as:
strawberries, bananas, chocolate, etc.
Pour into freezer.
This
does not have a canned milk taste.	Makes about 5 quarts, depending on how much fruit is added.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Ice Cream(1 Hour And 30 Minutes)
Ingredients:
4 c. milk
4 c. (2 pt.) whipping cream
1 1/2 c. sugar
5 eggs
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
In 3-quart saucepan, combine milk and whipping cream.
Cook over low heat until warm (6 to 8 minutes).
In large mixer bowl, combine all remaining ingredients.
Beat at medium speed, scraping bowl often, until smooth (2 to 3 minutes).
Gradually stir into milk mixture.
Cool to room temperature.
Pour into ice cream canister.
Freeze in ice cream maker according to manufacturer's directions.
Yield:
3 quarts.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Ice Cream
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
3/4 c. sugar
2 eggs, well beaten
1 Tbsp. flour
1/4 tsp. salt
1 c. half and half
1 c. heavy cream
Directions:
In large saucepan, beat together milk, sugar, eggs, flour and salt.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until mixture reaches 160° or until just coats a metal spoon.
Cool quickly by placing pan in a bowl of ice or cold water; continue to stir.
Add half and half and heavy cream.
Combine well.
Add desired flavorings.
Freeze according to ice cream maker's instructions.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Ice Cream
Ingredients:
5 eggs, separated
1 1/2 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
2 c. heavy cream
2 1/2 tsp. vanilla
6 c. whole milk
Directions:
Put egg yolks into a large bowl.
Add sugar and beat until thick.
Beat egg whites and set aside.
Add remaining ingredients (except egg whites) to egg yolk mixture, blending well.
Fold in egg whites.
Pour into ice cream freezer and freeze.
Various fruits such as peaches, strawberries, etc., can be added.

question: How do I make a dairy-free ice cream?
answer:
Title: Homemade Ice Cream(For Four-Quart Freezer)
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
1 3/4 c. sugar
1/2 tsp. salt
2 c. half and half
1 Tbsp. vanilla extract
4 c. whipping cream
Directions:
Scald milk until bubbles form around edge.
Remove from heat. Add sugar and salt.
Stir until dissolved.
Stir in half and half, vanilla and whipping cream.
Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or longer.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. quick rise yeast (two 1/4 oz. packets)
1 tsp. salt
8 oz. lukewarm water (1 c.)
1/2 tsp. sugar
Directions:
Combine flour, yeast, salt and sugar in mixing bowl and stir. Add vegetable oil and water.
Mix together all ingredients.
Knead by hand for 3 minutes; shape and put in bowl. Cover and let rise until double in volume (approximately 1/2 hour).
Punch down; divide into 2 equal pieces and shape into round balls or leave in one piece for 16-inch pizza.
Let dough rest for 4 minutes.
Roll out approximately 12 or 16-inches in diameter.
Spray pizza pan lightly with no stick vegetable cooking spray and wipe off excess. Place on pizza pan; let rise for 10 to 15 minutes.
Add sauce, toppings and cheese.
Place on bottom rack in cold oven; turn oven to 500° and bake 17 to 20 minutes, depending on oven.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 tsp. sugar
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. oil
2 c. flour
1 1/2 c. additional flour
Directions:
Combine first 4 ingredients in large bowl allowing yeast to soften.
Stir in oil and 2 cups flour.
Add more flour until dough holds together.
Grease your hands lightly and knead dough on floured board until smooth.
Cover and let rise 45 minutes.
Shape it to pans you are using or into individual disks all on greased pans.
Brush with sauce and cover with ingredients.
Let rise about 5 to 10 more minutes then bake in 425° oven for 15 minutes. This recipe also makes a nice French bread loaf.
My family makes individualized pizzas.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. sugar
5 c. flour
1/2 tsp. salt
1 3/4 c. warm water
Directions:
Put yeast, warm water and sugar in a small bowl.
In a large bowl, add the flour, salt/yeast mixture and warm water.
Mix together, then on a floured surface, knead for a few minutes.
Put dough into a well-greased bowl.
Cover with wax paper.
Let rise for 1 hour, then spread dough onto a well-greased pizza pan or cookie sheet.
Let rise another 1/2 hour.
Bake at 350° or until crust is brown on bottom.

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
3 3/4 c. flour
2 pkg. yeast
pinch of sugar
pinch of salt
1 c. warm water
1 Tbsp. oil
Directions:
Mix first four ingredients.
Add water and oil.
Mix and knead until you are able to roll into a smooth ball.
Place in warm place with towel over it.
Let rise 30 minutes.
Punch down and let set for 4 minutes.
Roll out and place on pan and let rise for 15 minutes.
Add toppings (sauce, cheese, meats, veggies, etc.). Place pizza in cold oven, set temperature to 500° and bake for 15 to 17 minutes, or longer depending on your oven!
(This recipe works best on "Air-Pans.")

question: How do I make homemade pizza dough?
answer:
Title: Pizza Dough
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 Tbsp. oil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
2 3/4 to 3 1/4 c. flour
Directions:
Mix water and yeast together until dissolved.
Add sugar and oil; mix well.
Add salt and 2 1/2 cups flour.
Mix into a ball. Turn onto floured board.
Add remaining flour until a bread-type consistency.
Put in lightly greased bowl.
Cover and let rise until double.
Spread on 1 large pizza pan or 2 small.
Bake at 325° for 5 minutes.
Add favorite pizza toppings and sauce; bake at 425° for 15 minutes.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Stir-Fry
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
2 bunches green onions
1 (4 oz.) can mushrooms
soy sauce
Chinese noodles
1 c. uncooked brown rice
1 c. uncooked long grain white rice
Directions:
One cup of uncooked kashi may be substituted for brown rice.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Quick Dish
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
2 cans stewed potatoes
2 cans pinto or kidney beans
approximately 6 to 8 servings instant rice
seasonings to taste
Directions:
Brown the ground turkey. Cook the instant rice according to directions using a microwave-safe casserole dish.
Combine the ground turkey, rice, tomatoes and beans. Microwave 3 to 4 minutes, until hot.

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Delight
Ingredients:
1 pkg. ground turkey
onions, chopped
garlic, chopped
garlic salt
chicken seasoning
1 egg
bread crumbs
Directions:
Mix all of the ingredients together.
Mixture can be used for meatballs or your favorite pasta dish, or it can be used for burgers on the grill or on the stove.
Cook in your selected method (grill or stove).
They are simply great and are a healthy change for those unable to eat beef!!!

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: When You Don'T Have Much Time, Cook This...
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
16 oz. can stewed tomatoes
8 oz. can corn
Directions:
Fry the ground turkey and drain.
Mix with tomatoes and corn. Heat on medium-low for about 1/2 hour and serve.
Great with corn bread!

question: What can I do with ground turkey and rice?
answer:
Title: Ground Turkey Casserole
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground turkey
1 tsp. garlic salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 (8 oz.) cans tomato sauce
1 (8 oz.) pkg. egg noodles
3 oz. cream cheese, softened
1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
1 c. sour cream
Directions:
Brown ground turkey and drain.
Return to pan; add garlic salt, sugar and tomato sauce.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Cook egg noodles and drain.
Mix cream cheese, Cheddar cheese and sour cream.
Layer in 13 x 9-inch dish as follows:
egg noodles, cheese mixture and meat sauce.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.
Serves 6 to 8.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. active dry yeast
1/8 c. hot tap water
1/3 c. brown sugar
1 1/3 c. warm water
approximately 5 c. flour
baking soda
Kosher salt
Directions:
In a large bowl place 1/8 cup hot water from tap.
Add yeast and stir until dissolved.
Add warm water and brown sugar.
Stir until dissolved.
Add flour until dough does not stick to sides of bowl.
Place dough on a floured surface and knead until smooth. Pinch off dough the size of a golf ball and roll into a rope approximately 10 inches long.
Form into shape of pretzel and place on a floured surface.
Prepare cookie sheets sprayed with Pam. Fill frying pan with water.
For every cup of water add 1 tablespoon of baking soda.
Bring water to a slow boil.
Place pretzels into slowly boiling water for approximately 30 seconds. Place pretzels on cookie sheet and salt with Kosher salt.
Bake at 475° just until golden brown.
Pretzels are best if eaten right away.
They can be frozen after the frying pan step and baked from frozen at a later date.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 c. warm water
2 pkg. dry yeast
2 Tbsp. sugar
3 c. flour
2 tsp. baking soda
1 egg
coarse salt
Directions:
Mix yeast and water;
then
add sugar and flour.
Knead on floured surface and let raise in warm space for 30 minutes. Heat oven to 400°.
Fill
pot
1/2
full
of water; add baking soda and bring to
a
boil.
Roll dough to 1/2-inch thickness; cut and twist into pretzel shapes.
Place on slotted spoon and lower
into boiling water
for
5
to
10
seconds.
Place
on greased cookie sheet.
Brush with beaten egg and sprinkle with salt.
Bake 12 to 15 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels(Snack)
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 tsp. salt
1 Tbsp. sugar
2 c. each: whole wheat and white flour
Directions:
Mix yeast in warm water; stir in salt and sugar.
Add 4 cups flour; mix well.
Turn the dough onto a floured surface to knead for 5 to 10 minutes.
Pull off walnut-sized chunks and roll into snakes.
Place on greased cookie sheet.
To make shiny pretzels, beat an egg and brush onto pretzels.
Sprinkle lightly with salt. Bake at 425° for 15 minutes or until golden brown.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Homemade Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. warm water
1 pkg. yeast
3/4 tsp. salt
1 1/2 tsp. salt
4 c. flour
1 egg
Directions:
Dissolve yeast in water.
Add sugar and salt.
Gradually add flour. Roll dough into long rolls and shape pretzels.
Beat egg and brush on top. Sprinkle on salt. Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade soft pretzels?
answer:
Title: Soft Pretzels
Ingredients:
1 pkg. yeast
1 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. warm water
2 1/2 to 3 c. flour
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. salad oil
1 egg white, beaten
1 tsp. each salt and pepper
caraway seed or coarse salt
Directions:
Dissolve yeast and sugar in water in bowl.
Let stand about 10 minutes. Add 2 cups flour, salt and oil. Beat until smooth. Gradually stir in more flour (about 1/2 cup) to form soft dough. Turn dough out to floured surface.
Knead until smooth and elastic, adding more flour (up to 1/2 cup) if necessary to prevent dough from being too sticky.
Place dough in a greased bowl. Cover and let stand to rise about double (45 minutes to 1 hour).

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant From The Border
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground beef
4 slices bacon, chopped
1/2 c. chopped onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1 clove garlic, minced
1 medium eggplant, peeled and cut into chunks
1 can tomato sauce
1/4 tsp. pepper
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Brown ground beef.
Drain and set aside.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Baked Eggplant
Ingredients:
1 eggplant
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/4 stick margarine
1 onion, chopped
1 green pepper, chopped
2 c. Italian rice, cooked
1/3 c. seasoned bread crumbs
salt and pepper to taste
1 tsp. oregano
1 tsp. parsley
1/3 lb. grated Romano cheese
Directions:
Peel eggplant and cut into cubes.
Cook in boiling salt water. Drain well.
Mash eggplant down with a fork.
Brown ground beef in butter with spices, onion and green pepper.
Stir in eggplant and cooked rice.
Spoon into lightly greased Pyrex casserole. Sprinkle with bread crumbs and grated Romano cheese.
Cover and bake at 375° for 20 minutes.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant And Beef Casserole
Ingredients:
1 large eggplant
1/2 c. oil
1/4 c. minced onion
1/2 c. chopped green pepper
1/2 lb. ground beef
1/2 c. bread crumbs
2 c. canned tomatoes
salt and pepper to taste
2 Tbsp. sugar
1 c. sharp grated cheese
Directions:
Saute eggplant (peeled and diced) in oil with onion, green pepper and ground beef for 10 minutes.
Add tomatoes, salt, pepper and sugar and cook 10 minutes longer.
Pour into buttered 2-quart casserole.
Cover with cheese and bread crumbs.
Bake at 400° for 20 minutes.
Serves 8 to 10 people.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Beef Eggplant Bake
Ingredients:
2 lb. beef for stew
1/4 c. flour
2 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
3 Tbsp. cooking fat
1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
1/4 c. water
2 medium onions, sliced
1 tsp. dill seed
1 large eggplant (approximately 1 1/2 lb.)
2 c. boiling water
1 tsp. salt
1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
1/4 c. dry bread crumbs
1/4 c. grated Mozzarella cheese
Directions:
Cut beef cubes in 1/2-inch strips across the grain.
Combine flour, 2 teaspoons salt and pepper. Dredge meat and brown in hot fat in large frying pan, 1/3 at a time.
Drain tomatoes, reserving liquid.
Break tomatoes into pieces and set aside.
Add reserved tomato liquid, water, onions and dill seed.
Cover and cook slowly 1 hour and 15 minutes or until tender.
Add tomatoes and cook 5 minutes.
Cut eggplant into 1/2-inch slices.
Pare and place in large saucepan with boiling water and salt.
Boil 5 to 10 minutes, turning occasionally.
Remove to absorbent paper and pat dry. Combine Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs.
Sprinkle half the crumb mixture in bottom of a 2 1/2-quart casserole.
Place eggplant in layers in casserole and sprinkle with remaining crumbs.
Add meat mixture and top with Mozzarella cheese.
Cover and bake in moderate 350° oven for 15 to 20 minutes or until eggplant is done. Makes 6 to 8 servings.

question: What can I cook with eggplant and ground beef?
answer:
Title: Eggplant-Beef Casserole
Ingredients:
1 medium eggplant
1 lb. ground beef
1 c. chopped onion
16 oz. can tomatoes
1 tsp. basil
1 1/2 tsp. salt
pepper
1/4 tsp. garlic powder
1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese
3 c. hot cooked rice
grated Parmesan cheese
Directions:
Peel and cook eggplant in salt water until tender; drain. Brown beef and onion.
Stir in other ingredients.
Sprinkle with Mozzarella cheese.
Serve over hot rice sprinkled with Parmesan cheese.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus(Chickpea Spread)
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
2 c. cooked, drained chickpeas or canned
4 Tbsp. lemon juice
1/2 tsp. salt
3 to 5 Tbsp. tahini sauce*
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/4 tsp. cumin
2 Tbsp. olive oil
Directions:
Start your food processor and then put in garlic.
As soon as garlic is minced, put in chickpeas, lemon juice, salt, tahini and cold water.
Blend until smooth.
Add more cold water if you want it thinner.
Empty contents into a shallow 6-inch wide bowl. Smooth contents.
Sprinkle with paprika and cumin, then drizzle oil over it.
Best served at room temperature.
Dip with pita bread.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
2 cloves garlic
1 (15 oz.) can garbanzos (chickpeas)
1/2 c. tahini paste
3 to 4 Tbsp. lemon juice
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 to 4 Tbsp. water
1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon
pinch of coriander
salt to taste
pita bread, warmed and cut into triangles
Directions:
Mince garlic in food processor.
Add garbanzos, tahini, lemon juice, water, olive oil, salt and cumin.
Blend until smooth.
Add lemon juice or water if too thick.
Transfer to serving dish and garnish with olives, chopped red onion and chopped tomato.
Use pita triangles for dipping.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 lb. chickpeas (garbanzos)
1/2 c. tahini (sesame paste)
2 cloves garlic
1/2 c. lemon or lime juice
cooking broth (from chickpeas)
pita breads
paprika or cayenne to taste
olive oil
parsley
Directions:
Cook chickpeas in lightly salted water. Drain. Reserve liquid. Cool.
Peel chickpeas (this can be done by rolling peas between palms of hands to loosen skins).
Process in small amounts in food processor.
Process garlic.
Add tahini; mix well.
Add lemon or lime juice and as much cooking broth to make a medium thick dipping paste.
Place in dish with well in center. Top with olive oil, paprika or pepper and parsley. Serve with pita bread for dipping.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 2/3 c. (15 oz. can) cooked chickpeas, drained, reserve liquid
1/4 c. tahini (sesame paste)
1/4 c. lemon juice
3 large cloves garlic, crushed
1/2 tsp. ground coriander
1/4 tsp. cumin
1/4 tsp. paprika
water if needed
2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley
1/4 c. scallions
dash of cayenne
Directions:
In blender (in batches) or in food processor, process chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice until mixture reaches consistency of coarse paste; use as much of reserved pea liquid or water as needed.
Add garlic, coriander, cumin, paprika and cayenne and process again.
Transfer to a bowl and add scallions. Cover and chill one hour before serving the dip.
Add parsley as garnish.

question: How do I make a creamy roasted garlic hummus?
answer:
Title: Hummus
Ingredients:
1 can chick peas, drained (reserve liquid to add if needed)
2 Tbsp. Tahini sesame paste
drizzle of olive oil
1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes
1 tsp. cumin
1 tsp. coriander
1 clove garlic, crushed
salt
juice from 1/2 of lemon
Directions:
Place all ingredients in food processor.
Process until well blended.
Serve with pita chips, celery, and carrot sticks.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: Homemade French Fries
Ingredients:
3 c. vegetable oil
7 medium potatoes
1/2 tsp. onion salt
Directions:
Preheat deep fryer on medium with the vegetable oil, add onion salt to the oil.
Cut potatoes into quarters.
Deep fry for 1 1/2 minutes, check, stir occasionally.
Remove when brown.
Place on paper toweling to drain.
Add salt as desired.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: French Fries
Ingredients:
10 oz. potatoes
1 tsp. oil
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut potatoes into 1/2 inch wide sticks.
Place in old water (ice) about 30 minutes.
Pat dry.
Place potatoes in plastic bag with other ingredients.
Shake to coat.
Arrange on large cookie sheet in a single layer.
Bake at 425° for 30 minutes, stirring once or twice until golden brown.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: No Fry French Fries
Ingredients:
6 large potatoes
1/4 c. oil
1 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese (optional)
1/2 tsp. garlic powder (optional)
1 tsp. paprika (optional)
1/2 tsp. pepper (optional)
Directions:
Scrub potatoes well and cut into strips.
Combine oil, salt and pepper (may add optional ingredients) into a plastic bag.
Add potatoes and shake to coat.
Spread strips on 2 cookie sheets in a single layer.
Bake at 400° for 20 to 30 minutes until golden brown and tender.
Stir once.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: French Fries
Ingredients:
2 medium potatoes
2 tsp. oil
1/4 tsp. paprika
1/8 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cut potatoes lengthwise into 1/2 inch wide sticks. Place in bowl of ice water about 30 minutes to crisp, then drain.
Pat dry with paper towels. Place sticks into plastic bag and add oil, paprika and salt. Shake to coat. Place on large cookie sheet in single layer. Bake at 425° for 30 to 35 minutes. Stir once or twice. Bake at 450° for last 10 minutes.

question: How do I make homemade French fries?
answer:
Title: Oven Baked French Fries
Ingredients:
8 large potatoes
1/2 c. salad oil
2 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese
1 tsp. salt
1/4 tsp. pepper
1/2 tsp. paprika
1/2 tsp. garlic powder
1/2 tsp. seasoned salt (optional)
1/2 tsp. herb and pepper (optional)
Directions:
Peel potatoes and cut into 1/-8 inch wedges lengthwise.
Set aside.
Mix together oil and the rest of the ingredients.
Add the potatoes and coat well.
Place in a single layer on a cookie sheet.
Bake at 375° about 45 minutes.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Easy Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1 c. sugar
3 tsp. baking powder
1/2 tsp. salt
1 c. sweet milk (2% or whole)
1/2 c. butter or oleo
2 lb. peaches
1 c. water
1 c. sugar
Directions:
Mix first four ingredients.
Gradually stir in milk and butter.
Mix peaches, water and sugar in another bowl (use no more than 2 cups liquid).
In a 9 x 13-inch baking pan, melt butter. Pour batter in pan then pour fruit over batter.
During baking, batter will rise to top.
Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until top is well browned.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. sliced peaches (raw)
1/4 c. water
1 c. sugar
1 egg
1 Tbsp. shortening
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
light cream
Directions:
In saucepan, combine peaches, water and 1/2 cup of sugar. Bring to a boil.
Keep hot.
Beat egg, 1/2 cup of sugar and shortening until fluffy.
Add milk.
Stir in flour, baking powder and salt.
Spread batter in greased baking dish.
Pour hot peaches over the batter.
Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until fruit is tender.
Serve with cream.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 c. flour
1/3 c. Crisco
1 tsp. baking powder
pinch of salt
1/3 c. milk
1 stick butter
2 c. sugar
2 c. water
sliced fresh peaches
Directions:
Blend flour, Crisco, baking powder and salt with pastry blender until it resembles coarse meal.
Add milk and stir.
Roll out on floured surface in rectangle form.
Melt 1 stick butter in a 13 x 9-inch dish; set aside.
Boil sugar and water until melted.
Place sliced fresh peaches on crust and roll as if jelly roll.
Slice into 16 pieces and place in dish with melted butter. Pour water and sugar mixture over sliced pieces.
Bake at 400° for 40 minutes.
Use with any fresh fruit.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
5 c. fresh peaches, peeled and sliced
1 c. plus 1 tsp. sugar
1/4 tsp. nutmeg
1 c. flour, divided
3 Tbsp. butter, melted
1/4 c. shortening
1/4 tsp. salt
2 Tbsp. cold water
Directions:
Place peaches, 1 cup sugar and nutmeg in a saucepan.
Stir over low heat until peaches begin to exude their juices.
Sprinkle on 1/4 cup flour; cook and stir until well incorporated.
Stir in the butter.
Turn into an ovenproof 9-inch baking dish.
Place remaining flour and salt in a small bowl.
Using a pastry blender (or fingertips), work in the shortening until the mixture resembles coarse meal.
Stir in enough water to make a soft dough. Gather the dough into a ball; roll out on a floured board.
Place rolled out dough over the peaches, tucking under the edges or trimming as needed.
Sprinkle the dough with 1 teaspoon sugar; slash in several places to allow the steam to escape.
Bake in preheated 400° oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until top is well browned.
Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.

question: How do I make a peach cobbler from scratch?
answer:
Title: Fresh Peach Cobbler
Ingredients:
1 1/2 c. thinly sliced fresh peaches
1/4 c. water
1/2 c. sugar
1 egg
1/2 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. shortening
1 Tbsp. milk
1/2 c. flour
1/2 tsp. baking powder
1/4 tsp. salt
Directions:
In saucepan, combine peaches, water and 1/2 cup sugar.
Bring to boil and stir.
Keep hot.
With spoon, beat egg, 1/2 cup sugar and shortening until fluffy.
Add milk; stir in flour, baking powder and salt.
Spread batter in a greased 8-inch square pan, then pour hot peaches over the batter.
Bake at 375° for 25 to 30 minutes or until tender.
Serve warm with cream, if desired. Serves 4 to 6.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
1 pkg. (1 cup) semi-sweet chocolate chips
2 Tbsp. granulated or super-fine sugar
1/2 c. heavy cream
3 egg yolks
1/2 c. heavy cream, whipped
Directions:
Melt chocolate over simmering water in double boiler.
Stir in sugar and 1/2 cup heavy cream.
Cook, stirring constantly, until smooth and no lumps remain.
Beat yolks until smooth. Slowly pour in chocolate mixture while beating yolks constantly. Set aside and cool to room temperature.
When cool, fold in whipped cream.
Spoon into bowls and refrigerate until serving time.
Garnish with a rosette of whipped cream and chocolate curls.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
8 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
2 to 3 egg yolks
1 1/4 c. whipping cream
3 Tbsp. powdered sugar
3 Tbsp. strong brewed coffee
Directions:
Melt chocolate in a double boiler or in a pan with hot water. (Do not let water boil.)
Add sugar, coffee and egg yolks, one at a time.
Stir until mixture has thickened.
Remove from heat.
Let cool.
Whip cream.
Add slightly cooled chocolate mixture.
Spoon mousse into individual serving dishes.
Let cool in refrigerator for 1 hour.
Garnish each serving with a spoonful of whipped cream.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
8 eggs (room temperature)
12 oz. semi-sweet chocolate chips
10 Tbsp. butter
1/4 c. brandy
4 oz. large chocolate bar, shaved
1 c. whipped cream
Directions:
Melt butter and chocolate chips in top of double boiler (or on low power in microwave).
Beat in egg yolks, one at a time.
Cool slightly.
Stir in brandy (or Kahlua or any flavored liquer). Beat egg whites into stiff peaks.
Fold whites into the chocolate mixture, gently blending.
Spoon into 8 separate dishes or 1 large dish.
Refrigerate.
Before serving, garnish with whipped cream and shaved chocolate curls.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse
Ingredients:
4 oz. semi-sweet chocolate
4 egg yolks
1/2 stick butter, softened
dash of salt
1 tsp. vanilla
4 egg whites
6 Tbsp. sugar
Directions:
Put chocolate in saucepan.
Cover with 2 inches very hot tap water.
Cover.
Let stand 5 minutes or until chocolate is soft enough to stick toothpick through.
When chocolate is soft, but not dissolved, drain water.
Do not worry that some water clings.
Add yolks.
Stir with whisk and cook until thick.
Remove from heat. Add butter, salt and vanilla.
Mix well and cool.
Beat egg whites; gradually add sugar.
Beat until stiff.
Mix into chocolate. Serves 6.

question: How can I make a chocolate mousse?
answer:
Title: Chocolate Mousse(Serves 12 Or More)
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. sweet chocolate
6 large eggs
3 Tbsp. water
2 c. heavy cream
6 Tbsp. sugar
1/4 c. Amaretto
whipped cream for garnish
grated chocolate for garnish
Directions:
Cut chocolate into 1/2 inch pieces and place in a saucepan. Place pan in almost boiling water and cover.
Let chocolate melt over lowered heat.
Put yolks in a heavy saucepan and add the 3 tablespoons water.
Place saucepan over very low heat while beating vigorously and constantly with a wire whisk, being careful not to burn.
When yolks start to thicken, add Amaretto.
Continue beating until sauce is consistency of a Hollandaise sauce.
Remove from heat.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Sauce
Ingredients:
1 lb. ground round
1 (16 oz.) can tomato sauce
1 small can tomato paste
1/4 to 1/2 green pepper, chopped
1/4 to 1/2 medium onion, chopped
1/4 tsp. garlic
oregano to taste
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Brown ground round.
Add chopped green pepper; stir.
Add chopped onion; stir.
Cover until softened, 5 minutes.
Add sauce and paste.
Add water until desired thickness.
Add garlic, oregano and pepper.
Simmer 20 minutes.
Serve over pasta. Freezes well.
Serves 4 to 6.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Spaghetti Sauce For A Crowd
Ingredients:
8 lb. ground beef
3 cloves minced garlic
1 large onion, chopped
4 tsp. garlic salt
1 1/2 tsp. pepper
5 tsp. Italian seasoning
1 (No. 10) can crushed tomatoes
5 c. tomato sauce (1/2 of No. 10 can)
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 bay leaves
salt to taste
Directions:
Brown meat and drain.
Saute garlic and onion in olive oil. Add to meat.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer 2 to 3 hours, stirring often.
Add water if necessary to keep right consistency. Add olives, oregano or basil to taste.
Serves 50.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Pasta Sauce(Large Pot)
Ingredients:
8 cans tomato sauce
2 large cans tomato paste
1 medium onion, chopped
2 Tbsp. oregano
1/2 tsp. black pepper
3/4 Tbsp. garlic powder
1 tsp. thyme
1 Tbsp. basil
1/2 c. Italian cheese
Directions:
Saute onion in small amount of oil.
Add tomato paste.
Stir for a minute.
Add all other ingredients.
Then add 4 cans of water, using tomato paste can for measure.
Bring to boil.
Simmer 3 hours, stirring often.
Add 1/2 cup grated Italian cheese after cooking 1 hour.
(Meatballs can be made and cooked in sauce.)

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 Tbsp. butter
1 medium onion, sliced
1 to 2 stalks celery, chopped
1 green pepper, sliced
1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced
3 large green olives, chopped
1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste, with 2 c. water*
2 Tbsp. parsley, snipped
1/2 to 1 tsp. salt
dash of pepper
1 bay leaf
1 tsp. dried oregano
Directions:
*Or, 1 (12 ounce) tomato sauce and 1 cup water or tomato paste and whole tomatoes and little water.

question: How do I make a sauce for pasta with only tomatoes and garlic?
answer:
Title: Garlic Pasta Sauce
Ingredients:
1/4 c. olive oil
4 or 5 garlic cloves, sliced
1/4 c. onion, chopped
1/4 c. bell pepper, chopped
4 or 5 tomatoes, skinned and chopped
1/2 c. water
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Heat oil and brown garlic until light brown.
Add onion and bell
pepper;
cook
a
little and add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Simmer
for
5
minutes.
Add
water;
bring to boil. Reduce heat;
simmer
for 20 minutes.
Cook thin spaghetti or angel
hair pasta; drain.
Pour sauce over pasta; blend well. Sprinkle with grated Italian cheese.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1 c. roasted peanuts, with shells and skins removed
2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
Directions:
Put peanuts into blender or food processor.
Gradually add 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil, blending until texture is thick and creamy.
Keep homemade peanut butter refrigerated.
If oil separates, stir back in with spoon.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter Candy
Ingredients:
3 c. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1 1/2 c. milk
1/4 c. butter
1 tsp. vanilla
1 (18 oz.) jar Jif peanut butter (creamy)
Directions:
Combine peanut butter, sugar and salt in a large saucepan (3 quart size).
Add milk gradually; mix thoroughly and bring to a bubbly boil on high heat, stirring continuously.
Reduce heat to medium and continue to boil the mixture without stirring until it reaches a temperature of 232° or until a small amount of mixture forms a soft ball when dropped into cold water.
(Be sure bulb of thermometer is not resting on bottom of saucepan.)
Remove saucepan from heat; add butter and vanilla to mixture.
Do not stir.
Allow candy to cool at room temperature until it reaches 110°.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Homemade Peanut Butter
Ingredients:
1 c. salted, roasted Spanish peanuts
1 tsp. sugar or honey (these are optional)
1 Tbsp. peanut oil
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Place ingredients in an electric blender.
Blend until mixture becomes paste-like or speadable.
It may be necessary to add more peanut oil.
The ingredients must be blended for several minutes. Store in tightly covered container.
Homemade peanut butter will separate on standing; stir before using.
You may leave out the sugar and salt, if desired.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Squares
Ingredients:
1/2 lb. margarine, softened
1 c. white sugar
1 c. brown sugar
2 eggs
2 c. flour (plain)
2/3 c. peanut butter (smooth)
1 tsp. vanilla
1/2 tsp. salt
1 tsp. soda
2 c. oats
Directions:
Cream the margarine and sugar.
Mix eggs, peanut butter, vanilla, salt and soda.
Add flour and oats.
Spread dough in slightly greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake 20 to 24 minutes at 350°. While hot, cover with milk chocolate pieces and allow to melt before icing.

question: How do I make homemade peanut butter?
answer:
Title: Peanut Butter Temptations
Ingredients:
1 bag miniature peanut butter cups
1/2 c. butter
1/2 c. peanut butter
1/2 c. brown sugar
1/2 c. white sugar
1 egg
1/2 tsp. vanilla
1 1/4 c. flour
3/4 tsp. soda
1/2 tsp. salt
Directions:
Cream butter, peanut butter and sugars; add egg and vanilla. Mix well.
Add flour, soda and salt.
Shape into 1-inch balls. Place in ungreased small muffin tins.
Bake at 375° for 8 minutes. Immediately after removing from oven, press peanut butter cup into center.
Cool 10 minutes and carefully remove from tin.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Easy Granola Mix
Ingredients:
5 c. quick-cooking rolled oats
1 1/2 c. wheat germs
1 c. shredded coconut
2 Tbsp. brown sugar
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. maple syrup
1/2 butter, melted
1 tsp. vanilla
1 c. raisins and/or chopped walnuts
Directions:
Mix oats, wheat germ, coconut, brown sugar and cinnamon in a large bowl. Add maple syrup and mix well. Stir together melted butter and vanilla and mix in the mixture. Turn into a large shallow pan. Bake at 325° for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring after 10 minutes. Cool. Add raisins and/or nuts. Store in airtight container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Simple Granola
Ingredients:
3 c. 3 minute oats or old fashioned oats
1/2 c. raisins
1/2 c. sunflower nuts
1/2 c. slivered almonds
1/2 c. chopped pecans
1/2 c. wheat germ
1/2 c. coconut
1/2 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. honey
Directions:
Combine all ingredients except oil and honey in large mixing bowl.
Mix oil and honey together; pour over oat mixture.
Mix well.
Spread into 2 (15 x 10 x 1-inch) baking pans.
Bake in a 300° oven for about 20 minutes, stirring once.
Remove from pan when cool.
Store in tightly covered container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
5 c. quick oats
3/4 c. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. dry milk
1/3 c. honey
3/4 tsp. cinnamon
pinch of salt
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Place 1/4 cup of mung beans in a quart jar and cover with tepid water.
Cover with cheesecloth and tie securely.
Soak overnight.
Drain water off.
Set in a warm, dark place.
Every day, rinse with tepid water and drain.
Place in a warm dark place again.
Repeat 4 to 5 days or until sprouts are as big as you want.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Granola(Kids Recipe)
Ingredients:
4 c. old-fashioned oatmeal, uncooked
1 1/2 c. wheat germ (raw or toasted)
1 c. coconut, grated
1/4 c. nonfat dry milk
2 Tbsp. cinnamon
1 Tbsp. brown sugar
1/3 c. vegetable oil
1/2 c. honey
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1/2 c. sesame seed
1/2 c. slivered almonds
1 c. raisins
Directions:
In a large bowl, mix dry ingredients.
Combine oil, honey and vanilla in a saucepan and warm.
Add these to the dry ingredients and stir until all the particles are coated.
(Hand mixing works well here).
Spread this mixture in a long, low pan or rimmed baking sheet that has been sprayed with vegetable shortening. Bake at 250° for an hour, turning with spatula every 15 minutes. When finished toasting, add raisins and toss.
Cool and store in an airtight container.

question: How do I make a simple granola?
answer:
Title: Homemade Granola
Ingredients:
2 c. old fashioned oats
1 1/2 c. chopped almonds
1 c. shredded coconut
1/2 c. toasted wheat germ
1 tsp. salt
1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk
1/4 c. vegetable oil
1 1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Preheat
oven
to
300°.
In a large bowl combine oats, almonds, coconut,
wheat
germ and salt.
Stir in milk and oil and mix
thoroughly.
Spread
on
a
wax-paper
lined shallow baking pan and bake, stirring occasionally for 1 hour or until golden. Stir
in
raisins.	Let
cool
and	store in airtight containers. Makes 7 1/2 cups.
(And it's delicious too!)

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Delicious Bread Pudding #1
Ingredients:
4 c. bread cubes
2 c. milk, scalded with 1/4 c. butter
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1 tsp. cinnamon
1/2 c. raisins
Directions:
Heat oven to 350°.
Put bread crumbs in 1 1/2-quart baking dish.
Blend in remaining ingredients and stir.
Place baking dish in pan of hot water, about 1-inch deep, and bake for 45 to 50 minutes, until knife inserted comes out clean.
Great for holidays!

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding(Makes 6 Servings)
Ingredients:
3 c. soft bread crumbs
1/4 c. butter
2 eggs, beaten
1/4 tsp. cinnamon
2 c. scalded milk
1/2 c. sugar
1/8 tsp. salt
1/4 c. raisins
Directions:
Scald milk with butter.
Stir in all other ingredients, except the eggs.
Mix well, then add eggs last, stirring gently.
Pour into greased pan.
Place pan in hot water and bake about 30 minutes in 350° oven.
Serve about 1 ounce butter sauce with each serving.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding
Ingredients:
2 c. milk
4 c. coarse bread crumbs
1/4 c. melted butter
1/2 c. sugar
2 eggs, slightly beaten
1/4 tsp. salt
1/2 c. seedless raisins
1 tsp. cinnamon
Directions:
Scald milk and pour over bread crumbs.
Cool and add remaining ingredients, mixing well.
Pour into a 1 1/2-quart casserole dish. Place casserole dish in pan of hot water (1 inch deep).
Bake at 350° for 1 hour, or until a silver knife inserted into pudding comes out clean.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding
Ingredients:
3 c. bread cubes (6 slices)
1/4 tsp. salt
4 eggs, slightly beaten
1 1/2 tsp. vanilla
4 c. scalded milk
1 Tbsp. butter
3/4 c. sugar
1 Tbsp. flour
Directions:
Lightly spray a 7 1/2 x 11 1/2 baking dish with Pam.
Place in a 9 x 13 filled with 1-inch of water.
Set aside.
Place bread cubes in the bottom of the smaller dish.
Put milk in a saucepan and heat to scalding.
Remove from the heat.
Add sugar, flour, salt, butter, vanilla and eggs.
Beat well.
Pour over bread cubes.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour.
Check after 45 minutes as ovens may vary.
Pudding is done when a knife inserted near the middle comes out clean.

question: How do I make a savory bread pudding?
answer:
Title: Bread Pudding
Ingredients:
5 slices bread, cut in small cubes
4 eggs
4 c. milk
1/2 c. raisins
1/3 c. dates, chopped
1 Tbsp. vanilla
1/3 c. wine or brandy
2/3 c. sugar
2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted
Directions:
Soak raisins and dates in wine or brandy for at least 15 minutes.
Add milk and bread.
Bring to a boil.
Add beaten eggs, mixed with sugar and vanilla.
Let mixture come to boiling point. Pour into 8 x 12-inch pan, that has been sprayed with nonstick spray.
Put this pan into a larger pan with hot water 1 1/2-inches deep.
Pour melted butter over top and sprinkle with nutmeg.
Bake in 375° oven until knife inserted in center comes out clean.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup
Ingredients:
2 large leeks
1 Tbsp. vegetable oil
1 Tbsp. butter
2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced
2 c. chicken broth
salt and pepper to taste
Directions:
Cut off roots and tops of leeks.
Slice and wash.
In soup pot, saute leeks in oil and butter until limp.
Add potatoes and chicken broth.
Simmer 30 minutes or until potatoes are done.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup(This Recipe Is About 125 Years Old)
Ingredients:
3 leeks (4 if small) or bunch of scallions
3 medium potatoes
2 Tbsp. very fine barley
3/4 qt. water
1 c. milk
salt and butter
Directions:
Split leeks or scallions in half and cut in small pieces.
Cut up potatoes.
In water, put potatoes, salt and barley and let come to a boil; cook about 1 hour.
Mash the potatoes.
Thin out soup with a cup of milk, more if needed.
Again let it come to a boiling point, turn off heat and add 4 tablespoons of butter (no substitute or it won't give same flavor).

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup
Ingredients:
1 bunch leeks, sliced very fine
3 stalks celery, sliced very fine
3 Tbsp. butter
2 1/2 c. diced potatoes
3 c. milk or half milk and half all-purpose cream
1 c. water
Directions:
Put leeks, celery and butter in a pan.
Cook 10 minutes, stirring constantly.
Add water.
Cover and cook 10 more minutes. Add potatoes and add more water to cover.
Cover and cook 10 additional minutes.
Add milk.
Simmer until potatoes are tender. Season to taste with salt, pepper and cayenne.
Serve hot.
Serves 6.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Potato-Leek Soup
Ingredients:
2 Tbsp. olive oil
2 leeks, cleaned and chopped
2 Tbsp. whole-wheat flour (do not substitute white flour)
4 or 5 small potatoes, cleaned and chopped (peeled or not, your choice)
water to cover
salt and black pepper to taste
1/4 tsp. red chile (optional)
Directions:
Heat olive oil in large soup pan over moderate heat. Add leeks and cook just until tender. Add flour and stir to blend with the oil.
Add potatoes and water to cover. Cook until potatoes are tender.
Add seasoning to taste. Serve hot, preferably with a warm bread.

question: How do I make a creamy leek and potato soup?
answer:
Title: Leek And Potato Soup
Ingredients:
6 Tbsp. butter
3 c. leeks, minced
3 Tbsp. flour
4 c. water
1 Tbsp. salt
pepper
4 c. potatoes, diced
4 c. milk, warmed
1/2 c. heavy cream
3 Tbsp. butter
chives or chopped parsley
Directions:
Saute leeks in butter 5 minutes.
Blend in flour and cook 2 minutes.
Gradually blend in water.
Add salt, pepper and potatoes; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer 40 minutes, partially covered.
Add milk; bring to a simmer.
Blend in cream. Turn off heat and add butter.
Garnish with chives or parsley.
